40001001	Luno njʼolukalala lwʼamasiina gʼabaatu abomu lulyo lwa Yesu Kurisito Omwijuhulu wa Dawudi, owaali omwijuhulu wa Yibbulayimu.
40001002	Yibbulayimu gasaala Yisaka, nga Yisaka asaala Yakobbo. Nga Yakobbo asaala Yuda ko nʼabalebe babe,
40001003	nga Yuda asaala Pereezi ni Zeera era nyinaawe gaali nje Tamali. Nga Pereezi asaala Hezirooni, nga Hezirooni asaala Raamu,
40001004	nga Raamu asaala Aminadabbu. NgʼAminadabbu asaala Nasoni, nga Nasoni asaala Salumooni;
40001005	nga Salumooni asaala Bbowaazi. Era nyina ya Bbowaazi gaali nje Rahabbu. Bbowaazi gasaala Obbedi, nyina yʼObbedi gaali nje Luusi, era ngʼObbedi asaala Yese.
40001006	Nga Yese asaala habaha Dawudi, nga Dawudi asaala Sulemaani era nyina ya Sulemaani gaali muha Wuriya mu husooka.
40001007	Nga Sulemaani asaala Rehobbowaamu, nga Rehobbowaamu asaala Abbija, ngʼAbbija asaala Asa.
40001008	NgʼAsa asaala Yehosofaati, nga Yehosofaati asaala Yolamu, nga Yolamu asaala Wuziiya.
40001009	Nga Wuziiya asaala Yosamu, nga Yosamu asaala Ahazi, ngʼAhazi asaala Hezekiya.
40001010	Nga Hezekiya asaala Manaase, nga Manaase asaala Amoni, ngʼAmoni asaala Yosiya.
40001011	Nga Yosiya asaala Yekoniya nʼabalebe babe era ebiseera ebyo njʼebi baŋiriramo Abayisirayiri mu buŋaŋanguse e Bbabbulooni.
40001012	Oluvanyuma lwʼehiseera ehyo ehi baŋiriramo Abayisirayiri e Bbabbulooni, Yekoniya gasaala Salutyeri, nga Salutyeri asaala Zerubbabbeeri.
40001013	Nga Zerubbabbeeri asaala Abbiwudi, ngʼAbbiwudi asaala Eliyakimu, ngʼEliyakimu asaala Azori.
40001014	NgʼAzori asaala Zadooki, nga Zadooki asaala Akimu, ngʼAkimu asaala Eliwudi.
40001015	NgʼEliwudi asaala Elyazaali, ngʼElyazaali asaala Matani, nga Matani asaala Yakobbo.
40001016	Nga Yakobbo asaala Yosefu yamwe ya Malyamu, nyina ya Yesu oyu balanga baati Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu.
40001017	Ŋaaliŋo emirembe ehumi neene ohuŋwa hu Yibbulayimu ohwola hu Dawudi, ehumi nʼene ohuŋwa hu Dawudi ohwola olu baŋira Abayisirayiri mu buŋaŋanguse e Bbabbulooni. Nindi ehumi neene ohuŋwa mu buŋaŋanguse ohwola olu basaala Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu.
40001018	Bino njʼebyaliŋo ko basaale Yesu Kurisito: nyina Malyamu ni Yosefu baali basalireŋo ohufumbirigana. Aye ko bafumbirigane, bavumbula Malyamu nʼali hida hu lwʼobuŋangi wʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu.
40001019	Olwohuba Yosefu yamwe ya Malyamu gaali muutu ahola ebiruŋamu, sigendire humuswasa mu baatu. Olwʼehyo, gendire amuleheŋo mu ngiso.
40001020	Ne ni gaali nʼategeha ohuhola atyo, nga malayika wa Hatonda Musengwa amubonehera mu hirooto amuloma ati, “Yosefu, omwijuhulu wa Dawudi, otatya huŋira Malyamu ngʼomuhasi wuwo. Ehida ehi ali ni nahyo hyʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu.
40001021	Aja husaala omwana musinde era olimuguliha esiina oti Yesu; olwohuba aja hunoŋola abaatu babe mu bibi byawe.”
40001022	Bino byosibyosi byaliŋo ohwoheresa ehi Musengwa gaaloma nʼabitira mu naabbi ati,
40001023	“Omuhaana ahiiri ohweŋimbangaho nʼomusinde aliba hida, ngʼasaala omwana omusinde. Era balimuguliha esiina baati Emanweri,” (amahulu galyo ti, “Hatonda ali ni neefe.”)
40001024	Olwʼehyo Yosefu ni gasisimuha, gaahola ngʼolu malayika wa Musengwa gamulagira, gaŋira Malyamu ngʼomuhasi wuwe.
40001025	Aye sigeŋimba ni naye ohwola olu gasaala omwana omusinde, nga Yosefu amuguliha esiina ati Yesu.
40002001	Oluvanyuma lwʼohusaaliwa hwa Yesu e Bbeserekemu mu twale lyʼe Buyudaaya, mu hiseera ehi Herode gaali habaha, abasinde abagesi ohuŋwa ewuŋwa lyuba baatiina e Yerusaalemu.
40002002	Ni boola nga babuusa baati, “Omwana oyu basaaye ohuba habaha wʼAbayudaaya ali ŋeena? Hwaweene emunyeenye nʼeraga ohusaaliwa huhwe, njʼohuuja humujumirye.”
40002003	Ehyo ni hyagwa habaha Herode mu hutwi, hyamweralihirisa era nʼabaatu bosibosi mu Yerusaalemu beralihirira.
40002004	Olwʼehyo, Herode galanga oluhiiho lwʼabatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi bosibosi, ngʼababuusa ati, “Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu wahusaaliwa ŋeena?”
40002005	Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Wahusaaliwa e Bbeserekemu mu twale lyʼe Buyudaaya, olwohuba naabbi gaŋandiiha ati,
40002006	“ ‘Aye enywe abaatu bomu Bbeserekemu mu twale lyʼe Buyudaaya, abaŋugi bomu Buyudaaya bamanyire baati ehibuga hyenywe hirala hu bibuga ebyʼomugaso, olwohuba mu nywe muliŋwamo omutangirisi, aliŋuga Yisirayiri, abaatu bange.’ ”
40002007	Ngʼaŋo Herode alanga abasinde abagesi abo mu ngiso ababuusa ehiseera ehyene nʼehyene ehi baboneramo emunyeenye.
40002008	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Mutiine e Bbeserekemu mubuuhirise hu biŋamba hu mwana oyo, era ni muvumbula aŋa ali, muutebuseeho keesi nahatiina mujumirye.”
40002009	Oluvanyuma lwa habaha Herode ohubaloma atyo, baŋamba engira batiina e Bbeserekemu. Ni baali ni bahiiri mu ngira nga nindi babona emunyeenye yira eyi baabona era nga yibatangiriramo ohwola olu yemereera ŋamugulu wʼenyumba omu mwana gaali.
40002010	Ni baabona emunyeenye eyo, basangaala bugali weene.
40002011	Ni bengira mu nyumba, baabona omwana nʼali ni nyina Malyamu, nga bahubba amafuha bamujumirya. Ngʼaŋo batusa mu saŋu jaawe ebirabo ebyʼezaabbu, obubbaani nʼebyahaloosa ebi balanga baati miira bahena batonera omwana oyo.
40002012	Ehiseera ehyʼohwagamayo ewaawe ni hyola, baŋamba engira eyindi olwohuba Hatonda galoma ni nabo mu hirooto nʼabalabula ohutagama eyiri Herode.
40002013	Oluvanyuma lwʼabasinde abagesi abo ohutiina ewaawe, malayika wa Musengwa gabonehera Yosefu mu hirooto, ngʼamuloma ati, “Yosefu yinyoheramo oŋambe omwana ni nyina mweyibe mutiine e Misiri, mube eyo ohwola olu ndi balomera ehyʼohuhola, olwohuba Herode aja hutuma abaatu bendule omwana bamwite.”
40002014	Ngʼaŋo Yosefu genyoheramo owiire owo, aŋamba omwana ni nyina batiina e Misiri.
40002015	Eyo gamenyayo ohwola olu Herode gafa. Hino hyaliŋo ohwoheresa ehi Musengwa galoma nʼabitira mu naabbi ati, “Nalanga omwana wange ohuŋwa e Misiri.”
40002016	Herode ni gategeera ati abasinde abagesi abo bamweholaholanisyeho, galuŋa era ngʼalagira beete abaana abaseere bosibosi abʼemyaha ebiri ohwiha ŋaasi mu Bbeserekemu nʼohumirirano. Ehyo gahihola ni geema hu hiseera ehi basinde abagesi baloma baati njʼehi baboneramo emunyeenye.
40002017	Ngʼaŋo ehi naabbi Yeremiya galoma ati,
40002018	“Ejanjaasi liŋwera mu Raama, enduulu nʼohulira ohwʼamaani, Lakeeli nʼalira abaana babe era nʼatenda muutu yesiyesi humugumyagumya, olwohuba abaana babe bafuuye,” hyolerera.
40002019	Oluvanyuma lwa Herode ohufa, malayika wa Musengwa gabonehera Yosefu mu hirooto e Misiri,
40002020	ngʼamuloma ati, “Yosefu; yinyoheramo oŋire omwana ni nyina e Yisirayiri, olwohuba abo abaali ni benda ohwita omwana, bafuuye.”
40002021	Olwʼehyo, nga Yosefu genyoha aŋamba omwana ni nyina nga bagamayo e Yisirayiri.
40002022	Aye Yosefu ni gaŋulira ati Arucelaawo njʼowagobola mu magulu ga semwana Herode nga habaha wa Buyudaaya, gatya ohwagamayo. Ne olwohuba Hatonda gamulabula mu hirooto, gasalaŋo hutiina mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya,
40002023	ngʼatiina mu habuga ahabalanga baati Nazaleesi. Ngʼebyo ebi abanaabbi baaloma baati, “Bali mulanga Munazaleesi,” byolerera.
40003001	Ehiseera hyola nga ŋabaaŋo omuutu oyu balanganga baati Yowaane Omubatiza, owatiina mu lulafu lwʼomu twale lyʼe Buyudaaya, nʼabuulira ati,
40003002	“Mwebbwage muleheŋo ebibi byenywe, olwohuba obuŋugi bwomwigulu bwigereeye.”
40003003	Yowaane oyo njʼoyu naabbi Yisaaya galomaho ati, “Ŋaliŋo ejanjaasi eriŋwera mu lulafu, omuutu nʼalangirira ati, ‘Muhosiirire Musengwa engira, muluŋamye amagira gage.’ ”
40003004	Yowaane gambalanga ehyambalo ehi baahola mu mooya gʼesolo eyi balanga baati engamiya, era ni gesidiha omusipi ogwʼehyanjo mu hihunya. Emere yiye yalinga esige nʼomudugere.
40003005	Era olwʼohubuulira huhwe, abaatu baŋwerehererangamo ohuŋwa mu hibuga hyʼe Yerusaalemu nomu twale lyʼe Buyudaaya ko nʼebitundu ebiririheene olwabi Yoludaani.
40003006	Nga batiina benenya ebibi byawe era ngʼababatiza mu lwabi Yoludaani.
40003007	Aye Yowaane ni gabona eduuli lyʼAbafalisaayo nʼAbasadukaayo ni batiinayo ohubabatiza, ngʼabalomanga ati, “Enywe abaatu abahabi hyʼetemu, njʼani owabalabula ohuŋunuha ehiruŋi hya Hatonda?
40003008	Ale ŋaahani muhole ebikolwa ebiraga biiti mwebbwagire mulehireŋo ebibi byenywe.
40003009	Mulehere aŋo ohweginiha muuti mbo muli bagwalaafu olwohuba muli bejuhulu ba Yibbulayimu. Mbalomera ti Hatonda aŋanga ohucuusa amabaale gano gafuuha bejuhulu ba Yibbulayimu.
40003010	Ŋaahani mumanye muuti muli hyʼemisaala eji muutu ategeheeye aŋo embasa ohujitema. Era hiisi musaala ogutaama bibala ebiraŋi baja hugutema, bagudanye mu muliro.
40003011	“Ese mbabatiza nʼamaaji ohulaga ti mwebbwagire era mulehireŋo ebibi byenywe. Aye ŋaliŋo aliija oluvanyuma lwange owukira obuŋangi oyu ese toola wayire ohufihulamo engayito. Oyo alibabatiza nʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu nʼomuliro.
40003012	Niye anahaabule mu baatu ngʼolu omuutu aŋamba olugali gaahonja ohwabula omuhuuji nʼembehe. Embehe nijo ajihumbaania gajibiiha aye omuhuuji ŋalala nʼebidete alibyohya nʼomuliro ogutasima.”
40003013	Mu hiseera ehyene ehyo, nga Yesu aŋwa mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya, atiina eyiri Yowaane amubatize mu lwabi Yoludaani.
40003014	Aye Yowaane gagesyaho ohugaana ohubatiza Yesu nʼaloma ati, “Ndiiwe owʼohumbatiza, lwahiina wuuja eyi ndi?”
40003015	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Hahibe hiityo, olwohuba hiraŋi ohuhola byosibyosi ebisangaasa Hatonda.” Ngʼaŋo Yowaane afugiirira ohubatiza Yesu.
40003016	Aŋo ni naaŋo, Yesu ni gahena ohubatiziwa ngʼaŋwa mu maaji. Mu hiseera ehyo ngʼegulu liwihuha, ngʼabona Omwoyo wa Hatonda nʼamwihaho nʼali mu hifaananyi hyʼeŋuusi.
40003017	Ngʼejanjaasi liŋwa mwigulu ni ŋaliŋo aloma ati, “Ono njʼOmwana wange omuhoda, owunesiimisa.”
40004001	Oluvanyuma, ngʼOmwoyo aluŋamia Yesu amuŋira mu lulafu Sitaani ohumuhema.
40004002	Oluvanyuma lwa Yesu ohusiiba endaalo amahumi ane omuusi nʼowiire, enjala yamuluma.
40004003	Ngʼaŋo Sitaani atiina amuloma ati, “Nʼoba nʼoli Mwana wa Hatonda, lagira amabaale gano gafuuhe biryo olye.”
40004004	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, ‘Omuutu saanabenga mulamu lwa biryo byoŋene, aye nʼolwa hiisi hibono hya Hatonda.’ ”
40004005	Ngʼaŋo Sitaani aŋira Yesu mu hibuga ehyabufu ehi balanga baati Yerusaalemu amuninia hu hisuli hya Yekaalu,
40004006	amuloma ati, “Nʼoba nʼoli Mwana wa Hatonda, tuuma ogwe ŋaasi, olwohuba hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “ ‘Hatonda aliragira abamalayika babe bahuyeeda era hiiti balihubbaha, ndiwegumula hu mabaale huhulumya magulu.’ ”
40004007	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Era nindi hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti; ‘Soohemanga Hatonda Musengwawo.’ ”
40004008	Nga nindi Sitaani aŋira Yesu ŋamugulu hu lusozi, amulaga owahabaha bwosibwosi owohu hyalo nʼebiraŋi byamo.
40004009	Ngʼamuloma ati, “Ebyo byosibyosi nja hubihuŋa, singa wunjumirya.”
40004010	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma Sitaani ati, “Pwereŋo! Hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti; ‘Onajumiryenga nje Hatonda Musengwawo era njʼoyu onaŋeeresenge yeŋene.’ ”
40004011	Ngʼaŋo Sitaani amuleha era ngʼabamalayika batiina baja bamuŋeeresa.
40004012	Oluvanyuma, Yesu ni gaali nʼahiiri mu twale lyʼe Buyudaaya, gaŋulira ati badanyire Yowaane mu komera, nga gaagamayo mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya.
40004013	Ni goola eyo, gatiina e Nazaleesi eyi gaŋwa ngʼatiina amenya e Kaperanawumu, ehiri hu nyanja mu hitundu hyʼe Zebbulooni ni Nafutaali.
40004014	Hino hyali hiityo, ohwoheresa ehi naabbi Yisaaya galoma ati,
40004015	“Ehyalo hyʼe Zebbulooni, nʼehyalo hyʼe Nafutaali, hu luguudo olutiina hu nyanja yʼe Galilaaya, engereha wa Yoludaani, ni Galilaaya, omu Abatali Bayudaaya bamenya!
40004016	Enjase eyʼamaani yaduhiiye abaatu abahosi bʼebibi. Enjase yaduhiiye abo abali mu hiirema.”
40004017	Ohuŋwa mu hiseera ehyo, nga Yesu atandiha ohubuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi ati, “Mwebbwage olwohuba obuŋugi bwomwigulu bwigereeye.”
40004018	Lulala, Yesu ni gaali nʼagenda hwigenya lyʼenyanja yʼe Galilaaya, gabona abalebe babiri: Simooni oyu balanga Peetero nʼAndereya. Abalebe abo baali benuli bʼenyeeni ni batega ahatimba mu nyanja.
40004019	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Muuje munonde mugendenga ni neese, ndibafuula benuli bʼabaatu.”
40004020	Aŋo ni naaŋo nga baleha aŋo obutimba bwawe, bamulondaho.
40004021	Ni gesendaho mu moni ŋatotono, ngʼabona abalebe babiri, Yakobbo ni Yowaane abasaani ba Zebbedaayo ni bali ni saawe mu lyato ni bagonjoola obutimba waawe.
40004022	Nga boosi abalanga. Aŋo ni naaŋo nga baleha eryato ni saawe Zebbedaayo nga nibo batiina ni Yesu bagendanga ni naye.
40004023	Ngʼaŋo Yesu atiina hiisi ŋaatu mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya nʼasomesa mu mahumbaaniro gaawe, nʼabuulira abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu buŋugi bwa Hatonda, era ngʼaŋonia hiisi bulwaye mu baatu.
40004024	Ngʼefuma lirye lihwana mu gwanga lya Siriya mwosimwosi. Era nga bamuleetera abalwaye aba hiisi ngeri, abaali nʼobulumi obwʼamaani, abaaliho emisambwa, abʼesimbu nʼabasanyalaala, ngʼabaŋonia.
40004025	Ngʼaŋo ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ohuŋwa mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya, nʼe Dekapooli, nʼe Yerusaalemu, nomu twale lyʼe Buyudaaya era nʼengereha wʼolwabi Yoludaani bagendanga ni naye.
40005001	Lulala, Yesu ni gabona ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu, gatiina hu lusozi nga gehala. Ngʼaŋo abeegi babe batiina aŋa gaali,
40005002	ngʼatandiha ohubasomesa ati,
40005003	“Bali nʼekabi abo abamanyire baati benda Hatonda abayeede, olwohuba njʼaba genda babe mu buŋugi buwe.
40005004	Bali nʼekabi abalira hatyane; olwohuba Hatonda alibagumyagumya.
40005005	Bali nʼekabi abo abawombeefu; olwohuba Hatonda alibaŋa ehyalo hino, nʼebiraŋi byosibyosi ebi abendesa.
40005006	Bali nʼekabi abayala era abʼenduŋo eruma olwʼohwenda ohuhola ebi Hatonda genda, olwohuba banahegute.
40005007	Bali nʼekabi abo abali nʼehisa; olwohuba Hatonda alibaŋambira ehisa.
40005008	Bali nʼekabi abo abali nʼemyoyo emigwalaafu; olwohuba balibona Hatonda moni hu moni.
40005009	Bali nʼekabi abo abenda emiyaaya; olwohuba balifuuha baana ba Hatonda.
40005010	Bali nʼekabi abo ababahiyaania olwʼohwenda ohuhola ebi Hatonda genda; olwohuba abo mbaba genda babe mu buŋugi buwe.
40005011	“Muli nʼekabi ni banabaduhenga, babahiyaania era babaŋayirisa hiisi hibi olwohuba baloobera bange.
40005012	Musangaalenga era musaŋalyenga olwohuba muli nʼomuhemba mubba mwigulu. Mu ngeri njʼenyene nʼabanaabbi boosi babahiyaania.
40005013	“Muli hyʼomunyu omuherehe mu hyalo muno. Aye singa omunyu gufuuha heresu, oŋanga otye ohugugobosamo obunoli nindi? Guba gubula mugaso ohutusaho ohugudanya ngʼabaatu bagutyakirira.
40005014	“Enywe muli hyʼenjase mu hyalo muno emulihira hiisi muutu era muboneherera hyʼehibuga ehi batongola hu lusozi.
40005015	Era omuutu saaŋambya taala gayifunihira mu hisero oba gayita mu kuliiti aye ayita hu hihondo aŋa yinaaŋe hiisi muutu ali mu nyumba enjase.
40005016	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, mube hyʼenjase eyiri abaatu, ko bajumiryenga Senywe ali mwigulu ni babona ebikolwa byenywe ebiraŋi.
40005017	“Mutaŋeega muuti naaja hudibya magambi aga baŋa Musa oba ebi banaabbi baŋandiiha. Sinaaja hubidibya kadi, aye ohubyoheresa.
40005018	Mbalomera ehituufu ti, ohutusaho ngʼegulu nʼehyalo biŋoyeeŋo, ŋabula hanjikuta huŋwa hu magambi ga Hatonda, ohwola olu byosibyosi bija hwolerera.
40005019	“Olwʼehyo, omuutu yesiyesi abbwaga erala hu magambi wayire erisingayo obutono ohuba lyʼomugaso era gasomesa nʼabandi ohuhola cʼehyene, omuutu oyo njʼalisembayo ohutaba wʼomugaso mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda. Aye oyo aŋamba ebiragiro era gabisomesa nʼabandi, aja huba muhulu mu buŋugi buwe.
40005020	Era mbalomera ti; ohutusaho nga muholire ebi Hatonda genda ohuhiraho ngʼolu basomesa bʼamagambi ga Hatonda nʼAbafalisaayo bahola, simulingira mu buŋugi buwe.
40005021	“Mwaŋulira muuti Hatonda gaaloma abaatu abahalehale ati, ‘Siwiitanga muutu wahyo. Era omuutu yesiyesi owiita, balimusalira omusango.’
40005022	Aye ese mbaloma ti; hiisi aluŋira owahye, balimusalira omusango. Nindi oyo aloma owahye ati, ‘Oboneha hirangi,’ bamuŋaŋabira mu Luhiiho lwʼAbayudaaya Olubbala. Era hiisi aloma owahye ati, ‘Musiru ewe,’ balimudanya mu muliro namehere ogutasima.
40005023	“Olwʼehyo, nʼobanga nʼoŋira eŋongo yiyo eyiri Hatonda hu hituuti, ne wahebulira oti mulebewo ali nʼehyahwemulugunyaho,
40005024	olehanga aŋo eŋongo liryo ŋa hituuti, watiina watabagana ni naye, ko wagobola waliŋayo.
40005025	“Singa ŋabaŋo ahuŋaŋabira, nʼaba nʼahuŋira mu mbuga fuba nʼamaani mufugiirisanie ni muhiiri mu ngira. Ne ni mutafugiirisania, nʼalihwosa mu moni wʼomulamuzi, balihusalira omusango bahena bahuŋayo eyiri omuhulu wʼabasirikale bahudanye mu komera.
40005026	Kulomera ehituufu ti, sooliŋwa mu komera ohutusaho nʼosasuuye ebbeesa josijosi eji ahubanja.
40005027	“Mwaŋulira muuti amagambi aga baŋa Musa galoma gaati, ‘Sooholanga buhwedi.’
40005028	Aye mbaloma ti omuutu yesiyesi aheja hu muhasi gamwegomba, aba ahenire ohuhola obuhwedi mu mwoyo gugwe.
40005029	Olwʼehyo hanye emoni yiyo eyʼohu muhono omulungi njʼehuleetera ohuhola ehibi, yomoleemo oyidanye. Hiraŋi obe wa moni ndala aye wingire mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda, ohuhira olu osigasa emoni jombi, aye bahudanya mu hifo omu oja husihiirihira.
40005030	Era hanye omuhono gugwo omulungi njʼoguhuleetera ohuhola ehibi, gutemeeho ogudanye. Hiraŋi ohufiirwa hirala hu bitundu byʼomubiri gugwo aye osune obulamu obutaŋwaŋo ohuhira olu badanya omubiri gugwo gwosigwosi mu hifo omu oja husihiirihira.
40005031	“Mwaŋulira muuti amagambi aga baŋa Musa galoma gaati, ‘Omuutu yesiyesi abbinga omuhasi wuwe, amuŋanga ebbaluŋa eyihahasa yiiti amubbingire.’
40005032	Aye ese mbaloma ti, hiisi abbinga omuhasi wuwe, ohutusaho olwʼobuhwedi, amuleetera ohuhola obuhwedi. Era omuutu yesiyesi afumbirwa oyu babbingire, aba ahola obuhwedi.
40005033	“Era nindi mwaŋulira muuti baaloma abahalehale baati, ‘Soolayiranga wereere aye woheresanga ebi wasuubisa Hatonda Musengwa.’
40005034	Aye mbaloma ti mutalayiranga wayire lulala oba ohulayira mbo muuti, ‘Mu mazima aga Hatonda ali mwigulu,’ olwohuba njʼetebe ya Hatonda,
40005035	oba ehyalo, olwohuba Hatonda njʼohwata amagulu gage, oba ni mutangirisa ehibuga Yerusaalemu, olwohuba njʼehibuga hya Habaha Ohihenaho.
40005036	Era soolayiranga wasinga nʼomutwe gugwo, olwohuba oguŋumaho buŋangi, ohufuula wayire olufiiri lulala ohuba luhosa oba lumali.
40005037	Olwʼehyo, onaba nʼonahole ehiitu, loma oti, ‘Nahihole’ oba oti, ‘Bbe sinahihole.’ Ehiitu hyosihyosi ehihiraho aŋo hiba hiŋwa eyiri hibooyi Sitaani.
40005038	“Mwaŋulira muuti baaloma abahalehale baati, ‘Singa omuutu ahukosa emoni, weesi mukose moni, linaba liino weesi omukosa liino.’
40005039	Aye mbaloma ti; siwegalulanga. Era omuutu nʼahuhubbanga oluŋi hwitama, mucuuhise ahubbe nʼohulindi lyosi.
40005040	Era singa omuutu ahuŋira mu mbuga ni genda ahunyageho esaati yiyo, omuŋanga nʼekooti yoosi.
40005041	Era singa omuutu ahuŋalirisa ohumugegera ebiitu emayiro ndala, bimugegere emayiro ebiri.
40005042	Singa omuutu ahusunga ehiitu, omuŋanga, era ni bayo owenda ohumuŋola, omuŋolanga.
40005043	“Mwaŋulira muuti baaloma abahalehale baati, ‘Yendanga omuutu wahyo, aye ocaawenga omulabe wuwo.’
40005044	Ne mbaloma ti, mwendenga abalabe benywe era mulomberenga abo ababahiyaania,
40005045	ko muŋange ohuba abaana ba Senywe ali mwigulu. Olwohuba gaduhisa abalaŋi nʼababi omumwi era agwisa efula ewʼabahola ebiraŋi ko nʼabahola ebibi.
40005046	Ni munendenga ababenda boŋene, ehyo hibaŋeesa kabi hi? Nʼabaŋoosa aba muloma ti bali nʼebibi boosi benda ababenda.
40005047	Era singa muheesa abalebe benywe boŋene, ehi muba ni muholire hiba hihiriraho ŋe ehyʼabandi? NʼAbatali Bayudaaya boosi po bahola.
40005048	Olwʼehyo, enywe muli nʼohuba besigwa mu huhola ebiraŋi ngʼolu Senywe ali mwigulu ali mwesigwa.”
40006001	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma abeegi babe ati, “Mwehuume ohutaholanga bikolwa ebiraŋi mu moni jʼabaatu olwʼohwenda bababone. Olwohuba singa muhola muutyo, simulisuna muhemba ohuŋwa eyiri Senywe ali mwigulu.
40006002	“Olwʼehyo nʼogabiranga abagadi, siwerangiriranga ngʼolu banafuusi bahola mu mahumbaaniro nomu nguudo, ni benda abaatu babaŋe eŋono. Mbalomera ehituufu ti, olwʼohwenda abaatu babaŋe eŋono, ogwo njʼomuhemba ogu basuna.
40006003	Aye ewe nʼobanga nʼogabira abagadi, sooganyanga muhono gugwo omugooda ohumanya omulungi ehi guholire.
40006004	Mu ngeri hyʼeyo ehi oliba nʼoŋaaye abagadi, hiriba mu ngiso. Era Hatonda abona ebi bahola mu ngiso alihuŋa omuhemba.
40006005	“Era ni mubanga ni musaba, simubanga hyʼabanafuusi, olwohuba nibo benda ohwemereera mu mahumbaaniro nʼohutulo wʼenguudo ko abaatu bababone, babaŋe eŋono. Mbalomera ehituufu ti, eŋono eryo njʼomuhemba gwawe ogu balihomaho.
40006006	Aye enywe ni muba ni musaba, mwingiranga mu hisenge mwigalaŋo olwigi, nga ko musaba Hatonda ataboneha. Era Senywe abona ebi bahola mu ngiso aja hubaŋa omuhemba.
40006007	“Era ni musaba, mutagobojolangamo ebibono ebiŋuma mahulu ngʼolu ‘abahosi bʼebibi’ bahola olwohuba baŋeega mbo baati Hatonda aja huŋulira esaala jaawe olwʼebibono byawe ebingi.
40006008	Mutaba hya nibo olwohuba Senywe amanyire ebi mwenda ni muhiiri nʼohusaba.
40006009	“Ni muba ni musaba, mulombenga muuti, “ ‘Seefe ali mwigulu, oŋeewe eŋono,
40006010	obuŋugi buwo buuje, ebi wenda biholewe hu hyalo ngʼolu biholewa mwigulu.
40006011	Tufunise ebiryo ebyolwa leero
40006012	era tusoniŋe ebibi byefe, ngʼolu hwesi husoniŋa hiisi abatuhola ebibi.
40006013	Era otatuleha hugwa mu huhemewa, aye tunoŋole mu bubi.’
40006014	“Era ni munasoniŋenga abaatu ebibi ebi babahola, Senywe ali mwigulu anabasoniŋenga mwesi.
40006015	Aye ni mutasoniŋenga ababahola ebibi, mwesi Senywe saanabasoniŋenga.
40006016	“Ni mubanga ni musiiba, simunakuŋalanga hyʼabanafuusi abeyonoona mu moni, ohulaga abaatu baati bali husiiba. Mbalomera ehituufu ti, olwʼohwenda abaatu babaŋe eŋono, ogwo njʼomuhemba gwawe ogu balihomaho.
40006017	Aye ni muba ni musiiba, musaabenga mu moni, mweŋahe amafuta era mususule nʼefiiri,
40006018	ko abaatu batategeera baati muli husiiba, ohutusaho Hatonda ataboneha abe njʼababona. Era Hatonda oyo abona ebi bahola mu ngiso alibaŋa omuhemba.
40006019	“Simwebihiranga buŋinda hu hyalo huno ohu bisereŋi nʼobutalagi bibyonoona nʼabeebi babbwaga enyumba babiiba.
40006020	Aye mwebiihirenga obuŋinda bwenywe mwigulu eyi butalagi nʼebisereŋi bitoola; nʼabeebi eyi bataŋanga hutiina babbwaga, beeba.
40006021	Olwohuba eyi obuŋinda bubwo buba nʼomwoyo gugwo njʼeyi gusiiba ni guŋemba.
40006022	“Emoni yiri hyʼetaala hu mubiri. Era emoni jenywe jinaba ni jibona bulaŋi, obulamu bwenywe bwosibwosi buja hwijula enjase.
40006023	Aye emoni jenywe jinaba ni jitabona bulaŋi, muba muli mu hiirema. Enjase eyiri mu nywe yinafuuha hiirema, ehiirema ehyo hiba hibitiirifu!
40006024	“Ŋaŋuma aŋanga ohuba nʼabasengwa babe babiri. Hinaba hiityo acaawaho mulala nga genda owundi oba agonderaho mulala ngʼatala owundi. Omuutu saaŋanga huŋira ebbeesa ngʼehiitu ehihulu era gasigala nʼahiŋeeresa Hatonda.”
40006025	Nga Yesu aloma abeegi babe ati, “Olwʼehyo, mbaloma ti muteŋendehereranga olwʼehyohulya oba ehyʼohunywa oba ehyʼohwambala. Obulamu si wa muŋendo ohuhira ebiryo, nʼomubiri gwosi siguhira ebyʼohwambala?
40006026	Ale mubonere hu nyuni, sijirima era jiŋuma byagi omu jibunga ebiryo aye Bbaabba obwomwigulu ajiŋa ebijirya. Enywe simuhirira ŋaleeŋi enyuni ejo bbe?
40006027	Era njʼani hu enywe aŋanga ohweyongesaho wayire oludaalo lulala hu bulamu buwe olwʼohweŋendehereranga?
40006028	“Lwahiina mweŋendeherera olwʼebyohwambala? Mubonere hu bimuli, sibirima wayire ohutungisa engoye.
40006029	Era mbalomera ti; nʼeŋono eri habaha Sulemaani gaali ni nalyo lyosiryosi sigambalanga hubihira emboneha.
40006030	Obanga eyo njʼengeri eyi Hatonda alabiirira ebimuli ebiriŋo ehiseera buseera nga babyohya omuliro, saalibambasa enywe abali nʼohufugiirira ohudiidiri?
40006031	“Kale muteŋendehereranga hu ebi munaalye oba munanywe oba munambale.
40006032	Byosibyosi ebyo mbebi baatu abatafugiirira Hatonda baŋembaho byabahenera ehiseera, aye Senywe ali mwigulu amanyire ati mubyenda.
40006033	Ne enywe muŋeegenga hu buŋugi bwa Hatonda nʼohubiitu ebiruŋamu ebi genda muhole, ali bameedaho nʼebisigayeyo byosibyosi.
40006034	Kale simweŋendehereranga olwʼoludaalo olunahahye ejo. Olwohuba hiisi ludaalo luba nʼebyeŋendeheresa ebyalwo.
40007001	“Mutasaliranga bahyenywe misango, mwesi Hatonda saalibasalira.
40007002	Olwohuba, mu ngeri enyene eyi musaliramo abahyenywe emisango, njʼeyi mwesi Hatonda alibasaliramo. Era ehipimo ehi mu pimiramo abandi, ehyene ehyo mwesi cʼehi balibapimiramo.
40007003	Lwahiina ehiri hu wahyo njʼehiraŋi hyʼohuloma, waleherera ehi huliho ewe wamwene?
40007004	Oŋanga otye ohuloma mulebewo oti, ‘Mulebe yange, leha kutuse ahaatu hu moni’, aye ewe wamwene nʼotebona oguutu oguhuli hu moni?
40007005	Munafuusi ewe, sooka wetuseho oguutu oguhuli hu moni ko oŋange ohutusa ahaatu ahali hu wahyo.
40007006	“Simuŋambanga ebiitu ebyabufu mwabiŋa ababbengi. Olwohuba bali hyʼembiiji ejityakirira ebiitu ebyʼomugaso jonoona, era bali hyʼembwa ejibacuuhira jabaluma.”
40007007	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma beegi babe ati, “Mulombenga, Hatonda alibaŋa ehi musaba, mwegumyenga ohwendula, muligundula era mukookonenga, balibeguliraŋo.
40007008	Olwohuba hiisi asunga bamuŋa, owendula agundula, nʼakookona yeesi bamwiguliraŋo.
40007009	Ale njʼani hu enywe aŋa omwana wuwe ebaale nʼamusungire omugaati
40007010	oba aŋa omwana wuwe etemu nʼamusungire enyeeni?
40007011	Olwo ŋaahani obanga enywe ababi mumanyire ohuŋa abaana benywe ebiraŋi, ne Senywe ali mwigulu saalihira bugali weene ohuŋa ebiraŋi abo abamusunga?
40007012	“Olwʼehyo mu hiisi hiitu hyosihyosi, muholerenga abahyenywe ebi mwahendire mwesi babaholere. Ebyo mu buupi njʼebiri mu magambi nomu ebi banaabbi baŋandiiha.”
40007013	Yesu geyongera ohuloma abeegi babe ati, “Mufubenga ohwingirira mu mulyango omudiiŋi, olwohuba omulyango ogwingira mu husihiiriha mugalamu, nʼengira eyolayo ngalamu era bangi abayibitamo.
40007014	Ne omulyango ogwingira mu bulamu obutaŋwaŋo mudiiŋi, nʼengira eyolayo yahwenyigiirisa, nʼabayigundula sibangi.
40007015	“Mwehuumenga abanaabbi abʼobudulingi, abaaja eyi muli ni baboneha bawombeefu hyʼetaama, aye mugati mula ni bali hya nalaŋa.
40007016	Ne munahabafaanihisye hu bikolwa byawe. Ebibala ebyʼomusaala ogu balanga baati omutiini sibabinoga hu buŋwa obusaba, nʼebibala byʼemizabbibbu sibabinoga hu manani.
40007017	Mu ngeri njʼenyene hiisi musaala omulaŋi gwama ebibala ebiraŋi, aye omusaala omubi gwama ebibala ebibi.
40007018	Omusaala omulaŋi sigwama bibala ebibi era nʼomusaala omubi sigwama bibala ebiraŋi.
40007019	Hiisi musaala ogutataho bibala ebiraŋi bagutemaaŋo, era bagudanya mu muliro.
40007020	Hyʼemisaala, abanaabbi abʼobudulingi boosi mulibafaanihisya hu bikolwa byawe.
40007021	“Si hiisi owunanga ati, ‘Musengwa, Musengwa,’ aja hwingira mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda, ohutusaho oyo ahola ebi Bbaabba ali mwigulu genda.
40007022	Hu ludaalo olwo, bangi balindoma baati, ‘Musengwa, Musengwa, sihwasomesanga mu siina liryo? Sihwabbinganga emisambwa hu baatu era hwahola ebyamaliholiho bingi mu siina liryo?’
40007023	Aye ese ndibagobolamo lwatu ti; ‘Simbamanyire era simanyire nʼeyi muŋwera. Olwʼehyo, mupwere ni naaŋo enywe abahosi bʼebibi.’
40007024	“Olwʼehyo hiisi aŋulira ebibono byange gahena gabiholeraho, ali hyʼowatongola enyumba yiye hu mabaale.
40007025	Efula yagwa, ngʼamaaji gabanda, ngʼepunga ehubba enyumba eyo, aye siyefumuliraŋo olwohuba gayitongola hu mabaale.
40007026	Aye hiisi aŋulira ebibono byange ebyo, ndabiholeraho, ali hyʼomuutu omubuyabuya, owatongola enyumba yiye hu mujehe.
40007027	Efula ni yagwa, ngʼamaaji gabanda, ngʼepunga ehubba enyumba eyo yefumuliyeŋo yosiyosi yaŋwera hwiroba.”
40007028	Yesu ni gahena ohuloma ebibono ebyo, ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu hyeŋunja bugali esomesa yiye.
40007029	Olwohuba gasomesanga nʼobuŋangi, sosi hyʼabasomesa bʼamagambi ga Hatonda.
40008001	Oluvanyuma Yesu ni gaŋwa hu lusozi ngʼehibbubbu hyʼabaatu himulondaho.
40008002	Ngʼaŋo ŋabaŋo omusinde omugenge owatiina aŋa gaali, ngʼahubba amafuha mu moni jije, amwegalihira ati, “Muhulu, ni huba ni huli husiima huhwo, ponie.”
40008003	Nga Yesu ajanuula omuhono amuŋambaho, amuloma ati, “Njʼohusiima hwange, ale ŋona.” Nga ŋaweene aŋo ebigenge biŋona.
40008004	Ngʼaŋo Yesu amuhamiirisa ati, “Omanya, hino otahiromeraho muutu kadi mulala. Aye tiina weyanjule eyiri omusengi wa Hatonda, oŋeyo eŋongo eyi Musa galagira, bube bujulizi obubahahasa buuti oŋonire.”
40008005	Ngʼaŋo Yesu atiina mu hibuga hyʼe Kaperanawumu. Mu hibuga omwo mwalimo Omurooma owaali omuhulu wʼehibinja hyʼabasirikale cikumi. Omwidu wʼomuhulu oyo gaali mulwaye nʼali huupi hufa. Ngʼaŋo omuhulu aŋamba engira atiina eyiri Yesu amwegayirira ati,
40008006	“Muhulu, omwidu wange engo eyo ali hu buliri gasanyalaala era ali hubonaabona bugali.”
40008007	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Natiine namuŋonia.”
40008008	Ngʼomuhulu oyo amugobolamo ati, “Musengwa, sipoomera ewe ohuuja ewange, aye loma ehibono hyoŋene, omwidu wange anaŋone.
40008009	Hino kiroma olwohuba ndi nʼabasengwa bange abaapira era keesi ndi nʼabasirikale abali ŋaasi wange. Nʼaloma ono ti, ‘Tiina,’ ngʼatiina; nʼaloma ola ti, ‘Nja,’ nga gaaja; oba nʼaloma omwidu wange ti, ‘Hola hino,’ ahihola.”
40008010	Yesu ni gaŋulira ebi omuhulu oyo galoma, nga geŋunja. Ngʼaloma ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ehyali ni himulondaho ati, “Mbalomera ehituufu, kiiri hwaganaho omuutu yesiyesi mu Bayisirayiri ali nʼohufugiirira hyʼohwomusinde ono!
40008011	Mbahahasa ti abaatu baliŋwa enjuyi nʼenjuyi nga beehala hu mbaga ni Yibbulayimu, ni Yisaka ko ni Yakobbo mu buŋugi obwomwigulu.
40008012	Aye mu hiseera ehyo, abo abahali abeene bo balibadanya ebulafu mu hiirema, eriba ohweninala nʼohulira amangi olwʼobusiba.”
40008013	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma omuhulu oyo ati, “Tiina, hija huba hiityo ngʼolu ofugiiriiye.” Era mu hiseera ehyene ehyo ngʼomwidu wuwe aŋoneraŋo.
40008014	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aŋwa mu humbaaniro eryo, atiina ewa Peetero. Ni gengira mu nyumba, gasaŋaana masaala ya Peetero nʼalambaaye hubuliri nʼali mulwaye wʼomusuuja omwene ogwʼamaani.
40008015	Ngʼamuŋamba hu muhono, aŋo ni naaŋo omusuuja ogwali ni gumuluma nga guŋona, era nga genyoha amutegeheraŋo ehyʼohulya.
40008016	Egulo ni lyola, abaatu abaali nʼabalwaye baawe abaali nʼobulwaye owa hiisi ngeri, babaleeta eyiri Yesu era ngʼaŋamba hu hiisi mulwaye amuŋonia. Era bangi abaaliho emisambwa, gajibabbingaho nʼajiragira ohubaŋwaho jitiine.
40008017	Ehyo hyali hiityo, ohwoheresa ebibono ebi naabbi Yisaaya gaaloma ati, “Gatutusaho obunafu era gaaŋira obulwaye obwali ni butuluma.”
40008018	Yesu ni gabona ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ni himweswanigirihiise galoma abeegi babe ati, “Hwambuhe, hutiine engereha wʼenyanja.”
40008019	Baali bahiiri huniina eryato ngʼomusomesa wʼamagambi ga Hatonda atiina aŋa Yesu gaali, amuloma ati, “Musomesa, nagendenga ni neewe hiisi aŋa onatiinenga.”
40008020	Aye Yesu gamugobolamo ati, “Ebibbwe biri nʼekero omu biŋenyuha, enyuni joosi jiri nʼebiswi aye Omwana wʼOmuutu aŋuma aŋa ata olubafu.”
40008021	Nga ŋabaaŋo owundi hu abeegi babe owamuloma ati, “Muhulu, nahahene husiiha laata yange ko naaja.”
40008022	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Nja, ogendenga ni neese, leha abafu mu mwoyo basiihe abafu bahyawe.”
40008023	Yesu ni ganiina eryato, abeegi babe baleha aŋo ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu, nga bambuha ni naye.
40008024	Ni baali ni bahiiri mu lugendo, ngʼero liŋamba Yesu aŋenyuha. Hibuyaga owʼamaani ngʼahubba hu nyanja ngʼebimoto byʼamaaji byedanyanga mu lyato.
40008025	Ngʼaŋo abeegi babe batiina bamusisimusa, ni bamuloma baati, “Tunoŋole Musengwa, enyanja yenda hutwita!”
40008026	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Lwahiina mutya? Muli nʼohufugiirira hutotono?” Nga genyoha ahayuhira hibuyaga ko nʼebimoto byʼamaaji ebyali ni byefuhisa hu nyanja. Ngʼaŋo hibuyaga ateeha nʼenyanja ngʼebunjeerera erala.
40008027	Ehyo hyahena abeegi abo efiiri hu mutwe, bebuusa abeene nʼabeene baati, “Omuutu ono wa ngeri hi oyu wayire hibuyaga nʼebimoto byʼamaaji hu nyanja biŋulira?”
40008028	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, nga Yesu nʼabeegi babe boola engereha wʼenyanja mu hyalo hyʼAbagaraasa. Yesu gaali ko gahaŋwa ati mu lyato, abasinde babiri abaliho emisambwa nga bamwagaana ni baŋwera mu pungulu eji basiihangamo abafu. Abasinde abo baali nʼoluswa bugali, nʼeŋuma muutu yesiyesi abita mu ngira eyo.
40008029	Nga bahayaana ni baloma baati, “Otuhaabya hiina, ewe Yesu Omwana wa Hatonda? Wujire ŋano ohutubonyaabonya ehiseera ni hihiiri hwola?”
40008030	Ohuupi aŋo ŋaaliŋo ehidooli hyʼembiiji ni jaaya.
40008031	Ngʼemisambwa jegalihira Yesu jiiti nʼaba nʼajibbinga, ajiganye jitiine mu mbiiji ejo.
40008032	Era nga Yesu ajiganya. Emisambwa ni jabaŋwaho, jatiina jingira mu mbiiji. Nga josijosi jifulumuha embiro jihirira jiŋwera mu nyanja jinywa etubbi nga jifa.
40008033	Abaali ni beemera embiiji nga baduluma baja balomera abaatu abomu hibuga hyawe, byosibyosi ebyali ni byolire hu basinde bala abaaliho emisambwa.
40008034	Ngʼaŋo abaatu bangi abomu hibuga ehyo baŋwerehereramo batiina ohwebonera Yesu. Ni boola aŋa gaali bamwegalihira aŋwe mu hitahere hyawe.
40009001	Nga Yesu aniina mu lyato, asomoha enyanja atiina mu hibuga hyʼewaawe.
40009002	Ngʼaŋo ŋabaŋo abasinde abaŋira omuutu owaali nʼasanyalaaye ni bamugegire hu musigaasiga. Yesu ni gabona ohufugiirira hwawe, ngʼaloma omulwaye ati, “Mwana wange oteŋendeherera, kusoniŋire ebibi bibyo.”
40009003	Mu hiseera ehyo, ŋaaliŋo abasomesa bʼamagambi ga Hatonda abaali ni behaaye aŋo baaŋulira ebibono ebi Yesu gaaloma, nga baloma abeene nʼabeene baati, “Aŋanga atye ohuloma atyo? Ohwo huba hufodogola.”
40009004	Ŋaweene aŋo nga Yesu afaania mu mwoyo gugwe ebyali mu biŋeego byawe. Ngʼababuusa ati, “Lwahiina mufugiirira epeega embi ohuba mu myoyo jenywe?
40009005	Ehihiraho owangu njʼehiri ŋeena, ohuloma ti ‘Kusoniŋire ebibi bibyo,’ oba ti, ‘Yinyoha ogende’?
40009006	Ŋaahani nja hubalaga ti Omwana wʼOmuutu ali nʼobuŋangi hu hyalo ohusoniŋa ebibi.” Ngʼaloma owaali nʼasanyalaaye oyo ati, “Yinyoha ogege ehidugi hihyo wagameyo ewenywe.”
40009007	Ŋaweene aŋo ngʼomusinde oyo genyoha, aŋamba ehidugi hihye atiina engo.
40009008	Ngʼabaatu bosibosi beŋunja era nga bajumirya Hatonda aŋa abaatu obuŋangi hyʼobwo.
40009009	Yesu ni gaali naŋwa mu hifo aŋa gaŋonehesya omuutu owaali nʼasanyalaaye, ngʼabona omuŋoosa oyu balanganga baati Matayo ni gehaaye aŋa baŋoosesa nʼaŋoosa. Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Nja ofuuhe mwegi wange.” Ngʼebyo byosibyosi Matayo abiŋwaho, genyoha atiina ni Yesu.
40009010	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, nga Yesu atiina nʼabeegi babe ewa Matayo ohulya. Omutoolo gwʼabaŋoosa nʼabaatu abandi “abahosi bʼebibi,” boosi batiinayo. Nga bosibosi beehala ni Yesu nʼabeegi babe, baliira ŋalala.
40009011	Abafalisaayo ni babona Yesu nʼalya nʼabaatu abo “abahosi bʼebibi” nʼabaŋoosa nga babuusa abeegi babe baati, “Lwahiina alya nʼabaatu ‘abahosi bʼebibi’ nʼabaŋoosa?”
40009012	Yesu ni gaŋulira ehi babuusa, nga niye abaloma ati, “Abaatu abalamu sibetaaga musaŋu, ohutusaho abalwaye.
40009013	Aye mutiine mwendule amahulu gʼehyaŋandiihiwa ehiroma hiiti; ‘Nenda ehisa sosi eŋongo.’ Olwʼehyo mbaloma ti sinaaja hulanga abalaŋi, ohutusaho abahosi bʼebibi.”
40009014	Ngʼaŋo abeegi ba Yowaane batiina eyiri Yesu bamubuusa baati, “Lwahiina efe nʼAbafalisaayo husiiba, aye abeegi babo sibasiiba?”
40009015	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Abalange hu mbaga yʼobugole baŋanga ohunakuŋala ahooye omweŋa nʼahiiri ni nabo? Aye ehiseera hiryola babatusaho ahooye omweŋa. Huulwo ndʼolu balitagiha ohusiiba.
40009016	“Omuutu saahubba hiŋero ehyʼolugoye olunyaaha mu hyambalo ehihayire. Olwohuba ehiŋero ehyo ni hyehuuna, hihapuha ohuŋwa hu lugoye olwo oluhayire hyaŋiriraho nʼehimesu hyalwo, ngʼehituli hyeyongera ohugalama.
40009017	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, sibajuha mwenge epiiraŋo ogwomu mizabbibbu mu saŋu yʼehyanjo ekayire. Singa ohihola, yadisa esaŋu ngʼobifiirwa byombi. Aye omwenge epiiraŋo ogwo, bagujuha mu saŋu yʼehyanjo epyaha ko ndʼobifiirwe byombi.”
40009018	Yesu ni gaali nʼahiiroma, nga jireeta mulala hu bahulu bʼehumbaaniro lyʼAbayudaaya oyu baali ni balanga baati Yayiro. Yayiro oyo gatiina ngʼahubba amafuha mu moni jije, amwegalihira bugali nʼamuloma ati, “Muhulu ahahaana hange hahaŋwa ohufa, nja oje ohaŋambeho hanalamuhe.”
40009019	Ngʼaŋo Yesu nʼabeegi babe benyoha batiina ni naye.
40009020	Ŋaaliŋo omuhasi owaali nʼalwaye oluheeŋo ohuhena emyaha ehumi nʼebiri. Ngʼaŋo geyibirira aŋwera egongo wa Yesu aŋamba hu hyambalo hihye.
40009021	Hino gahihola olwohuba gaaloma mu mwoyo gugwe ati, “Ni naŋambe huŋambaho hu hyambalo hihye, naaŋone.”
40009022	Nga Yesu acuuha amubona amuloma ati, “Muhaana, ba mugumu! Ohufugiirira huhwo huhuŋonisye.” Ngʼomuhasi oyo aŋona mu haseera aho.
40009023	Yesu ni goola mu mago gʼomuhulu ola oyu balanga baati Yayiro, gengira mu nyumba, ngʼabona abembi nʼemirere ni bali huhooha enyembo eji bemba omuutu nʼafuuye, nʼabaatu bosibosi abaaliŋo ni bali hulira ni bahubba nʼenduulu olwʼohufa hwʼomuhaana oyo.
40009024	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Mutule ebulafu, omuhaana saafe, aye ali huŋenyuha.” Aye nibo bamujeherera humujeherera, olwohuba baali bamanyire baati omuhaana gaali afuuye.
40009025	Ni bahena ohutusa ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ebulafu, nga Yesu gengira aŋamba omuhaana hu muhono, ngʼomuhaana gemeerera.
40009026	Amaŋuliro agaŋamba huhulamuha hwʼomuhaana oyo gahwana mu twale eryo lyosiryosi.
40009027	Yesu ni gaali nʼaŋwa mu hifo ehyo, abasinde babiri abaali abaŋofu bamulondaho ni balomera ŋamugulu baati, “Mwijuhulu wa Dawudi, tuŋambire ehisa otuŋonie!”
40009028	Ŋaahani Yesu ni gengira mu nyumba, abaŋofu abo boosi batiina aŋa gaali, ngʼababuusa ati, “Mufugiirira muuti sobola ohubaŋonia?” Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Musengwa, hufugiirira!”
40009029	Ngʼaŋo aŋamba hu moni jaawe, abaloma ati, “Hahibe hiityo olwʼohufugiirira hwenywe.”
40009030	Ŋaweene aŋo ngʼemoni jʼabasinde abo jirimbula batandiha ohubona. Nga Yesu abalabula nʼabahutiira ati, “Mumanya ohutalomeraho muutu yesiyesi!”
40009031	Aye nibo baatula, batiina bahwania mu twale eryo lyosiryosi amaŋuliro agaŋamba hu Yesu.
40009032	Abasinde abo ni baali ni batula ebulafu, nga ŋabaaŋo abaleetera Yesu omusinde owaaliho omusambwa nataŋanga nʼohuloma.
40009033	Yesu ni gabbinga omusambwa ogwo, omusinde oyo gatandiha ohuloma ngʼehiŋindi hyʼabaatu abaali aŋo beŋunja. Era nga baloma baati, “Hino hubaaye sihuhibonangaho mu Yisirayiri!”
40009034	Aye Abafalisaayo baaloma baati, “Abbinga emisambwa nʼatambisa obuŋangi bwa Bbeluzebbuli omuhulu wʼemisambwa.”
40009035	Yesu gagenda mu bibuga byosibyosi nomu byalo nʼasomesa mu mahumbaaniro gʼAbayudaaya, nʼabuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu buŋugi bwa Hatonda. Era nʼaŋonia hiisi bulwaye.
40009036	Yesu ni gabona ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ni hihumbeene, nga bamuŋambya ehisa olwohuba baali beŋendehereye ni ŋabulaŋo owʼohubayeeda era ni baali hyʼetaama ejiŋumaho mwayi.
40009037	Ngʼaŋo aloma abeegi babe ati, “Abaatu abaja ohufugiirira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi bangi era bali hyʼebirime ebyolire ohuhungula aye abatambi sibahena.
40009038	Olwʼehyo, musunge Hatonda Musengwa omwene ndimiro asindihemo abatambi.”
40010001	Nga lulala Yesu alanga abeegi babe ehumi nʼababiri batiine aŋa gaali, ngʼabaŋa obuŋangi ohubbinganga emisambwa hu baatu era baŋonie hiisi bulwaye.
40010002	Abahwenda babe abo ehumi nʼababiri mba bano: asooka nje Simooni oyu balanga erindi baati Peetero ni mugandaawe Andereya; ko ni Yakobbo ni mugandaawe Yowaane abasaani ba Zebbedaayo;
40010003	Filipo ni Bbatulumaayo ni Matayo omuŋoosa ni Tomasi ni Yakobbo omusaani wʼAlufaayo; ni Sadaayo
40010004	ni Simooni Omuzelote, ko ni Yuda Yisikaryoti owalya mu Yesu oluhwe.
40010005	Yesu gatuma abahwenda abo nabalaabbira ati, “Mutatiina mu Batali Bayudaaya, oba ohwingira mu hibuga hyʼAbasamaliya hyosihyosi.
40010006	Aye mutiine eyiri abaatu ba Yisirayiri abaagota.
40010007	Mutiine mubalome muuti; ‘Obuŋugi bwomwigulu bwegereeye ŋaapi.’
40010008	Era muŋonie abalwaye, mulamuse abafu, muŋonie abali nʼebigenge, mubbinge emisambwa hu baatu. Musunire obuŋangi obwo huwereere era mwesi mubutambisenga huwereere.
40010009	Mu lugendo luno, mutagega bbeesa josijosi mu saŋu jenywe.
40010010	Mutagega ehihapu oba ehyʼohwambala ehyohubiri oba omugogo gwʼengayito ogwohubiri oba omuhoomero olwohuba omutambi asaanira bamuŋe ebi genda.
40010011	“Hiisi hibuga oba mu hyalo eyi munolenga, mwendulirisanga omuutu aŋanga ohubasangaalira nga mumenya mu mago gage ohwola olu museebuha.
40010012	Ni mwingiranga mu mago omwo, mubasabiranga ekabi.
40010013	Abomu mago ago banabasangaalira, ekabi eji mubalombeeye jinabenga ni nabo. Aye banagaana ohubasangaalira, ekabi jenywe jibagoboleranga.
40010014	Ni mwolanga mu mago aŋaatu oba mu hibuga, ndibabasangaalira oba bagaana ohuŋuliirisa ebi mubaloma, nga muŋwaŋo. Era ni muba ni muŋwaŋo, mwekukumulangaho efuuhe mu magulu, habe habonero ahalaga ohulabula ohuŋwa eyiri Hatonda.
40010015	Mbalomera ehituufu ti hu ludaalo olwʼohusaliraho emisango, baliŋa abaatu bomu Sodoma ni Gomora ehibonereso ehiriho obudemwademwa ohuhira abomu hibuga ehyo.”
40010016	Nga Yesu geyongera aloma ati, “Mbatuma aye mwehuume olwohuba eyi mbatuma muja huba hyʼenyana jʼetaama mu nalaŋa. Olwʼehyo mube bagesigesi mwehuume hyʼetemu era mube bawombeefu hyʼeŋuusi.
40010017	Mubeŋo ni muhimanyire era ni mwetegehire, olwohuba balibaŋamba babaŋayo mu mbuga jʼamagambi era balibahubbira mu mahumbaaniro gaawe.
40010018	Balibemeha ohuŋosya mu mbuga jʼabaami nʼeja bahabaha olwohuba baloobera bange. Hino hiribaleetera enywe ohulomera abaŋugi abo nʼAbatali Bayudaaya Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agapambaho.
40010019	Aye ni banabaŋambenga babaŋira mu mbuga jaawe, simweŋendehereranga ehi munalome oba ngʼolu munahirome. Olwohuba mu hiseera ehyo, Hatonda anabaŋenga ehyʼohuloma.
40010020	Era simuja huba ndinywe omuloma aye ebibono ebi muja hulomanga bija huba byʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu owa Senywe ali mwigulu.
40010021	“Mu hiseera ehyo, abalebe baja hulyanganamo oluhwe owundi gaŋayo owahye ohumwita, nʼabasaawe bʼabaana boosi baliŋayo abaana baawe. Abaana balijeemera abasaaye baawe era bahena babaŋayo ohubeeta.
40010022	Era enywe, abaatu bosibosi balibacaawa olwohuba baloobera bange. Aye oyo aligumira ebigosi ohwola hu komerero, njʼalinoŋoha.
40010023	Munatiina aŋaatu babahiyaania, mudulumiranga aŋandi. Mbalomera ehituufu ti; simulihenaho bibuga ebyomu Yisirayiri Omwana wʼOmuutu nʼatagobola.
40010024	“Omusomi saahira musomesa wuwe eŋono era eŋuma omwidu ahiraho musengwawe.
40010025	Omusomi saali nʼohweŋunja singa bamubisya ngʼolu babisya omusomesa wuwe, mu ngeri njʼenyene nʼomwidu yeesi saali nʼohweŋunja banaba ni bamubisya ngʼolu babisya musengwawe. Obanga omwene mago bamulanga Bbeluzebbuli, hiina ehibataliranga abomu mago gage!”
40010026	Nga Yesu geyongera aloma ati, “Olwʼehyo simweŋendehereranga olwʼabaatu hyʼabo abalibahiyaania, olwohuba hiisi ehi bahweha balihigundula era ehiitu ehi bagisa hiryeta aŋalafu.
40010027	Byosibyosi ebi mbalomera mu wiire mubiromanga mu muusi etangalwe. Ehi babaŋweŋweterera mu hutwi, mubibbutulanga mu lwijuuye.
40010028	“Mutatyanga abo abeeta omubiri hyonyene. Mutyenga nje Hatonda olwohuba ali nʼobuŋangi ohusihiirisa obulamu nʼomubiri mu muliro ogutasima. Oyo njʼoyu muli nʼohutyanga.
40010029	“Obuyuni bubiri bulimo ebbeesa totono nyene aye eŋuma wayire halala hubwo ahafa, Senywe ali mwigulu nʼatendire.
40010030	Era ni nenywe mwesi, Hatonda amanyire nʼobungi wʼefiiri ejiri hu mitwe jenywe.
40010031	Kale muteŋendehereranga, olwohuba muli bamuŋendo nʼohuhiraho obuyuni obwo eduuli.
40010032	“Hiisi oyu esoni jitaŋamba ohwatula mu abaatu ati gaafugiirira, keesi ndyatula mu moni ja Bbaabba ali mwigulu ti muutu wange.
40010033	Aye oyo oyu soni jiŋamba ohwatula mu baatu ati gaafugiirira, keesi ndimwegaana mu moni ja Bbaabba ali mwigulu.”
40010034	Nga Yesu geyongera ohuloma ati, “Mutaŋeega muuti naaja huleeta miyaaya hu hyalo. Sinaaja huleeta miyaaya aye etalo.
40010035	Hino kiroma olwohuba naaja ohwabuhania “omwana omuseere ni semwana, omwana muhaana ni nyina, omulya ni masaalawe.
40010036	Era abalabe bʼomuutu baja huba bomu mago gage ameene.”
40010037	Nga Yesu aloma ati, “Omuutu yesiyesi owenda semwana oba nyina oba abaana babe ohuhiraho ngʼolu ganyenda ese, saasanira huba muloobera wange.
40010038	Hiisi owenda ohuba omuloobera wange, ali nʼohwefiirisa gagega omusalabba gugwe gagendanga ni neese.
40010039	Hiisi owehenerera obulamu buwe, alibufiirwa aye hiisi afiirwa obulamu buwe hu lwange, alibunoŋola.”
40010040	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma abeegi babe ati, “Hiisi abasangaalira aba asangaaliiye ndiise, era hiisi owusangaalira aba asangaliiye oyo owaatuma.
40010041	Hiisi asangaalira naabbi olwohuba naabbi, alisuna omuhemba hyʼogwa naabbi. Era hiisi asangaalira omuutu omugwalaafu olwohuba omuutu oyo mugwalaafu, alisuna omuhemba hyʼogwoyo omugwalaafu.
40010042	Mbalomera ehituufu ti, singa omuutu yesiyesi aŋa mulala hu beegi bange bano omwendo gwʼamaaji, olwohuba oyu baŋa muloobera wange wayire nga njʼasembayo ohuba wʼeŋono, mu buli ngeri Hatonda alisasula omuutu oyo.”
40011001	Oluvanyuma, Yesu ni gahena ohusomesa abeegi babe ehumi nʼababiri, ngʼaŋwa mu hifo ehyo atiina ohusomesa nʼohubuulira abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi mu bibuga byʼe Galilaaya.
40011002	Yowaane Omubatiza nʼali mu komera, bamuŋayira hu biitu ebi Kurisito gaali nʼali huhola. Ngʼatuma abeegi babe
40011003	ohubuusa Yesu baati, “Ndiiwe oyo oyu Hatonda gasuubisa ohuuja ohunoŋola abaatu oba eriyo owundi?”
40011004	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Mwagame mulomere Yowaane ebi mubona nʼebi muŋulira,
40011005	abaali abaŋofu ŋaahani babona; abaleme bagenda; abagenge balongooha, abasiŋa baŋulira, abafu balamuha nʼabagadi boosi basunire ekabi ohubalomera Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi.
40011006	Bali nʼekabi abo abatanemotamo.”
40011007	Abahwenda ba Yowaane abo ni baali ni bagamayo, nga Yesu atandiha ohubuusa ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ebiŋamba hu Yowaane ati, “Ni mwatiina mu lulafu, mwatiina hubona hiina? Mwatiina hubona omuutu ali hyʼolugada olu embeŋo ehubba ni ŋira eyi ni neeyi?
40011008	Ni hitaba cʼehyo, mwatiina hubona hi? Omuutu owambaye engoye ejimeregenya? Si cʼehyo, olwohuba abambala engoye ejimeregenya baba mu lubiri ewa habaha.
40011009	Ne hiina ehyene ehi mwatiina ohubona mu lulafu? Peega ti mwatiina hubona naabbi. Era buhomya weene, Yowaane oyo si naabbi hyonyene.
40011010	Aye oyo, njʼoyu ehyaŋandiihiwa hiromaho hiiti, “ ‘Nja hutuma omuhwenda wange ahweherereyo aje ahutereehese engira.’
40011011	“Mbalomera ehituufu ti, mu baatu abahasaaliwa bosibosi, ŋabula ahira Yowaane Omubatiza eŋono cooka abaatu abali mu buŋugi bwomwigulu, asembayo ohuba owa ŋaasi, amuhira eŋono.
40011012	Ohuŋwa mu biseera bya Yowaane Omubatiza ohwola hatyane, abanamaani basoosa obuŋugi bwomwigulu bugali weene era oyo awingira awingirira hifuba.
40011013	Hino kiroma olwohuba amagambi nʼebi banaabbi bosibosi baŋandiiha byaloma hu hiseera hyʼobuŋugi womwigulu, ohwola olu Yowaane gaaja.
40011014	Era ni muba ni mufugiirira obuhwenda obwo, Yowaane oyo njʼEriya oyu baalomaho baati aja huuja.”
40011015	Ngʼaŋo agohoba ati, “Ali nʼohutwi, aŋulire.
40011016	“Abaatu abʼomulembe guno nʼabagerageranie hu hi? Bali hyʼabaana abaŋere abehaaye mu nabiŋwera ko baaloma abahyawe baati,
40011017	“ ‘Hubafuuŋiiye emirere aye ndimuhine, era nʼolu hwembire olwembo oluŋambya enaku, ndimulire nahulira.’
40011018	“Ehyo kigeragerania hu Yowaane, sigalyanga biryo ebya bulijo oba hunywaho envinyo, olwʼehyo nga baloma baati, ‘Aliho emisambwa!’
40011019	Aye Omwana wʼOmuutu gaaja ni geriira ebiryo era nʼanywa nʼevinyo hyʼomuutu yesiyesi nga baloma baati, ‘Oyo wa mulyerye, mumeesi era ahola omuhumba nʼabaŋoosa ko nʼabahosi bʼebibi.’ Aye abo bosibosi abaholera hu magesi ga Hatonda bahahasa baati matuufu ni hibonehera hu bikolwa byawe.”
40011020	Ngʼaŋo Yesu atandiha ohunenya abaatu abomu bibuga omu gaholera ebyamaliholiho ebihira obungi olwohuba sibebbwaga.
40011021	Ngʼaloma ati, “Jibageene enywe abaatu abomu hibuga Korazini nʼe Bbesusayida! Ebyamaliholiho ebi baahola ewenywe, biba ni byali mu Tiiro nomu Sidoni, hani abaatu baayo beboŋa ebigwaali era beeŋaha nʼegohe ohulaga baati bebbwagire.
40011022	Aye mbalomera ti, hu ludaalo olwʼohusala emisango, baliŋa abaatu abomu Tiiro ni Sidoni ehibonereso ehiriho obudemwademwa hu hyenywe.
40011023	“Ate enywe abaatu bʼe Kaperanawumu, muŋeega muuti mulitiina mwigulu? Bbe, mulitiina mu geyeena, olwohuba ebyamaliholiho ebi baahola mu nywe, baba ni babihola mu hibuga hyʼe Sodoma, hani hihiiriŋo.
40011024	Aye mbalomera ti, hu ludaalo olwʼohusala emisango, baliŋa abaatu bomu Sodoma ehibonereso ehiriho obudemwademwa hu hyenywe.”
40011025	Mu hiseera ehyo, nga Yesu aloma ati, “Kujumirya Bbaabba, Musengwa owatonda egulu nʼehyalo, olwohuba wagisa aberanga abamagesi ohumanya amazima, ngʼohwehulira abaŋuma ehi bamanyire hyʼabaana abaŋere.
40011026	Hituufu Bbaabba, ehyo hyahusangaasa olwohuba njʼohwali ohusiima huhwo.”
40011027	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma abaatu ati, “Bbaabba gapambya ebiitu byosibyosi ohubiŋuga. Ŋaŋuma amanyire Omwana ohutusaho Semwana era ŋaŋuma amanyire Semwana ohutusaho Omwana ni naabo aba Omwana ahwehulira ehyama ehyʼohumutegeera.
40011028	“Muuje eyi ndi, enywe mwesimwesi abadembire era abaluŋiriiye nʼemigugu emisito, nja hubaŋa ehiŋuumulo.
40011029	Mungondere ngʼolu eŋombe esaame yigonda bayitaaho ehijoogi. Mwegire hu ese olwohuba ndi muwombeefu era wagonjewa mu mwoyo, mulisuna ehiŋuumulo.
40011030	Ehyo kiroma olwohuba engeri eyi njahubatangirirangamo eja huba ndaŋi era ehi mbaŋa ohuhola hyangu.”
40012001	Mu hiseera ehyo, hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato Yesu nʼabeegi babe baali babita mu ngira eyibita mu muga gwʼengaano. Enjala yaali eruma abeegi babe era nga batiinanga ni baŋulula amagala gʼengaano bahena bemunga embehe.
40012002	Abafalisaayo ni bababona, nga baloma Yesu baati, “Bona, abeegi babo bahola ehi magambi gatatufugiirira huhola hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato!”
40012003	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Simusomangaho hu ehi Dawudi gahola olu niye nʼabahye aba gaali ni nabo ni baali ni baŋuma hyʼohulya?
40012004	Dawudi gengira mu weema ya Hatonda ngʼalya emigaati eji baali ni baŋongire eyiri Hatonda. Amagambi gaali gafugiirira basengi ba Hatonda boŋene ohulya emigaati ejo. Cooka Dawudi gajirya era gaŋaho nʼaba gaali ni nabo.
40012005	Oba simusomangaho mu magambi aga baŋa Musa muuti abasengi ba Hatonda ni bahola emirimo jaawe mu Yekaalu hulwa Sabbaato baba babbwaaga egambi, cooka ate sibabaho musango?
40012006	Ne mbalomera ti, oyo ahira Yekaalu eŋono ali ŋano.
40012007	Era mubanga ni mumanyire amahulu gʼebibono ebiroma biiti; ‘Nenda ehisa sosi eŋongo,’ simwahali ni munenya abo abeŋumira musango.
40012008	Hino kiroma olwohuba Omwana wʼOmuutu nje Musengwa aŋuga oludaalo lwa Sabbaato.”
40012009	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aŋwa aŋo, atiina mu humbaaniro lyʼAbayudaaya eryomu hitahere ehyo.
40012010	Hu olwo, mwalimo omusinde owaali nʼomuhono omuŋotohi. Mu weene omwo, mwalimo Abafalisaayo abaali ni bendula ehyʼohumweŋambya ehi baneemeho ohumuŋaŋabira. Kale nga bamubuusa baati, “Amagambi gʼefe gafugiirira ohuŋonia abaatu hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato?”
40012011	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Njʼani hu enywe, singa etaama yiye yiba yiguuye mwiroŋo hu ludaalo olwa Sabbaato, atafayo huyiŋalulamo?
40012012	Omuutu saahirira ŋale etaama omuŋendo? Olwʼehyo hiraŋi ohuhola obulaŋi hu Sabbaato.”
40012013	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma omusinde oyo owaali nʼomuhono omuŋotohi ati, “Waama, januula omuhono gugwo.” Ngʼola agujanuula, nga guŋonera erala guba hyagula ogundi.
40012014	Aye Abafalisaayo nga baŋwa mu humbaaniro batiina huseega magesi gʼohwitamo Yesu.
40012015	Yesu ni gategeera oluhwe olwʼohumwita, gaŋwa mu hifo ehyo. Abaatu bangi nga bamulondaho, era ngʼaŋonia abalwaye baawe bosibosi.
40012016	Ngʼahena abahamiirisa batalomeraho muutu yesiyesi.
40012017	Ebyo byaliŋo ohwoheresa ehi naabbi Yisaaya galoma ati,
40012018	“Ono njʼomuŋeeresa wange oyu natobola, omuhoda era owunesiimisa. Nja humutaaho Mwoyo wange, alomere abaatu abamawanga gosigosi amazima.
40012019	Saliduhana oba ohuhayaana nʼomuutu yesiyesi, ejanjaasi lirye siririŋulirihana mu nguudo nʼahayaana.
40012020	Saalyabulira abali nʼohufugiirira ohutono; era aliyeeda hiisi muutu wayire abo abamwesiga ehitono ohwola olu alisala emisango nʼatehubbira.
40012021	Era aliba suubi lyʼabaatu mu mawanga gosigosi.”
40012022	Ngʼaŋo ŋabaaŋo abaŋirira Yesu omusinde owaaliho omusambwa. Omusinde oyo gaali muŋofu era nʼataloma, ngʼamuŋonia atandiha ohuloma nʼohubona.
40012023	Abaatu bosibosi beŋunja nga bebuusa baati, “Ono aŋanga ohuba njʼOmwijuhulu wa habaha Dawudi, oyu Hatonda gasuubisa?”
40012024	Aye Abafalisaayo ni baŋulira, baaloma baati, “Abbinga emisambwa hu baatu, nʼatambisa obuŋangi bwa Bbeluzebbuli omuhulu wʼemisambwa.”
40012025	Ngʼaŋo Yesu ategeera ebiŋeego byawe, abaloma ati, “Abaatu abʼowahabaha obulala banesalamo bahubbagana abeene nʼabeene, owahabaha obwo busihiiriha. Era nʼolu hiba hibuga oba mago goosi ganeyabulamo gabbwagiha.
40012026	Ni Sitaani yeesi singa gesoosa omwene, obwahabaha buwe buba bunemeerereŋo buutye?
40012027	Ŋaahani obanga mbinga emisambwa ni tambisa obuŋangi bwa Bbeluzebbuli, abaloobera benywe bajibbinga hu lwʼobuŋangi bwʼani? Ehyo cʼehigira abaloobera benywe abeene balibasalira omusango.
40012028	Aye nimba ni mbinga emisambwa hu lwʼOmwoyo wa Hatonda, ŋaahani obuŋugi buwe buujire eyi muli.
40012029	“Kale ŋabula aŋanga ohwingira mu nyumba yʼomuutu owʼamaani ganyaga ebibye nʼatasookire humusidiha ko gabinyaga.
40012030	“Oyo atali hu lubega lwange aba mulabe wange era atahumbaania ni nange, asalaania.
40012031	Era mbalomera ti, balisoniŋa abaatu ebibi byosibyosi, nga pomuli nʼohuloma ebibono ebifodogola. Aye hiisi afodogola Omwoyo Omutukuvu, sibalimusoniŋa.
40012032	Hiisi aloma ebibi hu Mwana wʼOmuutu, balimusoniŋa aye oyo aloma ebibi hu Omwoyo Omutukuvu sibalimusoniŋa emirembe nʼemirembe.”
40012033	Ngʼaŋo Yesu geyongera abaloma ati, “Singa omusaala guba mulaŋi, nʼebibala byagwo biba biraŋi aye gunaba mubi nʼebibala byagwo byosi biba bibi. Olwʼehyo omusaala bagumanyira hu bibala byagwo.
40012034	Enywe abaatu abaahabi hyʼetemu, muŋanga ohuloma ebiraŋi ni muli babi? Ebi omuutu aloma, abitusa hu mungo eyʼebyo ebiba mu mwoyo gugwe.
40012035	Omuutu anaba nʼomwoyo omulaŋi, ahola ebiraŋi ebiri mu mwoyo gugwe, ne anaba nʼomwoyo omubi, ahola ebibi nʼabitusa hu mungo yʼebibi ebiri mu mwoyo gugwe.
40012036	Aye mbalomera ti, hu ludaalo lwʼohusala emisango, hiisi muutu alyeromereraho hu hiisi hibono ehitasaana ehi gaaloma.
40012037	Ebibono bibyo ebyene njʼebirihusalira omusango ohuhuhira oba bbe.”
40012038	Ngʼaŋo balala hu Bafalisaayo nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi ga Hatonda baloma Yesu baati, “Musomesa, hwenda otulage ahabonero aheŋunjisa.”
40012039	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Abaatu bʼomulembe guno babi era sibesigwa eyiri Hatonda! Basunga ahabonero aheŋunjisa aye ŋaŋuma habonero ahabaja ohubaŋa ohutusaho ahabonero ha naabbi Yona mu guyeeni.
40012040	Ngʼolu Yona gaali mu hida hyʼoguyeeni endaalo edatu omuusi nʼowiire; mu ngeri njʼenyene nʼOmwana wʼOmuutu yeesi aliba e magombe endaalo edatu, owiire nʼomuusi.
40012041	Abaatu bʼe Nineeve hu ludaalo lwʼohusala emisango balyemeerera balumirisa abʼomulembe guno omusango gubahire olwohuba nibo Yona ni gabalomera ehibono hya Hatonda, bebbwaga. Aye ahira Yona eŋono ali ŋano ne simwenda hwebbwaga.
40012042	“Habaha omuhasi ohuŋwa mu gwanga lyʼe Syebba ehirirene mu menamo ga Yisirayiri alyemeerera gasalira abaatu bʼomulembe guno omusango olwohuba gagenda olugendo olwene oluleeŋi gatiina mu Yisirayiri ohuŋuliirisa ebibono bya habaha Sulemaani ebyʼamagesi. Aye ahira Sulemaani eŋono ali ŋano ne simufugiirira ebi aloma.
40012043	“Omusambwa ni guŋwa hu muutu, gulerenga mu lulafu ni gwendula aŋa guneŋogome nga guhaya.
40012044	Ni guhaya guloma guuti, ‘Nja hwagama eyi nabanga.’ Ni gwagama, gwagaana obulamu wʼomuutu oyo ni babulongoosa bulaŋi weene hyʼenyumba eyi basaguuye.
40012045	Ngʼaŋo gutiina guhobaho ejahye ejindi musanvu ejiguhiraho obubi, nga jija jimwingiramo. Era obulamu wʼomuutu oyo buliba bubi ohuhiraho ngʼolu waali oludaayi. Bino njʼebinahoole hu baatu bʼomulembe guno abahosi bʼebibi.”
40012046	Yesu ni gaali nʼahiiroma nʼeduuli lyʼabaatu, abalebe babe ni nyina batiina aŋa gaali. Ni boola nga beema ebulafu ni benda ohuloma ni naye.
40012047	Ngʼaŋo ŋabaaŋo owamuloma ati, “Maawo nʼabalebe babo bali ebulafu, benda ohulomaho ni neewe.”
40012048	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Baatu ba ngeri hi abasaniiye ohuba maama nʼabalebe bange?”
40012049	Ngʼasosya hu beegi babe ahena aloma ati, “Maama nʼabalebe bange mba bano.
40012050	Hiisi ahola ebi Bbaabba ali mwigulu genda, njʼaba muganda yange, mboojo yange era njʼaba maama.”
40013001	Oluvanyuma, hu ludaalo olwene olwo, Yesu gaŋwa mu nyumba, ngʼatiina gehala hwigenya lyʼenyanja.
40013002	Ngʼaŋo oguŋindi gwʼabaatu guhumbaanira aŋa gaali era ehyaŋwamo ngʼaniina mu lyato gehala omwo, ne abaatu bosibosi bemeerera hwigenya.
40013003	Ngʼabalomera ebiitu bingi mu ngero ati, “Ŋaaliŋo omulimi owatiina ohumwa owumo.
40013004	Ni gaali nʼamwa, ngʼowumo obundi bugwa hu tulo wʼengira babutyakirira era ngʼenyuni jitiina jibulya.
40013005	Obundi nga bugwa hwiroba eryʼohu lwanda ohwali otuloba otugeregere. Era olwohuba bwali hu mugulu, siwalwa humera.
40013006	Aye endobooli ni yatula, nga buŋotoha era nga bwoma olwohuba emisi jaali ndi jiiha ŋaasi ehihena.
40013007	Ngʼobundi bugwa mwiroba eryameramo amaŋwa, ni wamera nga buhulira ŋalala nʼamaŋwa ago era nga gabumiina gabuloberesa ohuhula.
40013008	Aye obundi nga bugwa hwiroba eraŋi. Ngʼowumo obwo bwama, amagala gaabwo nga gajuhamo emoni. Amagala agandi nga gabaaho embehe cikumi; agandi embehe nkaaga; nʼagandi embehe amahumi adatu.
40013009	Ali nʼohutwi, aŋulire.”
40013010	Ngʼaŋo abeegi babe besenda aŋa gaali, bamubuusa baati, “Lwahiina oloma nʼabaatu mu ngero?”
40013011	Ngʼabagobolamo ati, “Enywe muli nʼekabi ohumanya ebyama ebiŋamba hu buŋugi bwomwigulu, aye abaatu abandi bayiŋuma.
40013012	Oyo ali nʼebingi balimumeedaho ebindi aye oyo aŋuma balimutusaaho nʼahadiidiri aho aha ali ni naho.
40013013	Ehyo cʼehigira ndoma ni nabo mu ngero, olwohuba wayire bahaŋaasa aye batafaania ehi bahaŋaasa. Baŋulire, aye batategeera ehi baŋulira.
40013014	“Era hyolerere ehi Hatonda gabalomaho nʼabita mu naabbi Yisaaya ati, “ ‘Ohuŋulira muja huŋuliranga aye ni mutategeera; muja hubonanga aye ni mutetegeeresa.
40013015	Hino kiroma olwohuba abaatu bano bali nʼemyoyo migumu, bamasiipe abali nʼamatwi aye sibaŋulira, bali nʼemoni aye sibabona, ate nga bahaweene nʼemoni jaawe, baŋulira nʼamatwi gaawe, bategeera nʼemyoyo jaawe, bacuuha nga mbaŋonia.’
40013016	“Aye enywe mwesiimire olwohuba emoni jenywe jibona era nʼamatwi genywe gaŋulira.
40013017	Mbalomera ehituufu ti abanaabbi ko nʼabaatu abagwalaafu bangi beegomba ohubona bino ebi mubona nʼohuŋulira ebi muŋulira aye sibasobola.”
40013018	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abaloma ati, “Ŋaahani muŋulire amahulu gʼolugero lwʼomuŋaanyi wʼowumo.
40013019	Omuutu yesiyesi aŋulira obuhwenda obuŋamba hu buŋugi bwa Hatonda aye saabutegeere, Sitaani gaaja gabumutusamo. Oyo ali hyʼowumo owagwa hu tulo wʼengira.
40013020	Owumo owagwa hwiroba eryʼohu lwanda buli hyʼabaatu abaŋulira ehibono hya Hatonda, bahisangaalira nʼamanyonyo.
40013021	Aye olwohuba bali hyʼebirime ebiŋuma emisi ejihire hwiroba ehihena, ohufugiirira hwawe hwa haseera buseera. Ebigosi ni bibaajira oba abaatu babacaawa olwʼehibono hya Hatonda, banafuŋa.
40013022	Owumo owagwa hwiroba eryameramo amaŋwa buli hyʼabaatu abaŋulira ehibono hya Hatonda, aye oluvanyuma ebiitu ebindi omuli ohuŋemba obugali hu byʼehyalo, ohusendasendebwa nʼomulungo gwʼobusuni, nʼohululuhanira ohusuna ebiitu, biŋuga emyoyo jaawe, byaloberesa ehibono ehi baŋuliiye ohuŋwamo ehiraŋi.
40013023	Obwo obwagwa hwiroba eraŋi, njʼabaatu abaŋulira ehibono hya Hatonda bahitegeera, era baaba nʼehyasa. Abaatu abandi emirundi cikumi; abandi emirundi nkaaga, nʼabandi emirundi amahumi adatu.”
40013024	Nga Yesu abagerera olugero olundi ati, “Obuŋugi bwomwigulu huŋanga ohubugeragerania hu muutu owaŋaanya owumo obulaŋi mu ndimiro yiye eyʼengaano.
40013025	Aye abaatu ni baali ni baŋenyuha, ngʼomulabe atiina, amwa ebibereŋi ngʼahena geŋweraŋo.
40013026	Engaano ni yahula, nga yitulula, nʼebibereŋi byosi bitulula biboneherera.
40013027	Abeedu bʼomwene ndimiro nga batiina aŋa gaali bamuloma baati, ‘Muhulu, siwamwa owumo obulaŋi mu ndimiro yiyo? Ne ebibereŋi bira byaŋwa ŋeena?’
40013028	Ngʼaŋo abagobolamo ati, ‘Omulabe njʼowahola atyo.’ Ngʼabeedu bamuloma baati, ‘Wenda hutiine hubihuulemo?’
40013029	Ngʼabaloma ati, ‘Bbe, olwohuba ni munaabe ni mubihulamo, muŋanga ohuhuuliramo nʼengaano.
40013030	Mulehe byombi bihulire ŋalala ohwola hwigesa. Mu hiseera ehyo, ndiroma abaligesa beheerere huhumbaania ebibereŋi ebyo, babisidihe mu miganda babyohye, aye bahumbaanie engaano baje bayibunge mu hyagi hyange.’ ”
40013031	Nga Yesu abagerera olugero olundi ati, “Obuŋugi bwomwigulu huŋanga ohubugeragerania hu ahamo ahʼehirime ehi balanga baati kalidaali aha omuutu gaŋira gahoma mu muga gugwe.
40013032	Wayire njʼahamo ahahiirira erala obutono mu wumo bwosibwosi aye ni hamera hahula haŋwamo ehisaala ehyene ehibba, ngʼenyuni jitongolamo ebiswi mu masaga.”
40013033	Nga Yesu abagerera olugero olundi ati, “Obuŋugi bwomwigulu hubugeragerania hu hasimbulusa aha omuhasi gaŋamba gahatabula mu busyanu owʼengaano oweene obungi abuhande anyiyemo emigaati nga hengira mu tome lyosiryosi eri gahanda mu busyanu obwo.”
40013034	Yesu galomera ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ebyo byosibyosi mu ngero. Era ŋabula ehiitu hyosihyosi ehi gabalomera ehitaali mu lugero.
40013035	Ehyo hyoheresa ehi naabbi galoma ati, “Ndiroma ni nabo mu ngero ndiroma ebiitu ebihwehe ohuŋwa hu hutonda hwʼehyalo.”
40013036	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aleha ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu, gengira mu nyumba. Ngʼabeegi babe bamulondaho bamuloma baati, “Tulomere amahulu gʼolugero oluŋamba hu bibereŋi.”
40013037	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Owaŋaanya owumo obulaŋi, njʼOmwana wʼOmuutu.
40013038	Endimiro njʼehyalo era owumo obulaŋi njʼabaatu abomu buŋugi bwa Hatonda. Ebibereŋi njʼabaatu ba Sitaani.
40013039	Era omulabe owamwa nje Sitaani. Egesa njʼekomerero yʼehyalo era abamalayika njʼabaligesa.
40013040	Ngʼolu bahumbaania ebibereŋi babyohya omuliro, pohiriba hiityo hu komerero yʼehyalo hino.
40013041	Omwana wʼOmuutu alituma abamalayika babe, nga batusaamo ebireeta ehibi ni naabo bosibosi abahola ebibi
40013042	nga babadanya mu muliro eyiriba ohweninala nʼohulira amangi olwʼobulumi.
40013043	Hu olwo abagwalaafu balimeregenya hyʼeryuba mu buŋugi bwa Bbaabba. Era oyo ali nʼohutwi, aŋulire.
40013044	“Obuŋugi bwomwigulu huŋanga ohubugeragerania hu buŋinda obu bahweha mu hisugu aŋaatu. Omuutu ni gagundula, gabuhweha aŋaatu aŋandi, gatiina nʼesangaalo ngʼatunda ebibye byosibyosi ebi gaali ni nabyo, ngʼagula ehisugu ehyo.”
40013045	Nga nindi Yesu abagerera olugero ati, “Obuŋugi bwomwigulu huŋanga ohubugeragerania hu musubuuzi, owendula amabaale agʼebbeeyi.
40013046	Ni gagwirihirira erihira ohuba eryʼebbeeyi obugali, gatiina gatunda ebibye byosibyosi ebi gaali ni nabyo, ngʼaja aligula.”
40013047	Nga nindi Yesu abagerera olugero ati, “Obuŋugi bwomwigulu buli hyʼahatimba ahabatega mu nyanja nga haŋambya enyeeni eja hiisi ngeri.
40013048	Ni hejula enyeeni, ngʼabenuli bahahwesa ohwola hwigenya. Nga beehala, bangalamo endaŋi bajita mu bisero aye nga badanya embi.
40013049	Pohiriba hiityo hu komerero. Abamalayika baliija baabulamo abalaŋi, ngʼababi
40013050	babadanya mu muliro ogutasima eyiriba ohweninala nʼohulira amangi olwʼobulumi.”
40013051	Nga Yesu ababuusa ati, “Ebyo byosibyosi mubitegeeye?” Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Hutegeeye.”
40013052	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Olwʼehyo, hiisi musomesa wʼamagambi ga Hatonda afuuha omwegi mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda, ali hyʼomuutu omwene nyumba atusa ebiitu ebinyaaha nʼebihayire omu babibiiha.”
40013053	Yesu ni gaahena ohugera engero ejo, ngʼaŋwa mu hifo ehyo,
40013054	ngʼatiina mu hibuga hyʼewaawe. Ni goola, ngʼasomesa abaatu mu humbaaniro lyawe. Era abo abaŋulira nga beŋunja ni bebuusa baati, “Omusinde ono gatusa ŋeena amagesi nʼobuŋangi obuhola ebyamaliholiho?
40013055	Ono sinje omusaani wʼomubaaji? Era nyina sinje Malyamu? Nʼabalebe babe sinje Yakobbo ni Yosefu ni Simooni ko ni Yuda?
40013056	Nʼababoojo bosibosi sibamenya ŋano ni neefe? Amagesi nʼobuŋangi buno bwosibwosi gabitusa ŋe?”
40013057	Ehyaŋwamo nga bagaana ohufugiirira ebibye. Aye Yesu niye ngʼabaloma ati, “Naabbi bamuŋa eŋono aŋaatu ŋosiŋosi, ohutusaho mu hitundu hyʼewaawe nomu mago ewaawe.”
40013058	Era eyo sigaholayo byamaliholiho bingi olwʼabaatu baayo ohutaba nʼohufugiirira.
40014001	Mu biro ebyo, Herode owaali nʼaŋuga etwale lyʼe Galilaaya gaŋulira efuma lya Yesu.
40014002	Ngʼaloma abaŋeeresa babe ati, “Omuutu oyo anaabe nje Yowaane Omubatiza alamuhire, cʼehifa ali nʼobuŋangi ohuhola ebyamaliholiho.”
40014003	Herode gaŋeega atyo olwohuba gaali aŋambire Yowaane nʼamudanyire mu komera olwʼohwenda ohusangaasa Herodiya oyu gaali nʼapaahise hu mulebewe Filipo.
40014004	Hino gaali ahiholire olwohuba Yowaane galomanga Herode ati, “Sihiraŋi ewe ohupaasa muha mulebewo.”
40014005	Herode gendire ohwita Yowaane aye gatya abaatu, olwohuba baali bamanyire baati Yowaane naabbi.
40014006	Hu ludaalo olwʼohuhebuliriraho ohusaaliwa hwa Herode, omuhaana wa Herodiya gabahinira era ehyo hyasangaasa Herode.
40014007	Ehyaŋwamo, gamulayirira era ngʼamusuubisa ohumuŋa hyosihyosi ehi anamusunge.
40014008	Nʼaholera hu amagesi ga nyina, ngʼomuhaana aloma Herode ati, “Nenda omutwe gwa Yowaane Omubatiza ni guli hu suniya.”
40014009	Ehyo hyanakuŋasa habaha bugali, aye olwohuba gaali ahenire ohulayira nʼabageni babe ni baŋulira, ngʼahanda alagira bagumuŋe.
40014010	Era nga batiina mu komera batema hu Yowaane omutwe.
40014011	Nga baguleeta hu suniya baguŋa omuhaana, nga yeesi aguŋirira nyina.
40014012	Ngʼabeegi ba Yowaane batiina baja batusayo omulambo gugwe, bagusiiha. Ni bahena nga batiina balomeraho Yesu.
40014013	Yesu ni gaŋulira ebyali ni byolire hu Yowaane, gaŋamba engira nʼabeegi babe baŋwa mu hifo ehyo nga baniina eryato batiina mu hifo ehiŋumamo baatu. Ne ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ni bahitegeera, baŋwa mu bibuga ebiririhene bamulondaho nʼamagulu.
40014014	Yesu ni gaŋwa mu lyato gabona ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ni hihumbeene, nga himuŋambya ehisa ngʼaŋonia abalwaye aba baali ni nabo.
40014015	Egulo ni lyola, ngʼabeegi batiina aŋa Yesu gaali bamuloma baati, “Ehifo hino hiduleere, ate owiire mbobuno butiinire. Seebula abaatu batiine mu bitahere ebyohu mulirano begulire ebiryo balye.”
40014016	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Sihibeetagisa hutiina, enywe mubaŋe ebiryo balye.”
40014017	Nga nibo bamuloma baati, “Huliŋo nʼemigaati etaanu nʼenyeeni ebiri joŋene.”
40014018	Nga Yesu aloma ati, “Mubindeetere ŋano.”
40014019	Nga Yesu alagira abaatu ohwihala ŋaasi hu nyaasi. Ngʼabugula emigaati jira etaanu nʼenyeeni jawaho ebiri, ngʼagangamusa emoni aheja mwigulu, geyaasa Hatonda. Ngʼaŋo abbwagabbwaga mu migaati ejo, ajiŋa abeegi babe bagabire abaatu.
40014020	Ngʼabaatu abo bosibosi balya beeguta. Ngʼaŋo abeegi babe bahumbaania obukukumuhira owasigalaho nga bijusa ebisero ehumi nabibiri.
40014021	Abaatu abaalya baali ngʼekumi etaanu ohwo nʼotataayeho abahasi nʼabaana.
40014022	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo Yesu aloma abeegi babe baniine eryato batangirengamo bambuhe enyanja, niye nʼahiseebula abaatu.
40014023	Ni gahena ohubaseebula, ngʼatiina hu lusozi yeŋene ohusaba. Aŋa hiirema hyaŋambira, Yesu gaali ahiiri eyo yeŋene.
40014024	Cooka abeegi babe nibo ni bali mu lyato ni boolire ŋaleeŋi era amayengo ni gali huhubba, olwʼepunga eyaali ni baŋwa emutwe.
40014025	Ni waali ni bunatere ohuhya, Yesu gatiina eyi baali nʼagenda hu maaji.
40014026	Ni bamubona nʼagenda hu maaji, ngʼolusisimo lubaŋamba, baloma baati, “Himalyo!” ni binianguha olwʼohutya.
40014027	Aye aŋo ni naaŋo nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Ndiise, mugume mutatya!”
40014028	Ngʼaŋo Peetero amugobolamo ati, “Musengwa, nʼoba nʼoli ndiiwe ndome ngendere hu maaji niije eyi oli.”
40014029	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Nja.” Nga Peetero aŋwa mu lyato, agenda hu maaji nʼatiina eyiri Yesu.
40014030	Aye ni gabona amayengo ni genyoha, ngʼobuti bumuŋamba. Amaaji ni gamwiniha, gahayaana ati, “Musengwa, ponie!”
40014031	Ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo Yesu agolola omuhono, amuŋamba amuloma ati, “Lwahiina obuusabuusa, oli nʼohufugiirira hutotono?”
40014032	Era bombi ni bengira mu lyato, ngʼepunga eteeha.
40014033	Ngʼaŋo abaali mu lyato bajumirya Yesu ni baloma baati, “Mu butuufu oweene, oli Mwana wa Hatonda!”
40014034	Ni bambuha enyanja, nga boola mu hitahere ehi balanga baati Genesareeti.
40014035	Era abaatu baayo ni bahitegeera baati Yesu gaali goolire, basasaania amaŋuliro mu hitundu ehyo hyosihyosi ko nʼemirirano. Ngʼaŋo abaatu bamuŋirira abalwaye baawe bosibosi
40014036	nga bamwegalihira aganye abalwaye abo baŋambeho buŋambe hu gemo lyʼehyambalo hihye. Era hiisi owamuŋambaho, gaŋonanga huŋona.
40015001	Oluvanyuma balala hu Bafalisaayo nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi ga Hatonda baŋwa e Yerusaalemu, baatiina eyiri Yesu bamubuusa baati,
40015002	“Lwahiina abeegi babo sibahola ngʼolu obulombolombo wʼabasehulu beefe butuloma? Balya ni bahiiri husaaba mu ngalo.”
40015003	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Ne lwahiina enywe mubbwaga egambi lya Hatonda olwʼobulombolombo bwenywe?
40015004	Hino kiroma olwohuba Hatonda gaaloma ati, ‘Ŋanga lataawo ni maawo eŋono,’ era ati, ‘Anaduhenga Semwana oba nyina, bali nʼohumwitanga.’
40015005	Aye enywe muloma muuti omuutu analoma semwana oba nyina ati, ‘Obuyeedi obunahahuŋaye, nabuŋongayo eyiri Hatonda,’
40015006	olwo aba nʼehiyale ohyʼohutaŋa Semwana obuyeedi. Mu ngeri eyo nga mudibya ehibono hya Hatonda olwʼobulombolombo bwenywe.
40015007	Banafuusi enywe, ehibono hya Hatonda ehi naabbi Yisaaya gabalomaho hituufu olu gaaloma ati,
40015008	“ ‘Abaatu bano baapa eŋono lya hu munwa, aye emyoyo jaawe jipumaho.
40015009	Era banjumirya byahwehenahenaho, olwohuba ebibono obubono ebyʼabaatu, mbebi baŋira ohuba amagambi gange.’ ”
40015010	Ngʼaŋo Yesu alanga ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu hitiina aŋa gaali, ngʼaloma ati, “Mutege ohutwi era mutegeere ehi nja ohuloma.
40015011	Ebi muutu alya sinje ebimwonoona, aye ebiŋwa mu munwa gugwe.”
40015012	Ngʼaŋo abeegi babe batiina aŋa gaali, bamubuusa baati, “Ohimanyire oti Abafalisaayo baluŋire ni baŋuliiye ebibono ebyo?”
40015013	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Hiisi musaala ogu Bbaabba ali mwigulu atahoma, banahaguhuuleŋo.
40015014	Olwʼehyo, Abafalisaayo abo batabahenera biseera olwohuba batangirisi abaŋofu. Era singa omuŋofu atangirira omuŋofu wahye, bombi bagwa mwiroŋo.”
40015015	Ngʼaŋo Peetero amuloma ati, “Tulomere amahulu gʼolugero olwo.”
40015016	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Koni mwesi simufaania mahulu gʼolugero olwo bbe?
40015017	Simumanyire muuti ebi muutu alya bitiina mu hida omu biŋwa byatula?
40015018	Aye ebi aloma biŋwa mu mwoyo gugwe era ebyo njʼebimwonoona.
40015019	Hino kiroma olwohuba mu mwoyo gwʼomuutu pomuŋwa ebiŋeego ebibi, obutemu, obuhwedi, ohuba wʼemoni enyangu, ohuba nʼomuhono omuleeŋi, obudulingi nʼobuŋesi.
40015020	Ebyo njʼebyonoona omuutu; sosi ohulya nʼatasaabire mu ngalo.”
40015021	Yesu ni gaaŋwa mu hifo ehyo, ngʼatiina mu twale lyʼe Tiiro ni Sidoni.
40015022	Omuhasi Omukanani ohuŋwa mu hitundu ehyo, ngʼatiina aŋa gaali, genaana ati, “Musengwa, Omwijuhulu wa Dawudi, pambire ehisa! Omusambwa gugudya omuhaana wange bugali!”
40015023	Aye Yesu sigamugobolamo hiitu hyosihyosi. Olwʼehyo, abeegi babe batiina aŋa gaali bamwegalihira baati, “Mubbinge, olwohuba ali hutuhubbira oluhero!”
40015024	Nga Yesu agobolamo ati, “Baatuma eyiri Abayisirayiri ababbaama boŋene.”
40015025	Ngʼaŋo omuhasi oyo atiina ahubba amafuha mu moni jije amuloma ati, “Musengwa, njeede!”
40015026	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Sihiraŋi ohuŋamba ebiryo byʼabaana wabidanyira embwa jaawe.”
40015027	Ngʼomuhasi oyo amuloma ati, “Musengwa, pohiri aye nʼembwa joosi jirya obukukumuhira obugwa ŋaasi wʼemeeza ya musengwa waajo.”
40015028	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Muhasi ewe, oli nʼohufugiirira ohwʼamaani! Ale hahibe ngʼolu osungire.” Era omuhaana wuwe gaŋona mu saawa enyene eyo.
40015029	Yesu ni gaŋwa mu hifo ehyo, gatiina nʼagendera hwigenya lyʼenyanja yʼe Galilaaya, ngʼaniina hu lusozi geehala.
40015030	Abaatu bangi batiina aŋa gaali ni bamuŋirira abaleme nʼabahyafutafuta nʼabaŋofu nʼabagongobala nʼabataloma ko nʼabalwaye abandi. Nga babata aŋo ohuupi ni naye era ngʼabaŋonia.
40015031	Abaatu beŋunja ni baabona abaali ni bataloma ni baloma, abaleme ni bagenda, abaŋofu ni babona. Era nga bajumirya Hatonda wʼAbayisirayiri.
40015032	Ngʼaŋo Yesu alanga abeegi babe batiine aŋa gaali abaloma ati, “Abaatu bano bapambya ehisa olwohuba babaaye ni neese endaalo edatu kwiye, aye ŋaahani baŋuma hyʼohulya. Sinenda hubaseebula ni bali njala, bahanda bagwa hu ngira.”
40015033	Aye abeegi babe bamugobolamo baati, “Mu hifo ehiduleere hino omuutu aŋanga hutusa ŋeena ebiryo ebiŋanga ohuliisa abaatu bano bosibosi?”
40015034	Nga Yesu ababuusa ati, “Muliŋo nʼemigaati jinga?” Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Musanvu nʼobuyeeni butotono.”
40015035	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma abaatu behale ŋaasi.
40015036	Ngʼabugula emigaati ejo omusanvu nʼenyeeni jawaho, nga geyaasa Hatonda, ajibbwagabbwagamo ngʼahena ajiŋa abeegi babe bajigabire abaatu. Nga boosi bahola ngʼolu gabaloma.
40015037	Nga bosibosi balya beguta. Ni bahena ohulya, ngʼabeegi babe bahumbaania obukukumuhira owasigalaŋo, nga bwijula ebisero musanvu.
40015038	Abaatu abalya, baali ekumi ene, ohwo nʼatatayeho abahasi nʼabaana.
40015039	Oluvanyuma lwa Yesu ohuseebula abaatu, gahena ganiina eryato ngʼatiina mu twale lyʼe Magadani.
40016001	Lulala, balala hu Bafalisaayo nʼAbasadukaayo baatiina eyiri Yesu nga bamuloma abaŋe ahabonero aheŋunjisa ahalaga haati obuŋangi obu gaali ni nabwo gabutusa yiri Hatonda. Ehyo bamuloma humuhema.
40016002	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Eryuba aŋa ligwira mu maaji, munabona egulu ni lifaana hyʼamafugi, muloma muuti; ‘Olwejo embeera yʼowiire yinahabe ndaŋi.’
40016003	Mu mugamba aŋa lyuba liŋwerayo munabona egulu ni lifaana hyʼamafugi nʼebireri ni bisidihire muloma muuti; ‘Olwa leero lunaabe lwʼehidumi.’ Mumanyire amahulu gemboneha yʼowiire aye simumanyire huvunula ebiriŋo mu hiseera hino.
40016004	Abaatu bʼomulembe guno babi era sibesigwa eyiri Hatonda! Benda ahabonero ahalaga haati Hatonda njʼowaatuma aye ŋaŋuma ahabonero ahabaja ohubaŋa ohutusaho ahabonero hyaha Yona olu gaali mu guyeeni.” Nʼebibono ebyo, nga Yesu abalehaŋo getiinira.
40016005	Abeegi ba Yesu ni boola engereha wʼenyanja, bahebulira baati bebiriiye ohugega emigaati.
40016006	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Mwegenderese era mwehuume ehisimbulusa hyʼAbafalisaayo nʼAbasadukaayo.”
40016007	Nga nibo begeyamo abeene nʼabeene baati, “Aloma atyo olwohuba ndihugega migaati.”
40016008	Yesu gamanya ehi baali ni begeyamo ngʼababuusa ati, “Enywe abali nʼohufugiirira ohutotono, lwahiina muŋeega hu hyʼohuŋuma emigaati?
40016009	Nʼohwola haati muhiiri hutegeera? Si muhebulira olu nabbwaga mu migaati etaanu nagabira abaatu ekumi etaanu? Mwahumbaania ebisero binga ebyʼobukukumuhira?
40016010	Ate mwahumbaania ebisero byʼobukukumuhira binga olu nabbwaga mu migaati omusanvu nagabira abaatu ekumi ene?
40016011	Lwahiina simutegeera muuti simbaaye ni ndoma hu migaati? Aye mbalomire mwehuume ehisimbulusa hyʼAbafalisaayo nʼAbasadukaayo.”
40016012	Ngʼabeegi abo ko bategeera baati sigaali nʼabaloma hwehuuma hutalya migaati ejirimo ehisimbulusa aye esomesa yʼAbafalisaayo nʼAbasadukaayo eyʼobudulingi.
40016013	Yesu nʼabeegi babe ni boola mu hibuga Kayisaaliya ehya Filipi, ngʼababuusa ati, “Abaatu ni baba ni baloma hu Omwana wʼOmuutu, baloma baati njʼani?”
40016014	Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Ŋaliŋo abaloma mbo ndiiwe Yowaane Omubatiza, abandi baati ndiiwe naabbi Eriya, abandi baati ndiiwe Yeremiya era nʼabandi baati oli mulala hu banaabbi.”
40016015	Ngʼaŋo ababuusa ati, “Ne enywe, muloma muuti ndiise ani?”
40016016	Nga Simooni oyu balanga baati Peetero amugobolamo ati, “Ndiiwe Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu era Omwana wa Hatonda omulamu.”
40016017	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Simooni omwana wa Yona, oli nʼekabi olwohuba omuutu sinje ahuhwehuliiye ehyo, aye Bbaabba ali mwigulu.
40016018	Olwʼehyo kuloma ti ndiiwe Peetero, hu lwanda huno nditongolaho ehibbubbu hyange ehyʼabafugiirira era amaani gʼe magombe sigalibaŋangula.
40016019	Ndihuŋa ebisumuluzo ebyʼobuŋugi bwomwigulu era hiisi ehi osidiha hu hyalo, nomwigulu mwosi balihisidiha era hiisi ehi ositula hu hyalo nomwigulu mwosi balihisitula.”
40016020	Ngʼahuutira abeegi babe batalomeraho muutu yesiyesi baati nje Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu.
40016021	Ohuŋwa mu hiseera ehyo, nga Yesu atandiha ohusomesa abeegi babe ngʼolu ali nʼohutiina e Yerusaalemu, abaatu abahulu mu gwanga nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi nʼabatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda bamubonyaabonye bugali weene era bamwite, aye ni ŋalibitaŋo endaalo edatu aliramuha.
40016022	Olwʼehyo, Peetero gaŋira Yesu hu tulo ngʼamuhayula ati, “Musengwa, ehyo sihija huhwolaho kadi!”
40016023	Nga Yesu acuuha amuloma ati, “Pwe mu moni, oli Sitaani! Oli hutigatigania ohuhola ebyagima naaja, sooli huŋeega hu mulimo gwa Hatonda ogwandeeta, aye oli huŋeega hu byʼabaatu!”
40016024	Ngʼaŋo aloma abeegi babe ati, “Hiisi muutu owenda ohuba omuloobera wange, ateehwa ohwefiirisa byosibyosi era nʼali muheneerefu ohubbeeda omusalabba gugwe era agende ni neese.
40016025	Hino kiroma olwohuba hiisi oweheneerera obulamu buwe, alibufiirwa aye hiisi afiirwa obulamu buwe hu lwange, alibunoŋola.
40016026	Ale higasa hi omuutu ohuba nʼobuŋinda bwohu hyalo huno bwosibwosi aye gafiirwa obulamu buwe? Ale dala ŋaliŋo ehi omuutu aŋanga ohuŋayo ko gagobosaŋo obulamu buwe ni buba ni buhenire ohugota?
40016027	Hino kiroma olwohuba Omwana wʼOmuutu aja huuja mu eŋono lya Semwana, nʼali nʼabamalayika babe aŋe hiisi muutu omuhemba ni geema hu bikolwa byawe.
40016028	Mbalomera ehituufu ti, ŋaliŋo abandi hu enywe abemereeye ŋano, abatalifa ohutusaho ni bahenire ohubona Omwana wʼOmuutu ni gaaja ohuŋuga.”
40017001	Ni ŋabitaŋo endaalo mukaaga, nga Yesu atiina ni Peetero ni Yakobbo ni Yowaane muganda ya Yakobbo nga baniina hu olusozi olwegingihiriri baba eyo boŋene.
40017002	Ni baali eyo, abeegi babe abo baali baheja nga mu moni wuwe mucuuha mumeregenya hyʼeryuba era ebyambalo bibye nga bipepya bimesya hyʼenjase.
40017003	Aŋo ni naaŋo nga babona Eriya ni Musa ni baŋaya ni Yesu.
40017004	Nga Peetero aloma Yesu ati, “Musengwa, hiraŋi ti huli ŋano. Ni huba husiima huhwo, natongole ebitiira bidatu. Hirala hibe hihyo, ehindi hya Musa nʼehindi hyʼEriya.”
40017005	Peetero ni gaali nʼahiiroma, ehireri ehipepya nga hiija hibawiihaho. Ngʼejanjaasi liŋwera mu hireri ehyo, ni ŋaliŋo aloma ati, “Ono njʼOmwana wange omuhoda oyu nenda era owunesiimisa. Ale muŋulirise ebi abaloma.”
40017006	Abeegi abo ni baŋulira ebibono ebyo batya bugali, nga bagwa ŋaasi mahotamiriiye ni batenda nʼohumuhejaho.
40017007	Aye Yesu gatiina gabaŋambaho, ngʼabaloma ati, “Mwinyohe mutatya!”
40017008	Abeegi babe ni bagangamuha, sibabona muutu owundi yesiyesi ohutusaho Yesu yeŋene.
40017009	Ni baali ni baŋwa hu lusozi, nga Yesu abahamiirisa ati, “Mutalomeraho muutu yesiyesi ebyo ebi muweene ohwola olu Omwana wʼOmuutu aliramuha.”
40017010	Ngʼaŋo abeegi abo bamubuusa baati, “Lwahiina abasomesa bʼamagambi ga Hatonda baloma baati naabbi Eriya ali nʼohweheerera ohugobola ko Kurisito gaaje?”
40017011	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Hituufu, Eriya ali nʼohweheerera ohuuja agobose bunyaaha emyoyo jʼabaatu.
40017012	Aye mbalomera ti Eriya gahena hale ohuuja, aye sibamufaania era abaatu bamuhola byosibyosi ebi bendire. Mu ngeri njʼenyene baja hugudya nʼOmwana wʼOmuutu baatyo.”
40017013	Ngʼaŋo abeegi bategeera baati gaali abalomera hu Yowaane Omubatiza.
40017014	Yesu nʼabeegi babe bala abadatu ni baŋwa hu lusozi, nga bagaana ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu. Nga ŋabaaŋo omusinde owatiina eyiri Yesu, ahubba amafuha mu moni wuwe amuloma ati,
40017015	“Muhulu, kwegayiriiye ŋambira musaani yange ehisa, agwa efubu era abonaabona bugali. Efunda nyingi agwa mu muliro oba mu maaji.
40017016	Namuleetaho eyiri abeegi babo aye sibamuŋonia.”
40017017	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Enywe abaatu bʼomulembe guno ababbeeme era abaŋuma hufugiirira, ndihena ni nenywe ahamanga ahaaga hatye ko mube nʼohufugiirira, ndyosa ŋeena ohubehaliiriha? Mundeetere ŋano omuseere oyo.”
40017018	Yesu ngʼahayuhira omusambwa guŋwa hu museere, ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo aŋona.
40017019	Oluvanyuma abeegi ba Yesu batiina eyi ali nʼali yeŋene nga bamubuusa baati, “Lwahiina ndihusobole hubbinga musambwa ogwo hu museere?”
40017020	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Ehyo hibaaye hiityo olwohuba muli nʼohufugiirira hutotono. Mbalomera ehituufu ti, singa muba nʼohufugiirira nʼolu huba hudiidiri hyʼahamo ha kalidaali, mwahalomire olusozi luno muuti, ‘Siguha ŋano oje wedaanye ŋala’ era nga ehi oloma hibaŋo. Ŋaŋuma ehiribahaya.
40017021	Aye omusambwa hyʼogwo siguŋanga hutiina ni ŋaŋuma husaba nʼohusiiba.”
40017022	Abeegi bosibosi ni Yesu ni baali ni bahumbeene ŋalala e Galilaaya, nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Omwana wʼOmuutu baja humulyamo oluhwe bahene bamuŋeyo eyiri abobuŋangi bamwite.
