40017023	Baja humwita aye ŋalibitaŋo endaalo edatu ngʼalamuha.” Ehyo hyaleetera abeegi babe ohweŋunamira.
40017024	Yesu nʼabeegi babe ni boola e Kaperanawumu, ngʼabaŋoosa bomu yʼe Yekaalu batiina eyiri Peetero bamubuusa baati, “Koni omusomesa wenywe niye saaŋa musolo gwomu Yekaalu?”
40017025	Nga Peetero abagobolamo ati, “Aŋa.” Peetero ni gengira mu nyumba, Yesu njʼoweherera ohuloma ngʼamubuusa ati, “Ne ewe Simooni oŋeega otye? Abahabaha baŋoosa baatu hi? Abaatu bomu gwanga lyawe oba abalugendwa?”
40017026	Nga Peetero amugobolamo ati, “Hu balugendwa.” Ngʼaŋo Yesu amuloma ati, “Abazaliranwa bomu gwanga sibali nʼohuŋa omusolo.
40017027	Aye ohutenda hubaluŋia tiina hu nyanja odanye omulobo mu maaji, enyeeni eyi oneheerere ohuŋambya, onayasamye wagaanamo ebbeesa. Jiŋambe otiine osasule omusolo ogugwo nʼogwange.”
40018001	Mu hiseera ehyo abeegi batiina aŋali Yesu, nga bamubuusa baati, “Njʼani ahira ohuba owʼeŋono mu baatu abali mu buŋugi obwomwigulu?”
40018002	Ngʼaŋo Yesu alanga omwana omuŋere owaali aŋaapi aŋo, amwemeeresa ŋagati waawe.
40018003	Ngʼahena aloma ati, “Mbalomera ehituufu ti hiisi muutu ateesiga Hatonda hyʼomwana omuŋere ngʼolu geesiga abasaaye babe, saalibaliwa huba mulala hu baatu aba Hatonda aŋuga.
40018004	Olwʼehyo hiisi oweŋomeha hyʼomwana omuŋere ono, njʼahira ohuba owʼeŋono mu baatu aba Hatonda aŋuga.
40018005	Era Hiisi asangaalira omwana omuŋere hyʼono hu lwange, aba asangaliiye ndiise.
40018006	Aye omuutu yesiyesi aleetera mulala hu baŋere bano abafugiirira ohubbenga, aŋoomera humusidihamo ogubaale ogusito mu mamiro, nga bahena bamudanya mu buliba.
40018007	“Nga jibageene abaatu abomu hyalo hino olwohuba mulimo ebiitu ebi baleetera ohwonoona. Ebiitu hyʼebyo biri nʼohubaŋo aye jimwageene oyo abireeta!
40018008	Olwʼehyo hanye muhono oba hugulu huhwo njʼohuhuleetera ohwonoona, hutemeeho. Hiraŋi osune obulamu obutaŋwaŋo nʼoli muleme, ohuhira olu osigasa emihono jombi oba amagulu gombi, aye bahudanya mu muliro ogutasima emirembe nʼemirembe.
40018009	Era hanye emoni yiyo ehuleetera ohuhola ehibi yomoleemo. Hiraŋi obe wa moni ndala aye wingire mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda, ohuhira olu osigasa emoni jombi, aye bahudanya mu hifo omu oja husihiirihira.
40018010	“Olwʼehyo omanya otatalanga wayire mulala hu baŋere bano, olwohuba mbalomera ti, abamalayika ababalabirira hiisi hiseera bolerera Bbaabba ali mwigulu.
40018011	Omwana wʼOmuutu gaaja ohunoŋola abaatu ababbaama.
40018012	“Enywe muŋeega muutye? Singa omuutu aba nʼetaama jije cikumi aye nga ndala yigotaho, saaleha aŋo ecenda namwenda ni jiri hwaya gatiina ohwendula endala eyo egotire ohwola olu ayibona?
40018013	Era mbalomera ehituufu ti, nʼayibona asangaala bugali olwʼetaama eyo endala, ohuhiraho jira ecenda namwenda.
40018014	Mu ngeri njʼenyene Senywe ali mwigulu sigenda wayire mulala hu baŋere bano ohubadanya mu muliro.”
40018015	Ngʼaŋo Yesu geyongera aloma ati, “Singa owahyo ahuhola ehibi, tiinayo omulomere ehibi hihye ni muli babiri mweŋene. Nʼafugiirira ehi omuloma, muligobolaŋo nindi ohuholagana bulaŋi.
40018016	Aye singa saafugiirira ehi oloma, wagamangayo nʼowahyo mulala oba babiri ko hiisi songa bayihahasenga ni ŋaliŋo obujulizi owʼabaatu babiri oba badatu.
40018017	Singa agaana ohubaŋulirisa, mumuŋiranga mu hibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira, bamwiihasa bamubulirira. Anagaana ohuŋuliirisa, mumuŋiranga ohuba hyʼAtali Muyudaaya oba omuŋoosa oyu muloma muuti ali nʼebibi.
40018018	“Mbalomera ehituufu ti hiisi ehi osidiha hu hyalo, nomwigulu mwosi balihisidiha, era hiisi ehi ositula hu hyalo, nomwigulu mwosi balihisitula.
40018019	“Nindi mbaloma ti, singa babiri hu hyalo huno banabenga bulala mu hiisi ehi musaba, Bbaabba ali mwigulu anahibaŋenga.
40018020	Hino kiroma olwohuba babiri oba abadatu abafugiirira banahumbaana mu siina lyange, mba aŋo ni nabo.”
40018021	Ngʼaŋo Peetero atiina aŋali Yesu amubuusa ati, “Musengwa, owahyange anakola ehibi, musoniŋe efunda jinga? Musoniŋe efunda musanvu?”
40018022	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Kuloma ti, si funda musanvu aye nsanvu emirundi musanvu.
40018023	“Obuŋugi bwomwigulu huŋanga ohubugeragerania hu habaha owendire abeedu babe baŋeyo embalirira yʼebbeesa jije.
40018024	Ni gatandiha ohubala ebitabo nga baleeta mulala hu beedu oyu gaali nʼabanja etalanta omutwalo mulala.
40018025	Omwidu oyo gaŋuma bbeesa ohusasula musengwawe. Olwʼehyo musengwawe galagira bamutunde, nʼomuhasi wuwe nʼabaana babe ko nʼebiitu bibye byosibyosi, ohusasula ebbanja.
40018026	Ngʼaŋo omwidu oyo ahubba amafuha amwegalihira ati, ‘Ngumikirizeho, nahahusasule ebbeesa jijo josijosi eji wumbanja.’
40018027	Omwidu oyo gaŋambya musengwawe ehisa, ngʼamusoniŋa ebbanja ngʼamuleha gagamayo.
40018028	“Aye omwidu oyo ni gatula ebulafu, gagaanana nʼomwidu wahye oyu gaali nʼabanja dinaari cikumi. Ngʼamugwa mu mamiro amuloma ati, ‘Sasule ebbeesa jange!’
40018029	Ngʼaŋo omwidu wahye oyo ahubba amafuha, amwegalihira nʼaloma ati, ‘Ngumikirizeho, njahuhusasula ebbeesa jijo.’
40018030	Aye niye gagaana era galoma bamudanya mu komera ohwola olu alisasula ebbanja.
40018031	Abeedu bahye ni baabona ebyaliŋo, ehyo hyababisya bubi bugali weene, era baŋamba engira batiina balomera musengwa yaawe byosibyosi.
40018032	Ngʼaŋo musengwa yaawe alanga omwidu oyo amuloma ati, ‘Mwidu ewe omubi, nahusoniŋa ebbanja eri naali ni kubanja olwohuba wanjegalihira.
40018033	Ndiiwe ataŋanga husoniŋa wahyo ngʼolu ese nahusoniŋa?’
40018034	Nʼobusungu bungi, musengwawe gamuŋambya abasirikale bamudanye mu komera bamugudye, ohwola olu alihena ohusasula ebbanja lyosiryosi.”
40018035	Nga Yesu agohoba ati, “Eyo njʼengeri eyi Bbaabba ali mwigulu alibisyamo hiisi mulala hu nywe, ohutusaho nga musoniŋire abahyenywe ohuŋwera erala mu myoyo jenywe.”
40019001	Yesu ni gahena ohuloma ebibono ebyo, ngʼaŋwa e Galilaaya atiina mu twale lyʼe Buyudaaya, engereha wʼolwabi Yoludaani.
40019002	Ngʼaŋo ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu himulondaho era ngʼaŋonia abalwaye abaalimo.
40019003	Ngʼaŋo balala hu Bafalisaayo batiina bamuhema baati, “Amagambi geefe gafugiirira omuutu ohubbinga omuhasi wuwe olwʼesonga yosiyosi?”
40019004	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Simusomangaho ehyaŋandiihiwa hiiti; ‘Ohuŋwa hutandiha yʼehyalo, Hatonda gawumba omusinde nʼomuhasi?’
40019005	Era ngʼaloma ati, ‘Olwʼehyo omusinde analehenga semwana ni nyina, nga geŋimba nʼomuhasi wuwe, nga bombi bafuuha mubiri mulala?’
40019006	Olwo nga sibahiiri babiri, wabula mulala. Ale omuutu saaŋimbululanga ehi Hatonda gaŋimba ŋalala.”
40019007	NgʼAbafalisaayo abo bamubuusa baati, “Ne lwahiina Musa gataŋo ehiragiro ati omusinde abbinga omuhasi wuwe, amuŋanga ebbaluŋa ehahasa yiiti amubbingire?”
40019008	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Musa gafugiirira abasinde ohuŋa abahasi baawe ebbaluŋa olwʼobuhahanyafu wʼemyoyo jaawe. Aye sihyali hiityo ohuŋwera erala mu hutandiha.
40019009	Mbaloma ti hiisi abbinga omuhasi wuwe ohutusaho olwʼobuhwedi, ngʼahena aleeta owundi, aba aholire obuhwedi.”
40019010	Ngʼabeegi babe bamuloma baati, “Ni hiba ni hiri hiityo ŋagati wʼomusinde nʼomuhasi wuwe, hiraŋi ohutafumbirwa.”
40019011	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Hiisi muutu saaŋanga hufugiirira esomesa eyo, ohutusaho abo aba Hatonda gaŋa ohuyitegeera boŋene.
40019012	Abaatu abandi sibaleeta bahasi olwohuba babasaala ni balibafiirwa, abandi olwʼohubalaaŋa nʼabandi olwʼohwenda ohweŋerayo erala ohuŋeeresa Hatonda. Afugiirira ebyo ebindomire hu bufumbo, ahifugiirire.”
40019013	Ngʼaŋo ŋabaaŋo abaaŋira abaana abaŋere eyiri Yesu ohubaŋambaho abalombere ekabi, aye abeegi babe bahayula abaatu abo.
40019014	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Mulehe abaana abaŋere baaje eyi ndi. Mutabagaana, olwohuba abali hyʼabo, mbʼabengira mu obuŋugi womwigulu.”
40019015	Ni gahena ohubaŋambaho nʼohubasabira ekabi, ngʼaŋwa mu hifo ehyo.
40019016	Ŋaaliŋo omusinde owatiina eyiri Yesu ngʼamubuusa ati, “Musomesa, hiraŋi hi ehi ndi nʼohuhola ohusuna obulamu obutaŋwaŋo?”
40019017	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Lwahiina wumbuusa ehiŋamba hu biitu ebiraŋi? Ŋaliŋo mulala yeŋene Omulaŋi. Era nʼoba ni wenda ohusuna obulamu obutaŋwaŋo gondera ebiragiro bibye.”
40019018	Ngʼomusinde oyo amubuusa ati, “Biragiro hi ebyo?” Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Siwitanga muutu, sooholanga buhwedi, siwibanga hiitu hyosihyosi, otabeŋeranga muutu ehi ataholire,
40019019	oŋanga lataawo ni maawo eŋono era ‘yendanga omuutu wahyo, ngʼolu weyenda wamwene.’ ”
40019020	Ngʼomusinde oyo amuloma ati, “Ebiragiro ebyo byosibyosi mbyoheresa. Hiina ehi kibuliraho?”
40019021	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Nʼoba ni wenda ohuba owolereeye, tiina otunde ebibyo byosibyosi, ebbeesa ejiŋwamo ojigabire abagadi olisuna obuŋinda obwomwigulu. Nʼohena, wuuje obe muloobera wange.”
40019022	Omusinde oyo ni gaŋulira ebyo, gaŋwaŋo nʼawomboŋaaye olwohuba gaali nʼobuŋinda obwene obungi.
40019023	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma abeegi babe ati, “Mbalomera ehituufu ti, higosi omuŋinda ohwingira mu buŋugi bwomwigulu!
40019024	Era mbalomera ehituufu ti, hyangu bugali weene engamiya ohubita mu ŋundu lyʼepiso, ohuhira omuŋinda ohwingira mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda.”
40019025	Abeegi babe ni baŋulira ebibono ebyo, beŋunja bugali nga babuusa baati, “Olwo ŋaahani njʼani aŋanga ohunoŋoha?”
40019026	Nga Yesu abalengerera ahena abaloma ati, “Eyiri abaatu, higosi ohwenoŋola aye eyiri Hatonda ebiitu byosibyosi bisoboha era ŋabula ehimuhaya.”
40019027	Ngʼaŋo Peetero aloma Yesu ati, “Efe hwaleha ebyefe byosibyosi nga huuja hube baloobera babo, balituŋa hi?”
40019028	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Mbalomera ehituufu ti ni balihena ohugobosa hiisi hiitu bunyaaha, Omwana wʼOmuutu aliihala hu tebe yiye eyʼobuŋungi mu ŋono lirye, enywe abaloobera bange ehumi nʼababiri mwesi muliihala hu etebe ehumi nʼebiri ejʼobuŋugi, mwasalira ebiha bya Yisirayiri ehumi nabibiri emisango.
40019029	Era hiisi owaleha amago gage oba abaganda babe oba ababoojo oba nyina oba semwana oba abaana oba muŋuluko gugwe hu lwange, alisuna omuhemba emirundi cikumi ejʼebyo ebi gafiirwa era baamuŋa nʼobulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
40019030	Aye bangi hu begingihiriri mu hiseera hino abaliba abaŋaasi, nindi bangi hu baŋaasi mu hiseera hino abaliba abegingihiriri.”
40020001	Nga Yesu abagerera olugero ati, “Obuŋugi bwomwigulu huŋanga ohubugeragerania hu muutu owaali nʼendimiro yiye eyʼemizabbibbu. Lulala gaŋuuna mu mugamba ohwendula abaatu abohumutambira mu ndimiro yiye.
40020002	Ni gababona, ngʼafugiirisania ni nabo ohubasasula dinaari ndala, ngʼabasindiha batiina ohutamba mu ndimiro yiye.
40020003	Ni gatiina mu katale hu saawa ngʼedatu ohwendula abatambi abandi, gabona abaatu ni bemereeye aŋo ni baŋuma ehibahola.
40020004	Ngʼabaloma ati, ‘Enywe mwesi mutiine mutambe mu ndimiro yange eyʼemizabbibbu, nabasasule ebbeesa ejisaana.’
40020005	Era nga boosi batiina ohutamba mu ndimiro eyo. Nga nindi hu saawa mukaaga ejomu muusi nohu saawa mwenda gagamayo mu katale ahola ehiitu cʼehyene.
40020006	Hu saawa ehumi nandala gatiina era nga nindi abona abandi ni bemereeye aŋo ngʼababuusa ati, ‘Lwahiina oludaalo lwosirwosi muluheneye aŋo ni mwemereeye hwemeerera ni ŋaŋuma ehi muhola?’
40020007	“Ngʼabaatu abo bamugobolamo baati, ‘Hwemereeye ŋano olwohuba ŋaŋuma atuŋaye emirimo ohumutambira.’ Ngʼabaloma ati, ‘Ale mwesi mutiine mutambe mu ndimiro yange eyʼemizabbibbu.’
40020008	“Egulo, esaawa eyʼohwinuha hu muga ni yoola, ngʼomwene ndimiro aloma nyapala wuwe ati, ‘Langa abatambi obasasule omuhemba gwawe nʼotandiihira hu basembireyo ohuuja ohutamba, osembyeyo abo abehereeye.’
40020009	“Abaatu abo abatiina esaawa ehumi nandala ohutamba, batiina nga hiisi muutu asuna edinaari ndala.
40020010	Abeheerera ohutiina ohutamba ni batiina ohubasasula, baŋeega baati baali bahusuna hibbala ohuhiraho abahyabwe abo. Aye boosi baabaŋa edinaari ndala ndala.
40020011	Oluvanyuma lwʼohubaŋa ebbeesa, bemulugunya eyiri omwene ndimiro
40020012	baati, ‘Abasinde bano, abasembireyo ohuuja era abatambire esaawa ndala yoŋene, obasasuuye cʼehyene ni neefe abaholire omuusi gwosigwosi nʼogumwi gwatuŋweraho!’
40020013	Ngʼaŋo omwene ndimiro agobolamo mu mulala hu abo ati, ‘Wange nandikwibe, sihutegeregane edinaari ndala?
40020014	Olwʼehyo ŋamba eyiyo ote mu saŋu wetiinire. Hiri eyi ndi ohusasula nʼasembireyo ohuuja, cʼehyene ni neewe.
40020015	Ehi oloma puma buŋangi ohutambisa ebbeesa jange ngʼolu mba ni nendire? Oba ogongeera olwohuba ndi nʼehyere?’ ”
40020016	Nga Yesu agohoba ati, “Bangi hu begingihiriri mu hiseera hino abaliba abaŋaasi, nindi bangi hu baŋaasi mu hiseera hino abaliba abegingihiriri.”
40020017	Ŋaahani Yesu nʼabeegi babe ehumi nʼababiri ni baali ni batiina e Yerusaalemu, gabagobosa hutulo ngʼabaloma ati,
40020018	“Huli hutiina e Yerusaalemu aye ni hulyola eyo baja hulya mu Mwana wʼOmuutu oluhwe bahene bamuŋeyo eyiri abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi. Era baja humusalira ogwʼohufa,
40020019	bamuŋeyo eyiri abalugendwa bamujeeje era bamufadule efaalu bahene bamuhomerere hu musalabba. Ne ni ŋalibitaŋo endaalo edatu, aliramuha.”
40020020	Ngʼaŋo muha Zebbedaayo atiina nʼabasaani babe eyiri Yesu, ngʼahubba amafuha amusunga abeho nʼehi amuholera.
40020021	Nga Yesu amubuusa ati, “Wenda kuholere hi?” Ngʼomuhasi oyo amugobolamo ati, “Nʼonahehale hu tebe yiyo eyʼeŋono mu buŋugi buwo, nenda oganye abasaani bange bano bombi beehale ohuhulirana, mulala hu muhono gugwo omulungi, nʼowundi hu mugooda.”
40020022	Nga Yesu aloma abasaani ba Zebbedaayo ati, “Ehi musunga simuhitegeera. Muŋanga ohunywa hu hihopo ehyʼohubonaabona ehi nja hunywaho?” Nga nibo bamugobolamo baati, “Huŋanga.”
40020023	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Hituufu mwesi mulinywa hu hihopo ehyʼohubonaabona ehi nja hunywaho. Aye ehyʼohwihala ni mundireene hu muhono gwange omulungi oba omugooda, sindiise ahigaba. Ebifo ebyo, Bbaabba omwene alibiŋa abo aba gabitegehera.”
40020024	Abeegi bahyawe ehumi ni baŋulira ehi bahyawe ababiri abo basunga, nga babaluŋira.
40020025	Olwʼehyo nga Yesu abalanga bosibosi bahumbaanire aŋa gaali. Ngʼabaloma ati, “Mumanyire muuti abaŋugi bʼAbatali Bayudaaya benda babaŋeerese era abatangirisi baawe benda abaatu aba baŋuga bamanye baati babaliho obuŋangi.
40020026	Aye sihiri nʼohuba hiityo eyiri enywe. Hiisi owenda ohuba omuhulu mu nywe, ali nʼohuba muŋeeresa wʼabahye.
40020027	Era hiisi owenda ohuba omutangirisi, ali nʼohuba muŋeeresa wʼabahye.
40020028	Mu ngeri njʼenyene nʼOmwana wʼOmuutu sigaaja bamuŋeerese aye niiye ohuŋeeresa, era nʼohuŋayo obulamu buwe ohuba endiŋi eyʼohununula oluhulende.”
40020029	Yesu nʼabeegi babe ni baali ni baŋwa e Yeriko, ngʼehiŋindi hyʼabaatu himulondaho.
40020030	Ŋaahani ŋaaliŋo abasinde babiri abaŋofu abaali ni behaaye hutulo wʼengira. Abasinde abo ni baŋulira baati Yesu abita, nga balangirira nʼejanjaasi eryʼamaani baati, “Musengwa, Mwijuhulu wa Dawudi, tuŋambire ehisa otuŋonie!”
40020031	Nga bangi hu baatu abomu hiŋindi ehyo babahayula ni babaloma baŋoleere. Cooka nibo nga begumya hwegumya ohulangirira baati, “Musengwa Mwijuhulu wa Dawudi, tuŋambire ehisa!”
40020032	Nga Yesu gemeerera alagira baleete abaŋofu abo aŋa ali. Ni babaŋira, ngʼababuusa ati, “Mwenda mbaholere hi?”
40020033	Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Musengwa, twigule emoni hubone.”
40020034	Yesu gabaŋambira ehisa ngʼabaŋamba hu moni. Aŋo ni naaŋo, ngʼemoni jʼabasinde abo jirimbula batandiha ohubona era nga beŋimba hu baali ni balonda hu Yesu.
40021001	Ŋaahani Yesu nʼabeegi babe ni baali ni banatere ohwola mu Yerusaalemu, boola mu haalo ahabalanga baati Bbesufage, hu lusozi lwʼemisaala Emizayiti. Ngʼatuma babiri hu beegi babe ati,
40021002	“Mutiine mu hitahere ehi mulengera hira. Ni munaabe ni mwahengiramo, munaabone nasugirya nʼenyana yaayo ebunwa ni bajisidihire aŋo, mujiboŋolole mujindeetere.
40021003	Singa ŋabaŋo ababuusa lwahiina mujiboŋolola, munamugobolemo muuti; ‘Musengwa njʼajenda’, era aŋo ni naaŋo anabafugiirire mwajireeta.”
40021004	Bino byaliŋo ohwoheresa ehi naabbi galoma ati,
40021005	“Mulomere abaatu bomu Sayuuni muuti; ‘Mubone, habaha wenywe ali huuja, muwombeefu era gehaaye hu nasugirya eperepere.’ ”
40021006	Ngʼaŋo abeegi abo batiina, bahola ngʼolu Yesu gabaloma.
40021007	Nga batangirisa nasugirya eyo nʼenyana yaayo bajimuŋirira. Ni boola bayaalaho engoye jaawe hu mugongo, nga Yesu ayiihalaho.
40021008	Ni baali ni batiina, ngʼehiŋindi hyʼabaatu hyala engoye mu ngira Yesu abiteho, nʼabandi nga baaliriramo obusaga wʼebisaala obuliho amahoose obu baabbwaga hu misaala. Bino babihola olwʼohuŋa Yesu eŋono.
40021009	Ngʼaŋo ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu abaali ni batangiriiye, nʼabaali ni bamuŋwaho egongo bahoohera ŋamugulu baati, “Tunoŋole, Omwijuhulu wa Dawudi. Ali nʼekabi oyo owuujira mu buŋangi bwa Hatonda Musengwa! Aŋeewe eŋono Musengwa ali mwigulu.”
40021010	Yesu ni gengira mu Yerusaalemu, ehibuga hyosihyosi hyasamalirira. Era ehyo hyaleetera abaatu ohubuusa baati, “Njʼani oyo?”
40021011	Nga babagobolamo baati, “Nje Yesu, naabbi Omunazaleesi ohuŋwa mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya.”
40021012	Yesu nʼabeegi babe ni boola e Yerusaalemu gengira mu lunya lwa Yekaalu ngʼabbingamo bosibosi abaali ni batundiramo nʼabaali ni bagula. Ngʼagengula emeeza jʼabaswanisa ebbeesa, nʼefoomu jʼabaali ni batunda enjiiwa.
40021013	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, ‘Enyumba yange yinaabenga nyumba omu baatu bananjumirihisyenga. Ne enywe muyifuuhisye pungulu eyi bakondo behwehamo.’ ”
40021014	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, ngʼabaŋofu nʼabaleme batiina aŋa Yesu gaali mu lunya lwa Yekaalu, ngʼabaŋonia.
40021015	Aye abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi ni baabona ebyamaliholiho ebi Yesu gaali nʼahola, nʼabaana ni bahayaanira hu lunya lwa Yekaalu ni baloma baati, “Omwijuhulu wa Dawudi oŋeewe eŋono,” ngʼobusungu bubaŋamba.
40021016	Olwʼehyo nga babuusa Yesu baati, “Oli huŋulira ebi baana abo baloma?” Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Pulira.” Ngʼahena ababuusa ati, “Ne simusomangaho Ehyaŋandiihiwa ehiroma hiiti; “ ‘Wagunjula abaana abaŋere nʼebiwegera ohuhujumirya?’ ”
40021017	Ni gahena ohuloma atyo, ngʼabaleha aŋo aŋwa mu hibuga Yerusaalemu atiina e Bbesaniya eyi gaŋenyuha.
40021018	Ni wahya mugamba, Yesu nʼabeegi babe ni baali ni baŋwa e Bbesaniya ni baagama e Yerusaalemu, gaŋulira enjala nʼemuluma.
40021019	Ni galengera omusaala omutiini hutulo wʼengira, ngʼatiina aje abone hanye aŋanga ohwagaanaho ebibala. Ni gagwolaho sigabona hibala kadi hirala ohutusaho amahoose. Ngʼaŋo aguloma ati, “Siwamanga bibala kadi!” Aŋo ni naaŋo ngʼomusaala ogwo guŋotoha nʼohuŋotoha.
40021020	Abeegi ni baabona ehyo, beŋunja! Nga bebuusa baati, “Omusaala omutiini guŋotohire guutye amangu ago?”
40021021	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Mbalomera ehituufu ti singa muba nʼohufugiirira era ni muŋuma hubuusabuusa, simulihola ehi kolire hu musaala omutiini ogwo hyoŋene aye muliŋanga nʼohuloma olusozi luno muuti, ‘Siguha ŋano oje wedaanye mu buliba’ era ehi mulomire hyabaŋo.
40021022	Era singa muba nʼohufugiirira, munasunenga hiisi ehi munalombenga Hatonda.”
40021023	Ngʼaŋo Yesu goola mu lunya lwa Yekaalu era ni gaali nʼasomesa, ngʼabatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼabaatu abahulu mu gwanga, batiina aŋa gaali nga bamubuusa baati, “Otusa ŋeena obuŋangi obuhuginiha ohuhola ebiitu ebyo ebi ohola? Era njʼani owahuŋa obuŋangi obwo?”
40021024	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Keesi leha mbabuuse ehibuuso hirala. Ni munangobolemo nga ko mbalomera eyi tusa obuŋangi obu neemaho ohuhola ebi kola.
40021025	Mundomere, Yowaane gatusa ŋeena obuŋangi owʼohubatiza? Gabutusa yiri Hatonda, oba yiri baatu?” Ngʼaŋo bahubbagania ebiŋeego ni baloma baati, “Humugobolemo huutye? Singa huloma huuti Hatonda njʼowamutuma anatubuuse ati, ‘Kale lwahiina simwafugiirira bya Yowaane?’ ”
40021026	Aye ni hunalome huuti, “Abaatu njʼabamutuma,” hitiisa olwohuba abaatu bosibosi bafugiirira baati Yowaane gaali naabbi.
40021027	Ehyaŋwamo nga bamugobolamo baati, “Sihumanyire.” Ngʼaŋo Yesu abaloma ati, “Kale keesi si nʼabalomere eyi tusa obuŋangi obuukosa ebi kola.”
40021028	Nga Yesu geyongera aloma abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya ati, “Ŋaahani enywe muŋeega muutye hu lugero luno? Ŋaaliŋo omuutu owaali nʼabasaani babe babiri. Ngʼatiina eyiri omudaayi amuloma ati, ‘Mwana wange, olwa leero tiina otambe mu ndimiro yʼemizabbibbu.’
40021029	Nga niye amugobolamo ati, ‘Ngeene.’ Cooka oluvanyuma ngʼacuusa ebiŋeego atiina atamba.
40021030	Nga semwana atiina eyiri owohubiri ngʼamuloma cʼehyene. Niye ngʼamugobolamo ati, ‘Kale Bbaabba.’ Aye omusaani oyo sigatiina ohuhola ehi gamuloma.”
40021031	Kale njʼani hu bombi owahola ehi saawe gendire? Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Omudaayi.” Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Mbalomera ehituufu ti abaŋoosa nʼabahwedi bali hweyingirira mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda enywe ni mudindibaliiye aŋo.
40021032	Hino kiroma olwohuba Yowaane Omubatiza gaaja ohubalaga engira etuufu eyʼohuŋamba, mwagaana ohufugiirira obuhwenda buwe. Aye abaŋoosa nʼabahwedi nibo bafugiirira. Era wayire mwababona ni bafugiirira, simwebbwaga mwamufugiirira.”
40021033	Nga Yesu geyongera abaloma ati, “Muŋulire olugero olundi. Ŋaaliŋo omuutu owahoma endimiro eyʼemizabbibbu ngʼahena ayisitiriraho, ayabamo eroŋo eryʼohujungirangamo, ngʼatongolamo nʼehitiira hyʼomuhuumi, ngʼahena ayipangisa abaatu nga niye atiina mu gwanga erindi.”
40021034	Ehiseera ehyʼegesa ni hyola, gatuma balala hu baŋeeresa babe eyiri abapangisa, bamuŋe owiisa buwe.
40021035	Cooka abapangisa abo baŋamba abaŋeeresa babe abo. Owundi nga bamuhubba, nga beeta owundi era ngʼowohudatu bamuhubba amabaale.
40021036	Nga nindi omwene ndimiro abatumira abaŋeeresa abandi bangi ohuhiraho abagabatumira oludaayi, era boosi nga bababisya cʼehyene.
40021037	Omwene ndimiro gasembyayo nʼohubatumira omusaani wuwe, mula nʼaloma ati, “Baja huŋa omwana wange eŋono bamupeera owiisa wange.”
40021038	Cooka abapangisa ni babona omusaani, nga behobaana baati, “Ono njʼomusika. Muhole hu mwite hwegoboseho obusika.”
40021039	Ngʼaŋo bamusindigirisa bamutusa ebulafu wʼendimiro yʼemizabbibbu, nga bamwitira eyo.
40021040	Ngʼaŋo Yesu ababuusa ati, “Ŋaahani omwene ndimiro nʼaligobola alihola atye abapangisa abo?”
40021041	Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Alitiina gasihiirisa abamalimbe abo nʼendimiro gayipangisa abaatu abandi abohumuŋanga owiisa buwe mu hiseera ehyʼegesa.”
40021042	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Simusomangaho ehyaŋandiihiwa ehiroma hiiti; ‘Ebaale eri abatongoli batala baati siraŋi, njʼeryafuuha ehulu eryʼomugaso mu gosigosi? Hino Musengwa omwene njʼowahihola, era hyeŋunjisa abahibona.’ ”
40021043	Nga Yesu geyongera aloma ati, “Olwʼehyo mbalomera ti Hatonda alibatusaaho enywe obuŋugi buwe, gabugabira abaatu abaliba nʼebikolwa ebiraŋi.
40021044	Era hiisi agwa hu ebaale eryo, alibbwagijihamo aye oyo oyu lirigwaho, aliminianguha.”
40021045	Abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼAbafalisaayo ni baŋulira olugero olwo, bategeera baati Yesu gaali ali huloma hu nje nibo.
40021046	Olwʼehyo, bagesyaho ohwenda ohumuŋamba, aye batya ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu, olwohuba nibo baali bafugiirira baati Yesu gaali naabbi.
40022001	Ngʼaŋo nindi Yesu abagerera olugero ati,
40022002	“Owahabaha obwomwigulu huŋanga ohubugeragerania hu habaha owategehera omusaani embaga eyʼobugole.
40022003	Esaawa eyʼobugole ni yoola, gatuma abeedu babe ohuhebulisa abageni abalange batiine. Aye abageni nga bagaana ohutiina.
40022004	“Ngʼaŋo nindi atuma abeedu abandi ati, ‘Mulome abageni abalange muuti kenire ohutegeha embaga era netire eŋombe esaame nʼebisonga ebisaata ebinabbiita olwʼembaga yʼobugole wʼomwana wange. Era hiisi hiitu hiŋooye, muuje hu mbaga.’
40022005	“Aye abageni abo abalange, sibafayo era hiisi muutu eyi gaali, gaŋamba engira yiye gaŋwaŋo. Ngʼabandi batiina mu ndimiro jaawe, abandi betiinira mu husubuula.
40022006	Abasigalaŋo, nga baŋamba abeedu aba baali ni batumire bababonyabonya bugali bahena babeeta.
40022007	Ehyo hyaluŋia habaha bugali weene. Era ehyaŋwamo, gaŋindiha eŋe lirye lyasihiirisa abatemu abo era nga bohya nʼehibuga hyabwe.
40022008	Ngʼahena aloma abeedu babe ati, ‘Kenire ohutegeha embaga. Aye abageni abalange bebihiisye bubi era eŋuma nʼosaaniiye ohuuja.
40022009	Olwʼehyo mutiine mu masaŋangira gʼenguudo ejomu hibuga, mulange hiisi muutu oyu munagaane gaaje hu mbaga.’
40022010	Ngʼaŋo abeedu batiina mu nguudo balanga abaatu bosibosi abalaŋi nʼababi ababagaana batiine hu mbaga. Olwʼehyo abaatu baŋwerereheramo batiina hu mbaga era enyumba omu bategehera nga yijula.
40022011	“Ne habaha ni gengira mu nyumba ohuheesa abageni, galengera omuutu owaali nʼatambaaye ebyambalo ebiŋomera ohwambala hu mbaga.
40022012	Ngʼamuloma ati, ‘Wange, wujire ŋano otye nʼotambaaye bulaŋi?’ Omusinde oyo gaŋuma hya huloma.
40022013	Ngʼaŋo habaha aloma abeedu babe ati, ‘Mumuhaade emihono nʼamagulu, muhene mumudanye ebulafu mu hiirema, eyiriba ohweninala nʼohulira amangi olwʼobulumi.’ ”
40022014	Ngʼaŋo Yesu agohoba ati, “Bangi aba Hatonda alanga aye gatobolamo badiidiri.”
40022015	Ngʼaŋo balala hu Bafalisaayo batiina baseega amagesi agohutega Yesu bamuŋambihisye mubi analome.
40022016	Olwʼehyo, batuma balala hu beegi baawe ko nʼabawagizi ba habaha Herode, baje bamuheme bamuŋambire mu ndoma yiye. Batiina bamuloma baati, “Musomesa, humanyire huuti ewe ofiira hu mazima era osomesa mu mazima ebi Hatonda genda abaatu bahole, olwohuba obula hu byahuhusiima ebinambulamo.
40022017	Ŋaahani tulomere, hiraŋi ohuŋa Kayisaali omusolo oba bbe?”
40022018	Aye Yesu mu hutegeera ehi baaliho, gabaloma ati, “Banafuusi enywe, lwahiina mukema?
40022019	Mundeetere ŋano endusu eyi batambisa ohuŋa omusolo.” Nga bamuŋirira edinaari.
40022020	Ngʼababuusa ati, “Ehifaananyi nʼamasiina ebiyiriho bino, byʼani?”
40022021	Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Bya Kayisaali.” Ngʼaŋo Yesu abaloma ati, “Ale ebya Kayisaali mubiŋe Kayisaali, nʼebya Hatonda mubiŋe Hatonda.”
40022022	Ni baŋulira ebibono ebyo, nga beŋunja bugali engeri eyi aŋunuhiremo omubaso gwawe. Olwʼehyo bamuŋwaho, nga baŋamba engira bagamayo.
40022023	Hu ludaalo olwene olwo, balala hu Basadukaayo, bano njʼabatafugiirira baati eriyo ohulamuha, batiina eyiri Yesu bamubuusa baati,
40022024	“Musomesa, Musa omuŋeeresa wa Hatonda gatuŋandiihira egambi ati, ‘Singa omuutu afa galeha namwandu nʼatamusaayemo mwana, mugandaawe ateehwa ohumusika amusaalire abaana.’
40022025	Ŋaahani ŋaaliŋo aboluganda musanvu abamenyanga ni neefe. Ngʼomudaayi ahwa omuhasi, cooka ngʼafa nʼatamusaayemo mwana. Ngʼaleehera mutoowe omuhasi oyo.
40022026	Nga mutoowe asika namwandu oyo era nga yeesi afa nʼatamusaayemo mwana. Nʼowohudatu yeesi atyo. Bosibosi omusanvu nga bambalaho omuhasi oyo. Cooka ndibamusaalamo mwana.
40022027	Ŋaahani bosibosi ni baali ni baŋooye ohufa ngʼomuhasi oyo yeesi afa.
40022028	Olwo ŋaahani, hu ludaalo olu baatu bosibosi baliramuhiraho, omuhasi oyo aliba muha ani olwohuba gaaliho muhasi wʼabaatu abo omusanvu?”
40022029	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Aŋo mugotire, era ehibaleeteeye ohugota, hutamanya ebyaŋandiihiwa, wayire obuŋangi wa Hatonda.
40022030	Hino kiroma olwohuba abaatu ni baliramuha, baliba hyʼabamalayika mwigulu, ni batahwa era ni batafumbirwa.
40022031	Ate ebiŋamba hu hulamuha hwʼabafu simusomangaho ehyaŋandiihiwa, Hatonda nʼabaloma ati,
40022032	‘Ndiise Hatonda wa Yibbulayimu ni Yisaka ni Yakobbo.’ Ehyo hiraga hiiti Hatonda, si Hatonda wʼabafu aye wʼabalamu.”
40022033	Ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ni hyaŋulira ebibono ebyo, bosibosi beŋunja esomesa yiye.
40022034	Ŋaahani Abafalisaayo ni baŋulira baati Yesu atangalahiise Abasadukaayo, nga behumbaania ohweteesamo ehi banahole.
40022035	Era nga mulala hu bo owaali omusomesa wʼamagambi ga Hatonda abuusa Yesu nʼamuhema ati,
40022036	“Musomesa, hiragiro hiina ehihira byosibyosi?”
40022037	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti; ‘Yendanga Hatonda Musengwawo nʼomwoyo gugwo gwosigwosi nʼobulamu buwo bwosibwosi ko nʼamagesi gago gosigosi.’
40022038	Ehyo cʼehiragiro ehidaayi era ehihira byosibyosi.
40022039	Ehiragiro ehironda hu ehyo mu bubbala era ehihifaanana, cʼehino, ‘Yenda omuutu wahyo ngʼolu ewe weyenda wamwene.’
40022040	Era amagambi gosigosi nʼebi abanaabbi baŋandiiha byediiye hu biragiro ebyo ebibiri.”
40022041	Ŋaahani Abafalisaayo ni baali ni bahumbeene aŋo, nga Yesu ababuusa ati,
40022042	“Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu, mwijuhulu wʼani?” Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Mwijuhulu wa Dawudi.”
40022043	Nga Yesu ababuusa ati, “Lwahiina Dawudi omwene, gamulanga Musengwawe?” Omwoyo nʼamutangirira galoma ati,
40022044	“ ‘Hatonda Musengwa gaaloma Musengwa yange ati, Yiihala ni wundireene hu lubega olwʼomuhono gwange omulungi, ohwola olu ndifuula abasigu babo ekookolo eyʼohutaho amagulu gago.’
40022045	“Obanga Dawudi omwene alanga Kurisito ati Musengwawe, nindi aŋanga atye ohuba mwijuhulu wuwe?”
40022046	Ŋaŋuma wayire mulala hu bo owamugobolamo ehibono hyosihyosi. Era ohuŋwa hulwo ŋaŋuma owesinga ohumubuusa ebibuuso nindi.
40023001	Oluvanyuma, Yesu galoma ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ŋalala nʼabeegi babe ati,
40023002	“Buvunanyiziwa wʼabasomesa bʼamagambi nʼAbafalisaayo ohuvuunula amagambi ga Musa.
40023003	Olwʼehyo muli nʼohubagondera era muhole hiisi ehi babaloma. Aye simuŋambanga esambo jaawe olwohuba ebi basomesa sinje ebi bahola.
40023004	Batwiha abaatu amagambi amakambwe ate nga nibo abeene sibasobola nʼohugaŋamba.
40023005	“Hiisi ehi bahola, bahihola olwʼohwenda abaatu bababone. Cʼehigira besidiha mu weeni oba hu ngalo obusaŋu omuba enyiriri jʼebyaŋandiihiwa obubbala ohuhiraho owabandi, era batunga nʼamajolobera amaleeŋi hu magandula gaawe.
40023006	Benda ohwihala mu bifo ebyʼeŋono hu mbaga nomu mahumbaaniro.
40023007	Era benda abaatu ohubaheesa mu akisoni nʼohubalanga baati, ‘Musomesa.’
40023008	“Aye enywe simufugiiriranga hubalanga ‘Basomesa,’ olwohuba Musengwa wenywe ali mulala yeŋene. Enywe mwesimwesi muli baluganda.
40023009	Era simulanganga muutu yesiyesi hu hyalo muuti ‘Bbaabba’ ohulaga muuti mumuŋa eŋono, olwohuba muli ni Senywe mulala era ali mwigulu.
40023010	Era ni nenywe mwesi simufugiiriranga hubalanga ti ‘Basomesa,’ olwohuba Omusomesa wenywe ali mulala, nje Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ahunoŋola abaatu.
40023011	Omuutu ahira ohuba omuhulu mu enywe, ali nʼohuba muŋeeresa wenywe.
40023012	Ehyo kiroma olwohuba hiisi owegulumisa, balimwisa aye oyo oweyisa balimugulumisa.”
40023013	Nga Yesu geyongera aloma ati, “Jibageene enywe abasomesa bʼamagambi nʼAbafalisaayo. Banafuusi nywe! Mulobera abaatu ohwingira mu buŋugi bwomwigulu. Enywe mwabeene simwingira ate ni naabo abagesyaho ohwingira mubahingirira.
40023014	Jibageene enywe, abasomesa bʼamagambi nʼAbafalisaayo. Banafuusi enywe! Munyagulula ebiitu mwahena mu mayumba ga banamwandu, era mujumirya Hatonda nʼebibono ebingi olwʼohweraga. Olwʼehyo, balibaŋa ehiguudyo ehihiraho obubbala.
40023015	“Jibageene enywe abasomesa bʼamagambi nʼAbafalisaayo. Banafuusi enywe! Mutiina hiisi ŋaatu olwʼohwenda muhongerese omuutu mulala ohufuuha omuloobera wenywe. Cooka anafugiirira, afuuha munafuusi ohuhiraho ni nenywe mwabeene era hino hija humuleetera ohubonaabona mu geyeena ohuhiraho enywe emirundi ebiri.
40023016	“Jibageene enywe abatangirisi abaŋofu! Muloma muuti; ‘Hiisi alayira nʼatangiirisa Yekaalu saaba nʼomusango nʼatoherehiise ehi galayira. Aye hiisi alayira nʼatangiirisa ebiitu ebya zaabbu ebiri mu Yekaalu, ali nʼohwoheresa ehi aba nʼalayiiye.’
40023017	Baŋofu era basiru enywe, hiri ŋeena ehihira ohuba ehyʼomugaso? Ebiitu ebi babbota mu zaabbu oba Yekaalu egima byaba byabufu?
40023018	Era nindi musomesa muuti mbo; ‘Omuutu yesiyesi analayira nʼatangiirisa ehituuti, saaba nʼomusango nʼatoherehiise ehi aba nʼalayiiye. Aye omuutu yesiyesi alayira nʼatangiirisa ehirabo ehiri hu hituuti, oyo ali nʼohuhyoheresa.’
40023019	“Baŋofu enywe, ehihiraho ohuba ehyʼomugaso cʼehiri ŋeena? Hirabo oba ehituuti ehifuula ehirabo ehyo ohuba ehyabufu?
40023020	Olwʼehyo omuutu yesiyesi alayira nʼatangiirisa ehituuti, aba alayiiye hu lwʼehituuti nʼolwebirabo ebi baba ni baŋongire eyiri Hatonda.
40023021	Era hiisi alayira nʼatangiirisa Yekaalu, salayira mu siina lya Yekaalu hyoŋene aye aba alayiiye nʼomu siina lya Hatonda ayiihalamo.
40023022	Era omuutu alayira nʼatangirisa egulu, aba salayira mu siina lyʼetebe ya Hatonda eyʼobuŋugi hyoŋene aye nomu siina lyʼoyo ayiihalaho.”
40023023	“Jibageene enywe abasomesa bʼamagambi nʼAbafalisaayo. Banafuusi enywe! Muŋa ehirala ehyʼehumi nʼohubirime ebisemberayo erala obutotono ebi mutambisa ohuŋomya ebyʼohulya aye mwebirira muuti ohusala emisango ni mutehubbira nʼowesigwa nʼohwenda Hatonda njʼebihira ohuba ebyʼomugaso. Muhole byosibyosi ni ŋaŋuma hulehayo ebindi.
40023024	Enywe abatangirisi abaŋofu, muta bugali esira huhugondera ohuhola ebiitu ebitali byʼamaani, nga mulagajalira ebiitu ebibbala mu magambi ga Hatonda aye ebyo mubihola ni mutamanyire!
40023025	“Jibageene enywe abasomesa bʼamagambi nʼAbafalisaayo. Banafuusi enywe! Muli hyʼabaatu aboosa hu mugulu wʼebihopo nʼembya aye mugati ni mwijuuye obucaafu. Mwesi mu myoyo jenywe mwijuuye ebibi.
40023026	Omufalisaayo omuŋofu ewe, sooka woose ehihopo nʼolubya mugati ko bibonehe hu mugulu hwosi ni biri biŋoono.
40023027	“Jibageene enywe abasomesa bʼamagambi nʼAbafalisaayo. Banafuusi enywe! Muli hyʼamagombe agabaŋahaho erangi ehosa nga gaboneha maŋoono hu mugulu aye mugati ni mwijuuye magumba gʼomufu nʼebiitu ebitali bigwalaafu!
40023028	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, eyiri abaatu muboneha hyʼabaatu abahola ebiruŋamu, aye mugati mula mwijuuye obunafuusi nʼobubi.
40023029	“Jibageene enywe abasomesa bʼamagambi nʼAbafalisaayo. Banafuusi enywe! Mudabirisa amagombe gʼabanaabbi era mudabirisa nʼagabaatu abaali abagwalaafu.
40023030	Nga muhena muloma muuti; ‘Singa hwaliŋo mu mirembe jʼabasehulu beefe, hani sihwabeŋimbaho ohwita abanaabbi.’
40023031	Olwʼebyo muli bajulizi, enywe mwabeene muŋa obuhahafu muuti muli bejuhulu baabo abeeta abanaabbi olwohuba muli hya nibo.
40023032	Muheneerese ohuhola ebibi ebi basehulu benywe batandiihirisa.
40023033	“Enywe abaatu abahabi hyʼetemu! Muliŋunuha muutye omusango ogwʼohubadanya mu geyeena?
40023034	Olwʼehyo, nja hubatumira abanaabbi nʼabasinde abagesi nʼabasomesa. Balala hu bo muja hubeeta abandi mubahomerere hu musalabba, abandi mubahubbire mu mahumbaaniro genywe nʼabandi mulibaŋiima mu hiisi hibuga mubaŋambe.
40023035	Ehyo cʼehigira balisalira abaatu bʼomulembe guno omusango olwʼohwita abanaabbi bosibosi ohuŋwera erala hu hutonda hwʼehyalo ohwola hatyane. Ohuŋwa ngʼolu beeta Abbiri omugwalaafu ohwola hu Zakaliya omusaani wa Bbalakiya oyu beetira ŋagati wʼehituuti nʼehifo ehigwalaafu mu Yekaalu.
40023036	Mbalomera ehituufu ti; ebyo byosibyosi birigira baasalira abaatu abʼomulembe guno omusango.”
40023037	Nga Yesu geyongera abaloma ati, “Enywe abaatu bomu Yerusaalemu! Enywe abaatu bomu Yerusaalemu! Mweta abanaabbi era mwahubba aba babatumira amabaale! Efunda nyingi nendire ohubahumbaania hyʼengoho ngʼolu ehumbaania obwana bwayo aye ni mutafugiirira.
40023038	Buhomya weene mbalomera ti Yekaalu yenywe yija hufuuha magunda.
40023039	Era simulimbona nindi ohwola olu ndigobola nga mundoma muuti, ‘Ali nʼekabi oyo owuujira mu buŋangi bwa Hatonda Musengwa.’ ”
40024001	Oluvanyuma lwʼebyo, Yesu gaŋwa hu Yekaalu era ni gaali nʼatiina, abeegi babe begerera aŋa gaali bamulaga ngʼolu bayitongola nʼebyamaŋoono.
40024002	Nga Yesu ababuusa ati, “Mubona ebizimbe ebyo byosibyosi? Mbalomera ehituufu ti, biribulunguha era siŋalibaŋo ebaale wayire erala eririsigala ni liri hu lyahye. Gosigosi baligatepulula gaagwa ŋaasi.”
40024003	Yesu nʼabeegi babe ni baali ni beyebire, ni gehaaye ni nabo hu lusozi olwʼemisaala Emizayiti, nga bamubuusa baati, “Tulomereho, ebyo biribaaŋo ŋaali? Habonero hi ahaliraga haati oli huupi hugobola era nʼekomerero yʼehyalo yoolire?”
40024004	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abaloma ati, “Mwehuume ŋatabaŋo abadulingadulinga.
40024005	Hino kiroma olwohuba bangi baliija ni beranga ohutambisa obuŋangi wange era ni baloma baati, ‘Ndiise Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu’ era balidulinga bangi.
40024006	Era ni muŋuliranga etalo ŋano ni naŋala, simutyanga. Ebyo biri nʼohubaŋo aye ekomerero yiriba yihiiri hwola.
40024007	Amawanga galihubbana nʼowahabaha buliwagala obwahabaha obundi. Enjala erigwa hu hyalo ni musisi alitengesya ebitundu bingi hu hyalo.
40024008	Aye aŋo galiba gahiiri gamutumbu.
40024009	“Balibaŋamba babaŋayo ohubaboneresa bahene babeete. Era abaatu bosibosi balibacaawa olwohuba muli baloobera bange.
40024010	Mu hiseera ehyo bangi baliŋwa mu hufugiirira, baliryaŋanamo ekwe era bacaawagana.
40024011	Abanaabbi abʼobudulingi baliija era balidulinga bangi.
40024012	Era olwohuba ohuhola ebibi hulyeyongera bugali, bangi sibaja hwenda bahyawe.
40024013	Aye oyo aligumira ebigosi ohwola hu komerero, alinoŋoha.
40024014	Ko ŋatabaŋo ehyohweŋambya, Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu buŋugi bwa Hatonda gaja hubuulirwa mu hyalo hyosihyosi eyiri abaatu bosibosi ko ekomerero yoole.”
40024015	Nga Yesu geyongera aloma ati, “Ni mulibona ehiitu ehyʼembiho ehyenyinyasa, ehi naabbi Danieli galomaho ni bahitaaye mu hifo ehyabufu (asoma bino ategeere),
40024016	abaliba mu Buyudaaya, badulumiranga mu bitehere ebyʼobusozi.
40024017	Aliba ŋamugulu hu nyumba yiye nʼaninuhanga, sigengiranga mu nyumba ohutusamo ehiitu hyosihyosi ehyʼohutiina ni nahyo.
40024018	Era aliba hu muga, saagobolanga yingo hwiruhira ebyambalo bibye.
40024019	Mu ndaalo ejo abahasi abaliba ebida nʼabookesa njʼabalisinga ohubonaabona.
40024020	Musabe, bino bitabaŋo mu biseera ebyʼefula nʼobuŋololohi obungi oba hulwa Sabbaato.
40024021	Hino kiroma olwohuba mu ndaalo ejo ŋalibaaŋo ohubonaabona ohwʼamaani, ni huhira hwosihwosi ohwali ni hubaayeŋo ohuŋwera erala hu hutonda hwʼehyalo nʼohwola hatyane. Era siŋalibaŋo hubonaabona ohuli hyʼohwo.
40024022	Era singa Hatonda Musengwa sigahendeesa hu ndaalo ejo ejʼohubonaabona, siŋahaŋonireho muutu kadi mulala. Aye olwʼabo abagatobolamo, endaalo ejo gajipiŋia.
40024023	Mu biseera ebyo, omuutu nʼalibaloma ati, ‘Bona! Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu njʼono ŋano,’ oba ati, ‘Bona! Njʼola ŋala,’ simufugiiriranga.
40024024	Hino kiroma olwohuba bangi balidulinga ni beranga Kurisito, oba ni beranga abanaabbi, era balihola obubonero owʼamaani nʼebyamaliholiho ebyeŋunjisa, ni hiba ni hiŋangiha babbaamye nʼabatobole ba Hatonda.
40024025	Aye enywe mbalabuuye ebyo ni bihiiri hubaaŋo. Kale mubeŋo ni muhimanyire era ni mwetegehire!
40024026	“Olwʼehyo singa omuutu yesiyesi abaloma ati, ‘Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu ali mu lulafu,’ simutiinangayo; oba ati, ‘Ali mu nyumba,’ simufugiiriranga.
40024027	Hino kiroma olwohuba ohuuja hwʼOmwana wʼOmuutu huliba hyʼohumesya hwʼefula ohuhosya egulu ohuŋwa ebuŋwa lyuba ohwola ebugwalyuba.
40024028	Ngʼolu hiri ti aŋaba ehifu paŋa esega jihumbaanira hiisi muutu gajibona, nʼohuuja hwʼOmwana wʼOmuutu huutyo po huliba.”
40024029	Ngʼaŋo Yesu geyongera aloma ati, “Oluvanyuma lwʼebiseera ebyo ebyʼohubonaabona, “ ‘eryuba liribaaho ehiirema, nʼomwesi gulisima. Emunyeenye jiriŋanuha ŋamugulu jakukumuha, nʼebiri ŋamugulu mu bbanga biritetema.’
40024030	“Mu hiseera ehyo ahabonero ahalaga ohuuja hwʼOmwana wʼOmuutu haliboneha hwigulu, abaatu bosibosi hu hyalo balinianguha. Era balibona Omwana wʼOmuutu ni gaajira hu hireri nʼobuŋangi nʼeŋono eryʼamaani.
40024031	Era alituma abamalayika babe nʼamagwala agafuga nʼamaani ohutiina mu njuyi josijosi ejʼehyalo, bahumbaanie abaatu babe abatobole ohuŋwa mu hiisi sonda yʼehyalo.”
40024032	Nga Yesu geyongera aloma ati, “Mubonere hu musaala omutiini muhene mwege. Amasaga gʼomusaala ogwo ni guhena ohukukumusa gusebuhaho amahoose amanyenyeeri, ngʼomanya oti ebiro ebyʼendobooli binaatere ohwola.
40024033	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, ni mubonanga ebindomireho byosibyosi ni biriŋo, mumanyanga muuti ekomerero yinatere ohwola.
40024034	Mbalomera ehituufu ti ebiitu bino byosibyosi binahabeeŋo abaatu abʼomulembe guno ni bataŋwaŋo hufa.
40024035	Ehyalo hino nʼebiri ŋamugulu mu bbanga biriŋwaŋo aye ebibono byange sibirigwa ŋaasi.”
40024036	Nga Yesu geyongera abaloma ati, “Cooka ŋaŋuma amanyire oludaalo olwene oba esaawa eyi biitu ebyo biribeeraŋo, nʼabamalayika mwigulu oba Omwana wa Hatonda sibamanyire ohutusaho Bbaabba yeŋene njʼamanyire.
40024037	Ngʼolu hyali mu mulembe gwa Nuwa, pohiriba hiityo nʼohuuja hwʼOmwana wʼOmuutu.
40024038	Mu hiseera ehyo, abaatu baali balya ni banywa ni bahwa era ni bafumbirwa ohwola hu ludaalo olu Nuwa gengira mu lyato
40024039	era baali sibamanyire ehija hubaŋo ohwola olu mataba gasihiirisa abaatu bosibosi. Nʼohugobola hwʼOmwana wʼOmuutu huliba huutyo.
40024040	Abaatu babiri baliba mu ndimiro, baliŋiraho mulala baleha owundi.
40024041	Abahasi babiri baliba ŋalala ni basa, baliŋiraho mulala nga baleha owundi.
40024042	“Olwʼehyo mubeŋo moni ni mwetegehire, olwohuba simumanyire ludaalo olu Musengwa yenywe aligobola.
40024043	Aye muhimanye muuti singa omwene amago amanya esaawa ejʼowiire eji omwibi anajiremo, saamuleha hubbwaga nyumba yiye ohumunyaga ebiitu bibye.
40024044	Mwesi mwetegehe olwohuba Omwana wʼOmuutu alijiira mu hiseera ehi mutamusuubiriramo.”
40024045	Nga Yesu geyongera aloma ati, “Ŋaahani njʼani omuŋeeresa omwesigwa era owʼamagesi? Njʼoyo oyu musengwawe gataŋo ohutangirira abahye era gabaŋa ebiryo byawe mu hiseera ehituufu.
40024046	Gesiimire omuŋeeresa oyu musengwawe alyagaana nʼahola atyo.
40024047	Mbalomera ehituufu ti musengwawe alimuŋa ohuhulira ebiitu bibye byosibyosi.
40024048	“Aye omuŋeeresa oyo anaba naali mubi, aloma mu mwoyo gugwe ati, ‘Musengwa yange anahalwe ohugobola,’
40024049	ngʼatandiha ohuhubba abahye era gaaba hu hulya nʼohunywera ŋalala nʼabameesi.
40024050	Musengwa wʼomuŋeeresa oyo aligobola hu ludaalo olu atamusuubiriraho nomu saawa eyi atamanyire.
40024051	Era musengwawe oyo alimugudya ebyembaha ebyene ngʼahena amubalira ŋalala nʼabanafuusi. Eyo peyi aliba mu hweninala nʼohulira amangi olwʼobulumi.”
40025001	Ngʼaŋo Yesu geyongera aloma ati, “Mu hiseera ehyo ehi Omwana wʼOmuutu aligoboleramu, obuŋugi bwomwigulu huŋanga ohubugeragerania hu abahaana ehumi abataŋenyuhangaho nʼomusinde, abatiina nʼetaala jaawe ohusangaalira omugole omusinde.
40025002	Hu bahaana abo ehumi, abataanu baali basiru aye abataanu baali bagesi.
40025003	Abasiru batiina nʼetaala jaawe aye sibagega mafuta mu cupa ohwerindisa.
40025004	Abagesi nibo batiina nʼetaala jaawe ko nʼamafuta mu cupa.
40025005	Omugole ni galwaŋo ohwola, bosibosi batandiha ohuŋongera nga baŋenyuha.
40025006	“Ŋagati mu wiire ŋaaliŋo omuutu owalangirira ati, ‘Omugole njʼono goolire, mutule mumusangaalire.’
40025007	Ngʼaŋo abahaana abo ehumi benyoha, bahosiira etambi jʼetaala jaawe.
40025008	Ngʼabasiru baloma abahyawe abagesi baati, ‘Mutuŋeho hu mafuta genywe, olwohuba etaala jeefe jenda ohusima.’
40025009	Ngʼabahaana bala abagesi babagobolamo baati, ‘Siganatuhene hwesihwesi ohutusaho mutiine eyi bagatunda, mwegulireyo.’
40025010	“Aye abasiru ni baali ni bahiiri mu ngira ni batiina ohugula amafuta gʼetaala, ngʼomugole goola. Abahaana bala abaali ni betegehire, nga bengira nʼomugole mu nyumba omubategehera embaga. Ni bahena ohwingira, ngʼabaŋeeresa begalaŋo olwigi.
40025011	“Oluvanyuma, ngʼabahaana bala abasiru boosi boola, ngʼabalanga baati, ‘Muhulu, muhulu, twigulireŋo.’
40025012	Aye omugole omusinde ngʼabagobolamo ati, ‘Mbalomera ehituufu ti simbamanyire.’ ”
40025013	Nga Yesu agohoba ati, “Olwʼehyo, mubeŋo moni olwohuba simumanyire ludaalo oba esaawa eji Omwana wʼOmuutu aligoboleramo.”
40025014	Nga nindi Yesu geyongera aloma ati, “Mu hiseera ehyʼohugobola hwʼOmwana wʼOmuutu, obuŋugi bwomwigulu huŋanga ohubugeragerania hu muutu owaali nʼolugendo, ngʼalanga abeedu babe abalehera ebiitu bibye babirabirire.
40025015	Ngʼalehera mulala hu bo ebbeesa ejibalanga baati etalanta etaanu, owundi ebiri, nʼowundi ndala. Hiisi mwidu bamuŋa etalanta ni bema hu busobozi buwe. Omuutu oyo ni gahena ohubaŋa etalanta ejo, ngʼatiina mu lugendo.
40025016	Aŋo ni naaŋo, oyo owaasuna etalanta ataanu, gaatiina ngʼajisubuulamo, nga jisaala etalanta ejindi etaanu.
40025017	Ni nooyo owʼasuna etalanta ebiri, gaahola atyo ngʼasaasamo etalanta ejindi ebiri.
40025018	Aye oyo owʼasuna etalanta ndala, gatiina gayaba eroŋo ngʼahwehamo etalanta eya musengwawe eyo.
40025019	“Oluvanyuma lwʼehiseera ehireeŋi, musengwa yʼabeedu abo gagobola, ngʼabaloma bamulomere ebiŋamba hu ebbeesa jije eji gabaŋa.
40025020	Ngʼomwidu owasuna etalanta etaanu, atiina aleeta etalanta ejindi etaanu ngʼamuloma ati, ‘Muhulu, waapa etalanta etaanu. Bona, nasaasamo ejindi etaanu nje jino.’
40025021	Nga musengwawe amuloma ati, ‘Webale bugali weene, oli mwidu mulaŋi era mwesigwa. Ngʼolu obaaye mwesigwa hu biitu ebidiidiri, nja huhuŋa obuvunanyiziwa hu biitu bingi. Yingira husaŋalihisye ŋalala.’
40025022	Ngʼola owaasuna etalanta ebiri yeesi gaaja, ngʼaloma ati, ‘Muhulu, waapa etalanta ebiri. Bona, nasaasamo etalanta ejindi ebiri.’
40025023	Nga musengwawe amuloma ati, ‘Webale bugali weene, oli mwidu mulaŋi era mwesigwa. Ngʼolu obaaye mwesigwa hu biitu ebidiidiri, nja huhuŋa obuvunanyiziwa hu biitu ebingi. Yingira husaŋalihisye ŋalala.’
40025024	Aye owohudatu owasuna etalanta ndala ni gaaja gamuloma ati, ‘Muhulu, namanya ti oli mugosi, ogesa aŋa otamwa era oŋira nʼehitali hihyo.
40025025	Olwʼehyo natya, ngʼatiina kweha etalanta yiyo mwiroba era nje yino, enyene nʼenyene.’
40025026	“Nga musengwawe amugobolamo ati, ‘Mwidu ewe omusirusiru era omudoto! Obanga omanyire oti pira ehitali hyange era ngesa nʼaŋa tamwa,
40025027	lwahiina ebbeesa eji nahuŋa siwajiŋola abasubuuzi ni nahagobooye samwene najitusayo ni jikoleeye amagoba?’
40025028	Ngʼaŋo musengwawe aloma balala hu beedu ati, ‘Mumutuseho nʼetalanta eyo, muyiŋe oyo ali nʼehumi.
40025029	Hiisi ali nʼebingi balimumeedaho ebindi aye oyo aŋuma balimutusaaho nʼahadiidiri aho aha ali ni naho.
40025030	Omwidu oyo aŋuma mugaso, mumudanye ebulafu mu hiirema, eyi aliba ni geninala era nʼalira amangi olwʼobulumi.’ ”
40025031	Nga Yesu geyongera aloma ati, “Omwana wʼOmuutu nʼaliija mu ŋono lirye nʼabamalayika bosibosi, aliihala hu tebe yiye eyʼeŋono.
40025032	Hu olwo abaatu bosibosi balihumbaana mu moni jije. Ngʼababulamo ngʼolu omwayi gabula etaama mu mbusi.
40025033	Alyabula etaama jaaba hu muhono omulungi, embusi hu mugooda.
40025034	“Habaha aliroma abo abali hu muhono gugwe omulungi ati, ‘Enywe aba Bbaabba gaŋa ekabi, muuje mube mu bulamu obu babategeehera ohuŋwa olu batonda ehyalo.
40025035	Ehyo kiroma olwohuba enjala ni yaali ni yinduma, mwapa ehyʼohulya era enduŋo ni yaali ni yinduma, mwapa ehyʼohunywa. Era ni naali mugeni, mwasangaalira.
40025036	Ni naali ni puma hyambalo, mwanyambasa. Ni naali mulwaye, mwandabirira. Era ni naali mu komera, mwaja mwambonaho.’
40025037	“Ne abaatu abo abagwalaafu balimugobolamo baati, ‘Musengwa, hwahubona ŋaali enjala nʼehuluma hwahuŋa ehyʼohulya oba enduŋo nʼehuluma hwahuŋa ehyʼohunywa?
40025038	Era hwahubona ŋaali nʼoli mugeni, hwahusangaalira oba nʼoŋuma hyambalo hwahwambasa?
40025039	Era hwahubona ŋaali nʼoli mulwaye, oba nʼoli mu komera, hwaja hwahubona?’
40025040	“Habaha alibagobolamo ati, ‘Mbalomera ehituufu ti; hiisi ehiitu ehi mwaholera mulala hu balebe bange bano ababatala, mwahiholera ndiise.’
40025041	“Aye aliroma abo abali hu muhono gugwe omugooda ati, ‘Mupwe mu moni, enywe aba Hatonda gaŋwaba! Mutiine mu muliro ogutasima emirembe nʼemirembe ogubategehera Sitaani nʼabamalayika babe.
40025042	Naali njala ne simwapa hyʼohulya era enduŋo yanduma, ne simwapa hyʼohunywa.
40025043	Ni naali mugeni, simwasangaalira mu mago genywe, ni naali ni puma hyahwambala simwanyambasa, ni naali mulwaye simwafaaho era ni naali mu komera simwandabirira.’
40025044	“Boosi balimugobolamo baati, ‘Musengwa, hwahubona ŋaali nʼoli enjala oba enduŋo nʼehuluma, oba nʼoli mugeni oba nʼoŋuma hyambalo oba nʼoli mulwaye oba nʼoli mu komera, aye sihuhuyeeda?’
40025045	Alibagobolamo ati, ‘Mbalomera ehituufu ti; hiisi olu mwagaananga ohuyeeda mulala hu abo ababatala, mwagaananga huyeeda ndiise.’
40025046	“Balibaŋindiha eyi baligadira emirembe nʼemirembe. Aye abagwalaafu nibo balitiina mu bulamu obutaŋwaŋo.”
40026001	Yesu ni gahena ohuloma ebibono ebyo byosibyosi, ngʼaloma abeegi babe ati,
40026002	“Ngʼolu mumanyire esigayeeyo endaalo ebiri, Embaga eyʼohuhebuliriraho Ohubihisya yoole. Era baja huŋaayo Omwana wʼOmuutu, bamuhomerere.”
40026003	Ngʼaŋo abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼabaatu abahulu mu gwanga, bahumbaanira ewa Kayaafa omuhulu wʼabasengi ba Hatonda,
40026004	era nga basala amagesi agʼohuŋamba Yesu mu ngiso, bamwite.
40026005	Nga baloma baati, “Aye ehyo hutahihola mu biseera ebyʼEmbaga, olwohuba abaatu bahanda batabuha.”
40026006	Mu hiseera ehyo Yesu ni gaali mu habuga hʼe Bbesaniya mu nyumba ya Simooni owaali omugenge,
40026007	nga ŋabaaŋo omuhasi owatiinayo nʼecupa eyʼamafuta amalaŋi agaŋunya ahaloosa, era agʼebbeeyi, ngʼagajuha hu mutwe gwa Yesu.
40026008	Abeegi ni baabona ehyo, basunguŋala, nga bebuusa baati, “Lwahiina gonoonire amafuta ago atyo?
40026009	Bahagatundire mwaŋwamo ebbeesa enyene enyingi, nga bajigabira abagadi.”
40026010	Yesu ni gategeera ehi baali ni baŋeega, ngʼabaloma ati, “Lwahiina mwoloobya omuhasi ono? Ehi gakoleeye hiraŋi.
40026011	Abagadi banabenga ni nenywe habuhyabuhya, aye ese sinja huba ni nenywe ehiseera hyosihyosi.
40026012	Nʼajuhire amafuta agʼahaloosa hu mubiri gwange, ahiholire nʼagutegeha olwʼohugusiiha.
40026013	Mbalomera ehituufu ti hiisi ŋaatu mu hyalo hyosihyosi eyi banabuulirenga Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi, ni nahino ehi omuhasi ono aholire banahiromengaho nga bamuhebulira.”
40026014	Ngʼaŋo mulala hu beegi babe ehumi nʼababiri oyu balanganga baati Yuda Yisikaryoti, atiina eyiri abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda,
40026015	ababuusa ati, “Munaape hiina singa mbayeeda ohumuŋamba?” Olwʼehyo bala bamubalira endusu jʼefeeza amahumi adatu ngʼabamuŋa.
40026016	Ohuŋwa hulwo nga Yuda atandiha ohwendula ahamanga ahohuŋayo Yesu eyi bali.
40026017	Hu ludaalo oludaayi mu ndaalo jʼEmbaga Eyi Baliiraho Emigaati Ejibatataayemo Ehisimbulusa, abeegi baatiina aŋa Yesu gaali bamubuusa baati, “Wenda huje hutegehere ŋeena eyi onaliire Embaga eyʼOhuhebuliriraho Ohubihisya?”
40026018	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Mutiine mu hibuga munagaane omuutu wange oyo oyu mumanyire mumulome muuti Omusomesa alomire ati, ‘Ehiseera hyange ehiragaane hinaatere ohwola. Kale naliire yiwuwo Embaga eyʼOhuhebuliriraho Ohubihisya ŋalala nʼabeegi bange.’ ”
40026019	Ngʼaŋo abeegi bahola ngʼolu Yesu gabaloma, era nga bategeha Embaga eyʼOhuhebuliriraho Ohubihisya.
40026020	Owiire ni wiira, nga Yesu nʼabeegi babe ehumi nʼababiri beehala ohulya.
40026021	Era ni baali ni balya, nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Mbalomera ehituufu ti, mulala hu enywe anandyemo oluhwe.”
40026022	Ehyo hyanakuŋasa bugali abeegi babe, era nga hiisi mulala abuusa Yesu ati, “Musengwa, ndiise?”
40026023	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Anandyemo oluhwe njʼoyo ali hutonga ni neese mu lubya.
40026024	Omwana wʼOmuutu baja humwita ngʼolu ebyaŋandiihiwa bimulomaho. Aye jimwageene oyo amulyamo oluhwe! Hyahamubereeye hiraŋi singa sibamusaala!”
40026025	Ngʼaŋo Yuda owaali nʼanalye mu Yesu oluhwe amuloma ati, “Musomesa, ndiise?” Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Ndiiwe.”
40026026	Ni baali ni bahiirya nga Yesu abugula omugaati geyaasa Hatonda, ngʼagubbongolamo aguŋa abeegi babe abaloma ati, “Munaaŋe mulye, guno njʼomubiri gwange.”
40026027	Ngʼaŋo abugula ehihopo hyʼenvinyo ni gahena ohweyaasa Hatonda, ngʼabaŋa nʼaloma ati, “Mwesimwesi muhinyweho,
40026028	gano njʼamafugi gange aganahoŋohe hu lwʼabangi olwʼohubasoniŋa ebibi ni gahahasa endagaano epyaha eyi Hatonda ali huhola nʼabaatu babe.
40026029	Mbalomera ti sinja hunywa hu nvinyo yʼemizabbibbu ohwola olu ndinywa epyaha ni nenywe, mu buŋugi bwa Bbaabba.”
40026030	Ni bahena ohwemba olwembo olwʼohujumirya Hatonda, nga batula batiina hu lusozi olwʼemisaala Emizayiti.
40026031	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma abeegi babe ati, “Mwesimwesi munadulume mwandehaŋo mu hiire ehyene hino olwʼebinaabe ni binjolireho, olwohuba hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti; “ ‘Naheete omwayi, ngʼetaama jisalaaniha.’
40026032	“Aye oluvanyuma lwʼohulamuha, ndibeheerera ohutiina e Galilaaya.”
40026033	Ngʼaŋo Peetero amuloma ati, “Wayire abandi bosibosi banadulume bahulehaŋo, ese sinahuleheŋo.”
40026034	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Kulomera ehituufu ti; mu hiire ehyene hino, engoho yinaabe yitaholyoha, ni wahanegaanira emirundi edatu.”
40026035	Aye Peetero nga muloma ati, “Wayire hunaabe hufiira ŋalala ni neewe, sinahwegaane.” Era nʼabahye bosibosi nga baloma cʼehyene.
40026036	Ngʼaŋo Yesu nʼabeegi babe boola mu hifo ehi balanga baati Gasesimane. Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Muhole ni mwihala ŋano, ese nesendeho ŋala nombe Hatonda.”
40026037	Ngʼatiina ni Peetero nʼabasaani ba Zebbedaayo bombi era ngʼatandiha ohutya nʼohweŋendeherera bugali.
40026038	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Omwoyo gwange gwijuuye enaku eyoola nʼohunjita! Musigale ŋano ni muliŋo moni, mutaŋenyuha.”
40026039	Ni geeyongerayo ŋatono mu moni ngʼahubba amafuha gegayirira Hatonda ati, “Bbaabba, ni hiba ni hiŋangiha, ponie esaawa yino eyʼohubonaabona! Aye ewe ehi wenda cʼehiba ni hiholebwa, sosi ehi ese nenda.”
40026040	Ngʼaŋo agobola eyiri abeegi babe, ngʼabagaana ni baŋenyuha ngʼaloma Peetero ati, “Ndimusobola hubaŋo moni ni neese wayire ohuhena esaawa ndala?
40026041	Mutaŋenyuha, mubeŋo moni ni musaba ko mutahemewa, mu butuufu emyoyo jenywe miheneerefu aye emibiri minafu.”
40026042	Ngʼatiina nindi efunda eyohubiri asaba ati, “Bbaabba, ni hiba ni hinjetagisa ohubita mu hubonaabona huno, kale ehi wenda hiholewe.”
40026043	Ni gagobola nga nindi abagaana ni baŋenyuha olwohuba emoni jaawe jaali jijuuye ero.
40026044	Olwʼehyo gabaleha, nindi ngʼatiina emulundi ogwohudatu asaba nʼaloma cʼehyene.
40026045	Ngʼaŋo gaagama eyiri abeegi abaloma ati, “Muhiŋenyuha era muhiŋuumula? Esaawa eyʼohuŋayo Omwana wʼOmuutu mu buŋangi wʼababbengi yoolire.
40026046	Mwinyohe hutiine. Bona! Obundyamo oluhwe njʼoyo gaaja.”
40026047	Yesu ni gaali nahiiroma, nga Yuda mulala hu beegi babe ehumi nʼababiri, goola nʼehiŋindi hyʼabaatu abaali ni baŋambire epiima nʼesimbo. Abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼabaatu abahulu mu gwanga baali babatumire ohumuŋamba.
40026048	Oyo owalya mu Yesu oluhwe gaali ahenire ohubaloma ati, “Oyu naagwe mu hifuba anaabe nje niye, mumuŋambe.”
40026049	Yuda ni goola, ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo atiina aŋali Yesu, amuheesa ati, “Musomesa, oli otye!” Ngʼahena amugwa mu hifuba.
40026050	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Wange, hola ehihuleetereeye.” Nga bafuhumira Yesu, nga bamujasa.
40026051	Mulala hu abo abaali ni Yesu gasoŋolayo epiima, ngʼatema omwidu wʼomuhulu wʼabasengi ba Hatonda amuhapulaho ohutwi.
40026052	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Yagamyayo epiima yiyo aŋa yibaaye, olwohuba abo bosibosi abaŋamba epiima, balifa piima.
40026053	Oŋeega oti sipanga husunga Bbaabba gapeeresa ebibinja byʼamaje gʼabamalayika ebituuma ehumi nabibiri basoolera?
40026054	Ne singa kihola, ebyaŋandiihiwa ebiroma biiti hino njʼehiri nʼohunjolaho, binolerere biitye?”
40026055	Mu hiseera ehyo, nga Yesu ababuusa ati, “Mujire ohupamba ni muli nʼepiima nʼemibbera, hyʼabajiriiye omuyekera? Hiisi ludaalo mbaayenga nihala mu lunya lwa Yekaalu ni somesa, ni mutapamba.
40026056	Aye hino muhiholire, ohwoheresa ebi banaabbi baŋandiiha.” Ngʼaŋo abeegi babe bosibosi baduluma, bamulehaŋo.
40026057	Abo abaŋamba Yesu, bamuŋira ewa Kayaafa omuhulu wʼabasengi ba Hatonda, eyi basomesa bʼamagambi nʼabaatu abahulu mu gwanga bahumbaanira.
40026058	Aye Peetero galonda hu Yesu ni gesambireho ahanaŋiro era gatiina ohwolera erala mu lunya lwʼomuhulu wʼabasengi. Ni goola, nga gengira mu lunya geehala nʼabahuumi ba Yekaalu ohubona ebinabeŋo.
40026059	Abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼAboluhiiho lwʼAbayudaaya Olubbala baali muhwendula obujulizi obwʼobudulingi obu baneemeho ohwita Yesu.
40026060	Aye babuhaya wayire ŋaaliŋo bangi abaaja baŋa obujulizi obwobudulingi. Oluvanyuma abaatu babiri beŋayo batiina ohuŋa obujulizi,
40026061	nga baloma baati, “Ono gaaloma mbo asobola ohubbwagaŋo Yekaalu ya Hatonda gahena gayitongola mu ndaalo edatu.”
40026062	Ngʼaŋo omuhulu wʼabasengi ba Hatonda gemeerera, abuusa Yesu ati, “Obula ehi ogobolamo? Hiina ehi oloma hu bino ebi bahulumiirisa?”
40026063	Aye Yesu gaŋoleera huŋoleera. Ngʼomuhulu wʼabasengi amuloma ati, “Mu mazima ga Hatonda omulamu: tulomere hanye ndiiwe Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu, Omwana wa Hatonda.”
40026064	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Ngʼolu oloma olwo. Era mbaloma ti mulibona Omwana wʼOmuutu ni gehaaye hu lubega olwʼomuhono omulungi ogwa Hatonda Omwene buŋangi, era mulimubona ni gaajira hu bireri ebyomwigulu.”
40026065	Ngʼaŋo omuhulu wʼabasengi ahanula eganduula yiye aloma ati, “Afodogooye! Hwendera hi obujulizi obundi. Bahyange, muŋuliiye nʼamatwi genywe mwabeene ebibono ebifodogola.
40026066	Muŋeega muutye?” Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Aŋomera hufa.”
40026067	Ngʼaŋo bamufuujaho agate mu moni era nga bamuhubba epuusi, nʼabandi bamuhubba amaŋi
40026068	ni bamuloma baati, “Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu, tulomere njʼani ahuhubbire?”
40026069	Ŋaahani Peetero ni gaali ni gehaaye ebulafu mu lunya, nga ŋabaaŋo omuhaana owaŋeeresanga ewomuhulu wʼabasengi ba Hatonda owatiina aŋa gaali ngʼamuloma ati, “Ewe weesi oli muloobera wa Yesu Omugalilaaya.”
40026070	Aye Peetero gegaana mu moni jaawe bosibosi ati, “Simanyire ehi oloma.”
40026071	Ngʼaŋo Peetero genyohaŋo atiina ŋa mulyango, aŋa omuhaana omwidu owundi gamubonera, ngʼaloma abaatu abaali aŋo ati, “Omusinde ono yeesi abaaye ni Yesu Omunazaleesi.”
40026072	Nga Peetero nindi gegaana nʼalayira ati, “Mu mazima, omusinde oyo simumanyire.”
40026073	Ni ŋabitaŋo ahaseera hatotono, abaali ni bemereeye aŋo nga besenda aŋa Peetero gaali bamuloma baati, “Hituufu oli mulala hu baloobera ba Yesu, olwohuba engeri eyi olomamo yihuloopa yiiti oli Mugalilaaya.”
40026074	Ngʼaŋo Peetero atandiha ohulayira ati, “Mu mazima, ese simanyire omusinde oyo.” Ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo engoho yiholyoha.
40026075	Nga Peetero ahebulira ebi Yesu gaali nʼamulomire ati, “Engoho yinaabe yitaholyoha, ni wuneganiiye emirundi edatu.” Ngʼaŋo Peetero atula ebulafu, atemuha alira bugali weene.
40027001	Ni wahya mu mugamba, abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda bosibosi nʼabaatu abahulu mu gwanga bateesa nga basalaŋo ohwita Yesu.
40027002	Ngʼaŋo bamusidiha emihono bamuŋira bamuŋaayo eyiri Pilaato owaali gavana Omurooma mu hiseera ehyo.
40027003	Yuda owalya mu Yesu oluhwe ni gabona ni basaliiye Yesu ogwʼohufa, gehebulisa ngʼagobohesa abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼabaatu abahulu mu gwanga endusu jʼefeeza amahumi adatu eji baali ni bamuŋaaye,
40027004	ngʼabaloma ati, “Mbengire ohulya oluhwe mu muutu aŋuma musango!” Aye nibo nga bamugobolamo baati, “Ebyo bibyo, sihituŋambaho.”
40027005	Nga Yuda adanya ebbeesa ejo mu Yekaalu ngʼatula atiina geetuga.
40027006	Ngʼaŋo abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda bangala ebbeesa ejo, baloma baati, “Sihiraŋi ohuta ebbeesa jino ŋalala nʼejebirabo, olwohuba jaŋwa mu hwita muutu.”
40027007	Olwʼehyo, ni bahena ohusalaŋo ehi banahole ngʼabaŋamba ebbeesa ejo bajigulamo ehisugu hyʼomuwumbi basiihengamo abalugendwa.
40027008	“Cʼehigira ehisugu ehyo bahiranga baati ‘Ehisugu hyʼamafugi’ nʼohwola hatyane.”
40027009	Ngʼaŋo hyolerera ehi naabbi Yeremiya galoma ati, “Baŋira endusu ejʼefeeza amahumi adatu, nga njʼebbeeyi eyi batangirisi ba Yisirayiri bapatana,
40027010	nga bajigulamo ehisugu hyʼomuwumbi, ngʼolu Hatonda Musengwa gandagira.”
40027011	Ngʼaŋo baaŋira Yesu bamwemeha mu moni ja Pilaato. Ngʼamubuusa ati, “Ndiiwe habaha wʼAbayudaaya?” Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Ngʼolu oloma olwo.”
40027012	Abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼabaatu abahulu mu gwanga ni bamuŋaŋabira, ŋaaŋuma ehigagobolamo.
40027013	Ngʼaŋo Pilaato amubuusa ati, “Sooŋulira ebi bahulumiirisa?”
40027014	Aye Yesu gaŋolera huŋolera. Ehyo hyeŋunjisa gavana oyo bugali.
40027015	Mu biseera byʼEmbaga eyʼOhuhebuliriraho Ohubihisya, gavana galehulanga omusibe oyu bamusunganga ohulehula.
40027016	Hu mulundi ogwo, mu komera mwalimo omusibe owaali nʼamanyiheene obugali olwʼebikolwa ebibi, oyu balanganga baati Bbarabba.
40027017	Ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ni hyahumbaana ewa Pilaato, ngʼababuusa ati, “Mwenda mbalehulire njʼani: Bbarabba oba Yesu oyu balanga Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu?”
40027018	Galoma atyo olwohuba gaali ategeeye ati abatangirisi bʼabasengi baali baŋayeeyo Yesu eyi ali olwʼekirihindi eyi baali ni nayo.
40027019	Pilaato ni gaali ni gehaaye hu etebe ohugehalanga nʼasala emisango, omuhasi wuwe gamutumira omuutu amulome ati, “Wegenderese nʼosala esonga ejiŋamba hu muutu oyo olwohuba muluŋamu era owiire obuhyeye olwa leero, mbweneweene bugali nʼehirooto ehimuŋambaho.”
40027020	Ne abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼabaatu abahulu mu gwanga, bahongeresa ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu basunge balehule nje Bbarabba aye Yesu bamwite.
40027021	Pilaato gababuusa ati, “Hu bano bombi, mwenda mbalehulire njʼani?” Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Bbarabba.”
40027022	Nga Pilaato ababuusa ati, “Kole tye Yesu oyu balanga Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu?” Nga bosibosi bamugobolamo baati, “Bamuhomerere hu musalabba!”
40027023	Nga Pilaato ababuusa ati, “Lwahiina? Aholire hibi hi?” Aye nibo nga beeyongera hweyongera ohuhayaana baati, “Mumuhomerere hu musalabba!”
40027024	Pilaato ni gabona ebiitu ni bimusobeeye era abaatu ni benda hutabuha, ngʼaŋamba amaaji asaaba mu ngalo mu moni jaawe bosibosi ngʼaloma ati, “Simbona musango hu muutu ono. Era amafugi gage gabe hu ndinywe mwabeene.”
40027025	Ngʼabaatu bosibosi bamugobolamo baati, “Leha amafugi gage gabe hu efe nʼabaana beefe.”
40027026	Pilaato gabalehulira Bbarabba ngʼolu bamusunga. Aye ngʼalagira bafaduule Yesu efaalu, nga ko ahena amuŋayo eyiri abasirikale baje bamuhomerere hu musalabba.
40027027	Ngʼaŋo abasirikale baŋira Yesu mu lubiri lwa Pilaato, olu balanganga baati Purayitoriyo, nga bahoba abahyawe bosibosi abomu hibinja ehyo bahumbaana bamweswanigirisa.
40027028	Nga bamufihulamo engoye jije, bahena bamwambasa olugoye olulando.
40027029	Nga bagata amaŋwa mu ngeri yʼomuge bamufiiha hu mutwe. Nga bamuŋambya olugada mu muhono gugwe omulungi, nga bahubba amafuha mu moni jije, bamujeeja ni baloma baati, “Wangaala, Habaha wʼAbayudaaya!”
40027030	Nga bahena bamufuujaho agate, baŋamba olugada bamuhubba hu mutwe efunda nʼefunda.
40027031	Ni baahena ohumujeeja nga bamufihulamo olugoye lula olulando, nga bamwambasa engoye jije bamuŋira ohumuhomerera hu musalabba.
40027032	Ni baali ni batula mu hibuga, baagaanana nʼomusinde owʼe Kireene oyu balanganga baati Simooni, nga bamuŋagia ohugega omusalabba gwa Yesu.
40027033	Ni boola mu hifo ehi balanga baati Gologosa, amahulu gahyo ti “Ehifo Ehyahaŋanga,”
40027034	nga baŋa Yesu envinyo ni bayitabuuyemo enduse. Cooka ni gahombaho, gageene ohunywa.
40027035	Ni baahena ohumuhomerera hu musalabba, bagabana ebyambalo bibye ni babihubbiraho ahalulu.
40027036	Abasirikale beehala aŋo ni bamuhuumire babone ehinamwoleho.
40027037	Ŋamugulu wʼomutwe gugwe nga bataŋo omusango ogu baali ni bamuhaabya baguŋandiiha hu hapande baati, “ONO NJE YESU, HABAHA WʼABAYUDAAYA.”
40027038	Era bahomerera nʼabakondo babiri, hiisi muutu hu musalabba gugwe. Mulala hu muhono gugwe omulungi, owundi hu mugooda.
40027039	Abaali ni babitaŋo nga boosi basugusa emitwe jaawe nʼobusambuha ni baduha Yesu,
40027040	baati, “Ewe asobola ohubbwagaŋo Yekaalu, nindi wayitongola mu ndaalo edatu, wenoŋole. Era hanye oli Mwana wa Hatonda, niinuha hu musalabba!”
40027041	Mu ngeri njʼenyene abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi nʼabaatu abahulu mu gwanga boosi bamujerega ni baloma baati,
40027042	“Ganoŋolanga bandi, saaŋanga hwenoŋola niye omwene. Nje Habaha wa Yisirayiri! Ŋaahani aŋwe hu musalabba, konyo humufugiirire.
40027043	Gesiga Hatonda. Leha Hatonda nʼaba ni genda, amununule. Ti galomanga mbo niye Mwana wa Hatonda.”
40027044	Abakondo ababahomerera hu misalabba huupi ni naye nga boosi bamuduha mu ngeri njʼenyene.
40027045	Ohuŋwa esaawa mukaaga ejomu muusi, ohwola hu saawa mwenda ejʼegulo, ngʼehiirema hiŋamba ehyalo hyosihyosi.
40027046	Ngʼaŋo hu saawa nga mwenda, Yesu alanga nʼejanjaasi eryʼamaani ati, “Eloyi, Eloyi, lama sabbakusaani?” Amahulu gaahyo ti, “Hatonda wange, Hatonda wange, lwahiina wundehireŋo?”
40027047	Balala hu abo abaali ni bemereeye aŋo ni baŋulira, nga baloma baati, “Ali hulanga Eriya!”
40027048	Ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo mulala hu bo aduluma, aŋamba ehisuumwa ahitimya mu nvinyo eyisalire, ahita hu lugada aŋa Yesu ohunywa.
40027049	Aye abandi nga baloma baati, “Leha hubone hanye Eriya anaaje gamunoŋola!”
40027050	Yesu ni galanga nindi nʼejanjaasi eryʼamaani, ngʼahena afa.
40027051	Mu hiseera ehyo, olutimbe olwomu Yekaalu nga ludweduhamo ŋabiri, ohuŋwa ŋamugulu ohwola ŋaasi. Ehyalo hyatengeeta ngʼamabaale gaadiha.
40027052	Era nga ŋabaŋo amagombe agaadiha, ngʼabagwalaafu bangi abaali ni bafuuye, balamuha baŋwamo.
40027053	Baaŋwa mu magombe era Yesu ni galamuha batiina e Yerusaalemu, ehibuga ehyabufu era abaatu bangi bababona.
40027054	Omuhulu wʼehibinja hyʼabasirikale ecikumi ni naabo abaali ni bahuuma Yesu ni babona byosibyosi ebyaliŋo baŋulira nʼohutetema hwa musisi, batya bugali era nga baloma baati, “Mu butuufu ono abaaye Mwana wa Hatonda!”
40027055	Ŋaaliŋo nʼabahasi bangi abaali ni besambireho ahamanga ni bebonera. Abahasi abo baali balondire hu Yesu ohuŋwa e Galilaaya era njʼabamuŋeeresanga.
40027056	Mu abo mwalimo Malyamu Magadaleeni ni Malyamu nyina ya Yakobbo ni Yose era ni nyina yʼabasaani ba Zebbedaayo.
40027057	Egulo ni lyola, omusinde omuŋinda owʼe Alimataaya, oyu balanga baati Yosefu, ngʼatiina aŋa bahomerera Yesu. Era yeesi gaali afuuhire mwegi wuwe.
40027058	Kale ngʼatiina eyiri Pilaato amusunga omulambo gwa Yesu aje agusiihe. Nga Pilaato alagira bagumuŋe.
40027059	Nga Yosefu aŋira omulambo ogwo, aguboŋa mu lugoye olunyaha olwa laasi.
40027060	Ngʼaguta mu higombe hihye ehi gaali nʼabajire mu baale mu ngeri yʼepungulu era ehi baali ni batatambisangaho. Ngʼaŋiringisya ogubaale, gegaliraŋo omulyango ogwingira mu higombe, ngʼaŋwaŋo.
40027061	Malyamu Magadaleeni ni Malyamu owundi baali behaaye huupi nʼehigombe ni bahirengereeye.
40027062	Ni wahya, lwali lwa Sabbaato oludaalo lwʼAbayudaaya olwʼohuŋumuliraho, ngʼabatangirisi bʼabasengi nʼAbafalisaayo batiina eyiri Pilaato.
40027063	Nga bamuloma baati, “Muhulu, huhebulira omudulingi oyo ni gaali nʼahiiri mulamu galoma mbo nʼalifa ŋalibitaŋo endaalo edatu ngʼalamuha.
40027064	Olwʼehyo, huhusunga olagire bahuumire erala amagombe butiribiri ohwola endaalo edatu ni jibitireŋo olwohuba abeegi babe baŋanga ohuuja bamwibamo nga balomera abaatu baati alamuhire. Obudulingi obwo, buja huhiraho owasooka.”
40027065	Nga Pilaato abaloma ati, “Mbaŋaaye abahuumi. Mutiine bahuumire erala amagombe ngʼolu hisoboha.”
40027066	Ngʼaŋo batiina bata ahabonero hu gubaale nga balehaŋo abahuumi ohuhuuma.
40028001	Oludaalo olwa Sabbaato ni lubitire, nga mu mawiiwi hu ludaalo oludaayi mu wiiki, Malyamu Magadaleeni ni Malyamu owundi batiina hu higombe omu baali ni bataaye omulambo gwa Yesu.
40028002	Ni boola eyo, ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo ŋabaaŋo musisi owʼamaani olwohuba malayika wa Hatonda Musengwa gaŋwa mwigulu gatiina hu higombe ehyo ngʼaŋiringisya ebaale eryali ŋamulyango alitusaaŋo, ngʼahena aliihalaho.
40028003	Malayika oyo gaali amesya hyʼehimyaso hyʼefula nʼebyambalo bibye ni bipepya hyʼamabaale gʼefula.
40028004	Abahuumi ni bamubona, batya bugali, bateetema era nga bagwa bafaho olweso.
40028005	Ngʼaŋo malayika aloma abahasi abo ati, “Mutatya, manyire ti mwendula Yesu, oyu bahomerera hu musalabba.
40028006	Ŋano aŋumaŋo, alamuhire ngʼolu galoma. Muuje mubone aŋa baali ni bamutaaye,
40028007	muhahase konyo mutiine mangu, mulomere abeegi babe muuti; ‘Alamuhire era atangiiyemo atiina e Galilaaya. Eyo peyi munahamubonere.’ Obwo njʼobuhwenda obu mbalomera.”
40028008	Ngʼabahasi abo batula mangu baŋwa hu higombe ni batiiye aye ni bejuuye esangaalo, nga baduluma batiina balomere abeegi babe.
40028009	Ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo Yesu ababonehera ngʼabaloma ati, “Emiyaaya jibe ni nenywe!” Nga bamwigereraho bahubba amafuha, bafuhumira amagulu gage nga bamujumirya.
40028010	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Mutatya, mutiine mulomere abeegi bange batiine e Galilaaya. Eyo peyi banahambonere.”
40028011	Abahasi abo ni baali ni batiina, balala hu basirikale abaali ni bahuuma ehigombe batiina mu hibuga Yerusaalemu nga baloohesa abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda byosibyosi ebyaliŋo.
40028012	Abatangirisi bʼabasengi abo nʼabaatu abahulu mu gwanga bahumbaana, nga bateesa basalaŋo baŋa abasirikale ebbeesa embitiirifu ni babagula.
40028013	Nga babaloma baati, “Mulome muuti; ‘Abeegi babe baajire owiire ni huŋenyuha nga beeba omulambo gugwe.’
40028014	Ni hinoole hu muŋugi Pilaato, efe hunamunyonyole nga hubaŋonia omusango.”
40028015	Ngʼabahuumi abo banaaŋa ebbeesa ejo, bahola ngʼolu babaloma. Era ebibono ebyo byahwana mu Bayudaaya nʼohwola hatyane.
40028016	Ngʼaŋo abeegi ehumi namulala batiina e Galilaaya, hu lusozi eyi Yesu gabaloma ohutiina.
40028017	Ni bamubona, nga bamujumirya aye abandi hu bo bamubuusabuusa.
40028018	Nga Yesu atiina aŋa baali abaloma ati, “Bapaaye obuŋangi bwosibwosi mwigulu nʼohu hyalo.
40028019	Olwʼehyo, mutiine mufuule abaatu bosibosi ohuba beegi bange, ni mubabatiza mu siina lya Bbaabba nʼOmwana nʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu
40028020	ni mubasomesanga ohuŋamba byosibyosi ebi nabalagira. Mu butuufu oweene, niija hubanga ni nenywe ohwola hu komerero yʼehyalo.”
41001001	Gano njʼAmaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu Yesu Kurisito Omwana wa Hatonda.
41001002	Gatandiha nʼebibono bya Hatonda ebi naabbi Yisaaya gaŋandiiha ati, “Nja hutuma omuhwenda wange ahweherereyo ohuuja ahutereehese engira.
41001003	Ŋaliŋo ejanjaasi eryʼamaani eriŋwera mu lulafu, ni ŋaliŋo alangirira ati, ‘Muhosiirire Musengwa engira, muluŋamye amagira gage.’ ”
41001004	Omuutu oyo oyu balanganga baati Yowaane Omubatiza, gabanga mu lulafu nʼabatiza era nʼabuulira, nʼaloma abaatu bebbwage bacuuse emyoyo babatiziwe, Hatonda abasoniŋe ebibi.
41001005	Ngʼaŋo abaatu baŋwerehererangamo ohuŋwa mu twale lyʼe Buyudaaya lyosiryosi nʼomu hibuga hyʼe Yerusaalemu ni batiina eyi ali ni benenya ebibi byawe, ngʼababatiza mu lwabi Yoludaani.
41001006	Yowaane gambalanga olugoye olu baahola mu mooya gʼesolo eyi balanga baati engamiya, era ni gesidiha omusipi ogwʼehyanjo. Galyanga esige nʼomudugere ogwomwisugu.
41001007	Mu hubuulira huhwe galomeranga abaatu ati, “Ŋaliŋo aliija owukira obuŋangi oyu toola wayire nʼohwinama ohumufihulamo engayito namwoga amagulu.
41001008	Ese mbabatiza nʼamaaji aye niye alibabatiza nʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu.”
41001009	Mu hiseera ehyene ehyo, nga Yesu aŋwa mu habuga ahʼe Nazaleesi mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya, atiina eyiri Yowaane amubatize mu Lwabi Yoludaani.
41001010	Yesu ni gaŋwa mu maaji ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo abona egulu ni liwihuhire ngʼOmwoyo amwihaho nʼali mu hifaananyi hyʼeŋuusi.
41001011	Ngʼejanjaasi liŋwa mwigulu ni ŋaliŋo aloma ati, “Ndiiwe Omwana wange omuhoda, owunesiimisa.”
41001012	Ŋaweene aŋo ngʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu aluŋamya Yesu amuŋira mu lulafu.
41001013	Ngʼeyo ahenayo endaalo amahumi ane nʼamenyire ŋalala nʼesolo ejomwisugu Sitaani nʼamuhema, ngʼabamalayika batiina bamulabirira.
41001014	Ŋaahani abobuŋangi ni baali ni badanyire Yowaane mu komera, Yesu gatiina mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya ngʼalomeranga abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋwa eyiri Hatonda,
41001015	nʼaloma ati, “Ehiseera ehi mubaaye ni mulindirira hyolire. Obuŋugi bwa Hatonda bwigereeye. Mwebbwage mucuuse emyoyo, mufugiirire Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu Buŋugi wa Hatonda.”
41001016	Ŋaahani ŋaaliŋo abasinde babiri Simooni nʼAndereya mulebewe. Abasinde abo baali benuli bʼenyeeni ni bateganga obutimba mu nyanja. Lulala Yesu ni gaali nʼagenda hwigenya lyʼenyanja Galilaaya, ngʼababona ni batega obutimba mu nyanja.
41001017	Ngʼaŋo abaloma ati, “Muuje munonde mugendenga ni neese, ndibafuula benuli bʼabaatu.”
41001018	Aŋo ni naaŋo nga baleha aŋo obutimba bwawe, bamulondaho.
41001019	Ni gesendaho mu moni ŋatotono, ngʼabona Yakobbo ni Yowaane abasaani ba Zebbedaayo ni bali ni saawe mu lyato lyawe ni bagonjoola obutimba.
41001020	Aŋo ni naaŋo nga boosi abalanga, baleha aŋo saawe Zebbedaayo nʼabatambi babe mu lyato, nga nibo batiina ni Yesu bagendanga ni naye.
41001021	Ngʼaŋo Yesu nʼabeegi babe, boola mu hibuga hyʼe Kaperanawumu. Olwa Sabbaato ni lwola, nga Yesu atiina mu humbaaniro lyʼAbayudaaya, atandiha ohusomesa.
41001022	Abaatu ni baŋulira, nga beŋunja bugali esomesa yiye. Olwohuba gasomesa nʼobuŋangi, sosi hyʼabasomesa bʼamagambi ga Hatonda.
41001023	Ŋaahani mu humbaaniro omwo mwalimo omusinde owaaliho omusambwa. Ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo aloma nʼahayaana ati,
41001024	“Otuhaabya hiina ewe Yesu Omunazaleesi? Wujire hutusihiirisa? Ese kumanyire! Ndiiwe Omwabufu wa Hatonda.”
41001025	Yesu ngʼahayula omusambwa ogwo ati, “Ŋoleera! Ŋwa nʼohu muutu oyo!”
41001026	Omusambwa nga gujugumisa omusinde oyo nʼamaani, nga guhena gumuŋwaho ni gwiteera.
41001027	Abaaliŋo bosibosi nga beŋunja, nga bahena bebuusa baati, “Omuutu ono wa ngeri hi? Esomesa yiye pyaha ate ya buŋangi. Obona alagira nʼemisambwa joosi jamuŋulira!”
41001028	Ohuŋwa hulwo, ngʼafuma mu hyalo hyʼe Galilaaya hyosihyosi nʼemirirano.
41001029	Yesu ni gaŋwa mu humbaaniro lyʼAbayudaaya, ngʼatiina ni Yakobbo ni Yowaane mu mago ga Simooni nʼAndereya.
41001030	Mu hiseera ehyo masaala ya Simooni gaali mu buliri omusuuja ni gumuluma era olu Yesu goola ati nga bamulomera.
41001031	Ngʼaŋo Yesu atiina aŋa ali, ngʼamuŋamba hu muhono amwinyosa. Aŋo ni naaŋo, omusuuja ogwali ni gumuluma nga guŋona, ngʼabategehera ehyʼohulya.
41001032	Ngʼaŋo egulo esaawa niija ohugwa mu maaji, abaatu baŋwerehereramo baŋira abalwaye nʼabaaliho emisambwa eyiri Yesu.
41001033	Era abaatu abomu hibuga ehyo bosibosi nga beejuha ebulafu ŋa mulyango gwʼenyumba omu gaali.
41001034	Ngʼaŋonia bangi abaali nʼobulwaye owa hiisi ngeri. Nʼabaaliho emisambwa gajibabbingaho, cooka nʼatajiganya huba nʼehi jiroma olwohuba jaali jimumanyire.
41001035	Ni wahya mu mawiwi, Yesu genyoha ngʼatiina mu hifo ehiduleere ngʼaba eyo nʼasaba.
41001036	Simooni nʼabahye, nga batiina ohumwendula.
41001037	Ni bamubona, nga bamuloma baati, “Hiisi muutu ali huhudaha.”
41001038	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Muhole hutiineho nʼomu bitahere ebirirene ŋano yoosi nje mbuulireyo olwohuba ehyo njʼehi najiriiye.”
41001039	Ngʼaŋo atiina hiisi ŋaatu mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya, nʼabuulira mu mahumbaaniro gaawe, era nʼabbinga emisambwa hu baatu.
41001040	Ngʼaŋo ŋabaaŋo omusinde omugenge owatiina eyiri Yesu, ngʼahubba amafuha mu moni jije, amwegalihira ati, “Ni huba ni huli husiima huhwo, ponie.”
41001041	Omusinde oyo ngʼaŋambya Yesu ehisa. Ngʼaŋo ajanuula omuhono amuŋambaho, amuloma ati, “Njʼohusiima hwange, ale ŋona.”
41001042	Ŋaweene aŋo, ebigenge nga biŋona, ngʼalongooha.
41001043	Ngʼaŋo Yesu amuseebula nʼamuhamiirisa buhomya ati,
41001044	“Omanya hino otahiromeraho muutu kadi mulala. Aye tiina weyanjule eyiri omusengi wa Hatonda, oŋeyo eŋongo eyi naabbi Musa galagira, bube bujulizi obubahahasa ti oŋonire.”
41001045	Aye omusinde oyo gatiina gaatandiha hwerebulira hiisi muutu, ngʼolu Yesu gaali nʼamuŋonisye. Olwʼehyo, Yesu hyamubeera higosi ohubaaho nʼahabuga aha gengiramo lubonani, aye gaabanga hutulo mu lulafu ebula baatu. Cooka ni nʼeyo yoosi abaatu baŋwanga hiisi ŋaatu ni batiina eyi ali.
41002001	Ni ŋaabitaŋo endaalo ndiidiri, nga Yesu gagama mu hibuga hyʼe Kaperanawumu. Ni hyagwa abaatu baayo mu hutwi ti ali mu mago aga gamenyangamo,
41002002	nga batiinayo abeene abangi bahumbaanira mu lunya, nʼohwolera erala ŋa mulyango nʼoŋuma nʼaŋa obisya hugulu. Yesu ni gaali nʼabalomera ehibono hya Hatonda,
41002003	nga ŋabaaŋo abasinde bane abatiinayo ni baŋira omuutu owaali nʼasanyalaaye ni bamugegire hu musigaasiga.
41002004	Olwʼobungi wʼabaatu bahaya engeri eyimwosa aŋali Yesu. Ehyaŋooyemo nga baniina ŋamugulu baŋomola eŋundu mu hasolya hʼenyumba omu gaali, nga babisya omulwaye mu ŋundu eryo, bamwihisa hu musigaasiga ohu bamuleeteeye ohumwosa aŋa Yesu gaali.
41002005	Yesu ni gabona ohufugiirira hwawe, ngʼaloma omulwaye ati, “Mwana wange, kusoniŋire ebibi bibyo.”
41002006	Ehiseera ehyo, ŋaaliŋo hu basomesa bʼamagambi ga Hatonda abaali ni behaaye aŋo. Ni baŋulira ebibono ebi Yesu galoma, nga baloma mu myoyo jaawe baati,
41002007	“Aŋanga atye ohuloma atyo? Ohwo huba hufodogola. Hatonda yeŋene njʼali nʼobuŋangi ohusoniŋa ebibi.”
41002008	Ŋaweene aŋo nga Yesu afaania mu mwoyo gugwe, ehyali mu biŋeego byawe. Ngʼababuusa ati, “Lwahiina muŋeega muutyo mu myoyo jenywe?
41002009	Ehihiraho owangu ohuloma owasanyalala njʼehiri ŋeena? Ohuloma ti: ‘Kusoniŋire ebibi bibyo’ oba ti: ‘Yinyoha ogege ehidugi hihyo wagameyo ewuwo?’
41002010	Ŋaahani nja hubalaga ti Omwana wʼOmuutu ali nʼobuŋangi hu hyalo huno ohusoniŋa ebibi.” Ngʼaloma owaali nʼasanyalaaye ati,
41002011	“Yinyoha ogege ehidugi hihyo, wagameyo ewenywe.”
41002012	Aŋo ni naaŋo bosibosi ni bamutaayeho emoni, ngʼomusinde oyo genyoha, aŋamba ehidugi hihye ohu bamuŋirira, agenda atiina. Nga bosibosi beŋunja, bajumirya Hatonda, ni baloma baati, “A! Hino sihuhibonangaho!”
41002013	Ngʼaŋo Yesu gagamayo hu nyanja Galilaaya. Ngʼehiŋindi hyʼabaatu hihumbaana aŋa gaali atiina mu moni nʼohubasomesa.
41002014	Oluvanyuma ni gaali nʼagenda hwigenya lyʼenyanja, ngʼabona omuŋoosa oyu balanganga baati Leevi wʼAlufaayo ni gehaaye aŋa baŋoosesa. Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Nja wunonde ogendenga ni neese.” Nga Leevi genyoheramo amulondaho.
41002015	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, nga Yesu atiina nʼabeegi babe ewa Leevi ohulya. Omutoolo gwʼabaŋoosa nʼabaatu abandi abahosi bʼebibi, nga batiina ni naye. Nga bosibosi beehala baliira ŋalala ni Yesu nʼabeegi babe.
41002016	Balala hu basomesa bʼamagambi abʼehibbubbu hyʼAbafalisaayo ni babona Yesu nʼalya nʼabaatu abo abʼebibi nʼabaŋoosa nga babuusa abeegi babe baati, “Lwahiina alya nʼabaatu abahosi bʼebibi nʼabaŋoosa?”
41002017	Yesu ni gaŋulira ehi babuusa, nga niye abaloma ati, “Abaatu abalamu sibetaaga musaŋu, ohutusaho abalwaye. Sinaaja hwendula aberanga abalaŋi, ohutusaho abahosi bʼebibi.”
41002018	Lulala, abeegi ba Yowaane Omubatiza nʼaba Bafalisaayo baali basiibire aye aba Yesu ni batasiibire. Nga ŋabaaŋo abaatu abatiina eyiri Yesu nga bamubuusa baati, “Lwahiina abeegi ba Yowaane nʼaba Abafalisaayo basiiba, aye ababo ni batasiiba?”
41002019	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Abalange hu mbaga yʼobugole baŋanga ohusiiba ahooye omweŋa nʼahiiri ni nabo? Ehiseera hyosihyosi ehi ahena ni nabo, sibasiiba.
41002020	Aye ehiseera hiryola, babatusaho ahooye omweŋa. Hu olwo ndolu balitagiha ohusiiba.” Nga geyongera ohubagerera engero ejindi ohubalaga ngʼolu esomesa yiye nʼobulombolombo waawe bitasobola huŋambagana.
41002021	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Omuutu saahubba hiŋero ehyʼolugoye olunyaaha mu hyambalo ehihayire. Olwohuba ehiŋero ehyo ni hyehuuna, hihapuha ohuŋwa hu lugoye olwo oluhayire hyaŋiriraho nʼehimesu hyalwo, ngʼehituli hyeyongera ohugalama.
41002022	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, sibajuha omwenge gwʼemizabbibbu epiiraŋo mu hisaŋu ehihayire. Singa bahihola, gwadisa ehisaŋu ehyo nga byombi obifiirwa. Aye omwenge gwʼemizabbibbu epiiraŋo, bagujuha mu hisaŋu ehinyaaha.”
41002023	Lulala hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato, Yesu nʼabeegi babe baali babita mu ngira eyibita mu muga gwʼengaano. Abeegi babe nga batiinanga ni baŋulula embehe hu magala ni bemunga.
41002024	NgʼAbafalisaayo babuusa Yesu baati, “E! Lwahiina abeegi babo bahola ehi magambi geefe gatatufugiirira huhola hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato?”
41002025	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Simusomangaho hu ehi Dawudi gahola olu niye nʼabahye aba gaali ni nabo baali ni baŋuma hyʼohulya?
41002026	Mu biseera ebi Abbiyataari gaali njʼomuhulu wʼabasengi ba Hatonda, Dawudi gengira mu weema ya Hatonda ngʼalya emigaati eji baali ni baŋongire eyiri Hatonda. Amagambi gafugiirira basengi ba Hatonda boŋene ohulya emigaati ejo. Cooka ate Dawudi gajiryaho, era gaŋaho nʼaba gaali ni nabo.”
41002027	Ngʼaŋo Yesu agohoba nʼaloma Abafalisaayo ati, “Hatonda gaataŋo oludaalo lwa Sabbaato lugase omuutu, sosi Sabbaato ohumuŋuga.
41002028	Olwʼehyo Omwana wʼOmuutu nje Musengwa aŋuga oludaalo lwa Sabbaato.”
41003001	Nga nindi olundi Yesu atiina mu humbaaniro lyʼAbayudaaya. Hu olwo mwalimo omusinde owaali nʼomuhono omuŋotohi.
41003002	Hu baali mu humbaaniro, mwalimo Abafalisaayo abaali ni bendula ehyʼohumweŋambya era nga bamutaho emoni babone oba anaŋonie owʼomuhono omuŋotohi hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato, basune ehi baneemeho ohumuŋaŋabira.
41003003	Nga Yesu aloma omusinde owaali nʼomuhono omuŋotohi ati, “Yinyoha, wemerere aŋa hiisi muutu asobola ohuhubona.”
41003004	Ngʼaŋo Yesu ko abuusa abaali ni bamwendulirisa ati, “Kaho amagambi gatufugiirira huhola hiina hulwa Sabbaato? Huhola biraŋi, oba huhola bibi? Huŋonia bulamu, oba hubusihiirisa?” Aye nibo nga baŋoleera huŋoleera.
41003005	Nga Yesu abetoloosamo emoni nʼabasunguŋaliiye, era nʼali munyikaafu olwʼobuhahanyafu wʼemyoyo jaawe, ngʼaloma omusinde oyo ati, “Waama januula omuhono gugwo.” Ngʼola agujanuula, nga guŋonera erala.
