41003006	Ŋaweene aŋo, Abafalisaayo ni bahena ohubona Yesu nʼaŋonisye omusinde oyo, nga batula mu humbaaniro batiina beŋimba hu bawagizi ba Herode ohuseega magesi gʼohwitamo Yesu.
41003007	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aŋwaŋo nʼabeegi babe batiina hwigenya lyʼenyanja Galilaaya. Oguŋindi gwʼabaatu nga gumulondaho. Abaatu baŋwa enjuyi nʼenjuyi mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya nomu Buyudaaya,
41003008	nʼomu hibuga hyʼe Yerusaalemu, nʼomu hitundu hyʼe Yidumeya, nʼengereha wʼolwabi Yoludaani, nʼomu bitundu ebirirene ebibuga hyʼe Tiiro ni Sidoni nga batiina eyi gaali. Hino bahihola olwohuba baali baŋuliiye efuma yʼebi gaholanga.
41003009	Olwʼabaatu ohubitiirira obungi, Yesu galoma abeegi babe bamutegehereŋo eryato gehalemo nʼasomesa, abaatu batamunyigirisa.
41003010	Olwohuba gaali aŋonisye abaatu bangi, hiisi mulwaye hulwo gaali genyigirisa asobole ohumwolerera amuŋambeho.
41003011	Hiisi olu baatu abaaliho emisambwa bamubonanga, bagwanga ŋaasi mu moni jije, emisambwa ni jiiteera jiiti, “Ndiiwe Omwana wa Hatonda!”
41003012	Cooka niye gahayulanga huhayula emisambwa ejo nʼatajiganya hubbutula ehyama ehyo.
41003013	Yesu ni gaŋwa aŋo ngʼatiina mu hifo ehyomu lugingi, ngʼagangalamo abaatu aba gendire nga begerera aŋa ali.
41003014	Mu bano pomu gatobola ehumi nʼababiri abafuula bahwenda babe, basobole ohubanga ni naye, era abatumenga ohubuulira obuhwenda buwe.
41003015	Ni gahena ngʼabaŋa obuŋangi owʼohubbinganga emisambwa hu baatu.
41003016	Ehumi nʼababiri abo mba bano: Simooni, oyu gameedaho esiina erindi ati Peetero;
41003017	abasaani ba Zebbedaayo ababiri Yakobbo ni Yowaane, boosi aba gameedaho erindi ati, “Bbowanageruge” amahulu gaalyo ti, “Ababbwabbwanuha hyʼeraadu.”
41003018	Ngʼohwo omeedaho Andereya ni Filipo ni Bbatulumaayo ni Matayo ni Tomasi ni Yakobbo wʼAlufaayo ni Sadaayo ni Simooni Omuzelote,
41003019	ko ni Yuda Yisikaryoti, owalya mu Yesu oluhwe.
41003020	Ebyo ni byaŋwa nga Yesu nʼabeegi babe baagama eyi bamenyanga. Nga nindi eyo yoosi ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu hihumbaana nga hyola nʼohutabaŋa simire eyʼohuŋamba hu hyomu tamu.
41003021	Ni hyagwa abalebe babe mu hutwi, nga batiina baje bamutuseyo olwohuba baali baŋeega baati alaluhire.
41003022	Ŋaaliŋo abasomesa bʼamagambi abaali ni bajire ohuŋwa e Yerusaalemu. Bano baaloma baati, “Yesu aliho Bbeluzebbuli omuhulu wʼemisambwa.” Era baati, “Atambisa buŋangi wa Bbeluzebbuli ohubbinga emisambwa hu baatu.”
41003023	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abalanga besende aŋa ali, ngʼabalomera mu ngero ati, “Sitaani omuhulu wʼemisambwa, aŋanga atye ohwebbinga omwene hu muutu?
41003024	Abaatu abʼowahabaha obulala banesalamo bahubbagana abeene nʼabeene, owahabaha obwo busihiiriha.
41003025	“Nʼolu baba baatu mu mago boosi singa si baŋambagana, amago ago gabbwagiha.
41003026	Mu ngeri njʼenyene singa ni Sitaani gesoosa omwene, obuŋangi buwe bwabuhanamo era aba anasihiirihe.
41003027	Kale ŋabula aŋanga ohwingira mu nyumba yʼomuutu owʼamaani ganyaga ebiitu bibye nʼatasookire humusidiha ko ganyaga ebibye.
41003028	Mbalomera ehituufu ti balisoniŋa abaatu ebibi byosibyosi, nga pomuli nʼohuloma ebibono ebifodogola.
41003029	Aye hiisi afodogola Omwoyo Omutukuvu, sibalimusoniŋa, aye aba asaaye omusango ogu alisigala ni nagwo emirembe nʼemirembe.”
41003030	Hino Yesu gahiroma nʼagobola mu baali ni balomire baati aliho emisambwa.
41003031	Ngʼaŋo nyina nʼabalebe babe boola eyi gaali. Ni boola nga beema ebulafu bamutumisa atiine eyi baali.
41003032	Hu nyanga eyo ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu hyali hihaaye ni himwetolooye. Nga ŋabaaŋo abamuloma baati, “Bona maawo nʼabalebe babo bali ebulafu benda ohuhubona.”
41003033	Nga Yesu ababuusa ati, “Baatu ba ngeri hi abasaniiye ohuba maama nʼabalebe bange?”
41003034	Ngʼaŋo getoloosa emoni mu abaatu abaali ni behaaye ohumwetoloola. Nga ko ahena aloma ati, “Maama nʼabalebe bange mba bano.
41003035	Hiisi ahola ebi Hatonda genda, njʼaba muganda yange, mboojo yange, era njʼaba maama.”
41004001	Ngʼaŋo nindi Yesu atiina atandiha ohusomesa nʼali hwigenya lyʼenyanja Galilaaya. Oguŋindi gwʼabaatu ogwahumbaana aŋa gaali nga gubitiirira obubbala. Ehyaŋwamo ngʼaniina mu lyato balisenda mu maaji gehala omwo nʼasomesa, abaatu bosibosi bemeerera hwigenya.
41004002	Ngʼabasomesa ebiitu ebiŋera nʼatambisa engero. Mu husomesa huhwe, gabaloma ati,
41004003	“Ni mwetege! Ŋaaliŋo omulimi owatiina ohumwa owumo.
41004004	Ni gaali nʼamwa, ngʼowumo obundi bugwa hu tulo wʼengira ngʼenyuni jitiina jibulya.
41004005	Obundi nga bugwa hwiroba eryʼohu lwanda ohwali otuloba otugeregere. Era olwohuba bwali hu mugulu, siwalwa humera.
41004006	Aye endobooli ni yatula, nga buŋotoha era nga bwoma olwohuba emisi jaali ndi jiiha ŋaasi ehihena.
41004007	Ngʼobundi bugwa hwiroba eryameramo amaŋwa, ni wamera nga buhulira ŋalala nʼamaŋwa ago era nga gabumiina gabuloberesa ohuhula era ehyo hyabuleetera ohutaama.
41004008	Aye obundi nga bugwa hwiroba eraŋi. Nibwo ni bwamera nga buhula era nga bwitulula, amagala gaabwo nga gajuhamo emoni. Amagala agandi nga gabaaho embehe amahumi adatu; agandi embehe nkaaga; nʼagandi, embehe cikumi.”
41004009	Nga Yesu agohoba ati, “Ali nʼohutwi aŋulire.”
41004010	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, abaatu abahira obungi ni baali ni baŋooyeŋo, abeegi babe ehumi nʼababiri ko nʼabandi abaali ni basigaaye ni Yesu, nga bamusunga abanyonyole amahulu gʼengero.
41004011	Ngʼaŋo abaloma ati, “Enywe muli nʼekabi ohumanya ehyama ehiŋamba hu buŋugi bwa Hatonda.” Aye abebulafu, hiisi hiitu hiba mu ngero konyo:
41004012	Bahaŋaase, aye ni batafaania ehi bahaŋaasa. Baŋulirise, aye ni batategeera ehi baŋulira, batahanda hwebbwaga bacuusa emyoyo babasoniŋa ebibi byawe.
41004013	Ngʼaŋo Yesu ababuusa ati, “Simufaania mahulu gʼolugero luno? Olwo ŋaahani munahaŋange muutye ohubaaho nʼolugero olu munahafaanie amahulu?
41004014	Omuŋaanyi wʼowumo, ali hyʼomuutu oyo abuulira ehibono hya Hatonda mu baatu.
41004015	Abaatu abandi bali hyʼowumo owagwa hu tulo wʼengira. Ni babaŋanyamo ehibono, bahiŋulira aye ŋaweene aŋo Sitaani gaaja gahibatusamo.
41004016	Abandi bali hyʼowumo owagwa hwiroba eryʼohu lwanda. Ni baŋulira ehibono, bahisangaalira nʼamanyonyo.
41004017	Aye olwohuba bali hyʼebirime ebiŋuma emisi ejihire mwiroba ehihena, ohufugiirira hwawe hwa haseera buseera. Ebigosi ni bibajira oba abaatu babacaawa olwʼehibono hya Hatonda, nga banafuŋa.
41004018	Ate abandi bali hyʼowumo owagwa hwiroba eririmo amaŋwa. Bano baŋulira ehibono,
41004019	aye oluvanyuma ebiitu ebindi omuli ohuŋemba obugali hu byʼehyalo, ohusendasendebwa nʼomulungo gwʼobusuni, nʼohululuhanira ohusuna ebiitu ebindi, biŋuga emyoyo jaawe, byaloberesa ehibono ohuŋwamo ehiraŋi.
41004020	Aye abaatu abandi bali hyʼowumo obwo obwagwa mwiroba eraŋi. Ni baŋulira ehibono bahifugiirira nʼomwoyo mulala era baba nʼehyasa. Abaatu abandi emirundi amahumi adatu; ate bandi emirundi nkaaga, nʼabandi emirundi cikumi.”
41004021	Ngʼaŋo nindi Yesu abagerera olugero olundi nʼababuusa ati, “Ŋaliŋo aŋambya etaala gayifunihira mu hisero oba gaayita mu kuliiti mu hifo hyʼohuyita hu hihondo hyayo?
41004022	Olwʼehyo hiisi ehi bagisa, hiryeta aŋalafu. Era hiisi hyama balihiŋebbula.
41004023	Ale hanye ŋaliŋo ali nʼohutwi, aŋulire.”
41004024	Era ngʼameedaho ati, “Mwetegeresenga ebi muŋulira. Ehipimo ehi opimiramo abandi, ehyene ehyo weesi cʼehi balihupimiramo, era bali huteeraho nʼenyongesa.
41004025	Oyo ali nʼebingi balimumeedaho ebindi. Oyo aŋuma, balimutusaaho nʼahadiidiri aha ali ni naho.”
41004026	Nga Yesu geyongera abagerera olugero olundi nʼaloma ati, “Obuŋugi bwa Hatonda huŋanga bugeragerania nʼolugero luno: Omuutu aŋaanya owumo mu muga gugwe.
41004027	Ebiseera ebyomu muusi omuutu oyo ahola emirimo jije ejindi, owiire ngʼaŋenyuha. Wo owumo bumera, waahula, omwene hubuŋaanya nʼatamanyire ngeri eyi bumeramo, wayire eyi buhulamo.
41004028	Eroba eryene hu waalyo lihusa ebirime ebyo mu ngiso. Ebirime ebyo byeherera hutubbula emitombo, ni bihula nga bitulula, nga bijuhamo emoni.
41004029	Ni biŋangala, ngʼolwo omuutu aŋamba hageso ahagesa olwohuba egesa liba lyolire.”
41004030	Nga Yesu abagerera olugero olundi nʼabaloma ati, “Obuŋugi bwa Hatonda hunabugerageranie hu hiina? Oba lugero hi olu huŋanga ohutambisa ohubunyonyola?
41004031	Buli hyʼahamo hʼehirime ehi balanga baati kalidaali. Hano njʼahamo ahasingira erala obudidiri mu wumo bwosibwosi hu hyalo.
41004032	Aye ni bahahoma mwiroba, hamera nga hahula haŋwamo ehirime hyʼeryani ehisingira erala byosibyosi obubbala. Hihubba amasaga ameene amabbala, aga enyuni jiŋanga ohutongolamo ebiswi, nʼohweyigama omumwi mu hiŋolu hyahyo.”
41004033	Yesu galomera abaatu ehibono hya Hatonda nʼatambisa engero ejiŋera ejifananaho ni najino, ni geema hu hutegeera hwawe.
41004034	Era ŋabula ehiitu hyosihyosi ehi gabalomera ehitaali mu lugero. Aye ni gasigalanga nʼabeegi babe boŋene, nga nibo abanyonyola amahulu gaajo goosi.
41004035	Egulo hu ludaalo olwene olwo, Yesu galoma abeegi babe ati, “Hwambuhe, hutiine engereha wʼenyanja.”
41004036	Nga baleha aŋo ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu, baniina eryato eri Yesu gaalimo nga bambuha ni naye. Ŋaaliŋo nʼamaato agandi, nga goosi galondaho.
41004037	Baali bahiiri mu lugendo nga hibuyaga owʼamaani genyoha hu nyanja, ngʼebimoto byʼamaaji bitagiha ohwedanyanga mu lyato, ni lihaabira hwijula.
41004038	Mu hiseera ehyo, Yesu gaali yinyuma mu lyato ni geŋigihire nʼaŋenyuha. Ngʼaŋo abeegi babe bamwinyosa, bamuloma baati, “Musomesa, enyanja yenda hutwita nʼewe soofayo?”
41004039	Nga Yesu genyoha, ahabira hibuyaga ati, “Yihaahana!” Era ngʼalagira enyanja ati, “Wunjeera!” Nga hibuyaga gehahana, nʼenyanja ngʼewunjeerera erala yiiti ce!
41004040	Nga Yesu abuusa abeegi babe ati, “Lwahiina mubaaye muŋooyemo omwoyo? Muhiiri huba nʼohufugiirira?”
41004041	Aye nibo hino nga hibahenaho efiiri hu mutwe bahena bebuusa abeene nʼabeene baati, “Omuutu ono wa ngeri hi oyu wayire hibuyaga nʼebimoto byʼamaaji hu nyanja biŋulira?”
41005001	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, nga Yesu nʼabeegi babe boola engereha wʼenyanja mu hyalo hyʼAbagaraasa.
41005002	Yesu gaali ko gahaŋwa ati mu lyato, ngʼomusinde owaaliho emisambwa aŋwera mu pungulu eji basiihangamo abafu, atiine gagaanane ni naye.
41005003	Omusinde oyo gaŋenyuhanga mu pungulu ejo. Hyali hiŋaaye omusinde oyo amaani ni ŋaŋuma hiitu hyosihyosi ehi baali ni basobola ohumusidiha ndahihapula, wayire olujegere.
41005004	Efunda nyingi bamusidihanga nʼenjegere emihono nʼamagulu, cooka nʼajihapula. Era ni ŋabula owʼamaani owaali nʼasobola ohumuhuuma.
41005005	Hiisi owahyanga, mu muusi nʼowiire gaberereranga alerenga eyo mu hifo nago ehi basiihangamo abafu nʼomu ngingi, ni geyasa era ni gesalasala amabaale hu mubiri.
41005006	Omusinde oyo ni galengera Yesu, gaduluma ngʼatiina aŋa gaali, ni goola ngʼahubba amafuha mu moni jije.
41005007	Ngʼomusambwa ogwamuliho gwinianguha ni guloma guuti, “Wukaabya hiina, ewe Yesu Omwana wa Hatonda Owaŋamugulu Obugali? Kwegayiriiye mu siina lya Hatonda, otangudya.”
41005008	Nga Yesu alagira omusambwa ogwali hu musinde oyo ati, “Musambwa ewe ŋwa hu muutu oyo!”
41005009	Ngʼaŋo Yesu agubuusa ati, “Ndiiwe ani?” Nga gumugobolamo guuti, “Ndiise Maŋe, olwohuba huli buhehere.”
41005010	Nga gumwegayirira bugali ni gumusunga atajibbinga huŋwa mu hitundu ehyo.
41005011	Ohuupi aŋo mu menamo gʼolusozi, ŋaaliŋo ehidooli hyʼembiiji ni jaaya.
41005012	Ngʼemisambwa jegayirira Yesu jiiti, “Tufugiirire huje hwingire mu mbiiji ejo.”
41005013	Ngʼajifugiirira, nga jiŋwa hu muutu oyo, jija jingira mu mbiiji. Nga wangewe ehidooli hyʼembiiji ehyali ni hiŋeramo embiiji ngʼekumi ebiri jifulumuha embiro jiŋwera mu nyanja jinywa etubbi.
41005014	Abaali ni beemera embiiji nga baduluma baja balomera abaatu abomu habuga haawe nʼabomu bitundu ebyʼomulirano. Nga batiina baje bebonere ebyali ni byolire hu musinde owaaliho omusambwa.
41005015	Ni boola aŋa Yesu gaali nga babona omusinde ola owabangaho eŋe lyʼemisambwa ni gehaaye, ni gambaaye ebyambalo, nʼohutegeera nʼategeera bulaŋi weene, nga batya.
41005016	Abaaliŋo baabona emisambwa ni jiŋwa hu musinde oyo ni jingira mu mbiiji, nga baloohesaho abahyawe abaali ni baajire ngʼolu bibaaye.
41005017	Bala ni baŋulira nga batandiha ohwegalihira Yesu aŋwe mu hitahere hyawe.
41005018	Yesu ni gaali nʼaniina eryato abaŋwereŋo, omusinde ola oyu gabbingaho emisambwa ngʼamwegalihira amufugiirire atiine ni naye.
41005019	Cooka Yesu ndaamufugiirira, ngʼamuloma ati, “Yagamayo ewenywe eyiri abaatu babo, obalomere byosibyosi ebi Hatonda Musengwa ahuholeeye, era ngʼolu ahuŋambiiye ehisasabirisi.”
41005020	Ngʼaŋo omusinde oyo abita nʼalomera hiisi muutu mu bitundu hyʼe Dekapooli byosibyosi ebi Yesu gaali nʼamuholeeye. Bosibosi abaŋulira nga beŋunja.
41005021	Nga nindi Yesu nʼabeegi babe bambuha baagamayo engereha wʼenyanja. Ni boola ngʼoguŋindi gwʼabaatu gwesoloosa aŋa gaali hwigenya.
41005022	Gaali ahiiri aŋo, nga jireeta mulala hu bahulu bʼehumbaaniro lyʼAbayudaaya oyu balanganga baati Yayiro. Yayiro ni gahubba emoni hu Yesu, ngʼaja ahubba amafuha mu moni jije,
41005023	amwegalihira bugali nʼamuloma ati, “Ahahaana hange henda hufa. Muhulu, nja oje ohaŋambeho ohaŋonie hatafa.”
41005024	Ngʼaŋo Yesu atiina ni naye. Oguŋindi gwʼabaatu nga guŋindigana gumulondaho ni gutiina ni gumunyigirisa.
41005025	Mu guŋindi ogwo mwalimo omuhasi owaali nʼaweeneweene nʼobulwaye wʼoluheeŋo ohuhena emyaha ehumi nʼebiri.
41005026	Omuhasi oyo gaali aweeneweene bugali olwʼabagangi ehipyeda eyi gesombanga nʼatiina ohumuganga era nʼahenireŋo ebiitu bibye olwʼohubasasula cooka nʼataŋona aye obulwaye buwe nʼetaamanga hutaama.
41005027	Olwohuba gaali aŋuliiyeho ni baloosa efuma ya Yesu, gaŋwaho enyuma ni genyigirisa mu guŋindi gwʼabaatu abaali ni balonda hu Yesu ngʼaŋamba hu hyambalo hihye.
41005028	Hino gahihola olwohuba gaali aloma mu mwoyo gugwe ati, “Hasinge ni naŋambe huŋambaho hu hyambalo hihye, naŋone.”
41005029	Ni gahiŋambaho, aŋo ni naaŋo ngʼoluheeŋo lwomeera. Ngʼaŋulira mu bulamu buwe obulwaye obubaaye ni bumudambya ni buŋonire.
41005030	Hu nyanga enyene eyo, Yesu gategeera amaani gage agaŋonia ni gaholire omulimo. Ngʼacuuha ahejaheja abuusa ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ati, “Njʼani owupambire hu hyambalo?”
41005031	Abeegi babe nga bamugobolamo baati, “Weesi, obona ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ngʼolu hiri huŋindigana, era wabuusa oti: ‘Njʼani owupambireho?’ ”
41005032	Aye Yesu nga gegumya ohuhejaheja abone omuutu amuŋambireho.
41005033	Ngʼaŋo omuhasi ola olwʼohumanya ehyali ni himwolireho, gatiina butibuti, era nʼakaakana, ngʼahoma ekumbo mu moni ja Yesu, amulomera byosibyosi ebyamuliho.
41005034	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Muhaana, Ohufugiirira huhwo huhuŋonisye. Tiina nʼemiyaaya, nʼobulwaye obubaaye ni buhudambya buŋone.”
41005035	Yesu gaali ahiiroma, ngʼebaayo abahwenda abaŋwa ewa Yayiro omuhulu wʼehumbaaniro, nga baloma omuhulu oyo baati, “Muhulu odambihisya hiina Omusomesa? Omwana wuwo ahenire ohufa.”
41005036	Yesu ni gaŋulira ebi baali ni baloma, ngʼaloma Yayiro ati, “Ewe oteralihira, yegumye huba nʼohufugiirira.”
41005037	Ngʼaŋo Yesu asibira abaatu abandi ohumulondaho nʼatiina ni Yayiro, ohutusaho Peetero nʼaboluganda ababiri Yakobbo ni Yowaane.
41005038	Ni boola mu mago ga Yayiro, Yesu gageeneyo amaliro, abaatu ni balira era ni bahubba nʼenduulu.
41005039	Ni gengira mu nyumba, ngʼabaloma ati, “Amaliro nʼenduulu ebimuhubba, byahi? Omwana saafe, aye ali huŋenyuha.”
41005040	Nibo bamujeherera humujeherera. Ni gahena ohubbingaŋo abaatu abandi, nga gengira nʼabasaye bʼomwana, ko nʼabeegi babe abadatu, mu hisenge omu mwana gaali.
41005041	Ngʼaŋamba omwana, hu muhono, amuloma ati, “Taliisa kumi”, amahulu gaahyo ti, “Mwana ewe yinyoha!”
41005042	Ŋaweene aŋo, ngʼomwana oyo owaali nʼaŋesa emyaha ehumi nʼebiri, gemeerera agenda. Abaaliŋo nga basamalirira!
41005043	Nga Yesu abahamiirisa ehi aholire batahiromeraho abaatu bandi. Era ngʼalagira baŋeho omwana oyo ehyʼohulya.
41006001	Yesu ni gaŋwa mu hitundu ehyo, ngʼatiina mu habuga hʼewaawe aha balanga Nazaleesi. Ngʼabeegi babe batiina ni naye.
41006002	Oludaalo lwa Sabbaato ni lwola, ngʼatiina mu humbaaniro atandiha ohusomesa. Abahira obungi hu baŋulira ebi gaali nʼasomesa nga beŋunja ni bebuusa baati, “A! Omusinde ono bino ebi asomesa gabitusa ŋeena? Magesi hiina gano aga gasuna ohuba ti asobola nʼohuhola ebyamaliholiho?”
41006003	Nga bamujerega ni baloma baati, “Ono sinje omubaaji omusaani wa Malyamu, mulebe ya Yakobbo ni Yose, ni Yuda, ni Simooni? Era ababoojo sibamenyire huno ni neefe?” Ehyaŋwamo nga bagaana ohufugiirira ebibye.
41006004	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Naabbi bamuŋa eŋono hiisi ŋaatu, ohutusaho mu hitundu hyʼewaawe omuli abalebe babe nʼabehiha.”
41006005	Olwʼehyo, sigaholayo byamaliholiho, ohutusaho abalwaye ababale aba gaŋambaho baŋona.
41006006	Era geŋunja bugali abaatu baayo ohutaba nʼohufugiirira. Ngʼaŋo atiina ŋano ni naŋala mu bitundu ebyʼomulirano nʼasomesa abaatu ehibono hya Hatonda.
41006007	Mu hiseera ehyo nga Yesu alanga abeegi babe ehumi nʼababiri batiine aŋa gaali. Ngʼabatuma babiri babiri ohuja ohubuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu buŋugi bwa Hatonda, ngʼabaŋa nʼobuŋangi ohubbinganga emisambwa hu baatu.
41006008	Ngʼabahamiirisa ati, “Mu lugendo luno mutagega hiitu hindi hyosihyosi, ohutusaho omuhoomero. Mutawoŋa ebyʼohulya era mutagega bihapu oba bbeesa.
41006009	Mwambale ebirayito aye mutagega byambalo ebindi ohutusaho ebi hiisi muutu anaabe ni gambaaye.
41006010	Hiisi hibuga ehi munaholengamo, mumenyanga mu mago gʼabaatu ababa ni babasangaaliiye, ohwola olu museebuha.
41006011	Era ni mwolanga aŋaatu ndibabasangaalira, oba bagaana ohuŋuliirisa ebi mubaloma, nga muŋwaŋo. Era ni muba ni muŋwayo, mwekukumulangaho efuuhe mu magulu, habe habonero ahalaga ohulabula ohuŋwa eyiri Hatonda.”
41006012	Ngʼaŋo abeegi batiina ni babuulira abaatu bebbwage bacuuse emyoyo balehe ebibi ebi bahola.
41006013	Nga babbinga emisambwa mingi hu baatu, nga nʼabalwaye bangi babaŋahangaho amafuta ni baŋona.
41006014	Ehiseera hyola nga Herode owaali nʼaŋuga etwale lyʼe Galilaaya aŋulira efuma ya Yesu, olwohuba baali bamulomaho hiisi ŋaatu baati, “Nje Yowaane Omubatiza alamuhire, cʼehifa ali nʼobuŋangi ohuhola ebyamaliholiho.”
41006015	Aye abandi ni baloma baati, “NjʼEriya.” Nʼabandi baati, “Mulala hu banaabbi aba hale.”
41006016	Aye efuma ya Yesu ni yagwa Herode mu hutwi niye galoma ati, “Oyo anaabe nje Yowaane Omubatiza oyu nalagira baatemaho omutwe, njʼalamuhire!”
41006017	Ŋanyumaho, Herode gaali alagiiye baŋambe Yowaane bamuwoŋe mu komera. Hino gahihola olwʼohwenda ohusangaasa Herodiya oyu gaali nʼahooye oluvanyuma lwʼohumupaasa ohuŋwa hu Filipo mugandaawe.
41006018	Efunda ejiŋera, Yowaane Omubatiza galomanga Herode ati, “Sihiraŋi ewe ohupaasa muha mugandaawo.”
41006019	Hino hyaleetera Herodiya ohuŋalana Yowaane ni genda nʼohumwita cooka nʼahaya engeri,
41006020	olwohuba Herode gaali amuhuuma atoolaho higosi. Hino gahihola olwohuba gaali amanyire ati Yowaane musinde muluŋamu era muutu wa Hatonda, kale nʼatya ohigosi ohumwolaho. Herode gendanga ohuŋuliirisa ebi Yowaane galomanga wayire hiisi olu gamuŋulirisanga, gasigalangamo ahakukuna.
41006021	Lwali lulala nga Herodiya afuna ahakisa. Oludaalo olwo lwali lwʼamasaaliwa ga Herode. Herode ganyiiya embaga, ngʼalanga abahungu babe, nʼabahulu bʼabasirikale, nʼabaatu abegingihiriri mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya.
41006022	Ni baali ŋagati wʼembaga, omuhaana wa Herodiya gengira mu diiro omu baali ngʼahina, asangaasa bugali Herode nʼabageni babe. Ngʼaŋo Habaha aloma omuhaana oyo ati, “Loma ehiitu hyosihyosi ehi wenda, nahihuŋe.”
41006023	Ngʼalayira nʼohulayira ati, “Mazima ameene ehi onende hyosihyosi nahihuŋe, nʼolu onende oti hugabanire ŋagati owahabaha wange.”
41006024	Ngʼaŋo omuhaana atula aja gebuusa hu nyina ati, “Sunge hiina?” Nga nyina amugobolamo ati, “Tiina osunge mutwe gwa Yowaane Omubatiza.”
41006025	Omuhaana nga genyoheramo gagama eyiri habaha amuloma ati, “Nenda wupeere ŋaweene ŋano omutwe gwa Yowaane Omubatiza ni bagutereeye hu suniya.”
41006026	Ehyo hyanakuŋasa habaha bugali, aye olwohuba gaali ahenire ohulayira nʼabageni babe ni baŋulira, gahaya engeri eyʼohumwima ehi amusungire.
41006027	Ŋaweene aŋo habaha galagira omusirikale omuhuumi wʼekomera aje ateme hu Yowaane omutwe aguleete. Nga oyu gatuma atiina mu komera atema hu Yowaane omutwe,
41006028	aguleetera hu suniya aguŋa omuhaana, nʼomuhaana ngʼaguŋa nyina.
41006029	Abeegi ba Yowaane ni baŋulira, nga baja batusayo omulambo gugwe baguŋira baja bagusiiha.
41006030	Ngʼaŋo abahwenda aba Yesu gatuma ohutiina ohubuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi bagobola bamuloohesa byosibyosi ebi baali ni baholire nʼebi baali ni basomesiise.
41006031	Mu hiseera ehyo, abaatu oluhulende baali batiina hanjihinjihi aŋa baali. Bano babanga bahaŋwaŋo, nga nindi abandi boola, nga bahaya nʼehiseera ehyʼohuŋamba hu hyomu tamu. Nga Yesu aloma abeegi babe ati, “Muhole hutiine mu hifo ehibulamo baatu aŋa hunaabe hweŋene, muŋuumuleho.”
41006032	Nga baniina eryato bambuhe batiine mu hifo ehiŋumamo baatu.
41006033	Aye nga ŋabaaŋo abaatu bangi abababona ni batiina babafaania ti nje nibo. Ngʼaŋo baŋwerehereramo ohuŋwa hiisi ŋaatu bamulondaho nʼamagulu ni babita hu woomu, nga baja babeherera mu hifo eyi Yesu nʼabeegi babe baali ni batiina.
41006034	Yesu ni gaŋwa mu lyato, gabona ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ni bahumbeene, nga bamuŋambya ehisa olwohuba baali hyʼetaama ejiŋumaho mwayi. Ngʼaŋo abasomesa ebiitu ebyene ebitali bitono.
41006035	Abeegi babe ni babona owiire ni butiinire, nga batiina aŋa Yesu gaali bamuloma baati, “Ehifo hino hiduleere, ate owiire mbobuno butiinire.
41006036	Seebula abaatu batiine mu bitahere ebyohu mulirano begulire ebiryo balye.”
41006037	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Enywe mubaŋe biryo balye?” Nga nibo bamubuusa baati, “Ehyo hiŋanga ohuŋira omuhemba ogwʼemyesi nga munaana. Oŋeega hunatuse ŋeena edinaari ebihumi bibiri, ko hubagulire ebiryo balye?”
41006038	Nga niye ababuusa ati, “Muli nʼemigaati jinga? Mutiine mubone.” Ni bahena ohwetegeresa, nga bamuloma baati, “Etaanu, nʼenyeeni ebiri.”
41006039	Ngʼaŋo Yesu alagira abeegi babe balome abaatu bosibosi behale ŋaasi hu nyaasi mu bibbubbu.
41006040	Nga babehasa mu bibbubbu, ebyʼabaatu cikumi cikumi, ebindi amahumi ataanu ataanu.
41006041	Nga Yesu aŋamba emigaati jira etaanu nʼenyeeni ebiri, ngʼagangamusa emoni aheja mwigulu, nga geyaasa Hatonda. Ngʼaŋo abbwagabbwaga mu migaati ejo, ajiŋa abeegi babe bagabire abaatu. Nenyeeni jira ebiri joosi ngʼajigaba hiisi muutu afuna.
41006042	Ngʼabaatu abo bosibosi balya beeguta.
41006043	Ngʼaŋo abeegi bahumbaania obukukumuhira wʼemigaati nʼenyeeni ebyasigalaho nga bejusa ebisero ehumi nabibiri.
41006044	Abaatu abaalya baali abasinde ekumi etaanu.
41006045	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo Yesu alagira abeegi babe baniine eryato batangirengamo bambuhe enyanja, batiine e Bbesusayida, niye nʼahiseebula abaatu.
41006046	Ni gahena ohubaseebula, ngʼatiina hu lusozi ohusaba.
41006047	Aŋa hiirema hyaŋambira, abeegi babe baali mu lyato ŋagati mu nyanja, aye Yesu niye nʼali yeŋene hu woomu.
41006048	Yesu ni gaali eyo ngʼalengera abeegi babe ni bafaabiina ohugimba eryato nʼemiiho, olwʼepunga eyaali ni baŋwa emutwe. Ni waali ni bunatere ohuhya, gatiina eyi baali nʼagenda hu maaji. Era gatiina oti hani genda ohubabitamo.
41006049	Ne nibo ni bamubona nʼagenda hu maaji, nga baŋeega baati himalyo nga benianguha,
41006050	olwʼobuti owaali ni bubaŋambire bosibosi ni bamubona. Aŋo ni naaŋo nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Ndiise, mugume mutatya!”
41006051	Ngʼahena gengira mu lyato omu baali ngʼepunga eteeha. Hino hyatangalasa abeegi babe bugali,
41006052	olwohuba baali bahiiri humutegeera wayire nga gaali aholire ehyamaliholiho ehyʼohwasa emigaati. Ehyaleeta hino myoyo jaawe huba mihahanyafu.
41006053	Ni bambuha enyanja, nga boola mu hitahere ehi balanga baati Genesareeti nga baŋwa mu lyato balihwesa balireeta hwigenya.
41006054	Baali bahaŋwa baati mu lyato, ngʼabaatu abaali aŋo bahitegeera baati nje Yesu.
41006055	Ni bamufaania nga baduluma betoloola hiisi ŋaatu mu hitundu ehyo ni basima hu baali nʼabalwaye babaŋira ni babagegeeye hu misigaasiga eyi baŋuliranga baati peyi Yesu ali.
41006056	Hiisi ŋaatu aŋa gatiinanga, hamube mu hyalo oba mu bibuga, abaatu batanga abalwaye baawe mu bifo ebihumbaania baatu, nomu bifo ebindi hyomu akisoni, nga bamwegalihira aganye abalwaye baŋambeho buŋambe hu gemo lyʼehyambalo hihye. Era hiisi owamuŋambangaho, ngʼaŋona.
41007001	Ŋaahani ŋaaliŋo balala hu Bafalisaayo nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi ga Hatonda abaŋwa e Yerusaalemu abahumbaanira aŋa Yesu gaali.
41007002	Baali bahiiri aŋo nga babona balala hu beegi ba Yesu ni balya ni batehereeye husaaba mu ngalo mu ngeri eyʼohwegwalaasa ngʼolu obulombolombo bwawe obwʼEhiyudaaya bwali ni bubetagisa ohuhola.
41007003	Abayudaaya bosibosi ko weyite Abafalisaayo, balondereranga ahalombolombo hʼabasehulu baawe ahʼohutalya ni bahiiri husaaba mu ngalo mu ngeri eyʼohwegwalaasa.
41007004	Era ni baŋwanga mu butale sibalyanga ni batehereeye husaaba mu ngeri eyo. Baali nʼobulombolombo obundi bungi obu balondereranga nga pomuli ahohwosa ebihopo, enywero, nʼembya ejʼebihomo eji batambisanga mu ngeri eyʼohubigwalaasa ngʼolu obulombolombo bwawe bwali ni bubaloma.
41007005	Ngʼaŋo Abafalisaayo abo nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi aba baali ni nabo babuusa Yesu baati, “Lwahiina abeegi babo sibahola ngʼolu obulombolombo wʼabasehulu beefe butuloma, aye baalya nʼengalo eji batehereeye husaaba?”
41007006	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Banafuusi enywe, ehibono hya Hatonda ehi naabbi Yisaaya gabalomaho hituufu olu galoma ati, “ ‘Abaatu bano baapa eŋono lya hu munwa, aye emyoyo jaawe jipumaho.
41007007	Era banjumirya byahwehenahenaho, olwohuba ebibono obubono ebyʼabaatu, mbebi baŋira ohuba amagambi gange.’
41007008	“Kale mu ngeri oyo, muleherera egambi lya Hatonda, mwaŋamba bulombolombo wʼabaatu.”
41007009	Ngʼameedaho abaloma ati, “Olwo ko muŋeega mbo muhola hiraŋi ohuleha ohuŋamba egambi lya Hatonda mwahola ebi bulombolombo wenywe bubaloma.
41007010	Ale Musa galoma ati, ‘Ŋanga lataawo ni maawo eŋono.’ Era ati, ‘Anaduhenga semwana oba nyina, bali nʼohumwita.’
41007011	Aye enywe muloma muuti singa omuutu aloma semwana oba nyina ati ehi gahamuŋaaye ngʼobuyeedi, hyafuuha Korubbani (amahulu gaahyo ti hiŋonge eyiri Hatonda),
41007012	olwo muba simuhimwihirisa hubaaho nʼehiitu hyosi ehi aholera semwana oba nyina.
41007013	Mu ngeri eyo nga mudibya ehibono hya Hatonda ni musomesa obulombolombo wenywe. Era nʼebindi bingi ebyʼengeri eyo ebi muhola.”
41007014	Nga nindi Yesu alanga ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu hitiina aŋa gaali. Ngʼabaloma ati, “Mutegere ohutwi, era mutegeere ehi nja ohuloma.
41007015	Ebi muutu alya sinje ebimwonoona, ohutusaho ebiŋwa mu mwoyo gugwe.
41007016	Ali nʼohutwi ohuŋulira, ale aŋulire.”
41007017	Ni galeha aŋo ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu abo gengira mu nyumba ngʼabeegi babe bamubuusa amahulu gʼehi gaali nʼalomire.
41007018	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Koni mwesi simufaania? Simumanyire muuti omuutu ebi alya sinje ebimwonoona?
41007019	Ebi olya sibingira mu mwoyo gugwo, aye bitiina mu hida, omu biŋwa byatula.” (Mu huloma atyo Yesu gaali ataaho enjihiso ngʼolu hiisi ehiriiwa hiri hiraŋi.)
41007020	Ngʼaŋo ameedaho ati, “Ebitula ohuŋwa mu mwoyo gwʼomuutu njʼebimwonoona,
41007021	olwohuba mu mwoyo gwʼomuutu po muŋwa ebiŋeego ebibi, ohuba wʼemoni enyangu, owiibi, obutemu, obuhwedi,
41007022	ohwegomba, obubi obwa hiisi ngeri; obudulingi, ohwetyolonga, omwoyo ogwʼekirihindi, obuŋesi, ohwebona, nʼobuŋwituhi.
41007023	Ebibi ebyo byosibyosi njʼebyonoona omuutu olwohuba biŋwa mu mwoyo gugwe.”
41007024	Yesu ni gaaŋwa aŋo, ngʼatiina nʼabeegi babe mu hitahere ehirirene ehibuga hyʼe Tiiro. Ni goola eyo nga ŋabaaŋo amago aga gengiramo mu kweho nʼatenda baatu bamanye, cooka ndihiŋangiha.
41007025	Ŋaaliŋo omuhasi owaali nʼahahaana hahe ni haliho omusambwa cooka nʼaŋulira ati Yesu ali mu mago ago, gatiina aŋa gaali ngʼahoma ekumbo mu moni jije, amusunga abbinge omusambwa hu haana hahe.
41007026	Omuhasi oyo gaali Muyonaani ni bamusaala e Foyiniki mu hyalo hyʼe Siriya.
41007027	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Leha abaana beherere ohulya begute, olwohuba sihiraŋi ohuŋamba ebiryo byʼabaana wabidanyira embwa jaawe.”
41007028	Ngʼomuhasi oyo amuloma ati, “Musengwa pohiri. Aye nʼembwa joosi ni jiba ŋaasi wʼemeeza ohu baana baliira, jirya obukukumuhira.”
41007029	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Olwʼebibono ebi olomire, yagamayo engo omuhaana wuwo omusambwa gumuŋooyeho.”
41007030	Ngʼaŋo omuhasi oyo gagamayo engo gagaana omuhaana wuwe nʼalambaaye hu buliri, omusambwa ni gumuŋooyeho.
41007031	Yesu ni gaŋwa mu hitahere ehirirene ehibuga Tiiro nga nindi aŋamba olugendo atiina hu nyanja Galilaaya, nʼabitira mu hibuga hyʼe Sidoni nʼomu matwale gʼe Dekapooli.
41007032	Nga ŋabaaŋo abaatu abaŋira eyi ali omusinde owaali kasiru nʼataŋulira, bamwegalihira amuŋambeho aŋone.
41007033	Ngʼaŋo Yesu atusa omusinde oyo mu hiŋindi hyʼabaatu, amuŋira hu tulo, ngʼamuta enjala mu matwi, afuuja amate amuŋamba hu lulimi.
41007034	Ngʼagangamusa emoni aheja mwigulu ahena giisa omuuya, amuloma ati, “Efata!” Amahulu gaahyo ti, “Yiguha!”
41007035	Ngʼaŋo amatwi gʼomusinde oyo geguha, nʼehyali ni himusidihire olulimi hiwoŋoloha ngʼatandiha ohuloma bulaŋi.
41007036	Nga Yesu ahamiirisa abaatu abaaliŋo, ehi baweene batahiromeraho abaatu abandi. Cooka aŋa gahoma ohubahamiirisa, paŋa bahoma nʼohwerebulira hiisi muutu.
41007037	Bosibosi abahiŋulira, beŋunja bugali nga baloma baati, “Hiisi ehi ahola ahihola bulaŋi. Obona geegula amatwi gʼabataŋulira baŋulira nʼabakasiru gabawoŋolola olulimi basobola ohuloma!”
41008001	Olwola mu biro ebyene ebyo, nga nindi oguŋindi gwʼabaatu guhumbaanira aŋaali Yesu. Ŋaahani abaatu abo ebiryo ni byali ni bibaŋoyeho, ngʼaŋo Yesu alanga abeegi babe batiine aŋa gaali abaloma ati,
41008002	“Abaatu bano bapambya ehisa, olwohuba babaaye ŋano ni neese endaalo edatu kwiye aye ŋaahani baŋuma hyʼohulya.
41008003	Singa mbaseebula baagameyo ewaawe enjala nʼebaluma, bahanda bagwa hu ngira ate abandi hu bo baŋwera ŋaleeŋi.”
41008004	Aye abeegi babe nga bamugobolamo baati, “Mu hifo ehiduleere hino omuutu aŋanga hutusa ŋeena ebiryo ebiŋanga ohuliisa abaatu bano bosibosi?”
41008005	Nga niye ababuusa ati, “Muliŋo nʼemigaati jinga?” Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Musanvu.”
41008006	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma abaatu behale ŋaasi. Ngʼabugula emigaati ejo omusanvu geyaasa Hatonda, ngʼajibbwagabbwagamo ahena ajiŋa abeegi babe bajigabire abaatu. Nga boosi bahola ngʼolu gabaloma.
41008007	Abeegi ba Yesu era baaliŋo nʼobuyeeni budidiri. Bwoosi, Yesu ni gahena ohweyaasa Hatonda ngʼabaloma babugabire abaatu.
41008008	Ngʼabaatu balya beguta. Ni bahena ohulya ngʼabeegi babe bahumbaania obukukumuhira owasigalaŋo, nga bwijula ebisero musanvu.
41008009	Abaatu abagaliisa baali baŋera ekumi ene. Ni bahena ohulya, nga Yesu abaseebula.
41008010	Ni gahena ganiina eryato nʼabeegi babe bambuha enyanja Galilaaya, nga batiina mu hitundu ehyʼe Dalumanuta.
41008011	Ngʼaŋo ŋabaaŋo balala hu Bafalisaayo abatiina eyiri Yesu nga batandiha ohumujojoberesa ni bamuloma abaŋe ahabonero ahalaga haati obuŋangi obu gaali ni nabwo gabutusa yiri Hatonda. Hino bahihola olwʼohwenda humuhema.
41008012	Yesu ni gaŋulira ebibono byawe, nga bimulumya omwoyo, nga geesa omuuya ahena abaloma ati, “Lwahiina abaatu bʼomulembe guno basunga ahabonero aheŋunjisa? Mbalomera ehituufu ti ŋaŋuma habonero ahabanahabaŋe.”
41008013	Ngʼaŋo abaleha aŋo, nindi aniina eryato gambuha gagameyo engereha wʼenyanja.
41008014	Mu lugendo luno, abeegi ba Yesu baali bebiriiye ohuwoŋa ebiryo ebihena ohutusaho omugaati omulala ogu baali ni nagwo mu lyato.
41008015	Ni baali ni batiina nga Yesu abaloma mu lugero nʼabalabula ati, “Mwegenderese, mwehuume batabadulinga nʼehisimbulusa hyʼAbafalisaayo nʼehya habaha Herode.”
41008016	Nga nibo begeyamo abeene nʼabeene baati, “Alomire atyo olwohuba ndihuwoŋa ebiryo ebihena!”
41008017	Aye Yesu ni gamanya ehi baali ni begeyamo ngʼababuusa ati, “Lwahiina muŋeega hu hyʼohuŋuma biryo ebihena? Nʼohwosa haati muhiiri hufaania era mutategeera? Emyoyo jenywe jihiiri mihahanyafu?
41008018	Muli nʼemoni, aye sijibona? Era muli nʼamatwi aye sigaŋulira? Simuhebulira?
41008019	Olu nabbwaga mu migaati etaanu nagabira abaatu ekumi etaanu, mwahumbaania ebisero byʼobukukumuhira ebijufu binga?” Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Ehumi nabibiri.”
41008020	Nga nindi ababuusa ati, “Ate olu nabbwaga mu migaati omusanvu nagabira abaatu ekumi ene, mwahumbaania ebisero byʼobukukumuhira ebijufu binga?” Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Ebisero musanvu.”
41008021	Ngʼaŋo ababuusa ati, “Nʼohwosa haati muhiiri hutegeera ehi ndomire?”
41008022	Ngʼaŋo Yesu nʼabeegi babe boola mu hibuga ehi balanga baati Bbesusayida. Nga ŋabaaŋo abaatu abaŋira omusinde omuŋofu eyi ali bamwegalihira amuŋambeho gahaŋona.
41008023	Nga Yesu aŋamba omusinde oyo omuŋofu hu muhono, amutusa ebulafu wʼahabuga aho. Ni boola eyo ngʼafuuja hu moni jʼomuŋofu, amuŋamba hu moni, nga ko amubuusa ati, “Obona?”
41008024	Omuŋofu ni galimbula gaamoga ngʼamugobolamo ati, “Mbona abaatu abagenda aye baafanira hyʼemisaala.”
41008025	Nga nindi Yesu gongera ohumuŋamba hu moni, omusinde oyo ni galimbula gahaŋaasa, ngʼemoni jije jirimbuha abona hiisi hiitu bulaŋi.
41008026	Ngʼaŋo Yesu amuseebula gagameyo ewaawe nʼamuloma ati, “Otagamayo mu habuga aho.”
41008027	Ngʼaŋo Yesu atiina nʼabeegi babe mu bitahere ebirirene ehibuga ehi balanga baati Kayisaaliya ehya Filipi. Ni baali ni batiina, nga Yesu abuusa abeegi babe ati, “Abaatu bandanga baatye?”
41008028	Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Ŋaliŋo abaloma baati ndiiwe Yowaane Omubatiza. Abandi baati ndiiwe naabbi Eriya, ate abandi baati oli mulala hu banaabbi.”
41008029	Ngʼaŋo ababuusa ati, “Ne enywe muloma muuti ndiise ani?” Nga Peetero amugobolamo ati, “Ndiiwe Kurisito oyu Hatonda gafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu.”
41008030	Nga Yesu abahamiirisa ehi Peetero alomire batahiromeraho muutu yesiyesi.
41008031	Ngʼaŋo Yesu atandiha ohubasomesa ngʼolu Omwana wʼOmuutu ali nʼohubonaabona bugali, era abaatu abahulu mu gwanga, nʼabatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda, nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi bamwegaane. Era bamwite aye oluvanyuma lwʼendaalo edatu, aliramuha.
41008032	Bino gabibaloma butereefu natabbumbirya. Ehyaŋwamo nga Peetero aŋira Yesu hu tulo ngʼamuhayula olwʼohuloma ebibono hyʼebyo.
41008033	Cooka Yesu ni gacuuha gaaheja egongo, gahubba emoni hu beegi babe abandi, ngʼahayula Peetero ati, “Pwe mu moni, oli Sitaani! Sooli huŋeega hu mulimo gwa Hatonda ogwandeeta, aye oli huŋeega hu byʼabaatu!”
41008034	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, nga Yesu alanga abaatu abaali ohuupi aŋo ko nʼabeegi babe besende aŋa gaali ngʼabaloma ati, “Hiisi muutu owenda ohuba omuloobera wange, ateehwa ohwefiirisa byosibyosi abe muheneerefu ohubbeeda omusalabba gugwe era agende ni neese.
41008035	Hino kiroma olwohuba hiisi oweheneerera obulamu buwe, alibufiirwa, aye hiisi afiirwa obulamu buwe hu lwange nʼolwa Maŋuliro Amalaŋi alibunoŋola.
41008036	“Ale higasa hiina omuutu ohuba nʼobuŋinda bwʼohu hyalo huno bwosibwosi, aye gafiirwa obulamu buwe?
41008037	Ale dala ŋaliŋo ehi omuutu aŋanga ohuŋayo ko gagobosaŋo obulamu buwe ni buba ni buhenire ohugota?
41008038	Hiisi oyu esoni jiŋamba olwʼese nʼolwehibono hyange nʼali mu baatu abʼomulembe guno omubi ogwawuhana hu Hatonda, nʼOmwana wʼOmuutu yeesi alimwegaana olu aligobolera mu ŋono lya Semwana nʼabamalayika abagwalaafu ni bamuŋerehera.”
41009001	Ngʼaŋo Yesu geyongera ohubaloma ati, “Mbalomera ehituufu ti ŋaliŋo abandi hu enywe abemereeye ŋano, abatalifa ohutusaho ni bahenire ohubona Obuŋugi bwa Hatonda ni buujire nʼamaani.”
41009002	Ni ŋabitaŋo endaalo mukaaga, nga Yesu atiina ni Peetero, Yakobbo, ni Yowaane mu kweho abatangirira baja baniina hu olusozi olwegingihiriri. Ni boola eyo, abeegi babe abo bali baheja ngʼefaani yiye yicuuha ngʼafaana lundi.
41009003	Ebyambalo bibye nga bimeregenya, bipepya bugali ni ŋaŋuma kadi mulala hu hyalo owaali nʼasobola ohubyosa gabituhusa ohwaga aŋo.
41009004	Ngʼaŋo babona abanaabbi ba Hatonda Eriya ni Musa ni baŋaya ni Yesu.
41009005	Nga Peetero aloma Yesu ati, “Musomesa, hiraŋi ti efe huli ŋano. Leha hutongoleŋo ebitiira bidatu. Hirala hibe hihyo, ehindi hya Musa, nʼehindi hyʼEriya.”
41009006	Peetero galoma atyo olwohuba niye nʼabahye baali batiiye bugali ni bahaya nʼehyohuloma.
41009007	Nga ŋabaaŋo ehireri ehyaja hyabawiiha nʼehisisigo hyahyo, era ngʼejanjaasi liŋwera mu hireri ehyo ni ŋaliŋo aloma ati, “Ono njʼOmwana wange omuhoda, muŋulirise ebi abaloma.”
41009008	Abeegi babe ni bagangamuha, sibabona muutu wundi ali ni nabo, ohutusaho Yesu yeŋene.
41009009	Ni baali ni baniinuha ohuŋwa hu lusozi, nga Yesu abahamiirisa ati, “Ebi muweene mutabiromeraho muutu wundi, ohwola olu Omwana wʼOmuutu aliramuha.”
41009010	Era boosi nga bagondera ehi gabaloma, ni bebuusa abeene nʼabeene baati, “Ategehiise hiina nʼalomire hu hulamuha?”
41009011	Ngʼaŋo bamubuusa baati, “Lwahiina abasomesa bʼamagambi ga Hatonda baloma baati naabbi Eriya ali nʼohweheerera ohugobola ko Kurisito gaaje?”
41009012	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Hituufu, Eriya ali nʼohweheerera ohugobola atereese emyoyo jʼabaatu. Aye lwahiina hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti Omwana wʼOmuutu ateehwa ohuboneresebwa bugali, era abaatu bamwegaane?
41009013	Aye mbalomera ti Eriya gahena hale ohuuja, era abaatu bamuhola byosibyosi ebi bendire, ngʼolu ebyaŋandiihiwa byamulomaho.”
41009014	Yesu nʼabeegi babe abadatu ni baŋwa hu lusozi, nga bagaana ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ni betolooye abeegi babe abandi, era abasomesa bʼamagambi ga Hatonda ni bali huhubba ni nabo embaha.
41009015	Abaatu ni bahubba emoni hu Yesu nga basangaala bugali, nga baduluma ohutiina eyi ali ohumusangaalira.
41009016	Nga Yesu abuusa abeegi babe ati, “Hiina ehi muli huhubba embaha ni nabo?”
41009017	Mulala mu hiŋindi hyʼabaatu abaali aŋo ngʼamugobolamo ati, “Omusomesa, kuleteeye musaani yange aliho omusambwa ogumugaana ohuloma.
41009018	Hiisi olu gumubanda gumuhubba ehigo, ngʼatumbeera efulo mu munwa, galuma ameeno, era nga gumuŋandalasa. Sungire abeegi babo ohugumubbingaho aye nga bibahaya.”
41009019	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Enywe abaatu bʼomulembe guno abaŋuma hufugiirira, ndihena ni nenywe ahamanga ahaaga hatye ko mube nʼohufugiirira, ndyosa ŋeena ohubehaliiriha? Mundeetere ŋano omuseere.”
41009020	Ngʼaŋo bamumuŋirira. Omusambwa ni gwabona Yesu, aŋo ni naaŋo nga gubanda omuseere, gumujugumisa, gumuhubba ehigo gegalangusa, nʼatumba efulo mu munwa.
41009021	Nga Yesu abuusa semwana yʼomuseere oyo ati, “Omusambwa guno gumuhenireho hamanga hi?” Nga niye agobolamo ati, “Ohuŋwera erala mu buŋere buwe.
41009022	Era efunda nyingi gubaaye gumudanyanga mu muliro, oba mu maaji, gumwite. Cooka nʼoba nʼoŋanga tuŋambire ehisasabirisi, otuyeede.”
41009023	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Olomire oti nimba ni panga? Manyire ti byosibyosi bisoboha, omuutu anaba nʼohufugiirira.”
41009024	Ngʼaŋo semwana yʼomuseere agobolamo ni gekakaba ati, “Fugiirira, ohutusaho ti Musengwa njeede, mu hufugiirira hwange tabamo hwemoota!”
41009025	Yesu ni gabona eduuli lyʼabaatu abandi ni baduluma ni batiina aŋa gaali ngʼahayuhira omusambwa ati, “Musambwawe ogusiriŋasa era ogutaloma kulagira ohuŋwa hu museere oyo, era soomugobolangaho nindi.”
41009026	Nga wangewe omusambwa ogwo gujugumisa omuseere ebyembaha ebyene, nʼohwiteera nga pohu gutaaye nga ko gumuŋwaho gumuleha nʼajalaaye hyʼafuuye. Abahira obungi hu baaliŋo beboneraho nga baloma baati, “Afuuye!”
41009027	Aye Yesu ngʼamuŋamba hu muhono amwinyosa, nga gemeerera.
41009028	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, Yesu ni gengira mu nyumba, ngʼabeegi babe bamubuusa baati, “Lwahiina ndihusobola hubbinga omusambwa ogwo hu museere?”
41009029	Nga niye abagobolamo ati, “Omusambwa ogwʼengeri yino sigubbingiha hu muutu aŋabula husaba.”
41009030	Ngʼaŋo Yesu nʼabeegi babe baŋwa mu hitahere ehyo nga batiina ni babitira mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya. Yesu sigendire abaatu abandi ohumanya aŋa ali,
41009031	olwohuba gaali gegeresa abeegi babe nʼabaloma ati, “Omwana wʼOmuutu baja humuŋaayo eyiri abaatu bamwite, aye ni baliba ni bahenire ohumwita, ŋalibitaŋo endaalo edatu ngʼalamuha.”
41009032	Cooka sibategeera ehi gabaloma, era baatya nʼohumubuusa.
41009033	Ngʼaŋo Yesu nʼabeegi babe boola mu hibuga hyʼe Kaperanawumu. Ni bengira mu nyumba, nga Yesu abuusa abeegi babe ati, “Muŋahenenga hu hiina mu ngira?”
41009034	Aye nga nibo esoni jibaŋamba baŋoleera huŋoleera, olwohuba mu ngira baali baŋahene ni bebuusa njʼani hu bo ahira ohuba owʼeŋono.
41009035	Nga Yesu gehala alanga abeegi babe ehumi nʼababiri begerere aŋa ali. Ngʼabaloma ati, “Hiisi owenda ohuba owʼeŋono, ali nʼohweherera geyise afuuhe muŋeeresa wa basigaayeŋo bosibosi.”
41009036	Ngʼaŋo aŋamba omwana omuŋere owaali aŋaapi, amwemeeresa ŋagati waawe. Ngʼamufumberera, ahena abaloma ati,
41009037	“Hiisi asangaalira omwana omuŋere hyʼono hu lwange, aba asangaliiye ndiise. Nindi hiisi owusangalira ese, aba saasangaalira ndiise, aye aba asangaliiye oyo owaatuma.”
41009038	Ngʼaŋo mulala hu beegi babe oyu balanga Yowaane aloma Yesu ati, “Omusomesa, hwaweene omuutu nʼabbinga emisambwa hu baatu nʼatambisa esiina liryo, efe nga humuloma alehere aŋo olwohuba simulobera wuwo hyefe.”
41009039	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Simugesyangaho ohulobera omuutu hyʼoyo, olwohuba hiisi muutu ahola ebyamaliholiho nʼatambisa obuŋangi obuli mu siina lyange, saaŋanga hwefudula mu hamanga ahatotono gandomaho bubi.
41009040	Hiisi atatusoosa, saaba mulabe weefe.
41009041	Mbalomera ehituufu ti hiisi abaŋa omwendo gwʼamaaji ohunywa olwohuba muli baloobera bange, mu buli ngeri Hatonda alimusasula.
41009042	“Era omuutu yesiyesi aleetera mulala hu baŋere bano abafugiirira ohubbenga, aŋoomera humusidiha ogubaale ogusito mu mamiro, bamudanya mu buliba.
41009043	Olwʼehyo hanye muhono gugwo njʼoguhuleetera ohwonoona, gutemeeho. Hiraŋi obe wʼomuhono mulala aye osune obulamu obutaŋwaŋo ohuhira olu osigasa emihono jombi aye bahudanya mu hifo omu oja husihiiriha,
41009044	omuli omuliro ogutasima, era omutaŋwa enyende.
41009045	“Era hanye hugulu huhwo njʼohuhuleetera ohuhola ehibi hutemeeho. Hiraŋi osune obulamu obutaŋwaŋo nʼoli muleme, ohuhira olu osigasa amagulu gombi, aye bahudanya mu hifo omu oja husihiiriha,
41009046	omuli omuliro ogutasima, era omutaŋwa enyende.
41009047	“Era hanye emoni yiyo ehuleetera ohuhola ehibi yomoleemo. Hiraŋi obe wa moni ndala aye wingire mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda, ohuhira olu osigasa emoni jombi, aye bahudanya mu hifo omu oja husihiirihira,
41009048	omuli omuliro ogutasima, era omutaŋwa enyende.
41009049	“Ngʼolu ebiryo babitamo omunyu byabamo obunoli, abafugiirira bosibosi balibita mu hyobo hya Hatonda gabaŋwanamo omuliro ohubalongoosa.
41009050	Omunyu omuherehe gwa mugaso, aye gunafuuha heresu, oŋanga otye ohugugobosamo obunoli? Olwʼehyo esambo jenywe jibemo obunoli hyʼomunyu, era muholaganenga.”
41010001	Yesu ni gaŋwa e Kaperanawumu, ngʼatiina mu twale lyʼe Buyudaaya, nga gambuha olwabi Yoludaani atiina mu bitahere ebyʼengereha wʼolwabi. Nga nindi ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu hihumbaanira aŋa ali, era ngʼolu yaali esambo yiye ngʼatandiha ohubasomesa.
41010002	Ngʼaŋo balala hu Bafalisaayo batiina aŋa gaali bamubuusa ni bamuhema baati, “Hihirisiwa omusinde ohubbinga omuhasi wuwe?”
41010003	Niye ngʼabagobolamo ati, “Musa omuhwenda wa Hatonda gabalagira atye?”
41010004	Nga baloma baati, “Musa gafugiirira omusinde abbinga omuhasi wuwe, ohumuŋa ebbaluŋa ehahasa yiiti amubbingire.”
41010005	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Musa gabateeraŋo ehiragiro ehyo lwʼobuhahanyafu wʼemyoyo jenywe,
41010006	aye ebyaŋandiihiwa biroma biiti ohuŋwa hutandiha yʼehyalo, ‘Hatonda gawumba omusinde nʼomuhasi.’
41010007	Olwʼehyo omusinde analehenga semwana ni nyina, nga geŋimba nʼomuhasi wuwe,
41010008	nga bombi bafuuha mubiri mulala. Olwo nga sibahiiri babiri, wabula mulala.
41010009	Kale omuutu saaŋimbululanga ehi Hatonda gaŋimba ŋalala.”
41010010	Ni gaŋwa mu baatu gengira mu nyumba nʼabeegi babe, abeegi nga bamuloma gongere ohubanyonyola hu songa yʼohubbinga omuhasi.
41010011	Ngʼaŋo abaloma ati, “Hiisi abbinga omuhasi wuwe, ngʼahena aleeta owundi, aba aholire obuhwedi.
41010012	Era singa omuhasi anoba hu wamwe, gahena gasuna obufumbo obundi, aba aholire obuhwedi.”
41010013	Lulala ŋaaliŋo abaatu abaŋira abaana abaŋere eyiri Yesu abaŋambeho abalombere ekabi, aye abeegi babe nga babahayula hubahayula.
41010014	Yesu ni gabona ehi abeegi babe bahola, ngʼabaluŋira, abaloma ati, “Mulehe abaana abaŋere baaje eyi ndi. Mutabagaana, olwohuba abaatu abali hyʼabo, mbʼabengira mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda.
41010015	Mbalomera ehituufu ti hiisi muutu ateesiga Hatonda hyʼomwana omuŋere ngʼolu geesiga abasaaye babe, saalingira mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda.”
41010016	Ngʼaŋo alera abaana abo abaŋere, ngʼabaŋambaho abasabira ekabi.
41010017	Nindi Yesu ni gatandiha olugendo lulwe, nga ŋabaaŋo omusinde owaduluma gatiina eyi gaali ngʼahubba amafuha mu moni jije, ngʼamubuusa ati, “Omusomesa omulaŋi, kole hi ko sune obulamu obutaŋwaŋo?”
41010018	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Wema huhi ohunanga omulaŋi ate nga ŋaŋuma mulaŋi ohutusaho Hatonda yeŋene?
41010019	Omanyire ebiragiro bya Hatonda ebiroma biiti; ‘Siwitanga muutu, sooholanga buhwedi, siwibanga, otabeŋeranga muutu ehi ataholire, otalyahanga byabeene, oŋanga lataawo ni maawo eŋono?’ ”
41010020	Omusinde oyo ngʼagobola mu Yesu ati, “Omusomesa, ohuŋwera erala mu buŋere wange nʼohwosa haati ebiragiro ebyo byosibyosi mbyoheresa.”
41010021	Nga Yesu alengerera omusinde oyo ngʼamusasira. Ngʼamuloma ati, “Ohibuliraho ehiitu hirala. Tiina otunde ebibyo byosibyosi, ebbeesa ejinaŋwemo ojigabire abagadi, ko ohene wuuje obe muloobera wange, olisuna obuŋinda mwigulu.”
41010022	Omusinde oyo ni gaŋulira ebyo gaŋulyana, era gaŋwaŋo nʼawomboŋaaye olwohuba gaali nʼobuŋinda obwene obungi.
41010023	Nga Yesu getoloosa abaaliŋo emoni, ngʼahena aloma abeegi babe ati, “Nga hiriba higosi abaŋinda ohwingira mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda!”
41010024	Ngʼabeegi babe beŋunja ebibono bibye ebyo era ngʼobuti wubaŋamba. Cooka nindi nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Baana enywe, nga higosi omuŋinda ohwingira mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda!
41010025	Hyangu bugali weene engamiya ohubita mu ŋundu lyʼepiso, ohuhira omuŋinda ohwingira mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda!”
41010026	Ngʼaŋo ehyo ko hyongerera erala ohweŋunjisa abeegi babe, nga bamubuusa baati, “Olwo ŋaahani njʼani aŋanga ohunoŋoha?”
41010027	Nga Yesu abalengerera ahena abaloma ati, “Eyiri abaatu, higosi ohwenoŋola aye eyiri Hatonda ebiitu byosibyosi bisoboha era ŋabula ehimuhaya.”
41010028	Ngʼaŋo Peetero aloma Yesu ati, “Efe hwaleha ebyefe byosibyosi, nga huuja hube baloobera babo.”
41010029	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Mbalomera ehituufu ti ŋaŋuma muutu owaleha amago gage, oba abaganda babe, oba ababoojo, oba nyina, oba semwana, oba abaana babe, oba omuŋuluko gugwe, hu lwange nʼolwa Maŋuliro Amalaŋi,
41010030	atalisuna mu bulamu buno owʼohu hyalo, emirundi cikumi ejʼebyo ebi gafiirwa: amago, abaganda babe, ababoojo, abasaaye babe, abahasi, abaana, omuŋuluko, ohwo taaho nʼohumuŋalaana. Era mu biseera ebyomu moni, alisuna nʼobulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
41010031	Aye bangi hu begingihiriri mu hiseera hino abaliba abaŋaasi, nindi bangi hu baŋaasi mu hiseera hino abaliba abegingihiriri.”
41010032	Ŋaahani Yesu nʼaba gaali ni nabo baali mu lugendo, ni batiina mu hibuga hyʼe Yerusaalemu. Yesu gaali abatangiriyemo, nʼabalehireŋo ahamanga. Hino nga hyeŋunjisa abeegi babe nga hiŋa nʼabaatu abandi abaali ni babaŋwaho egongo obuti. Nga geeta amagulu abeegi babe ehumi nʼababiri bamwolaho. Nga nindi abagobosa hu tulo, atandiha ohubalomera ebyali ni bija humwolaho.
41010033	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Huli hutiina e Yerusaalemu; eyo baja hulya mu Mwana wʼOmuutu oluhwe bahene bamuŋeyo eyiri abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda, nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi. Era baja humusalira ogwʼohufa, era bamuŋeyo eyiri abalugendwa.
41010034	Abo nibo baja humujeherera, bahene bamufujeho agate, bamuhubbe efaalu, era bamwite. Ni ŋalibitaŋo endaalo edatu, aliramuha.”
41010035	Ngʼaŋo Yakobbo ni Yowaane, abasaani ba Zebbedaayo, bolerera Yesu, bamuloma baati, “Omusomesa, hwenda otuholere ehiitu hyosihyosi ehi hunahulombe.”
41010036	Nga Yesu ababuusa ati, “Mwenda mbaholere hi?”
41010037	Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Nʼonahehale hu tebe eyʼeŋono mu buŋugi buwo, hwenda oganye hwihale huhulirane, mulala hu muhono gugwo omulungi, nʼowundi hu mugooda.”
41010038	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Ehi musunga simuhitegeera. Muŋanga ohunywa hu hihopo ehyʼohubonaabona ehi nja hunywa, oba ohubatiziwa ohwʼohweyiniha mu hubonaabona ohu nja hubatiziwa?”
41010039	Nga nibo bamugobolamo baati, “Husobola.” Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Hituufu mwesi mulinywa hu hihopo ehyʼohubonaabona ehi nja hunywaho, era mulibatiziwa mu ngeri eyi nja hubatiziwamo.
41010040	Aye ehyʼohwihala ni mundirene hu muhono omulungi oba omugooda, si ndiise ahigaba. Ebifo ebyo, omwene alibiŋa abo aba gabitegehera.”
41010041	Abeegi bahyawe ehumi ni baŋulira ehi Yakobbo ni Yowaane basungire, nga babaluŋira.
41010042	Olwʼehyo nga Yesu abalanga bosibosi baje bahumbaanire aŋa ali. Ngʼabaloma ati, “Mumanyire muuti abaŋugi bʼAbatali Bayudaaya benda babaŋeerese era abatangirisi baawe benda abaatu aba baŋuga bamanye baati babaliho obuŋangi.
41010043	Aye sihiri nʼohuba hiityo eyiri enywe. Mu nywe, hiisi owenda ohuba omuhulu, ali nʼohuba muŋeeresa wʼabahye,
41010044	era hiisi owenda ohuba omutangirisi, ali nʼohuba mwidu wa basigaayeŋo.
41010045	“NʼOmwana wʼOmuutu sigaaja bamuŋeerese aye niiye ohuŋeeresa, era nʼohuŋayo obulamu buwe ohuba endiŋi ohununula abaatu oluhulende.”
41010046	Ngʼaŋo Yesu nʼabeegi babe, nʼoguŋindi gwʼabaatu abaali ni bamulonda, boola mu hibuga e Yeriko. Eyo yaaliyo omusinde omuŋofu owehalanga hu ngira nʼasungirisa. Omusinde oyo baali bamulanga baati Bbarutimaayo (amahulu gesiina eryo baati omusaani wa Timaayo). Yesu nʼaba gaali ni nabo ni baali ni batula ehibuga, nga bagaana omusinde oyo omuŋofu ni gehaaye hu tulo wʼengira.
41010047	Bbarutimaayo ni gaŋulira ati Yesu Omunazaleesi njʼabitaŋo, ngʼatandiha ohulangirira nʼaloma ati, “Yesu Omwijuhulu wa Dawudi, pambire ehisa!”
41010048	Nga bangi hu baatu abomu hiŋindi bamuhayula ni bamuloma aŋoleere. Cooka niye nga gegumya hwegumya ohulangirira ati, “Mwijuhulu wa Dawudi, pambire ehisa!”
41010049	Ngʼaŋo Yesu geema, aloma ati, “Mumulange gaaje.” Nga bamulanga bamuloma baati, “Guma omwoyo, yinyoha ahulanga.”
41010050	Ngʼaŋo adanya ehihooti ehi gaalimo, genyoha mangu, atiina aŋali Yesu.
41010051	Nga Yesu amubuusa ati, “Wenda kuholere hiina?” Ngʼomuŋofu amugobolamo ati, “Musomesa, njigule emoni, mbone.”
41010052	Ngʼaŋo Yesu amuloma ati, “Kale tiina, ohufugiirira huhwo, huhuŋonisye.” Ŋaweene aŋo ngʼemoni jʼomusinde oyo jirimbula atandiha ohubona era nga yeesi geŋimba hu baali ni balonda hu Yesu.
41011001	Ŋaahani Yesu nʼabeegi babe ni baali ni banatere ohwola mu hibuga hyʼe Yerusaalemu, njʼohuloma ni boolire mu bubuga obuhirireene obuli mu meenamo gʼolusozi lwʼEmisaala Emizayiti, ahʼe Bbesufage ni Bbesaniya, nga Yesu atuma babiri hu beegi babe ati,
41011002	“Mutiine mu hitahere ehi mulengera mu moni. Ni munaabe ni mwahengiramo muuti, munaabone nasugirya eperepere eyi muutu ahiiri hwihalangaho ni bayisidihire hu hihongo, muyiwoŋolole muyindeetere ŋano.
41011003	Singa ŋanaabeŋo ababuusa ati, ‘Lwahiina muyiwoŋolola?’ Munamugobolemo muuti; ‘Musengwa njʼayenda, era nʼanabe nʼahenire ehi ayetagira banayigobose ŋano mu wangu.’ ”
41011004	Ngʼaŋo batiina, nga bagaana nasugirya eperepere ni yemereeye ebulafu ŋa mulyango gwʼenyumba nʼeri sidihe hu hihongo ŋaapi nʼengera, nga bayiwoŋolola.
41011005	Nga ŋabaaŋo balala hu baali ni bemereeye aŋo, abababuusa baati, “Muhola hiina ehyo? Lwahiina muwoŋolola nasugirya eyo?”
41011006	Ngʼabeegi abo babagobolamo ngʼolu Yesu gaali nʼabalomire. Nga bala babaleha batiina ni nasugirya.
41011007	Ngʼaŋo abeegi batangirisa nasugirya eyo bayiŋirira Yesu. Nga bayaalaho hu mugongo engoye jaawe, Yesu ayiihalaho batandiha olugendo.
41011008	Ni baali ni batiina nga bangi huba gaali ni nabo baala engoye jaawe mu ngira Yesu abiteho, nʼabandi nga baaliriramo obusaga wʼebisaala obuliho amahoose obu baabbwaga hu misaala. Bino babihola olwʼohuŋa Yesu eŋono.
41011009	Ngʼaŋo abaali ni batangiriiye, nʼabaali ni bamuŋwaho egongo ni bahoohera ŋamugulu baati, “Musengwa aŋeewe eŋono.” Ali nʼekabi oyo owuujira mu siina lya Musengwa,
41011010	Hatonda aŋe ekabi owahabaha bwa sehulu yeefe Dawudi obuuja ohugobolaŋo. Musengwa, ali Ŋamugulu Obugali, aŋeewe eŋono.
41011011	Ngʼaŋo Yesu goola mu hibuga hyʼe Yerusaalemu, gengira mu Yekaalu. Ni gahena ohuhubba emoni hu hiisi hiitu nʼohubona ebyali ni bitiina mu moni, ngʼatula nʼabeegi babe ehumi nʼababiri batiina e Bbesaniya, olwohuba owiire waali huupi hwira.
41011012	Hu ludaalo olwagobolaho, Yesu nʼabeegi babe ni baali ni baŋwa e Bbesaniya ohwagamayo e Yerusaalemu, nga Yesu aŋulira enjala nʼemuluma.
41011013	Ni galengera omusaala omutiini oguliho amahoose, ngʼatiina aje abone hanye aŋanga ohwagaanaho ebiriiwa. Ni gagwolaho sigagaanaho hibala kadi hirala ohutusaho amahoose ameerere goŋene, olwohuba sibyali biro ebi mitiini jibeeraho ebiriiwa.
41011014	Ngʼaŋo aguloma ati, “Ohuŋwa olwa leero ŋatabaŋo nindi muutu alirya ebibala bibyo!” Abeegi babe nga baŋulira nʼaloma ebibono ebyo.
41011015	Yesu nʼabeegi babe ni boola e Yerusaalemu nga Yesu gengira mu lunya lwa Yekaalu atandiha ohubbingamo abaali ni batundiramo nʼabaali ni bagula. Ngʼagengula emeeza jʼabaswanisa ebbeesa, nʼefoomu jʼabaali ni batunda enjiiwa.
41011016	Era ngʼasibira hiisi muutu ohubisya ebiitu mu lunya lwʼe Yekaalu.
41011017	Ngʼaŋo asomesa abaaliŋo ati, “Hatonda sigaloma mu byaŋandiihiwa ati, ‘Enyumba yange yinaabenga nyumba omu baatu bananjumirihisyenga? Ne enywe muyifuuhisye pungulu eyi bakondo behwehamo!’ ”
41011018	Abatangirisi bʼabasengi nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi ga Hatonda ni baŋulira ebi Yesu aholire nʼebi alomire, nga batandiha ohusala amagesi agʼohumwita. Hino bahihola olwohuba beralihirira engeri eyi hiŋindi hyʼabaatu hyosihyosi hyali ni hisangaliiye esomesa yiye.
41011019	Owiire ni wera, nga Yesu nʼabeegi babe baŋwa mu hibuga baagamayo eyi bamenyanga.
41011020	Ni wahya mu mugamba, Yesu nʼabeegi babe ni baali ni babita hu mutiini gula ogu Yesu gaali nʼaŋwebe nga babona ni gwomire ohuŋwera erala hu hiholo.
41011021	Nga Peetero ahebulira ebyaliŋo aloma Yesu ati, “Musomesa Bona! Omusaala omutiini ogu waŋwebe gwomire!”
41011022	Nga Yesu aloma abeegi babe ati, “Mwesige Hatonda.
41011023	Mbalomera ehituufu ti singa omuutu gesiga Hatonda aŋanga ohuloma olugingi luno ati, ‘Siguha ŋano oje wedaanye mu buliba’ era ehi alomire hyabaŋo. Ehyetagisa hiri hirala hya muutu hutabuusabuusa mu mwoyo gugwe, aye gafugiirira ati ehi aloma hinolerere.
41011024	Olwʼehyo mbahahasa ti hiisi ehi munalombenga Hatonda, mufugiirire mu myoyo jenywe muuti muhenire ohuhisuna, era mulihisuna.
41011025	“Era hiisi olu muneŋengayo eyiri Hatonda mu husaba, ni ŋabangaŋo abbengire eyi oli, omusoniŋanga ko weesi Senywe ali mwigulu ahusoniŋe ebibi bibyo.
41011026	Aye singa soomusoniŋa, weesi Senywe ali mwigulu saalihusoniŋa bibi bibyo.”
41011027	Ngʼaŋo nindi Yesu nʼabeegi babe boola e Yerusaalemu. Yesu ni gaali nʼagenda mu lunya lwʼe Yekaalu ngʼabatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi ga Hatonda, nʼabaatu abahulu mu gwanga, batiina aŋa gaali.
41011028	Nga bamubuusa baati, “Otusa ŋeena obuŋangi obuhuginiha ohuhola ebiitu ebyo ebi ohola? Era njʼani owahuŋa obuŋangi obwo?”
41011029	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Keesi leha mbabuuse ehibuuso hirala. Ni munangobolemo nga ko mbalomera eyi tusa obuŋangi obu nemaho ohuhola ebi kola.
41011030	Mundomere, Yowaane gatusa ŋeena obuŋangi owʼohubatiza? Gabutusa yiri Hatonda, oba yiri baatu?”
41011031	Ngʼaŋo bala bahubbagania ebiŋeego ni baloma baati, “Humugobolemo huutye? Singa huloma huuti Hatonda njʼowamutuma anatubuuse ati, ‘Kale lwahiina simwafugiirira bya Yowaane oyo?’ ”
41011032	Ate ni baŋeega ohumugobolamo baati, “Abaatu njʼabamutuma” nga hino bahitya olwohuba abaatu bosibosi baali bafugiirira baati Yowaane gaali naabbi dala.
41011033	Ehyaŋwamo nga bamugobolamo baati, “Sihumanyire.” Ngʼaŋo Yesu abaloma ati, “Kale keesi sinabalomere eyi tusa obuŋangi obuukosa ebi kola.”
41012001	Ngʼaŋo Yesu atandiha ohuloma nʼabaatu abo mu ngero. Ngʼabaloma ati, “Ŋaaliŋo omuutu owahoma endimiro eyʼemizabbibbu, ngʼahena ayisitiriraho, ayabamo eroŋo eryʼohujungirangamo, atongolamo ehitiira hyʼomuhuumi, ngʼahena ayipangisa abaatu nga niye atiina mu gwanga erindi.”
41012002	Ehiseera ehyʼegesa ni hyola, gatuma mulala hu baŋeeresa babe eyiri abapangisa, bamuŋe owiisa wuwe.
41012003	Ngʼaŋo bala baŋamba omuŋeeresa oyo bamuhubba bahena bamubbinga gagama ni ŋabula ehi bamuŋaaye.
41012004	Nga nindi omwene ndimiro abatumira omuŋeeresa owundi. Ngʼoyo bamuhubba oluguma, bahena bamuhola nʼebyobuŋemu.
41012005	Omwene ndimiro sigademba era ngʼatuma owundi. Oyo beeta wiite. Nʼabandi bangi aba omwene ndimiro gatuma ni bababisya mu ngeri njʼenyene. Abandi ni babahubba, nʼabandi ni babeeta.
41012006	“Hu komerero ya byosi omwene ndimiro gaali ahiiriyo nʼomuutu owundi mulala oyu gaali nʼaŋanga ohutuma. Omuutu oyo njʼomusaani wuwe omuhoda. Oyo njʼoyu gasembyayo ohubatumira nʼaloma ati, ‘Omwana wange banamuŋe eŋono bamupeera owiisa wange.’
41012007	Cooka abapangisa ni bamubona nga behobaana baati, ‘Ono njʼomusika. Muhole hu mwite hwegoboseho obusika.’
41012008	Ngʼaŋo bamusindigirisa bamutusa ebulafu wʼendimiro nga bamwitira eyo.
41012009	“Ŋaahani omwene ndimiro alihola hi abapangisa abo? Alitiina gabasihiirisa nʼendimiro gayipangisa abaatu abandi.
41012010	Kahasa ti mwali musomireho ehyaŋandiihiwa ehiroma hiiti; “ ‘Ebaale eri abatongoli batala baati ebi, njʼeryafuuha ehulu eryʼomugaso mu gosigosi.
41012011	Hino Musengwa omwene njʼowahihola, era hyeŋunjisa abahibona.’ ”
41012012	Abasigu ba Yesu ni bahisuna baati olugero olwo alugerire ni luŋamba hu nibo, nga bagesyaho ohwenda ohumuŋamba, aye nga batya ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu, nga bamuleha batiina.
41012013	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, abasigu ba Yesu bamutumira balala hu Bafalisaayo nʼababala hu bawagizi ba habaha Herode, baje bamuheme bamuŋambire mu malomere.
41012014	Ngʼaŋo batiina bamuloma baati, “Musomesa, humanyire huuti ewe ofiira hu mazima, era obula hu byʼabaatu huhusiima ebinambulamo wabula abaatu bosibosi obabisya mu ngeri njʼenyene nʼobasomesa ebi Hatonda genda bahole aŋabula hwehubbirya. Ŋaahani Muhulu tulomere, hiraŋi ohuŋa Kayisaali habaha wa Barooma omusolo oba bbe? Huŋe omusolo oba hutaguŋa?”
41012015	Aye Yesu ngʼategeera ehi baaliho, ngʼabaloma ati, “Lwahiina mukema? Mundeetere ŋano endusu njibone.”
41012016	Ni bayimuleetera ngʼababuusa ati, “Ehifaananyi nʼamasiina ebiyiriho byʼani?” Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Bya Kayisaali.”
41012017	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abaloma ati, “Ale ebya Kayisaali mubiŋe Kayisaali, nʼebya Hatonda mubiŋe Hatonda.” Nga bala beŋunja engeri eyi aŋunuhiremo omubaso gwawe.
41012018	Ngʼaŋo balala hu Basadukaayo, bano njʼabatafugiirira baati eriyo ohulamuha, batiina eyiri Yesu bamubuusa baati,
41012019	“Musomesa, Musa omuŋeeresa wa Hatonda gatuŋandiihira egambi ati, ‘Singa omuutu afa galeha namwandu nʼatamusaayemo mwana, mugandaawe ateehwa ohumusika amusaalire abaana.’
41012020	“Ŋaahani ŋaaliŋo aboluganda musanvu. Ngʼomudaayi ahwa omuhasi, cooka ngʼafa nʼatamusaayemo mwana.
41012021	Owohubiri ngʼasika namwandu oyo, era yeesi ngʼafa nʼatamusaayemo mwana. Nʼowohudatu yeesi atyo.
41012022	Bosibosi omusanvu nga bambalaho omuhasi oyo, cooka ndi bamusaalamo mwana. Ŋaahani bosibosi ni baali ni baŋooyeŋo ohufa, ngʼomuhasi oyo yeesi afa.
41012023	Olwo ŋaahani hu ludaalo olu baatu bosibosi baliramuhiraho, omuhasi oyo aliba muha ani olwohuba gaaliho muhasi wʼabaatu abo bosibosi?”
41012024	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Aŋo mugotire, era ehibaleeteeye ohugota, hutamanya ebyaŋandiihiwa, wayire obuŋangi wa Hatonda.
41012025	Abaatu ni baliramuha, baliba hyʼabamalayika mwigulu, ni batahwa era ni batafumbirwa.
41012026	“Ate mu butuufu suubira ti mwasomaho mu hitabo hya Musa omuŋeeresa wa Hatonda, ebifa hu hulamuha hwʼabafu. Mu hitundu ehiroma hu hadeŋo aha Musa gabona ni hanya cooka ni hataguhuliha, Hatonda galoma Musa ati, ‘Ndiise Hatonda wa Yibbulayimu ni Yisaka ni Yakobbo.’
41012027	Ehyo hiraga ti Ye Hatonda wʼabalamu sosi wʼabafu.”
41012028	Ngʼaŋo ŋabaaŋo mulala hu basomesa bʼamagambi ga Hatonda owatiina, ngʼaŋulira Abasadukaayo ni bahubba embaha ni Yesu. Ni gabona Yesu nʼabagobooyemo bulaŋi, nga yeesi amubuusa ati, “Hiragiro hiina ehihira byosibyosi?”
41012029	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Ehiragiro ehisinga byosibyosi obuhulu cʼehino: ‘Tega ohutwi ewe Yisirayiri, Hatonda Musengwa yeefe nje Musengwa yeŋene.
41012030	Era yendanga Musengwa Hatonda wuwo, nʼomwoyo gugwo gwosigwosi, nʼobulamu buwo bwosibwosi, nʼamagesi gago gosigosi, nʼamaani gago gosigosi.’
41012031	Ehiragiro ehironda hwihyo mu bubbala, cʼehino: ‘Yenda omuutu wahyo ngʼolu ewe weyenda wamwene.’ Ebula hiragiro ehindi ehihira ebyo obubbala.”
41012032	Ngʼaŋo omusomesa wʼamagambi oyo aloma Yesu ati, “Musomesa, ogobooyemo bulaŋi. Ehi olomire oti Hatonda ali mulala yeŋene hituufu. Ŋabula wundi.”
41012033	Era hiroma hiiti “Yendanga Hatonda nʼomwoyo gugwo gwosigwosi, nʼamagesi gago gosigosi, nʼamaani gago gosigosi, era yendanga muliranwawo ngʼolu weyenda wamwene. Era ngʼohugondera egambi lino hisinga ebisolo byosibyosi ebi baatu baŋayo ngʼeŋongo babyohye ni biri bihwiye, ko nʼebindi byosi ebi baatu baŋayo eyiri Hatonda.”
41012034	Yesu ni gabona omusomesa wʼamagambi ngʼolu amugobooyemo nʼamagesi, ngʼamuloma ati, “Sooli ŋaleeŋi nʼobuŋugi bwa Hatonda.” Ohuŋwa hulwo, siŋaaliŋo muutu wundi owesinga ohumubuusa ebibuuso nindi.
41012035	Olundi Yesu ni gaali mu lunya lwa Yekaalu nʼasomesa, ngʼabuusa abaatu ati, “Lwahiina abasomesa bʼamagambi baloma baati Kurisito Mwijuhulu wa Dawudi.
41012036	Ate nga Dawudi omwene, nʼaliho Omwoyo Omutukuvu, galoma ati, “ ‘Hatonda Musengwa gaaloma Musengwa yange ati, Yiihala ni wundireene hu lubega olwʼomuhono gwange omulungi, ohwola olu ndifuula abasigu babo ekookolo eyʼohutaho amagulu gago?’
41012037	“Obanga Dawudi omwene amulanga Musengwawe nindi olwo aŋanga atye ohuba mwijuhulu wuwe?” Ngʼehiŋindi hyʼabaatu abaaliŋo, baŋulirisa ebibono bibye bino nʼamanyonyo.
41012038	Nga Yesu atiina mu moni nʼohubasomesa ati, “Mwehuume mubone ti simuŋamba sambo yʼabasomesa bʼamagambi abagenda ni bambaaye amaganduula amaleeŋi agehwesa hwiroba ohulaga ngʼolu bahihenaho era abenda babaheese mu ngeri eyʼohubaŋa eŋono ni bali mu akisoni
41012039	nʼohwihala mu bifo ebyʼeŋono mu mahumbaaniro nʼohu mbaga.
41012040	Abanyagulula ebiitu baahena mu mayumba ga banamwandu, era abajumirya Hatonda nʼebibono ebyene ebingi olwʼohweraga. Balibaŋa ehiguudyo ehihiraho obubbala.”
41012041	Yesu ni gaali ni gehaaye ŋa hifo aŋa baŋeerayo ebirabo mu Yekaalu ngʼabona abaatu bangi ni baŋayo ebirabo. Abaŋinda bangi nga bataamo ebbeesa ejiŋera.
41012042	Ngʼaŋo eŋwayo namwandu omugadi owatiina gaatamo obubbeesa bubiri obusembayo ohuba owʼomuŋendo omutono obugali.
41012043	Nga Yesu alanga abeegi babe, begerera aŋa ali, ngʼabaloma ati, “Mbalomera ehituufu namwandu ono omugadi aŋayeyo hibbala bugali, ohuhira abandi bosibosi.
41012044	Bala bataayemo ni batusa hu hingi ehi bali ni nahyo. Aye namwandu ono omugadi, mu bugadi buwe aŋayeyo hyosihyosi ehi abaaye ni nahyo ehibaaye ni hija humuyeeda mu obulamu buwe.”
41013001	Hu olwo Yesu ni gaali nʼaŋwa hu Yekaalu mulala hu beegi babe ngʼamuloma ati, “Musomesa, oweene otye amabaale gano aga batongolera ebizimbe bino ngʼolu biri biŋoono?”
41013002	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Ebizimbe bino ebibbala ebi obona byosibyosi biribulunguha era siŋalibaŋo ebaale wayire erala eririsigala ni liri hu lyahye. Gosigosi baligatepulula gaagwa ŋaasi.”
41013003	Yesu ni gaali ni gehaaye hu lusozi olwʼemisaala Emizayiti ohulengerera Yekaalu, nga Peetero, Yakobbo, Yowaane nʼAndereya, bamuloma abebireho ehyama. Nga bamubuusa baati,
41013004	“Tulomereho, ebyo biribaaŋo ŋaali? Era habonero hi ahaliraga haati ebyo byosibyosi binatere ohubaŋo?”
41013005	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Mwehuume ŋatabaŋo abadulingadulinga.
41013006	Bangi baliija ni beranga ohutambisa obuŋangi wange, era balidulinga bangi.
41013007	Era ni muŋuliranga etalo ŋano ni ŋala, simuŋuŋuhanga. Ejo jiri nʼohubaaŋo, aye ekomerero yiriba yihiiri hwola.
41013008	“Amawanga galihubbagana, nʼowahabaha buliwagala obwahabaha obundi. Ŋalibaaŋo musisi mu bitundu bingi hu hyalo, era enjala erigwa. Aye aŋo galiba gahiiri gamutumbu.
41013009	“Ne nywe mubeŋo ni muhimanyire era ni mwetegehire, olwohuba balibaŋamba babaŋayo mu mbuga jʼamagambi. Balibahubbira mu mahumbaaniro gaawe era balibemeha ohuŋosya mu mbuga jʼabaami nʼeja bahabaha ni babahabya ohuba baloobera bange, mubalomere obuhwenda wange era mube bujulizi eyi bali.
41013010	Ekomerero nʼehiiri hwola, Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi gali nʼohubuulirwa eyiri abaatu mu mawanga gosigosi.
41013011	“Era ni banabaŋambenga babaŋira mu mbuga jʼamagambi, simweŋendehereranga ehi munalome, aye mulomenga ehyo ehi Hatonda anabaŋenga ohuloma mu hiseera ehyo. Ebibono ebi munalomenga sibinaabenga byenywe, aye binaabenga byʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu.
41013012	“Mu hiseera ehyo, abalebe baja hulyanganamo oluhwe owundi gaŋayo owahye ohumwita, nʼabasaawe bʼabaana boosi baliŋayo abaana baawe. Abaana balijeemera abasaaye baawe, era bahena babaŋayo ohubeeta.
41013013	Era enywe abaatu bosibosi balibacaawa olwohuba baloobera bange. Aye oyo aligumira ebigosi ohwola hu komerero, njʼalinoŋoha.”
41013014	“Ni mulibona ehiitu ehyʼembiho ehi benyinyalya ni bahitaaye mu Yekaalu aŋa hitasaniiye ohuba (asoma bino ategeere), hulwo abaliba mu Buyudaaya, badulumiranga mu bitundu ebyʼesozi.
41013015	Aliba ŋamugulu hu nyumba yiye, nʼaninuhanga, sigengiranga mu nyumba ohutusamo ehiitu hyosihyosi ehyʼohutiina ni nahyo.
41013016	Era aliba hu muga, saagobolanga yingo hwiruhira ebyambalo bibye.
41013017	Mu ndaalo ejo abahasi abaliba ebida nʼabookesa njʼabalisinga ohubonaabona.
41013018	Mwegalihire Hatonda, bino bitabaŋo mu biseera ebyʼefula nʼobuŋololohi obungi.
41013019	“Mu ndaalo ejo, ŋalibaŋo ohubonaabona ohwʼamaani, ni huhira hwosihwosi ohwali ni hubaayeŋo, ohuŋwera erala olu Hatonda gatonda ehyalo nʼohwola hatyane. Era siŋalibaŋo hubonaabona ohuli hyʼohwo.
41013020	Singa Hatonda Musengwa sigahendeesa hu ndaalo ejo ejʼohubonaabona, siŋahaŋonireho muutu kadi mulala. Aye olwʼabo abagatobolamo, endaalo ejo gajipiŋia.
41013021	“Mu hiseera ehyo, omuutu nʼalibaloma ati, ‘Bona! Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu njʼono ŋano,’ oba ati, ‘Bona! Njʼola ŋala,’ simwihirisanga.
41013022	Hino kiroma olwohuba bangi balidulinga ni beranga Kurisito, oba ni beranga abanaabbi, era balihola obubonero nʼebyamaliholiho ebyeŋunjisa, ni hiba ni hiŋangiha babbaamye nʼabatobole ba Hatonda.
41013023	Olwʼehyo, mwehuume mbalomeeye byosibyosi ni bihiiri hubaaŋo. Kale mubeŋo ni muhimanyire era ni mwetegehire!”
41013024	“Aye mu ndaalo ejo, ehiseera ehyʼohubonaabona ni hiriba ni hiŋooye, eryuba liribaho ehiirema, nʼomwesi gulisima.
41013025	Emunyeenye jiriŋanuha ŋamugulu jakukumuha, nʼebiri ŋamugulu mu bbanga biri teteema.
41013026	“Mu hiseera ehyo abaatu balibona Omwana wʼOmuutu ni gaajira hu bireri mu ŋono nʼobuŋangi owʼamaani.
41013027	Era alituma abamalayika babe ohutiina mu njuyi josijosi ejʼehyalo, bahumbaanie abaatu babe abatobole ohuŋwa mu hiisi sonda yʼehyalo.”
41013028	“Mubonere hu musaala omutiini muhene mwege. Amasaga gʼomusaala ogwo ni guhena ohukukumusa gusebuhaho amahoose amanyenyeeri, ngʼomanya oti ebiro ebyʼendobooli binaatere ohwola.
41013029	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, ni mubonanga ebindomireho ni biriŋo, mumanyanga muuti ekomerero yinatere ohwola.
41013030	“Mbalomera ehituufu ti ebiitu bino byosibyosi binahabeeŋo abaatu abʼomulembe guno ni bataŋwaŋo hufa.
41013031	Ehyalo hino nʼebiri ŋamugulu mu bbanga biriŋwaŋo, aye ebibono byange sibirigwa ŋaasi.”
41013032	Nga Yesu geyongera abaloma ati, “Cooka ŋaŋuma amanyire oludaalo olwene oba esaawa, eyi biitu ebyo biribeeraŋo, nʼabamalayika mwigulu oba Omwana wa Hatonda sibamanyire, ohutusaho Bbaabba yeŋene njʼamanyire.
41013033	Kale mubeŋo ni mwetegehire! Mutaŋongera, olwohuba simumanyire hiseera hino aŋa hiryolera.
41013034	“Ehiseera hino hunahigehesye hubi muutu ahola nʼaba nʼatiina mu lugendo. Omuutu oyo nʼaba nʼaŋwa mu mago, aleha nʼaŋambisye hiisi muŋeeresa ŋa wuwe omulimo ogwʼohuhola, ngʼahena alagira omuhuumi wʼohu mulyango ohuhuuma.
41013035	Olwʼehyo mubeŋo bulindaala ni mwetegehire, olwohuba simumanyire omwene mago aŋa aligobolera. Hamunga aligobola egulo, oba mu wiire ŋagati oba engoho ni jiholyoha, oba mu mugamba pwipwipwi.
41013036	Atahanda hubagwaho bugwe, gabagaana ni muŋenyuha.
41013037	Ehi mbaloma enywe, era njʼehi ndoma nʼabasigaayeyo ti: ‘Mutaŋenyuha! Mubeŋo moni ni mwetegehire.’ ”
41014001	Mu hiseera ehyo, yaali esigaayeyo endaalo ebiri, Embaga yʼAbayudaaya eyʼOhuhebuliriraho Ohubihisya, nʼEmbaga eyi baliiraho emigaati eji batataayemo ehisimbulusa, joole. Abatangirisi bʼabasengi, nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi ga Hatonda baali mu husala amagesi agʼohuŋamba Yesu mu ngiso, bamwite.
41014002	Aye nga baloma baati, “Hutamuŋamba mu biseera ebyʼembaga, olwohuba abaatu baja hwediima.”
41014003	Mu hiseera ehyo, Yesu ni gaali mu habuga hʼe Bbesaniya mu nyumba ya Simooni owaali omugenge, nʼalya, nga ŋabaaŋo omuhasi owatiinayo nʼecupa erimo amafuta amalaŋi agaŋunya ahaloosa, era agʼebbeeyi obugali aga balanga baati narudo. Ni goola ngʼasembula ecupa eyo, amafuta agaalimo ngʼagajuha hu mutwe gwa Yesu.
41014004	Aye balala hu baaliŋo nga baluŋa. Nga baloma baati, “Lwahiina gonoonire amafuta ago atyo?
41014005	Bahagatundire, mwaŋwamo ebbeesa ejibita mu dinaari ebihumi bidatu, bajigabira abagadi.” Omuhasi oyo nga bamwoloobya mu ngeri eyo.
41014006	Cooka Yesu ngʼabaloma ati, “Lwahiina mumwoloobya? Mumulehe. Ehi gakoleeye hiraŋi.
41014007	Abagadi banabenga ni nenywe bulijo, era hiisi olu munendenga munabayeedenga. Aye ese sinja huba ni nenywe ehiseera hyosi.
41014008	Omuhasi ono aholire ehi asobooye. Ajuhire amafuta agʼahaloosa hu mubiri gwange ni kiri hufa, nʼagutegeha olwʼohugusiiha.
41014009	Mbalomera ehituufu ti hiisi ŋaatu mu hyalo hyosihyosi eyi banabuulirenga Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi, ni nahino ehi omuhasi ono aholire, banahiromengaho nga bamuhebulira.”
41014010	Ngʼaŋo Yuda Yisikaryoti, mulala hu beegi ba Yesu ehumi nʼababiri, atiina eyiri abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda, ni genda ohulya mu Yesu oluhwe bamuŋambe.
41014011	Abasengi ni baŋulira ehi genda ohubaholera, nga basangaala, era nga basuubisa ohumuŋa ebbeesa. Ohuŋwa hulwo nga Yuda atandiha ohwendula ahamanga ahohuŋayo Yesu eyi bali.
41014012	Hu ludaalo oludaayi mu ndaalo jʼEmbaga Eyi baliiraho Emigaati Ejibatataayemo Ehisimbulusa, era olu betiraho etaama eperepere eyʼEmbaga eyi bahebuliriraho Ohubihisya, abeegi ba Yesu nga bamubuusa baati, “Wenda huje hutegehere ŋeena eyi onaliire Embaga eyʼOhuhebuliriraho Ohubihisya?”
41014013	Ngʼaŋo Yesu atuma babiri hu bo, nʼabaloma ati, “Mutiine mu hibuga, munaagaane omusinde owetwihire esongo yʼamaaji, mumulonde.
41014014	Mulome omwene nyumba omu anengire muuti; ‘Omusomesa alomire ati mbo ehisenge hiiri ŋeena omu niye nʼabeegi babe banaliire Embaga eyʼOhuhebuliriraho Ohubihisya?
41014015	Anabalage ehisenge ehibbala ŋamugulu, mu kalina ehi bahenire ohulongosa nʼohutegeha, kale mutegehere omwo.’ ”
41014016	Ngʼaŋo abeegi basimbuha, batiina mu hibuga. Era baagaana byosibyosi ni biri ngʼolu Yesu gaali nʼabalomire. Ngʼaŋo bategeha Embaga eyʼOhuhebuliriraho Ohubihisya.
41014017	Owiire ni weera, nga Yesu atiina nʼabeegi babe ehumi nʼababiri.
41014018	Ni baali ni balya, nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Mbalomera ehituufu ti mulala hu enywe ali hulya ni neese hatyane, anandyemo oluhwe.”
41014019	Abeegi babe nga banakuŋala, era hiisi mulala ngʼabuusa Yesu ati, “Ndiise?”
41014020	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Mulala hu nywe ehumi nʼababiri, ali hutonga ni neese mu lubya.
41014021	Omwana wʼOmuutu baja humwita, ngʼolu ebyaŋandiihiwa bimulomaho. Aye jimwageene oyo amulyamo oluhwe! Hyahamubereeye hiraŋi singa sibamusaala!”
41014022	Ni baali ni bahiirya nga Yesu abugula omugaati. Ni gahena, geyaasa Hatonda, ngʼagubbongolamo aguŋa abeegi babe abaloma ati, “Munaaŋe mulye, guno njʼomubiri gwange.”
41014023	Ngʼaŋo abugula ehihopo hyʼenvinyo. Ni gahena ohweyaasa Hatonda ngʼabaŋa bosibosi bahinyweho.
41014024	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Gano njʼamafugi gange aganahoŋohe hu lwʼabangi, ni gahahasa endagaano epyaha eyi Hatonda aholire.
41014025	Mbalomera ehituufu ti sinja hunywa hu nvinyo yʼemizabbibbu nindi, ohwola olu ndinywa epyaha, mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda.”
41014026	Ni bahena ohwemba olwembo olwʼohujumirya Hatonda, nga batula, batiina hu lusozi olwʼemisaala Emizayiti.
41014027	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma abeegi babe ati, “Mwesimwesi munadulume mwandehaŋo, olwohuba hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti: ‘Naheete omwayi, ngʼetaama jisalaaniha.’
41014028	Aye oluvanyuma lwʼohulamuha, ndibeheerera ohutiina e Galilaaya.”
41014029	Ngʼaŋo Peetero amuloma ati, “Wayire abandi bosibosi banadulume bahulehaŋo ese sinahuleheŋo.”
41014030	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Mu butuufu kulomera ti mu hiire hino ehyene, engoho jinaabe jitagobolamo huholyoha efunda eyohubiri, ni wahaneganira emirundi edatu.”
41014031	Cooka Peetero ngʼagobolamo nʼamuhahahisa erala ati, “Wayire hinetagise ohufiira ŋalala ni neewe, sinahwegaane.” Nʼabahye bosibosi nga baloma baatyo.
41014032	Nga Yesu nʼabeegi babe boola mu hifo ehi balanga baati Gasesimane. Ngʼaloma abeegi babe ati, “Muhole ni mwihala ŋano, ese nje sabeho.”
41014033	Ngʼatiina ni Peetero, Yakobbo ni Yowaane era ngʼatandiha ohutya nʼohweralihirira bugali.
41014034	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Omwoyo gwange gwijuuye enaku eyoola nʼohunjita! Musigale ŋano, ni muliŋo moni mutaŋenyuha.”
41014035	Ni geeyongerayo ŋatono mu moni ngʼahubba amafuha gegalihira Hatonda nʼamusaba ni hiba ni hisoboha esaawa eyʼohubonaabona yitamwolaho.
41014036	Ngʼaloma ati, “Bbaabba, ebiitu byosibyosi biŋangiha eyi oli. Tuseho esaawa yino eyʼohubonaabona. Aye ewe ehi wenda hibe njʼehiholewa, sosi ehi ese nenda.”
41014037	Ni gagobolayo nga gagaana Peetero, Yakobbo ni Yowaane ni baŋenyuha, ngʼaloma Peetero ati, “Simooni, oŋenyuha? Ndimusobola hubaŋo moni wayire ohuhena esaawa ndala yonyene?
41014038	Mutaŋenyuha, mubeŋo moni ni musaba ko mutahemewa, mu butuufu emyoyo jenywe miheneerefu, aye emibiri minafu.”
41014039	Nga nindi gagamayo asaba mu ngeri njʼenyene ngʼolu gasaba oludaayi.
41014040	Ni gagobola nga nindi abagaana ni baŋenyuha, olwohuba emoni jaawe jaali jijuuye ero. Nga bahaya ehyʼohuloma.
41014041	Ni gaagama omulundi ogwohudatu ngʼabaloma ati, “Muhiŋenyuha era muhiŋuumula? Ale mulehere aŋo! Esaawa ohuŋaayo Omwana wʼOmuutu mu buŋangi wʼabaatu ababbengi yoolire.
41014042	Mwinyohe hutiine. Bona! Owundyamo oluhwe njʼoyo gaaja.”
41014043	Yesu gaali ahiiroma, ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo Yuda, mulala hu beegi babe ehumi nʼababiri, goola nʼehiŋindi hyʼabaatu abaali ni baŋambire epiima nʼesimbo. Abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda, nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi, ko nʼabaatu abahulu mu gwanga baali babatumire ohumuŋamba.
41014044	Oyo owalya mu Yesu oluhwe gaali ahenire ohubaloma ati, “Oyu naagwe mu hifuba anaabe nje niye, mumuŋambe muŋire ni mumuhuumire butiribiri.”
41014045	Yuda ni goola, ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo atiina aŋali Yesu amuloma ati, “Musomesa!” Ngʼahena amugwa mu hifuba.
41014046	Nga bafuhumira Yesu, bamuŋamba bamuhadaasa.
41014047	Aye mulala hu baali ni bemereeye aŋo, ngʼasoŋolayo epiima yiye, atema omwidu wʼomuhulu wʼabasengi ba Hatonda amuhapulaho ohutwi.
41014048	Ngʼaŋo Yesu ababuusa ati, “Mujire ohupamba ni muli nʼepiima nʼebibbiro, hyʼabajire ohuŋamba omuyekera?
41014049	Hiisi ludaalo mbaayenga mba ni nenywe mu lunya lwa Yekaalu ni somesa, ni mutapamba. Aye hino muhiholire, ebyaŋandiihiwa bisobole ohwolerera.”
41014050	Ngʼaŋo abeegi babe bosibosi bamulehaŋo, baduluma.
41014051	Ŋaaliŋo omuseere nalunje owaali nʼatambaaye lugoye lundi ohutusaho olu gaali ni gewihiriiye, ngʼabaatu bamuŋamba nʼalonda hu Yesu.
41014052	Cooka ngʼabeŋunulaho aduluma majula, nʼabaleheeye olugoye.
41014053	Ngʼaŋo baŋira Yesu ewomuhulu wʼabasengi. Abatangirisi bʼabasengi bosibosi nʼabaatu abahulu mu gwanga, nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi, nga besoloosa beehala mu hijaami.
41014054	Peetero galonda hu Yesu, ni gesambireho ahanaŋiro. Nga gengirira erala mu lunya lwʼomuhulu wʼabasengi ba Hatonda, gehala nʼabahuumi bʼembuga ŋa hihoso goota omuliro.
41014055	Abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼAboluhiiho lwʼAbayudaaya Olubbala baali muhwendula obujulizi obwʼobudulingi obu baneemeho ohwita Yesu, aye babuhaya.
41014056	Nga ŋabaaŋo bangi abaŋa obujulizi owʼobudulingi ni bamulumirisa, aye obujulizi waawe ni butaŋambagana.
41014057	Era abandi nga benyoha, baŋa obujulizi owʼobudulingi ni bamulumirisa baati,
41014058	“Hwamuŋulira nʼaloma ati, ‘Ndibbwagaŋo Yekaalu yino eyi abaatu baatongola, oluvanyuma mu ndaalo edatu, nditongola eyindi, eritatongolewa abaatu.’ ”
41014059	Aye obujulizi wa bano woosi ni butaŋambagana.
41014060	Ngʼaŋo omuhulu wʼabasengi ba Hatonda gemeerera mu moni jaawe, abuusa Yesu ati, “Obula ehi ogobolamo? Hiina ehi oloma hu bino ebi bahulumiirisa?”
41014061	Aye Yesu gaŋoleera huŋoleera, nʼasagobolamo. Omuhulu wʼabasengi nga geyongera ohumubuusa ati, “Ndiiwe Kurisito, Omwana wa Hatonda oyu hujumirya?”
41014062	Ngʼaŋo Yesu agobolamo ati, “Ndiise. Era mulibona Omwana wʼOmuutu ni gehaaye hu lubega olwʼomuhono omulungi ogwa Hatonda Omwene Buŋangi, era mulimubona ni gaajira hu bireri ebyomwigulu.”
41014063	Ngʼaŋo omuhulu wʼabasengi ahanula ebyambalo ebi gaali ni gambaaye ahena aloma ati, “Hwendera hi obujulizi obundi?
41014064	Muŋuliiye ngʼolu afodogooye. Enywe muŋeega muutye?” Nga bosibosi basalira Yesu omusango baati asaanira ohufa.
41014065	Ngʼabandi batandiha ohumufujaho agate, bamuwiiha mu moni, nga bamuhubba epuusi ni baloma baati, “Tulomere ahuhubbire.” Ngʼabahuumi bʼembuga bamuŋira ni bamuhubba amaŋi.
41014066	Peetero ni gaali mu lunya, ngʼeŋwayo mulala hu bahaana abaŋeeresanga ewomuhulu wʼabasengi.
41014067	Ni gamubona ni goota omuliro, ngʼamuhaŋaasa ahena amuloma ati, “Ewe weesi obaaye ni Yesu Omunazaleesi.”
41014068	Cooka Peetero nga geegaana ati, “Ehi oloma sikimanyire era sikitegeera.” Ngʼaŋo Peetero aŋwa mu lunya, atiina mu luhuubo olutula ebulafu. Ngʼengoho eholyoha.
41014069	Omuhaana ola nindi ni gabona Peetero ngʼaloma abaali ni bemereeye ohuupi ni naye ati, “Omusinde ono njʼomulala hu babaaye ni bagendanga ni Yesu.”
41014070	Nga Peetero atandiha ohulayira ati, “Mu mazima, ese simanyire omusinde oyu muloma.” Ŋabitaŋo ahamanga hatotono, abaali ni bemereeye ohuupi ni naye nga bamuloma baati, “Hituufu oli mulala hu babaaye ni bagendanga ni Yesu, olwohuba weesi oli Mugalilaaya hya niye.”
41014071	Aye Peetero gatandiha ohulayira nʼohweŋwaba ati, “Ese simanyire muutu oyo oyu mulomaho!”
41014072	Aŋo ni naaŋo engoho ngʼeholyoha omulundi ogwohubiri. Nga Peetero ahebulira ebi Yesu gaali nʼamulomire ati, “Engoho yinaabe yitaholyoha efunda eyohubiri, ni wuneganiiye emirundi edatu.” Ngʼatemuha alira.
41015001	Ni wahya mu mugamba, abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼabaatu abahulu mu gwanga, nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi ga Musa, ko nʼabaatu abandi boosi abohu Luhiiho lwʼAbayudaaya, nga bateesa ohubona ehi banahole Yesu. Nga bamuhaada bamuŋira bamuŋayo eyiri Pilaato.
41015002	Pilaato ngʼamubuusa ati, “Ndiiwe habaha wʼAbayudaaya?” Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Ngʼolu oloma olwo.”
41015003	Ngʼaŋo abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda bamuŋaŋabira emisango emyene emingi.
41015004	Nga Pilaato amubuusa ati, “Oŋuma hya hweŋosyaho? Soobona emisango eji bahuŋaŋabira ni jiri mingi?”
41015005	Aye Yesu gaŋolera huŋolera. Nga Pilaato geŋunja.
41015006	Mu biseera byʼEmbaga eyʼOhuhebuliriraho Ohubihisya, Pilaato galehulanga omusibe oyu bamusunganga ohulehula.
41015007	Hu mulundi guno, mu komera mwalimo omusinde oyu balanganga baati Bbarabba, oyu baali ni bawoŋire nʼabajeemu bahye abaali ni beetire abaatu mu hediimo ahʼohujeemera Abarooma abaali ni baŋuga ehyalo hyawe.
41015008	Ngʼaŋo ehibbubbu hyʼabaatu hitiina ewa Pilaato himusunge abaholere ngʼolu gaali nʼabanahiise.
41015009	Pilaato ngʼababuusa ati, “Mwenda mbawoŋolorere Habaha wʼAbayudaaya?”
41015010	Ehyo gahiroma, olwohuba gamanya ati Abatangirisi bʼabasengi baali baŋayeeyo Yesu olwʼekirihindi eyi baali ni nayo.
41015011	Ne abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nga batuuya abaatu balome Pilaato abalehulire nje Bbarabba mu hifo hya Yesu.
41015012	Nga Pilaato ababuusa ati, “Ŋaahani oyu mulanga habaha wʼAbayudaaya muhole tye?”
41015013	Nga nibo bamugobolamo ni bahayaana baati, “Muhomerere hu musalabba!”
41015014	Nga Pilaato ababuusa ati, “Lwahiina? Aholire hibi hi?” Aye nibo nga beeyongera hweyongera ohuhayaana baati, “Mumuhomerere hu musalabba.”
41015015	Pilaato olwʼohwenda ohubasangaasa, gabalehulira Bbarabba ngʼolu bamusunga. Aye ngʼalagira bafaduule Yesu efaalu, nga ko ahena amuŋayo eyiri abasirikale baje bamuhomerere hu musalabba.
