41015016	Ngʼabasirikale baŋira Yesu mu lubiri lwa Pilaato olu balanganga baati Purayitoriyo, nga bahoba abahyawe bosibosi abomu hibinja ehyo bahumbaana.
41015017	Nga bamwambasa eganduula eryʼerangi lya namasyoma, bagata amaŋwa mu ngeri yʼomuge bamufiiha hu mutwe.
41015018	Nga batandiha ohumujeeja baati, “Wangaala, Habaha wʼAbayudaaya!”
41015019	Nga baŋamba olugada bamuhubba hu mutwe efunda nʼefunda. Nga bahena bamufuujaho agate, bamuhubbira nʼamafuha ohumuhiina ti bamuŋa eŋono.
41015020	Ni bahena ohumujeeja, nga bamufihulamo olugoye olwa nʼamasyoma, nga bamwambasa engoye jije, nga ko bamutusa ebulafu bamuŋira ohumuhomerera hu musalabba.
41015021	Mu hiseera ehyo, ŋaaliŋo omusinde owʼe Kireene oyu balanganga baati Simooni owaali nʼabita engira nʼaŋwa mu hitahere ehirirene ehibuga. Simooni ono njʼowaali semwana yʼAlekizanda ni Ruufusi. Abasirikale nga bamuŋagia ohubbeeda omusalabba gwa Yesu.
41015022	Ngʼaŋo boosa Yesu mu hifo ehi balanga baati Gologosa, amahulu gahyo ti Ehifo Ehyahaŋanga.
41015023	Nga bamuŋa envinyo yomu mizabbibbu ni bayitabuuyemo ehiresi ehi balanga baati miira. Cooka ngʼagaana ohuyinywa.
41015024	Nga bamuhomerera hu musalabba, bagabana ebyambalo bibye ni babihubbiraho ahalulu ohubona hiisi mulala ehi anaŋire.
41015025	Bamuhomerera ni jiŋera esaawa edatu ejomu mugamba.
41015026	Omusango ogu baali ni bamuhaabya nga baguŋandiiha hu hapande baati, “HABAHA WʼABAYUDAAYA” nga bahaŋaniha hu musalabba gugwe.
41015027	Ngʼaŋo bahomerera nʼabakondo babiri hiisi mulala hu musalabba gugwe. Mulala hu muhono gwa Yesu omulungi, owundi hu mugooda.
41015028	Ehyaŋandiihiwa nga hyolerera ehiroma hiiti, “Bamubalira ŋalala nʼababbwagi bʼamagambi.”
41015029	Abaali ni babitaŋo nga boosi basugusa emitwe jaawe nʼobusambuha ni baduha Yesu baati, “Ewe asobola ohubbwagaŋo Yekaalu nindi wayitongola mu ndaalo edatu,
41015030	wenoŋole! Ninuha hu musalabba!”
41015031	Mu ngeri njʼenyene abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi, boosi bamujerega ni baloma baati, “Ganoŋolanga bandi, aye saaŋanga hwenoŋola niye omwene!
41015032	Kurisito Habaha wa Yisirayiri, ale ŋaahani aŋwe hu musalabba, hubone konyo humufugiirire!” Ni naabo aba bahomerera ni naye nga boosi bamuduha.
41015033	Ohuŋwa hu saawa mukaaga ejomu muusi ohwola hu mwenda ejʼegulo, ngʼehiirema hiŋamba ehyalo hyosihyosi.
41015034	Hu saawa eyʼomwenda, nga Yesu alanga nʼejanjaasi eryʼamaani ati, “Eloyi, Eloyi, lama sabbakusaani?” Amahulu gaahyo ti, “Hatonda wange, Hatonda wange, lwahiina wundehireŋo?”
41015035	Balala hu abo abaali ni bemereeye ŋaapi aŋo, ni baŋulira nga baloma baati, “Muŋulire, ali hulanga Eriya!”
41015036	Ngʼaŋo mulala hu bo aduluma atimya ehisumwa mu nvinyo eyisalire, ahita hu lugada aŋa Yesu ohunywa nʼaloma ati, “Leha hubone hanye Eriya anaaje gamutusa hu musalabba!”
41015037	Yesu ngʼalira nʼejanjaasi eryʼamaani, ngʼahena afa.
41015038	Ngʼaŋo olutimbe olwomu Yekaalu ludweduhamo ŋabiri, ohuŋwa ŋamugulu ohwola ŋaasi.
41015039	Omuhulu wʼehibinja hyʼabasirikale cikumi owaali ni gemereeye ŋa musalabba nʼalengereeye, ni gabona engeri eyi Yesu gafamo, ngʼaloma ati, “Mu butuufu omuutu ono abaaye Mwana wa Hatonda!”
41015040	Era ŋaaliŋo nʼabahasi abaali ni besambireho ahamanga ni balengereeye. Mu abo mwalimo Malyamu Magadaleeni, Salome, ni Malyamu nyina ya Yose ni Yakobbo omuŋere.
41015041	Abahasi bano bagendanga ni Yesu ni bamuŋeeresa, olu gaali mu hitahere hyʼe Galilaaya. Era ŋaaliŋo nʼabahasi abandi bangi abaali ni bajire ni naye e Yerusaalemu.
41015042	Bino byosibyosi byaliŋo hu ludaalo lwʼohwetegehera obunahye nʼenahabe Sabbaato. Ŋaaliŋo owʼeŋono owahiihanga mu Luhiiho lwʼAbayudaaya Oluhulu,
41015043	ni bamulanga baati Yosefu owʼe Alimataaya. Yosefu ono gaali alindirira ohuuja hwʼobuŋugi bwa Hatonda. Nga Yosefu gesinga atiina eyiri Pilaato amusunga omulambo gwa Yesu.
41015044	Pilaato ni gaŋulira ati Yesu gaali ahenire ohufa, nga geŋunja. Ngʼalanga omuhulu wʼehibinja hyʼabasirikale, amubuuse hanye dala Yesu gaali afuuye.
41015045	Omuhulu wʼehibinja hyʼabasirikale ni gamuhahasa ngʼolu Yesu gaali ahenire ohufa, Pilaato gehirisa Yosefu ohuŋira omulambo.
41015046	Ngʼaŋo Yosefu agula olugoye olulaŋi olwa laasi, ngʼatusa omulambo gwa Yesu hu musalabba, agwambiha mu lugoye olwo, aguta mu higombe ehi baali ni babajire mwibaale mu ngeri yʼepungulu. Ngʼaŋiringisya ogubaale, gegaliraŋo omulyango ogwingira mu higombe ehyo.
41015047	Malyamu Magadaleeni, ni Malyamu nyina ya Yose, nga beetegeeresa aŋa bata omulambo gwa Yesu.
41016001	Oludaalo lwa Sabbaato ni lwaŋwaho, Malyamu Magadaleeni ni Salome ni Malyamu nyina Yakobbo, nga bagula amafuta agʼahaloosa, batiine baŋahe omulambo gwa Yesu.
41016002	Ni wahya, hu ludaalo oludaayi mu wiiki, mu mugamba pwipwipwi eryuba ni lyali ni lyahaŋwangayo, nga batiina hu higombe.
41016003	Batiinanga bebuusa baati, “Njʼani anatuŋiringisisye ebaale ohulitusa hu mulyango gwʼehigombe?”
41016004	Aye ni bagangamusa emoni ohuhejayo, nga babona baati baali baliŋiringihisye ni balituhiise hu mulyango gwʼehigombe ate nga ebaale eryo lyali bbala bugali.
41016005	Ni bengira mu higombe, babona omuseere nalunje ni gehaaye hu luuyi olwʼomuhono omulungi, ni gambaaye ekaaso ekosa. Ngʼobuti bubaŋamba.
41016006	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Mutatya. Mwendula Yesu Omunazaleesi oyu bahomerera hu musalabba. Aŋuma ŋano. Alamuhire. Mubone, hino njʼehifo aŋa baali ni bamutaaye.
41016007	Mutiine mulomere abeegi babe ko weyite Peetero, muuti; ‘Atangiiyemo atiina e Galilaaya. Eyo peyi munahamubonere ngʼolu gabaloma.’ ”
41016008	Ngʼabahasi abo batula mu higombe baduluma, olwohuba esisi nʼobuti byali bibaŋambire. Era olwʼobuti obwo sibalomeraho muutu kadi mulala.
41016009	Yesu ni gahena ohulamuha hu ludaalo oludaayi mu wiiki gasooka hubonehera nje Malyamu Magadaleeni oyu gabbingaho emisambwa omusanvu.
41016010	Ono njʼowatiina galomera abaloobera ba Yesu, mu hiseera ehyo aba obutahi waali ni wijuuye hu mwoyo nʼohulira ni balira.
41016011	Aye ni babalomera baati Yesu mulamu, era ngʼolu Malyamu Magadaleeni gamubona, sibafugiirira.
41016012	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, nga Yesu abonehera babiri hu beegi babe abaali ni batula ehibuga ni batiina mu hyalo cooka nʼatafaana ngʼolu gafaananga.
41016013	Ni gahena ohubabonehera nga baagamayo balomera abahyawe. Cooka nibo nasi behirisa hibono ehyo.
41016014	Oluvanyuma, nga Yesu abonehera abeegi babe ehumi namulala, ni behaaye ni balya. Ngʼabanenya olwʼohutafugiirira hwawe, nʼolwobuhahanyafu wʼemyoyo jaawe, olwohuba sibehirisa bibono byʼabo abaali ni baamuweeneho nʼahenire ohulamuha.
41016015	Era ngʼabaloma ati, “Mutiine mu mawanga gosigosi, mulomere abaatu bosibosi Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi.
41016016	“Hiisi afugiirira era gabatiziwa, alinoŋolewa, aye atafugirira, omusango gulimuhira.
41016017	“Abafugiirira banaholenga ebyamaliholiho bino. Mu siina lyange banaabbingenga emisambwa hu baatu, banalomenga mu ndimi eji bahiiri hwega,
41016018	ni banaŋambenga hu misota oba ni bananywenga ehiitu hyosihyosi ehiita, sibanolengaho higosi hyosihyosi. Ni banaŋambenga hu balwaye banaŋonenga.”
41016019	Yesu Musengwa ni gahena ohuloma ni nabo, ngʼaŋiriwa mwigulu, gehala hu luuyi olwʼomuhono omulungi ogwa Hatonda.
41016020	Ngʼabeegi babe batiina hiisi ŋaatu ni balomera abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi. Nga Yesu Musengwa abaŋambirangaho ni bahola ebyamaliholiho ohuhahasa obuhwenda waawe.
42001001	Owʼeŋono Tefiiro, abaatu bangi baŋandiihire hu biitu ebi Yesu atiinire nʼahola mu fe.
42001002	Baŋandiihire ni batambisa ebibono byʼabo ababyeboneraho nʼemoni jaawe ohuŋwera erala oludaayi ngʼolu gatandiha obuŋeeresa buwe era basasaania nʼehibono ehyo mu baatu.
42001003	Olwʼehyo, oluvanyuma lwʼohwendulirisa mu wiijufu hu hiisi hiitu ehibayeŋo keesi kuŋadiihira ewʼeŋono Tefiiro ebibono ebiroose obulaŋi ebyolereeye mu fe,
42001004	ko weesi ofaanie ehituufu ehiŋamba hu bibono ebi bahusomesa.
42001005	Mu himanga ehi habaha Herode gaali nʼaŋuga Buyudaaya, ŋaaliŋo omusengi wa Hatonda oyu balanganga baati Zakaliya owʼomu hibbubbu hyʼabasengi ehi balanganga baati Abbija. Omuhasi wuwe gaali njʼElizabbeesi yeesi owaali nʼaŋwa mu lulyo lwʼabasengi ba Hatonda, owomu lusaga lwʼAlooni.
42001006	Abaatu bano bombi baholanga biruŋamu mu moni ja Hatonda Musengwa era ni badembuhira amagambi nʼebiragiro bibye byosibyosi.
42001007	Aye baali baŋuma mwana olwohuba Elizabbeesi gaali mugumba, nindi bombi ni basahuluŋire.
42001008	Lulala ehibinja ehi Zakaliya gaŋeerehesangamo ngʼomusengi mu moni ja Hatonda ni hyali hu luŋalo,
42001009	abahye bamwangala ni bahubba ahalulu ngʼolu ekola yabwe yaali, aje adunyise obubbaani mu Yekaalu ya Hatonda Musengwa.
42001010	Ehimanga ehyʼohudunyisa obubbaani ni hyola, abaatu bosibosi baali bahumbeene ebulafu wa Yekaalu ni basaba.
42001011	Ngʼaŋo mu himanga ehyene ehyo Zakaliya abona malayika wa Hatonda Musengwa ni gemereeye hu lubega lwʼomuhono omulungi ogwʼehituuti ohubadunyihisanga obubbaani.
42001012	Zakaliya ni gamubona gesinduha bugali weene, nga nʼobuti wumuŋamba.
42001013	Aye malayika oyo ngʼamuloma ati, “Zakaliya, otatya olwohuba Hatonda aŋuliiye ohusaba huhwo. Era omuhasi wuwo Elizabbeesi aja huhusaalira omwana omuseere, olimuguliha esiina oti Yowaane.
42001014	Omwana oyo, aligira waaba nʼesangaalo nʼohusaŋalya era abaatu balisangaala olwʼohusaaliwa huhwe,
42001015	olwohuba anaahabe mwegingihiriri mu moni ja Hatonda Musengwa. Era saagesangaho ohunywa omwenge gwomu mizabbibbu wayire ehiitu hyosihyosi ehimeesa. Omwoyo Omutukuvu anahamumaamire ohuŋwera erala mu hida hya nyina.
42001016	Era aligira Abayisirayiri bangi bebbwaga baagobola eyiri Hatonda Musengwa yaawe.
42001017	Aliba nʼamaani gʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu hyʼEriya era njʼalyeheerera ohuuja ohweyulira Musengwa engira. Alifaŋania abaana nʼabasaawe, era aligobosa abaatu abajeemera Hatonda mu ngira eyʼobugwalaafu, nʼabategeha olwʼohuuja hwa Musengwa.”
42001018	Ngʼaŋo Zakaliya abuusa malayika oyo ati, “Hiina ehihahasa hiiti ehi oloma hinaholerere? Ese nʼomuhasi wange hwesahuluŋiiye.”
42001019	Ngʼaŋo Malayika amugobolamo ati, “Ese, ndiise Gabbudyeri, aba mu moni ja Hatonda ni muŋeeresa. Hatonda gaatumire ohuhulomera amaŋuliro gano amalaŋi.
42001020	Aye olwʼohubuusabuusa ebi kulomera, sooja hugobolayo huloma ohwola olu Hatonda anahabyoherese ehiseera hyʼabo ni hyolire.”
42001021	Mu hiseera ehyo, abaatu baali ebulafu ni bahuumiriiye Zakaliya era ni bebuusa ehimwolireho.
42001022	Zakaliya ni gatula, gaali saahiŋanga huloma aye nʼagesya hugesya nʼengalo. Ngʼabaatu bahifaania baati gaali asunire ohwolesewa.
42001023	Olugobo lulwe olwʼohuŋeeresa mu Yekaalu ni lwaŋwaho, nga gagamayo ewuwe.
42001024	Ŋabitaŋo ehiseera ngʼElizabbeesi omuhasi wuwe aba hida, ngʼahena emyesi etaanu nʼatebonesa mu baatu.
42001025	Ngʼaŋo aloma ati, “Hatonda Musengwa gapambiiye ehisa mu hiseera hino gaatusaho eduho eryʼobugumba.”
42001026	Elizabbeesi nʼali hida ehyʼemyesi mukaaga, Hatonda gatuma Malayika Gabbudyeri mu hibuga ehi balanga baati Nazaleesi mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya,
42001027	eyiri omuhaana ataŋenyuhangaho nʼomusinde oyu balanga baati Malyamu owaali nʼaja hufumbirwa omusinde oyu balanganga baati Yosefu era gaali aŋwa mu lulyo lwa habaha Dawudi.
42001028	Malayika oyo ngʼamuloma ati, “Oli otye ewe omuhoda wa Hatonda? Oli nʼekabi era Hatonda Musengwa ali ni neewe!”
42001029	Ebibono ebyo byeŋunjisa Malyamu bugali weene, ni gebuusa ehi bitegeesa.
42001030	Ngʼaŋo Malayika amuloma ati, “Malyamu, otatya olwohuba osunire obuhoda eyiri Hatonda.
42001031	Oliba hida wasaala omwana museere, olimuguliha esiina oti nje Yesu.
42001032	Omwana oyo, aliba nʼobuŋangi era balimulanga Mwana wa Hatonda oyo Owaŋamugulu Bugali. Hatonda Musengwa alimuŋa obuŋugi hyʼowa Dawudi sehulu wuwe.
42001033	Aliŋuga Yisirayiri emirembe nʼemirembe era obuŋugi buwe sibuliŋwaŋo.”
42001034	Nga Malyamu abuusa malayika oyo ati, “Naahabe tye hida, ese otaŋenyuhangaho nʼomusinde?”
42001035	Nga Malayika amugobolamo ati, “Omwoyo Omutukuvu anahahumaamire ngʼamaani ga Hatonda Owaŋamugulu Bugali gahuujaho, ngʼoba hida. Olwʼehyo omwana oyu olisaala aliba mwabufu era aliba Mwana wa Hatonda.
42001036	Nʼomulebe wuwo Elizabbeesi oyu babaaye ni balanga omugumba, yeesi aja husaala omwana mu busahulu buwe era guno aŋira omwesi gwa mukaaga nʼali hida.
42001037	Olwohuba ŋaŋuma ehihaya Hatonda.”
42001038	Nga Malyamu aloma ati, “Ese ndi muŋeeresa wa Hatonda Musengwa. Hahibe hiityo hu ese ngʼolu olomire.” Ngʼaŋo Malayika aŋwaŋo getiinira.
42001039	Mu hiseera ehyene ehyo, Malyamu genyoheramo gaŋamba olugendo gatiina mu hibuga mu twale lyʼe Buyudaaya mu ehyalo hyʼesozi eyi Zakaliya gamenyanga.
42001040	Ni goola gengira mu nyumba ya Zakaliya ngʼaheesa Elizabbeesi.
42001041	Wangewe, Elizabbeesi ni gaŋulira Malyamu nʼamuheesa, ngʼomwana asamba mu hida. NgʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu amaamira Elizabbeesi.
42001042	Ngʼaŋo Elizabbeesi olwʼesangaalo aloma nʼejanjaasi eryaŋamugulu ati, “Hatonda ahuŋaaye ekabi ohuhira abahasi bosibosi era nʼomwana oyu oja ohusaala yeesi ali nʼekabi.
42001043	Ko ndiise ani, ewe oja huba nyina ya Musengwa ohupa eŋono lino eryʼamaani ohucaalira?
42001044	Olu puliiye ejanjaasi liryo ni bukeesa, omwana asambire mu hida olwʼesangaalo.
42001045	Oli nʼekabi olwʼohufugiirira oti ebi Hatonda Musengwa gaaloma bija hwolerera.”
42001046	Ngʼaŋo Malyamu aloma ati, “Mu mwoyo gwange njumirya Hatonda Musengwa.
42001047	Nʼobulamu wange busangaafu olwa Musengwa Omunoŋosi wange,
42001048	olwohuba gapambiiye ehisa ese omuŋeeresa wuwe aŋumaho naŋaali. Ohuŋwa ŋaahani abaatu aba hiisi mulembe, bananangenga wʼekabi,
42001049	olwohuba Hatonda omwene buŋangi era omwabufu gakoleeye ebihulu.
42001050	Ohuŋwa mu hiisi mulembe ogubaluhaŋo ehisa hihye hiba eyiri abo abamutya.
42001051	Alagire obuŋangi wuwe owʼamaani mu byamaliholiho ebi ahola, ni goŋania abeŋeegaho baati njʼabahihenaho.
42001052	Aŋanuuye abaŋugi hu buŋugi aye genyosa abeŋomeha gabaŋa obubbala.
42001053	Geguhise abayala nʼebiraŋi, aye abo aberanga abaŋinda gabagamirisaho engalo ni jirereeja.
42001054	Ayedire Yisirayiri abaatu babe abamuŋeeresa abahebuliiye gaba nʼohusasira,
42001055	eyiri Yibbulayimu nʼolusaaye lulwe emirembe nʼemirembe, ngʼolu gahisuubisa abasehulu beefe.”
42001056	Nga Malyamu amenya nʼElizabbeesi emyesi ngʼedatu, nga ko gaagama engo.
42001057	Endaalo ejʼohusaala ni joola, ngʼElizabbeesi asaala omwana omuseere.
42001058	Abaliranwa nʼabalebe babe ni baŋulira ngʼolu Hatonda Musengwa amuŋambiye ehisa gamuŋa omwana, nga boosi basangaala.
42001059	Omwana ni gaŋesa endaalo munaana, nga batiina ohumuhomola. Baali baja humuguliha esiina lya semwana baati nje Zakaliya.
42001060	Aye nyina ngʼaloma ati, “Bbe, humugulihe huuti nje Yowaane.”
42001061	Nga bamuloma baati, “Mu lulyo lulwo muŋumamo muutu kadi mulala oyu baguliha esiina eryo!”
42001062	Ngʼaŋo beeyedesa obubonero ohubuusa semwana yʼomwana esiina eri genda bamugulihe.
42001063	Zakaliya ngʼasunga ehipande ehyʼohuŋandiihaho, ngʼaŋandiiha ati, “Esiina lyʼomwana nje Yowaane.” Bosibosi nga beŋunja.
42001064	Aŋo ni naaŋo nga Zakaliya geguha omunwa era nʼolulimi lulwe nga luboŋoloha, ngʼatandiha ohuloma nʼajumirya Hatonda.
42001065	Hino hyaleetera abaliranwa babe bosibosi ohweŋunja. Era ngʼebibono bino bihwana hu ŋingi jʼe Buyudaaya josijosi.
42001066	Bosibosi ababiŋulira, bebuusanga abeene nʼabeene baati, “Omwana ono anaahabe muutu wa ngeri hi?” Baalomanga baatyo olwohuba Hatonda Musengwa gaali ni naye.
42001067	Ngʼaŋo Omwoyo Omutukuvu amaamira Zakaliya semwana ya Yowaane ngʼaŋa obunaabbi nʼaloma ati,
42001068	“Hujumirye Hatonda Musengwa wa Bayisirayiri, olwohuba ahyaliiye abaatu babe era abanunuuye.
42001069	Atuŋaaye Omunoŋosi owʼamaani ohuŋwa mu lulyo lwa Dawudi omuŋeeresa wa Hatonda, atunoŋole
42001070	ngʼolu gasuubisa ahale nahale nʼabita mu banaabbi babe abagwalaafu,
42001071	atunoŋole ohuŋwa eyiri abasigu beefe, nʼomu muhono gwʼabo bosibosi abatatwenda.
42001072	Ngʼolu gasuubisa ohuŋambira abasehulu beefe ehisa era gahebulira endagaano yiye eyʼenjabulo
42001073	mu hirayiro ehi galayirira sehulu yeefe Yibbulayimu, ati alitununula ohuŋwa mu ngalo jʼabasigu beefe
42001074	ko humuŋeerese ni huŋuma hutya,
42001075	mu bugwalaafu era ni hwolereeye mu moni jije obulamu weefe bosibosi.
42001076	Ne ewe mwana wase, balihulanga naabbi wa Hatonda oyo Owaŋamugulu Obugali. Hino kiroma olwohuba olitangiramo ohutiina ohweyulira Musengwa engira,
42001077	nʼohuleetera abaatu babe ohufaania engira eyʼobunoŋosi, Hatonda nʼabasoniŋa ebibi byawe,
42001078	olwʼehisasabirisi hihye ehingi, ehiriiha ohuŋwa mwigulu hyʼenjase eyʼeryuba ni liŋwayo,
42001079	ohwaduhira abali mu hiirema hyʼebibi nʼehisisigo hyʼolumbe, nʼohutuluŋamya mu ngira ereeta emiyaaya.”
42001080	NgʼOmwana ahula mu hirangi nʼomu bulamu buwe owʼomwoyo era gamenyanga mu lulafu ohwola olu gatandiha ohulomera Abayisirayiri ehibono hya Hatonda.
42002001	Mu hiseera ehi habaha oyu balanganga baati Agusito gaŋugiyemo owahabaha wa Rooma, gaatusa ehiragiro ati abaatu bosibosi mu matwale gage, beŋandiise.
42002002	Ohweŋandiisa ohwo ohudaayi, hwaliŋo gavana oyu balanganga baati Kiriniyo nʼali njʼaŋuga etwale lyʼe Siriya.
42002003	Ngʼaŋo hiisi muutu atiina mu habuga hʼewaawe ohweŋandiisa.
42002004	Olwʼehyo, nga Yosefu yeesi aŋwa mu hibuga Nazaleesi mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya, atiina mu hibuga Bbeserekemu mu twale lyʼe Buyudaaya. E Bbeserekemu eyo peeyi basaala habaha Dawudi era Yosefu yeesi gaali wamu lulyo olwo.
42002005	Yosefu gatiina ni Malyamu oyu gaali nʼahwa, beŋandiise. Malyamu gaali ali hida,
42002006	era ni bali eyo, ngʼehiseera hihye ehyʼohusaala hyola.
42002007	Nga Malyamu asaala omwana wuwe omudaayi omuseere, ngʼamuwiiha mu bugoye era ngʼamuta mu hiitu omu bisolo byaliranga. Gamusaalira mu hidooli olwohuba sibasuna hifo mu nyumba omu abagendi bapangisanga baŋenyuhamo.
42002008	Aŋaapi aŋo mu hitundu ehyo, mwalimo abaayi abahuumanga etaama jaawe owiire mu hyayo.
42002009	Ni baali eyo, nga malayika wa Hatonda Musengwa abawonehera. Ngʼehimyaso hyʼeŋono lirye hibeswanigirisa. Hino hyabaleetera ohutya bugali weene!
42002010	Aye malayika ngʼabaloma ati, “Mutatya, olwohuba mbaleteeye amaŋuliro amalaŋi, agalileetera abaatu bosibosi esangaalo eryene eryʼamaani.
42002011	Olwa leero e Bbeserekemu mu hibuga eyi basaala habaha Dawudi, basaaye Omunoŋosi wʼabaatu bosibosi, Kurisito Musengwa.
42002012	Hano njʼahabonero ahamunamufanihisyeho, muja hubona omwana museere ni bamuwiihire mu bugoye wʼabaŋere era ni bamutaaye mu hiitu omu bisolo biriira.”
42002013	Ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo eduuli lyʼabamalayika ohuŋwa mwigulu abandi beŋimba hu wahyawe ni bemba enyembo ejʼohujumirya Hatonda baati,
42002014	“Eŋono libe eyiri Hatonda mwigulu nʼemiyaaya jibe mu baatu abasiima!”
42002015	Abamalayika ni baŋwaŋo baagamayo mwigulu, ngʼabaayi baloma abeene nʼabeene baati, “Hutiine e Bbeserekemu huje hubone ebibaayeŋo ngʼolu Hatonda Musengwa atulomire.”
42002016	Ngʼaŋo abaayi beyuna batiina era nga babona Malyamu ni Yosefu nʼomwana ni bamutaaye mu hiitu nago omu bisolo biriira.
42002017	Ni bahena ohubona omwana, nga batiina balomera abaatu ebi malayika gaali nʼabalomeeye hu mwana oyo.
42002018	Era abaatu bosibosi mu hitundu ehyo beeŋunja ebi abaayi abo babalomera.
42002019	Aye Malyamu ngʼata ebibono ebyo byosibyosi hu mwoyo, nʼabiŋeegangaho bugali.
42002020	Ngʼaŋo abaayi bagamayo hu byayo byawe ni bajumirya Hatonda era ni bamuŋa eŋono olwʼebyo ebi baali ni baŋuliiye era ni baweene, olwohuba byosibyosi byali ngʼolu malayika gaali nʼabalomeeye.
42002021	Omwana ni goosa endaalo munaana ohumuhomola, bamuguliha esiina baati Yesu, eri malayika galoma omwana nʼahiiri nʼohuba mu hida.
42002022	Endaalo jʼomukolo gwʼohwegwalaasa ogwabangaŋo abahasi ni bahenire ohusaala ni jaŋwa ngʼolu magambi aga Hatonda gaŋa Musa galagira, nga Yosefu ni Malyamu baŋira Yesu e Yerusaalemu ohumuŋayo eyiri Hatonda Musengwa.
42002023	Hino bahihola olwʼohwoheresa ehyaŋandiihiwa mu magambi ga Musengwa hiiti, “Hiisi mwana omuseere omudaayi banamuŋengayo eyiri Hatonda Musengwa.”
42002024	Era batiina nʼebyohuŋonga ngʼolu hiiri mu magambi ga Hatonda Musengwa: “enjiiwa ebiri oba amaŋuusi amaŋere abiri.”
42002025	Ŋaahani yaaliyo omusinde mu Yerusaalemu oyu balanganga baati Simyoni. Omusinde oyo gaaliho amaani gʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu, nʼali mugwalaafu, nʼaŋamba ebiragiro bya Hatonda era nʼahuumiriiye ohubonaho ohununula hwa Yisirayiri.
42002026	Omwoyo Omutukuvu gaali amusuubihiise ati alibona hu Kurisito oyu Hatonda Musengwa gafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu, ko gaafa.
42002027	Ngʼaŋo Omwoyo Omutukuvu amutangirira amuŋira mu lunya lwa Yekaalu. Abasaaye ba Yesu ni bamwosa hu Yekaalu ohuhola ebi amagambi galoma,
42002028	nga Simyoni anaaŋa omwana hu nyina, ahena ajumirya Hatonda ati,
42002029	“Ale Hatonda Musengwa, ngʼolu wʼasuubisa ganya omuŋeeresa wuwo aŋuumule nʼemiyaaya.
42002030	Olwohuba mbwene Omunoŋosi
42002031	oyu wategehera abaatu bosibosi,
42002032	abe enjase ohulaga Abatali Bayudaaya ehi Hatonda ali, era aŋeese abaatu babo Abayisirayiri eŋono.”
42002033	Nga Yosefu ni Malyamu beeŋunja olwʼebibono ebi Simyoni galoma hu mwana oyo.
42002034	Ngʼaŋo Simyoni abasabira ekabi ahena aloma Malyamu nyina ati, “Omwana ono Hatonda gamwangala, bangi mu Yisirayiri bamufugiirire banoŋohe era bangi bamwegaane basihiirihe. Aja huba ahabonero ohulaga ati aŋwa ewa Hatonda aye sibaja hu hifugiirira,
42002035	ko ebiŋeego ebibi ebyomu myoyo jʼabaatu abeene abangi byeyolehe. Era enaku erifumita omwoyo gugwo hyʼepiima.”
42002036	Era ŋaaliŋo naabbi omuhasi owaali omuhayire ni bamulanga baati Ana omuhaana wa Fanweri owʼehiha hya Aseri. Omuhasi oyo ni gafumbirwa gahena emyaha musanvu, wamwe ngʼafa.
42002037	Ohuŋwa hulwo gaali ahenire emyaha cinaana nʼene nʼali namwandu era omuusi nʼowiire sigaŋwanga mu Yekaalu, galinga mu hujumirya Hatonda, nʼasaba era nʼasiiba.
42002038	Nga mu hiseera ehyene ehyo, omuhasi oyo atiina aŋa Malyamu ni Yosefu baali, nga geyaasa Hatonda olwʼomwana oyo. Era ngʼalomera abo bosibosi abaali ni bahuumirira Hatonda ohununula Yerusaalemu ebiŋamba hu mwana oyo.
42002039	Yosefu ni Malyamu ni bahena ohuhola byosibyosi ngʼolu magambi ga Hatonda Musengwa galoma, nga balucuusa bagamayo ewaawe mu hibuga hyʼe Nazaleesi mu Galilaaya.
42002040	Ngʼaŋo omwana oyo geyongera ohuhula mu hirangi nʼomu magesi, ngʼaba nʼamaani era omuhoda eyiri Hatonda.
42002041	Ŋaahani hiisi mwaha abasaaye ba Yesu batiinanga e Yerusaalemu hu Mbaga eyʼOhubihisya.
42002042	Yesu ni goosa emyaha ehumi nʼebiri, nga batiina ni naye e Yerusaalemu hu mbaga eyʼOhubihisya ngʼolu esambo yaawe yaali.
42002043	Embaga ni yaŋwa, abasaaye ba Yesu ni baali ni bagamayo, baŋeega baati Yesu ali ni nabo aye gaali asigaye e Yerusaalemu.
42002044	Ni baali ni bahagendaho olugendo olwʼoludaalo lulala nga ko bafaania baati gaali saali mu hiŋindi hyʼabaatu aba baali ni bagenda ni nabo. Ngʼaŋo batandiha ohumwendula hiisi ŋaatu, mu balebe nʼomu mihago jaawe.
42002045	Ni bamuhaya, nga bagamayo e Yerusaalemu ohumwendula.
42002046	Ni ŋabitaŋo endaalo edatu nga ko bamugwirihirira mu lunya lwa Yekaalu nʼaŋaya nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi, nʼabaŋuliirisa era nʼababuusa ebibuuso.
42002047	Bosibosi abamuŋuliirisa beŋunja olwʼamagesi nʼengeri eyi gagobolangamo ebibuuso.
42002048	Abasaaye babe ni bamubona, ngʼemyoyo jibeeha aye basigala ni beŋunja. Nga nyina amuloma ati, “Mwana wase, lwahiina otuholire otyo? Ese ni lataawo hubaaye huhwedula ni hweŋendehereeye.”
42002049	Nga niye abagobolamo ati, “Lwahiina mubaaye munyendula? Simumanyire muuti ndi nʼohuba mu nyumba ya Bbaabba?”
42002050	Aye nibo ndibategeere ehi gaali nʼaloma.
42002051	Ngʼaŋo gaagama ni nabo e Nazaleesi era ngʼaba mugondi eyi bali nʼabaŋulira. Nga nyina ata ebyo byosibyosi hu mwoyo era ngʼabiŋeegangaho.
42002052	Ngʼaŋo Yesu geyongera ohuhula mu hirangi nʼomu magesi, nʼali muhoda eyiri abaatu ni Hatonda.
42003001	Mu mwaha ogwʼehumi nʼetaanu ogwʼomulembe gwa Tibberiyo habaha wʼe Rooma, Pootiyo Pilaato gaali aŋuga etwale lyʼe Buyudaaya ni Herode nʼaŋuga eryʼe Galilaaya, ni mulebe wuwe Filipo nʼaŋuga etwale eryʼe Yituraaya ni Turakoniti, ni Lisaniya nʼaŋuga eryʼAbbileene.
42003002	Era Anaasi ni Kayaafa baali njʼabahulu bʼabasengi, Hatonda gaŋa Yowaane omusaani wa Zakaliya owaali nʼamenya mu lulafu obuhwenda aje alomere abaatu.
42003003	Ngʼaŋo Yowaane agenda mu bitahere byosibyosi ebiririheene olwabi Yoludaani nʼaloma abaatu bebbwage bacuuse emyoyo babatiziwe, Hatonda abasoniŋe ebibi.
42003004	Yowaane gahola hino ni goheresa ebyaŋandiihiwa mu hitabo hya naabbi Yisaaya ebiroma biiti, “Ŋaliŋo ejanjaasi eryʼamaani eriŋwera mu lulafu omuutu nʼalangirira ati, ‘Muhosiirire Musengwa engira, muluŋamye amagira gage.
42003005	Hiisi hiiho muhijuse; era hiisi lusozi muluteremuse. Muluŋamye amagira amagodami, mugwalaase nʼebiŋigi.
42003006	Era hiisi muutu anahabone ohunoŋola hwa Hatonda.’ ”
42003007	Eduuli lyʼabaatu nga litiinanga eyiri Yowaane ababatize, ngʼabalomanga ati, “Enywe abaatu abahabi hyʼetemu, njʼani owabalabula ohuŋunuha ehiruŋi hya Hatonda?
42003008	Ale ŋaahani muhole ebikolwa ebiraga biiti mwebbwagire mulehireŋo ebibi byenywe. ‘Mulehere aŋo ohuloma muuti mbo muli bagwalaafu olwohuba muli bejuhulu ba Yibbulayimu.’ Mbalomera ti Hatonda aŋanga ohucuusa amabaale gano gafuuha bejuhulu ba Yibbulayimu.
42003009	Ŋaahani mumanye muuti muli hyʼemisaala eji muutu ategeheeye aŋo embasa ohujitema. Era hiisi musaala ogutaama bibala ebiraŋi baja hugutema, bagudanye mu muliro.”
42003010	Ngʼaŋo abaatu bamubuusa baati, “Ŋaahani huhole hi?”
42003011	Ngʼabagobolamo ati, “Ali nʼebyambalo bibiri aŋeho oyo aŋuma era ali nʼebiryo yeesi ahole atyo.”
42003012	Abaŋoosa boosi nga batiina ohubabatiza, nga bamubuusa baati, “Omusomesa, huhole hi?”
42003013	Ngʼabagobolamo ati, “Mutasolonganga ohuhira ehi babaloma.”
42003014	Abasirikale boosi nga bamubuusa baati, “Ate efe, huhole hi?” Ngʼabaloma ati, “Mutanyaganga ebyabeene era mutaŋayirisanga muutu yesiyesi. Omuhemba gwenywe gubahenenga.”
42003015	Ngʼaŋo abaatu bosibosi batandiha ohwebuusa mu myoyo jaawe hanye Yowaane nje Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu oyu bali ni balindiriye.
42003016	Nga Yowaane abaloma ati, “Ese mbabatiza nʼamaaji aye owukira obuŋangi gaaja oyu toola wayire nʼohuboŋolola ekoba jʼengayito jije namwoga amagulu era oyo alibabatiza nʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu nʼomuliro.
42003017	Niye anahaabule mu baatu ngʼolu omuutu aŋamba olugali gahonja ohwabula omuhuuji nʼembehe. Embehe nijo ajihumbaania gajibiiha mu hyagi aye omuhuuji ŋalala nʼebidete alibyohya nʼomuliro ogutasima.”
42003018	Yowaane atyo pogalabulanga abaatu nʼatambisa ebibono hyʼebyo era nabalomeranga Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi.
42003019	Aye goloobya Herode owaali nʼaŋuga etwale lyʼe Galilaaya olwa Herodiya oyu gaali nʼapaahise hu mulebewe nʼolwebibi ebindi ebi gaahola.
42003020	Herode sigahoma aŋo, gongera ehibi hu hibi, galagira bandanye Yowaane mu komera.
42003021	Olwolire abaatu abandi ni baali ni babatiziwa, nga Yesu yeesi atiina bamubatize. Ni bahena ohumubatiza, ni gaali nʼahisaba, ngʼegulu liwihuha,
42003022	ngʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu nʼali mu hifaananyi hyʼeŋuusi amwihaho. Era ejanjaasi nga liŋwa mwigulu ni ŋaliŋo aloma ati, “Ndiiwe Omwana wange omuhoda, owunesiimisa.”
42003023	Yesu ni gatandiha emirimo jije gaali aŋesa emyaha amahumi adatu, abaatu ni bamulanga musaani wa Yosefu, omusaani wa Heli.
42003024	Heli gaali musaani wa Matati, Matati musaani wa Leevi, Leevi musaani wa Meleki, Meleki musaani wa Yanaayi, Yanaayi musaani wa Yosefu.
42003025	Yosefu gaali musaani wa Matatiya, Matatiya musaani wʼAmosi. Amosi musaani wa Nahumu, Nahumu musaani wʼEsili, Esili musaani wa Nagayi.
42003026	Nagayi musaani wa Maati, Maati musaani wa Matatiya, Matatiya musaani wa Semeeyi, Semeeyi musaani wa Yoseki, Yoseki musaani wa Yoda.
42003027	Yoda niye gaali musaani wa Yowanani, Yowanani musaani wa Reesa, Reesa musaani wa Zerubbabbeeri, Zerubbabbeeri musaani wa Salutyeri. Salutyeri musaani wa Neeri,
42003028	Neeri musaani wa Meleki, Meleki musaani wʼAdi, Adi musaani wa Kosamu, Kosamu musaani wʼElimadamu, Elimadamu musaani wʼEli.
42003029	Eli niye gaali musaani wa Yoswa, Yoswa musaani wʼElyeza, Elyeza musaani wa Yorimu, Yorimu musaani wa Matati, Matati musaani wa Leevi.
42003030	Leevi musaani wa Simyoni, Simyoni musaani wa Yuda, Yuda musaani wa Yosefu, Yosefu musaani wa Yonamu, Yonamu musaani wʼEliyakimu.
42003031	Eliyakimu niye gaali musaani wa Meleya, Meleya musaani wa Meena, Meena musaani wa Mataasa. Mataasa musaani wa Nasani, Nasani musaani wa Dawudi,
42003032	Dawudi musaani wa Yese, Yese musaani wʼObbedi. Obbedi musaani wa Bbowaazi, Bbowaazi musaani wa Salumoni, Salumoni musaani wa Nasoni.
42003033	Nasoni niye gaali musaani wa Aminadabbu, Aminadabbu musaani wʼAdimiini, Adimiini musaani wʼAruni. Aruni musaani wa Hezirooni, Hezirooni musaani wa Pereezi, Pereezi musaani wa Yuda.
42003034	Yuda musaani wa Yakobbo, Yakobbo musaani wa Yisaka, Yisaka musaani wa Yibbulayimu. Yibbulayimu musaani wa Teera, Teera musaani wa Naholi.
42003035	Naholi niye gaali musaani wa Serugi, Serugi musaani wa Reewu. Reewu musaani wa Peleegi, Peleegi musaani wʼEbberi, Ebberi musaani wa Seela.
42003036	Seela musaani wa Kanaani, Kanaani musaani wa Alupakusaadi, Alupakusaadi musaani wa Seemu, Seemu musaani wa Nuwa, Nuwa musaani wa Lameeka.
42003037	Lameeka musaani wa Mesuseela, Mesuseela musaani wʼEnoka, Enoka musaani wa Yaledi. Yaledi musaani wa Mahalaleeri, Mahalaleeri musaani wa Kanaani,
42003038	Kanaani musaani wʼEnosi. Enosi musaani wa Seesi, Seesi musaani wʼAdamu, Adamu mwana wa Hatonda.
42004001	Ngʼaŋo Omwoyo Omutukuvu amaamira Yesu, amutusa hu lwabi Yoludaani amuluŋamya amuŋira mu lulafu,
42004002	ngʼahenayo endaalo amahumi ane, Sitaani nʼamuhema. Ahamanga aho hosihosi sigalyaho hiitu hyosihyosi era enjala yamuluma.
42004003	Nga Sitaani amuloma ati, “Nʼoba nʼoli Mwana wa Hatonda, lagira ebaale lino lifuuhe biryo, olye.”
42004004	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, ‘Omuutu saanabenga mulamu lwa biryo byoŋene.’ ”
42004005	Ngʼaŋo Sitaani aŋira Yesu ŋamugulu hu lusozi, ngʼamangu ago amulaga owahabaha bwosibwosi owohu hyalo.
42004006	Ngʼamuloma ati, “Nja huhuŋa obuŋangi ohuŋuga obwahabaha obu oweene ko nʼebyobuŋoono ebitiniraho olwohuba babipambya era panga ohubiŋa oyo oyu mbyendesa.
42004007	Olwʼehyo, byosibyosi binaabe bibyo, singa onanjumirye.”
42004008	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, ‘Onajumiryenga nje Hatonda Musengwawo era njʼoyu onaŋeeresenge yeŋene.’ ”
42004009	Ngʼaŋo Sitaani aŋira Yesu e Yerusaalemu amuninia hu hisuli hya Yekaalu amuloma ati, “Nʼoba nʼoli Mwana wa Hatonda, tuuma ogwe ŋaasi,”
42004010	olwohuba hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “ ‘Hatonda aliragira abamalayika babe baahuyeeda,’
42004011	era hiiti, ‘Balihubbaha ndiwegumula hu mabaale huhulumya magulu.’ ”
42004012	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, ‘Soohemanga Hatonda Musengwawo.’ ”
42004013	Sitaani ni gahena ohuhema Yesu, ngʼamuleha nʼamuhuumire ehiseera ehindi.
42004014	Ngʼaŋo Yesu gagamayo mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya nʼali nʼamaani agʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu. Ngʼefuma lirye lihwana mu twale eryo lyosiryosi.
42004015	Ngʼasomesa mu mahumbaaniro gaawe era hiisi muutu owamuŋulira nʼasomesa, gamutenda.
42004016	Ngʼaŋo Yesu atiina e Nazaleesi eyi gahulira. Ngʼolu yaali esambo yiye, hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato gatiina mu humbaaniro nga bamusunga ohusoma ehyaŋandiihiwa.
42004017	Nga bamuŋambya ehitabo hya naabbi Yisaaya, awihula ngʼasoma aŋaloma ŋaati,
42004018	“Omwoyo wa Hatonda Musengwa gamaamiye, olwohuba ganyangala ohulomera abagadi Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi. Gaatumire ohulangirira ti abasibe baja hubaboŋolola, nʼabaŋofu boosi baja huŋona. Era gaatuma ohutaasa ababanyigirisa,
42004019	Nʼohulangirira ti njʼehiseera ehya Hatonda Musengwa ohunoŋola ababe.”
42004020	Ni gahena ohusoma ngʼawiihaŋo agobohesa omuŋeeresa womu humbaaniro ehitabo ngʼahena gehala. Ngʼabaatu bosibosi mu humbaaniro bamutaho emoni.
42004021	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Olwa leero ehyaŋandiihiwa hino hyolereye eyi muli.”
42004022	Ngʼaŋo bosibosi beeŋunja olwʼebibono ebiraŋi ebi galoma, ngʼabaloma baati, “Ono sinje omusaani wa Yosefu oyu hwesihwesi humanyire?”
42004023	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Buhomya weene, muja hungerera olugero oluloma luuti, ‘Omuŋeŋa, weŋeŋe.’ Era muja humedaho muuti, ‘Holeraho ŋano ebi hwaŋulira huuti waholera e Kaperanawumu.’ ”
42004024	Ne ese mbaloma ati, “Mu butuufu, naabbi sibamuŋangaho eŋono ewaawe!
42004025	Muhebulire muuti mu mulembe gwʼEriya olu endoboli yatula efula ndiyitonya ohuhena emyaha edatu nʼemyesi mukaaga enjala enyene eyʼamaani yagwa hu hyalo. Mu hiseera ehyo ŋaaliŋo abanamwandu bangi mu Yisirayiri
42004026	coka Eriya sibamutuma eyiri mulala hwʼabo aye bamutuma yiwa namwandu owaali e Zerafaasi mu hyalo hyʼe Sidoni.
42004027	Era mu mirembe ja naabbi Elisa, ŋaaliŋo abagenge bangi mu Yisirayiri aye ŋaŋuma kadi mulala owaŋona ohutusaho Naamani Omusiriya.”
42004028	Abaatu bosibosi mu humbaaniro ni baŋulira ebyo, ngʼehiruŋi hibaŋamba,
42004029	nga benyoha bamusindigirisa bamutusa bamuŋira hu mugo gwʼolusozi ohubatongola ehibuga hyabwe; olwohuba bendire bamusindihe agwe ŋaasi mu luloŋo.
42004030	Aye gabeŋunula gababitamo, nga getiinira.
42004031	Ngʼaŋo Yesu atiina e Kaperanawumu ehibuga ehyomu Galilaaya, nga hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato atiina mu humbaaniro asomesa abaatu ebiŋamba hu Hatonda.
42004032	Ngʼaŋo abaatu beŋunja bugali ekola eyi gasomesamo olwohuba gasomesa nʼobuŋangi.
42004033	Mu humbaaniro omwo mwalimo omuutu owaaliho omusambwa. Ngʼomuutu oyo alomera ŋamugulu ati,
42004034	“O, Otuhaabya hiina ewe Yesu Omunazaleesi? Wujiire ohutusihiirisa? Ese kumanyire! Ndiiwe Omwabufu wa Hatonda.”
42004035	Nga Yesu ahayula omusambwa ogwo ati, “Ŋoleera! Ŋwa nʼohu muutu oyo.” Omusambwa nga guhubbiraŋo omusinde oyo ehigo nga guhena gumuŋwaho ni ŋaŋuma hisago hyosihyosi ehi gumwohiiseho.
42004036	Ngʼabaatu bosibosi beŋunja era nga bebuusa baati, “Esomesa yino ya ngeri hi? Obona alagira hulagira nʼamaani nʼobuŋangi emisambwa jaŋwa hu muutu!”
42004037	Ngʼefuma yiye yihwana hiisi ŋaatu mu twale eryo.
42004038	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aŋwa mu humbaaniro eryo, atiina gengira mu nyumba ya Simooni. Mu hiseera ehyo, masaala ya Simooni gaaliŋo nʼali mulwaye wʼomusuuja omwene ogwʼamaani, nga basunga Yesu amuŋonie.
42004039	Nga Yesu atiina gemeerera, ahotama aŋaali omulwaye oyo, alagira omusuuja nga guŋona. Aŋo ni naaŋo ngʼomulwaye oyo genyoha atandiha ohubategeheraŋo ehyʼohulya.
42004040	Esaawa niija ohugwa mu maaji, abaatu abaali nʼabalwaye baawe abaali nʼobulwaye owa hiisi ngeri, babaleeta eyiri Yesu ngʼaŋamba hu hiisi mulwaye amuŋonia.
42004041	Era bangi abaaliho emisambwa, jabaŋwaho ni jiromera ŋamugulu jiiti, “Ndiiwe Omwana wa Hatonda!” Yesu nʼajihabuhira hujihabuhira, nʼatajiganya huloma olwohuba jaali jimumanyire jiiti nje Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu.
42004042	Oludaalo olwalondaho ko ni wanuuha, nga Yesu atiina mu hifo eŋuma baatu. Ngʼabaatu bamwendula ohwola olu bamubona era sibendire abaŋweho atiine aŋaatu aŋandi.
42004043	Cooka niye ngʼabaloma ati, “Ndi nʼohutiina mu bibuga ebindi yoosi ndomere abaatu baayo Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu buŋugi bwa Hatonda, olwohuba njʼehyagira gaatuma.”
42004044	Era geyongera ohulomera abaatu ehibono hya Hatonda mu mahumbaaniro gomu Buyudaaya.
42005001	Lulala Yesu ni gaali ni gemereeye hwigenya lwʼenyanja Genesareeti, ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu hyaja hyʼaŋindigana aŋaali baŋulire ehibono hya Hatonda.
42005002	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abona amaato abiri ni gali aŋo hwigenya wʼenyanja, agʼabenuli bali ni balehire aŋo ni bali hugonjoola obutimba bwawe.
42005003	Nga Yesu aniina mwirala hu maato ago, eryali erya Simooni era gamusunga alisendeho ŋadiidiri mu maaji ohuŋwa hu woomu. Nga Yesu geehala atandiha ohusomesa abaatu.
42005004	Ni gahena ohusomesa, ngʼaloma Simooni ati, “Hwesendeho mu maaji amangi otege obutimba, mwinule.”
42005005	Nga Simooni amuloma ati, “Musengwa, hufululuhene hwahyesa huhyerere. Ne onaloma otyo, haatege obutimba.”
42005006	Ni baatega obutimba, nga baŋambya enyeeni enyene enyingi huupi jihapule obutimba.
42005007	Nga basimirya abahyawe abaali mu lyato erindi, baaje babayeede. Ni baaja, nga beejusa amaato ago gombi enyeeni. Era olwʼobusito, huupi geyinihe.
42005008	Simooni oyu balanganga erindi baati Peetero ni gabona hino, ngʼahubba amafuha ohuupi ni Yesu, ngʼamuloma ati, “Ndehe, Musengwa. Olwohuba ese, ndi muutu mubbengi!”
42005009	Peetero galoma atyo olwohuba niye nʼabahye bosibosi aba gaali ni nabo, obuti bwali bubaŋambire olwʼobungi bwʼenyeeni eji baali ni baŋambisye.
42005010	Yakobbo ni Yowaane abasaani ba Zebbedaayo, abameeri ba Simooni boosi obuti wabaŋamba. Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma Simooni ati, “Otatya, olwohuba ohuŋwa olwa leero muhifo hyʼohwinulanga enyeeni, munenulenge abaatu mwabaleeta bafuuha baloobera bange.”
42005011	Ngʼaŋo bagobosa amaato gaawe hu woomu, ngʼebyo babiŋwaho bagendanga ni Yesu.
42005012	Lulala Yesu gaali mu hibuga omwali omusinde omugenge. Ngʼomugenge oyo atiina ahubba amafuha mu moni jije amwegalihira ati, “Muhulu, ni huba ni huli husiima huhwo, ponie.”
42005013	Nga Yesu amuŋambaho amuloma ati, “Njʼohusiima hwange, era ŋona.” Era nga ŋaweene aŋo ebigenge biŋona.
42005014	Ngʼaŋo Yesu amuhamiirisa atalomeraho omuutu yesiyesi, ohutusaho gamuloma ati, “Tiina weyanjule eyiri omusengi wa Hatonda oŋeyo eŋongo ngʼolu naabbi Musa galagira bube bujulizi obubahahasa ti oŋonire.”
42005015	Aye efuma ya Yesu yeyongera nʼohuhiraho, ehyaŋwamo abaatu bangi ohutiinanga eyi ali bamuŋulirise era abaŋonie nʼobulwaye bwawe.
42005016	Aye efundi nyingi Yesu gatiinanga gesyeneeha ebula abaatu, gasaba.
42005017	Lulala Yesu ni gaali nʼasomesa, Abafalisaayo nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi ga Hatonda ohuŋwa mu hiisi haalo hʼe Galilaaya nʼe Buyudaaya nʼomu Yerusaalemu boosi baaliŋo ni behaaye aŋo. Amaani ga Hatonda Musengwa gaali ni Yesu ohusobola ohuŋonianga abalwaye.
42005018	Ngʼaŋo ŋabaŋo abasinde abaŋira omuutu owaali nʼasanyalaaye ni bamugegire hu musigaasiga, nga bagesyaho ohumwingisa bamute aŋa Yesu gaali.
42005019	Aye olwʼeduuli lyʼabaatu, sibasobola. Nga baniina ŋamugulu hu nyumba, nga baŋomola ehituli bamwihisa hu musigaasiga aŋa Yesu gaali.
42005020	Yesu ni gabona ohufugiirira hwawe, ngʼamuloma ati, “Meeri yange, kusoniŋire ebibi bibyo.”
42005021	NgʼAbafalisaayo abo nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi batandiha ohuloma abeene nʼabeene baati, “Ono gelanga ani? Ohwo hufodogola. Njʼani asobola ohusoniŋa ebibi ohutusaho Hatonda yeŋene?”
42005022	Yesu gamanya ebiŋeego byawe ngʼabaloma ati, “Lwahiina muli hwebuusa mu myoyo jenywe muutyo?
42005023	Ehihiraho owangu njʼehiri ŋeena, ohuloma ti ‘Kusoniŋire ebibi bibyo,’ oba ti, ‘Yinyoha ogende?’
42005024	Ŋaahani nja hubalaga ti Omwana wʼOmuutu ali nʼobuŋangi hu hyalo ohusoniŋa ebibi.” Ngʼaŋo aloma owaali nʼasanyalaaye oyo ati, “Yinyoha ogege ehidugi hihyo wagameyo ewenywe.”
42005025	Aŋo ni naaŋo ngʼomusinde oyo genyoha bosibosi ni bamutaayeho emoni, aŋamba ehidugi hihye gagamayo engo nʼajumirya Hatonda.
42005026	Nga bosibosi abaaliŋo beŋunja, bajumirya Hatonda era ngʼolusisimo lubaŋamba baloma baati, “Olwa leero huweene ebyamaliholiho!”
42005027	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, nga Yesu aŋwaŋo atiina. Ni gaali nʼagenda ngʼabona omuŋoosa oyu balanganga baati Leevi ni gehaaye aŋa baŋoosesa nʼaŋoosa. Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Nja ofuuhe omwegi wange.”
42005028	Ngʼebyo byosibyosi Leevi abiŋwaho, genyoha atiina ni Yesu.
42005029	Nga Leevi ahyasa Yesu ewuwe amunyiiyira embaga enyene eyʼamaani. Omutoolo gwʼabaŋoosa nʼabaatu abandi abahosi bʼebibi batiina beehala nga baliira ŋalala ninaye.
42005030	Aye Abafalisaayo nʼabasomesa baawe abʼamagambi abomu hibbubbu hyawe bemulugunya era nga baloma abeegi ba Yesu baati, “Lwahiina mulya nʼabaŋoosa ko nʼabaatu abandi abahosi bʼebibi?”
42005031	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Abaatu abalamu sibetaaga musaŋu ohutusaho abalwaye.
42005032	Sinaaja hwendula aberanga abalaŋi, ohutusaho abahosi bʼebibi.”
42005033	NgʼAbafalisaayo nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi abo baloma Yesu baati, “Abeegi ba Yowaane nʼaba Abafalisaayo basiiba era basaba aŋa ni naŋa aye ababo sibasiiba, balya hiisi ludaalo.”
42005034	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Abalange hu mbaga yʼobugole baŋanga ohusiiba ahooye omweŋa nʼahiiri ni nabo?
42005035	Aye ehiseera hiryola babatusaho ahooye omweŋa. Hu olwo ndʼolu balitandiha ohusiiba.”
42005036	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abagerera olugero ati, “Ebula asala ehiŋero ehyʼolugoye olunyaaha gahitunga mu lugoye oluhayire. Nʼahihola aba gononire olugoye olunyaaha era ehiŋero ehinyaaha sihiŋambagana nʼehiŋero ehihayire.
42005037	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, sibajuha mwenge ogwomu mizabbibbu epiiraŋo mu saŋu eyʼehyanjo ekayire. Singa ohihola, gwadisa esaŋu eyo nga byombi obifiirwa.
42005038	Aye omwenge gwomu mizabbibbu epiiraŋo, bagujuha mu saŋu yʼehyanjo ehinyaaha.
42005039	Omuutu ananywaho omwenge gwomu mizabbibbu endoota, sigenda epiiraŋo olwohuba aloma ati, ‘Endoota ehira epiiraŋo ohuŋooma.’ ”
42006001	Lulala hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato, Yesu nʼabeegi babe baali babita mu ngira eyibita mu muga gwʼengaano. Abeegi babe nga batiinanga ni baŋulula amagala gʼengaano nga bahunyaho omuhuuji bahena bemunga embehe.
42006002	Balala hu Bafalisaayo nga babuusa baati, “Lwahiina muhola ehi magambi geefe gatatufugiirira huhola hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato?”
42006003	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Simusomangaho hu ehi Dawudi gahola olu niye nʼabahye aba gaali ni nabo baali ni baŋuma hyʼohulya?
42006004	Dawudi gengira mu weema ya Hatonda ngʼalya emigaati eji baali ni baŋongire eyiri Hatonda. Amagambi gafugiirira basengi ba Hatonda boŋene ohulya emigaati ejo. Cooka Dawudi gajirya era gaŋaho nʼaba gaali ni nabo.”
42006005	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma Abafalisaayo ati, “Omwana wʼOmuutu nje Musengwa aŋuga oludaalo lwa Sabbaato.”
42006006	Hu Sabbaato eyindi, Yesu gatiina mu humbaaniro lyʼAbayudaaya era ni gaali nʼasomesa, hulwo mwalimo omusinde owaali nʼomuhono omulungi ni gwaŋotoha.
42006007	NgʼAbafalisaayo nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi ga Hatonda bahaŋaasa Yesu babone oba hanye anaŋonie owʼomuhono omuŋotohi hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato, basune ehi baneemeho ohumuŋaŋabira.
42006008	Aye Yesu gamanya ebiŋeego byawe, ngʼaloma omusinde oyo owaali nʼaŋotohire omuhono ati, “Yinyoha wemereere aŋa hiisi muutu asobola ohuhubona.” Ngʼola genyoha gemeerera.
42006009	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abaloma ati, “Mbabuusa enywe, hiraŋi ohuhola obulaŋi hu Sabbaato? Huŋonia bulamu, oba hubusihiirisa?”
42006010	Nga Yesu abetoloosamo emoni bosibosi ngʼaŋo aloma omusinde oyo ati, “Waama, januula omuhono gugwo.” Ngʼagujanuula, nga guŋonera erala.
42006011	Aye abasigu ba Yesu abo, nga baluŋa era batandiha ohuteesa ehyʼohumuhola.
42006012	Lulala mu biseera ebyo, Yesu gatiina hu lusozi ohusaba era gahyesa nʼasaba.
42006013	Ni wahya, ngʼalanga abeegi babe besende aŋa ali, ngʼahena atobola ehumi nʼababiri, abaguliha ti bahwenda.
42006014	Era abahwenda abo nje Simooni, oyu gameedaho erya Peetero, ni mulebewe Andereya ni Yakobbo ni Yowaane ni Filipo ni Bbatulumaayo,
42006015	ni Matayo ni Tomasi ni Yakobbo omusaani wʼAlufaayo ni Simooni Omuzelote,
42006016	ni Yuda mulebe wa Yakobbo ko ni Yuda Yisikaryoti owamulyamo oluhwe.
42006017	Ngʼaŋo Yesu ateremuha nʼabahwenda babe abo, ngʼatiina gemeerera mu hifo ehiterefu. Mu hifo ehyo mwali muhumbaaniyemo ehibbubbu hyʼabaloobera babe nʼoguŋindi gwʼabaatu abaali ni baŋooye mu twale lyʼe Buyudaaya lyosiryosi nʼomu Yerusaalemu nʼohumyalo ejʼe Tiiro ni Sidoni.
42006018	Abaatu abo bosibosi batiina huŋulira ebi asomesa era nʼohubaŋonia obulwaye waawe. Ni naabo abaaliho emisambwa, bajibabbingeho.
42006019	Hiisi mulala hu bo genyigirisa asobole ohumwolerera amuŋambeho gahaŋona, olwohuba amaani agaŋonia gamuŋwangamo ni gabaŋonia.
42006020	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aheja hu beegi babe abaloma ati, “Muli nʼekabi abagadi olwohuba muhenire ohwingira mu Buŋugi bwa Hatonda.
42006021	Muli nʼekabi abayala hatyane, olwohuba muliguta. Muli nʼekabi abalira hatyane, olwohuba mulijeha.
42006022	Muli nʼekabi abaatu ni babacaawanga, bababoola era babaduha baahena babalanga babi hu lwʼOmwana wʼOmuutu.
42006023	“Musangaalenga era mwenyoonye olwohuba muli nʼomuhemba mubba mwigulu. Abasehulu babwe boosi baholanga baatyo abanaabbi.
42006024	“Jibageene enywe abaŋinda hatyane, olwohuba obuŋinda ni bunahabaŋweho, muligada.
42006025	“Jibageene enywe omulya ni mwiguta hatyane olwohuba mwesi enjala enahabalume. Jibageene enywe abagiginala hatyane, olwohuba muligawihaho.
42006026	“Jibageene enywe aba hiisi muutu apaaha. Olwohuba abasehulu baawe po bapaahanga baatyo abanaabbi abʼobudulingi.
42006027	“Ne mbaloma enywe abapulirisa, ti mwendenga abalabe benywe era muholerenga abatabenda ebiraŋi.
42006028	Musabirenga ababaŋwaba ekabi. Era musabirenga abo ababagudya.
42006029	Omuutu nahuhubbanga oluŋi hwitama, mucuuhise ahubbe nʼohulindi. Oyo aŋira ekooti yiyo, omuŋanga nʼesaati yoosi.
42006030	Singa omuutu ahusunga ehiitu, muŋenga. Omuutu anaŋira ebibyo, omuleheranga.
42006031	Muholerenga abahyenywe ebi mwahendire mwesi babaholere.
42006032	“Ni munendenga ababenda boŋene, ehyo hibaŋeesa ekabi? Nʼabahola ebibi boosi benda ababenda!
42006033	Era ni munayeedenga ababayeeda boŋene, ehyo hibaŋeesa ekabi? Nʼabahosi bʼebibi po bahola.
42006034	Singa muŋola abo aba musuubira ohubasasula boŋene, ehyo hibaŋeesa ekabi? Nʼabahosi bʼebibi boosi baŋola ababi bahyawe.
42006035	Aye mwendenga abalabe benywe era mubabisyenga bulaŋi. Mutatanga mwoyo eyi muŋolire. Aŋo mulisuna omuhemba mubba era mulifuuha baana bʼOyo Owaŋamugulu Obugali, olwohuba niye mulaŋi eyiri abatasiima nʼababi.
42006036	Mube nʼehisa ngʼolu Senywe ali mwigulu ali wʼehisa.
42006037	“Mutasaliranga bahyenywe emisango, mwesi Hatonda saalibasalira. Mutasaliranga bahyenywe ehibonereso, mwesi mwahaŋona ohubasalira. Musoniŋenga abo ababahola ebisirisinye, mwesi bali basoniŋa.
42006038	Mugabenga, mwesi bali bagabira. Mutambisanga ehipimo ehituufu, ehi musegehiise mwasinya bulaŋi mwataho nʼomutwe, olwohuba ehipimo ehyene ehyo cʼehi balibapimiramo mwesi.”
42006039	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abagerera olugero ati, “Omuŋofu saatangirira omuŋofu wahye. Hino kiroma olwohuba anahihola, bombi bagwa mwiroŋo.
42006040	Omusomi saahira musomesa wuwe aye hiisi oyu basomesa nʼahena ohwega bulaŋi, aba hyʼowamusomesa.
42006041	“Lwahiina ehiri hu wahyo njʼehiraŋi hyʼohuloma, waleherera ehihuliho ewe wamwene?
42006042	Oŋanga otye ohuloma mulebewo oti, ‘Mulebe yange, leha kutuse ahaatu hu moni,’ aye ewe wamwene nʼotebona oguutu oguli hu moni? Ewe, owegesiŋasa sooka wetuseho oguutu oguhuli hu moni ko oŋange ohutusa ahaatu ahali hu wahyo.
42006043	“Omusaala omulaŋi sigwama bibala ebibi era nʼomusaala omubi sigwama bibala ebiraŋi.
42006044	Hiisi musaala gumanyihira hu bibala ebi gwama. Ebibala byohu mutiini sibabinoga hu buŋwa obusaba, nʼebibala byʼemizabbibbu sibabinoga hu manani.
42006045	Omuutu anaba nʼomwoyo omulaŋi, ahola ebiraŋi ebiri mu mwoyo gugwe, ne anaba nʼomwoyo omubi, ahola ebibi nʼabitusa mu mungo yʼebibi eyiri mu mwoyo gugwe. Olwohuba ebi omuutu aloma, abitusa hu mungo eyʼebyo ebiba mu mwoyo gugwe.
42006046	“Lwahiina munanga muuti, ‘Musengwa, Musengwaʼ, aye simugondera ebi mbaloma?’
42006047	Leha mbalage ngʼolu hiisi omuutu owuuja eyi ndi gaaŋulira ebibono byange gahena gaabihola, afaana.
42006048	Ali hyʼomuutu oyo owatongola enyumba ni gehereeye ohuyaba omusingi gwatinirira ohwola hu mabaale. Efula ni yagwa, amaaji gabanda, ngʼomuhula guhubba enyumba oyo, siyanyenya olwohuba gayitongola bulaŋi.
42006049	Aye oyo aŋulira ebibono byange ne ndabiholeraho, afaana hyʼoyo owatongola enyumba yiye natehereye huyaba musingi. Efula ni yagwa, amaaji gabanda, omuhula gwayitomera, yefumuliyeŋo yosiyosi yaŋwera hwiroba.”
42007001	Yesu ni gahena ohusomesa abaatu ebiitu ebyo byosibyosi, ngʼatiina mu hibuga hyʼe Kaperanawumu.
42007002	Mu hibuga omwo mwalimo Omurooma owaali omuhulu wʼehibinja hyʼabasirikale cikumi nʼali nʼomwidu oyu gendanga obugali. Aye omwidu oyo gaali mulwaye nʼali huupi hufa.
42007003	Omuhulu wʼabasirikale oyo ni gaŋulira ebiŋamba hu Yesu, gatuma balala hu bahulu aba Bayudaaya nʼamusunga gaaje amuŋoniehese omwidu wuwe.
42007004	Ni boola aŋaali Yesu, nga bamwegalihira bugali baati, “Omusinde oyo asaniira omuholere ehi ahusunga,
42007005	olwohuba genda abaatu abegwanga lyʼefe era gatutongolera nʼehumbaaniro.”
42007006	Ngʼaŋo Yesu atiina ni nabo. Ni gaali nʼali huupi ohwola, ngʼomuhulu wʼabasirikale oyo atuma emihago jije baje balomere Yesu baati, “Muhulu, otedambya, olwohuba ese sisaana ewe ohuuja ewange,
42007007	cʼehigirire kiweene ti sinoola ohuuja eyo ese omwene. Aye loma huloma ehibono, omwidu wange anaŋone.
42007008	Olwohuba ese keesi ndi nʼabasengwa bange abaapira era keesi ndi nʼabasirikale abaapira. Naloma ono ti, ‘Tiina’, ngʼatiina; naloma ola ti, ‘Nja’, nga gaaja; oba naloma omwidu wange ti, ‘Hola hino,’ ahihola.”
42007009	Yesu ni gaŋulira ebi omuhulu oyo galoma, nga geŋunja. Ngʼacuuhira ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ehyali ni himulonda, aloma ati, “Mbaloma ti mbaaye simbonangaho omuutu ali nʼohufugiirira hyʼohwomusinde oyo wayire mu Bayisirayiri!”
42007010	Abahwenda abʼomuhulu wʼehibinja hyʼabasirikale cikumi abagatuma ni baagamayo engo, baageene omwidu oyo nʼaŋonire.
42007011	Olwolire, ni ŋabitireŋo ehiseera hidiidiri nga Yesu atiina mu hibuga ehi balanganga baati Nayini, era abeegi babe ko nʼehiŋindi hyʼabaatu abandi baatiina ni naye.
42007012	Ni gaali ko ni goleresa hu mulyango ogwali ni gwingira mu hibuga ehyo, nga gagaanana nʼabaali ni batusa omulambo. Omufu oyo gaali musaani wa namwandu ate nʼali njʼomwana wuwe omulala wogobbo. Ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu abomu hibuga ehyo baali ni namwandu oyo.
42007013	Yesu Musengwa ni gamubona, ngʼamusaasira amuloma ati, “Otalira.”
42007014	Ngʼaŋo aŋamba hu musigaasiga ogu baali ni bagegeyeho omulambo, ngʼabaali ni bagudundire beema. Nga Yesu aloma ati, “Wange museere, yinyoha!”
42007015	Ngʼomufu oyo alamuha, ahena geehala atandiha nʼohuloma. Yesu ngʼamuŋambya nyina.
42007016	Ngʼobuti owʼamaani buŋamba bosibosi abaliŋo, bajumirya Hatonda ni baloma baati, “Naabbi owʼenjabulo atuhyaliiye.” “Hatonda gajire ohuŋonia abaatu babe.”
42007017	Ngʼaŋo efuma ya ehi Yesu gaali nʼaholire ehwana mu Buyudaaya mwosimwosi nʼebitundu ebiririheene.
42007018	Abeegi ba Yowaane ni baŋulira efuma yʼebi Yesu gaahola, nga batiina bamulomera ebyo byosibyosi. Nga Yowaane alanga babiri hu bo,
42007019	abatuma eyiri Yesu Musengwa, ohumubuusa baati, “Ndiiwe oyo oyu Hatonda gasuubisa ohuuja ohunoŋola abaatu oba eriyo owundi?”
42007020	Abeegi ba Yowaane abo ni boola, nga baloma Yesu baati, “Yowaane Omubatiza atutumire eyi oli nʼabuusa ati, ‘Ndiiwe oyo oyu Hatonda gasuubisa ohuuja ohunoŋola abaatu oba eriyo owundi?’ ”
42007021	Hu ludaalo olwene olwo, Yesu gaŋonia eduuli lyʼabaatu abaali nʼobulwaye nʼabaaliho emisambwa era gegula nʼemoni jʼabaŋofu bangi.
42007022	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma abahwenda ba Yowaane ati, “Mwagame mulomere Yowaane ebi muweene nʼebi muŋuliiye, abaŋofu ŋaahani babona; abaleme bagenda; abagenge balongooha, abasiŋa baŋulira, abafu balamuha nʼabagadi boosi basunire ekabi ohubalomera Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi.
42007023	Bali nʼekabi abo abatanemotamo.”
42007024	Oluvanyuma lwʼabahwenda ba Yowaane abo ni bagamayo, Yesu gaabuusa ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ebiŋamba hu Yowaane ati, “Ni mwatiina mu lulafu, mwatiina hubona hiina? Mwatiina hubona omuutu ali hyʼolugada olu mbeŋo ehubba ni ŋira eyi ni neeyi?
42007025	Ni hitaba cʼehyo, mwatiina hubona hi? Omuutu owambaye engoye ejimeregenya? Si cʼehyo, olwohuba abambala engoye ejʼebbeeyi era ababa mu bulamu ohwejalabya baba mu lubiri.
42007026	Ne hiina ehyene ehi mwatiina ohubona mu lulafu? Peega ti mwatiina hubona naabbi. Era buhomya weene, Yowaane oyo si naabbi hyonyene.
42007027	Aye oyo, njʼoyu ehyaŋandiihiwa hiromaho hiiti, ‘Nja hutuma omuhwenda wange ahweherereyo ohuuja ahutereehese engira.’ ”
42007028	Nga Yesu geyongera aloma ati, “Mu baatu abahasaaliwa bosibosi, ŋabula ahira Yowaane eŋono. Cooka oyo asembayo ohuba owa ŋaasi mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda amuhira eŋono.”
42007029	Abaŋoosa nʼabaatu abandi bosibosi ni baŋulira ebibono ebyo, bafugiirira baati Hatonda sigehubbira olwohuba Yowaane njʼowababatiza.
42007030	Aye Abafalisaayo nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi ga Hatonda bageene etegeha ya Hatonda olwohuba sibafugiirira Yowaane ohubabatiza.
42007031	Yesu geeyongera ohuloma ati, “Abaatu abʼomulembe guno nʼabagerageranie hu hi? Bafaana batye?
42007032	Bafaana hyʼabaana abaŋere abehaaye mu nabiŋwera ko baloma abahyawe baati, ‘Hubafuuŋiiye emirere aye ndimuhine, era nʼolu hwembire olwembo oluŋambya enaku, ndimulire nahulira.’
42007033	“Yowaane Omubatiza sigalyanga biryo ebya bulijo oba hunywaho omwenge gwomu mizabbibbu, olwʼehyo nga muloma muuti, ‘Aliho emisambwa!’
42007034	“Aye Omwana wʼOmuutu gaaja ni geriira ebiryo era nʼanywa nʼevinyo nga muloma muuti, ‘Oyo wa mulyerye, mumeesi era ahola omuhumba nʼabaŋoosa ko nʼabahosi bʼebibi.’
42007035	Aye abo bosibosi abaholera hu magesi ga Hatonda bahahasa ti matuufu ni hibonehera hu bikolwa byawe.”
42007036	Lulala ŋaaliŋo mulala hu Bafalisaayo owʼasunga Yesu amuhyalireho ewuwe. Nga Yesu atiinayo ohulya.
42007037	Mu hibuga omwo mwalimo omuhasi omuhosi wʼebibi owategera ati Yesu gaali ewʼomufalisaayo oyo, ngʼatiina nʼecupa erimo amafuta amalaŋi agaŋunya ahaloosa,
42007038	ngʼaja gemeerera egongo huupi nʼamagulu ga Yesu. Ngʼomuhasi oyo atandiha ohulira, amasiga ni gatonya hu amagulu ga Yesu, ngʼahoma ekumbo amusaabuusa nʼefiiri jije, ngʼamujuhaho amafuta ago.
42007039	Omufalisaayo owahyasa Yesu ni gabona ebi muhasi oyo gaali nʼahola, ngʼaloma mu mwoyo ati, “Omusinde ono aba nʼali naabbi, gahamanyire omuhasi amuŋambaŋambaho ehi ali. Gahali amanyire ati muhosi wʼebibi.”
42007040	Ngʼaŋo Yesu amuloma ati, “Simooni, ndi nʼehi kuloma.” Nga Simooni amugobolamo ati, “Musomesa, ndomere.”
42007041	Nga Yesu atandiha ati, “Ŋaaliŋo agaali nʼabanja abaatu babiri. Omudaayi nʼamubanja dinaari ebihumi bitaanu, owundi dinaari amahumi ataanu.
42007042	Bombi sibasobola humusasula, kale nga basoniŋa. Ŋaahani njʼani hu bo owahira ohumwenda?”
42007043	Nga Simooni amugobolamo ati, “Peega ti gahali oyo oyu gasoniŋa enyingi.” Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Hituufu.”
42007044	Ngʼaŋo acuuha aheja hu omuhasi ola, ahena aloma Simooni ati, “Obona omuhasi ono? Ese caaye ŋawuwo, nasiwuupa maaji ohusaaba amagulu aye niye ganjogire nʼamasiga, gasiimuula nʼefiiri lirye.
42007045	Ni nolire siwunywegera, aye naaholeeye ŋano ono anywegera amagulu gange.
42007046	Nasiwuupa mafuta agomu fiiri aye niye gaapahire ebyʼahaloosa.
42007047	Olwʼehyo kuloma ti ohwenda huhwe huŋwa hu humusoniŋa ebibi ebingi aye oyu basoniŋa ehitono nʼohwenda huba hutono.”
42007048	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma omuhasi ati, “Kusoniŋire ebibi bibyo.”
42007049	Abaali ni behaaye ni Yesu ni balya nga batandiha ohwebuusa abeene nʼabeene baati, “Njʼani ono oweeŋa obuŋangi owʼohusoniŋa ebibi!”
42007050	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma omuhasi oyo ati, “Olwʼohufugiirira huhwo onoŋohire, tiina nʼemiyaaya.”
42008001	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, nga Yesu atandiha ohugenda ŋano ni naŋala mu bibuga nʼomu byalo nʼabuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu buŋugi bwa Hatonda. Abahwenda babe ehumi nʼababiri,
42008002	ko nʼabahasi aba gambingaho emisambwa nʼabagaŋonia obulwaye baali ni naye. Omwo pomwali Malyamu Magadaleeni oyu gabbingaho emisambwa musanvu,
42008003	ni Jowaana omuhasi wʼomuŋanika wa Herode oyu balanganga baati Kuuza, ni Susaana ko nʼabahasi abandi abeene abangi. Abahasi abo babugulanga hu byawe baaŋaho Yesu nʼabeegi babe obuyeedi.
42008004	Ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ni hyali ni hihumbaanira aŋa Yesu gaali, ni baŋwa mu bibuga ngʼabagerera olugero ati,
42008005	“Ŋaaliŋo omulimi owatiina ohumwa owumo. Ni gaali nʼamwa, ngʼowumo obundi bugwa hu tulo wʼengira babutyakirira era ngʼenyuni jitiina jibulya.
42008006	Obundi nga bugwa hwiroba eryʼohu lwanda ohuli otuloba otugeregere. Olwohuba bwali hu mugulu, siwalwa humera aye olwʼemisi ohutesimiha ŋaasi ehihena nga buŋotoha.
42008007	Ngʼobundi bugwa hwiroba eryameramo amaŋwa, ni wamera nga buhulira ŋalala nʼamaŋwa ago nga gabumiina gabuloberesa ohuhula.
42008008	Aye obundi nga bugwa hwiroba eraŋi ni bwamera nga buhula bwitulula, nga hiisi gaala lijuhamo emoni cikumi cikumi.” Yesu ni gahena ohuloma atyo ngʼadundaho ejanjaasi ameedaho ati, “Ali nʼohutwi, aŋulire.”
42008009	Ngʼaŋo abeegi babe bamubuusa amahulu gʼolugero olwo.
42008010	Ngʼabagobolamo ati, “Enywe muli nʼekabi ohumanya ebyama ebiŋamba hu buŋugi bwa Hatonda aye abaatu abandi babiŋulirira mu ngero, ko bahaŋaase aye ni batafaania ehi bahaŋaasa, baŋulire aye ni batategeera ehi baŋulira.”
42008011	Nga Yesu aloma ati, “Amahulu gʼolugero olwo ngagano, owumo njʼehibono hya Hatonda.
42008012	Era owumo owagwa hu ngira buli hyʼabaatu abaŋulira ehibono bya Hatonda aye Sitaani gaaja gahibatusamo batafugiirira banoŋohe.
42008013	Abaatu abandi bali hyʼowumo owagwa mwiroba eryʼohu lwanda. Ni baŋulira ehibono hya Hatonda, bahisangaalira nʼamanyonyo aye nga baba hyʼebirime ebiŋuma emisi ejihire mwiroba ehihena. Bafugiirira ohuhena ahaseera hadiidiri aye ebigosi ni bibaajira nga baŋwamo amaani.
42008014	Abandi bali hyʼowumo owagwa hwiroba eryameramo amaŋwa, baŋulira ehibono hya Hatonda aye ohweŋendeherera olwʼebigosi byʼehyalo nʼohululuhanira ohusuna obuŋinda nʼamasanyu gʼehyalo hino bibaloberesa ohuŋangala mu hufugiirira hwawe.
42008015	Aye abaatu abandi bali hyʼowumo obwagwa hwiroba eraŋi, ni baŋulira ehibono hya Hatonda bahifugiirira nʼomwoyo mulala era baaba nʼehyasa.
42008016	“Omuutu saaŋambya taala gayifunihira mu hisero oba gayita mu kuliiti aye ayita hu hihondo aŋa yinaaŋe abo abengira mu nyumba enjase.
42008017	Eŋuma ehiitu ehi bagisa ehi batalibona era hiisi hyama balihiŋebbula.
42008018	Olwʼehyo, mwegenderesenge ebi muŋulira. Oyo ali nʼebingi balimumeedaho ebindi aye oyo aŋuma balimutusaaho nʼahadiidiri aho aha ali ni naho.”
42008019	Lulala, abalebe ba Yesu ni nyina batiina eyi gaali aye ndibasobola humwolaho olwʼeduuli lyʼabaatu.
42008020	Ngʼaŋo ŋabaaŋo owamuloma ati, “Maawo nʼabalebe babo bali ebulafu, benda ohuhubona.”
42008021	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Maama nʼabalebe bange mbabo abaŋulira ehibono hya Hatonda bahena bahola ebi hiroma.”
42008022	Lulala Yesu galoma abeegi babe ati, “Hwambuhe hutiine engereha wʼenyanja.” Ngʼaŋo baniina eryato batiina.
42008023	Ni baali ni bahiiri mu lugendo, ngʼero liŋamba Yesu aŋenyuha. Nga hibuyaga owʼamaani ahubba hu nyanja ngʼebimoto byʼamaaji byedanyanga mu lyato. Ehyo hyabata mu bugosi owʼamaani.
42008024	Ngʼaŋo abeegi babe batiina bamusisimusa, bamuloma baati, “Musengwa, Musengwa, enyanja yenda hutwita!” Nga Yesu genyoha ahabuhira hibuyaga ko nʼenyanja eyaali ni yefuhisa. Ngʼaŋo hibuyaga ateeha nʼenyanja yoosi ngʼebunjeera.
42008025	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abuusa abeegi babe ati, “Lwahiina muŋuma hufugiirira?” Aye nibo nga hibahenaho efiiri hu mutwe, bebuusa abeene nʼabeene baati, “Omuutu ono wa ngeri hi oyu wayire hibuyaga nʼebimoto byʼamaaji hu nyanja biŋulira?”
42008026	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, nga Yesu nʼabeegi babe bambuha boola engereha hu woomu mu hyalo hyʼAbagaraasa ehyali ni hirengerene nʼetwale lyʼe Galilaaya.
42008027	Yesu ni gaŋwa ati mu lyato, gagaanana nʼomusinde owomu hibuga ehyo owaaliho emisambwa. Omusinde oyo gaali ahenire ehiseera hireeŋi nʼatambala ngoye era nʼataŋenyuha mu nyumba aye namenya mu pungulu ejibasihangamo abafu.
42008028	Ni gabona Yesu, ngʼahubba amafuha mu moni jije nʼahayanira ŋamugulu ati, “Wukaabya hiina ewe Yesu Omwana wa Hatonda Owaŋamugulu Obugali? Kwegayiriiye otangudya!”
42008029	Galoma atyo olwohuba Yesu gaali alagiiye omusambwa ogwo ohumuŋwaho. Efunda nyingi ni gwahamubandire, wayire bahamuboŋire emihono nʼamagulu ni tambisa enjegere era bamuhuuma atabadulumaho, gajihapulanga ngʼomusambwa ogwo gumuŋira eyo mu lulafu eŋuma muutu.
42008030	Nga Yesu amubuusa ati, “Esiina liryo ndiiwe ani?” Ngʼamugobolamo ati, “Ndiise Maŋe.” Galoma atyo olwohuba emisambwa buhehere jaali jiri hu muutu oyo.
42008031	Ngʼaŋo jegalihira Yesu atajisindiha mwiroŋo ereeŋi eritahoma.
42008032	Ohuupi aŋo mu menamo gʼolusozi ŋaaliŋo ehidooli hyʼembiiji ni jaaya. Ngʼemisambwa jegalihira Yesu jiiti, “Tufugiirire huje hwingire mu mbiiji ejo.”
42008033	Ngʼajifugiirira jiŋwa hu muutu oyo, jija jingira mu mbiiji. Ngʼembiiji ejo josijosi jifulumuha embiro jiihirira jiŋwera mu nyanja nga jinywa etubbi.
42008034	Abemeri bʼembiiji ejo ni babona ebyali ni byolire hu musinde ola owaaliho emisambwa, nga baduluma batiina balomeraho abaatu abomu hibuga ehyo nʼabohumulirano.
42008035	Ngʼabaatu batiina ohwebonera ehiguuyeŋo. Ni boola aŋa Yesu gaali, nga babona omusinde ola owabangaho emisambwa ni jimuŋooyeho, ni gehaaye huupi ni naye era ni gambaaye ebyambalo, nʼohutegeera nʼategeera bulaŋi weene, nga batya.
42008036	Ngʼaŋo abo abaaliŋo beboneraho, baloohesaho abahyawe abaali ni baajire engeri eyi oyo owaaliho emisambwa jamuŋwaho.
42008037	Ngʼaŋo abaatu abomu twale lyʼAbagaraasa basunga Yesu aŋwe mu hitahere ehyo olwohuba baali batiiye bugali. Nga Yesu aniina eryato, aŋwaŋo.
42008038	Yesu ni gaali nʼabaŋweraŋo, ngʼomuutu ola oyu gabbingaho emisambwa amwegalihira amuganye atiine ni naye. Aye Yesu sigamuganya, ngʼamuloma ati,
42008039	“Yaagamayo ewenywe, obalomere byosibyosi ebi Hatonda ahuholeeye.” Ngʼaŋo omuutu oyo abita nʼalomera hiisi muutu mu hibuga hyosihyosi ebi Yesu amuholeeye.
42008040	Yesu ni gambuha enyanja gagamayo, abaatu bangi bamusangaalira olwohuba bosibosi baali bamuhuumiriiye.
42008041	Ngʼomuhulu wʼehumbaaniro lyʼAbayudaaya oyu balanganga baati Yayiro gaaja ahubba amafuha huupi ni Yesu, amwegalihira gooleho ewuwe,
42008042	olwohuba ahahaana hahe ahaali ni haŋesa emyaha ngʼehumi nʼebiri ejʼobuhulu, ate nga nje hoŋene aha gaali ni naho haali halwaye ni henda hufa. Yesu ni gaali nʼatiina, oguŋindi gwʼabaatu nga guŋindigana gumulondaho ni gumunyigirisa.
42008043	Mu guŋindi omwo, mwalimo omuhasi owaali nʼalwaye oluheeŋo ohuhena emyaha ehumi nʼebiri era nahayire aŋanga ohumuŋonia.
42008044	Ngʼaŋo geyibirira aŋwa egongo wa Yesu aŋamba hu hyambalo hihye, aŋo ni naaŋo ngʼoluheeŋo lwomeera.
42008045	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abuusa ati, “Njʼani owupambireho?” Bosibosi nga begaana. Nga Peetero amuloma ati, “Weesi Musengwa, abaatu bali huŋindigana ni bahwehonyaho!”
42008046	Aye nga Yesu aloma ati, “Ŋaliŋo owupambireho, olwohuba pulira amaani agaŋonia ni gapoyeemo era ni gaholire omulimo.”
42008047	Ngʼaŋo omuhasi oyo owamuŋambaho ahifaania ati bamufanisye, ngʼatiina butibuti nʼateetema, ahoma ekumbo mu moni ja Yesu, amulomera mu lwijuuye ehyagira gamuŋambaho era ngʼolu gaali nʼaŋoneeyeŋo.
42008048	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Muhaana, ohufugiirira huhwo huhuŋonisye. Tiina nʼemiyaaya.”
42008049	Yesu ni gaali nʼahiiroma nʼomuhasi oyo, ngʼomuhwenda gaaja alomera Yayiro omuhulu wʼehumbaaniro ati, “Otadambya musomesa. Omwana wuwo afuuye.”
42008050	Aye Yesu ni gaŋulira, ngʼaloma omuhulu wʼehumbaaniro oyo ati, “Otatya, fugiirira hufugiirira, omuhaana wuwo aja hulamuha.”
42008051	Yesu ni goola mu mago ga Yayiro, sigaganya abaatu abandi ohwingira ni naye mu nyumba, ohutusaho Peetero ni Yowaane ni Yakobbo ko nʼabasaaye bʼomuhaana.
42008052	Abaatu bosibosi abaaliŋo, baali balira ni bahubba nʼenduulu olwʼohufa hwʼomuhaana oyo. Aye Yesu ngʼabaloma ati, “Mulehere aŋo ohulira nʼohuhubba enduulu, olwohuba nandafe aye ali huŋenyuha.”
42008053	Ngʼaŋo bosibosi bamujeherera, olwohuba nibo baali bamanyire baati omuhaana oyo gaali afuuye.
42008054	Aye Yesu ngʼamuŋamba hu muhono, ngʼamulanga ati, “Mwana ewe, yinyoha!”
42008055	Ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo omuhaana oyo alamuha, nga gemeerera. Nga Yesu alagira bamuŋeho ehyʼohulya.
42008056	Abasaaye bʼomwana oyo beeŋunja aye nga Yesu abahamiirisa batalomeraho muutu wayire mulala ehibaayeŋo.
42009001	Lulala, Yesu galanga abeegi babe ehumi nʼababiri batiine aŋa gaali, ngʼabaŋa amaani nʼobuŋangi ohubbinganga emisambwa josijosi hu baatu nʼohuŋonianga obulwaye.
42009002	Ni gahena ngʼabatuma batiine balomere abaatu ebiŋamba hu buŋugi bwa Hatonda era baŋonie nʼabalwaye.
42009003	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Mu lugendo luno, mutagega hiitu hindi hyosihyosi wayire muhoomero oba ehihapu oba ebyʼohulya oba bbeesa oba ehyʼohwambala ehyohubiri.
42009004	Ni mwolanga mu hibuga, mumenyanga mu mago omu baba ni babasangaaliiye ohwola olu museebuha.
42009005	Aye ni mwolanga aŋaatu ndibabasangaalira, ni mubanga ni muŋwaŋo mwekukumulangaho efuuhe hu magulu habenga habonero ahalaga ohulabula ohuŋwa eyiri Hatonda.”
42009006	Ngʼaŋo abeegi abo batiina, ŋano ni naŋala mu byalo ni balomera abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi era ni baŋonia abalwaye hiisi ŋaatu.
42009007	Ŋaahani, Herode owaali nʼaŋuga etwale lyʼe Galilaaya, ni gaŋulira byosibyosi ebyali ni bitiina mu moni, nga bimuheehera olwohuba ŋaaliŋo abaatu abalomanga baati, “Anaabe nje Yowaane Omubatiza alamuhire!”
42009008	Aye abandi baati, “Oyo njʼEriya abonehire.” Nʼabandi baati, “Anaabe mulala hu banaabbi abaahale.”
42009009	Aye Herode galoma ati, “Nalagira batema hu Yowaane Omubatiza omutwe, nindi ono oyu pulira anaabe njʼani?” Era gendire ohumubona ahahase.
42009010	Abahwenda aba Yesu gatuma ohutiina ohubuulira ni bagobola, nga bamulomera byosibyosi ebi baahola. Nga Yesu atiina ni nabo mu hifo ehiŋumamo baatu baba booŋene eyo mu hibuga ehi balanganga baati Bbesusayida.
42009011	Aye ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ni hyategeera, nga himulondaho. Ni gahena ohubasangaalira, ngʼabalomera ebiŋamba hu buŋugi bwa Hatonda era ngʼaŋonia abalwaye abaaliŋo.
42009012	Abeegi ba Yesu ehumi nʼababiri ni babona owiire ni butiire bamuloma baati, “Seebula abaatu batiine mu bitehere ebiririheene ŋano, beegulire ebiryo balye basune nʼaŋa banaŋenyuhe olwohuba ehifo hino hiduleere.”
42009013	Aye nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Enywe mubaŋe ebiryo balye.” Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Huliŋo nʼemigaati etaanu nʼenyeeni ebiri joŋene. Kooji ni hutiinire hwabagulira!”
42009014	(Ŋaaliŋo abasinde ngʼekumi etaanu). Nga Yesu aloma abeegi babe ati, “Mubeehase mu bibbubbu ebyʼabaatu ngʼamahumi ataanu ataanu.”
42009015	Nga bahola baatyo, bosibosi babeehasa.
42009016	Nga Yesu abugula emigaati jira etaanu nʼenyeeni jawaho ebiri, ngʼagangamusa emoni aheja mwigulu, nga geyaasa Hatonda. Ngʼaŋo ko ajibbwagabbwagamo, ajiŋa abeegi babe bagabire abaatu.
42009017	Ngʼabaatu abo bosibosi balya beeguta. Ngʼaŋo abeegi babe bahumbaania obukukumuhira owasigalaho nga bwijusa ebisero ehumi nabibiri.
42009018	Lulala, Yesu ni gaali ni geyebire nʼasaba, abeegi babe baali ni naye, ngʼababuusa ati, “Abaatu bandanga baatye?”
42009019	Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Ŋaliŋo abaloma mbo ndiiwe Yowaane Omubatiza, abandi baati ndiiwe naabbi Eriya, ate abandi baati mbo oli mulala hu banaabbi abaahale alamuhire.”
42009020	Ngʼaŋo ababuusa ati, “Ne enywe, mundanga muutye?” Nga Peetero amugobolamo ati, “Ndiiwe Kurisito oyu Hatonda gafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu.”
42009021	Nga Yesu abahamiirisa bugali weene ehyo batahiromeraho muutu yesiyesi.
42009022	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Baja hugudya Omwana wʼOmuutu bugali weene, abaatu abahulu mu gwanga lwefe nʼabatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda, nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi bamwegaane era bamwite aye ni ŋalibitaŋo endaalo edatu aliramuha.”
42009023	Ngʼaŋo abaloma bosibosi ati, “Hiisi muutu owenda ohuba omuloobera wange, ateehwa ohwefiirisa byosibyosi era abe muheneerefu habuhyabuhya ohubbeeda omusalabba gugwe era agende ni neese.
42009024	Hino kiroma olwohuba hiisi oweheneerera obulamu buwe, alibufiirwa aye hiisi afiirwa obulamu buwe hu lwange, alibunoŋola.
42009025	Ale higasa hiina omuutu ohuba nʼobuŋinda bwʼohu hyalo huno bwosibwosi aye gafiirwa obulamu buwe?
42009026	Hiisi oyu esoni jiŋamba olwʼese nʼolwehibono hyange, nʼOmwana wʼOmuutu yeesi alimwegaana olu aligobolera mu ŋono lya Semwana nʼerya nʼabamalayika abagwalaafu.
42009027	Mbalomera ehituufu ti, ŋaliŋo abandi hu enywe abemereeye ŋano, abatalifa ohutusaho ni bahenire ohubona Obuŋugi bwa Hatonda.”
42009028	Ni ŋabitaŋo endaalo nga munaana, nga Yesu atiina ni Peetero ni Yowaane ni Yakobbo, ngʼaniina ni nabo hu lusozi ohusaba.
42009029	Ni gaali nʼasaba, ngʼefaani yiye yicuuha era ebyambalo bibye bimeregenya era bihosa bugali hyʼohumesya hwʼefula.
42009030	Ngʼaŋo abasinde babiri, Eriya ni Musa
42009031	baboneha mu ŋono eryʼamaani ni baloma ni naye hu hufa huhwe ohu gaali nʼaja hufamo e Yerusaalemu.
42009032	Mu hiseera ehyo, ero lyali liŋambire Peetero nʼabahye aye ni basisimuha, baabona Yesu nʼali mu eŋono nʼabasinde ababiri abo ni bemereeye ni naye.
42009033	Abasinde abo ni baali ni baŋwa aŋali Yesu, nga Peetero aloma ati, “Musengwa, hiraŋi ti huli ŋano. Leha hutongoleŋo ebitiira bidatu, hirala hibe hihyo, ehindi hya Musa nʼehindi hyʼEriya.” Galoma atyo olwohuba gaali saamanyire hyahuloma.
42009034	Peetero gaali ahiroma ebyo, ngʼehireri hiija hibawiiha nga niye nʼabahye ngʼobuti bubaŋamba.
42009035	Ngʼejanjaasi liŋwera mu hireri ehyo, ni ŋaliŋo aloma ati, “Ono njʼOmwana wange, oyu netobooleye, muŋulirise ebi abaloma.”
42009036	Ejanjaasi eryo ni lyaŋoleera, ngʼabeegi abo babona nje Yesu yeŋene nʼali ni nabo. Ehi babona nga bahiŋooleraho, ndibahiromereho muutu owundi mu hiseera ehyo.
42009037	Ni wahya, Yesu nʼabeegi babe abo abadatu ni baniinuha hu lusozi, nga bagaanana nʼehiŋindi hyʼabaatu.
42009038	Ngʼaŋo mulala hu basinde abaali mu hiŋindi ehyo adundaho ejanjaasi aloma ati, “Musomesa, kwegayiriiye, ŋambira musaani yange ehisa, olwohuba mulala wogobbo!
42009039	Olu musambwa gumubanda, nga gaana gumuhubba ehigo ngʼatumbeera efulo nʼohusihimbwa po hwataaye. Sigumuŋaho simire era guli humukosa.
42009040	Negayiriiye abeegi babo ohugumubbingaho aye ndibasobole.”
42009041	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Enywe abaatu bʼomulembe guno ababbeeme era abaŋuma hufugiirira, ndihena ni nenywe ahamanga ahaaga ŋe ko mube nʼohufugiirira?” Ngʼaŋo aloma semwana yʼomuseere oyo ati, “Leeta ŋano musaani wuwo.”
42009042	Era nʼolu baali ni baŋira omuseere oyo, omusambwa gwamubanda, gwamuhubba ehigo gatandiha ohujugumira. Aye Yesu gahayuhira omusambwa nagwo, ngʼahena aŋonia omuseere amuŋambya semwana.
42009043	Nga bosibosi abaaliŋo beeŋunja obuŋangi wa Hatonda. Aye abaatu ni baali ni bahyeŋunja byosibyosi ebi Yesu gaali ni holire, ngʼaloma abeegi babe ati,
42009044	“Muŋulirise ebibono byange bino nʼohwegenderesa. Omwana wʼOmuutu baja humuŋayo eyiri abaatu bamwite.”
42009045	Aye nibo sibafaania mahulu gʼebibono ebyo era baatya nʼohumubuusa amahulu gabyo.
42009046	Ŋaaliŋo olu beegi ba Yesu baŋahana ni bebuusa baati njʼani hu bo alihira ohuba owʼeŋono.
42009047	Yesu ni gamanya ehi baŋeega, nga gemeeresa omwana omuŋere owaali aŋaapi aŋo ni naye.
42009048	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Hiisi muutu asangaalira omwana omuŋere hyʼono hu lwange, aba asangaaliiye ndiise. Nindi hiisi owusangaalira, aba asangaaliiye Hatonda owaatuma. Oyo oweeyisa gafuuha muŋeeresa wabahye, njʼahira ohuba owʼeŋono.”
42009049	Ngʼaŋo mulala hu beegi babe oyu balanga baati Yowaane aloma Yesu ati, “Musomesa, hwaweene omuutu nʼabbinga emisambwa hu baatu nʼatambisa esiina liryo, efe nga hugesyaho ohumulobera olwohuba si muloobera wuwo hyefe.”
42009050	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Simuloberanga omuutu hyʼoyo, olwohuba atabaŋiriŋania saaba musigu wenywe.”
42009051	Endaalo ja Yesu ejʼohwagamayo mwigulu ni jaali ni jigereeye aŋaapi, gahenerera gaŋamba engira ohutiina e Yerusaalemu.
42009052	Ngʼaŋo atuma balala hu bahwenda babe batangirirengamo batiine mu hitahere hyʼe Samaliya abaatu betegehere ohuuja huhwe.
42009053	Aye abaatu baayo bagaana ohumusangaalira olwohuba gaali atiina yi Yerusaalemu.
42009054	Abeegi babe, Yakobbo ni Yowaane, ni baŋulira nga bamuloma baati, “Musengwa, hulome omuliro guŋwe mwigulu gubasihiiriise?”
42009055	Aye Yesu gacuuha gabahejaho ngʼabahayula.
42009056	Ngʼaŋo batiina mu hitahere ehindi.
42009057	Ni baali mu lugendo ni batiina, nga ŋabaŋo omuutu owaloma Yesu ati, “Nagendenga ni neewe hiisi aŋa onatiinenga.”
42009058	Aye Yesu gamugobolamo ati, “Ebibbwe biri nʼekero omu biŋenyuha, enyuni joosi jiri nʼebiswi aye Omwana wʼOmuutu aŋuma aŋa ata olubafu.”
42009059	Nga ŋabaaŋo owundi oyu galoma ati, “Nja, ogendenga ni neese.” Aye oyo ngʼamugobolamo ati, “Muhulu, nahahene husiiha laata yange ko naaja.”
42009060	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Leha abafu mu mwoyo basiihe abafu bahyawe aye ewe otiine olomere abaatu ebiŋamba hu buŋugi bwa Hatonda.”
42009061	Nga ŋabaaŋo owundi owamuloma ati, “Muhulu, nja hufuuha muloobera wuwo aye ganya nje ndomereho abengo konyo.”
42009062	Aye Yesu ngʼamuloma ati, “Ngʼolu oyo alimisa eŋombe nʼahejaheja egongo atahola mulimo mulaŋi, nʼowenda ohuba muloobera wange yeesi, anaheja egongo saaba wʼomugaso mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda.”
42010001	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, nga Yesu Musengwa atobola abahwenda esanvu nʼababiri, abatuma babiri babiri ohutiina mu hiisi hibuga nʼebyalo eyi gaali nʼategehire ohutiina.
42010002	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Abaatu abaja ohufugiirira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi bangi era bali hyʼebirime ebyolire ohuhungula aye abatambi sibahena. Olwʼehyo, musunge Hatonda Musengwa omwene ndimiro atume abatambi.
42010003	Mutiine aye mwehuume olwohuba eyi mbatuma muja huba hyʼenyana jʼetaama mu nalaŋa.
42010004	Mutagega hasaŋu omu babiiha ebbeesa oba ehihapu wayire omugogo gwʼengayito ogundi. Era mutalwa hu ngira ni muheeseresa hiisi oyu muba ni mwageene.
42010005	Hiisi mago agamunolengamo, mwehererenga hugasabira ekabi muuti, ‘Hatonda ŋa amago gano emiyaaya era ogasagaaluse.’ ”
42010006	Abaatu bomu mago ago ni babasangaalira, emiyaaya eji muba ni mubasungira, jija husigala ni nabo. Aye ni baba ni batenda, ekabi jenywe jibagoboleranga.
42010007	Mumenye mu mago omu babasangaaliiye ni mulya era ni munywa ebi babeeŋula olwohuba omutambi asaanira bamuŋe omuhemba. Simuŋwanga mu mago ago mwatiina aŋandi.
42010008	Munengira mu hibuga abaatu baamo baabasangaalira, mulyanga ebi babaŋa ni mutemoota.
42010009	Muŋonienga abalwaye ababa ni bali mu hibuga omwo era mulomanga abaatu baamo muuti, “Obuŋugi bwa Hatonda bwigereeye eyi muli.”
42010010	Aye ni munengirenga mu hibuga ndibabasangaalira, mwemereranga mu luguudo lwahyo mwaloma muuti,
42010011	“Hwekukumulaho nʼefuuhe eryomu hibuga hyenywe eribaaye ni lyeŋambire hu magulu, habe habonero ahalaga haati Hatonda abalabuuye. Aye mumanye muuti Obuŋugi bwa Hatonda bwigereeye.”
42010012	Mbalomera ehituufu ti, hu ludaalo olwʼohusaliraho emisango balireherahomo abaatu bomu Sodoma ohuhira abomu hibuga ehyo.
42010013	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma ati, “Jibageene enywe abaatu abomu hibuga Korazini nʼe Bbesusayida! Ebyamaliholiho ebi baahola ewenywe, biba ni byali mu Tiiro nʼomu Sidoni, hani abaatu baayo beeboŋa ebigwaali era beeŋaha nʼegohe ohulaga baati bebbwagire.
42010014	Aye hu ludaalo olwʼohusala emisango, baliŋa abaatu abomu Tiiro ni Sidoni ehibonerezo ehiriho obudemwademwa hu hyenywe.
42010015	Enywe abaatu bʼe Kaperanawumu, muŋeega muuti mulitiina mwigulu? Bbe, mulitiina mu geyeena.”
42010016	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma abeegi babe ati, “Aŋulirisa ebi musomesa gaahena gabifugiirira, aba afugiiriye ndiise. Aye oyo atala ebimusomesa, aba atalire ndiise era atala ese aba atalire oyo owatuuma.”
42010017	Ni ŋabitaŋo ehiseera, ngʼabeegi bala esanvu nʼababiri baagamayo eyiri Yesu ni bali basangaafu nga bamulomera baati, “Musengwa, hubaaye huŋonia abaatu nʼemisambwa joosi ni jituŋulira olwʼobuŋangi obu watuŋa.”
42010018	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Nabona Sitaani nʼaŋanuha ohuŋwa mwigulu hyʼohumesya hwʼefula.
42010019	Era njʼehigema mbaŋaaye obuŋangi ohwema hu temu ejʼobusagwa nʼesiiga nʼohuŋangula amaani gosigosi agʼomusigu. Ŋaŋuma habi wayire halala ahaliboolaho.
42010020	Mutasangaala olwohuba ti emisambwa jibaŋulira aye musangaale olwohuba amasiina genywe baagaŋandiiha mwigulu.”
42010021	Mu hiseera ehyo, ngʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu amaamira Yesu ahena amuŋa esangaalo aloma ati, “Kujumirya Bbaabba, Musengwa owatonda egulu nʼehyalo, olwohuba wagisa aberanga abamagesi ohumanya amazima, ngʼohwehulira abaŋuma ehi bamanyire hyʼabaana abaŋere. Hituufu Bbaabba, ehyo hyahusangaasa olwohuba njʼohwali ohusiima huhwo.
42010022	“Bbaabba gaapambya ebiitu byosibyosi ohubiŋuga. Ŋaŋuma amanyire ehi Omwana ali ohutusaho Semwana era ŋaŋuma amanyire ehi Semwana ali ohutusaho Omwana. Era ŋaŋuma amanyire ehi Semwana ali ohutusaho Omwana ni naabo aba Omwana ahwehulira ehyama ehyʼohumutegeera.”
42010023	Yesu ni gasigala nʼabeegi babe boŋene ngʼabaloma ati, “Enywe mwesiimire ohubona bino ebi mubona!
42010024	Mbalomera ti abanaabbi nʼabahabaha bangi beegombanga ohubona ebyamaliholiho ebi mubona nʼohuŋulira bino ebi muŋulira aye sibasobola.”
42010025	Lwali lulala, ngʼomusomesa wʼamagambi ga Hatonda genyoha abuusa Yesu nʼamuhema ati, “Musomesa, kole hi ko nahasuna obulamu obutaŋwaŋo?”
42010026	Nga Yesu amubuusa ati, “Amagambi aga baŋa Musa galoma gaatye? Gahuloma hiina nʼogasoma?”
42010027	Ngʼomusomesa oyo amugobolamo ati hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Yendanga Hatonda Musengwawo nʼomwoyo gugwo gwosigwosi nʼobulamu buwo bwosibwosi nʼamaani gago gosigosi nʼamagesi gago gosigosi. Era yendanga muliranwawo ngʼolu weyenda wamwene.”
42010028	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Ogoboyeemo bulaŋi. Holanga otyo, olisuna obulamu obutaŋwaŋo.”
42010029	Aye omusomesa wʼamagambi oyo olwʼohwenda ohwehenaho esoni ngʼabuusa Yesu ati, “Muliranwa yange, njʼani?”
42010030	Ngʼaŋo Yesu amugobolamo nʼamugerera olugero ati, “Ŋaaliŋo omusinde owaali nʼaŋwa e Yerusaalemu ni gehirira e Yeriko, ngʼagwa mu batemu, bamuhubba bamwambulamo engoye nʼebigaali ni nabyo byosibyosi bamuleha nʼajalaaye aŋo nʼafuuyeho olweso.
42010031	Nga ŋabaaŋo omusengi wa Hatonda owaali yeesi nʼabita mu ngira enyene eyo, ni gamubona gamwebaaya, ngʼabitaaŋo getiinira.
42010032	“Omuutu ohuŋwa mu hiha hyʼAbaleevi gaali yeesi abita mu ngira enyene eyo. Ni goola mu hifo ehyo gamubona, gamwebaaya, ngʼabitaaŋo getiinira.
42010033	Aye Omusamaliya yeesi owaali hu lugendo lulwe, ni goola aŋa omuutu oyo gaali, ngʼamubona amuŋambira ehisa,
42010034	ngʼatiina aŋa gaali ngʼahotama ngʼamooga amabbwa amuŋaha envinyo ahena amuboŋa ebbandeji, ngʼamuta hu nasugirya yiye amuŋira mu nyumba omu bagendi baapangisanga baŋenyuhamo, geyongera ohumujanjaba.
42010035	Ni wahya, ngʼasasula omwene nyumba yʼabagendi edinaari ebiri, ahena amuloma ati, ‘Mulabirire, ndihusasula ebbeesa ejigwaho josijosi ni ngobooye.’
42010036	“Kale njʼani hu abo abadatu, oyu oŋeega oti njʼowaali muliranwa wʼoyo owagwa mu batemu?”
42010037	Ngʼomusomesa wʼamagambi amugobolamo ati, “Oyo owʼamuŋambira ehisa.” Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Ale weesi tiina oholenga otyo.”
42010038	Yesu nʼabeegi babe ni baali mu lugendo ni batiina e Yerusaalemu, nga boola aŋaatu mu hitahere omu muhasi oyu balanganga baati Maliza gamenyanga. Ngʼomuhasi oyo amuhyaasa mu mago gage.
42010039	Maliza gaali ni mugandaawe oyu balanganga baati Malyamu. Malyamu gatiina geehala huupi ni Yesu Musengwa gaŋuliirisa ebi gaali nʼaloma.
42010040	Aye Maliza gaali afululuhana nʼemirimo yeŋene. Ehyaŋooyemo ngʼatiina aŋali Yesu amuloma ati, “Musengwa, sihihuluma muganda yange ohundehera emirimo seŋene? Mulomeho gaaje ganjeede.”
42010041	Nga Yesu Musengwa amugobolamo ati, “Maliza, Maliza, weŋenderehire era oli nʼebingi ebihudambya ebitagasa.
42010042	Aye ehyetagisa obugali hirala hyonyene. Malyamu niye cʼehigangayeŋo era sibalihimutusaho.”
42011001	Lulala, Yesu gaali aŋaatu nʼasaba. Ni gahena, nga mulala hu beegi babe amuloma ati, “Musengwa, hwesi twigirise ohusaba, ngʼolu Yowaane gegirisa abeegi babe.”
42011002	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abaloma ati, “Ni muba ni musaba, musabenga muuti, “ ‘Seefe, oŋeewe eŋono, obuŋugi buwo buuje.
42011003	Tufunise ebiryo ebyolwa leero.
42011004	Era tusoniŋe ebibi byefe ngʼolu hwesi husoniŋa hiisi abatuhola obubi. Era otatuleha hugwa mu huhemewa.’ ”
42011005	Ngʼaŋo abaloma ati, “Singa mulala hu enywe aba ni meriiwe, ngʼatiina eyi ali mu wiire ŋagati amuloma ati, ‘Wange, poleho obusyanu,
42011006	olwohuba meeri yange aŋwa hungwaho aye mbula hyahumwiŋula.’
42011007	Ne ola ali mu nyumba ngʼamugobolamo ati, ‘Wange ese kenire ohweyigala, nʼabaana bange baŋenyuhire. Mbula agenyoha ohuba nʼehikuholera.’
42011008	Mbalomera ti wayire nga aba abula agenyoha ohumuŋa ehi aba nʼamusungire ate nga ko bamuhago, olwa ola ohumwomeraho nʼamwegayirira, genyoha gaamuŋa hiisi ehi genda.
42011009	“Olwʼehyo, mbaloma ti musabenga, Hatonda alibaŋa ehi mumusunga, mwegumyenga ohwendula, muligundula; mukokonenga, balibeguliraŋo.
42011010	Olwohuba hiisi asunga bamuŋa, owendula agundula, nʼakookona yeesi bamwiguliraŋo.
42011011	“Ale njʼani hu enywe, aŋa omwana wuwe etemu nʼamusungire enyeeni,
42011012	oba esiiga mu hifo hyʼegi?
42011013	Olwo ŋaahani obanga enywe ababi, mumanyire ohuŋa abaana benywe ebiraŋi, ne Senywe owomwigulu saalihira aŋo bugali weene ohuŋa Omwoyo Omutukuvu abo abamusunga?”
42011014	Lulala, Yesu gabbinga omusambwa hu muutu ogwali ni gumusidihire ohutaloma. Ni gwamuŋwaho gatandiha ohuloma ngʼehiŋindi hyʼabaatu abaali aŋo hyeŋunja.
42011015	Aye abandi nga baloma baati, “Abbinga emisambwa nʼatambisa obuŋangi wa Bbeluzebbuli omuhulu wʼemisambwa.”
42011016	Nʼabandi nga bamusunga ni bamuhema, mbo abaŋe ahabonero ahalaga haati obuŋangi obu gaali ni nabwo gabutusa yiri Hatonda.
