42011017	Yesu gamanya ebiŋeego byawe, ngʼabaloma ati, “Abaatu abʼowahabaha obulala banesalamo bahubbana abeene nʼabeene, owahabaha obwo busihiiriha era nʼolu gaba mago ganeyabulamo gabbwagiha.
42011018	Ni Sitaani yeesi singa geesoosa omwene, obwahabaha wuwe buba bunemeerereŋo buutye? Hino kiroma olwohuba muloma muuti mbo mbinga emisambwa hu baatu hu lwʼobuŋangi wa Bbeluzebbuli.
42011019	Ŋaahani hanye mbinga emisambwa ni tambisa obuŋangi bwa Bbeluzebbuli, abaloobera benywe bajibbinga hu lwʼobuŋangi bwʼani? Ehyo cʼehigira abaloobera benywe abeene balibasalira omusango.
42011020	Aye nimba ni mbinga emisambwa hu lwʼobuŋangi wa Hatonda, ŋaahani obuŋugi buwe buujire eyi muli.
42011021	Omuutu owʼamaani ali nʼebyohusoosa, anahuuma enyumba yiye, abeebi sibaŋira ebiitu bibye.
42011022	Aye amuhira amaani anamuwagala gamuŋangula, aŋira ebyʼohusoosa ebi gesiga era ganyagulula nʼebiitu bibye.
42011023	“Atali hu lubega lwange aba mulabe wange era atahumbaanihisya ŋalala ni nange, asalaania.
42011024	“Omusambwa ni guŋwa hu muutu, gulerenga mu lulafu ni gwendula aŋa guneŋogome. Ni guhaya guloma guuti, ‘Nja hwagama eyi nabanga.’
42011025	Ni gwagama, gwagaana obulamu wʼomuutu oyo ni babulongoosa bulaŋi weene hyʼenyumba eyi basaguuye.
42011026	Ngʼaŋo gutiina guhobaho ejahye ejindi musanvu ejiguhiraho obubi, nga jija jimwingiramo. Era obulamu wʼomuutu oyo buliba bubi ohuhiraho ngʼolu waali oludaayi.”
42011027	Yesu ni gaali nʼahiiroma, ngʼomuhasi owaali aŋo mu hiŋindi hyʼabaatu adunda ejanjaasi amuloma ati, “Ali nʼekabi omuhasi owahusaaye gahena gahwokesa!”
42011028	Aye Yesu gamuloma ati, “Abahira ohuba nʼekabi mbabo abaŋulira ehibono hya Hatonda baahena bahigondera.”
42011029	Abaatu bangi ni beyongera ohuhumbaana, nga Yesu aloma ati, “Abaatu bʼomulembe guno babi! Benda ahabonero aheŋunjisa ahalaga haati Hatonda njʼowaatuma aye ŋaŋuma ahabonero ahabaja ohubaŋa ohutusaho ahabonero hyaha Yona olu gaali mu guyeeni.
42011030	Olwohuba ngʼolu Yona gaali habonero eyiri abaatu bʼe Nineeve, nʼOmwana wʼOmuutu po aja ohuba eyiri abaatu bʼomulembe guno.
42011031	Habaha omuhasi ohuŋwa mu gwanga lyʼe Syebba ehirirene mu menamo ga Yisirayiri alyemeerera gasalira abaatu bʼomulembe guno omusango ohubahira olwohuba gagenda olugendo olwene oluleeŋi gatiina mu Yisirayiri ohuŋuliirisa ebibono bya habaha Sulemaani ebyʼamagesi. Aye ahira Sulemaani eŋono ali ŋano ne simufugiirira ebi aloma.
42011032	Abaatu bʼe Nineeve hu ludaalo lwʼohusala emisango balyemeerera balumiirisa abʼomulembe guno omusango gubahire olwohuba nibo Yona ni gabalomera ehibono hya Hatonda, bebbwaga. Aye ahira Yona eŋono ali ŋano ne simwenda hwebbwaga.
42011033	“Omuutu saaŋambya etaala gayihweha oba gayifunihira mu hisero aye ayita hu hihondo ko abaatu abengira mu nyumba babone enjase.
42011034	Emoni jenywe njʼetaala yʼomubiri gwenywe. Era jinaba ni jibona bulaŋi, obulamu bwosibwosi wijula enjase. Aye jinaba ni jitabona, omuutu oyo aba ali mu hiirema.
42011035	Ale ni mwegenderese, enjase eyiri mu enywe etaba hiirema.
42011036	Singa obulamu wenywe bwosibwosi wijula enjase ni ŋaŋuma himesu wayire hirala ehiri mu hiirema, olwʼehyo obulamu wenywe bunafugiirira enjase eyʼehibono hya Hatonda ni ŋaŋumaho hanyomero ahagaana amazima gehibono hya Hatonda, ehibono ehyo hiija huba hyʼetaala mu bulamu wenywe.”
42011037	Yesu ni gahena ohuloma atyo, nga ŋabaŋo omufalisaayo owʼamwanirisa ohulyaho ewuwe. Nga Yesu atiina gehala ohulya.
42011038	Aye omufalisaayo oyo geeŋunja ohubona Yesu nʼalya nʼatasaabire mu ngalo.
42011039	Ngʼaŋo Yesu Musengwa amuloma ati, “Enywe Abafalisaayo muli hyʼabaatu aboosa hu mugulu wʼebihopo nʼembya aye mugati ni mwijuuye obucaafu. Mwesi mu myoyo jenywe mwijuuye ebibi.
42011040	Basiru enywe! Muŋeega muuti owʼatonda hu mugulu, sinje owatonda nʼomugati?
42011041	Ehyʼohuhola, mugabirenga abagadi hu byenywe nʼomwoyo mulala ko mubeere erala bagwalaafu.
42011042	“Jibageene enywe Abafalisaayo! Muŋa ehirala ehyʼehumi ehya hiisi hiitu aye mwebirira muuti ohusala emisango ni mutehubbira nʼohwenda Hatonda, byamugaso. Muhole ebyo byosibyosi ni ŋaŋuma hulehayo ebindi.
42011043	“Jibageene enywe Abafalisaayo, olwohuba mwenda ohwihala mu bifo ebyʼeŋono mu mahumbaaniro nʼohubaheesa mu akisoni mu ngeri eraga yiiti ndinywe abahihenaho.
42011044	“Jibageene, olwohuba muli hyʼamagombe aga baatu beemaho aye ni batamanyire baati aŋa bemire ŋaliŋo omufu!”
42011045	Ngʼaŋo mulala hu basomesa bʼamagambi amuloma ati, “Musomesa, onaloma otyo oba otuduhiramo hwesi.”
42011046	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Jibageene enywe abasomesa bʼamagambi olwohuba mutwiha abaatu amagambi amasito aga mwabeene mwesi mutasobola nʼohuŋamba!
42011047	Jibageene enywe, olwohuba mudabirisa amagombe gʼabanaabbi aba basehulu benywe beeta aye simugondera ebi baalomanga.
42011048	Muli bajulizi bʼebyo ebi basehulu benywe baahola. Nibo beeta abanaabbi, ne nywe muli huhola gwahutandaza magombe gaawe.
42011049	“Olwʼehyo, Hatonda mu bulabuhi buwe galoma ati, ‘Ndibatumira abanaabbi nʼabahwenda era balala hu bo baja hubeeta nʼabandi babahiyaania.’
42011050	Olwʼehyo balisalira abaatu bʼomulembe guno omusango olwʼohwita abanaabbi bosibosi ohuŋwera erala hutandiha yʼehyalo ohwola hatyane.
42011051	Ohuŋwa ngʼolu beeta Abbiri ohwola hu Zakaliya oyu beetira ŋagati wʼehituuti nʼehifo ehyabufu mu Yekaalu.
42011052	“Jibageene enywe abasomesa bʼamagambi olwohuba mutigalira abaatu ohumanya amazima bahanoŋoha. Hiri hiityo olwohuba muhweha ehisumuluzo ehigula olwigi oluja mu hifo omu begirihisa abaatu amazima mwabaloberesa ohwingira, ni nenywe mwabene ndimwingira!”
42011053	Yesu ni gahena ohuloma ebyo, gaŋwaŋo ngʼatiina. Ngʼaŋo abasomesa bʼamagambi nʼAbafalisaayo batandiha ohumwendulirisa nʼohumuŋahanianga ebyʼamaani ebyene nʼohumusosekanga ebibuuso hulala hulala,
42011054	ni bendula aŋohumuŋambihisya mu ndoma yiye enyene.
42012001	Mu hiseera ehyene ehyo, abaatu ekumi nʼekumi ni baali ni bahumbeene nʼohwemanaho ni bemanaho, nga Yesu atagihira hu beegi babe abaloma ati, “Mwehuume obunafuusi bwʼAbafalisaayo olwohuba baloma hino nga bahola hindi.
42012002	Hiisi hiitu ehi bagisa hiryeta aŋalafu era hiisi ehi bahweha, balihiŋebbula.
42012003	Byosibyosi ebi balomera mu njirema, mubiromanga mu muusi etangaalwe era ni nebyo ebi babaŋweŋweterera mu hutwi mu hisenge biribbutuha.
42012004	“Bahyange, mbaloma ti mutatyanga abo abeeta omubiri hyoŋene nga bahoma aŋo.
42012005	“Aye leha mbalomere oyu muli nʼohutyanga, mutyenga nje Hatonda olwohuba ali nʼobuŋangi ohwita omubiri nʼohudanya omuutu mu muliro ogutasima. Oyo njʼoyu muli nʼohutyanga!
42012006	“Singa omuutu atunda obuyuni butaanu, saabufunamo bbeesa nyingi. Aye ŋaŋuma wayire halala aha Hatonda gebirira.
42012007	Kale muteŋendehereranga, olwohuba mu moni ja Hatonda muli bamuŋendo nʼohuhiraho obuyuni obwo eduuli, olwohuba amanyire nʼobungi wʼefiiri eriri hu mitwe jenywe.
42012008	“Mbalomera hino ti hiisi oyu esoni jitaŋamba ohwatula mu abaatu ati gaafugiirira, nʼOmwana wʼOmuutu yeesi alimwanjula eyiri abamalayika ba Hatonda ati wuwe.
42012009	Aye oyo oyu pambya esoni mu baatu, keesi sindimwanjula eyiri abamalayika ba Hatonda.
42012010	Era hiisi aloma ebibi hu Mwana wʼOmuutu, balimusoniŋa aye oyo afodogola Omwoyo Omutukuvu sibalimusoniŋa.
42012011	Ni banabaŋambenga babaŋira mu mbuga jʼamagambi, mu mahumbaaniro oba mu bʼobuŋangi, simweŋendehereranga ehi munalome.
42012012	Omwoyo Omutukuvu alibaŋa ehyʼohuloma mu hiseera ehyo.”
42012013	Ngʼaŋo ŋabaaŋo omuutu mulala hu baali mu hiŋindi hyʼabaatu owʼaloma Yesu ati, “Musomesa, lomaho hu mulebe yange hugabane ebyʼobusika bwefe.”
42012014	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Wange, njʼani owaatayeŋo ohuba mulamuzi wenywe?”
42012015	Ngʼaŋo aloma abaaliŋo ati, “Mwehuume ohutaluluhaniranga ebiitu ebyʼehyalo hino olwohuba obulamu wʼomuutu sibubaŋo olwʼebiitu ebingi ebi aba nʼali ni nabyo.”
42012016	Ngʼabagerera olugero ati, “Ŋaaliŋo omuutu omuŋinda owaali nʼendimiro yiye nga geeta ebiryo.
42012017	Nga geebuusa mu mwoyo gugwe ati, ‘Kole hi? Mbula ehifo ehihena ohubungamo ebirime byange bino!’
42012018	Ngʼaŋo omwene gegobolamo ati, ‘Hino njʼehi njʼahuhola. Nja hubbwagaŋo ebyagi bino kene nduheŋo ebibbala. Mbiihe omwo ebiryo nʼebiitu byange ebindi.
42012019	Ni kenire ohuhola tyo, ndyesiima mu mwoyo gwange ti ŋaahani kenire ohutegehera obulamu wange obwomu moni. Leha pumule, ndye era nywe hu byange, sangaale!’
42012020	Aye Hatonda ngʼamuloma ati, ‘Muŋaayi ewe! Mu hiire hino obulamu buwo buja huŋwaŋo. Ŋaahani njʼani aja hulya ebi obungire ebyo?’ ”
42012021	Nga Yesu ko agohoba ati, “Po aliba atyo omuutu owebiihira ebyʼobuŋinda mu hyalo muno aye nʼatali muŋinda ewa Hatonda.”
42012022	Nga Yesu aloma abeegi babe ati, “Cʼehigira mbaloma ti muteŋendehereranga olwʼehyohulya oba ehyʼohwambala.
42012023	Obulamu wenywe wa muŋendo ohuhira ebiryo nʼomubiri gwosi guhira ebyʼohwambala.
42012024	Mubonere hu nyuni, sijirima era jiŋuma byagi omu jibunga ebiryo aye Hatonda ajiŋa ebijirya. Enywe simuhirira ŋaleeŋi enyuni ejo bbe?
42012025	Era njʼani hu enywe aŋanga ohweyongesaho wayire oludaalo lulala hu bulamu buwe olwʼohweŋendehereranga?
42012026	Ŋaahani oba nga simuŋanga huhola wayire ehiitu ehidiidiri hyʼehyo, lwahiina mweŋendehereranga?
42012027	Mubonere hu bimuli, sibirima wayire ohutungisa engoye aye nʼeŋono eri habaha Sulemaani gaali ni nalyo lyosiryosi sigambalanga hubihira emboneha.
42012028	Hanye eyo njʼengeri eyi Hatonda alabiirira ebimuli ebiriŋo ahaseera buseera nga babyohya omuliro, saalibambasa enywe abali nʼohufugiirira ohudiidiri?
42012029	Muteŋendehereranga hu ebi munaalye oba munanywe.
42012030	Byosibyosi ebyo njʼebi baatu abatafugiirira Hatonda baŋembaho byabahenera ehiseera aye Senywe amanyire ati mubyenda.
42012031	Aye enywe muŋeegenga hu buŋugi bwa Hatonda, bali bameedaho nʼebisigayeyo byosi.
42012032	“Mutatya wayire muli habbubbu hadiidiri olwohuba Senywe owomwigulu alibaŋa omugabo mu obuŋugi buwe.
42012033	Muŋambe ebyenywe muŋe abagadi, munahola muutyo muba mwebiihira obuŋinda obwʼemirembe nʼemirembe mwigulu eyi omwibi nʼebisereŋi bitoola,
42012034	olwohuba eyi obuŋinda bubwo buba nʼomwoyo gugwo njʼeyi gusiiba ni guŋemba.
42012035	“Mube betegefu ohuŋeeresanga Hatonda hiisi ludaalo hyʼomwidu ngʼolu aba nahuumiiriye musengwawe nʼetaala yiye ni yaaduha.
42012036	Era mube hyʼabaatu abalindirira musengwa yaawe ohugobola nʼaŋwa hu higole, ni goola gakookona ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo bamwiguliraŋo.
42012037	Bali nʼekabi abaŋeeresa abo aba musengwa yaawe agobola gagaana ni bamoga. Buhomya weene mbalomera ti alyetegeha gabehasa ngʼabeŋula era ngʼasigalaŋo nʼalindiriye ohuŋeeresa hiisi muutu ehi genda.
42012038	Hiriba hiraŋi musengwa yaawe ohubagaana ni bahiimoga wayire agobola mu wiire ŋagati oba engoho ni jiholyoha.
42012039	Aye muhimanye muuti singa omwene mago amanya esaawa eyi mwibi anaajiremo, saamuleha hubbwaga nyumba yiye ohumunyaga ebiitu bibye.
42012040	Mwesi mwetegehe olwohuba Omwana wʼOmuutu aliijira mu hiseera ehi mutamusuubiriramo.”
42012041	Ngʼaŋo Peetero abuusa Yesu ati, “Musengwa, olugero luno olugereeye ndiife hweŋene oba abaatu bosibosi?”
42012042	Nga Musengwa amugobolamo ati, “Ŋaahani njʼani omuŋanika omwesigwa era owʼamagesi? Njʼoyo oyu musengwawe gataŋo ohutangirira abahye era gaabaŋa ebiryo byawe mu hiseera ehituufu.
42012043	Gesiimire omuŋeeresa oyu musengwawe alyagaana nʼahola atyo.
42012044	Mbalomera ehituufu ti musengwawe alimuŋa ohuhulira ebiitu bibye byosibyosi.
42012045	Aye singa omuŋeeresa oyo aloma mu mwoyo gugwe ati, ‘Musengwa yange anahalwe ohugobola,’ atandiha ohuhubba abahye era gaaba hu gʼohulya nʼohunywa nʼohumeera.
42012046	Musengwa wʼomuŋeeresa oyo aligobola hu ludaalo olu atamusuubiriraho nomu saawa eyi atamanyire. Era musengwawe oyo alimugudya ebyembaha ebyene ngʼahena amubalira ŋalala nʼabatafugiirira.
42012047	“Era omuŋeeresa amanyire ehi musengwawe genda era ndamwetegehera cooka ndahihola, balimugudya ebyembaha ebyene.
42012048	Aye omuŋeeresa oyo ohola ehibi nʼatamanyire ati ehi ahola hibi, balimugudya ni bamuleheramoho. Hiisi oyu baŋa obufunanyisiwa obubbala, balimusubiriramo bingi, ne oyo oyu babiihisa ebingi bali mwendaho bingi ohuhiraho ebi bamubiihisa.”
42012049	Ngʼaŋo Yesu geyongera ohuloma ati, “Naaja huŋwana muliro ogwʼohwabuhania abaatu hu hyalo. Ne nga nahendire bugali gube ti gwahena hale ohuŋamba!
42012050	Aye ese samwene ndi nʼohweyiniha mu hubonaabona ngʼolu beeniha omuutu mu maaji mu hubatiziwa era neŋendehereeye bugali ohwola olu hiryolerera.
42012051	Muŋeega muuti naaja huleeta miyaaya hu hyalo? Bbe, naaja hwabuhania.
42012052	Ohuŋwa olwa leero, abaatu bataanu mu hidaala hirala baneyabulengamo, abadatu babuhana hu babiri oba ababiri babuhana hu badatu hu lwange.
42012053	Omusaaye omusinde saaliŋambagana nʼomusaani era omuhaana saaliŋambagana ni nyina, omulya saaliŋambagana ni masaalaawe hu lwange.”
42012054	Nga Yesu aloma ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ati, “Ni mubona ehireri ni hiŋwa ebugwa lyuba, muloma muuti, ‘Efula yinaagwe’, era nga yigwa.
42012055	Era epunga enahubba ohuŋwa mu menamo, muloma muuti, ‘Omumwi guja hwaduha bugali.’ Nga era gwaduha.
42012056	Banafuusi enywe! Mumanyire amahulu gemboneha yʼembeera yʼehyalo nʼeyegulu byonyene. Lwahiina simumanyire huvunula ebiriŋo mu hiseera hino?
42012057	“Lwahiina simuŋanga hweyabuliraŋo ehiruŋamu ehi Hatonda genda era mwahihola?
42012058	Singa ŋabaaŋo ahuŋaŋabira, ni muba ni mutiina mu moni jʼomulamuzi fuba mufugiirisanie ni muhiiri mu ngira. Ne ni mutategeregana, nʼalihwosa mu moni jʼomulamuzi alihusalira omusango gaahena gaahuŋambya omuhulu wʼabasirikale ahudanye mu komera.
42012059	Kulomera ti sooliŋwa mu komera ohwola olulisasula ebbeesa josijosi eji ahubanja.”
42013001	Mu hiseera ehyo, ŋaaliŋo abalomera Yesu ebyafa hu baatu bʼe Galilaaya aba Pilaato galagira babeeta ni baali ni baŋayo eŋongo eyiri Hatonda.
42013002	Nga Yesu ababuusa ati, “Muŋeega muuti Abagalilaaya abo baali babbengi ohuhira abandi olwohuba baafa mu ngeri eyo?
42013003	Buhomya weene sipohiri. Aye mbaloma ti ni nenywe mwesi ni mutebbwaga, mulisihiiriha mwesimwesi.
42013004	Oba muŋeega muuti abasinde bala ehumi namunaana aba munaala gwagwaho e Silowaamu baafa baali babbengi ohuhira abaatu bosibosi abaali mu Yerusaalemu?
42013005	Buhomya weene sipohiri. Aye ni mutebbwaga, ni nenywe mwesimwesi mulisihiiriha.”
42013006	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abagerera olugero luno ati, “Ŋaaliŋo omuutu owaali nʼomusaala ogu balanga baati omutiini mu muga gugwe. Lulala gatiina ohwendulaho ebibala aye ndigagaanaho wayire hirala.
42013007	Ngʼaloma owʼalabiriranga endimiro ati, ‘Bona, emyaha edatu ni niija ohwendula ebibala hu mutiini guno aye ni tagaanaho.’ Gutemeeŋo, guŋuma mugaso.”
42013008	Ngʼowalabiriranga endimiro amugobolamo ati, “Muhulu, peeyo omwaha mulala ngutemerere nguteho nʼebigimusa hubone.
42013009	Singa gwama ebibala omwaha oguuja hiraŋi ne ni gutahaame nga ko gutemaaŋo.”
42013010	Lulala, hu ludaalo olwa Sabbaato, Yesu gaali mwirala hu mahumbaaniro nʼasomesa.
42013011	Ngʼaŋo ŋabaŋo mu humbaaniro omwo omuhasi oyu omusambwa gwali ni gufudungire ohuhena emyaha ehumi namunaana. Omuhasi oyo gaali saasobola nʼohwegolola kadi nʼaŋadiidiri.
42013012	Yesu ni gamubona, ngʼamulanga amuloma ati, “Oŋonire obulwaaye buwo.”
42013013	Ngʼamuŋambaho, aŋo ni naaŋo omuhasi oyo ngʼagololoha ajumirya Hatonda.
42013014	Omuhulu wʼehumbaaniro galuŋa olwohuba Yesu gaŋonia omuutu oyo hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato. Ngʼaloma ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu abaaliŋo ati, “Endaalo jiri mukaaga eji baatu baholeraho emirimo. Mujenga hwijo ohubaŋonia aye si hu ludaalo olwa Sabbaato.”
42013015	Nga Yesu Musengwa amugobolamo ati, “Banafuusi enywe, simusitula ŋombe oba nasugirya jenywe hu hihongo hu lwa Sabbaato mwajiŋira ohujinywesa?
42013016	Olwo hibi ohuŋonia omuhasi ono, omwijuhulu wa Yibbulayimu oyu Sitaani abaaye nʼabonyabonya ohuhena emyaha ehumi namunaana, olwohuba ludaalo lwa Sabbaato?”
42013017	Ni galoma atyo, nga hisimbya abasigu babe emitwe aye abaatu basigayeŋo nga basangaafu olwʼebiraŋi ebyo byosibyosi ebi gaali nʼabaholera.
42013018	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma ati, “Obuŋugi bwa Hatonda hunabugerageranie hu hi?
42013019	Buli hyʼahamo ha kalidaali aha omuutu gahoma mu muga gugwe. Ni gahoma nga hamera era hahula nga haŋwamo ogusaala ogwene ogubba, ngʼenyuni jitongola ebiswi mu masaga.”
42013020	Nga Yesu nindi abuusa ati, “Obuŋugi bwa Hatonda nabugerageranie hu hiina?
42013021	Nabugerageranie hu hasimbulusa aha omuhasi gaŋamba gahatabula mu busyanu oweene obungi owʼengaano abuhande anyiyemo emigaati nga hengira mu tome lyosiryosi eri gahanda mu busyanu obwo.”
42013022	Ngʼaŋo Yesu agenda nʼasomesa mu bibuga nʼomu byalo omu gabitanga naali hu lugendo lulwe nʼatiina e Yerusaalemu.
42013023	Nga ŋabaaŋo owamubuusa ati, “Yesu Musengwa, abaatu abalinoŋoha baliba badiidiri?” Ngʼaŋo Yesu amugobaloma ati,
42013024	“Mufubenga ohwingirira mu mulyango omudiiŋi olwohuba mbalomeraho ti bangi baligesyaho ohwingira mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda aye sibalisobola.
42013025	Olwigi luhiiri lwigule aye omwene nyumba nʼaligalaŋo, mulyemeerera ebulafu ni mukookona era ni mwegayirira muuti, ‘Muhulu, twigulireeŋo!’ Aye alibagobolamo ati, ‘Simbamanyire era simanyire nʼeyi muŋwera.’
42013026	Ngʼaŋo mutagiha ohuloma muuti, ‘Wasomesanga mu bitahere byʼewefe era hwalyanga ni nʼewe.’
42013027	Niye aligobolamo ati, ‘Ndomire ti simbamanyire era simanyire nʼeyi muŋwera. Muŋwe aŋo, enywe mwesimwesi abahosi bʼebibi.’
42013028	Mu hiseera ehyo, ŋalibaaŋo ohweninala nʼohulira amangi olwʼobulumi ni mubona Yibbulayimu ni Yisaka ni Yakobbo nʼabanaabbi bosibosi ni bali mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda aye enywe ni bababbingire.
42013029	Abaatu baliŋwa enjuyi nʼenjuyi nga beehala hu mbaga mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda.
42013030	Era hituufu bangi hu begingihiriri mu hiseera hino abaliba abaŋaasi, nindi bangi hu baŋaasi mu hiseera hino abaliba abegingihiriri.”
42013031	Mu hiseera ehyene ehyo, balala hu Bafalisaayo batiina ngʼabaloma Yesu baati, “Ŋwa ŋano olwohuba Herode genda hu hwita.”
42013032	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Mutiine mulome owʼolugesigesi oyo hyʼehibbwe muuti, ‘Olwa leero nʼejo njahubbinga emisambwa hu baatu ponie nʼabalwaye aye oludaalo olulondereraho nahahenerese ehyandetire.’
42013033	Ndinohweyongera ohuhola ehyandetire era pambire engira tiina e Yerusaalemu olwohuba eyo peyi banaabbi bali nʼohufiira.”
42013034	Nga Yesu geyongera abaloma ati, “Enywe abaatu bomu Yerusaalemu! Enywe abaatu bomu Yerusaalemu! Mweta abanaabbi era mwahubba aba babatumira amabaale! Efunda nyingi nendire ohubahumbaania hyʼengoho ngʼolu ehumbaania obwana bwayo aye ni mutafugiirira.
42013035	Buhomya weene mbalomera ti Yekaalu yenywe yija hufuuha magunda. Era simulimbona nindi ohwola olu ndigobola nga mundoma muuti, ‘Ali nʼekabi oyo owuujira mu buŋangi bwa Hatonda Musengwa.’ ”
42014001	Lulala hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato, Yesu ni gaali ewomulala hu batangirisi bʼAbafalisaayo ni balya, nga abasigu babe bamutaho emoni ni benda babone ehi anahole,
42014002	olwohuba ŋaaliŋo aŋo mu moni jije omuutu owaali nʼalwaye obulwaye owohusimbuluha.
42014003	Nga Yesu abuusa Abafalisaayo nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi ga Hatonda ati, “Amagambi gafugiirira ohuŋonia omuutu hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato oba bbe?”
42014004	Aye nibo baŋoleera huŋoleera sibamusimule. Ngʼaŋo Yesu aŋamba hu mulwaye oyo amuŋonia ahena amuseebula.
42014005	Ngʼaŋo ko ahena ababuusa ati, “Njʼani hu enywe, oyu omwana wuwe oba eŋombe yiye yinagwa mwiroŋo hu ludaalo olwa Sabbaato, ndaafayo?”
42014006	Era nindi sibamusimula.
42014007	Yesu ni gaabona abageni bahye ni betobosamo ebifo ebyʼeŋono hu meeza ohwali ebiryo, ngʼaloma nʼabbumbirya ati,
42014008	“Omuutu nʼahulanganga hu mbaga yiye eyʼobugole, siwetobosangamo ehifo ehyʼeŋono ni batahulomire, olwohuba eŋanga ohubaaŋo obundi oyu balangire ahuhiraho eŋono.
42014009	Oba mbo ohiiri aŋo, ngʼomutegehi wʼembaga gaaja ni nola ahuhira eŋono ahuloma ati, ‘Wange, ŋwaŋo ono geehale aŋo’, nga ko otiina ohwihala mu hifo ehitali hyʼeŋono nʼoswaye.
42014010	Aye ni bahulanganga, wihalanga mu hifo ehitali hyʼeŋono ko mutegehi wʼomukolo nʼahubona ni wihaaye eyo gaaje ahulome ati, ‘Wahyange, yigerera wuuje wihale ŋano aŋalaŋi ohuhiraho aŋo.’ Wangewe aŋo abageni bahyo bosibosi balihwisamo eŋono.
42014011	Ehyo kiroma olwohuba hiisi owegulumisa, balimwisa aye oyo oweyisa balimugulumisa.”
42014012	Ngʼaŋo aloma owamuhyasa ati, “Nʼonyiyanga emere soolanganga mihago jijo oba abalebe babo oba abehiha hihyo oba abaliranwa babo abaŋinda, olwohuba onahihola boosi balihulanga ewaawe.
42014013	Aye nʼoholanga embaga, olanganga bagadi, abaleme nʼabahyafutafuta nʼabaŋofu abaŋuma ehi banahahuŋe.
42014014	Ehyo hirihuŋeesa ekabi, olwohuba baŋuma hya huhusasula. Hatonda omwene alihusasula hu ludaalo olu aliramuhisaho abagwalaafu.”
42014015	Mulala hu baali ni behaaye hu meeza ni balya ni gaŋuliiye ehi Yesu galoma, ngʼaloma ati, “Bali nʼekabi abo abalirya hu mbaga eyʼomu buŋugi bwa Hatonda!”
42014016	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Ŋaaliŋo omuutu owanyiiya embaga hasiigu, ngʼalanga abaatu abeene abangi.
42014017	Esaawa eyʼohugabula ni yoola, ngʼatuma omwidu wuwe ohuloma abageni abalange ati, ‘Muuje, olwohuba ŋaahani kenire ohutegeha byosibyosi.’
42014018	Aye abageni abo abalange bosibosi batandiha ohweŋosyaho ngʼolu batasobole ohubaŋo hu mbaga. Oyu behereeye ohuloma galoma ati, ‘Nagulire ehisugu, nenda ohutiina ohuhyetegeresa. Olwʼehyo soniŋe sinasobole hubaŋo.’
42014019	Ngʼowundi amugobolamo ati, ‘Nagulire esaame ehumi, nenda ohutiina ohujigesesya mbone hanye jisobola ohulima bulaŋi. Olwʼehyo soniŋe sinasobole hubaŋo.’
42014020	Nʼowundi ngʼamugobolamo ati, ‘Nahaleetanga omweŋa, olwʼehyo soniŋe sinasobole huuja.’
42014021	“Ngʼaŋo omwidu gagamayo alomera musengwawe ebyo byosibyosi. Omwene mbaga ni gaŋulira, ngʼaluŋa aloma omwidu wuwe ati, ‘Ŋiitaho otiine ŋosiŋosi mu nguudo ejomu hibuga bunangire abagadi nʼabateŋe nʼabaŋofu nʼabaleme aba onagaane baaje.’
42014022	Ngʼomwidu atiina ahola ehi musengwawe amulomire. Ni gahena ngʼaloma musengwawe ati, ‘Kenire ohuhola ehi wundomire aye abaatu bahiiri huŋera.’
42014023	Nga musengwa yʼomwidu oyo amuloma ati, ‘Tiina olome abo bosibosi aba onagaane ŋosiŋosi mu nguudo ebulafu eyo baaje baŋere hu mbaga yange.
42014024	Buhomya weene, kulomera ti eŋuma wayire mulala hu banaali ni ndangire aba nahombeho hu mbaga yange.’ ”
42014025	Abaatu bangi bugali baali bagenda ni batiina ni Yesu, ngʼacuuha abaloma ati,
42014026	“Omuutu yesiyesi owenda semwana oba nyina oba omuhasi wuwe oba abaana babe oba abalebe babe oba ababoojo oba oweyenda omwene ohuhiraho ngʼolu ganyenda ese, saaŋanga huba muloobera wange.
42014027	Hiisi owenda ohuba omuloobera wange, ali nʼohwefiirisa byosibyosi era gaaba muhenerefu nʼohufiirwa obulamu buwe hu lwange ko abe muloobera wange.
42014028	Ŋaahani njʼani hu nywe nategeha ohutongola enyumba, ateherera hwihala gaabalirira abone hanye aŋanga ohuyihena?
42014029	Anayaba omusingi aye yamuhaya ohuheneeresa, ababona bamujeherera,
42014030	baati, ‘Omuutu ono gatandiha ohutongola aye byamuhaya ohuheneeresa.’
42014031	“Oba habaha hi atandiha ohusoosa habaha owundi nʼatehereeye hwihala gebuusa hanye asobola ohuŋangula olutalo nʼabasooli omutwalo mulala, ate nga ola oyu aja husoosa ali nʼabasooli emitwalo ebiri?
42014032	Anabona ati saasobola, amutumira abahwenda ola nʼahiiri ŋaleeŋi nʼamusunga batabagane.
42014033	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, hiisi mulala hu enywe atefiirisa byosibyosi saaŋanga huba muloobera wange.
42014034	“Omunyu omuherehe gwa mugaso aye singa gufuuha heresu, oŋanga otye nindi ohugugobosamo obunoli?
42014035	Guba gubula mugaso ohutusaho ohugudanya hu hibbomboyisi. Ale ali nʼohutwi, aŋulire.”
42015001	Lulala, abaŋoosa nʼabahosi bʼebibi bosibosi baali bahumbaanira aŋa Yesu gaali ohumuŋuliirisa nʼasomesa.
42015002	Ne Abafalisaayo nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi ga Hatonda bemulugunya ni baloma baati, “Omusinde ono ahola omuhumba nʼabahosi bʼebibi era alya ni nabo.”
42015003	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abagerera olugero ati,
42015004	“Singa mulala hu enywe aba nʼetaama jije cikumi aye nga ndala yigotaho, saaleha aŋo ecenda namwenda ni jiri hwaya gatiina ohwendula endala eyo egotire ohwola olu ayibona?
42015005	Era nʼayibona, ayidunda gaayita humabega nʼasangaaye
42015006	ngʼahena ayiŋira engo. Ni goola ngʼalanga emihago jije ko nʼabaliranwa babe ngʼabaloma ati, ‘Bahyange, husaŋalihisye ŋalala olwohuba etaama yange eyibaaye nʼegotire yibonehire.’
42015007	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, ŋabaaŋo ohusaŋalya hubitiirifu mwigulu olwʼomuhosi wʼebibi mulala owebbwaga ohuhira abalaŋi ecenda namwenda abatenda hwebbwaga.
42015008	“Oba singa ŋabaŋo omuhasi nʼali nʼendusu jije ehumi, ngʼendala yimugotaho saaŋambya taala gasingula ebiitu era gasaagula enyumba yosiyosi nʼayendula ohwola olu ayibona?
42015009	Nʼayibona, alanga emihago jije nʼabaliranwa babe ngʼabaloma ati, ‘Bahyange, husaŋalihisye ŋalala olwohuba mbwene endusu yange eyibaaye ni yingotireho.’
42015010	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, abamalayika ba Hatonda mwigulu basaŋalya olwʼomuhosi wʼebibi mulala owebbwaga.”
42015011	Nga Yesu geyongera abaloma ati, “Ŋaaliŋo omuutu owaali nʼabasaani babe babiri.
42015012	Ngʼaŋo owehiŋere aloma saawe ati, ‘Bbaabba, pe omugabo gwange hu byʼobuŋinda bubwo. Ngʼaŋo saawe abagabaniamo ebiitu bibye.’
42015013	“Endaalo sijabitaŋo nyingi, ngʼomusaani oyo aboŋa ebibye byosibyosi atiina eyo mu hyalo ehyaŋaleeŋi eyi gʼabidubuudira mu obulamu obwohwejalabya.
42015014	Ni gabihenaŋo byosibyosi, ngʼenjala eyʼamaani yigwa hiisi ŋaatu mu hyalo ehyo, ngʼaŋo atandiha ohudamba.
42015015	Olwʼehyo, gaatiina geesenga ewomulala hu baatu bomu hyalo ehyo owamuŋa ogwʼohulabiriranga embiiji.
42015016	Olwʼohuhaya ehyʼohulya, gegombanga nʼohulya hu moola aga gaŋanga embiiji aye ŋabulaŋo amuhombyaho ahaatu hosihosi.
42015017	“Ni geŋeegamo, ngʼaloma ati, ‘Abapakasi ba Bbaabba banga abalya ebiryo basendera nʼamagulu aye ese ndihufiira ŋano nʼenjala!’
42015018	Leha tiine eyiri Bbaabba, mulome ti ‘Bbaabba, nabbenga eyiri Hatonda nʼeyiri ewe wamwene.
42015019	Sipoomera nʼohunanga ti ndi mwana wuwo. Aye fuule mulala hu bapakasi babo.’
42015020	Ngʼaŋo genyoha atiina engo eyiri semwana. “Aye ni gaali nʼahiiriho ŋale nga semwana amulengera, ni gamufaania ngʼehisa himuŋambira omwana wuwe, ngʼaduluma amugwa mu hifuba.
42015021	Ngʼomusaani amuloma ati, ‘Bbaabba, nabbenga eyiri Hatonda nʼeyiri ewe wamwene. Sipoomera hundanga oti ndi mwana wuwo!’
42015022	Aye semwana galoma abeedu babe ati, ‘Mwanguŋeho muleete ebyambalo ebihira obulaŋi, nʼepeta nʼengayito mumwambase.’
42015023	“Mutiine muleete ebunwa yʼeŋombe etobbwatobbwa muyisale, hulye husangaale
42015024	olwohuba omwana wange ono gaali afuuye aye ŋaahani alamuhire era gaali agotire ne abonehire. Ngʼaŋo batandiha ohusaŋalya.
42015025	“Baholanga ebyo, omusaani omuhulu nʼali mu ndimiro. Ni gaali nʼagobola, nʼanatere ohwola engo ngʼaŋulira ni bemba.
42015026	Ngʼalanga mulala hu beedu, amubuusa ati hiina ehiri eyo?
42015027	Ngʼomwidu oyo amugobolamo ati, ‘Mulebewo agobooye era lataawo amusaliiye ebunwa yʼeŋombe etobbwatobbwa olwohuba mbo omwana wuwe agobooye nʼali mulamu.’
42015028	“Aye omusaani oyo galuŋa huluŋa nandi geeda nʼohwingira mu nyumba. Nga semwana atula ebulafu amwegalihira gengire.
42015029	Aye ngʼagobola mu semwana ati, ‘Bona, emyaha mingi eji kenire ni kuholera hyʼomwidu era sikuhaniaŋalirangaho. Aye sibupangaho wayire ahabusi sale keesi sangaaleho nʼabahyange.
42015030	Aye omusaani wuwo oyo, owadubuuda ebibyo nʼabamalaaya nʼagobooye, omwitiiye ebunwa yʼeŋombe!’
42015031	“Nga Semwana amugobolamo ati, ‘Mwana wange, ewe obaaye ŋano ni nange ahamanga hosihosi era ebiri ŋano byosibyosi bibyo.
42015032	Aye hibaaye hiraŋi ohusaŋalya olwohuba mulebewo oyo, gaali afuuye aye ŋaahani alamuhire era gaali agotire ne abonehire.’ ”
42016001	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma abeegi babe ati, “Ŋaaliŋo omuŋinda owaali nʼomuŋanika wuwe oyu baloopa baati gaali adubuuda ebiitu ebi gaali nʼamuŋaaye ohulabirira.
42016002	Ngʼaŋo alanga omuŋanika oyo amubuusa ati, ‘Biina bino ebi kuŋuliraho? Nenda wuupe embalirira yʼebiitu ebi nahuŋambya olwohuba sooja hweyongera nʼohiiri muŋanika wange.’
42016003	Ngʼomuŋanika oyo geebuusa mu mwoyo gugwe ati, ‘Hiina ehi naahole, olwohuba musengwa yange gatuhiseemo obwesige? Mbula amaani agalima, ndimudoto, nʼesoni jipamba ohusungirisa.’
42016004	Ngʼomwene gegobolamo ati ‘Ŋaahani manyire ehi nahole, ko abaatu abo aba musengwa yange abanja basangaalire mu mago gaawe ni bambingire hu mulimo.’
42016005	Ngʼaŋo alanga hiisi owaali nʼebbanja lya musengwawe. Ngʼaloma omudaayi ati, ‘Musengwa yange ahubanja jinga?’
42016006	“Ngʼamugobolamo ati, ‘Amafuta gomu mizayiti ebidomolo cikumi.’ Ngʼomuŋanika amuloma ati, ‘Ŋamba endagaano yiyo. Yiihala oyicuuse oŋandiihe ebidomolo ebihumi bine.’
42016007	Ngʼaloma owundi ati, ‘Ate ewe, bahubanja jinga?’ Ngʼamugobolamo ati ‘Esaŋu jʼengaano cikumi.’ Ngʼomuŋanika amuloma ati, ‘Ŋamba endagaano yiyo eyi bahubanjiraho. Yiihala oyicuuse oŋandiihe cinaana joŋene.’
42016008	“Nga musengwawe amupaaha olwʼobugeregetania obu gaali ni nabwo ohusala amagesi. Ehihulu hiri hiiti, abaatu abatafugiirira Hatonda bagesigesi ohuhira abafugiirira olwʼengeri eyi betegeheramo obulamu wabwe obwomu moni.
42016009	Mbalomera ti mutambisenga obuŋinda wenywe ohwesunira emihago, olwohuba ebiitu ebyohu hyalo huno ni biribaŋwaŋo balibasangaalira mu mago agʼemirembe nʼemirembe mwigulu.
42016010	“Omuutu omwesigwa mu hidiidiri aba mwesigwa nʼomu hibbala era oyo atali mwesigwa mu hidiidiri saaba mwesigwa nʼomu hibbala.
42016011	Ŋaahani ni muba ni mutali besigwa mu ngeri eyi muŋambamo obuŋinda obwʼohu hyalo huno, njʼani alibaŋa obuŋinda obwomwigulu?
42016012	Era ni muba ni mutali besigwa hu byʼabandi, njʼani alibaŋa ebyenywe hu wenywe?
42016013	“Omwidu saaŋanga huba nʼabasengwa babiri, atalaho mulala nga genda owundi oba agonderaho mulala, ngʼatala owundi. Omuutu saaŋanga huŋira ebbeesa ngʼehiitu ehihulu era gasigala nʼahiŋeeresa Hatonda.”
42016014	Ŋaahani, ŋaaliŋo Abafalisaayo abaali ni benda bugali ebyʼobuŋinda owʼehyalo hino ni baŋulira ebyo byosibyosi, nga bamujeherera.
42016015	Nga niye abaloma ati, “Mwefuula abalaŋi mu moni jʼabaatu aye Hatonda amanyire emyoyo jenywe. Olwohuba ehi abaatu bapaaha, hiba hya mbiho mu moni ja Hatonda.
42016016	“Basomesanga amagambi aga Hatonda gaŋa Musa nʼebi banaabbi baŋandiiha ohwola hu biseera bya Yowaane. Aye ohuŋwa hu olwo babuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu buŋugi bwa Hatonda era hiisi muutu gesolaho ohuwingira nʼehifuba.
42016017	Era hyangu egulu nʼehyalo ohuŋwaŋo ohuhira ahanyukuta ohuŋwaŋo mu magambi ga Hatonda.
42016018	“Ehyʼohuboneraho, hiisi abbinga omuhasi wuwe ngʼahena galeeta owundi, aba aholire obuhwedi. Era oyo aŋira omuhasi owanoba hu wamwe, aba ahola obuhwedi.
42016019	“Ŋaaliŋo omusinde omuŋinda owambalanga engoye ejʼebbeeyi, nabanga mu bulamu obulaŋi obwʼohwesangaasa hiisi ludaalo.
42016020	Era ŋaaliŋo nʼomugadi oyu balanganga baati Lazaalo owaali nʼahwene mabbwa mereere era oyu batanga ŋa mulyango ogwingira mu mago gʼomuŋinda oyo.
42016021	Era embwa jaajanga ni jihomberera amabbwa gage. Lazaalo gegombanga ohulya obukukumuhira wohu meeza yʼomuŋinda aye ŋaaŋuma amuŋa.
42016022	“Aye ehiseera hyola, nga Lazaalo afa, ngʼabamalayika bamuŋira mwigulu aŋa Yibbulayimu gaali. Ngʼomuŋinda yeesi afa, bamusiiha.
42016023	Omuŋinda oyo ni gaali mu bulumi obwene owʼamaani e magombe, galengera Yibbulayimu naali ni Lazaalo.
42016024	Ngʼaŋo omuŋinda oyo nʼadundireho ejanjaasi aloma ati, ‘Bbaabba Yibbulayimu, pambire ehisa otume Lazaalo atiine atimye olwala mu maaji gaaje gatonyese hu lulimi ohuŋosa ŋa mwoyo, olwohuba ndi mu bulumi bubitiirifu mu muliro guno.’
42016025	“Aye nga Yibbulayimu amuloma ati, ‘Mwana wange, hebulira oti ni waali nʼohiiri hu hyalo wasuna omugabo gugwo ogwʼebiraŋi aye Lazaalo niye nʼabonaabona. Ŋaahani ali husangaala, ewe nʼoli mu bulumi obubitiirifu.
42016026	Nindi ebyo byosibyosi nʼobitaaye aŋo, bataayeŋo olukooko olwene olubba ŋagati weefe ni nenywe, eŋume muutu aŋanga ohuŋwa eno ohuuja eyo oba ohuŋwa eyo ohuuja eno.’
42016027	“Ngʼaŋo omuŋinda aloma Yibbulayimu ati, ‘Ale muhulu, kwegayiriiye tuma Lazaalo atiine engo weefe,
42016028	alabule abalebe bange abataanu abaliyo, boosi bataaja mu hifo hino ehyʼobulumi obubitiirifu.’
42016029	“Nga Yibbulayimu amuloma ati, ‘Bali nʼamagambi aga baŋa Musa nʼebi banaabbi baŋandiiha, ebyo bihena ohubalabula.’
42016030	Ngʼomuŋinda oyo amuloma ati, ‘Bbe, Bbaabba Yibbulayimu, singa ŋabaaŋo alamuha gatiina gabalomera, bebbwaga.’
42016031	Nga Yibbulayimu amuloma ati, ‘Ni baba ni bataŋulira ebya Musa nʼabanaabbi, sibaja hufugiirira wayire ŋabaaŋo alamuha gatiina ohubalomera.’ ”
42017001	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma abeegi babe ati, “Ebiitu ebireetera abaatu ohwonoona sibirihaya hubaŋo aye jimwageene oyo abireeta.
42017002	Omuutu oyo aŋoomera humusidiha ogubaale ogusito mu mamiro bamudanya nomu buliba ohuhira olu aleetera mulala hu baŋere bano ohubbenga.
42017003	Mwehuume hino, mulebewo anahuhola ehibi, omulabulanga era singa geebbwaga, omusoniŋanga.
42017004	Singa ahuhola ehibi emirundi musanvu mu ludaalo lulala era hiisi funda ni gaaja eyi oli gaahuloma ati, ‘Nebbwaga, soniŋe,’ omusoniŋanga.”
42017005	Ngʼabahwenda baloma Musengwa baati, “Tuyeede hwahaba nʼohufugiirira ohuhiraho ŋano.”
42017006	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Singa muba nʼohufugiirira ohwaga hyʼahamo ha kalidaali, musobola ohuloma omusaala guno muuti, ‘Huuha nʼemisi oje wehomehe mu nyanja,’ era gwabaŋulira.
42017007	“Njʼani hu nywe ali nʼomwidu amulimira oba amwemerera aŋanga ohuloma omwidu oyo nʼaŋwa mu huhola emirimo ati, ‘Nja wiihale olye?’
42017008	Geheerera humuloma ati, ‘Tegehereŋo ehyʼohulya bunyiŋule, obe aŋo ni bupeeresa kene ohulya weesi ko olye.’
42017009	Omwidu oyo, Musengwawe amweyaasa olwʼohuhola ebi aba ni bamulagiiye ohuhola? Bbe, saamweyaasa.
42017010	Cʼehyene ni nenywe, ni munahenenge ohuhola byosibyosi ebi Hatonda galoma, mulomenge muuti, ‘Huli beedu wiidu. Huholire ebi huli nʼohuhola.’ ”
42017011	Yesu ni gaali nʼatiina e Yerusaalemu, gabita ŋagati wamatwale gʼe Samaliya ni Galilaaya.
42017012	Ni gaali nʼabita mu hirala hu bitahere byayo, ŋaaliŋo abasinde ehumi abaali abagenge abatiina bemeerera ŋaleŋaleho ni naye.
42017013	Ngʼaŋo baloma nʼejanjaasi eryʼamaani baati, “Yesu Musengwa, tuŋambire ehisa otuŋonie.”
42017014	Yesu ni gababona, ngʼabaloma ati, “Mutiine mweyanjule eyiri abasengi ba Hatonda.” Ni baali ni batiina, nga baŋona.
42017015	Mulala hu bo ni gabona ati aŋonire, ngʼagobola nʼajumirya Hatonda nʼejanjaasi eryʼamaani.
42017016	Ngʼahubba amafuha huupi ni Yesu, geyaasa. Oweyaasa oyo gaali Musamaliya.
42017017	Nga Yesu aloma ati, “Abaŋonire babaaye ehumi. Omwenda bali ŋeena?
42017018	Ŋabula owundi yesiyesi agobooye ohweyaasa Hatonda ohutusaho ono Atali Muyudaaya?
42017019	Nga Yesu ahena amuloma ati, ‘Yinyoha otiine, ohufugiirira huhwo huhuŋonisye.’ ”
42017020	Lulala, Abafalisaayo babuusa Yesu baati, “Obuŋugi bwa Hatonda bulibaŋo ŋaali?” Ngʼabagobolamo ati, “Obuŋugi bwa Hatonda sibuuja ni bwebonesa.
42017021	Abaatu sibaŋanga huloma baati, ‘Bona, Hatonda aŋuga ŋano’ oba baati, ‘Aŋuga ŋala,’ olwohuba Obuŋugi bwa Hatonda buli mu myoyo jenywe.”
42017022	Ngʼaŋo aloma abeegi babe ati, “Ehiseera hiryoola mwegomba ohuba aŋali Omwana wʼOmuutu aye ni mutamubona.
42017023	Abaatu balibaloma baati, ‘Bona, ali ŋala’ oba baati, ‘Bona, ali ŋano.’ Ebyo simubifugiiriranga.
42017024	Ohuuja hwʼOmwana wʼOmuutu huliba hyʼohumesya hwʼefula ohuhosya egulu ohuŋwa hu lubega lulala ohwola hu lundi.
42017025	Aye ebyo ko bibeŋo, banahasooke humugudya bugali weene era abaatu bʼomulembe guno bamwegaana.
42017026	“Ngʼolu hyali mu mulembe gwa Nuwa, pohiriba hiityo nomu hiseera ehyʼohuuja hwʼOmwana wʼOmuutu.
42017027	Mu mulembe gwa Nuwa, abaatu baali balya ni banywa ni bahwa era ni bafumbirwa ohwola hu ludaalo olu Nuwa gengira mu lyato, ngʼefula yitonya, amaaji gabanda gasihiirisa abaatu bosibosi.
42017028	“Era pohyali nomu mulembe gwa Luuti. Abaatu baali balya ni banywa, ni bagula era ni batunda ebyawe, baali balima era ni bagesa ni batongola nʼamayumba.
42017029	Aye hu ludaalo olu Luuti gaŋwa mu Sodoma, Hatonda gaŋindiha omuliro ohuŋwa mwigulu nga gusihiirisa abaatu bosibosi mu hibuga ehyo.
42017030	“Era pohiriba hiityo mu hiseera ehyʼohuuja hwʼOmwana wʼOmuutu.
42017031	Mu hiseera ehyo, omuutu aliba ŋamugulu hu nyumba nʼali nʼebiitu bibye mu gati, sigengiranga hutusamo ehyʼohutiina ni nahyo. Era oyo aliba hu muga sigaagama yingo.
42017032	Muhebulire ehyola hu muha Luuti, mwesi hitaboolaho!
42017033	Hiisi owenda oweheneerera obulamu buwe, alibufiirwa aye hiisi afiirwa obulamu buwe hu lwange, alibuŋonia.
42017034	Mbalomera ti mu hiire ehyo, abaatu babiri baliba hu buliri bulala, baliŋiraho mulala baleha obundi.
42017035	Abahasi babiri baliba baseera ŋalala hu mbaale, baliŋira mulala nga baleha obundi.
42017036	Abaatu babiri baliba hu muga, baliŋira mulala baleha obundi.”
42017037	Ngʼabeegi babe bamubuusa baati, “Musengwa, ebiitu ebyo biriba ŋeena?” Ngʼabagobolamo mu lugero ati, “Aŋaba ehifu, paŋa esega jihumbaanira hiisi muutu gajibona, nʼohuuja hwʼOmwana wʼOmuutu huutyo po huliba.”
42018001	Ngʼaŋo Yesu nindi agerera abeegi babe olugero ohubasomesa ati bali nʼohusabanga habuhyabuhya ni batademba.
42018002	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Ŋaaliŋo eyo ehibuga omwali omulamuzi atatyanga Hatonda oba omuutu yesiyesi.
42018003	Ngʼaŋo ŋabaaŋo ni namwandu mu hibuga ehyene ehyo owadebereranga nʼatiina ewʼomulamuzi oyo nʼamwegalihira ati, ‘Ngayeho obuyoga nʼosalira oyu posa ni naye omusango.’
42018004	Omulamuzi gaahena ehiseera nʼatafayo hu namwandu oyo aye goola aŋaatu gesinya ngʼaloma mu mwoyo gugwe ati, ‘Wayire sitya Hatonda oba omuutu yesiyesi,
42018005	olwohuba namwandu ono gasulusuuta, leha sale omusango gugwe alehere aŋo ohuujanga ni gasulusuuta.’ ”
42018006	Nga Musengwa abaloma ati, “Mubone ehi omulamuzi oyo atatya Hatonda galoma.
42018007	Olwo muŋeega muuti Hatonda saaliyeeda baatu babe abasaba omuusi nʼowiire? Saaliŋira hamanga nʼahiri hubayeeda.
42018008	Mbalomera ti alibayeeda mangu, aye Omwana wʼOmuutu nʼaligobola alyagaana abaatu hu hyalo huno ni bahimufugiirira?”
42018009	Ngʼaŋo Yesu agerera abo abaali ni beebona baati njʼabagwalaafu mu moni ja Hatonda olugero luno ati,
42018010	“Abaatu babiri batiina mu Yekaalu ohusaba. Mulala gaali mufalisaayo, owundi muŋoosa.
42018011	Ngʼomufalisaayo gemeerera asaba ati, ‘Hatonda, kweyaasa olwohuba sindi hyʼabandi: abakondo, abahosi bʼebibi, abahwedi oba hyʼomuŋoosa oyo.
42018012	Ese siiba emirundi ebiri mu wiiki era paayo ehirala ehyʼehumi hu byosibyosi ebisuna.’
42018013	Aye omuŋoosa niye gaali gebaayireho, nʼatenda nʼohugangamusa emoni ŋamugulu ohuheja ewa Hatonda. Aye nga gehubba mu hifuba aloma ati, ‘Hatonda, saasire ese omuhosi wʼebibi!’
42018014	Mbalomera ti omuŋoosa oyo gaagamayo ewuwe Hatonda nʼamusoniŋire ebibi bibye, aye omufalisaayo bbe, olwohuba hiisi owegulumisa, balimwisa aye oyo oweyisa balimugulumisa.”
42018015	Lulala, ŋaaliŋo abaatu abaŋira abaana abaŋere eyiri Yesu abaŋambeho abasabire ekabi. Aye abeegi babe ni bababona, nga babahayula hubahayula.
42018016	Aye Yesu galanga abaana abo nʼaloma ati, “Mulehe abaana abaŋere baaje eyi ndi, mutabalobera olwohuba abaatu abali hyʼabo, mbʼabengira mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda.
42018017	Mbalomera ehituufu ti hiisi muutu ateesiga Hatonda hyʼomwana omuŋere ngʼolu geesiga abasaaye babe, saalingira mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda.”
42018018	Ngʼaŋo mulala hu batangirisi bʼAbayudaaya abuusa Yesu ati, “Omusomesa omulaŋi, hiina ehisaanira ohuhola ko sune obulamu obutaŋwaŋo?”
42018019	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Wema huhi ohunanga omulaŋi ate nga ŋaŋuma mulaŋi ohutusaho Hatonda yeŋene?
42018020	Omanyire ebiragiro bya Hatonda ebiroma biiti, sooholanga buhwedi, siwitanga muutu wahyo, siwibanga, soobeŋeranga muutu ehi ataholire, oŋanga lataawo ni maawo eŋono.”
42018021	Ngʼomutangirisi oyo amugobolamo ati, “Ohuŋwera erala mu buŋere wange nʼohwosa haati ebiragiro ebyo byosibyosi mbyoheresa.”
42018022	Yesu ni gaŋulira ebyo, ngʼamuloma ati, “Ohibuliraho ehiitu hirala. Tiina otunde ebibyo byosibyosi, ebbeesa ejinaŋwemo ojigabire abagadi, ko ohene wuuje obe muloobera wange, olisuna obuŋinda mwigulu.”
42018023	Aye omutangirisi oyo ni gaŋulira ebiitu ebyo, ngʼabomboŋala olwohuba gaali nʼobuŋinda obwene obungi.
42018024	Yesu ni gamubona nʼawomboŋaye ngʼaloma ati, “Nga hiriba higosi abaŋinda ohwingira mu Buŋugi bwa Hatonda!
42018025	Hituufu, hyangu bugali weene engamiya ohubita mu ŋundu lyʼepiso, ohuhira omuŋinda ohwingira mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda.”
42018026	Abaŋulira ebyo nga bamubuusa baati, “Olwo ŋaahani njʼani aŋanga ohunoŋoha?”
42018027	Nga Yesu agobolamo ati, “Eyiri abaatu higosi ohwenoŋola aye eyiri Hatonda hyangu ohunoŋola olwohuba ŋabula ehimuhaya.”
42018028	Ngʼaŋo Peetero aloma Yesu ati, “Efe hwaleha ebyefe byosibyosi ebi hwali ni nabyo nga huuja hube baloobera babo.”
42018029	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Mbalomera ehituufu ti ŋabula muutu owaleha amago gage oba abaganda babe oba omuhasi wuwe oba abasaaye babe oba abaana babe olwʼobuŋugi bwa Hatonda,
42018030	atalisuna omuhemba omubba mu mulembe guno ko nʼobulamu obutaŋwaŋo mu biseera ebyomu moni.”
42018031	Nga Yesu agobosa abeegi babe ehumi nʼababiri hu tulo abaloma ati, “Huli hutiina e Yerusaalemu era byosibyosi ebi banaabbi baŋandiiha hu Mwana wʼOmuutu bija hwolerera.
42018032	Baja humuŋayo eyiri abalugendwa,
42018033	bamuhubbe efaalu bahene bamwite aye ni ŋabitireŋo endaalo edatu aliramuha.”
42018034	Aye abeegi babe sibategeera mahulu gʼebibono ebyo olwohuba gaali magise.
42018035	Yesu ni gaali nʼali huupi hwola mu hibuga e Yeriko, gaagaana omuŋofu owaali ni geehaye hu tulo wʼengira nʼasungirisa.
42018036	Omuŋofu oyo ni gaŋulira ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ni hibita ngʼabuusa ati, “Hiina ehyo?”
42018037	Nga bamulomera baati Yesu Omunazaleesi njʼabitaŋo.
42018038	Ngʼaŋo alangirira nʼejanjaasi eryʼamaani ati, “Yesu, Omwijuhulu wa Dawudi, pambire ehisa!”
42018039	Ngʼabaatu abaali ni batangiyemo bamuhayula ni bamuloma aŋoleere. Aye niye nga geeyongera hweyongera ohuloma nʼejanjaasi eyʼamaani ati, “Mwijuhulu wa Dawudi, pambire ehisa!”
42018040	Nga Yesu gemeerera alagira baleete omuŋofu oyo aŋa gaali. Ni bamuŋira, ngʼamubuusa ati,
42018041	“Wenda kuholere hi?” Ngʼomuŋofu amugobolamo ati, “Musengwa, njingule emoni, mbone.”
42018042	Ngʼaŋo Yesu amuloma ati, “Ohufugiirira huhwo, huhuŋonisye. Limbula obone.”
42018043	Aŋo ni naaŋo ngʼemoni jirimbuha atandiha ohubona, nga yeesi geŋimba hu baali ni balonda Yesu nʼajumirya Hatonda. Era abaatu bosibosi ni babona nʼaŋonire, nga boosi bajumirya Hatonda.
42019001	Ngʼaŋo Yesu nʼabagaali ni nʼabo bengira mu hibuga Yeriko ni babita engira.
42019002	Mu hibuga omwo, mwalimo omusinde omuŋinda owaali omuhulu wʼabaŋoosa ni bamulanga baati Zakayo.
42019003	Omusinde oyo gendire ohubona omuutu oyu balanga baati Yesu aye olwʼeduuli lyʼabaatu sigaŋanga humubona olwohuba gaali muupi.
42019004	Olwʼehyo, gaduluma gatiina mu moni ganiina omusaala omusokomooli ogwali hu ngira eyi Yesu gaali nʼaja hubitamo.
42019005	Yesu ni goola hu musaala ogwo, ngʼaheja ŋamugulu ahena amuloma ati, “Zakayo, niinuha mangu, olwohuba olwa leero ndi mugeni wuwo.”
42019006	Ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo, Zakayo aniinuha nʼali musangaafu ngʼaŋira Yesu ewuwe.
42019007	Abaatu ni babona, nga bemulugunya baati, “Atiina ohuhyala ‘ewʼomuhosi wʼebibi.’ ”
42019008	Ni baali ni bali eyo, Zakayo genyoha galoma Yesu ati, “Musengwa, nabuuyeemo ŋagati hu biitu byange ngabireho abagadi. Era ni ŋabaŋo oyu nalyakula, nja humuliŋaŋo emirundi ene.”
42019009	Ngʼaŋo Yesu amuloma ati, “Olwa leero abaatu abomu mago gano banoŋohire olwohuba wetuhiseyo oti ewe weesi oli mwijuhulu wa Yibbulayimu.
42019010	Olwohuba Omwana wʼOmuutu gaaja hu hyalo ohwendula nʼohunoŋola abo abaagota.”
42019011	Abaatu baali bahyetegeeresa ebyo, nga Yesu abagerera olugero olwohuba baali huupi nʼe Yerusaalemu era nʼabaatu aba gaali ni nabo ni baŋeega baati aja hutagihiraŋo ohuŋuga nga habaha ni golireyo.
42019012	Ngʼaloma ati, “Ŋaaliŋo omuutu owomu lulyo oluhombe owatiina mu hyalo ehyaŋale ohumufuula habaha, ko ahene agobole.
42019013	Ngʼalanga abeedu babe ehumi, ngʼaŋa hiisi mulala hu bo ebbeesa ejibalanga baati mina ndala ngʼabaloma ati, ‘Musuubuulire mu bbeesa ejo ohwola olu ndigobola.’
42019014	“Aye abaatu abomu hyalo hihye baali sibamwenda, nga batuma abahwenda batiine era eyi gaali nʼaja ohumufuula habaha balome baati, ‘Sihwenda musinde oyo ohuba habaha weefe.’
42019015	“Cooka niye nga bamufuula habaha gagamayo engo, ni goola ngʼalanga abeedu aba gaŋa ebbeesa jije ni genda ohumanya amagoba aga baahola.
42019016	Ngʼomwidu omudaayi amuloma ati, ‘Musengwa, ebbeesa jijo eji waapa jasaala amagoba gʼemina ehumi.’
42019017	“Nga musengwawe amuloma ati, ‘Kalwe bugali weene, oli mwidu mulaŋi. Ngʼolu baaye mwesigwa mu hidiidiri, oja huŋuga ebibuga ehumi.’
42019018	“Owohubiri nga gaaja aloma ati, ‘Musengwa, emina eyi waapa nayisaasamo ejindi etaanu.’
42019019	“Nga musengwawe amuloma ati, ‘Kalwe bugali weene, oja huŋuga ebibuga bitaanu.’
42019020	“Aye owohudatu ni gaaja gamuloma ati, ‘Musengwa, emina yiyo eyi waapa njʼeyi. Nayibiiha bulaŋi weene era njʼeyi enyene nʼenyene.
42019021	Nahutya, olwohuba oli mugosi, oŋira nʼehitali hihyo era ogehesa nʼaŋotamwa olwohuba wenda ebyowereere.’
42019022	“Nga musengwawe amugobolamo ati, ‘Musirusiru ewe, ebi oloma ebyene bihusalira omusango. Hanye omanyire oti ndi mugosi era ti nenda ebyowereere,
42019023	lwahiina ebbeesa eji nahuŋa siwajiŋa abasubuzi ni nahagoboye samwene najitusayo ni jikoleeye amagoba?’
42019024	“Ngʼaŋo aloma abeedu abandi abaali ni bemereeye aŋo ati, ‘Mumutuseho nʼemina eyo, muyiŋe oyo ali nʼehumi.’
42019025	“Ngʼabeedu abo bamugobolamo baati, ‘Musengwa, oyo oyu oloma ohuŋa, ali nʼehumi!’
42019026	“Ngʼabagobolamo ati, ‘Mbalomera hino ti oyo atambisa ehi bamuŋa, balimumeedaho ebindi aye oyo aŋuma balimutusaaho nʼahadiidiri aho aha ali ni naho.
42019027	Ŋaahani muleete ŋano abalabe bange, abatendire baafuule habaha bwawe era mubeetire ŋano ni mbona.’ ”
42019028	Yesu ni gahena ohuloma ebyo ngʼabatangiramo batiina e Yerusaalemu.
42019029	Ni baali ni banaatere ohwola mu bubuga Bbesufage ni Bbesaniya mu meenamo gʼolusozi lwʼemisaala emizayiti, gatuma babiri hu beegi babe,
42019030	abaloma ati, “Mutiine mu haalo aha mulengera aho. Ni munaabe ni mwahengira muuti, munaabone nasugirya eperepere eyi muutu ahiiri hwihalangaho ni bayisidihire aŋo, muyiwoŋolole muyindeetere ŋano.
42019031	Singa ŋabaŋo ababuusa ati, ‘Lwahiina muyiboŋolola?’ Munamugobolemo muuti, ‘Musengwa njʼayenda.’ ”
42019032	Ngʼaŋo ababatuma batiina bagaana byosibyosi ni biri ngʼolu baali ni babalomire.
42019033	Ni baali ko ni bawoŋolola nasugirya eyo, ngʼabeneeyo bababuusa baati, “Lwahiina muyiboŋolola?”
42019034	Nga babagobolamo baati, “Musengwa njʼayenda.”
42019035	Nga batangirisa nasugirya eyo bayiŋirira Yesu. Ni boola nga bayaalaho engoye jaawe hu mugongo, Yesu ayiihalaho.
42019036	Ni gaali nʼatiina, ngʼabaatu baalirira engoye jaawe mu ngira Yesu agendereho.
42019037	Ni gaali ni genda hwola e Yerusaalemu ni gehirira hu lusozi olwʼemisaala emizayiti, ehiŋindi hyʼabeegi babe hyosihyosi nga hijumirya Hatonda nʼejanjaasi eryʼamaani ni basangaaye olwʼebyamaliholiho byosibyosi ebi baali ni baweene.
42019038	Ni baloma nʼejanjaasi eryʼamaani baati, “Ali nʼekabi habaha oyo owuujira mu siina lya Musengwa, abaatu bamuŋe eŋono. Haŋabeeŋo emiyaaya ŋagati wa Hatonda nʼabaatu, era eŋono libe eyiri Hatonda oyo ali Ŋamugulu Obugali.”
42019039	Ngʼaŋo balala hu Bafalisaayo abaali mu hiŋindi baloma Yesu baati, “Musomesa, loma hu beegi babo baŋoleere.”
42019040	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Mbalomera ti singa abo baŋoleera, amabaale ganaahayaane.”
42019041	Yesu ni goola huupi nʼehibuga Yerusaalemu, ni gahirengera ngʼalira amangi olwʼohulumirwa abaatu bamo,
42019042	ngʼaloma ati, “Singa baatu nywe olwa leero mumanyire ehyahabaleeteye emiyaaya! Aye hatyane bahibahwehire.
42019043	Ehiseera hinahoole abasigu benywe babeswanigirisa.
42019044	Baabasihiirisa enywe ababalyagaana mu hibuga omwo era sibalireha ebaale eribatongolera ehibuga hyenywe ni liri hu lyahye, olwohuba simwamanya hiseera ehi Hatonda gaali ni gaajire ohubanoŋola.”
42019045	Nga Yesu goola e Yerusaalemu gengira mu lunya lwa Yekaalu atandiha ohubbingamo abaali ni basuubuliramo.
42019046	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, ‘Enyumba yange yinaabenga nyumba omu baatu bananjumirihisyenga.’ Ne enywe muyifuuhisye pungulu eyi bakondo behwehamo.”
42019047	Nga hiisi ludaalo Yesu asomesanga mu Yekaalu. Aye abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi nʼabaatu abahulu mu gwanga batandiha ohugesyaho ohumusihiirisa.
42019048	Aye gabahayisa olwʼabaatu abaŋwerehererangamo ni bahumbaana aŋa gaali ohumuŋuliirisa.
42020001	Lulala, Yesu ni gaali mu lunya lwa Yekaalu nʼasomesa era nʼabuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi, abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi ko nʼabaatu abahulu mu gwanga, batiina aŋa gaali,
42020002	nga bamuloma baati, “Tulomere, otusa ŋeena obuŋangi obuhuginiha ohuhola ebiitu ebyo ebi ohola? Era njʼani owahuŋa obuŋangi obwo?”
42020003	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Keesi leha mbabuuseho. Mundomere,
42020004	Yowaane gatusa ŋeena obuŋangi owʼohubatiza; gabutusa yiri Hatonda oba yiri baatu?”
42020005	Ngʼaŋo bahubbagania ebiŋeego ni baloma baati, “Humugobolemo huutye? Singa huloma huuti ‘Hatonda njʼowamutuma’ anatubuuse ati, ‘Lwahiina simwafugiirira bya Yowaane oyo?’
42020006	Nindi ni baŋeega ohumugobolamo baati, ‘Abaatu njʼabamutuma,’ nga hino hibatiisa baloma baati, ‘Abaatu banatuhubbe amabaale.’ Olwohuba bosibosi baali bafugiirira baati Yowaane gaali naabbi dala.”
42020007	Ehyaŋwamo nga bamugobolamo baati, “Sihumanyire.”
42020008	Ngʼaŋo Yesu yeesi abaloma ati, “Kale keesi sinabalomere eyi tusa obuŋangi obuukosa ebi kola.”
42020009	Ngʼaŋo Yesu agerera abaatu abaliŋo olugero ati, “Ŋaaliŋo omuutu owahoma endimiro eyʼemizabbibbu, ngʼahena ayipangisa abaatu, niye ngʼatiina mu lugendo ngʼalwayo.
42020010	Ehiseera ehyʼegesa ni hyola, gatuma mulala hu baŋeeresa babe eyiri abapangisa, bamuŋe owiisa wuwe. Cooka abapangisa abo baamuhubba nga bahena bamubbinga gaagama ni ŋabula ehi bamuŋaaye.
42020011	Nga nindi omwene ndimiro abatumira omuŋeeresa owundi. Ngʼoyo bamuhubba bahena bamuhola nʼebyobuŋemu nga gagama nʼengalo enjerere.
42020012	Ngʼatuma omuŋeeresa owohudatu era yeesi bamubisya bubi, bamuhubba oluguma gaagama ni ŋaŋuma ehi bamuŋaaye.
42020013	“Ngʼaŋo omwene ndimiro gebuusa ati, ‘Kole hi? Hatume omwana wange omuhoda, hamunga banaamuŋe eŋono bamupeera owiisa wange.’
42020014	“Cooka abapangisa ni bamubona nga behobaana baati, ‘Ono njʼomusika. Muhole hu mwite hwegoboseho obusika.’
42020015	Ngʼaŋo bamusindigirisa bamutusa ebulafu wʼendimiro yʼemizabbibbu, nga bamwitira eyo. “Ŋaahani omwene ndimiro alihola hi abapangisa abo?
42020016	Alitiina gabasihiirisa nʼendimiro gayipangisa abaatu abandi.” Abaatu ni baŋulira ebibono ebyo nga baloma baati, “O! Hatonda atuyeede ehyo hitabaŋo!”
42020017	Nga Yesu abahaŋaasa emoni ahena abaloma ati, “Ŋaahani ehyaŋandiihiwa hino hitegeesa hi, “ ‘Ebaale eri abatongoli batala baati siraŋi, njʼeryafuuha ehulu eryʼomugaso mu gosigosi?’
42020018	“Era hiisi agwa hu ebaale eryo, alibbwagijihamo aye oyo oyu lirigwaho, aliminianguha.”
42020019	Ngʼaŋo abasomesa bʼamagambi nʼabatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda bagesyaho ohwenda ohuŋamba Yesu mu haseera aho, olwohuba bategeera baati olugero olwo alugerire ni luŋamba hu nibo, aye nga batya abaatu.
42020020	Abasomesa bʼamagambi nʼabatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda ni bendulirisa ehi baneŋambye hu Yesu, batuma abaatu batiina beefuula oti haani basiima ebi ahola bamuŋambihisye mu malomere gage ameene, bamuŋeyo mu buŋugi wa Barooma.
42020021	Ngʼaŋo batiina bamuhema baati, “Musomesa, humanyire huuti ewe ofiira hu mazima era obula hu byʼabaatu huhusiima ebinambulamo wabula abaatu bosibosi obabisya mu ngeri njʼenyene nʼobasomesa ebi Hatonda genda bahole.
42020022	Ŋaahani muhulu tulomere, hiraŋi ohuŋa Kayisaali omusolo oba bbe?”
42020023	Aye Yesu ngʼategeera ehi baaliho, ngʼabaloma ati,
42020024	“Mundage edinaari. Ehifaananyi nʼamasiina ebiyiriho byʼani?”
42020025	Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Bya Kayisaali.” Ngʼaŋo Yesu abaloma ati, “Kale ebya Kayisaali mubiŋe Kayisaali, nʼebya Hatonda mubiŋe Hatonda.”
42020026	Abo aba batuma ohumuhema ndibaŋange humuŋambya mu ebi gaaloma mu lwijuuye, beŋunja engeri eyi gabagobolamo era baŋuma hyahuloma.
42020027	Ngʼaŋo Abasadukaayo, bano njʼabaali ni batafugiirira baati eriyo ohulamuha, batuma balala hu bahyawe eyiri Yesu bamubuusa baati,
42020028	“Musomesa, Musa omuŋeeresa wa Hatonda gatuŋandiihira egambi ati singa omuutu afa galeha namwandu nʼatamusaayemo mwana, mugandaawe ateehwa ohumusika amusaalire abaana.
42020029	Ŋaahani ŋaaliŋo aboluganda musanvu. Omudaayi ngʼahwa omuhasi, cooka ngʼafa nʼatamusaayemo mwana.
42020030	Owohubiri ngʼasika namwandu oyo era yeesi ngʼafa nʼatamusaayemo mwana.
42020031	Nʼowohudatu yeesi atyo. Bosibosi omusanvu nga bambalaho omuhasi oyo. Cooka ndibamusaalamo mwana.
42020032	Ŋaahani bosibosi ni baali ni baŋooye ohufa ngʼomuhasi oyo yeesi afa.
42020033	Olwo ŋaahani hu ludaalo olu baatu bosibosi baliramuhiraho, omuhasi oyo aliba muha ani, olwohuba gaaliho muhasi wʼabaatu abo bosibosi omusanvu?”
42020034	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Obufumbo, wʼabaatu hu hyalo huno.
42020035	Aye sipohija huba eyiri abaatu aba Hatonda abona ati basaanira ohulamuha babe balamu mwigulu ni batahwa era ni batafumbirwa.
42020036	Baliba hyʼabamalayika, ni batafa era baliberera balamu olwohuba baliba baana ba Hatonda.
42020037	Mu hitundu ehiroma hu hadeŋo ahaali ni hanya aye ni hataguhuliha, Musa omuŋeeresa wa Hatonda nʼaloma hu hulamuha, yeesi ahihahasa ati abafu balamuha ni gaali nʼaloma ati Musengwa, ‘nje Hatonda wa Yibbulayimu ni Yisaka ni Yakobbo.’
42020038	Hatonda wʼabalamu sosi wʼabafu olwohuba abaatu bosibosi eyiri Hatonda, balamu.”
42020039	Nga balala hu basomesa bʼamagambi baloma baati, “Musomesa, olomire bulaŋi.”
42020040	Ohuŋwa hulwo, ŋaŋuma owesinga ohumubuusa ebibuuso nindi.
42020041	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abaloma ati, “Lwahiina abaatu baloma baati Kurisito oyu Hatonda gafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu Mwijuhulu wa Dawudi?
42020042	“Dawudi omwene mu Zabbuli aloma ati, “ ‘Hatonda gaaloma Musengwa yange ati, Yiihala ni wundireene, hu lubega olwʼomuhono gwange omulungi,
42020043	ohwola olu ndifuula abasigu babo ekookolo eyʼohutaho amagulu gago.’
42020044	“Obanga Dawudi amulanga ‘Musengwawe,’ nindi olwo aŋanga atye ohuba mwijuhulu wuwe?”
42020045	Abaatu bosibosi ni baali ni bahiŋulirisa, nga Yesu aloma abeegi babe ati,
42020046	“Mwehuume mubone ti simuŋamba sambo yʼabasomesa bʼamagambi abagenda ni bambaaye amaganduula amaleeŋi agehwesa hwiroba ohulaga ngʼolu bahihenaho era abenda babaheese mu ngeri eyʼohubaŋa eŋono ni bali mu akisoni nʼohwihala mu bifo ebyʼeŋono mu mahumbaaniro nʼohu mbaga.
42020047	Abanyagulula ebiitu baahena mu mayumba ga banamwandu era abajumirya Hatonda nʼebibono ebyene ebingi olwʼohweraga. Balibaŋa ehiguudyo ehihiraho obubbala.”
42021001	Yesu ni gaali nʼahiiri mu Yekaalu, ngʼabona abaŋinda bangi ni baŋayo ebirabo.
42021002	Ngʼaŋo abona ni namwandu omugadi yeesi owaaja gaatamo obubbeesa bubiri obusembayo ohuba owʼomuŋendo omutono obugali.
42021003	Nga Yesu aloma abeegi babe ati, “Mbalomera ehituufu, namwandu ono aŋaayeyo hibbala bugali ohuhira abandi bosibosi.
42021004	Bala bataayemo ni batusa hu bingi ebi bali ni nabyo. Aye namwandu ono, mu bugadi buwe aŋaayeyo hyosihyosi ehi abaaye ni nahyo mu bulamu buwe.”
42021005	Ngʼaŋo balala hu beegi ba Yesu baloma ngʼolu Yekaalu bayitongola nʼamabaale ameene amaŋoono nʼebiitu ebi baŋonga eyiri Hatonda. Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati,
42021006	“Ehiseera hinahoole bino byosibyosi ebi mubona, byabulunguha era nasiŋabaŋo ebaale wayire erala eririsigala ni liri hu lyahye. Gosigosi baligatepulula gaagwa ŋaasi.”
42021007	Ngʼabeegi babe bamubuusa baati, “Musomesa tulomereho. Ebyo biribaaŋo ŋaali? Era habonero hi ahabalimanyiraho?”
42021008	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abaloma ati, “Mwehuume ŋatabaŋo abadulingadulinga. Hino kiroma olwohuba bangi baliija ni beranga ohutambisa obuŋangi bwange era ni baloma baati, ‘Ndiise Kurisito’ era baati, ‘Ekomerero yoolire.’ Aye simufugiiriranga ebi baloma.
42021009	Era ni muŋuliranga etalo nʼohutawuha ŋano ni naŋala, simutyanga. Ebyo biri nʼohubaŋo aye ekomerero yiriba yihiiri hwola.”
42021010	Ngʼaŋo geeyongera aloma ati, “Amawanga galihubbana nʼowahabaha buliwaagala obwahabaha obundi.
42021011	Ŋalibaŋo musisi mu bitundu bingi era enjala erigwa ni haŋupuli alibaŋo mu hyalo. Era ŋalibaŋo ebiitu ebitiisa nʼebyamaliholiho ebiriŋwa mwigulu.
42021012	“Aye ebyo byosibyosi ko bibeŋo, balibahiyaania era balibaŋamba babeemeha ohuŋosya mu mbuga jʼamahumbaaniro gʼAbayudaaya nʼeja bahabaha nga bahena babadaanya mu komera olwohuba muli baloobera bange.
42021013	Hino hiribaleetera mubooseho Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agapambaho.
42021014	Aye simweŋendehereranga ehi munaahalome oba ngʼolu muneŋosyeho,
42021015	olwohuba ndibaŋa ebibono nʼamagesi agohubagobolamo era abasigu benywe sibaliŋanga hubaŋahania wayire ohugaana ebi muliroma.
42021016	Abasaaye, nʼabalebe benywe nʼabemihago balibalyamo oluhwe era abandi hu nywe abasigu balibeeta.
42021017	Era abaatu bosibosi balibacaawa olwohuba abaloobera bange.
42021018	Aye ŋabula hu nywe oyu balisihiirisa obulamu buwe owʼomwoyo.
42021019	Oyo alyehaliriha ebigosi ohwola hu komerero alinoŋoha.”
42021020	Nga Yesu geyongera aloma ati, “Ni mulibona abasooli ni beswanigirihise Yerusaalemu, olwo nga mumanya muuti ohusihiiriha hwʼehibuga ehyo huli huupi.
42021021	Abo abaliba mu Buyudaaya, badulumiranga mu bitundu ebyʼesozi, abo abaliba mu hibuga bahiŋwangamo era ni nabo abaliba mu byalo sibadulumanga huja mu hibuga.
42021022	Mu ndaalo ejo Hatonda aliba gesasusa era ehyo hiriba hyoheeresa byosibyosi ebyaŋandiihiwa.
42021023	Mu ndaalo ejo abahasi abaliba ebida nʼabookesa njʼabalisinga ohubonaabona. Ŋalibaŋo ohubonaabona ohwʼamaani hu baatu olwʼehiruŋi hya Hatonda eyi bali.
42021024	Balibeeta nʼepiima era baŋira abandi eyo mu busibe mu mawanga agandi. Abatali Bayudaaya baliihala hu baatu bomu Yerusaalemu era baabaŋuga ohwola ebiseera byʼobuŋugi bwawe olu biriŋwaho.”
42021025	Nga Yesu geyongera aloma ati, “Ŋalibaŋo ehyamaliholiho hu lyuba nʼohu mwesi ko nʼohu munyeenye. Hu hyalo amawanga galyeŋendeherera olwʼohwoluuma hwʼenyanja nʼebimoto byʼamaaji.
42021026	Ebyo ebiri mu bbanga balibitengesya. Ehyo hirireetera abaatu ohufaho olweso olwʼemama ko nʼohweŋendeherera olwʼebyo ebiriba ni biboolireho era nʼebiri ŋamugulu mu bbanga biriteetema.
42021027	Mu hiseera ehyo balibona Omwana wʼOmuutu ni gaajira mu hireri nʼobuŋangi nʼeŋono eryʼamaani.
42021028	Aye ebiitu ebyo byosibyosi ni biritandiha ohubaŋo, mugobolangamo amaani olwohuba ohununuliwa hwenywe huliba huli huupi.”
42021029	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abagerera olugero ati, “Mubonere hu musaala omutiini oba ogundi gwosigwosi muhene mwege.
42021030	Omusaala ogwo ni gusebuhaho amahoose amanyenyeeri, nga mumanya muuti ebiro ebyʼendobooli binaatere ohwola.
42021031	Mu ngeri njʼenyene ni mubonanga ebindomireho ni biriŋo, mumanyanga muuti Obuŋugi bwa Hatonda bunaatere ohwola.
42021032	Mbalomera ehituufu ti ebiitu bino byosibyosi binahabeeŋo abaatu abʼomulembe guno ni bataŋwaŋo hufa.
42021033	Ehyalo hino nʼebiri ŋamugulu mu bbanga biriŋwaŋo aye ebibono byange sibirigwa ŋaasi.
42021034	“Mwehuume, mutahenera biseera byenywe mu hwejalabya nʼohumeera, oludaalo olwʼekomerero lutaboolaho ni mutamanyire.
42021035	Olwohuba oludaalo olwo lulyola hu baatu bosibosi hu hyalo.
42021036	Mube butebute hiisi hiseera ni musaba ko muŋange ohubita mu ebyo byosibyosi ebija hubaŋo era muŋange nʼohwemeerera nʼesangaalo mu moni jʼOmwana wʼOmuutu hu ludaalo olu aligobola.”
42021037	Hiisi ludaalo, Yesu gatiinanga hu Yekaalu ngʼasomesa, ne ni weeranga ngʼatiina hu lusozi olwʼemisaala emizayiti eyi gaŋenyuhanga.
42021038	Era hiisi mugamba abaatu bangi baaŋunanga hu Yekaalu ohumuŋuliirisa nʼasomesa.
42022001	Embaga yʼAbayudaaya eyi baliirangaho Emigaati Eji batataayemo Ehisimbulusa eyi balanga baati Embaga eyʼOhubihisya yaali yiri huupi hwola,
42022002	abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi baali mu husala amagesi ogʼohwita Yesu mu ngiso olwohuba baali batya abaatu.
42022003	Nga Sitaani amaamira mulala hu beegi ba Yesu ehumi nʼababiri oyu balanganga baati Yuda nʼerindi baati Yisikaryoti.
42022004	Ngʼaŋo Yuda atiina ateesa nʼabatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼabahulu bʼabahuumi ba Yekaalu, ngʼolu anaŋeyo Yesu eyi bali.
42022005	Hino hyasangaasa abatangirisi abo era nga balagaana ohumuŋa ebbeesa.
42022006	Nga Yuda afugiirira atandiha ohwendula ahamanga ahohuŋayo Yesu eyi bali, ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ni hiŋumaŋo.
42022007	Ngʼaŋo oludaalo olwʼEmbaga Eyibaliiraho Emigaati Ejibatataayemo Ehisimbulusa era olu beetiraho etaama eperepere ngʼeŋongo ni bahebulira Ohubihisya, lwola.
42022008	Nga Yesu atuma Peetero ni Yowaane abaloma ati, “Mutiine mututegehere Embaga eyʼOhubihisya.”
42022009	Nibo nga bamubuusa baati, “Wenda huje hutegehere ŋeena?”
42022010	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Ni munaabe ni mwingira mu hibuga, munagaane omusinde ni getwihire esongo yʼamaaji, mumulonde ohwola mu nyumba omu anengire.
42022011	Mulome omwene nyumba muuti, ‘Omusomesa abuusa ati mbo ehisenge hiiri ŋeena omu niye nʼabeegi babe banaliire Embaga eyʼOhuhebuliriraho Ohubihisya?’
42022012	Anabalage ehisenge ehibbala ehyaŋamugulu mu kalina ehi bahenire ohulongoosa nʼohutegeha, mutegehere omwo.”
42022013	Ngʼaŋo abeegi basimbuha batiina, baagaana byosibyosi ni biri ngʼolu Yesu gaali nʼabalomire. Ngʼaŋo bategeha Embaga eyʼOhuhebuliriraho Ohubihisya.
42022014	Esaawa eyʼohulya ni yoola, nga Yesu nʼabahwenda babe beehala ohulya.
42022015	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Nendire bugali weene ohulya ni nenywe embaga yino ni kiiri hubonaabona.
42022016	Mbalomera ti sinja hulyaho mbaga yino nindi ohwola olu hiribaŋo mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda.”
42022017	Ngʼaŋo abugula ehihopo hyʼenvinyo geyaasa Hatonda, ngʼaloma ati, “Munaaŋe munyweho mwesimwesi,
42022018	olwohuba mbalomera ti sinja hunywa hu nvinyo yʼemizabbibbu nindi ohwola olu ndinywa epyaha mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda.”
42022019	Ngʼaŋo abugula omugaati geyaasa Hatonda, ni gahena ngʼagubbongolamo, ngʼabaŋa aloma ati, “Guno njʼomubiri gwange oguupayo hu lwenywe. Hino muhiholenga olwʼohukebulira.”
42022020	Mu ngeri njʼenyene ni baahena ohulya ehyʼegulo, nga Yesu aŋamba ehihopo hyʼenvinyo aloma ati, “Envinyo yino njʼamafugi gange aganooŋohe ohuba ahabonero ahahahasa endagaano epyaha eyi Hatonda aholire nʼabaatu.
42022021	Aye oyo aja hundyamo oluhwe ali ni neese hu hiiŋulo hino.
42022022	Omwana wʼOmuutu aja hufa ngʼolu hyaŋandiihiwa aye jimwageene oyo amulyamo oluhwe!”
42022023	Ngʼabeegi babe bebuusa abeene nʼabeene baati njʼani hu bo owaali nʼaja hu mulyamo oluhwe.
42022024	Ngʼaŋo ŋabaluhaŋo embaha mu beegi ba Yesu ni bebuusa baati mbo njʼani hu bo ahira ohuba owʼeŋono.
42022025	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Abahabaha bʼAbatali Bayudaaya baŋuga nʼobuhambwe era abatangirisi baawe benda abaatu aba baŋuga bamanye baati babaliho obuŋangi era nga bahena beeranga mbo bayeedi baawe.
42022026	Aye mu enywe sipohiri hiityo, wabula ahira ohuba owʼeŋono mu nywe, gebisye hyʼomuŋere era omutangirisi abe muŋeeresa wabahye.
42022027	Ŋaahani ahira ohuba owʼeŋono njʼani? Oyo owihaaye ohulya oba oyo owiŋula? Njʼoyo owihaaye ohulya. Aye ese mu enywe ndi hyʼomuŋeeresa.
42022028	Ndinywe abagumiiye ebigosi byange.
42022029	Keesi mbateehateehera obuŋugi ngʼolu Bbaabba gaategehera,
42022030	konyo mulye era munywere hu meeza yange mu buŋugi bwange. Era mwesi mulihaala hu tebe ehumi nʼebiri ejʼobuŋugi mwasalira ebiha bya Yisirayiri ehumi nabibiri emisango.”
42022031	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma ati, “Simooni, Simooni, Sitaani asungire Hatonda amufugiirire abasenyete hyʼengaano.
42022032	Aye kusabiiye ti otaŋwamo maani mu hufugiirira huhwo. Era nʼolihena ohwebbwaga, ogumyanga abahyo.”
42022033	Aye gamuloma ati, “Musengwa, ese netegehire ohwingira ekomera ni neewe. Era netegehire ohufiira ŋalala ni neewe.”
42022034	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Mu butuufu oweene kuloma ti mu hiire ehyene hino, engoho yinaabe yihiiri huholyoha ni wahanegaanira emirundi edatu.”
42022035	Ngʼaŋo Yesu ababuusa ati, “Ni nʼabatuma ohubuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi, ndimugega bbeesa wayire engayito, ŋaaliŋo ehimwahaya?” Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Ŋaŋuma.”
42022036	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Ale oyo ali nʼebbeesa nʼehihapu abugule, ni nooyo aŋuma piima atunde ehyambalo hihye ayigule.
42022037	Ehyaŋandiihiwa ehiroma hiiti, ‘Bamubalira ŋalala nʼababbwagi bʼamagambi,’ hiri nʼohwolerera. Cʼehyo ehyene, ebyo ebipambaho biri nʼohwolerera.”
42022038	Nga abeegi babe bamuloma baati, “Musengwa, huliŋo nʼepiima ebiri ŋano.” Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Ehyo hihena!”
42022039	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aŋwa mu Yerusaalemu atiina hu lusozi olwʼemisaala Emizayiti ngʼolu gaholanga era abeegi babe nga batiina ni naye.
42022040	Ni goola eyo, ngʼabaloma ati, “Musabe Hatonda ko mutahemewa.”
42022041	Ngʼaŋo niye aŋwaŋo gesambaho ahanaŋiro, ahena ahubba amafuha gegalihira Hatonda,
42022042	nʼaloma ati, “Bbaabba, hanye njʼohusiima huhwo, esaawa yino eyʼohubonaabona yitanjolaho, aye ewe ehi wenda hibe njʼehiholebwa sosi ehi ese nenda.”
42022043	Ngʼaŋo malayika aŋwa mwigulu amugobosamo amaani.
42022044	Mu bulumi obubitiirifu geyongera ohwegalihira Hatonda bugali weene era oluuya lulwe nga lutagiha ohutonya ŋaasi hyʼamatondo gʼamafugi.
42022045	Yesu ni gahena ohusaba, nga genyoha gaagamayo aŋa beegi babe baali, aye gabagaana ni baŋenyuha olwʼomudembo nʼohweŋendeherera ebi baali ni nabyo.
42022046	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Lwahiina muli huŋenyuha? Mwinyohe, musabe ko mutahemewa.”
42022047	Yesu ni gaali nʼahiroma, ngʼehiŋindi hyʼabaatu hyola aŋa baali, Yuda mulala hu beegi babe ehumi nʼababiri nʼahitangiriye. Nga geegerera huupi ni Yesu amuheesa nʼamugwa mu hifuba.
42022048	Aye Yesu ngʼamuloma ati, “Yuda, ewe Omwana wʼOmuutu omulyamo oluhwe nʼomugwa mu hifuba?”
42022049	Abeegi ba Yesu ni babona ehyali ni hija hubaŋo, nga bamubuusa baati, “Musengwa, hubasoose nʼepiima?”
42022050	Nga mulala hu beegi babe atema hu mwidu wʼomuhulu wʼabasengi ba Hatonda ohutwi ohulungi.
42022051	Aye Yesu ngʼabaloma ati, “Mulehe!” Ngʼaŋamba aŋa batemire ohutwi hwʼomwidu oyo, amuŋonia.
42022052	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼabahulu bʼabahuumi ba Yekaalu ko nʼabaatu abahulu mu gwanga abaaja ohumuŋamba ati, “Muujire ohupamba ni muli nʼepiima nʼebibbiro hyʼabajiriiye omuyekera?
42022053	Mbaayenga mba ni nenywe mu Yekaalu, ni mutapamba. Aye hino njʼehiseera hyenywe amaani gʼehiirema ohuhola.”
42022054	Ngʼaŋo baŋamba Yesu, bamuŋira ewomuhulu wʼabasengi ba Hatonda. Peetero galondaho ni gesambireho ahanaaŋiro.
42022055	Ne ni bahena ohuŋambya ehihoso mu lunya ŋagati nga beehala ohwota omuliro. Nga Peetero yeesi geehala ni nabo ohwota omuliro.
42022056	Mulala hu bahaana abaŋeeresanga owʼomusengi oyo, gabona Peetero ni gehaaye mu njase yʼomuliro, ngʼamuhaŋaasa emoni, ahena aloma abo abaaliŋo ati, “Omusinde ono yeesi agendanga ni Yesu.”
42022057	Aye Peetero nga gegaana ati, “Muhasi ewe, omuutu oyo ese simumanyire.”
42022058	Era ni ŋabitireŋo ahaseera, omuutu owundi ngʼamubona, ngʼaloma ati, “Weesi oli mulala hu abo.” Cooka Peetero ngʼamuloma ati, “Musinde ewe, ese kwegaana!”
42022059	Ni ŋabitireŋo esaawa nga ndala, omuutu owundi ngʼamuhamiirisa ati, “Hituufu, ni noono abaaye agendanga ni Yesu olwohuba yeesi Mugalilaaya hya niye.”
42022060	Aye Peetero galoma ati, “Wange, ehi oli huloma sikimanyire.” Aŋo ni naaŋo, ni gaali nʼahiroma ngʼengoho yiholyoha.
42022061	Nga Musengwa yeefe acuuha aheja hu Peetero. Ngʼahebulira ebi Musengwa gaali nʼamulomire ati, “Olwa leero engoho yinaabe yitaholyoha, ni wuneganiiye emirundi edatu.”
42022062	Ngʼaŋo Peetero atula ebulafu, atemuha alira bugali weene.
42022063	Mu hiseera ehyo, abasinde abaali ni bahuuma Yesu batandiha ohumujeeja nʼohumuhubba.
42022064	Nga bamuwiiha mu moni bahena bamuloma baati, “Teeba, njʼani ahuhubbire.”
42022065	Nga bamuloma ebibono ebyene ebingi ni bamufodogola.
42022066	Ni wanuuha, ngʼAhahiiho hʼabatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi bahumbaana nga baŋira Yesu mu Luhiiho lwawe.
42022067	Nga bamubuusa baati, “Tulomere, ndiiwe Kurisito oyu Hatonda gafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu?” Ngʼabagobolamo ati, “Nʼolu nʼabalomere, simunafugiirire,
42022068	era singa mbabuusa, simunangobolemo.
42022069	Aye ohuŋwa ŋaahani, Omwana wʼOmuutu aja hwihala hu lubega olwʼomuhono omulungi ogwa Hatonda omwene buŋangi.”
42022070	Nga bosibosi bamubuusa baati, “Ewe, oli Mwana wa Hatonda?” Nga niye abagobolamo ati, “Ngʼolu muloma olwo.”
42022071	Ngʼaŋo baloma baati, “Hwendera hi obujulizi obundi olwohuba efe hwabeene hweŋuliriyeho nʼamatwi geefe ebiŋwa mu munwa gugwe.”
42023001	Ngʼaŋo abohu Luhiiho Olubbala mu diini lyʼEhiyudaaya bosibosi benyoha batangirisa Yesu bamuŋira ewa Pilaato.
42023002	Nga batandiha ohumuŋaŋabira ni baloma baati, “Hwavumbula huuti omusinde ono asasamasa abaatu bʼegwanga lyʼefe, nʼabagaana ohuŋa Kayisaali omusolo, era ni geeranga Kurisito oyu Hatonda gafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu era mbo nje habaha.”
42023003	Ngʼaŋo Pilaato amubuusa ati, “Ndiiwe habaha wʼAbayudaaya?” Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Ngʼolu oloma olwo.”
42023004	Nga Pilaato aloma abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼehibbubbu hyʼabaatu ati, “Simbona musango ogu muutu ono asaaye.”
42023005	Aye nibo nga beyongera huhayaana baati, “Ebi omuutu oyo asomesa bisasamahise abaatu mu Buyudaaya mwosimwosi. Gatandihira mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya era goolire ni naŋano mu Yerusaalemu.”
42023006	Pilaato ni gaŋulira ebyo, ngʼabuusa hanye Yesu gaali Mugalilaaya.
42023007	Ni bamulomera baati Mugalilaaya, ngʼamuŋindiha ewa Herode owaali omuŋugi wʼetwale eryo, yeesi owaali nʼali mu Yerusaalemu mu hiseera ehyo.
42023008	Herode gasangaala bugali ni gabona hu Yesu, olwohuba gaali aŋuliiye ebimuŋambaho era nʼahenire ehimanga ni gesunga ohumubona nʼahola ebyamaliholiho.
42023009	Nga Herode abuusa Yesu ebibuuso ebyene ebingi, aye Yesu sigagobolamo wayire hirala.
42023010	Abatangirisi bʼabasengi nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi baali bemereeye aŋo, nga bahaalama ni bamuŋaŋabira emisango.
42023011	Ngʼaŋo Herode nʼabasirikale babe bamujeeja era bamuhiina ni bamwambasa olugoye olumeregenya. Ni bahena ngʼamuŋambya abahahiiho bamwagamyeyo ewa Pilaato.
42023012	Herode ni Pilaato baali sibendana aye esonga ya Yesu yabagaata bafuuha ba muhago hu ludaalo olwo.
42023013	Ngʼaŋo Pilaato alanga abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda ko nʼabaatu abandi abohu hahiiho hʼAbayudaaya ko nʼehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ehyali aŋo,
42023014	ngʼabaloma ati, “Mundeteeye omusinde ono ni muloma muuti asasamasa abaatu. Aye ngʼolu muweene ni kejire mu songa jije, simbona musango ogu mumuŋaŋabira.
42023015	Era ni Herode yeesi ahayire esonga yosiyosi njʼohumugobosa eno. Ngʼolu mwesi mubona, omuutu ono aŋuma ehi aholire ohumusalira ogwʼohufa.
42023016	Olwʼehyo, oluvanyuma lwʼohumuswaja, namulehule.”
42023017	Hu hiisi ludaalo lwʼembaga eyʼOhubihisya, Pilaato galehulanga omusibe oyu bamusunganga.
42023018	Ngʼehiŋindi hyʼabaatu hyosihyosi hihayaana hiiti, “Oyo mumusimye humusimya aye lehula Bbarabba!”
42023019	Bbarabba oyo baali bamusidihire mu komera olwʼahegugungo ahaliiŋo mu hibuga nʼolwobutemu.
42023020	Nga nindi Pilaato aloma nʼabaatu nabaŋooyaŋooya olwʼohwenda ohulehula Yesu.
42023021	Aye nibo beyongera huhayaana baati, “Muhomerere hu musalabba, muhomerere hu musalabba!”
42023022	Nga nindi Pilaato ababuusa omulundi ogwohudatu ati, “Lwahiina mwenda bamuhomerere? Hibi hi ehi aholire? Simbona songa hu muutu ono eyigera ni mwenda musalire ogwʼohufa. Olwʼehyo, ni banahene ohumuswaja, namulehule.”
42023023	Cooka nibo nga beyongera huhayaana ni bahahasa baati bahomerere Yesu hu musalabba. Era nga bamuŋinga amaani.
42023024	Nga Pilaato asalaŋo abaholera ehi bendire.
42023025	Ngʼabalehulira Bbarabba oyu beegalira mu komera olwʼohwegugunga nʼobutemu, aŋaayo Yesu bamuhomerere ngʼolu bendire.
42023026	Abasirikale ni baali ni batangirihise Yesu ni bamuŋira ohumuhomerera, nga bagaana omusinde omusaale wʼe Kireene oyu balanganga baati Simooni nʼaŋwa mu hyalo ni gaagamayo mu hibuga. Nga bamugegesa omusalabba gwa Yesu agubbeeda nʼamulondaho.
42023027	Ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu hyalonda hu Yesu ni mulimo nʼabahasi abaali ni bahubba enduulu era ni balira olwa Yesu.
42023028	Cooka Yesu ngʼabacuuhira abaloma ati, “Abahaana bʼe Yerusaalemu, mulehe ohundira ese aye mwerire mwabeene nʼabaana benywe.
42023029	Olwohuba ehiseera hiryola olu baatu baliroma baati ‘abahasi abagumba bali bulaŋi.’
42023030	Era “baaloma esozi baati, ‘Mutugweho’ nʼobusozi baati, ‘Mutusiihe.’
42023031	“Aŋabaholera bino hu musaala omubisi, ne hu mwomu hiriba hiitye?”
42023032	Era ŋaaliŋo abasinde babiri ababbwagi bʼamagambi boosi ababatangirisa ni Yesu ohuja ohubahomerera.
42023033	Ni boola aŋa balanga baati, “Ehifo Ehyahaŋanga” nga bahomerera Yesu ko nʼababbwagi bʼamagambi bala hu musalabba, mulala hu lubega lwʼomuhono gwa Yesu omulungi, owundi hu mugooda.
42023034	Ebyo ni byaŋwa nga Yesu aloma ati, “Bbaabba, basoniŋe olwohuba sibamanyire ehi bahola.” Abasirikale baahubba ahalulu bagabana ebyambalo bya Yesu.
42023035	Abaatu nga bemeerera aŋo ni bamulengereeye, nʼabatangirisi babwe boosi ni bamujeherera baati, “Ganoŋolanga bandi aye saaŋanga hwenoŋola niye omwene. Hanye hituufu ehyene nje Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu era oyu Hatonda gatobola, genoŋole!”
42023036	Abasirikale boosi nga bamujeeja nga bahena bamuŋa envinyo eyisalire,
42023037	ni baloma baati, “Wenoŋole hanye oli habaha wʼAbayudaaya!”
42023038	Nga bata ŋamugulu wuwe ehipande ehisoma hiiti, “ONO NJE HABAHA WʼABAYUDAAYA.”
42023039	Mulala hu babbwagi bʼamagambi yeesi oyu baahomerera hu musalabba ngʼaduha Yesu ati, “Weranga Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu. Ale wenoŋole oŋwe hu musalabba, hwesi otunoŋole.”
42023040	Aye owahye ngʼamuhayula ati, “Ewe nʼohutya sootyaho Hatonda olwohuba mbo oli hu hibonerezo cʼehyene ni naye?
42023041	Ese ni neewe, ehibonerezo hino hitwola olwohuba huli husasula ebyo ebi hwahola. Aye ono abula ehibi ehigahola.”
42023042	Ngʼaŋo aloma Yesu ati, “Bukebuliranga olu onahajire mwiŋono lyʼobuŋugi buwo.”
42023043	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Mazima kuloma ti olwa leero, onaabe ni neese mu hifo ehyʼohwesiima.”
42023044	Ŋaahani ebyo byaliŋo esaawa nga mukaaga ejomu muusi. Ohuŋwa hu saawa ejo ohwola esaawa mwenda ejʼegulo, ngʼehiirema hiŋamba ehyalo hyosihyosi,
42023045	olwohuba eryuba lyasima. Olutimbe olwomu Yekaalu nga ludweduhamo ŋabiri, ohuŋwa ŋamugulu ohwola ŋaasi.
42023046	Nga Yesu alanga nʼejanjaasi eryʼamaani ati, “Bbaabba, kuŋambya obulamu bwange!” Ni gahena ohuloma atyo, ngʼafa.
42023047	Omuhulu wʼehibbubbu hyʼabasirikale ecikumi ni gabona ebyaliŋo, ngʼajumirya Hatonda nʼaloma ati, “Mu butuufu omuutu ono aŋumaho musango!”
42023048	Abaatu bosibosi abaali ni bahumbeene ohwebonera, ni babona ebyaliŋo, nga baagamayo ewaawe ni bawomboŋaaye.
42023049	Aye abo bosibosi abaali ni bamumanyire, omwo ni mulimo nʼabahasi abaamulondaho ohuŋwa e Galilaaya, nga bemeerera ni besambireho ahamanga ni bebonera.
42023050	Ŋaaliŋo omusinde owʼesambo endaŋi era omugwalaafu owʼahiihanga hu Luhiiho lwʼAbayudaaya ni bamulanga baati Yosefu.
42023051	Omusinde oyo gaali musaale womu habuga ahabalanga baati Alimataaya mu twale lyʼe Buyudaaya era gaali ahuumirira ohuuja hwʼobuŋugi bwa Hatonda. Yosefu gaali saafugiirisanie nʼeteesa ko nʼebikolwa byʼabahye.
42023052	Kale ngʼatiina eyiri Pilaato amusunga omulambo gwa Yesu aje agusiihe.
42023053	Ni gagutusa hu musalabba, gagwambiha mu lugoye olulaŋi olwa laasi. Ngʼaguŋira aguta mu higombe ehibabaaja mwibaale mu ngeri yʼepungulu era ni batasiihangahomo muutu yesiyesi.
42023054	Bino byosibyosi byaliŋo hu ludaalo lwʼohwetegehera obunahye ni yinaahabe Sabbaato.
42023055	Abahasi abaali ni baŋooye e Galilaaya ni batiinire ni Yesu e Yerusaalemu, balonda hu Yosefu baabona ehigombe omu gaata omulambo.
42023056	Ngʼaŋo abahasi abo bagamayo engo bategeha abyʼahaloosa ohuŋaha omulambo. Aye hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato baaŋuumula ngʼolu egambi liroma.
42024001	Ngʼaŋo mu mugamba hu ludaalo oludaayi mu wiiki, abahasi abo baŋamba ebyʼahaloosa ebi baali ni bategehire batiina hu higombe hya Yesu.
42024002	Ni boola, nga baagaana ebaale ni balisiringihisye ohuŋwa hu mulyango gwʼehigombe.
42024003	Aye ni bengira, sibagaanamo mulambo gwa Yesu Musengwa.
42024004	Ni baali ni bahitangalaaye, ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo abasinde babiri bemeerera huupi ni nabo, ni bambaaye engoye ekosa ni jimeregenya hyʼohumesya hwʼefula.
42024005	Ngʼabahasi abo bahotama ŋaasi olwʼohubatya nʼohubaŋa eŋono, ngʼabasinde abo babaloma baati, “Lwahiina mwendulira omulamu mu bafu?
42024006	Aŋuma ŋano, alamuhire. Muhebulire ngʼolu gabaloma ni gaali nʼahiiri ni nenywe mu Galilaaya ati,
42024007	‘Baliŋayo Omwana wʼOmuutu eyiri ababbengi, bamuhomerere hu musalabba aye aja hulamuha ni ŋabitireŋo endaalo edatu.’ ”
42024008	Ngʼaŋo bahebulira ebibono bibye ebyo.
42024009	Era abahasi abo ni batula mu higombe, baagamayo ngʼebyo byosibyosi babiromera abeegi ba Yesu ehumi namulala, nʼabandi bosibosi.
42024010	Abahasi abo baali nje Malyamu Magadaleeni ni Jowaana ni Malyamu nyina ya Yakobbo ko nʼabahasi abandi abaali ni nabo.
42024011	Aye abahwenda sibafugiirira ebi bahasi abo babalomera olwohuba ebibono byawe byali oti biŋuma mahulu.
42024012	Aye Peetero nga genyoha, aduluma atiina hu higombe. Ni goola ngʼahotama ohwetegeresa ngʼabona engoye eji baali ni basiihiremo Yesu ni jiri aŋo, ngʼaŋwayo ni geŋunja ebi aweene.
42024013	Hu ludaalo olwene olwo olu Yesu gaalamuhiraho, babiri hu beegi babe baali batiina mu haalo ahabalanga baati Emawusi emayiro nga musanvu ohuŋwa e Yerusaalemu.
42024014	Batiinanga ni baŋaya hu ebyo byosibyosi ebyali ni bibayeeŋo hu Yesu.
42024015	Ni baali ni bagenda ni baŋaya nga Yesu omwene aŋwera eyi gaŋwera abeŋimbaho bagendera ŋalala.
42024016	Aye nibo sibafaania baati nje niye.
42024017	Ngʼababuusa ati, “Mulihugenda ni muŋaya hu hi?” Nga bemeerera ni babomboŋaaye.
42024018	Mulala hu bo, oyu balanganga baati Kulewopasi ngʼamugobolamo ati, “Ndiiwe weŋene mu Yerusaalemu atamanyire ebibaayeŋo mu ndaalo jino?”
42024019	Ngʼababuusa ati, “Ebiina?” Nga baloma baati, “Ebiŋamba hu Yesu Omunazaleesi, abaaye naabbi owʼamaani era Hatonda nʼali ni naye nʼabaatu bangi ni babona obuŋangi buwe mu ebi gaholanga nʼomu bigalomanga.
42024020	Abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼabaŋugi bamuŋayo ohumusalira ogwʼohufa era nga bamuhomerera hu musalabba.
42024021	Hwali husuubira huuti njʼaja hununula Yisirayiri. Aye endaalo edatu jahabitaŋo ohuŋwa olu bamwita.
42024022	Ebyo ni bihiiri aŋo, eriyo abahasi abaŋuunire hu magombe,
42024023	aye ndibabona mulambo gugwe. Batulomire baati mbo baweene abamalayika ababalomire baati mbo Yesu alamuhire.
42024024	Abahyefe abandi boosi batiinire hu higombe, baageene ni biri ngʼolu abahasi balomire, sibabona hu mulambo gugwe.”
42024025	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abaloma ati, “Nga muli baŋubeebe era nga mulwaŋo ohufugiirira byosibyosi ebi banaabbi baaloma baati biribaŋo!
42024026	Baali nʼohugudya Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu, ko ahene aŋeewe eŋono lirye.”
42024027	Ngʼaŋo Yesu, abanyonyola ebyaŋandiihiwa ebimulomaho byosibyosi, ohutandihira hu ebi Musa gaŋandiiha nʼebyabanaabbi bosibosi.
42024028	Ni baali ni boola eyi baali ni baja, Yesu niye gaali oti ahyeyongerayo mu moni.
42024029	Nga bamwegalihira bugali weene baati, “Nja hutiine e weefe, olwohuba owiire wiriire.” Ngʼafugiirira atiina ni nabo.
42024030	Ni baali ni balya, nga Yesu abugula omugaati geyaasa Hatonda, ngʼagubbongolamo, ahena abaŋa.
42024031	Ngʼaŋo hibawijuhaho bamufaania baati nje niye aye aŋo ni naaŋo ngʼabagotaho.
42024032	Nga bebuusa abeene nʼabeene baati, “Emyoyo sijitwefubuhirenge nʼaloma ni neefe mu ngira nʼatunyonyola ebyaŋandiihiwa?”
42024033	Nga benyoha mu haseera aheene aho, baagamayo e Yerusaalemu. Ni boola, baagaana abeegi ba Yesu ehumi namulala nʼabandi ni bahumbeene.
42024034	Nga babaloma baati, “Hituufu, Musengwa alamuhire era Simooni amuweene.”
42024035	Nga bano boosi babaŋayira ebibaayeŋo mu ngira ni bagenda ni naye era ngʼolu abbwagire omugaati ni bali hulya nga ko hibawijuhaho bamufaania.
42024036	Ni baali ni bahiiroma ebyo, ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo Yesu gaaja gemeerera ŋagati waawe abaloma ati, “Emiyaaya jibe ni nenywe!”
42024037	Hino hyabasindusa era hyabaŋa ohutya ni baŋeega baati baweene omwigu gugwe.
42024038	Ngʼaŋo abaloma ati, “Lwahiina mweralihirira era lwahiina mubuusabuusa mu myoyo jenywe?
42024039	Mubone ebyaba nʼamagulu gange. Ndiise ono omwene. Mupambeho mubone, omwigu gubula mubiri nʼamagumba hyʼolu ese ndi ninabyo.”
42024040	Ni gahena ohubaloma atyo, ngʼabalaga ebyaba nʼamagulu gage.
