42024041	Hino hyabaleetera esangaalo bitiirifu aye mula ni batafugiirira baati nje niye. Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Mupeho ehyʼohulya.”
42024042	Nga bamuŋa enyeeni enjohye.
42024043	Ni gayinaaŋa, ngʼayirya ni babona.
42024044	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Bino mbebi nabalomeranga ni kiiri ni nenywe ti byosibyosi ebyaŋandiihiwa ni bindomaho mu magambi ga Musa nomu bitabo byʼabanaabbi nomu Zabbuli, biri nʼohwolerera.”
42024045	Ngʼaŋo ko hibawijuhaho bategeera Ebyaŋandiihiwa.
42024046	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, baaja hugudya Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu, bahene bamwite aye aja hulamuha ni ŋabitireŋo endaalo edatu,
42024047	baaja hulomera abaatu bosibosi ohutandihira mu Yerusaalemu obuhwenda obwʼohwenenya nʼohusoniŋiwa ebibi olwʼobuŋangi bubwe.
42024048	Era muli bajulizi bʼebiitu bino.
42024049	Nja hubaŋeeresa ehirabo ehi Bbaabba gabasuubisa. Aye musigale mu hibuga muno ohwola olu mulisuna amaani ohuŋwa mwigulu.”
42024050	Nga Yesu abatusa mu hibuga, abaŋira aŋaatu mu hitundu ohuupi nʼahabuga hʼe Bbesaniya. Ni boola, ngʼagolola emihono abasabira ekabi.
42024051	Ni gaali nʼahibasabira ekabi, ngʼabalehaŋo atiina mwigulu.
42024052	Nga bahubba amafuha bamujumirya. Ni bahena nga baagamayo e Yerusaalemu ni bejuuye esangaalo bitiirifu.
42024053	Era baabanga hu Yekaalu habuhyabuhya ni bajumirya Hatonda.
43001001	Mu hutandiha ko batonde ehyalo, oyo oyu balanga baati Hibono gaaliŋo. Hibono ngʼaba ni Hatonda era nʼali nʼowa Hatonda obwijuufu.
43001002	Hibono gaali ni Hatonda mu hutandiha ni bahiiri hutonda ehyalo.
43001003	Hatonda gatonda hiisi hiitu nʼatambisa Hibono oyo era aŋa ataali eŋuma ehi gatonda.
43001004	Hibono gaali njʼesimuho yʼobulamu era njʼenjase eyimulihira abaatu.
43001005	Enjase eyo eraga abaatu ehi Hatonda ali nʼehi genda bahole aye sibamutegeera.
43001006	Olwolire nga Hatonda atuma omuutu oyu balanganga baati Yowaane.
43001007	Yowaane gaaja ohulomera abaatu ebiŋamba hu oyo ali hyʼenjase alaga abaatu ehi Hatonda ali nʼehi genda. Era ti abaatu bafugiirire Hatonda ohubita mu niye.
43001008	Yowaane sinje owaali enjase aye gaaja ohulomera abaatu hu oyo ali hyʼenjase.
43001009	Oyo owaali ni gaaja hu hyalo huno, njʼenjase etuufu emulihira hiisi muutu.
43001010	Hibono gaaja hu hyalo huno era wayire Hatonda njʼoyu gahozesa ohutonda hiisi hiitu, abaatu sibamufugiirira.
43001011	Gaaja mu hyalo hihye aye abaatu babe abeene nʼabeene sibamusangaalira.
43001012	Ne abamusangaalira baahena baamutaamo obwesige, gaabafuula baana ba Hatonda.
43001013	Sibafuuha baana ba Hatonda ngʼolu baatu basaala abaana baawe oba olwʼohusalaŋo hwʼobuutu oba hu lwʼohwenda hwʼomusinde omufumbo aye gabasaala ngʼolu omwene asiima.
43001014	Hibono gahena gafuuha muutu, era gamenya ŋalala ni neefe mu hyalo muno. Efe hwabonaho eŋono lirye eri ali ni nalyo, eŋono eri Hatonda gatwiha Omwana wuwe omulala wogobbo oyo oyu Semwana gatuma ohuŋwa mwigulu gaaja ni gejuuye amazima nʼehisasabirisi ehyʼamaani.
43001015	Lulala, Yowaane galangirira ati, “Ono njʼoyu nʼaloma ti, ‘Oyo anahaaje oluvanyuma lwange gaakira obuŋangi, olwohuba gaaliŋo ni kiiri husaaliwa.’ ”
43001016	Olwʼehisasabirisi hihye ehibitiirifu, hwesihwesi gatuŋa ekabi enyene enyingi.
43001017	Hino kiroma olwohuba Hatonda gatuŋa amagambi nʼabita mu Musa, aye husuna ehisasabirisi nʼamazima agaŋamba hu Hatonda ohubita mu Yesu Kurisito.
43001018	Ŋabula abonangaho Hatonda, ohutusaho Omwana wuwe omulala wogobbo owihaaye ŋalala ni Semwana. Omwana oyo njʼatulaga ehi Semwana ali.
43001019	Ngʼabatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya batuma balala hu Baleevi nʼabasengi ba Hatonda abomu Yerusaalemu eyiri Yowaane Omubatiza ohumubuusa baati, “Ndiiwe ani?”
43001020	Aye gabagobolamo nʼobugumu ati, “Si ndiise Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu.”
43001021	Nga bamubuusa baati, “Ŋaahani hanye si ndiiwe Kurisito, ndiiwe ani? Ndiiwe Eriya?” Nga Yowaane abagobolamo ati, “Si ndiise.” Nga bamubuusa baati, “Ndiiwe naabbi ola oyu basuubisa?” Ngʼabagobolamo ati, “Bbe.”
43001022	Ngʼaŋo bamuloma baati, “Ale ni tulomere, ndiiwe ani? Hwenda hwagame nʼehyohugobolamo abo abatutumire.”
43001023	Nga Yowaane abagobolamo nʼatambisa ebibono ebi naabbi Yisaaya gaŋandiiha ebiroma biiti, “Ndiise ejanjaasi eryʼamaani eriŋwera mu lulafu ni lirangirira liiti, ‘Muhosiirire Musengwa engira.’ ”
43001024	Nga balala hu Bafalisaayo abo ababatuma
43001025	babuusa Yowaane baati, “Ŋaahani, hanye si ndiiwe Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu era si ndiiwe Eriya, oba naabbi ola, lwahiina obatiza abaatu?”
43001026	Nga Yowaane abagobolamo ati, “Ese mbatiza nʼamaaji, aye mu nywe ŋaliŋo owukira obuŋangi oyu mutamanyire.
43001027	Oyo njʼaliija oluvanyuma lwange era ese sipoomera wayire nʼohuboŋolola ekoba jʼengayito jije.”
43001028	Ebyo byosibyosi byaliŋo mu habuga aha balanga baati Bbesaniya, engereha wʼolwabi olu balanga baati Yoludaani eyi Yowaane gaali nʼabatihiza abaatu.
43001029	Oludaalo olwalondaho, nga Yowaane abona Yesu nʼatiinira eyi gaali, ngʼalomera abaaliŋo ati, “Mubone ali mu hifo hyʼEtaama Etusaŋo Ebibi byʼabaatu.
43001030	Ono njʼoyu nalomaho ti; ‘Omusinde anahaaje oluvanyuma lwange gaakira obuŋangi’ olwohuba gaaliŋo ni kiiri husaaliwa.
43001031	Ese keesi naali simumanyire aye ehyagira naaja ohubatiza abaatu nʼamaaji, hyali ti Abayisirayiri bahamutegeera.”
43001032	Nga Yowaane aloma ati, “Nabona Omwoyo ohuŋwa mwigulu nʼamwihaho nʼali mu hifaananyi hyʼeŋuusi, ngʼamusigalaho.
43001033	Hani sinamanya ti nje niye. Aye Hatonda owaatuma ohubatiza abaatu nʼamaaji, gaali gandomire ati, ‘Omusinde oyu olibona Omwoyo nʼamwihaho, oyo nje aja hubatiza abaatu nʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu.’
43001034	Mbalomera ehi nabonaho nʼemoni jange era mbahahasa ti oyo njʼOmwana wa Hatonda.”
43001035	Oludaalo olwalondaho, Yowaane nindi gaali gemeereye ŋaweene ŋala nʼababiri hu beegi babe.
43001036	Ngʼaŋo abona Yesu nʼabita, ngʼabaloma ati, “Mubone oyo ali mu hifo hyʼEtaama Etusaŋo Ebibi byʼabaatu!”
43001037	Abeegi babe abo ababiri ni baŋulira ebibono ebyo, nga balonda hu Yesu.
43001038	Yesu ni gaheja egongo, gababona ni bamulondaho, ngʼababuusa ati, “Mwenda hi?” Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Musomesa, omenya ŋeena?”
43001039	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Muuje hutiine mumanyeyo.” Esaawa jaali ngʼehumi ejʼegulo. Nga baŋamba engira batiina eyi gamenyanga, eyi baali egulo eryo lyosiryosi.
43001040	Andereya mulebe wa Simooni Peetero, gaali mulala hu baŋulira ehi Yowaane galoma era abaali ni balondire hu Yesu.
43001041	Ehi Andereya gasooka ohuhola, hutiina hwendula mulebewe Simooni, ngʼamuloma ati, “Huweene Masiya.”
43001042	Ngʼaŋo amuŋira eyiri Yesu. Yesu ni gamuhejaho ngʼamuloma ati esiina liryo ndiiwe Simooni omwana wa Yona, aye banahulangenga baati Keefa.
43001043	Oludaalo olwalondaho, nga Yesu asalaŋo ohutiina mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya. Ngʼabona omusinde oyu balanganga baati Filipo amuloma ati, “Nja obe mwegi wange.”
43001044	Filipo yeesi gaali aŋwera mu hibuga Bbesusayida hyʼAndereya ni Peetero.
43001045	Filipo ni gabona Nasanayiri, gaamuloma ati, “Huweene oyo oyu Musa gaŋandiihaho mu magambi, era oyu banaabbi boosi baŋandiihaho. Nje Yesu omusaani wa Yosefu e Nazaleesi.”
43001046	Ngʼaŋo Nasanayiri amubuusa ati, “Ŋaliŋo ehiraŋi hyosihyosi ehiŋanga ohuŋwa e Nazaleesi?” Nga Filipo amugobolamo ati, “Ewe nja obone.”
43001047	Yesu ni gabona Nasanayiri ni goleresa aŋa ali, ngʼaloma ati, “Bona Omuyisirayiri endiho era abulamo obunafuusi!”
43001048	Nga Nasanayiri amubuusa ati, “Wumanyire otye?” Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Filipo ko ahulange, kuweene nʼoli mu musaala omutiini.”
43001049	Nga Nasanayiri amuloma ati, “Musomesa, ndiiwe Omwana wa Hatonda era habaha wa Yisirayiri!”
43001050	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Ofugiirira olwohuba kulomeeye ti kuweene nʼoli mu musaala omutiini? Olibona ebiitu ebyene ebyʼamaani ebihira ehyo.”
43001051	Nga Yesu ameedaho ati, “Mu butuufu obwene mbalomera ti munahabone egulu ni liwihuhire, abamalayika ba Hatonda ni baniina era ni beeha hu Mwana wʼOmuutu.”
43002001	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, ŋabitaŋo endaalo edatu nga ŋabaŋo embaga eyʼobugole mu hibuga e Kaana mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya. Nyina ya Yesu gaaliyo,
43002002	era Yesu nʼabeegi babe boosi baali babalangire hu mbaga eyo.
43002003	Abaatu ni banywa omwenge gwʼemizabbibbu ogu baali ni bategehire gwaŋwaŋo, nga nyina amuloma ati, “Mwana wange, abaatu bano ebyʼohunywa bibaŋoyeho.”
43002004	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Maama ndehe! Ehiseera hyange hihiiri hwola.”
43002005	Nga nyina aloma abaŋeeresa ati, “Muhole hyosihyosi ehi anabalome.”
43002006	Ohuupi aŋo ŋaaliŋo agatamu mukaaga aga baahola mu mabaale. Agatamu ago gaali gajamo ebidomolo amahumi abiri hu adatu buli galala, baali bagatayeŋo olwʼesambo yʼEhiyudaaya eyʼohwegwalaasa.
43002007	Nga Yesu aloma abaŋeeresa ati, “Mwijuse agatamu ago amaaji.” Nga bagejusa nʼohumuniga.
43002008	Ngʼaŋo abaloma ati, “Ŋaahani mudaŋeho muŋirire omuhulu wʼembaga.” Nga boosi badaŋa baŋirira
43002009	omuhulu wʼembaga amaaji ago agaali ni gafuuhire omwenge gwomu mizabbibbu ngʼanywaho. Cooka niye sigamanya eyi gwaŋwa aye abaŋeeresa nibo baali bamanyire. Ngʼaŋo omuhulu wʼembaga alanga omugole omusinde amuloma ati,
43002010	“Abahyo beheerera hugabula omwenge omulaŋi. Abaatu ni bahena ohunywa, nga ko baloosaho ogutali mulaŋi. Ne ewe obihiriiye omulaŋi ohwosa esaawa yino!”
43002011	Hano njʼahabonero aheŋunjisa ahadaayi aha Yesu gahola e Kaana mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya, eyo galaga obuŋangi buwe era ngʼabeegi babe bamutamo obwesige.
43002012	Oluvanyuma lwʼobugole, Yesu nʼabeegi nʼabalebe babe ko ni nyina, nga batiina e Kaperanawumu bahenayo ahamanga.
43002013	Embaga eyʼEhiyudaaya eyʼOhuhebuliriraho Ohubihisya ni yaali nʼenaatere ohwola, Yesu nʼabeegi babe baatiina e Yerusaalemu.
43002014	Mu lunya lwa Yekaalu gagaanamo abaali ni batunda eŋombe nʼetaama nʼenjiiwa, era nʼabandi ni behaaye ŋa meeza jaawe ni baswanisa ebbeesa.
43002015	Ngʼaŋamba emigoye, ajihambaamo olubbooko, ngʼabbinga eŋombe nʼetaama jitula, ngʼagengula emeeza jʼabaswanisa ebbeesa jigwa era ngʼendusu joŋaaniha.
43002016	Ngʼaloma abo abaali ni batunda enjiiwa ati, “Jino mujituse ŋano. Mulehe hufuula enyumba ya Bbaabba ya husubuulirangamo.”
43002017	Ngʼabeegi babe bahebulira ehyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Ohwenda ohunendamo enyumba yiyo hulinjitisa.”
43002018	Ngʼaŋo abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya bamuloma baati, “Habonero hi aheŋunjisa ahosobola ohuhola ohutulaga oti oli nʼobuŋangi ohuhola ebyo byosibyosi ebi oholire?”
43002019	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Ale mubbwageŋo e Yekaalu yino, nja huyitongolera mu ndaalo edatu yaba nʼeŋooye.”
43002020	Ngʼabatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya abo bamugobolamo baati, “Yekaalu yino yituŋirira emyaha mahumi ane namukaaga ni huyitongola. Aye ewe oŋanga otye ohuyitongorera mu ndaalo edatu joŋene?”
43002021	Aye Yesu galoma hu Yekaalu nʼategeesa mubiri gugwe.
43002022	Ni galamuha, nga abeegi babe bahebulira ehi galoma. Ngʼaŋo bafugiirira ebyaŋandiihiwa nʼebibono ebi Yesu galomanga.
43002023	Yesu ni gaali e Yerusaalemu hu Mbaga eyi bahebuliriraho Ohubihisya, abaatu bangi babona obubonero obweŋunjisa obu gaholanga, nga bamutamo obwesige.
43002024	Aye eŋuma oyu Yesu gatamo obwesige olwohuba gaali abamanyire bosibosi.
43002025	Sihyali ni hyetagisa muutu yesiyesi ohumulomera ebiŋamba hu baatu olwohuba ye omwene gaali amanyire ebyali mu myoyo jaawe bosibosi.
43003001	Ŋaaliŋo omusinde oyu balanganga baati Nekodemu. Omusinde oyo gaali wamu hibbubbu hyʼAbafalisaayo era nʼali mulala hu bʼOluhiiho lwʼAbayudaaya Olubbala.
43003002	Lulala, Nekodemu gatiina eyiri Yesu owiire, ngʼamuloma ati, “Musomesa, humanyire huuti Hatonda gahutuma olwohuba ŋaŋuma aŋanga ohuhola obubonero obweŋunjisa obu ohola, ohutusaho Hatonda nʼali ni naye.”
43003003	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Kulomera ehituufu ti ohutusaho ngʼomuutu bamusaaye omulundi ogwohubiri, saaŋanga hwingira mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda.”
43003004	Nga Nekodemu amubuusa ati, “Omuutu aŋanga atye ohusaaliwa omulundi ogwohubiri nʼali muhulu? Mu butuufu saaŋanga hwingira mu hida hya nyina, baamusaala nindi.”
43003005	Ngʼaŋo Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Kulomera ehituufu ti, ohutusaho ngʼomuutu bamubatihiize nʼamaaji era gasuna nʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu, saaŋanga hwingira mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda.
43003006	Omuutu asaala muutu wahye aye Omwoyo Omutukuvu njʼaleetera omuutu ohuba nʼobulamu obunyaaha.
43003007	Oteŋunja olwʼohuhuloma ti muli nʼohusaaliwa omulundi ogwohubiri.
43003008	Omwoyo wa Hatonda ali hyʼepunga. Omuutu ayiŋulira aye ŋaŋuma aba nʼamanyire eyi eŋwera oba eyi eruŋama. Mu ngeri njʼenyene, ŋaŋuma aŋanga ohumanya Omwoyo nʼacuusa obulamu wʼomuutu.”
43003009	Nga Nekodemu amubuusa ati, “Ehyo hisoboha hiitye?”
43003010	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Ewe omusomesa wʼAbayisirayiri omulamba, soofaania ebindoma?
43003011	Kulomera ehituufu ti efe huloma ebi humanyire era ebi hwaweeneho aye enywe simufugiirira.
43003012	Obanga kulomeeye hu ebi baatu bahola hu hyalo huno nandofaania aye onafugiirire otye ni nahulomere hu byomwigulu?
43003013	Eŋuma owaali nʼatiinireho mwigulu ohutusaho Omwana wʼOmuutu owaŋwayo.”
43003014	Ngʼolu Musa gaŋaniha etemu hu musaala mu lulafu, mu ngeri njʼenyene nʼOmwana wʼOmuutu baja humuŋaniha baatyo hu musalabba,
43003015	ko hiisi amufugiirira asune obulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
43003016	Hatonda ni gendire bugali abaatu, gaŋayo Omwana wuwe omulala wogobbo, ko hiisi amufugiirira atasihiiriha aye asune obulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
43003017	Olwohuba Hatonda sigatuma Mwana wuwe hu hyalo ohusalira abaatu omusango aye banoŋohe ni babita mu niye.
43003018	Hiisi amufugiirira, gejeerera omusango. Aye atafugiirira, gwahena hale ohumuhira olwohuba saafugiirira Mwana mulala wogobbo owa Hatonda.
43003019	Guno njʼomusango, Hatonda galeeta enjase hu hyalo, aye abaatu benda ehiirema ohuhira enjase, olwohuba ebikolwa byawe bibi.
43003020	Hiisi muutu ahola ebibi, acaawa enjase era saatiina eyiri oyo ali hyʼenjase olwohuba ebikolwa bibye bija hweta aŋalafu.
43003021	Aye hiisi ahola amazima, aleha enjase yamumulihira ohulaga ti hiisi ehi ahola, ahihola hu lwa Hatonda.
43003022	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, nga Yesu nʼabeegi babe batiina mu twale lyʼe Buyudaaya, eyi gaali ni nabo nʼabatiza.
43003023	Yowaane Omubatiza yeesi gaali mu hifo ehi balanga baati Enoni, ohuupi ni Saalimu nʼabatiza olwohuba eyo amaaji gaali mangi. Abaatu batiinangayo ohubatiziwa.
43003024	Ehyo hyaliŋo ni bahiiri hudanya Yowaane mu komera.
43003025	Lulala, abeegi ba Yowaane baŋahana nʼomulala hu Bayudaaya hu biŋamba hu halombolombo haawe ahʼohwegwalaasa.
43003026	Nga batiina eyiri Yowaane, bamuloma baati, “Musomesa, omusinde ola owaali ni neewe engereha wʼolwabi Yoludaani era oyu walomaho ebiraŋi, ali hubatiza abaatu era bangi bali hutiinayo ohubabatiza.”
43003027	Nga Yowaane abagobolamo ati, “Omuutu saaŋanga huba nʼobuŋangi ohutusaho Hatonda nʼabumuŋaaye.
43003028	Enywe mwabeene muŋa obujulizi ngʼolu nʼaloma ti, ‘Si ndiise Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu ohutusaho baatuma ohumweyulira engira.’
43003029	Omugole aba bwʼoyo amuhooye. Meeri yʼahooye niye aba huba aŋo nʼamulindiriiye era olu aŋulira ejanjaasi lirye himusangaasa bugali. Mu ngeri njʼenyene keesi ndi nʼesangaalo bitiirifu.
43003030	Yesu geyongere ohufuma, ese ohwange ni huhendeera.”
43003031	“Oyo owaŋwa mwigulu ali ŋamugulu wa bosibosi. Aye omuutu owʼohu hyalo huno aba wa hyalo hino, aloma era ahola bya hu hyalo huno. Oyo owaŋwa mwigulu ali ŋamugulu wa bosibosi.
43003032	Era aloma hu ebi gaweene nʼehi gaŋulira mwigulu aye batono abaŋulirisa ebibye.
43003033	Hiisi afugiirira ebibono bibye, asuna ahabonero ahalaga haati ebi Hatonda aloma bituufu.
43003034	Olwohuba oyo oyu Hatonda gatuma, aloma ebibono bibye, era amuŋeera erala amaani ameene amangi agʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu.
43003035	Hatonda genda Omwana wuwe era gaamuŋa obuŋangi hu hiisi hiitu.
43003036	Hiisi afugiirira Omwana wa Hatonda ali nʼobulamu obutaŋwaŋo. Aye atamufugiirira, aŋuma bulamu obutaŋwaŋo olwohuba Hatonda amuliho ehiruŋi.”
43004001	Mu hiseera ehyo, Abafalisaayo baŋulira baati abaloobera ba Yesu baali beyongera obungi era baati gaali abatiza abaatu bangi ohuhira Yowaane,
43004002	wayire Yesu omwene sinje owabatizanga aye abeegi babe.
43004003	Yesu Musengwa ni gaŋulira ebiitu ebyo, gaŋwa mu twale lyʼe Buyudaaya, nga gagamayo mu lyʼe Galilaaya.
43004004	Ni gaali ni gagamayo, gaali nʼohubita e Samaliya.
43004005	Ngʼaŋo atiina goola e Samaliya mu hibuga ehi balanga baati Sikaali, ohulirihana omuŋuluho ogu Yakobbo gaŋa omusaani wuwe oyu balanga baati Yosefu.
43004006	Mu muŋuluho ogwo mwalimo esobere eyi Yakobbo gaali nʼayabire. Olwʼomudembo gwʼolugendo, Yesu geehala aŋo hu sobere eyo. Esaawa jaali nga mukaaga ejomu muusi.
43004007	Ngʼaŋo ŋabaŋo omuhasi Omusamaliya owatiina hu sobere eyo ohudaŋa amaaji. Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Peeho amaaji nyweho.”
43004008	Mu hiseera ehyo, abeegi babe baali batiinire mu hibuga ohugula ebiryo.
43004009	Ngʼaŋo omuhasi oyo amugobolamo ati, “Ewe oli Muyudaaya, ese ndi Musamaliya. Oŋanga otye ohusunga amaaji ohunywa?” (Abayudaaya baali sibaholagana nʼAbasamaliya).
43004010	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Obanga nʼomanyire ehirabo ehi Hatonda aŋa abaatu, oyo ahuloma ati omuŋeho amaaji, wahamusungire gahuŋa amaaji agaleeta obulamu.”
43004011	Ngʼomuhasi oyo amuloma ati, “Muhulu, esobere yino ndeeŋi ate oŋuma hyahudaŋira. Onatuse ŋeena amaaji ago agaleeta obulamu?
43004012	Ewe ohira sehulu yeefe Yakobbo owayaba era gaatuŋa esobere yino eyi omwene nʼabaana babe era nʼebyayo bibye byanywangamo?”
43004013	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Hiisi anywa hu maaji gano, enduŋo emuluma nindi.
43004014	Aye hiisi anywa hu maaji aga ese muŋa, enduŋo sirimuluma olwohuba galifuuha esulo ejʼamaaji agamuleetera obulamu obutaŋwaŋo.”
43004015	Ngʼomuhasi oyo amuloma ati, “Muhulu, peeho amaaji ago enduŋo etanumanga nindi era ndehere aŋo ohuujanga ŋano ohudaŋa amaaji.”
43004016	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Tiina olange wamo ohene ogobole ni naye.”
43004017	Ngʼomuhasi oyo amugobolamo ati, “Puma wamwange.” Ngʼaŋo Yesu amuloma ati, “Oli mutuufu ohuloma oti oŋuma wamo,
43004018	olwohuba wahafumbirwa abasinde bataanu era ni nooyo oyu oli ni naye si wamo. Ehi olomire hituufu.”
43004019	Ngʼomuhasi oyo aloma Yesu ati, “Muhulu, wumbonehera oti oli naabbi.
43004020	Abasehulu bʼefe bajumirihisyanga Hatonda hu lusozi luno. Aye enywe Abayudaaya muloma muuti mbo Yerusaalemu njʼehifo omwohujumirihisyanga Hatonda.”
43004021	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Muhasi ewe, fugiirira, ehiseera hiri huuja olu hitahetagise ohujumirihisya Hatonda Seefe hu lusozi olwo oba mu Yerusaalemu.
43004022	Enywe Abasamaliya mujumirya ehi mutamanyire. Aye efe Abayudaaya hujumirya ehi humanyire, olwohuba Hatonda aja hunoŋola abaatu nʼabita mu Bayudaaya.
43004023	Aye ehiseera hiija era hyolire, abajumirya Hatonda Seefe mu ngeri etuufu banamujumirihisyenga mu mwoyo era nomu mazima, olwohuba abamujumirya baatyo, mbaba genda.
43004024	Hatonda Mwoyo era ni naabo abamujumirya bali nʼohumujumirihisyanga mu mwoyo era nomu mazima.”
43004025	Ngʼomuhasi oyo amuloma ati, “Manyire ti Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu aja huuja. Era nʼaliija, alitunyonyola byosibyosi.”
43004026	Ngʼaŋo Yesu amuloma ati, “Ese aloma ni neewe, ndiise oyo.”
43004027	Nga mu hiseera ehyene ehyo abeegi ba Yesu bagobola, era nga beŋunja ohumwagana nʼaloma nʼomuhasi olwohuba hyali hibbwaga amagambi. Aye ŋaŋumaŋo owabuusa omuhasi oyo ati, “Wenda hi?” Oba abuusa Yesu ati, “Lwahiina oloma nʼomuhasi oyo?”
43004028	Ngʼomuhasi oyo aleha aŋo esongo yiye, aŋamba engira gagamayo mu hibuga, alomera abaatu ati,
43004029	“Muuje mubone omusinde owundomeeye byosibyosi ebi mbayenga ni kola. Omusinde ono aŋanga ohuba nʼali nje Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu?”
43004030	Ngʼaŋo abaatu baŋwerehereramo batiina ohumwebonera.
43004031	Mu hiseera ehyene ehyo, abeegi babe baali bamwegalihira baati, “Musomesa, lyaho ebiryo.”
43004032	Aye gabagobolamo ati, “Ndi nʼebiryo ebi mutamanyire.”
43004033	Ngʼaŋo abeegi babe bebuusa abeene nʼabeene baati, “Ŋaliŋo amuleeteyeho ehyʼohulya?”
43004034	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Nahola ebi owatuuma genda kole, mba hyʼaliiye.
43004035	Enywe si muli nʼendoma eroma yiiti; ‘Esigayeeyo emyesi ene, egesa lyole?’ Ale mubone: ebirime birabire era egesa lyolire.
43004036	Agesa ali hyʼoyo aloma ebipambaho galeetera abaatu ohusuna obulamu obutaŋwaŋo olwʼohufugiirira. Olwʼehyo owamwa ko ni nooyo agesa, basaŋalihisya ŋalala.
43004037	Endoma eyi baatu baloma baati, ‘Oyo amwa wundi nʼagesa yeesi wundi, tuufu.’
43004038	Nabaŋindiha ohugesa aŋa mutafaabinira. Abandi njʼabafaabiina aye enywe muuja hugesa.”
43004039	Abasamaliya bangi abomu hibuga ehyo bafugiirira Yesu olwʼebibono ebi muhasi oyo gabalomera ati, “Gandomeeye byosibyosi ebi naholanga.”
43004040	Abasamaliya ni batiina eyiri Yesu nga bamusunga ohubaho ewaawe. Ngʼahenayo endaalo ebiri.
43004041	Era olwʼebigabasomesa, bangi bamufugiirira.
43004042	Nga baloma omuhasi oyo baati, “Sihufugiirira olwʼebi otulomeeye aye olwohuba efe hwabeene huŋuliye nʼamatwi geefe. Humanyire huuti omusinde oyo mu butuufu njʼOmunoŋosi wʼabaatu bosibosi.”
43004043	Oluvanyuma lwʼendaalo ejo ebiri, Yesu gatiina mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya.
43004044	Ŋaahani Yesu gaali alomire ati, “Naabbi sibamuŋa eŋono mu hitundu hyʼewaawe.”
43004045	Ni goola e Galilaaya, ngʼabaatu baayo bamusangaalira olwohuba baali baweene byosibyosi ebi gahola hu Mbaga eyʼOhubihisya mu Yerusaalemu.
43004046	Ngʼaŋo nindi Yesu ahyala e Kaana mu Galilaaya, eyi gafuula amaaji ohuba envinyo. Mu hibuga hyʼe Kaperanawumu mwalimo omuhungu wa habaha owaali nʼomusaani wuwe nʼali mulwaye.
43004047	Omusinde oyo ni gaŋulira ati ŋaahani Yesu gaali aŋooye e Galilaaya nʼali mu twale lyʼe Buyudaaya, ngʼatiinayo amwegalihira atiine ni naye e Kaperanawumu, aŋonie omusaani wuwe owaali nʼali huupi hufa.
43004048	Ngʼaŋo Yesu amuloma ati, “Ohutusaho nga muweene obubonero obweŋunjisa, simuja hufugiirira.”
43004049	Ngʼomuhungu oyo amwegalihira ati, “Muhulu, ganya hutiine omwana wange nʼahiiri hufa.”
43004050	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Tiina, omwana wuwo anaŋone.” Omusinde oyo ngʼafugiirira ehi Yesu gamuloma, nga gagamayo engo.
43004051	Ni gaali nʼahiiri mu lugendo, ngʼabeedu babe bamwagaana hu ngira, bamulomera baati omwana wuwe aŋonire.
43004052	Ni gababuusa esaawa eyi gatandiha ohuba obulaŋi, nga bamulomera baati, “Omusuuja gwamulehuuye olwʼejo hu nyanga musanvu.”
43004053	Ngʼaŋo semwana yʼomwana oyo ahebulira ati eyo njʼesaawa enyene nʼenyene eyi Yesu gamulomeeyemo ati, “Omwana wuwo anaŋone.” Ngʼaŋo niye nʼabomu mago gage bosibosi bafugiirira Yesu.
43004054	Hano njʼahabonero aheŋunjisa ahohubiri aha Yesu gaahola nʼagobooye mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya ohuŋwa mu lyʼe Buyudaaya.
43005001	Ni ŋabitahoŋo ahamanga, nga Yesu atiina e Yerusaalemu hu mbaga yʼAbayudaaya.
43005002	Mu Yerusaalemu, ohuupi nʼomulala hu miryango ejingira mu hibuga omwo, ŋaaliŋo omulyango ni bagulanga baati, “Omulyango gwʼEtaama” ni ŋaliŋo ehidiba mu Lubbebbulaniya ni bahiranga baati Bbesusaaza. Era hu hidiba ehyo ni batongolaho ebigangu bitaanu ohuhyeswanigirisa.
43005003	Mu bigangu omwo, mwabangamo eduuli lyʼabalwaye hyʼabaŋofu, abaleme, nʼabasanyalala abalindiriranga amaaji ohwehuyuga.
43005004	Ŋaahani ŋaalingaŋo ehiseera ehi malayika geehanga mu hidiba, ngʼahuyuga amaaji. Oyo owehereranga ohwiha mu maaji ago, gaŋonanga hiisi bulwaye obu gabanga ni nabwo.
43005005	Hu hidiba ehyo, hwaliho omusinde owaali nʼahenire emyaha adatu namunaana nʼali mulwaye.
43005006	Yesu ni gamubona, gamanya ati abaaye mu mbeera eyo ohuhena ebbanga ebbala. Ngʼamubuusa ati, “Wenda ohuŋona?”
43005007	Ngʼomusinde oyo amugobolamo ati, “Muhulu, puma muutu owohunjeeda gandunda gaata mu hidiba mu hiseera aŋa maaji gehuyugira. Ni ngesyaho ohwiha mu maaji ngʼowundi ganeeheerera.”
43005008	Ngʼaŋo Yesu amuloma ati, “Yinyoha, ogege ehidugi hihyo, otiine.”
43005009	Aŋo ni naaŋo ngʼomusinde oyo aŋona ahena genyoha, aŋamba ehidugi hihye, atiina. Oludaalo olwo lwali lwa Sabbaato.
43005010	Abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya ni babona omusinde oyo oyu baali ni baŋonisye bamuloma baati, “Olwa leero lwa Sabbaato, amagambi sigahufugiirira hugega hidugi hihyo.”
43005011	Aye ngʼomusinde oyo abagobolamo ati, “Omusinde owuponisye, njʼowundomire ati, ‘Gega ehidugi hihyo,’ otiine.”
43005012	Ngʼaŋo bamubuusa baati, “Njʼani oyo ahulomire ati, ‘Gega ehidugi hihyo,’ otiine?”
43005013	Aye oyo oyu baali ni baŋonisye gaali samanyire ati Yesu njʼowamuŋonia, olwohuba gaali agoteeye mu guŋindi gwʼabaatu ogwali mu hifo ehyo.
43005014	Oluvanyuma, nga Yesu asaŋaana omusinde oyo hu Yekaalu, ngʼamuloma ati, “Wange, ŋaahani oli bulaŋi. Otahagesyaho hubbenga nindi, ehigosi ehihira aŋo hitahwolaho.”
43005015	Ngʼomusinde oyo atiina aŋayira abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya ati Yesu njʼowaali nʼamuŋonisye.
43005016	Ngʼaŋo abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya bahiyaania Yesu olwohuba gaŋonia omusinde oyo hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato.
43005017	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Hiisi ludaalo Bbaabba ahola emirimo era keesi ndi nʼohuhola.”
43005018	Ehyo hyongera hwongera amaani mu batangirisi bʼAbayudaaya ohusala magesi agʼohumwita. Olwohuba sigahoma hu hubbwaga egambi eriŋamba hu Sabbaato hyonyene, aye geranga Mwana wa Hatonda, ehiitu ehyali ni himuta hu daala erala ni Hatonda.
43005019	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Mbalomera ehituufu ti, Omwana aŋuma ehi aŋanga ohuhola hu lulwe, ohutusaho ahola ehyo ehi abona Semwana nʼahola.
43005020	Olwohuba Hatonda genda Omwana wuwe oyo, amulaga byosibyosi ebyʼohuhola. Era aja hu mulagirira ahole ebyʼamaani ebihiraho ni nehyo mweŋunje.
43005021	Ngʼolu Bbaabba alamusa abafu, nʼOmwana yeesi aŋa abo aba gendesa obulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
43005022	Era Bbaabba aŋuma oyu asalira omusango, aye obuŋangi obwo bwosibwosi gabuŋa Omwana wuwe,
43005023	ko abaatu bosibosi baŋenga Omwana wuwe oyo eŋono ngʼolu baliŋa Semwana. Era oyo ataŋa Mwana eŋono, aba saaŋa ni Semwana.”
43005024	“Mbalomera ehituufu ti, aŋulira ebibono byange, gahena gafugiirira oyo owaatuma, ali nʼobulamu obutaŋwaŋo, era sibalimusalira musango. Aba aŋooye mu hufa, nʼasunire obulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
43005025	Mbalomera ehituufu ti, ehiseera hinahoole olu bafu baliŋulira ejanjaasi lyʼOmwana wa Hatonda nga balamuha.”
43005026	Ngʼolu Bbaabba aŋa abaatu obulamu obutaŋwaŋo, mu ngeri njʼenyene nʼOmwana yeesi gamuŋa obuŋangi ohubaŋa obulamu obwo.
43005027	Era gaŋa Omwana obuŋangi ohusala emisango, olwohuba ye njʼOmwana wʼOmuutu.
43005028	Hitabeŋunjisa, olwohuba ehiseera hinahoole olu bafu bosibosi baliŋulira ejanjaasi lirye,
43005029	balamuha. Abo abahola ebiraŋi, balisuna obulamu obutaŋwaŋo aye abo abahola ebibi, baliramuha nga babasalira omusango.
43005030	“Eŋuma ehi kola hu lwange, sala emisango ngʼolu mba ni mbwene ehi Bbaabba aloma. Olwʼehyo sinehubbira, olwohuba ŋabula ehi kola olwʼohwesangaasa samwene ohutusaho ohusangaasa oyo owaatuma.”
43005031	Nga Yesu geyongera ohuloma ati, “Mbanga ni neromaho samwene, ebibono byange sibyahabaaye byʼamazima.
43005032	Aye ŋaliŋo omuutu aloma ebipambaho. Oyo nje Bbaabba era manyire ti ebi aloma byʼamazima.
43005033	Mwatuma abaatu eyiri Yowaane ohumubuusa ebipambaho era ebi gagobolamo, bituufu.
43005034	Ne sihinetagisa huba ti abaatu baloma ebiraŋi ebipambaho aye bino mbiroma, mwahafugiirira mwanoŋoha.
43005035	Obuhwenda bwa Yowaane waali hyʼetaala ni buleetera abaatu obutangaafu. Aye mwali nʼamanwaali haseera buseera olwʼebi gaali nʼaloma.”
43005036	Aye ebikolwa byange ebyene biraga ehyo ehi ndi nʼohuhiraho ni nʼebyo ebi Yowaane galoma. Era ebi kola njʼebi Bbaabba gaapa ohuhola era biraga biiti njʼowaatuma.
43005037	Era Bbaabba owaatuma gandomaho hiina ehi ndi. Aye enywe simumubonangaho era simutayo mwoyo hu bi abaloma.
43005038	Nʼehibono hihye hiŋuma nʼomu myoyo jenywe, olwohuba simufugiiririra mu oyo oyu gatuma.
43005039	“Musiiba mu husoma ebyaŋandiihiwa, olwohuba muŋeega muuti ehyo hiija hubaŋeesa obulamu obutaŋwaŋo. Ebyaŋandiihiwa ebyene ebyo bindomaho,
43005040	aye simwenda huŋulira byange nahabaŋa obulamu obutaŋwaŋo.”
43005041	“Ese, sindi hu byʼabaatu husiima
43005042	cooka mbamanyire bulaŋi weene era kimanyire ti simwenda Hatonda.
43005043	Ese naaja mu buŋangi wa Bbaabba, aye simufugiiririra. Ne abandi ni banahaaje hu lwawe, munahabasangaalire.
43005044	Simuŋanga hufugiirira ebindoma olwohuba mwepaahapaaha mwabeene nʼabeene. Simufayo ohwenda Hatonda abasiime.
43005045	“Aye mutaŋeega muuti ndiise alibaŋaŋabira eyiri Bbaabba. Amagambi ameene aga baŋa Musa era aga mwesiga njʼagalibaboŋa.
43005046	Mubanga ni mufugiiririra ebi Musa gaŋandiiha, keesi mwahafugiiriye, olwohuba bindomaho.
43005047	Aye obanga simufugiirira ebi gaŋandiiha, munafugiirire muutye ebindoma?”
43006001	Oluvanyuma, Yesu ganiina eryato gasomoha gatiina engereha wʼenyanja yʼe Galilaaya, (esiina erindi baati Tibberiya.)
43006002	Ngʼeduuli lyʼabaatu limulondaho olwʼobubonero obweŋunjisa obu gaali nʼaholire, nʼaŋonia abalwaye.
43006003	Ngʼaŋo Yesu nʼabeegi babe baniina olusozi, bahena beehala eyo.
43006004	Mu hiseera ehyo, Embaga yʼAbayudaaya eyʼOhuhebuliraho Ohubihisya, yaali huupi hwola.
43006005	Yesu ni gagangamusa omutwe gabona ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ni batiina eyi ali, ngʼaloma Filipo ati, “Hunagule ŋeena ebiryo ebi abaatu bano bosibosi banaalye?”
43006006	Aye galoma atyo hwenda hubona ehi analome olwohuba niye gaali amanyire ehi gaali nʼaja huhola.
43006007	Ngʼaŋo Filipo amugobolamo ati, “Wayire omuhemba ogwʼemyesi nga munaana, siguŋanga hugula ebiryo ebihena hiisi muutu ohulyaho.”
43006008	Ngʼowundi hu beegi babe oyu balanga baati Andereya mulebe ya Simooni Peetero, amuloma ati,
43006009	“Ŋano ŋaliŋo omuseere ali nʼemigaati etaanu ejomu busyanu wa bbaale nʼenyeeni ebiri. Aye bino binahole hi, hu eduuli lyʼabaatu lino?”
43006010	Nga Yesu aloma ati, “Mwihase abaatu.” Ŋaaliŋo enyaasi eraŋi olyʼohwihalaho mu hifo ehyo. Ngʼabaatu beehala era baali abasinde ngʼekumi taanu.
43006011	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abugula emigaati jira etaanu nga geyaasa Hatonda. Ngʼaŋo ajiŋa abeegi babe bagabire abaatu abaali ni behaaye. Mu ngeri njʼenyene ngʼaŋamba nʼenyeeni jira joosi abaŋa bajigabira abaatu. Nga hiisi muutu alya goosa aŋa gendire.
43006012	Hiisi muutu nʼahenire ohwiguta, ngʼaloma abeegi babe ati, “Muhumbaanie obukukumuhira obusigaayeŋo, mutonoona biryo.”
43006013	Nga bahumbaania obukukumuhira owʼemigaati jira etaanu bejusa ebisero ehumi nabibiri.
43006014	Abaatu ni babona ahabonero aheŋunjisa aha Yesu gaahola, nga batandiha ohuloma baati, “Hituufu ono nje naabbi oyu hubaaye ni hulindirira ohuuja hu hyalo huno!”
43006015	Yesu ni gategeera ati baja humuŋamba bamufuule habaha nʼehifuba, nga geyongerayo hu lusozi gebeera eyo yeŋene.
43006016	Egulo ni lyola, abeegi babe baserengeta batiina hu nyanja yʼe Galilaaya,
43006017	nga baŋamba eryato, basaabaale batiine e Kaperanawumu. Ehiseera ehyo, owiire waali wiirire aye Yesu gaali ahiiri hubeyungaho.
43006018	Epunga eyʼamaani yaali eri huhubba era enyanja nʼetabuhire.
43006019	Ni baali ni bahasabaalaho ngʼekilomita ene oba etaanu, nga babona Yesu nʼagenda hu maaji, ni goleresa ohuupi nʼeryato omu baali. Ni bamubona ngʼobuti owʼamaani bubaŋamba.
43006020	Aye nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Ndiise, mutatya!”
43006021	Ngʼaŋo baba nʼobugumu ohumufugiirira ohwingira mu lyato, aŋo ni naaŋo nga boola hu lugereha eyi baali ni batiina.
43006022	Oludaalo olwalondaho, ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu abaali ni basigaaye engereha wʼenyanja, bendula Yesu ni batamubona nga beŋunja. Hino hyaja olwohuba bahimanya baati hu mwalo hwaliho eryato erala eri beegi babe baali ni bambuhiiyemo boŋeene.
43006023	Ngʼaŋo ŋabaaŋo amaato agandi agaŋwa e Tibberiya, nga gagobera ohuupi nʼehifo aŋa abaatu baliira emigaati jira eji Musengwa gabaŋa nʼahenire ohweyaasa Hatonda.
43006024	Abaatu ni babona baati Yesu nʼabeegi babe baŋumaaŋo, nga baniina amaato ago basaabaala batiina e Kaperanawumu baje bamwendule.
43006025	Ni boola engereha wʼenyanja bamubona nga bamubuusa baati, “Musomesa, wolire ŋaali ŋano?”
43006026	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Mbalomera ehituufu ti, simunyendula olwohuba mwabona obubonero obweŋunjisa obu nʼahola aye olwohuba mwaliiye emigaati mweguta.
43006027	Mutaluluhaniranga ebiryo ebiŋwaŋo aye ehyʼohulya ehyʼomwoyo ehibaleetera obulamu obutaŋwaŋo obu Mwana wʼOmuutu ali baŋa. Olwohuba Hatonda ate nga nje Semwana gamuŋa obuŋangi obwo?”
43006028	Nga bamubuusa baati, “Huhole hi ko hube ni hwoheresa ebi Hatonda genda huhole?
43006029	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, ‘Hatonda ehi genda muhole,’ njʼohufugiirira oyo oyu gatuma.”
43006030	Ngʼaŋo bamubuusa baati, “Habonero hi aheŋunjisa ewe aha onahole, ko huhufugiirire? Onahole hi?
43006031	Mu lulafu, abasehulu beefe balyanga ebiryo ebi balanga baati emaanu, ngʼolu hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, ‘Gabaŋa ebiryo ohuŋwa mwigulu’ balye.”
43006032	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abaloma ati, “Mu butuufu, mbalomera ti Musa sinje owaŋa abasehulu benywe ebiryo ebyo ebyaŋwa mwigulu, aye Bbaabba abaŋa ehyʼohulya ehyene nʼehyene njʼowabibaŋa.
43006033	Olwohuba ehyʼohulya ehi Hatonda abaŋa, njʼoyo owaŋwa mwigulu gaaja hu hyalo ohuŋa abaatu obulamu obutaŋwaŋo.”
43006034	Nga bamuloma baati, “Muhulu, ohuŋwa ŋaahani tuŋenga ehyʼohulya ehyo.”
43006035	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abaloma ati, “Ndiise ehyʼohulya ehireeta obulamu. Owuuja eyi ndi, enjala serimulumaho kadi era owufugiirira enduŋo serimulumaho kadi.
43006036	Aye ngʼolu mbalomeeye, mumbwene ne simufugiirira ebindoma.
43006037	Hiisi oyu Bbaabba gaapa, gaaja eyi ndi. Era hiisi owuuja eyi ndi simwigalira yinje.
43006038	Hino kiroma olwohuba sinaŋwa mwigulu ohuhola ebyange aye ohuhola ebi Hatonda omwene hutuma genda kole.
43006039	Era husiima hwa Hatonda omwene huutuma ti tagosyaho wayire mulala hu abo aba gapambya aye mbalamuse hu ludaalo olwʼekomerero.
43006040	Olwohuba Hatonda Seefe asiima ati hiisi afugiirira Omwana wuwe, alisuna obulamu obutaŋwaŋo era ndimulamusa hu ludaalo lwʼekomerero.”
43006041	Ebibono ebyo byaleetera abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya ohweŋuluŋunya, olwohuba galoma ati, “Ndiise ehyʼohulya ehyaŋwa mwigulu.”
43006042	Nga baloma baati, “Ono sinje Yesu, omusaani wa Yosefu, oyu humanyire nyina ni semwana abamusaala? Ŋaahani geema huhi ohuloma ati gaŋwa mwigulu?”
43006043	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Mulehere aŋo ohweŋuluŋunya mwabeene nʼabeene.
43006044	Ŋabula aŋanga ohuuja eyi ndi hu lulwe ohutusaho nga Bbaabba omwene amuleetire. Era keesi hiisi owuuja ndimulamusa hu ludaalo lwʼekomerero.
43006045	Hyaŋandiihiwa mu bitabo byʼabanaabbi hiiti, ‘Hatonda gaaja husomesa hiisi muutu. Hiisi aŋulira ebya Bbaabba era gaŋamba ebi amuloma, afugiirira ebyange.’
43006046	Ŋabula owaali nʼaweeneho Bbaabba ohutusaho oyo owaŋwa mwigulu ewa Hatonda.”
43006047	“Mbalomera ehituufu ti, oyo owufugiirira ali nʼobulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
43006048	Ndiise ehyʼohulya ehireeta obulamu.
43006049	Abasehulu benywe balya emaanu mu lulafu aye baahena baafa.
43006050	Aye ehyʼohulya ehiŋwa mwigulu cʼehino ehi muutu alya ndaafe.
43006051	Ndiise ehyʼohulya ehiŋwa mwigulu ehireeta obulamu. Hiisi alya hu hyʼohulya hino aliba mulamu emirembe nʼemirembe. Ehyʼohulya ehyo njʼomubiri gwange, ogu ndiŋayo ohuleetera abaatu obulamu obutaŋwaŋo.”
43006052	Ngʼaŋo abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya bahiŋahania nʼobusambuha ni baloma baati, “Omusinde ono aŋanga atye ohutuŋa omubiri gugwe ohulya?”
43006053	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Mbalomera ehituufu ti, ohutusaho nga muliiye omubiri gwʼOmwana wʼOmuutu era mwanywa amafugi gage si muŋanga huba nʼobulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
43006054	Hiisi alya omubiri gwange era ganywa amafugi gange ali nʼobulamu obutaŋwaŋo era ndimulamusa hu ludaalo olwʼekomerero.
43006055	Olwohuba omubiri gwange hyʼohulya ehyene nʼehyene era amafugi gange cʼehyohunywa ehyene nʼehyene.
43006056	Hiisi alya omubiri gwange, ganywa nʼamafugi gange, asigala nʼali bulala ni neese.
43006057	Ngʼolu Bbaabba omwene huutuma agaba obulamu, keesi ndi mulamu hu lulwe. Era mu ngeri njʼenyene ni nooyo alya omubiri gwange gahena ganywa amafugi gange aba mulamu hu lwange.
43006058	Ndiise ehyʼohulya ehiŋwa mwigulu. Abasehulu benywe balya emaanu bahena baafa, aye oyo alya ehyʼohulya hino aliba mulamu emirembe nʼemirembe.”
43006059	Yesu galoma ebibono ebyo nʼali husomesa mu humbaaniro lyʼAbayudaaya e Kaperanawumu.
43006060	Bangi hu beegi ba Yesu ni baŋulira ebibono ebyo, nga baloma baati, “Esomesa eyo ngumu yahutegeera. Njʼani aŋanga ohuyifugiirira?”
43006061	Yesu ni gafaania ati abeegi babe baali beŋuluŋunya olwʼebi gaali nʼalomire, ngʼababuusa ati, “Olwo ebindomire bibaheniremo amaani?
43006062	Ne hiriba hiitye ni mulibona Omwana wʼOmuutu ni gagamayo mwigulu eyi gaaŋwa!
43006063	Omwoyo wa Hatonda aleetera abaatu ohuba nʼobulamu obutaŋwaŋo; aye omuutu hu buwe ŋaŋuma ehi asobola. Ebibono ebi mbalomera bireeta obulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
43006064	Aye abandi hu nywe simufugiirira.” Yesu galoma atyo olwohuba hu huŋwera erala mu hutandiha, gamanya abo abaali ni batamufugiirira era ni nooyo owaali nʼaja humulyamo oluhwe.
43006065	Nga geyongera abaloma ati, “Cʼehigira nabaloma ti ŋabula aŋanga ohufugiirira ohutusaho Bbaabba nʼamuŋaaye amaani.”
43006066	Ohuŋwa hulwo bangi hu abeegi babe bamwabulira era balehera aŋo ohugendanga ni naye.
43006067	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abuusa abeegi babe ehumi nʼababiri ati, “Enywe mwesi mwenda hunjabulira?”
43006068	Nga Simooni Peetero amugobolamo ati, “Musengwa, hunaaje ŋeena? Ndiiwe ali nʼebibono ebireeta obulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
43006069	Humanyire era hufugiirira huuti ndiiwe Omwabufu owaŋwa ewa Hatonda.”
43006070	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Si ndiise owabatobola enywe ehumi nʼababiri? Ne mulala hu nywe Sitaani mulamba.”
43006071	(Ehyo gahiroma nʼategeesa Yuda omusaani wa Simooni Yisikaryoti, olwohuba njʼowaali nʼaja ohumulyamo oluhwe wayire nga gaali mulala hu ehumi nʼababiri.)
43007001	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, nga Yesu agenderanga mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya, nʼatambuha huja mu lyʼe Buyudaaya olwohuba Abayudaaya baali basala amagesi ohumwita.
43007002	Aye Embaga yʼAbayudaaya eyi balanga baati Embaga eyʼohuba mu busisira ni yaali ni yiri huupi ohwola,
43007003	ngʼabaganda ba Yesu bamuloma baati, “Koni soonatiine mu twale lyʼe Buyudaaya, abeegi babo bahebonera ebyamaliholiho ebi ohola?
43007004	Koni soomanyire oti hiisi owenda abaatu bamumanye, sigehwehahweha nʼebi ahola? Ngʼolu ohola ebyamaliholiho, leha ehyalo hyosihyosi hihwebonere.”
43007005	Abaganda babe baaloma baatyo olwohuba baali sibafugiirira baati Hatonda njʼowamutuma.
43007006	Olwʼehyo, nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Ehiseera hyange ohyʼohutiina hu Mbaga hihiiri hwola aye eyiri enywe, hiisi hiseera hiba hiraŋi omuutu ohuhola ehi aba ni genda.
43007007	Abaatu sibaŋanga hubacaawa aye ese bacaawa olwohuba mbalomera amazima ti ebibahola bibi.
43007008	Enywe mutiine hu Mbaga, ese sindi hutiinayo hatyane olwohuba ese ebiseera byange ebyʼohutiina eyo bihiiri hwola.”
43007009	Ni gahena ohuloma atyo, nga niye asigalaho enyuma mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya.
43007010	Abaganda babe ni bahena ohutiina hu Mbaga, nga Yesu yeesi alondaho, aye mu ngiso.
43007011	Mu hiseera ehyo, abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya baali bamudaha hu Mbaga, ni bebuusa baati, “Omusinde nago ali ŋe?”
43007012	Ngʼaŋo owaama obumuŋambaho butagiha ohubitabitana mu baatu hu Mbaga. Balala hu bo ni baloma baati, “Omusinde oyo mulaŋi.” Abandi baati, “Bbe, abbaamya abaatu.”
43007013	Aye olwʼohutya abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya abaaliŋo, ŋaŋuma owʼamulomaho ehiitu hyosihyosi mu lwijuuye.
43007014	Aŋa Embaga eŋambira omwamba, Yesu gatiina mu lunya lwa Yekaalu, gatandiha ohusomesa.
43007015	Engeri eyi gasomesamo yeŋunjisa abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya, nga bebuusa baati, “Omusinde oyo, gatusa ŋeena amagesi gano ate nga ko saasomanga mu masomero geefe?”
43007016	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Ebisomesa si byange hu bwange aye byʼoyo owaatuma.
43007017	Hiisi owenda ohuhola ebi Hatonda asiima, aja hutegeera oba ebisomesa biŋwa ewa Hatonda, oba byange hu bwange.
43007018	Hiisi aloma hu lulwe aba geyendulira bibye hu bubwe aye oyo aloma ebyʼoyo owamutuma aba aholerera eŋono lyʼowamutuma era aloma byʼamazima, saaloma byʼobudulingi.
43007019	Kaho Musa sigabaŋa magambi ga Hatonda, ale hu nywe njʼani agaŋamba? Mubanga ni mugaŋamba hani simunesoomera hunjita.”
43007020	Ngʼaŋo ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu himugobolamo hiiti, “Ewe kooji emisambwa jihubandire! Njʼani ali huhwesoomera ohuhwita?”
43007021	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Nahola ehyamaliholiho hirala hyonyene, aye olwohuba nʼahihola lwa Sabbaato, mwesimwesi mwesisimula.
43007022	Cooka olwohuba Musa gabalagira ohuhomola (wayire sihwatagihira hu niye aye hu basehulu benywe), muhomola abaana nʼohu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato.
43007023	Obanga muhomola omwana hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato ohwoseresa amagambi aga baŋa Musa, lwahiina munyiigira olwʼohuŋonehesya erala omuutu hu ludaalo olwa Sabbaato?
43007024	Mulehere aŋo ohusala emisango ni mwema hu bimubona hu mugulu. Hiraŋi ohuŋonia omuutu oyo oba bbe? Musale omusango ogwo bulaŋi hubone.”
43007025	Aŋo paŋa balala hu baatu bomu Yerusaalemu batagihira ohwebuusa baati, “Ono sinje omusinde oyu besoomera ohwita?
43007026	Njʼono ali ŋano mu lwijuuye aye ŋaŋuma ehi bamulomaho. Abatangirisi beefe bahifaanisye baati nje Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu?
43007027	Ne omusinde ono efe humanyire eyi aŋwera, ate nga Kurisito nʼaliija, ŋaŋuma alimanya eyi aliŋwera.”
43007028	Yesu ni gaali nʼahisomehesa mu lunya lwa Yekaalu, ngʼaŋulira ni baloma baatyo. Ngʼaŋo adundaho ejanjaasi alangirira ati, “Wayire muŋeega muuti muumanyire era mumanyire nʼeyi pwera, aye sindi ŋano hu lwange. Hatonda owʼamazima njʼomwene hutuma. Enywe simumumanyire,
43007029	aye ese mumanyire olwohuba nʼaŋwa eyi ali era njʼowaatuma.”
43007030	Balala hu bo ni baŋulira ebyo, nga benda ohumuŋamba aye ŋaŋuma owahihola olwohuba ehiseera hihye ehyʼohufa hyali hihiiri hwola.
43007031	Cooka era bangi mu hibbubbu hyʼabaatu abaaliŋo bafugiirira ebibye, baloma baati, “Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu nʼaliija, alihola obubonero obweŋunjisa obuhira obu ono ahola?”
43007032	Ngʼaŋo Abafalisaayo baŋulira abaatu ni baŋweŋweta ebibono ebyo hu Yesu. Ngʼabatangirisi bʼabasengi batuma abahuumi ba Yekaalu ohumuŋamba.
43007033	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Nja huhena ahamanga hatono ni nenywe, kene nagame eyiri oyo owaatuma.
43007034	Muja hunyendula aye ni mutambona olwohuba simuŋanga huuja eyi ndi hutiina.”
43007035	Ngʼaŋo abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya bebuusa abeene nʼabeene baati, “Omusinde ono genda hutiina ŋeena eyi hutaligobolayo humubona? Genda hutiina asomese Abatali Bayudaaya, eyi baatu beefe basasaanira?
43007036	Ategeesa hi ohuloma ati, ‘Muja hunyendula aye simuja humbona era simuŋanga huuja eyi ndi hutiina?’ ”
43007037	Aŋa Embaga enyinyitirira, hu ludaalo olusembayo, ko njʼoluhirira erala obubbala, Yesu genyoha galangirira ati, “Hiisi oyu enduŋo eruma gaaje eyi ndi, anywe amaaji agaleeta obulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
43007038	Owufugiirira ngʼolu hyaŋandiihiwa hiroma, ‘Esulo ejʼamaaji agaleeta obulamu obutaŋwaŋo jihulumuta ohuŋwa mu mwoyo gugwe.’ ”
43007039	Yesu galoma atyo nʼategeesa Omwoyo Omutukuvu oyu abamufugiirira baali ni baja husuna. Mu hiseera ehyo, baali bahiiri hubaŋa Mwoyo olwohuba Hatonda gaali ahiiri hulamusa Yesu.
43007040	Abaatu ni baŋulira ebibono ebyo, ngʼabalala hu bo baloma baati, “Hituufu ono nje naabbi oyu baaloma baati aja huuja.”
43007041	Ngʼabandi baloma baati, “Ono nje Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu.” Aye abandi nga baloma baati, “Dala oyo oyu bafuujaho amate aŋanga atye ohuŋwa mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya?
43007042	Ehyaŋandiihiwa sihiroma hiiti Kurisito oyu bafuujaho aja huŋwa mu lulyo lwa Dawudi era aliba musaale wʼe Bbeserekemu ehibuga eyi basala Dawudi?”
43007043	Olwʼohutaŋambagana hu bibaali ni baloma hu Yesu, babuhanamo.
43007044	Era abandi baali benda ohumuŋamba aye ŋaŋuma owahihola.
43007045	Abahuumi ba Yekaalu bala ni baagamayo, ngʼabatangirisi bʼabasengi nʼAbafalisaayo bababuusa baati, “Lwahiina simumuŋambe mwamutuleetera?”
43007046	Aye abahuumi abo babagobolamo baati, “Hubaaye sihubonangaho aloma mu ngeri eyeŋunjisa hyʼeyomusinde oyo!”
43007047	NgʼAbafalisaayo babagobolamo baati, “Kaho mwesi ababbaamisye?
43007048	Mwali muweneeho mulala hu fe abatangirisi oba hu Bafalisaayo, afugiirira ebibye?
43007049	Ohutusaho abaatu bano abatamanyire magambi, leha ehiraamo hya Hatonda hibalonde abeene olwʼohuŋuliirisa ebibye!”
43007050	Nga Nekodemu, mulala hu batangirisi abo, owaali nʼatiinire ohwebuusa hu Yesu owiire, ababuusa ati,
43007051	“Kaho amagambi geefe gafugiirira ohusalira omuutu omusango nʼahiiri huŋosya, nʼohufaania ehi aholire?”
43007052	Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Kaho weesi oŋwa mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya, ko olome otyo? Wetegerese mu byaŋandiihiwa, oja hubona oti naabbi oyo saaja huŋwa mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya.”
43007053	Ngʼaŋo hiisi muutu gagamayo ewuwe.
43008001	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, nga Yesu niye atiina hu Lusozi olwʼemisaala ejibalanga baati Emizayiti.
43008002	Ni wahya, nga mu mugamba pwipwipwi gaagamayo mu lunya lwa Yekaalu, era abaatu bangi nga bahumbaana bamweswanigirisa, geehala abasomesa.
43008003	Ngʼaŋo ŋabaaŋo Abafalisaayo nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi aga Hatonda gaŋa Musa, abaŋira omuhasi oyu bagaana lubona nʼahola obuhwedi, nga bamwemeha mu moni jʼabaatu.
43008004	Nga baloma Yesu baati, “Musomesa, omuhasi ono bamwageene lubona nʼahola obuhwedi.
43008005	Amagambi aga baŋa Musa, gatulagira ohuhubba abahasi hyʼono amabaale. Ne ewe oloma otye?”
43008006	Ehyo bahiroma ni bamuhema, ko basune ehyohweŋambya ohumuŋaŋabira mu bʼobuŋangi. Aye Yesu geenama, gaŋandiiha ŋaasi nʼolwala lulwe.
43008007	Ni beyongera ohumusooseha ebibuuso, Yesu gagangamusa omutwe, gabaloma ati, “Hu enywe, atabbengangaho abe njʼoweheerera ohumuhubba ebaale.”
43008008	Nga nindi genamirira, aŋandiiha ŋaasi.
43008009	Ni baŋulira ebibono ebyo, nga batandiha ohunyololohaŋo hyamulala mulala, ni basookera hu bahulu mu myaha ohwola olu baŋwesa balehaŋo Yesu nʼomuhasi nʼahyemereeye aŋo.
43008010	Nga Yesu gemeerera, amuloma ati, “Muhasi ewe, koni ababaaye ni bahuŋaŋabira bali ŋeena? Oti hani eŋuma ahusaliiye omusango?”
43008011	Ngʼaŋo omuhasi oyo amugobolamo ati, “Muhulu, ŋabula.” Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Keesi sikusalira. Ale tiina aye ohuŋwa olwa leero omanya otagobolaho hubbenga.”
43008012	Yesu ni gaali nʼaloma nʼabaatu nindi, gabaloma ati, “Ndiise enjase emulihira abaatu. Era hiisi afuuha omuloobera wange, saaja hugenderanga mu hiirema aye nja humuluŋamyanga mu ngira eyireeta obulamu obutaŋwaŋo.”
43008013	NgʼAbafalisaayo bamuloma baati, “Olwohuba oli hweromaho wamwene, sihuŋanga hufugiirira ebi oloma.”
43008014	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Wayire neeromaho samwene, ebindoma byʼamazima, olwohuba manyire eyi naŋwa era nʼeyi ndi hutiina. Aye enywe simumanyire eyi nʼaŋwa wayire eyi ndi hutiina.
43008015	Musala omusango ngʼolu muba ni mubona hu mugulu, aye ese sisalira muutu yesiyesi musango.
43008016	Aye singa sala omusango, esala yange yʼamazima, olwohuba sindi seŋene, ndi ni Bbaabba owaatuma.
43008017	Hyaŋandiihiwa mu magambi genywe hiiti obujulizi owʼabaatu babiri ni buba cʼehyene wuba wʼamazima.
43008018	Ese neromaho era omujulizi wange obundi nje Bbaabba owaatuma.”
43008019	Ngʼaŋo bamubuusa baati, “Lataawo ali ŋeena?” Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Ese ni Bbaabba, simutumanyire. Mubanga ni mumanyire ese, Bbaabba yeesi mwahali mumumanyire.”
43008020	Yesu galoma ebibono ebyo nʼasomesa mu lunya lwa Yekaalu ohuupi nʼehifo aŋa baŋeera ebirabo. Aye ŋaŋuma owamuŋamba, olwohuba ehiseera hihye hyali hihiiri hwola.
43008021	Nga nindi Yesu abaloma ati, “Ndi hutiina era muliikeja aye simulimbona era mulifiira mu hibi hyenywe ni batabasoniŋire. Ate nga eyi ndi hutiina, simuŋanga hwolayo.”
43008022	Endoma eyo yaleetera Abayudaaya ohwebuusa baati, “Aja hweyita, cʼehigira aloma ati, ‘Eyi ndi hutiina, simuŋanga hwolayo?’ ”
43008023	Aye Yesu geyongera ohuloma ati, “Enywe muli bahu hyalo huno aye ese pwera mwigulu. Enywe muli bahu hyalo huno, aye ese sindi.
43008024	Cʼehigira mbalomeeye ti mu butuufu obwene mulifiira mu bibi byenywe, singa simufugiirira ebipambaho.”
43008025	Nga bamubuusa baati, “Weranga ani?” Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Ese ndiise oyu mbalomeeye oludaayi.
43008026	Ndi nʼebingi ebyʼohubalomaho ebibasalira omusango aye oyo owaatuma wʼamazima ebi gandoma, keesi mbebi ndomera abaatu.”
43008027	Sibategeera baati Yesu gaali aloma hu Hatonda Semwana.
43008028	Ngʼaŋo aloma abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya abo ati, “Ni munahahene ohuŋaniha Omwana wʼOmuutu hu musalabba, nga ko mumanya muuti ndiise oyu mbalomera ohuba. Era ŋaŋuma ese ehi kola hu wange aye ndoma ehi Bbaabba aba ni gandomire.
43008029	Era oyo owaatuma ali ni neese, siganjabulirangaho olwohuba hiisi ludaalo kola ebi asiima.”
43008030	Yesu ni gaali nʼahiiroma ebibono ebyo, abaatu bangi bamufugiirira.
43008031	Nga Yesu aloma Abayudaaya abaali ni bamufugiiriramo ati, “Singa mweyongera ohugondera esomesa yange, muba baloobera bange abatuufu.
43008032	Mulimanya amazima agaŋamba hu Hatonda era ali bafuula badembe.”
43008033	Nga nibo bamugobolamo baati, “Huli bejuhulu ba Yibbulayimu era sihubangaho beedu bʼomuutu yesiyesi. Oŋanga otye ohuloma oti, ‘Alitufuula bʼedembe?’ ”
43008034	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Mbalomera ehituufu ti, hiisi ahola ehibi, aba mwidu wʼehibi era aŋuma bulomero.
43008035	Omwidu saaba mulala hu baatu bomu mago ohutusaho omwana wamwo njʼaba owamwo emirembe nʼemirembe.
43008036	Olwʼehyo Omwana wa Hatonda anabatusa mu wiidu mufuuhira erala baatu ba Hatonda.
43008037	Mweranga bejuhulu ba Yibbulayimu, cooka munesoomera ohunjita, olwohuba simufugiirira ebisomesa.
43008038	Mbalomera ebi naŋulira ohuŋwa ewa Bbaabba era mwesi muhola ebi laata yenywe abaloma ohuhola.”
43008039	Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Efe, Yibbulayimu nje sehulu yeefe.” Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Mubanga ni muli bejuhulu ba Yibbulayimu, mwahali muhola ebi gaholanga.
43008040	Aye olwohuba simuli, cʼehifa munesoomera ohunjita, ese abalomera amazima aga nasuna ohuŋwa ewa Hatonda. Yibbulayimu oyu mwesidihireho ohuba senywe sigaholanga atyo.
43008041	Muhola ebi senywe ahola.” Aye nibo nga bamugobolamo baati, “Efe sihuli baana abatali bamu lunya. Huli ni Seefe mulala yeeka, nje Hatonda.”
43008042	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Hatonda abanga nʼali nje Senywe, mwahali munyenda olwohuba naŋwa yiwa Hatonda ko naaja, era sinaaja hu wange, aye niye omwene njʼowaatuma.
43008043	Lwahiina simutegeera ebindoma? Simubitegeera olwohuba simwenda huhola ebi mbasomesa.
43008044	Senywe nje Sitaani, era mwenda ohuhola ebyo ebi senywe genda. Ohuŋwera erala mu hutandiha hwʼehyalo, omulimo gugwe gwʼohwiita olwohuba aŋumaamo mazima. Era ohuloma ebyʼobudulingi, eyo kola yiye ohuŋwa ahale nahale olwohuba mudulingi era njʼasaala obudulingi.
43008045	Aye olwohuba ese ndoma amazima, simufugiirira ebindoma.”
43008046	“Njʼani hu enywe aŋanga ohundumirisa ati ndi nʼehibi ehi kola? Obanga ndoma amazima aye lwahiina simufugiirira?
43008047	Omuutu wa Hatonda, aŋuliirisa ebibono bibye. Aye enywe mugaana ohumufugiirira olwohuba simuli babe.”
43008048	Ngʼabatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya bagobola mu Yesu baati, “Sihuli batuufu ohuloma huuti oli hyʼOmusamaliya, sooli mulala hu fe era emisambwa jihubandire?”
43008049	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Ese mbulaho musambwa ohutusaho pa Bbaabba eŋono, ne enywe mumbisyamo emoni.
43008050	Ese sikolerera muutu huupa ŋono aye oyo aliipa aliyo era njʼowabulaŋo omutuufu ŋagati wese ni nenywe.
43008051	Mbalomera ehituufu ti, hiisi aŋamba ehibono hyange saalifa emirembe nʼemirembe.”
43008052	Ngʼabatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya nibo bamuloma baati, “Ŋaahani hufaanisye huuti sooli bwereere. Emisambwa jihubandire. Yibbulayimu nʼabanaabbi, baafa aye oli ŋano odafaaya oti, ‘Hiisi aŋamba ehibono hihyo, saalifa emirembe nʼemirembe.
43008053	Ohira Yibbulayimu sehulu yeefe nʼabanaabbi abaafa?’ Weranga ndiiwe ani?”
43008054	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Nimba ni nepaaha, ebinepaaha biba biŋuma mahulu. Ese obungulumisa nje Bbaabba, enywe oyu muloma mbo muuti nje Hatonda wenywe.
43008055	Wayire enywe simumumanyire aye ese mumanyire. Era singa ndoma ti, ‘Simumanyire, nahabaaye mudulingi hyenywe. Ese mumanyire era ngondera ehibono hihye.’
43008056	Sehulu yenywe oyo Yibbulayimu ni gamanya ati baali baja huutuma niije hu hyalo huno, gaali nʼohwehoya era ni galengera nʼemoni ejʼomwoyo oludaalo lwʼohuuja hwange, gaali musangaafu.”
43008057	Ngʼabatangirisi abo bamuloma baati, “Ewe ataŋesa myaha ataanu, sehulu yeefe Yibbulayimu, wamubonera ŋeena?”
43008058	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Mbalomera ehituufu ti, Yibbulayimu gaali ahiiri husaaliwa, Ese ni ndiŋo.”
43008059	Ni baŋulira ehyo, nga baŋamba amabaale ohuhubba Yesu aye niye ngʼaba naŋageŋogoma ngʼahena abanyololohaho aŋwa mu lunya lwa Yekaalu, atiina.
43009001	Yesu ni gaali nʼagenda nʼabeegi babe, ngʼabona omusinde oyu basaala nʼali muŋofu.
43009002	Ngʼabeegi babe bamubuusa baati, “Musomesa, njʼani owabbenga ko hireetere ono ohumusaala nʼali muŋofu, basaaye babe oba mwene?”
43009003	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Hu musinde ono nʼabasaaye babe, ŋabula owabbenga ko asaaliwe atyo, aye Hatonda omwene njʼowagera olwʼohwenda ohulaga obuŋangi buwe.
43009004	Ni guhiiri muusi, huli nʼohuhola emirimo jʼoyo owaatuma. Esaawa yinahoole ehiirema hyaŋamba omuutu nʼatasobola hutamba.
43009005	Ni kiiri hu hyalo huno, ndiise enjase emulihira abaatu.”
43009006	Ni gahena ohuloma atyo, ngʼafuuja amate ŋaasi, afuta eroba ngʼahena alita hu biginye byʼemoni jʼomusinde oyo.
43009007	Ngʼamuloma ati, “Tiina osaabe mu moni mu hidiba ehi balanga baati Silowaamu” amahulu gahyo ti “Oyu baatuma.” Ngʼomusinde oyo atiina asaaba mu moni ngʼolu bamulomire, ngʼagagama engo nʼabona.
43009008	Abaliranwa babe nʼabaatu abandi abamubonanga nʼasungirisa, nga bebuusa baati, “Ono sinje omusinde abayenga ni geehala nʼasungirisa?”
43009009	Ngʼabalala hu bo baloma baati, “Nje niye” aye abandi baati, “Bbe, amufaana humufaana.” Ne niye omwene ngʼahahasa ati, “Ndiise.”
43009010	Ngʼaŋo bamubuusa baati, “Tulomere, emoni jibaaye jiitye ko otagihe ohubona?”
43009011	Ngʼabagobolamo ati, “Omusinde oyu balanga baati Yesu afutire eroba, nga gaata hu biginye byʼemoni, ngʼahena gandoma ati, ‘Tiina hu hidiba Silowaamu osaabe mu moni. Ngʼaŋo tiina saaba, ngʼemoni jiguha tandiiha ohubona.’ ”
43009012	Nga bamubuusa baati, “Omusinde oyo ali ŋeena?” Ngʼabagobolamo ati, “Simanyire eyi ali.”
43009013	Ngʼaŋo batiina nʼomusinde oyo owaali omuŋofu eyiri Abafalisaayo.
43009014	Ŋaahani, hu ludaalo olu Yesu gaafuta eroba gaŋaha hu biginye byʼemoni jʼomusinde oyo gamuŋonia, lwali lwa Sabbaato.
43009015	Ehyo hyaleetera Abafalisaayo boosi ohubuusa omusinde oyo owaali omuŋofu engeri eyi aŋoniremo. Ngʼabalomera ati, “Yesu gataaye eroba hu biginye byʼemoni, nga kena saaba, era ŋaahani mbona.”
43009016	Nga balala hu bʼAbafalisaayo baloma baati, “Hatonda sinje owatuma omusinde oyo, olwohuba gahali ahuuma amagambi ga Sabbaato.” Aye ngʼabandi babuusa baati, “Omubbengi asobola atye ohuhola obubonero obwʼeŋunjisa hyobuno?” Nga babuhanamo abeene nʼabeene.
43009017	Ehyaŋwamo, nga bacuuhira omusinde oyo owaali omuŋofu bamuloma baati, “Ewe, tulomere, ahuŋonisye omulomaho otye?” Ngʼabagobolamo ati, “Omusinde oyo, naabbi.”
43009018	Aye abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya abo sibafugiirira baati omusinde oyo gaali muŋofu ko gaaŋona, ohwosa olu batumisa abasaaye babe.
43009019	Abasaaye babe ni boola, ngʼabatangirisi abo bababuusa baati, “Mbo ono mwana wenywe? Mbo mwamusaala nʼali muŋofu? Obanga hituufu mwamusaala nʼali muŋofu, abitire atye ohuba ti ŋaahani abona?”
43009020	Ngʼabasaaye babe babagobolamo baati, “Humanyire huuti oyo mwana weefe era hwamusaala nʼali muŋofu.
43009021	Aye efe sihumanyire ehimuleeteeye ohuŋona. Ngʼolu ali muhulu mu myaha asobola ohweromaho, mumubuuse omwene abalomere.”
43009022	Abasaaye babe baloma baatyo olwʼohutya abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya. Olwohuba baali basalireŋo baati mbo hiisi afugiirira ati Yesu nje Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu, bamubbinge mu humbaaniro lyawe.
43009023	Ehyo njʼehyaŋwaho abasaaye babe ohuloma baati, “Omwene muutu muhulu, mumubuuse.”
43009024	Nga nindi omulundi ogwohubiri baloma omusinde oyo owaali omuŋofu baati, “Loma amazima mu moni ja Hatonda. Humanyire huuti oyo ahuŋonisye mubbengi.”
43009025	Nga niye abagobolamo ati, “Simanyire oba mubbengi oba bbe. Manyire hirala ti nʼali muŋofu aye ŋaahani mbona.”
43009026	Ngʼaŋo abatangirisi abo bamubuusa baati, “Kaho olomire oti aholire atye? Aholire hiina ko ahuŋone emoni?”
43009027	Nga niye abagobolamo ati, “Mbalomeeye hale. Ndimuŋulira? Lwahiina mwenda mbalomere nindi? Mwesi mwenda hufuuha baloobera babe?”
43009028	Nga bala bamuduha, bahena bamuloma baati, “Ewe ndiiwe omuloobera wʼomuutu hyʼoyo. Efe huli baloobera ba Musa.
43009029	Humanyire huuti Hatonda galoma ni Musa. Aye oyo, sihumanyire nʼeyaŋwera.”
43009030	Ngʼomusinde oyo abagobolamo ati, “E! Ehyo hyeŋunjisa! Simumanyire nʼeyi aŋwera ate nga ese gandeteeye ohubona!
43009031	Humanyire huuti Hatonda saaŋulirisa esaala jʼababbengi aye aŋulira ejʼabo abamuŋa eŋono era abahola ebi genda.
43009032	Ohuŋwa hu tandiiha yʼehyalo ohwola hatyane, ŋaŋuma owaali nʼaweeneho omuutu owaali nʼaleeteeye oyo oyu basaaye nʼali muŋofu, ohubona.
43009033	Hatonda abanga sinje owatuma omusinde oyo ohuhola ebyo ebi ahola, hani sigahaŋangire huhola hiitu hyosihyosi.”
43009034	Ni baŋulira ebibono ebyo, nga bamuloma baati, “Ko ewe weesi oyu basaalira mu hibi, osomesa njʼani?” Nga bahena bamubbinga mu humbaaniro lyabwe.
43009035	Nga Yesu aŋulira ati abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya babbingire omusinde oyo oyu gaŋonia, mu humbaaniro. Ngʼatiina amwendula, ni gamwagaana ngʼamubuusa ati, “Ofugiirira Omwana wʼOmuutu oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu?”
43009036	Ngʼomusinde oyo amugobolamo ati, “Muhulu, Omwana wʼOmuutu oyo njʼani nahamufugiirira?”
43009037	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Ohenire ohumubona. Olwohuba njʼono ali huloma ni neewe.”
43009038	Ngʼaŋo omusinde oyo aloma ati, “Musengwa, fugiirira.” Ngʼahena amujumirya.
43009039	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Naaja mu hyalo lwʼohuta ebibi byʼabaatu aŋalafu. Ko hibe ti abaŋofu batandiha ohubona ni naabo aberanga ohuba ti babona bahifaanie baati baŋofu.”
43009040	Nga balala hu Bafalisaayo abaali ohuupi ni naye, bamuŋulira nʼaloma atyo, nga bamubuusa baati, “Olomire otye? Ehi oloma hwesi huli baŋofu?”
43009041	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Mubanga ni muli baŋofu, mwahaŋumire hibi. Aye ŋaahani ngʼolu muŋeega muuti emoni jenywe jibona, simuŋanga hwefihulaho omusango.”
43010001	Ngʼaŋo Yesu geyongera abaloma ati, “Mbalomera ehituufu ti, omuutu atabitira mu mulyango ohwingira mu lugo lwʼetaama, ne gabbwaga hubbwaga aŋaatu aŋandi ko gengira, oyo aba mwibi era mukondo.
43010002	Omuutu owingirira mu mulyango, njʼomwayi wʼetaama.
43010003	Ni goola hu mulyango gwʼolugo, omuhuumi amwiguliraŋo ngʼomwayi oyo alangamo etaama jije. Era jiŋulira ejanjaasi lirye ngʼajitusa ebulafu.
43010004	Nʼahena ohujitusa josijosi, atangiramo era jimulondaho olwohuba jitegeera ejanjaasi lirye.
43010005	Aye omuutu owundi sijimulondaho kadi, jimuduluma olwohuba jiba sijifaania janjaasi lirye.”
43010006	Yesu galomera abaatu abaaliŋo olugero olwo aye nibo sibategeera ehi gaali nʼaloma.
43010007	Olwʼehyo, nga nindi Yesu abaloma ati, “Mbalomera ehituufu ti, Ndiise omulyango omu taama jingirira era jatula mu lugo.
43010008	Abo bosibosi abaaja, ese ni kiiri huuja baali beebi era bakondo aye ngʼolu taama jitaŋulirisa oyo oyu jitamanyire, boosi abaatu sibabaŋulirisa.
43010009	Ndiise omulyango era hiisi abitira mu ese alinoŋoha. Oyo aba hyʼetaama eyingira era yaatula, ngʼesuna ehyʼohulya.
43010010	Omwibi gajirira hwiba nʼohwita nʼohusihiirisa aye ese naaja etaama jange jibe nʼobulamu obwijuuye esangaalo nʼemiyaaya.”
43010011	Nga Yesu geyongera ohuloma ati, “Ndiise omwayi wʼetaama omulaŋi, aŋayo obulamu buwe hu lwʼetaama.
43010012	Omwayi owemerera omuhemba, saaba oti mwene etaama ejo era nʼabona nalaŋa ni gaaja, aduluma gajirehaŋo, nga nalaŋa ajigwamo aŋambaaho ndala ngʼejindi jisalaaniha.
43010013	Omuutu hyʼoyo adulumaŋo olwohuba aba gemeerera muhemba, olwʼehyo saafayo hutaasa taama ejo.
43010014	“Ne ese Ndiise omwayi owʼetaama omulaŋi, manyire etaama jange era joosi jiimanyire.
43010015	Mu ngeri njʼenyene Bbaabba gamanyire era keesi mumanyire, paayo obulamu bwange ohufiirira etaama jange.
43010016	Era ndi nʼetaama ejindi ejitali mu lugo luno era joosi ndi nʼohujireeta. Joosi jija huŋuliirisa ejanjaasi lyange era lube lugo lulala ni jiri nʼomwayi mulala.
43010017	“Ehigira Bbaabba ni ganyenda, paayo obulamu bwange ohufiirira etaama, ko kene mbwegobohese.
43010018	Ŋabula muutu abuutusaho, aye samwene mbuŋayo olwʼohwenda hwange. Era ndi nʼobuŋangi ohubuŋayo banjita nʼahena nawegobohesa. Ehyo njʼehi Bbaabba gandagira ohuhola.”
43010019	Ebibono ebyo, byaleetera abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya nindi ohwabuhanamo abeene nʼabeene.
43010020	Era bangi hu bo baaloma baati, “Oyo emisambwa jimubandire era aguuye eralu. Lwahiina muŋulirisa omuutu hyʼoyo?”
43010021	Aye abandi nga baloma baati, “Ebibono ebyo si byʼomuutu oyu emisambwa jibandire olwohuba omusambwa sigusobola huŋonia omuŋofu.”
43010022	Oluvanyuma, mu Yerusaalemu nga ŋabaaŋo Embaga eyʼOhuhebuliriraho Ohuŋonga e Yekaalu eyiri Hatonda. Ehiseera ehyo hyali hya puuji nʼobuŋololohi bubitiirifu,
43010023	era Yesu gaali ali hugenda mu lunya lwa Yekaalu mu hifo ehi balanga baati, “Ehigangu hya Sulemaani.”
43010024	Ngʼabatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya batiina bahumbaana aŋa gaali beema bamweswanigirisa, bamubuusa baati, “Olihyosa ŋe ohutatulomera ehituufu? Tulomere, nʼoba nʼoli ndiiwe Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu.”
43010025	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Nabalomera hale, aye simufugiirira. Ebyamaliholiho ebi kola mu buŋangi wa Bbaabba biraga ehyo ehi ndi.
43010026	Aye enywe simufugiirira, olwohuba simuli baatu bange.
43010027	Ngʼolu taama jiŋulira omwayi waajo, nʼabaatu bange boosi baŋulira ebyange. Era mbamanyire.
43010028	Sibaja husihiiriha olwohuba mbaŋa obulamu obutaŋwaŋo era ŋabula aŋanga ohubanyagulaho.
43010029	Bbaabba owabaapa, ahira bosibosi obuŋangi era ŋabula asobola ohubamunyagulaho.
43010030	Ese ni Bbaabba huli bulala.”
43010031	Nga nindi abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya baŋamba amabaale ohuhubba Yesu.
43010032	Aye Yesu gabaloma ati, “Kolire ebyamaliholiho bingi era ebyʼamaani mu buŋangi wa Bbaabba. Hiriŋe hu bindomire ehi muŋwaho ohwenda ohukubba amabaale?”
43010033	NgʼAbayudaaya abo bamugobolamo baati, “Sihwenda huhubba amabaale olwʼebyamaliholiho ebi ohola, aye lwʼohufodogola Hatonda. Olwohuba ewe omuutu buutu oŋanga otye ohweranga Hatonda?”
43010034	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Sihyaŋandiihiwa mu magambi genywe hiiti, ‘Muli bahatonda?’
43010035	Obanga galanga abaatu abo aba baŋa ehibono hihye ati bahatonda, ate ebyaŋandiihiwa bisigala ni biri bituufu,
43010036	ne baati oyo oyu Bbaabba gatobola, gamwabula gahena gamutuma mu hyalo? Lwahiina muloma muuti ese fodogola, olwʼohuloma ti ‘ndi Mwana wa Hatonda?
43010037	Nimba ni tahola ebi Bbaabba ahola, mutafugiirira.
43010038	Ne nimba ni kola ebi Bbaabba ahola, wayire simufugiirira ebyange, mwahali mufugiirira olwʼebyamaliholiho ebi kola, mwahamanya era mwategeera muuti Bbaabba ali mu ese era keesi ndi mu Bbaabba.’ ”
43010039	Nga nindi bagesyaho bamuŋambe, aye gabeŋunula ngʼaŋwaŋo.
43010040	Ngʼaŋo Yesu gambuha olwabi Yoludaani, atiina mu hifo omu Yowaane gabatihizanga. Ngʼaba eyo ohuhena ahamanga,
43010041	era abaatu bangi batiinangayo. Ni boola baaloma baati, “Wayire Yowaane sigahola bubonero obweŋunjisa, aye byosibyosi ebi galoma hu musinde ono, bituufu.”
43010042	Era mu hifo ehyo, bangi bafugiirira Yesu.
43011001	Olwola, ngʼomusinde oyu balanganga baati Lazaalo, alwala. Omusinde oyo gaali wʼomu habuga aha balanga baati Bbesaniya eyi Malyamu ni Maliza, ababoojo babe bamenyanga.
43011002	Malyamu oyo, njʼowaali mboojo ya Lazaalo owaali omulwaye era njʼowaŋaha Yesu Musengwa amafuta agʼahaloosa hu magulu ngʼahena amusiimuula nʼatambisa efiiri lirye.
43011003	Ngʼaŋo ababoojo babe abo, bamutumira obuhwenda ni bamuloma baati, “Musengwa, meriiwo mulwaye.”
43011004	Yesu ni gaŋulira ehiitu ehyo, galoma abeegi babe ati, “Obulwaye obwo si bwa humuŋweramo hufa bbe, aye hugera hwa Hatonda, ko abaatu bahaŋa Omwana wuwe eŋono.”
43011005	Yesu gaali meeri ya Lazaalo ni Maliza ni Malyamu.
43011006	Aye niye ni gaŋulira ati Lazaalo mulwaye, geyongera ohuba eyi gaali endaalo ejindi ebiri.
43011007	Oluvanyuma ngʼaloma abeegi babe ati, “Hwagameyo mu twale lyʼe Buyudaaya.”
43011008	Nga beegi babe bamuloma baati, “Musomesa, ejuusijuusi ŋano, abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya baali benda huhuhubba amabaale, nindi njʼeyi wenda ohwagama?”
43011009	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Omuusi sigulimo esaawa ehumi nʼebiri? Agenda omuusi sigegumula olwohuba enjase eyʼomu hyalo muno emumulihira.
43011010	Aye oyo agenda owiire, njʼowegumula, olwohuba aba aŋuma enjase eyʼohumumulihira.”
43011011	Ni gahena ohuloma atyo, ngʼabaloma ati, “Meeri yeefe Lazaalo ali huŋenyuha, aye ndi hutiinayo musisimuse.”
43011012	Ngʼaŋo abeegi babe bamugobolamo baati, “Musengwa, nʼaba nʼaŋenyuha aba anaabeho bulaŋi.”
43011013	Yesu gaali aloma nʼabbumbirya ne nʼategeesa ati Lazaalo gaali afuuye. Cooka abeegi babe nibo ni baŋeega baati ali hutegeesa huŋenyuha ero.
43011014	Ngʼaŋo Yesu ahanda abalomera nʼatabbumbirya ati, “Lazaalo mufu.
43011015	Aye hu lwenywe hiraŋi ti sinaaliyo, mwahafugiirira. Ale hutiineyo.”
43011016	Ngʼaŋo Tomasi oyu balanga baati Didimo, aloma abeegi bahye ati, “Leha hwesi hutiine hufiire ŋalala ni naye.”
43011017	Yesu ni goola, gagaana Lazaalo nʼahenire endaalo ene e magombe.
43011018	Ahabuga Bbesaniya haali huupi nʼe Yerusaalemu, emayiro ngʼebiri.
43011019	Era Abayudaaya bangi baali batiinire ohulirisaho Maliza ni Malyamu olwʼohufiirwa mboojo yaawe.
43011020	Maliza ni gaŋulira ati Yesu gaali gaaja, gatula ngʼatiina ohumusangaalira, Malyamu niye gasigala mu nyumba.
43011021	Maliza ni goola aŋa Yesu gaali ngʼamuloma ati, “Musengwa, obanga ni waali ŋano, hani mboojo yange sigahafuuye!
43011022	Aye manyire ti nʼaŋandomera ŋano, Hatonda anahuŋe hiisi ehi onamusunge.”
43011023	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “mboojoyo aja hulamuha.”
43011024	Nga Maliza amugobolamo ati, “Manyire ti aliramuha hu ludaalo olwʼekomerero.”
43011025	Ngʼaŋo Yesu amuloma ati, “Ndiise alamusa abaatu era abaŋa obulamu. Hiisi owufugiirira aja huba mulamu wayire aliba afuuye.
43011026	Era hiisi omulamu owufugiirira, saalifa emirembe nʼemirembe. Ehyo ohifugiirira?”
43011027	Nga Maliza amugobolamo ati, “Hituufu Musengwa, fugiirira ti ndiiwe Kurisito Omwana wa Hatonda, oyu gafuujaho amate ohuuja ohunoŋola abaatu mu hyalo.”
43011028	Maliza ni gahena ohuloma atyo, nga gagamayo alanga mugandaawe Malyamu hutulo amuloma ati, “Omusomesa, golire era ahulanga.”
43011029	Malyamu ni gaŋulira, nga genyoheramo atiinayo.
43011030	Ŋaahani Yesu gaali ahiiri hwola mu hitahere omu bafiire bamenyanga aye nʼahiiri aŋa Maliza gamwagaana.
43011031	Abayudaaya abaali ni Malyamu mu nyumba ni bamusaasira obutahi, ni babona ni genyoha mangu mangu ohutula ebulafu, nga boosi bamulondaho. Baali baŋeega baati gaali atiina hu higombe ohulirira eyo.
43011032	Malyamu ni goola mu hifo aŋa Yesu gaali, gahubba amafuha ngʼahena amuloma ati, “Musengwa, obanga ni waali ŋano hani mboojo yange sigahafuuye!”
43011033	Yesu ni gabona Malyamu nʼalira era nʼAbayudaaya abaaja ni naye boosi ni bali hulira, gaŋulira ohulumwa era enaku yamwijula hu mwoyo.
43011034	Ngʼababuusa ati, “Mwamuta ŋeena?” Nga bamuloma baati, “Musengwa, nja hutiine obone.”
43011035	Ngʼaŋo Yesu alira.
43011036	Nga balala hu batangirisi bʼAbayudaaya baloma abeene nʼabeene baati, “Mubone ngʼolu abaaye nʼamwenda!”
43011037	Aye ngʼabandi baloma baati, “Obanga gagira omusinde omuŋofu gaabona, hani sigaŋonisye Lazaalo ohufa?”
43011038	Enaku ni ŋambire Yesu, gaatiina goola hu higombe. Era ehigombe ehyo yaali pungulu, ni begaliyeŋo ebaale.
43011039	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Mutuseŋo ebaale.” Nga Maliza, mboojo yʼomufu, amuloma ati, “Musengwa, ŋaahani aŋunya olwohuba ahenireemo endaalo ene!”
43011040	Ngʼaŋo Yesu amuloma ati, “Sikulome ti nʼonafugiirire, onabone ngʼolu Hatonda ali nʼobuŋangi?”
43011041	Nga batusaŋo ebaale eryo. Ngʼaŋo Yesu aheja ŋamugulu aloma ati, “Bbaabba, kweyaasa olwohuba bupuliiye.
43011042	Ese manyire ti bupulira habuhyabuhya, aye ndomire hino olwʼabaatu abali ŋano, ko bahafugiirira baati waatuma.”
43011043	Yesu ni gahena ohuloma atyo, ngʼalanga nʼejanjaasi eryʼamaani ati, “Lazaalo, tula wuuje!”
43011044	Ngʼaŋo omufu aŋwayo, nʼengoye eja laasi ko nʼolundi mu moni eji bamusiihamo ni jihyefumbiiye hu magulu nʼemihono. Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Mumufumbululeho engoye ejo, mumulehe atiine.”
43011045	Olwʼehyo, bangi hu Bayudaaya abaali ni baajire ohulirisa Malyamu, ni baabona ehi Yesu gaahola, nga bamutamo obwesige.
43011046	Aye balala hu bo batiina eyiri Abafalisaayo, nga babalomera ehi Yesu gaali nʼaholire.
43011047	Ngʼaŋo abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼAbafalisaayo beehasa Oluhiiho lwʼAbayudaaya Olubbala bateesa abeene nʼabeene baati, “Huhole hi? Omuutu ono ahola obubonero obweŋunjisa bungi.
43011048	Ni hunaalehe omusinde ono ohutiina mu moni nʼasomesa atyo, Abayudaaya bangi baja humufugiirira baati mbo njʼomununusi. Olwʼehyo, Abarooma baja hutuwaagala basihiirise Yekaalu nʼegwanga lwefe!”
43011049	Ngʼaŋo mulala hu bo, oyu balanganga baati Kayaafa, owaali Omuhulu wʼabasengi ba Hatonda omwaha ogwo abaloma ati, “Enywe, ŋaŋuma ehi mumanyire hu bitiina mu moni.
43011050	Simuhifaania muuti hiraŋi omuutu mulala ohufiirira abaatu ohuhira bosibosi ohusihiiriha?”
43011051	Ehyo, Kayaafa sigahiroma hu lulwe, aye ngʼolu gaali Muhulu wʼabasengi omwaha ogwo, gaŋa obunaabbi ati Yesu aja hufiirira Abayudaaya.
43011052	Nindi si gwanga lyʼAbayudaaya lino lyoŋene, aye nʼohuhumbaania abaatu ba Hatonda abasasaana.
43011053	Era ohuŋwa hu ludaalo olwo, nga beehobana ohwita Yesu.
43011054	Olwʼehyo Yesu galeheraŋo ohugendanga lubona mu Bayudaaya. Ngʼaŋwayo atiina mu haalo ohulirihana olulafu, mu hitahere ehi balanga baati Efurayimu, eyi gaali nʼabeegi babe.
43011055	Embaga yʼAbayudaaya eyʼOhuhebuliriraho Ohubihisya ni yaali nʼenaatere ohwola, abaatu bangi baŋwa mu byalo, batiina e Yerusaalemu hu mukolo ogwʼohwegwalaasa ko Embaga eyo, yoole.
43011056	Ni baali ni bahiiri eyo beyongera ohuhejaheja ni bendula Yesu ŋano ni naŋala era ni baali ni bali mu lunya lwa Yekaalu bebuusa abeene nʼabeene baati, “Muŋeega muutye, aŋangire ohutaaja hu Mbaga?”
43011057	Ehyo hyali hiityo olwohuba Abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼAbafalisaayo baali balagiiye baati singa ŋabaŋo amanyire aŋa Yesu ali, abebireho ahaama, bamuŋambe.
43012001	Ni yaali nʼebulayo endaalo mukaaga ko Embaga eyʼOhuhebuliriraho Ohubihisya yoole, nga Yesu atiina mu hibuga Bbesaniya, eyi omusinde oyu balanga baati Lazaalo oyu galamusa, gamenyanga.
43012002	Nga ŋabaŋo balala hu baatu abomu hibuga omwo abategehera Yesu ehiiŋulo. Maliza gayeeda mu hwiŋula ne Lazaalo gaali mulala hu abo abaali ni behaaye ni Yesu hu hiiŋulo ni balya.
43012003	Ngʼaŋo Malyamu atusaayo ecupa eyʼamafuta amalaŋi agʼebbeeyi obugali era agʼahaloosa ahʼamaani aga balanga baati narudo. Ngʼagajuha hu magulu ga Yesu ahena atambisa efiiri lirye ohumusiimuula. Ngʼahaloosa hahwana enyumba yosiyosi.
43012004	Aye mulala hu beegi ba Yesu, oyu balanga baati Yuda Yisikaryoti era owaali nʼaja humulyamo oluhwe ngʼaloma ati,
43012005	“Lwahiina sibatunde amafuta ago edinaari ebihumi bidatu baŋamba ebbeesa ejo bajigabira abagadi?”
43012006	Sigaloma atyo olwohuba gaali afaayo hu bagadi aye olwohuba gaali muŋanika waawe, era nʼatambisangaho ebbeesa ejindi mu kweho.
43012007	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Lwahiina mumwoloobya? Mumulehe, olwohuba amafuta ago gagabihire, bagatambise mu huusiiha.
43012008	Munaabenga nʼabagadi habuhyabuhya. Era hiisi olu munendenga munabayeedenga. Aye ese sinja huba ni nenywe ehiseera hyosihyosi.”
43012009	Mu hiseera ehyo, Abayudaaya bangi bategeera baati Yesu gaali e Bbesaniya. Era batiina silwa niye yʼeŋeene aye nʼohwebonera Lazaalo, oyu galamusa.
43012010	Ngʼabatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda basala amagesi ohwita Lazaalo yeesi.
43012011	Era olwʼohulamuha huhwe, Abayudaaya bangi baali bali hubaŋwangaho ni batiina eyiri Yesu era ni bamutamo obwesige.
43012012	Oludaalo olwalondaho, ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ehyali ni hitiinire e Yerusaalemu hu Mbaga eyʼOhuhebuliriraho Ohubihisya, hyaŋulira hiiti Yesu aŋambire engira atiinayo.
43012013	Nga baŋamba esaga jʼesaasa batiina ohumusangaalira ni bahoohera ŋamugulu baati, “Musengwa aŋeewe eŋono! Ali nʼekabi oyo owuujira mu siina lya Musengwa, habaha wa Yisirayiri aŋeewe eŋono.”
43012014	Nga basunira Yesu nasugirya eperepere ngʼayihalaho ohwoheresa ehyaŋandiihiwa ehiroma hiiti,
43012015	“Mutatya hiitu hyosihyosi, enywe abaatu bomu Sayuuni, mubone habaha wenywe ali huuja era gehaaye hu nasugirya eperepere.”
43012016	Ehyo, abeegi babe sibahitegeera ohwola olu Yesu galamuha nga ko bahebulira baati ebyo byosibyosi byaliŋo ngʼolu byaŋandiihiwa.
43012017	Ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ehyaliŋo nʼalamusa Lazaalo, hyatiina mu moni ni hiroohesa abaatu ebyaliŋo.
43012018	Olwa Yesu ohuhola ahabonero aho aheŋunjisa, bangi batiina ohumusangaalira.
43012019	Ngʼaŋo Abafalisaayo baloma abeene nʼabeene baati, “Huŋuma hyahuhola! Abaatu bosibosi bali huŋwerehereramo ohumufugiirira!”
43012020	Mu abo abatiina e Yerusaalemu ohujumirya Hatonda hu Mbaga eyʼOhubihisya, mwalimo Abatali Bayudaaya.
43012021	Abaatu abo batiina eyiri Filipo, omusaale wʼe Bbesusayida mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya, nga bamuloma baati, “Muhulu, hwenda ohubona Yesu.”
43012022	Ngʼaŋo Filipo atiina alomeraho Andereya nga batiina balomera Yesu baati ŋaaliŋo abaali ni benda ohumubona.
43012023	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Ehiseera hyolire Hatonda ohulaga eŋono lyʼOmwana wʼOmuutu eri ali ni nalyo.
43012024	Mbalomera ehituufu ti, ohutusaho nga bahomire ahamo hʼengaano, hasigala ni hali hamo halala hoŋene. Aye ni bahahoma hamera, haŋwamo owumo wungi.
43012025	Olwʼehyo oweheneerera obulamu buwe alibufiirwa, aye oyo abufiirwa mu hyalo muno hu lwange alisuna obulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
43012026	Hiisi owenda ohuba omuŋeeresa wange ali nʼohuba muloobera wange, eyi ndiba yeesi peyi aliba. Era hiisi obupeeresa, Bbaabba alimuŋa omuhemba.
43012027	“Neŋendehereye era simanyire nʼehyohuloma. Olwo, sabe ti, ‘Bbaabba, ponie ehiseera hino ehyʼohubonaabona hitanjolaho? Bbe, olwohuba ehyo njʼehyagira naaja hu hyalo!’
43012028	Bbaabba, laga ngʼolu oli wʼeŋono.” Ngʼaŋo ejanjaasi liŋwa mwigulu ni ŋaliŋo aloma ati, “Kenire ohuliraga era nja hweyongera ohuliraga.”
43012029	Balala hu abaatu mu hiŋindi ehyo ehyaliŋo, baloma baati mbo ohwo hwali huduma hwʼefula. Aye abandi nga baloma baati Malayika njʼowaali nʼalomire ni naye.
43012030	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abaloma ati, “Ejanjaasi eri muŋuliiye libaaye lya huyeeda ndinywe sosi ese.
43012031	Era ŋaahani ehiseera hyolire ohusalira ehyalo hino omusango, ohunyagula hu Sitaani obuŋugi.
43012032	Aye ni balipaniha hu musalabba, nja huleetera bangi ohunoŋoha.”
43012033	Yesu galoma atyo, ohulaga engeri eyi gaali naaja hufamo.
43012034	Ngʼaŋo ehibbubbu hyʼabaatu himuloma hiiti, “Ebyaŋandiihiwa biroma biiti Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu aja hubaaŋo emirembe nʼemirembe. Lwahiina ewe oloma oti Omwana wʼOmuutu baja humuŋaniha hu musalabba? Omwana wʼOmuutu oyo njʼani?”
43012035	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Muja huba mu njase ahaseera hatotono. Era mugendenga ehiirema ni hihiiri huŋamba. Olwohuba agendera mu hiirema saabona eyi aba nʼatiina.
43012036	Olwʼehyo mute obwesige wenywe mu njase nʼehiiri ni nenywe, mwahafuuha baana bʼenjase.” Yesu ni gahena ohuloma atyo, ngʼaŋwaŋo abehwehaho.
43012037	Wayire Yesu gaali aholire obubonero obweŋunjisa obwo bwosibwosi, abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya sibamufugiirira.
43012038	Ehyo hyaliŋo ohwoheresa ehi naabbi Yisaaya gaaloma ati, “Musengwa, njʼani afugiirira obuhwenda weefe? Era njʼani oyu Musengwa galaga obuŋangi wuwe?”
43012039	Olwʼehyo, sibafugiirira olwohuba Yisaaya omwene oyo, ŋaliŋo aŋandi aŋa gaaloma ati,
43012040	“Hatonda gabeegala emoni batabona, gabahahanyasa emyoyo jaawe. Olwʼehyo sibaŋanga hubona nʼemoni jaawe, wayire ohutegeera bahagobola eyi ndi nabaŋonia.”
43012041	Yisaaya gaaloma atyo, olwohuba galengera eŋono eri Yesu gaali nʼaja huba ni nalyo.
43012042	Wayire ebyo byali biityo, bangi bafugiirira Yesu nga pomuli nʼabatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya aye olwʼohutya Abafalisaayo ohubabbinga mu humbaaniro, bahihola mu ngiso.
43012043	Olwohuba bendire bugali abaatu ohubasiima mu hifo hya Hatonda ohubasiima.
43012044	Ngʼaŋo Yesu alangirira ati, “Omuutu owufugiirira, saafugiirira ndiise seŋene aye aba afugiirira ni nooyo owaatuma.
43012045	Omuutu owumbona aba aweene oyo owaatuma.
43012046	Ese naaja mu hyalo ohuleetera abaatu enjase ko hiisi owufugiirira ataba mu hiirema.
43012047	Omuutu aŋulira ebibono byange aye ndabigondere simusalira musango, olwohuba naaja hu hyalo hunoŋola baatu.
43012048	Abo abagaana ohufugiirira ebindoma, Hatonda njʼaja hubasalira omusango hu ludaalo olwʼekomerero ni geema hu bibono ebyene ebyo.
43012049	Olwohuba sindoma hu lwange, aye Bbaabba owaatuma njʼowundagira ebindoma nʼengeri eyʼohubiromamo.
43012050	Era manyire ti ehiragiro hihye hibaleetera obulamu obutaŋwaŋo. Olwʼehyo hiisi ehi ndoma njʼehi gandoma ohuloma.”
43013001	Ŋaahani byali biseera byʼegulo obunahye ni lunahabe ludaalo lwʼEmbaga eyʼOhuhebuliriraho Ohubihisya. Yesu gamanya ati ehiseera hihye ehyʼohuŋwa hu hyalo ohwagamayo eyiri Semwana hyolire. Era olwʼohwenda ohu gaali ni gendamo abeegi ababe abaali ni bajahusigala hu hyalo, gasalaŋo ohubalagira erala ohwenda huhwe mu hiseera ehyo.
43013002	Aŋa beeŋulira ehyʼegulo, Sitaani gaali ahenire hale ohuta mu Yuda Yisikaryoti omwana wa Simooni omwoyo mubi, ohulya mu Yesu oluhwe.
43013003	Aye Yesu gamanya ati Semwana gaamuŋa obuŋangi hu hiisi hiitu era ati gaŋwa eyiri Hatonda era gaali gagamayo.
43013004	Olwʼehyo, genyoha hu hiiŋulo, gefihulamo olugoye olu gaali ni gambaye hu mugulu, ahena geewoŋa etabulo mu kende.
43013005	Ngʼaŋo ajuha amaaji mu bbaafu, atandiha ohwoga abeegi babe amagulu nʼabasiimula nʼetabulo eyi gaali ni gewoŋire.
43013006	Ni goola hu Simooni Peetero, nga niiye amubuusa ati, “Musengwa, dala wenda hunjoga amagulu?”
43013007	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Sooŋanga hutegeera ehi ndi huhola aye olihitegeera hale.”
43013008	Nga Peetero amuloma ati, “Soonanjoge magulu!” Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Singa sikwoga magulu, sooja huba ni wiisa hirala ni nange.”
43013009	Nga Simooni Peetero amugobolamo ati, “Ale Musengwa, otanjoga magulu goŋeene, aye njoge emihono nʼomutwe gwosi!”
43013010	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Omuutu asaabire omubiri getaaga husaaba magulu goŋene olwohuba aba muŋoono. Era muli baŋoono wayire si mwesimwesi.”
43013011	Yesu gaali amanyire owaali nʼaja humulyamo oluhwe cʼehifa galoma ati, “Muli bagwalaafu aye si mwesimwesi.”
43013012	Ni gahena ohubooga amagulu, gambala olugoye lulwe lula nga gagama mu hifo hihye geehala, ahena ababuusa ati, “Mutegeera amahulu gʼehi kolire?
43013013	Munanga Musomesa era Musengwa yenywe. Ehyo hituufu olwohuba cʼehi ndi.
43013014	Ŋaahani ngʼolu ese, Omusomesa era Musengwa yenywe mbogire amagulu, mwesi mwoganenga.
43013015	Olwohuba mbaŋaye ehyʼohuboneraho, ale mwesi muholenga ngʼolu ese kolire.
43013016	Mbalomera ehituufu ti, eŋuma omwidu ahira musengwawe eŋono era eŋuma muhwenda ahiraho owamutuma.
43013017	Ŋaahani ngʼolu mumanyire ebiitu ebyo, muja husuna ekabi ni munabiholenga.
43013018	“Sindoma mwesimwesi olwohuba manyire abo abanatobola. Aye ehyaŋandiihiwa ehiroma hiiti, ‘Oyo oyu ndya ni naye hu hiiŋulo hirala gacuhiiye, hiri nʼohwolerera.’
43013019	Mbalomera hino ni hihiiri hubaŋo mwahafugiirira ti ndiise oyu bafuujaho amate.
43013020	Mbalomera ehituufu ti, hiisi asangaalira yesiyesi oyu tuma aba asangaaliiye ndiise, era hiisi owusangaalira, aba asangaaliiye oyo owaatuma.”
43013021	Yesu ni gahena ohuloma atyo, geralihirira ngʼabbutula ati, “Mbalomera ehituufu ti, mulala hu enywe anandyemo oluhwe.”
43013022	Abeegi babe, bahejanaho byabatangaliha olwʼohutategeera oyu gaali nʼalomaho.
43013023	Mulala hu bo oyu gaali ni genda bugali gaali amulireene.
43013024	Nga Simooni Peetero aholera omwegi oyo ahabonero nʼamuloma ati, “Mubuuse oyu ali hulomaho.”
43013025	Ngʼaŋo omwegi oyo ni gediira hu Yesu, amubuusa ati, “Musengwa, njʼani oyo oyu olomaho?”
43013026	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Oyu naaŋe omugaati guno ni kenire ohugutonga mu lubya, anaabe nje niye.” Nga nʼaŋaweene aŋo atonga omugaati aguŋa Yuda Yisikaryoti omwana wa Simooni.
43013027	Yuda ni gahena ohulya omugaati ogwo, ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo Sitaani amwingiramo. Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma Yuda ati, “Ehi wenda ohuhola, hihole mangu mangu!”
43013028	Aye ŋaŋuma hu abo abaali hu hiiŋulo owategeera lwahiina Yesu gamuloma atyo.
43013029	Abandi baŋeega baati ngʼolu Yuda gaali muŋanika, Yesu gamuloma hutiina hugula ebyʼohutambisa hu Mbaga oba ohuyeeda abagadi.
43013030	Yuda ni gahena ohulya omugaati ogwo, genyoheramo ngʼatula ebulafu. Ehiseera ehyo, owiire waali wiirire.
