43013031	Yuda nʼahenire ohutiina, nga Yesu aloma abeegi abaali ni basigayeŋo ati, “Ehiseera hyolire abaatu ohuŋa Omwana wʼOmuutu eŋono era ehyo ehi aja huhola, hija huŋeesa Hatonda eŋono.
43013032	Ngʼolu baŋa Hatonda eŋono olwʼebyo ebi Mwana owʼOmuutu ahola, Hatonda ajahulaga engeri eyi Mwana wuwe ali nʼobuŋangi mu hiseera ehitali hyaŋale.
43013033	Baana bange, nja huba ni nenywe ahaseera hatotono. Mulinyendula era ngʼolu nalomera Abayudaaya, mwesi mbaloma ati, ‘Simuŋanga huuja eyi ndi hutiina.’ ”
43013034	“Ehiragiro ehinyaaha ehi mbaŋa cʼehino ti: Mwendanenga. Ngʼolu ese mbenda, mwesi mwendanenga muutyo.
43013035	Ni munendanenga, ohwo pʼohu baatu banahamanyire baati muli beegi bange.”
43013036	Nga Simooni Peetero abuusa Yesu ati, “Musengwa, oli hutiina ŋeena?” Ngʼaŋo Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Sooŋanga hutiina eyi ndi huja hu saawa yino aye olinondaho hale.”
43013037	Nga Peetero amubuusa ati, “Musengwa, lwahiina sisobola hutiina ni neewe olwa leero? Ese kenereeye ohufa hu lulwo.”
43013038	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Dala onaŋeyo obulamu wuwo hu lwange? Kulomera ehituufu ti, mu hiire hino ehyene, engoho yinaabe yitagobolamo huholyoha omulundi ogwohubiri, ni wahanegaanira emirundi edatu.”
43014001	Nga Yesu aloma ati, “Muteŋendehereranga. Mute mu Hatonda obwesige era keesi muutemo obwesige.
43014002	Ewa Bbaabba eriyo ebifo bingi era hiba ni hitali hiityo, nahabalomeeye. Era tiina ohubategeheera ehifo.
43014003	Oluvanyuma lwʼohubategeheera, nja hugobola mberuhire, mwesi mube ni nange eyi nja huba.
43014004	Mumanyire engira eyoola eyi ndi hutiina.”
43014005	Ngʼaŋo Tomasi amuloma ati, “Musengwa, sihumanyire eyi oli hutiina. Huŋanga huutye ohumanya engira eyitiinayo?”
43014006	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Ndiise engira, nʼamazima nʼobulamu. Ŋaŋuma atiina eyiri Bbaabba, ohutusaho nʼabitiire mu ese.
43014007	Mbalomera ehituufu ti mubanga ni muumanyire, mwahali mumanyire ni Bbaabba yeesi. Ohuŋwa hatyane mumumanyire era muhenire ohumubona.”
43014008	Nga Filipo aloma Yesu ati, “Musengwa, tulage Bbaabba wuwo era ehyo hinatuhene.”
43014009	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Filipo, buhye menye ni nenywe ahamanga ahaaga aŋo, ohiiri hutegeera? Hiisi owumbona, aba aweene Bbaabba. Lwahiina wundoma oti, ‘Tulage Bbaabba wuwo?’
43014010	Soofugiirira oti ese ndi bulala ni Bbaabba, ni Bbaabba ali bulala ni neese? Ebibono ebi mbalomera, sibyange hu bwange aye Bbaabba ali mu ese njʼahola emirimo jije, nʼabitira mu ese.”
43014011	“Mufugiirire ni mbalomera ti ese ndi bulala ni Bbaabba, ni Bbaabba yeesi ali bulala ni neese. Ni hitaba hiityo, mumale gafugiirira olwʼebyamaliholiho ebi kola.
43014012	Mbalomera ehituufu ti hiisi owufugiirira, aja huhola ebyamaliholiho nʼohuhiraho bino ebi kola, olwohuba ndi hutiina eyiri Bbaabba.
43014013	Era hiisi ehi munasungenga ni mutambisa esiina lyange nja huhibaŋanga ko hireetere abaatu ohuŋa Bbaabba eŋono.
43014014	Era ni munasungenga ehiitu hyosihyosi ni mubita mu siina lyange, nahibaŋenga.”
43014015	Nga Yesu aloma abeegi babe ati, “Ni muba ni munyenda, munaŋambenga ebiragiro byange.
43014016	Era nja husunga Bbaabba, abaŋe Omuyeedi owundi, aja hubanga ni nenywe emirembe nʼemirembe.
43014017	Omuyeedi oyo njʼOmwoyo aloma amazima agaŋamba hu Hatonda. Abaatu abandi sibaŋanga humufugiirira, olwohuba sibamutegeera era sibamumanyire. Aye enywe mumumanyire olwohuba ali mu enywe era anabenga ni nenywe.”
43014018	“Sinja hubaleha hyʼabafuubbi, nja hugobola ohuba ni nenywe.
43014019	Mu hiseera ehitali hyaŋale, abatafugiirira sibaja humbona aye enywe muja humbona. Olwohuba njahulamuha, mwesi muja huba balamu emirembe nʼemirembe.
43014020	Hu ludaalo olwo ni ndamuhire, mulitegeera muuti ndi bulala ni Bbaabba, mwesi muli bulala ni neese era keesi ndi bulala ni nenywe.
43014021	Oyo owunyenda, afugiirira ebiragiro byange, gaahena gabiŋamba. Era Bbaabba aja hwenda oyo owunyenda, keesi nja humwenda kene mwehwehulire gategeere.”
43014022	Ngʼaŋo Yuda, ola atali Yisikaryoti, aloma Yesu ati, “Musengwa, lwahiina wenda ohutwehwehulira huhutegeere, aye sosi abaatu abatahufugiirira?”
43014023	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Hiisi owunyenda, aja huŋamba ebisomesa. Bbaabba aja humwenda. Era ese ni Bbaabba, huja hutiina eyi ali hube ni naye.
43014024	Oyo atanyenda, saaŋamba ebisomesa. Bino ebisomesa si byange aye bya Bbaabba omwene oyo owaatuma.”
43014025	Bino byosibyosi mbiromire ni kiiri ni nenywe.
43014026	Aye Omuyeedi oyu Bbaabba alituma mu siina lyange, era nga njʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu alibasomesa era gabahebulisa byosibyosi ebi mbalomeeye.
43014027	Ale ngʼolu ndi hutiina, emiyaaya jibe ni nenywe. Emiyaaya eji mbalehera sijiri hyʼeji baatu baŋa. Olwʼehyo simweŋendehereranga era simutyanga.
43014028	“Muŋuliiye ni ndoma ti ‘Ndi hutiina aye nja hugobola. Era singa mubaaye munyenda, mwahasangaaye ese ni tiina eyiri Bbaabba, olwohuba gaakiraho eŋono.’
43014029	Mbalomeeye ehyo ni hihiiri hubaŋo, ni hiribaŋo ko musobole ohufugiirira.
43014030	Sinja hweyongera huloma ni nenywe, olwohuba Sitaani aŋuga ehyalo hino ali huuja ohumbwagala aye gapumaho buŋangi bwosibwosi.
43014031	Cooka abaatu abatafugiirira bali nʼohuhimanya baati nenda Bbaabba era olwʼohumwenda, ehigandagira cʼehi kola.” Ngʼaŋo aheneresa nʼaloma ati, “Ale ni mwinyohe, hutiine.”
43015001	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma abeegi babe ati, “Ndiise omuzabbibbu omwene nʼomwene era Bbaabba njʼomulimi omwenegwo.
43015002	Asalaaho hiisi lusaga olutaama bibala, aye olwama alusabagulya ko lweyongerere erala ohuleremala.
43015003	Enywe ŋaahani muli hyʼolusaga olu bahena ohusabagulya olwʼohufugiirira ebibono byange.
43015004	Olwʼehyo, musigale ni muli bulala ni neese, keesi nja husigala ni ndi bulala ni nenywe. Olusaga lwʼomuzabbibbu siruŋanga hwama ebibala ni luli ŋa lwoŋene ohutusaho ni lusigaaye hu hiholo. Mu ngeri njʼenyene, ni nenywe mwesi simuŋanga huhola ebi Hatonda genda ohutusaho nga muli bulala ni neese.”
43015005	“Ndi hyʼomuzabbibbu, enywe muli hyʼamasaga. Singa musigala ni muli bulala ni neese, keesi ni ndi bulala ni nenywe, muja hwama ebibala bingi. Aŋaŋuma ese, eŋuma ehi muŋanga ohuhola.
43015006	Singa simusigala ni muli bulala ni neese, muja huba hyʼolusaga olu batema hu hisaala badanya. Ni lwoma, balwohya omuliro.
43015007	Singa musigala ni muli bulala ni neese era mwaŋamba ebibono byange, ni munasungenga hyosihyosi ehimwenda, munahisunenga.
43015008	Abaatu baja huŋa Bbaabba eŋono singa mwama ebibala bingi ohulaga muuti muli beegi bange.”
43015009	Ngʼolu Bbaabba ganyenda, keesi pombenda tyo. Musigale ni muli bulala ni neese ko neyongere ohubenda.
43015010	Singa mugondera ebiragiro byange, muja husigala ni muli bulala ni neese ko neyongere ohubenda ngʼolu ese ngondera ebiragiro bya Bbaabba yeesi geyongera ohunyenda.
43015011	Mbalomeeye ebiitu bino ko mube nʼesangaalo hyʼeryange era mube ni nalyo mu wijuufu.
43015012	Ehiragiro ehi mbaŋa cʼehino ti: mwendanenga ngʼolu ese mbenda.
43015013	Ŋaŋuma ali nʼohwenda ohuhira ohwʼomuutu aŋayo obulamu buwe olwʼabameeri babe.
43015014	Singa mugondera ebiragiro byange, muba bameeri bange.
43015015	Simbalanga baŋeeresa olwohuba omuŋeeresa saamanyire ehi musengwawe ahola. Aye mbalanga bameeri bange, olwohuba nabalomera byosibyosi ebi Bbaabba gandomera.
43015016	“Si ndinywe omwasalaŋo ohuba abeegi bange aye ese ndiise onabatobola mube beegi bange, nga kena mbatuma mutiine mwame ebibala ebija hubaŋo emirembe nʼemirembe. Era hiisi ehi munasungenga Bbaabba mu siina lyange, anabaŋenga.
43015017	Ehi mbalagira cʼehino ti, mwendanenga.”
43015018	“Abaatu ni babacaawanga, muhebuliranga muuti beeheerera hucaawa ndiise.
43015019	Singa mubaaye hya nibo, bahabendire. Aye olwohuba nʼabatobola ohutaba hya nibo, cʼehifa babacaawa.
43015020	Muhebulire ebi nʼabalomera ti ŋaŋuma mwidu ahira musengwawe eŋono. Obanga bakiyaania ese Musengwa yenywe, baja hubahiyaania mwesi. Abagondera ebisomesa, baja hugonderanga nʼebyenywe.
43015021	Baja hubabisya baatyo olwʼese, olwohuba sibamanyire owaatuma.”
43015022	“Mba ni taaja nabalomera obuhwenda ohuŋwa eyiri Bbaabba, bahaŋumire musango. Aye ŋaahani baŋuma hyahweŋambya ohuguŋunuha olwʼebibi byawe.
43015023	Hiisi owucaawa, acaawa ni Bbaabba yeesi.
43015024	Mba ni taahola ebyamaliholiho ebi bandi baatahola, bahaŋumireho hibi. Aye babyeboneyeho ne baacaawa ese ni Bbaabba.
43015025	Aye bahola ebyo ohwoheresa ehyaŋandiihiwa ehiroma hiiti, ‘Baacaawira bwereere.’ ”
43015026	“Omuyeedi oyu ndibaŋindihira ohuŋwa ewa Bbaabba nʼaliija, Omwoyo alomera abaatu amazima agaŋamba hu Bbaabba, era alibalomera ebipambaho.
43015027	Era ni nenywe muli nʼohulomera abaatu ebipambaho, olwohuba mubaaye ni nange ohuŋwa mu hutandiha.”
43016001	Ngʼaŋo Yesu aloma abeegi babe ati, “Mbalomeeye ebyo byosibyosi ko mutaŋwamo maani mu hufugiirira hwenywe.
43016002	Banahababbinge mu mahumbaaniro. Era mu butuufu obwene ehiseera hinahoole olu abaatu banahabeete baŋeega baati mbo bali huŋeeresa Hatonda.
43016003	Ebyo balibihola olwohuba sibamanyire Bbaabba era keesi sibaamanyire.
43016004	Mbalomeeye ebiitu ebyo ko ehiseera ni hyolire muhebulire muuti nabatebusa. Sinabalomera bibono ebyo mu hutandiha olwohuba naali manyire ti kiiri ni nenywe.”
43016005	Ehiseera hyolire ese ohwagama eyiri oyo owaatuma aye ŋaŋuma hu nywe owumbuusa ati, “Oja ŋeena?”
43016006	Era enaku yibaŋambire olwohuba mbalomeeye ebiitu ebyo.
43016007	Aye mbalomera ehituufu ti, hyamugaso eyi muli ti ndi hutiina. Olwohuba singa sitiina, Omuyeedi saaliija eyi muli. Aye singa tiina nja humuŋindiha gaaje eyi muli.
43016008	Era nʼaliija alirumiirisa abatafugiirira ati epeega yaawe hu biŋamba hu hibi caamu, abalage njʼani omuluŋamu era nʼengeri eyi Hatonda alisalamo omusango.
43016009	Alirumiirisa abaatu hu biŋamba hu hibi, olwohuba sibaafugiirira.
43016010	Aja hubalaga ati epeega yaawe caamu hu biipambaho olwohuba ndi wanjabulo era ndi hutiina eyiri Bbaabba eyi mutaŋanga hugobolayo humbonaho.
43016011	Omuyeedi oyo era aja hubalaga ebiŋamba hu ngeri eyi Hatonda aja husalamo omusango, olwohuba gahena hale ohugusalira Sitaani aŋuga ehyalo hino.
43016012	“Kiiri nʼebingi ebyʼohubalomera aye simuŋanga hubitegeera ŋaahani.
43016013	Aye Omwoyo aloma amazima agaŋamba hu Hatonda nʼaliija, ali baluŋamya ohumanya amazima gosigosi. Saaja huloma ebibye hu bubwe aye aja hubalomeranga ebi aŋulira ohuŋwa eyiri Bbaabba. Era aja hubalomeranga ebija hubaŋo mu moni.
43016014	Alibalaga ngʼolu ndi wʼeŋono olwohuba aja hubalomeranga ebyo ebi aja huŋuliranga ni ndoma.
43016015	Ebya Bbaabba byosibyosi byange. Cʼehigira nʼaloma ti Omwoyo oyo aja huŋuliirisanga ebimulomera nga ko abalomera.”
43016016	Ngʼaŋo Yesu abaloma ati, “Mu hiseera ehitali hyaŋale simuja humbona ne nindi oluvanyuma lwʼehiseera hitotono, muja humbona.”
43016017	Ngʼaŋo balala hu beegi babe bebuusa baati, “Hiina ehi ategeesa ohuloma ati, ‘Mu hiseera ehitali hyaŋale simuja humbona ne nindi oluvanyuma lwʼehiseera hitotono, muja humbona’ era ati ‘Olwohuba tiina eyiri Bbaabba?’ ”
43016018	Beyongera ohwebuusa baati, “Ategeesa hi ohuloma ati ‘Mu hiseera ehitotono?’ Sihutegeera ehi ali huloma.”
43016019	Yesu ni gabona ati benda humubuusa hu ebi alomire, ngʼabaloma ati, “Muli hwebuusa ehi tegehiise ni ndomire ti ‘Mu hiseera ehitali hyaŋale simuja humbona, era ni ŋabitireŋo ehiseera hitotono muja humbona nindi?’
43016020	Mbalomera ehituufu ti, ‘mulihubba enduulu era mulirira aye abatafugiirira balisaŋalya. Munahanakuŋale aye ohunakuŋala hwenywe hulibaŋweramo esangaalo.
43016021	Omuhasi alumwa, aba nʼobulumi bubitiirifu, olwohuba ehiseera ehyʼohusaala hiba hyolire. Aye olu ahena ohusaala, nga gebirira obulumi obwo olwʼesangaalo eryʼohusaala omwana.
43016022	Olwʼehyo mwesi hino cʼehiseera hyenywe ohunakuŋala aye ndibabona nindi era mulisangaala olwʼohumbona era ŋaŋuma muutu yesiyesi alibalobera ohuba abasangaafu.’ ”
43016023	“Mu hiseera ehyo, sihiryetagisa husunga hiitu hyosihyosi olwohuba mbalomera ehituufu ti, Bbaabba alibaŋanga hiisi hiitu ehi mulisunga mu siina lyange.
43016024	Ohwola haati muhiiri husungangaho hiitu hyosihyosi mu siina lyange. Musungenga Hatonda, mulisuna ko mubeere erala basangaafu.”
43016025	Ngʼaŋo Yesu geyongera aloma abeegi babe ati, “Wayire mbayenga ndoma ni nenywe ni mbumbirya, aye ehiseera hija hwola ndome ni nenywe ni tabbumbirya hu biŋamba hu Bbaabba.
43016026	Mu hiseera ehyo, mulimusunganga mu siina lyange. Sihirinjetagisanga hubasungira Bbaabba abaŋe ebimwenda.
43016027	Olwohuba Bbaabba omwene abenda era alibaŋanga ehi mulimusunganga. Hino alihiholanga olwohuba munyenda era mufugiirira muuti naŋwa eyi ali.
43016028	Ese naŋwa eyiri Bbaabba nʼaja hu hyalo era ŋaahani ndi hwagamayo.”
43016029	Ngʼaŋo abeegi babe bamuloma baati, “Ŋaahani oli huloma nʼotabbumbirya.
43016030	Ŋaahani humanyire huuti omanyire hiisi hiitu, era sihyetagisa muutu yesiyesi ohuhubuusa ebibuuso. Hino hituleetera ohufugiirira huuti waŋwa ewa Hatonda.”
43016031	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Ŋaahani mufugiirira?
43016032	Aye ehiseera hiija era hyolire, olu banabagwemo mwasalaaniha era mwesimwesi munadulume mwandehaŋo hiisi muutu gatiina ewuwe. Aye sindi seŋene, olwohuba Bbaabba ali ni nange.
43016033	Mbalomeeye ebiitu ebyo, ko musobole ohuba nʼemiyaaya olwohuba muli bulala ni neese. Hu hyalo huno muja hubonaabona. Aye mugume olwohuba ese panguuye amaani gʼehyalo hino.”
43017001	Yesu ni gahena ohuloma nʼabeegi babe ngʼaheja ŋamugulu mwigulu asaba ati, “Bbaabba, ŋaahani ehiseera hyolire, laga abaatu eŋono lyʼOmwana wuwo yeesi, abalage eŋono liryo.
43017002	Olwohuba wamuŋa obuŋangi hu baatu bosibosi, ko aŋe abo abawamuŋambya obulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
43017003	Era engeri eyʼohusunamo obulamu obutaŋwaŋo, yiri mu huhumanya ewe Hatonda omutuufu era omulala wogobbo nʼohumanya Yesu Kurisito oyu watuma hu hyalo.
43017004	Ndagire abaatu eŋono liryo olwohuba kenire omulimo ogu waapa ohuhola.
43017005	Ŋaahani Bbaabba, ngobose mu eŋono eri naali ni nalyo ni naali ni kiiri ni neewe, ko hutonde ehyalo.”
43017006	Ngʼaŋo Yesu geyongera ohusaba ati, “Ndeteeye abaatu aba waapa ohuŋwa mu hyalo hino, ohuhumanya. Baali babo aye ngʼobapambya era baagondera ehibono hihyo.
43017007	Era ŋaahani bamanyire baati ebiitu byosibyosi ebi waapa biŋwa eyi oli.
43017008	Nabaŋa obuhwenda obu waapa era baabufugiirira. Bamanyire mu butuufu baati naŋwa eyi oli era bafugiirira baati ndiiwe owaatuma.”
43017009	“Mbasabira. Sisabira abatafugiirira aye abo aba waapa olwohuba babo.
43017010	Abaatu bosibosi aba ndi ninabo babo, era ababo bosibosi, bange keesi. Era balagire eŋono lyange.
43017011	Sinja hweyongera huba mu hyalo hino era ndi huuja eyi oli aye nibo bahiiri mu hyalo muno. Bbaabba omwabufu, bahuume olwʼobuŋangi buwo obu waapa, babenga bulala ngʼolu ese ni neewe huli bulala.
43017012	Ni mbaaye ni kiiri ni nabo, mbahuumire bulaŋi olwʼobuŋangi obu waapa. Era ŋaŋuma wayire mulala owagota ohutusaho oyo owaŋaba ohutiina mu husihiiriha ko ehyaŋandiihiwa hyolerere.
43017013	Ehiseera hyolire ese ohuuja eyi oli aye bino mbiroma ni kiiri mu hyalo muno ko baahaba nʼesangaalo ebitiirifu hyʼese.”
43017014	“Nabaŋa obuhwenda bubwo era abaatu babacaawa, olwohuba siba hyalo hino ngʼolu ese tali wʼehyalo hino.
43017015	Sikusunga hubatusa mu hyalo hino aye obaŋonie omusigu Sitaani.
43017016	Ngʼolu ese tali wa hyalo hino, boosi siba hyalo hino ngʼolu abatafugiirira bali.
43017017	Bafuule babo olwʼehibono hihyo olwohuba hiisi ehi oloma hituufu.
43017018	Ngʼolu waatuma ohuuja hu hyalo huno, keesi mbatuma.
43017019	Neŋayo eyi oli ko boosi basobole ohweŋaayo eyi oli.”
43017020	“Sisabira bano boŋene, aye ni naabo abalifugiirira obuhwenda bwawe.
43017021	Bbaabba, mbasabira bosibosi babenga bulala, ngʼolu ese ni neewe huli bulala, boosi babenga bulala ni neefe ko abaatu mu hyalo bafugiirire baati ndiiwe owaatuma.
43017022	Era mbaleeteeye ohuba bʼeŋono hyʼeryo eri waapa, ko babe bulala ngʼolu ese ni neewe huli bulala.
43017023	Ese sobole ohuba bulala ni nabo hyʼolu ewe oli bulala ni neese. Babeere erala bulala era bamanye baati obenda ngʼolu bunyenda ko abo abatafugiirira, bategeerere ohwo baati ndiiwe owaatuma.”
43017024	“Bbaabba, kusunga abo aba waapa, lube lulala babe ni neese eyi nja huba bahabona eŋono eri ndiba ni nalyo. Waapa eŋono eryo olwohuba wanyenda ni huhiiri hutonda hyalo.
43017025	Bbaabba ahola ebiruŋamu byereere, wayire abaatu sibahumanyire aye ese kumanyire era nʼabeegi bange bano bamanyire baati waatuma.
43017026	Mbalagire ehyo ehi oli era nja hweyongera ohubalaga ko basobole ohwenda abaatu ngʼolu ewe bunyenda era keesi ko mbe bulala ni nabo.”
43018001	Yesu ni gahena ohusaba atyo, ngʼasimbuha atiina nʼabeegi babe bambuha ahalungu ahabalanga baati Kedulooni. Ngʼaŋo boola mu ndimiro yʼemisaala emizayiti nga baba omwo.
43018002	Yuda owamulyamo oluhwe, gaali amanyire ehifo ehyo olwohuba emirundi mingi Yesu nʼabeegi babe bahumbaanirangamo.
43018003	Nga Yuda atiina mu ndimiro eyo nʼatangiriye ehibinja hyʼabasirikale nʼabahuumi ba Yekaalu abʼabatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼAbafalisaayo baatuma. Era baali baŋambire etooki nʼetaala ko nʼebisoosa.
43018004	Cooka Yesu gaali amanyire ebyo ebyali ni bija humwolaho, olwʼehyo nga getusayo ababuusa ati, “Njʼani oyu mwendula?”
43018005	Ngʼaŋo bamugobolamo baati, “Hwendula nje Yesu omusaale wʼe Nazaleesi.” Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Ndiise oyu.” Yuda owamulyamo oluhwe gaali gemereeye aŋo ni nabo.
43018006	Yesu ni gabaloma ati, “Ndiise oyu,” nga baagama hinyumanyuma bagwa ŋaasi.
43018007	Nga nindi Yesu ababuusa ati, “Njʼani oyu mwendula?” Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Yesu omusaale wʼe Nazaleesi.”
43018008	Nga Yesu abagobolamo ati, “Mbalomeeye ti ndiise ono. Ni muba ni mwendula ndiise, bano mubalehe betiinire.”
43018009	Ebyo byaliŋo ohwoheresa ebi gaali nʼalomire ati, “Sinagosyaho wayire mulala hu abo aba waapa.”
43018010	Mulala hu beegi babe oyu balanga baati Simooni Peetero gaali nʼepiima. Ngʼayisoŋolayo, atema hu mwidu wʼomuhulu wʼabasengi ba Hatonda ohutwi ohulungi. Omwidu oyo baali bamulanga baati Maluko.
43018011	Nga Yesu aloma Peetero ati, “Yagamyayo epiima yiyo aŋa yibaaye. Siwenda ese nywe hu hihopo ehyʼohubonaabona ehi Bbaabba gaategehera?”
43018012	Ngʼaŋo ehibinja hyʼabasirikale nʼomuduumisi waawe nʼabahuumi ba Yekaalu baŋamba Yesu bamuhaada.
43018013	Nga bamuŋira ewa Anaasi semwana yʼomuhasi wa Kayaafa omuhulu wʼabasengi ba Hatonda mu mwaha ogwo.
43018014	Era njʼowaali nʼaŋaaye Abayudaaya amagesi ati hiraŋi omuutu mulala ohufiirira bosibosi.
43018015	Nga Simooni Peetero nʼomwegi wahye owundi balonda hu Yesu. Olwohuba omwegi oyo gaali mumanye eyiri omuhulu wʼabasengi ba Hatonda, ehyo hyagira gamulondaho ohwola mu lunya ewomuhulu wʼabasengi oyo.
43018016	Aye Peetero gasigala ebulafu gahuumira hu mulyango. Oluvanyuma, omwegi oyo owaali omumanye eyiri omuhulu wʼabasengi, gaagamayo ngʼaloma omuhaana owaali omuhuumi wʼohu mulyango amufugiirira gengisa Peetero mu lunya.
43018017	Ngʼomuhaana oyo abuusa Peetero ati, “Weesi sooli mulala hu beegi bʼomusinde nago?” Nga Peetero amugobolamo ati, “Bbe.”
43018018	Olwʼobuŋololohi, abaŋeeresa nʼabahuumi ba Yekaalu baali baŋweene omuliro hu hihoso ni bemerereeye ohuhyeswanigirisa ni boota. Peetero yeesi gaali ali hwota ni nabo.
43018019	Ngʼaŋo omuhulu wʼabasengi ba Hatonda abuusa Yesu hu biŋamba hu beegi babe nʼebi abaaye nʼasomesanga.
43018020	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Mbayenga somesa abaatu mu lwijuuye mu mahumbaaniro nʼomu Yekaalu omu Bayudaaya bosibosi bahumbaaniranga. Eŋuma ehi ndomangaho mu ngiso.
43018021	Lwahiina bumbuusa otyo? Buusa abo ababaayenga ni bapulirisa, olwohuba bamanyire ebi mbaye ni somesanga.”
43018022	Yesu ni galoma atyo, nga mulala hu bahuumi ba Yekaalu owaali ni gemereeye ohuupi ni naye amuhubba oluŋi hu tama ngʼahena amubuusa ati, “Eyo njʼengeri eyi ogobolamo omuhulu wʼabasengi ba Hatonda?”
43018023	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Oba ndomire bubi laga obubi wange aŋa buli. Aye hanye ndomire ebituufu, lwahiina wukubba?”
43018024	Ngʼaŋo ni bahimuhaadire, Anaasi aloma bamuŋire ewa Kayaafa omuhulu wʼabasengi ba Hatonda.
43018025	Simooni Peetero ni gaali ni gemereeye aŋo ni goota omuliro, nga ŋabaŋo owamubuusa ati, “Weesi sooli mulala hu beegi bʼomusinde nago?” Nga Peetero amuloma ati, “Ese kwegaana.”
43018026	Ngʼaŋo mulala hu beedu bʼomuhulu wʼabasengi ba Hatonda era mulebe yʼomusinde oyu Peetero gatemaho ohutwi, amuhamiirisa ati, “Sikubone nʼoli ni naye mu ndimiro yʼemisaala emizayiti?”
43018027	Nga nindi Peetero gegaana era mu hiseera ehyo ngʼengoho yiholyoha.
43018028	Ngʼaŋo mu mugamba pwipwipwi, abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya baŋwa ewa Kayaafa, batangirisa Yesu bamuŋira ewa gavana Omurooma. Aye olwohuba ohwingirayo hwali huja hubafuula abatali bagwalaafu, hibaleetere ohutasaanira hulya Mbaga eyʼOhuhebuliriraho Ohubihisya, abatangirisi abo sibengira yibuwe. Bendire ohwehuuma batabbwaga magambi ko baŋange ohulya.
43018029	Ngʼaŋo Pilaato atula atiina aŋa baali ababuusa ati, “Omusinde ono mumuhaabya hi?”
43018030	Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Abanga nʼatasaaye musango, hani sihumuleete eyi oli.”
43018031	Nga Pilaato abaloma ati, “Mumuŋire, mwabeene mumusalire omusango ni mwema hu magambi genywe.” Aye nibo nga bamugobolamo baati, “Sibatufugiirira husalira muutu yesiyesi ogwʼohufa.”
43018032	Hino hyaliŋo ohwoheresa ebibono ebi Yesu gaali nʼalomire ebiŋamba hu ngeri eyi gaali nʼaja ohufamo.
43018033	Ngʼaŋo Pilaato gagamayo mu lubiri alanga Yesu amubuusa ati, “Ndiiwe habaha wʼAbayudaaya?”
43018034	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Ehyo ohiroma hu lulwo, oba eriyo abahulomeeye ebipambaho?”
43018035	Nga Pilaato amugobolamo ati, “Koni ndi Muyudaaya? Mbona ti abaatu babo abeene nʼabasengi ba Hatonda abahulu njʼabahuleetire eyi ndi. Osaaye musango hi?”
43018036	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Obuŋugi bwange si wa hu hyalo huno. Singa hiri hiityo, hani abeegi bange basooye nʼAbayudaaya ohulobera ohupamba. Aye obuŋugi bwange wʼenjabulo.”
43018037	Ngʼaŋo Pilaato amubuusa ati, “Ehi oloma oli habaha?” Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Ngʼolu oloma olwo. Ehyo cʼehigira nasaaliwa era naaja hu hyalo huno ohulomera abaatu amazima. Hiisi owenda ohuba wʼamazima aŋulirisa ebyange.”
43018038	Ngʼaŋo Pilaato amubuusa ati, “Amazima cʼehiina?” Ni gahena ohumubuusa atyo, ngʼatula nindi atiina eyiri Abayudaaya abaloma ati, “Simbona musango hu musinde ono.”
43018039	“Aye kola yenywe ohubalehuliranga omusibe mulala mu biseera byʼEmbaga eyʼOhuhebuliriraho Ohubihisya. Ŋaahani, mwenda mbalehulire Habaha wʼAbayudaaya?”
43018040	Ngʼehiŋindi hyʼabaatu hyosihyosi higobolamo nʼejanjaasi eryʼamaani hiiti, “Bbe, sinje oyo, tulehulire nje Bbarabba!” Bbarabba oyo baali bamuŋambire ogwʼobujeemu.
43019001	Ngʼaŋo Pilaato alagira abasirikale ohufaduula Yesu efaalu.
43019002	Era abasirikale baagata amaŋwa mu ngeri yʼomuge bamufiiha hu mutwe, nga bamwambasa eganduula erya namasyoma,
43019003	era nga batiina aŋa gaali efunda nʼefunda ni bamujeeja baati, “Wangaala, habaha wʼAbayudaaya!” Ehyo bahimuhola ni bamuhubba nʼamaŋi.
43019004	Nga nindi Pilaato atula ebulafu aloma Abayudaaya ati, “Nenda humuleeta ebulafu ŋano, ohubalaga ti simubonaho musango.”
43019005	Ngʼaŋo batusa Yesu ni bamufiihire engule eyi baagata mu maŋwa era ni bamwambahise olugoye olwa namasyoma. Nga Pilaato abaloma ati, “Ale mwebonere, omusinde nago!”
43019006	Kasita abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼabaŋeeresa bomu Yekaalu bamogeeye Yesu, nga bahayaana baati, “Muhomerere hu musalabba, muhomerere hu musalabba!” Aye Pilaato gabagobolamo ati, “Mwabeene mumuŋire mumuhomerere. Ne ese simbona musango hu musinde ono.”
43019007	NgʼAbayudaaya bamugobolamo baati, “Huli nʼegambi eriroma liiti ali nʼohufa, olwʼohweranga ati mwana wa Hatonda.”
43019008	Pilaato ni gaŋulira ehyo, hyamwongera humwongera obuti.
43019009	Ngʼalagira bagamyayo Yesu mu lubiri, ngʼamubuusa ati, “Oŋwera ŋeena?” Aye Yesu ngʼaŋoleera huŋoleera.
43019010	Ngʼaŋo Pilaato amubuusa ati, “Ogeene ohungobolamo? Soomanyire oti ndi nʼobuŋangi ohuhulehula oba nalagira bahuhomerera hu musalabba?”
43019011	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Siwahabaaye nʼobuŋangi hu ese taleha Hatonda gabuhuŋa. Olwʼehyo oyo obupayeyo eyi oli njʼali nʼehibi ehihiraho obubbala.”
43019012	Ohuŋwa mu hiseera ehyo, nga Pilaato gendulirisa engeri eyʼohulehula Yesu. Aye Abayudaaya nibo nga beyongera ohuhayaana baati, “Onalehula omusinde oyo, onaabe soowagira Kayisaali olwohuba hiisi oweranga habaha aba amuyekera.”
43019013	Pilaato ni gaŋulira ebibono ebyo, galagira baatusa Yesu ebulafu nga niye ahena gehala hu tebe yiye eyʼobuŋugi. Etebe eyo yaali mu hifo ehi balanga mu Lubbebbulaniya baati Gabbasa amahulu gaalyo ti Ehyʼamabaale Amaalirire.
43019014	Esaawa jaali nga mukaaga ejomu muusi hu ludaalo olwʼohwetegehera Embaga eyʼOhuhebuliriraho Ohubihisya. Nga Pilaato aloma Abayudaaya abo ati, “Ale mwebonere habaha wenywe njʼoyo!”
43019015	Aye nga bahayaana baati, “Musimye humusimya! Musimye humusimya! Muhomerere hu musalabba!” Nga Pilaato ababuusa ati, “Mwenda komerere habaha wenywe hu musalabba?” Ngʼaŋo abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda bamugobolamo baati, “Hubula habaha owundi, ohutusaho Kayisaali.”
43019016	Ohwihahana, nga Pilaato abaŋa Yesu baje bamuhomerere hu musalabba. Ngʼaŋo abasirikale baŋamba Yesu bamuŋira.
43019017	Nga bamuŋira aŋa balanga baati, “Ehifo Ehyahaŋanga, mu Lubbebbulaniya ehi balanga baati Gologosa nʼabbeedire omusalabba gugwe.
43019018	Eyo peyi bahomerera Yesu hu musalabba nʼabasinde abandi babiri. Mulala hu bo hu luda olwʼomuhono gwa Yesu omulungi, nʼowundi hu mugooda.”
43019019	Nga Pilaato alagira baŋandiiha hu hipande baati, “YESU OMUSAALE WʼE NAZALEESI, HABAHA WʼABAYUDAAYA.” Nga batimba hu humusalabba gugwe.
43019020	Abayudaaya bangi basoma ebibono ebyo olwohuba bahomerera Yesu ŋaapi nʼe hibuga Yerusaalemu, ate ni babiŋandiihire mu Lubbebbulaniya nʼomu Lulatini ko nʼomu Luyonaani.
43019021	Abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nga batiina eyiri Pilaato bamuloma baati, “Hani sooŋandiihe oti, ‘Habaha wʼAbayudaaya’ aye oti, ‘Omusinde ono abaaye geranga habaha wʼAbayudaaya.’ ”
43019022	Ngʼaŋo Pilaato abagobolamo ati, “Ehipandiihire, njʼehipandiihire.”
43019023	Oluvanyuma lwʼabasirikale ohuhomerera Yesu hu musalabba baaŋira engoye jije, bajigabamo emigabo ene. Hiisi musirikale gafunaho omugabo nga ŋasigalaŋo ekaaso yoŋene. Ekaaso eyo sibayitunga nʼebuusi aye bayiruha huyiruha.
43019024	Ngʼaŋo abasirikale abo baloma baati, “Hulehe hutayinabulamo aye huhubbe ahalulu hasaleŋo anayiŋire.” Hino hyaliŋo, ohwoheresa ehyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Bagabana engoye jange, era ekaaso yange bayihubbiraho ahalulu.” Era ehyo njʼehi basirikale baahola.
43019025	Ohuupi aŋo nʼomusalabba ohu bahomerera Yesu, ŋaaliŋo nyina ni mulebe ya nyina, ni Malyamu muha Kulopaasi, ko ni Malyamu Magadaleeni.
43019026	Yesu ni gabona nyina nʼali aŋo era nʼomwegi wuwe oyu gaali ni genda obugali yeesi ni gemeereye aŋo huupi, ngʼaloma nyina ati, “Maama, ŋaahani oyo musaani wuwo.”
43019027	Era ngʼahena aloma omwegi oyo ati, “Oyo maawo.” Era ohuŋwa hulwo, ngʼomwegi oyo amuŋira engo wuwe amuhuuma.
43019028	Ngʼaŋo oluvanyuma lwʼebyo Yesu ni gamanya ati ŋaahani ahenire emirimo eji bamutuma ohuhola, era olwʼohwoheresa ehyaŋandiihiwa, ngʼaloma ati, “Enduŋo yinduma.”
43019029	Nga mulala hu basirikale aŋamba ehisumwa atimya mu juule wʼomwenge gwomu mizabbibbu ogwali ŋapi aŋo, ata hu hasaala aha balanga baati hayisopu ngʼahena adunda ahita hu munwa gwa Yesu.
43019030	Ni gahena ohususuuna hu juule wʼenvinyo eyo ngʼaloma ati, “Hiŋooye.” Ni gahena ohuloma atyo, ngʼahotamya omutwe, atondoha.
43019031	Ŋaahani, oludaalo olwo lwali lwʼohwetegehera obunahye ni lunahabe lwa Sabbaato olwʼenjabulo mu biseera ebyʼOhuhebuliriraho Ohubihisya. Olwʼohutenda emirambo jisigale hu musalabba ohwola hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato, abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya basunga Pilaato abafugiirire babbwaage amagulu gʼabaatu abo, baahafa mangu.
43019032	Ni gabafugiirira, ngʼabasirikale batiina babbwaga amagulu gʼomusinde omudaayi hu abo aba bahomerera ŋalala ni Yesu nga bahena baloosaho nʼagowundi yeesi.
43019033	Aye ni boola hu Yesu, bamutuhiira nʼahenire hale ohufa, olwʼehyo sibamubbwaga magulu.
43019034	Cooka mulala hu basirikale ngʼamufumita efumo mu mbafu ohuhahasa ti afuuye. Ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo amafugi nʼamaaji bitandiha ohwituluha ohuŋwa aŋa baamufumita.
43019035	Omuutu aloosa ebibono bino gaaliŋo gabyeboneraho nʼemoni era aloma ebi gabona. Aloma ebyene nʼebyene ebi gaabona. Gehahasa ati ebi aloma byʼamazima, era abiroma mwesi mwahafugiirira.
43019036	Ebyo byaliŋo, ohwoheresa ehyaŋandiihiwa ehiroma hiiti, “Eŋuma hu magumba gage, wayire erala eri balibbwaga.”
43019037	Era nʼohwoheresa ehyaŋandiihiwa ehindi ehiroma hiiti, “Emoni balijita hu oyo oyu bafumita.”
43019038	Oluvanyuma lwʼebyo, omusinde oyu balanga baati Yosefu gatiina eyiri Pilaato ngʼamusunga omulambo gwa Yesu. Omusinde oyo gaali musaale wʼomu habuga aha balanga baati Alimataaya era nʼali mulala hu baloobera ba Yesu aye mu ngiso olwʼohutya Abayudaaya. Ni bamufugiirira, ngʼatiina atusa omulambo gwa Yesu hu musalabba aguŋira.
43019039	Mu huŋira omulambo gwa Yesu, Yosefu gatiina nʼowahye oyu balanga baati Nekodemu. Nekodemu ono njʼowatiina eyiri Yesu owiire. Era mu hutiina ohusiiha omulambo, gatiina ni kalifuuŋa owahaloosa ahʼamaani oyu balanga baati miira nʼowundi baati aloowe ohuguŋaha.
43019040	Ngʼaŋo baŋira omulambo gwa Yesu, baguŋaha ebyʼahaloosa bahena bagwambiiha mu ngoye eja laasi, ngʼolu esambo yʼAbayudaaya eyʼohusiiha yaali.
43019041	Mu hifo aŋa bahomerera Yesu hu musalabba, ŋaaliŋo endimiro omwali ehigombe ehinyaaha era ni batasihangahomo muutu yesiyesi.
43019042	Olwohuba lwali ludaalo lwʼAbayudaaya ohwetegehera obunahye ni yinaahabe Sabbaato era ngʼolu higombe ehyo hyali ohuupi aŋo, bamuŋira bamuta omwo.
43020001	Hu ludaalo oludaayi mu wiiki, Malyamu Magadaleeni gatiina hu higombe hya Yesu mu mawiiwi, ngʼabona ni batuhiiseŋo ebaale eri baali ni begaliiye omulyango.
43020002	Olwʼehyo, gaduluma ngʼatiina eyiri Simooni Peetero nʼomwegi ola owundi Yesu oyu gendanga bugali, ngʼabaloma ati, “Batuhiise Musengwa mu higombe, sihumanyire aŋa bamutaaye!”
43020003	Ngʼaŋo Peetero nʼomwegi oyo batula batiina hu higombe.
43020004	Bombi baatiina ni baduluma aye omwegi ola gahira Peetero embiro, ngʼamweherera hu higombe.
43020005	Ni goola, ngʼahotama ohwetegeeresa, ngʼabona engoye ni jiri aŋo aye sigengira.
43020006	Ngʼaŋo Simooni Peetero owaali nʼamuŋwaho egongo goola nga gengira abona engoye ni jiri aŋo.
43020007	Ngʼabona nʼolugoye olwali hu mutwe gwa Yesu ni lwefumbire olwene ohwabuha hu jahye eja laasi.
43020008	Oluvanyuma omwegi ola oweheerera ohwola hu higombe, nga yeesi gengira. Gaabona era ngʼafugiirira.
43020009	Nʼomu hiseera ehyo bali sibategeera hibono ohuŋwa mu hyaŋandiihiwa ehyali ni hiroma hiiti Yesu gaali nʼohulamuha.
43020010	Ngʼaŋo abeegi abo bagamayo ewaawe.
43020011	Aye Malyamu Magadaleeni niye ngʼasigala aŋo ebulafu wʼehigombe nʼalira. Era nʼalira, gʼahotama galengeesa mu higombe,
43020012	ngʼabona abamalayika babiri mu ngoye ekosa ni behaaye. Mulala emutwe, owundi emagulu mu hifo aŋa baali ni bataaye omulambo gwa Yesu.
43020013	Ngʼabamalayika abo bamubuusa baati, “Muhasi ewe, olirira hi?” Nga niye abagobolamo ati, “Batuhiiseŋo Musengwa era simanyire eyi bamutaaye!”
43020014	Ni gahena ohuloma atyo, ngʼacuuha aheja egongo abona Yesu ni gemereeye aŋo, aye sigafaania ati nje niye.
43020015	Nga Yesu amubuusa ati, “Muhasi ewe, olirira hi? Njʼani oyu oli hwendula? Nga Malyamu aŋeega ati gaali njʼomwene ndimiro. Ngʼamuloma ati, ‘Muhulu,’ nʼoba ndiiwe amutuhiiseŋo, ndage aŋa omutaaye, tiine mutuseyo.”
43020016	Nga Yesu amulanga ati, “Malyamu!” Ngʼacuuha amuhejaho, ahena aloma mu Lubbebbulaniya ati, “Rabboni” (amahulu gahyo ati, “Musomesa”).
43020017	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Otanjerijaho, olwohuba kiiri hwagamayo mwigulu ewa Bbaabba. Aye tiina eyiri abalebe bange, obalomere oti: ‘Ndi hwagamayo mwigulu eyiri Bbaabba era Senywe; eyiri Hatonda wange era Hatonda wenywe.’ ”
43020018	Ngʼaŋo Malyamu Magadaleeni atiina, alomera abeegi ba Yesu ati, “Mbwene Musengwa.” Ngʼahena abalomera ebi gamuloma ohubalomera.
43020019	Hu ludaalo olwene olwo, egulo eryuba ni lihenire ohugwa mu maaji, abeegi ba Yesu baali ŋalala ni beyigaliriiye mu nyumba olwʼohutya abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya. Yesu gatiina gemeerera ŋagati waawe ngʼabaloma ati, “Emiyaaya jibe ni nenywe!”
43020020	Ni gahena ohuloma atyo, ngʼabalaga ebyaba nʼembafu jije. Abeegi basangaala bugali ohubona Musengwa.
43020021	Nga nindi Yesu abaloma ati, “Emiyaaya jibe ni nenywe. Ngʼolu Bbaabba gaatuma, keesi ndihubatuma.”
43020022	Ni gahena ohuloma atyo, ngʼabafuuŋaho omuuya ngʼabaloma ati, “Musune Omwoyo Omutukuvu.
43020023	Ni munasoniŋenga abaatu ebibi byawe, Hatonda yeesi anabasoniŋenga. Ne ni mutabasoniŋenga, ni Hatonda yeesi saaja hubasoniŋa.”
43020024	Tomasi oyu balanga erindi baati Didimo, mulala hu beegi ehumi nʼababiri sigaali nʼabahye olu Yesu gababonehera.
43020025	Abahye ni bamulomera baati, “Huweene Musengwa” niye gabagobolamo ati, “Ohutusaho nga mbwene emamba jʼemisumali mu byaba bibye naŋambamo, nʼamwabaaba nomu mbafu jije aŋa bamufumita efumo, sinja hufugiirira ebi muloma.”
43020026	Ni ŋabitaŋo ewiiki ndala, nindi abeegi ba Yesu ni bali mu nyumba, Tomasi yeesi gaaliŋo. Wayire enjigi jaali njigale, Yesu gatiina gemeerera ŋagati waawe, ngʼabaloma ati, “Emiyaaya jibe ni nenywe.”
43020027	Ngʼaŋo aloma Tomasi ati, “Leeta olwala lulwo olute ŋano. Bona emamba mu byaba byange. Leeta omuhono gugwo wabaabeho mu mbafu aŋa baafumita. Leheraŋo ohubuusabuusa, fugiirira.”
43020028	Nga Tomasi amugobolamo ati, “Musengwa yange era Hatonda wange!”
43020029	Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Olwohuba wumbwene, cʼehifa ofugiirira. Aye bali nʼekabi abo abafugiirira ni ŋaŋuma ehi baweeneho.”
43020030	Yesu gahola obubonero bungi obweŋunjisa, abeegi babe ni babona cooka bwosibwosi sibabuŋandiiha mu hitabo hino.
43020031	Aye buno babuŋandiiha, mwahafugiirira muuti Yesu nje Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu, era ti Mwana wa Hatonda, onamufugiirira osuna obulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
43021001	Ni ŋabitirehoŋo endaalo, Yesu nindi gabonehera balala hu beegi babe, hu nyanja eyʼe Tibberiya. Ŋaahani hyali hiiti,
43021002	Simooni Peetero ni Tomasi, oyu balanga erindi baati, “Didimo,” ni Nasanayiri omusaale wʼe Kaana mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya, nʼabasaani ba Zebbedaayo, nʼabeegi abandi babiri bosibosi baali ŋalala.
43021003	Nga Simooni Peetero aloma abahye abo ati, “Ese tiina ohwinula enyeeni.” Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Hwesi leha hutiine ni neewe.” Nga batula batiina baniina eryato. Aye owiire owo wosiwosi sibaŋambyaho hiitu.
43021004	Nga mu mugamba Yesu aboneha ni gemereeye hu egenya lyʼenyanja, aye abeegi babe sibategeera baati nje niye.
43021005	Ngʼabanaŋia omunwa aloma ati, “Bahyange, muŋambisyeho enyeeni?” Nga nibo bamugobolamo baati, “Bbe.”
43021006	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Mudanye ahatimba henywe mu maaji hu lubega olulungi olwʼeryato, munaŋambye.” Ni badanya ahatimba habahayisa ohuhwesa olwʼobungi wʼenyeeni eji baali ni baŋambisye.
43021007	Ngʼaŋo omwegi oyu Yesu gendanga bugali, aloma Peetero ati, “Nje Musengwa.” Aŋo ni naaŋo Simooni Peetero ni gaŋulira omwegi oyo nʼaloma ati, “Nje Musengwa,” nga gesidiha olugoye olu gambaliranga humugulu, olwohuba gaali alwetuhiseeho. Ni gahena, ngʼatuuma agwa mu maaji atiina eyiri Yesu.
43021008	Abeegi abandi balondaho mu lyato, ni bahwesa ahatimba ahaali ni hejuuye enyeeni. Sibaali ŋale nʼohwigenya, ahanaaŋiro hʼemita nga cikumi.
43021009	Ni boola hu woomu, nga babona ni baŋwene omuliro ni batayeeho enyeeni, ko nʼemigaati ni jiri aŋo.
43021010	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Muleeteho hu nyeeni eji muŋambisye.”
43021011	Nga Simooni Peetero atiina aniina eryato, ahwesa ahatimba goosa hu woomu. Haali hejuuye agayeeni cikumi ataanu nʼedatu. Aye wayire agayeeni gaali gangi, ahatimba sihakapuha.
43021012	Nga Yesu abaloma ati, “Ale muuje mulyeho ehyomu mugamba.” Ŋaŋuma hu beegi abo owamubuusa ati, “Ndiiwe ani,” olwohuba bategeera baati gaali nje Musengwa.
43021013	Nga Yesu abugula omugaati abaŋa, ngʼahena abaŋa nʼenyeeni.
43021014	Yino yaali funda yahudatu Yesu ohubonehera abeegi babe, oluvanyuma lwʼohulamuha.
43021015	Ni bahena ohulya, nga Yesu aloma Simooni Peetero ati, “Simooni, omwana wa Yona, mu butuufu wunyenda ohuhiraho abahyo?” Ngʼamugobolamo ati, “Musengwa, omanyire oti kwenda.” Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Labiriranga enyana jʼetaama jange.”
43021016	Nga nindi efunda eyohubiri amubuusa ati, “Simooni omwana wa Yona, wunyenda?” Nga Simooni amugobolamo ati, “Musengwa, omanyire oti kwenda.” Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Labiriranga etaama jange.”
43021017	Nga nindi efunda eyohudatu amubuusa ati, “Simooni, omwana wa Yona, wunyenda?” Nga Peetero mula aŋulira bubi olwohuba Yesu amubuuhiise efunda eyohudatu ati, “Wunyenda?” Ngʼamugobolamo ati, “Musengwa, omanyire byosibyosi, omanyire oti kwenda.” Nga Yesu amuloma ati, “Ale labiriranga etaama jange.
43021018	Kulomera ehituufu ti, ni waali nʼohiiri muŋere, wambalanga watiina eyi wahendire, aye nʼoliŋangala balihusidiha emihono, nga bahuŋira hyʼomusibe eyi otenda hutiina.”
43021019	Yesu galoma atyo, nʼategeesa efa eyi Peetero alifamo ohuŋeesa Hatonda eŋono. Yesu ni gahena ohuloma atyo ngʼaloma Peetero ati, “Wegumye ohuba muloobera wange.”
43021020	Nga Peetero acuuha abona omwegi oyu Yesu gendanga bugali nʼabalondaho. Omwegi oyo njʼola owediiye hu Yesu olu baali hu hiiŋulo ni balya, owʼabuusa Yesu ati, “Musengwa, njʼani aja huhulyamo oluhwe?”
43021021	Peetero ni gamubona, ngʼabuusa Yesu ati, “Musengwa, ate oyo aliba atye?”
43021022	Nga Yesu amugobolamo ati, “Singa nenda asigale nʼali mulamu ohwola olu ndi gobola, ehyo hihuŋambiraho ŋe? Ewe yegumye ohuba muloobera wange.”
43021023	Olwa Yesu ohuloma atyo, hyasasaana mu boluganda hiiti omwegi oyo saaja hufa. Aye Yesu sigaloma ati saaja hufa, ohutusaho galoma ati, “Singa nenda ti atafa ohwola olu ndi gobola, hihuŋambiraho ŋe?”
43021024	Omwegi oyo geboneyeeho ebiitu ebyo nʼemoni jije era gaabiŋandiiha. Humanyire huuti ebi aloma bituufu.
43021025	Yesu gahola ebiitu ebyene ebingi. Era singa baŋandiiha hiisi hiitu, mu hyalo hyosihyosi ŋahaŋumire aŋa bahataaye ebitabo ebi bahaŋandiihire.
44001001	Owʼeŋono Tefiiro, mu hitabo hyange ehidaayi nahuŋandiihira ni kuloohesa ebyo ebi Yesu gatiina nʼahola era nʼasomesa ohuŋwa olu gatandiha ohuhola omulimo gugwe,
44001002	ohwolera erala hu ludaalo olu gatiina mwigulu nʼahenire ohulaabbira abahwenda babe abagatobola, Omwoyo Omutukuvu nʼamutangirira.
44001003	Abanamaani ni bamuhomerera hu musalabba, gafa bamusiiha aye ngʼalamuha. Ni galamuha gahena endaalo amahumi ane nʼatiina nʼabonehera abahwenda babe abo ŋano ni naŋala ohuhahasa ati dala gaali mulamu era gabalomeranga ebiŋamba hu Hatonda nʼobuŋugi bubwe mu bulamu bwʼabo abamufugiirira.
44001004	Lulala ni gaali ni nabo ni bali hu hiiŋulo gabaloma ati, “Simuŋwanga mu Yerusaalemu ohwola olu Bbaabba alibaŋeeresa ehirabo ehyʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu oyu gabasuubisa ngʼolu mbayenga ni mbalomera.
44001005	Yowaane omubatiza gabatizanga abaatu nʼamaaji aye enywe mu ndaalo ejitali jaŋaleeŋi muja hubatiziwa mu Omwoyo Omutukuvu.”
44001006	Nindi olundi ni baali ni bahumbeene, abahwenda babuusa Yesu baati, “Olwo Musengwa, mu hiseera ehyene ehyo kehi olibbingiramo Abarooma abatuŋuga ewe waŋuga Yisirayiri hya Dawudi omuhalehale olu gaŋuganga?”
44001007	Yesu ngʼabagobolamo ati, “Sihyenywe ohumanya ebiseera oba oludaalo lwʼebyo ebiri mu tegeha nʼobuŋangi bwa Bbaabba.”
44001008	Wabula ehi muli nʼohumanya hiri hiiti Omwoyo Omutukuvu nʼanahabeheho anahabaleetere ohuba nʼobuŋangi mwalomera abaatu bomu hibuga Yerusaalemu, abomu twale eryʼe Buyudaaya nʼerye Samaliya ko nʼabomu hyalo hyosihyosi ebipambaho.
44001009	Ni gagwisa ebibono ebyo, nga Hatonda amuŋira mwigulu. Gatiina bosibosi ni bamutaayeho emoni ohwola olu ehireri hyamuwiiha gaabagotaho.
44001010	Baali bahirengereeye engira eyamuŋira ŋa mugulu, ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo ŋabaaŋo abasinde babiri abaali ni bambaaye engoye ekosa abaaja bemeerera aŋa baali.
44001011	Ngʼabasinde abo bababuusa baati, “Enywe abasinde bʼe Galilaaya, hiina ehibemeerehise ŋano ni mulengereeye ŋamugulu? Yesu oyo oyu muweene nʼatiina mwigulu po aligobola atyo ngʼolu mumuweene nʼatiina.”
44001012	Ngʼaŋo abahwenda baŋwa aŋa baali hu lusozi olwʼemisaala ejibalanga baati Emizayiti baagamayo mu hibuga Yerusaalemu. Olusozi olwo lwali suulu nʼomunwa ohuŋwa mu hibuga ehyo.
44001013	Ni boola mu Yerusaalemu nga bengira mu nyumba omu bamenyanga, baniina mu hisenge hyawe ehyali ŋamugulu. Abaatu bano baali nje Peetero ni Yowaane ni Yakobbo nʼAndereya ni Filipo ni Tomasi ni Bbatulumaayo ni Matayo ni Yakobbo omwana wʼAlufaayo ni Simooni omuzelote ni Yuda omwana wa Yakobbo.
44001014	Abaatu bano bosibosi ko nʼabahasi abagenderanga ŋalala ni Yesu nga pomuli abaganda babe ni nyina Malyamu bahumbaananga aŋa ni naŋa ohusaba.
44001015	Lulala mu biseera ebyene ebyo, Peetero gemeerera ŋagati mu bahye abaali ni bafugiirira Kurisito abaali ni baŋera abaatu nga cikumi nʼabiri ngʼabaloma ati,
44001016	“Aboluganda, Ehyaŋandiihiwa ehi Omwoyo Omutukuvu gawihulira habaha Dawudi hyali nʼohwolerera. Ehyaŋandiihiwa ehyo hiŋamba hu Yuda owatangirira abaja ohuŋamba Yesu
44001017	ate nga gaali wahyefe, yeesi oyu Yesu gangala hyefe huhole obuŋeeresa buno.”
44001018	(Ebbeesa eji bamuŋaaye olwʼehikolwa hihye ehyo ehibi bajigulamo ehisugu era mu weene omwo ni geetuga, gaŋanuha hu musaala ohu geetugira gagwa ngʼehida hyosuha nʼebyomuhida nga bijofumuha.
44001019	Hiisi muutu mu hibuga Yerusaalemu gaŋulira ehiitu ehyo era baguliha nʼehifo ehyo esiina mu lulimi lwawe baati Akeludama amahulu galyo ti, “Ehisugu hyʼamafugi.”)
44001020	Ngʼaŋo Peetero atiina mu moni abaloma ati, “Dawudi gaŋandiiha mu hitabo hya Zabbuli ati, “ ‘Leha ehibbwe hyembere mu gunda lirye, ŋaŋume amenyamo.’ “Era ati, “ ‘Ehifo hihye bahiŋe omuutu obundi.’
44001021	“Olwʼehyo hyenda mwangale omuutu owundi agendire ni neefe ehiseera hyosihyosi ehi hubaaye ni Yesu Musengwa,
44001022	ohwemera erala mu biseera bya Yowaane omubatiza ohwola olu Yesu gatiina mwigulu, agobole mu hifo hya Yuda atweŋimbeho mu hulomera abaatu ngʼolu Yesu galamuha.”
44001023	Ngʼaŋo baleeta amasiina gʼabaatu babiri, Yosefu oyu balanganga baati Barusabba ko nʼerindi baati Yusito ko nʼowundi ni bamulanga baati Matiya.
44001024	Nga basaba baati, “Musengwa ndiiwe omanyire ebiri mu myoyo jʼabaatu bosibosi. Olwʼehyo husunga otulage oyu ewe omwene otobooye hu bano bombi,
44001025	agobole mu hifo hya Yuda mu mulimo gwʼobuhwenda ogu niye galeha gaaja emusaanira.”
44001026	Ni bahubba ahalulu, hagwa hu nje Matiya era nga geŋimba hu bahwenda bala ehumi namulala.
44002001	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, oludaalo lwʼembaga eyi balanga baati Petekoote ni lwola, abafugiirira Kurisito bosibosi baali bahumbeene mu hifo hirala mu hibuga Yerusaalemu.
44002002	Baali bahiiri aŋo nga aŋo ni naaŋo baŋulira ohwoluuma hyʼohwepunga enyene eyʼamaani ni huŋwera mwigulu nga huŋulirihana mu nyumba mwosimwosi omu baali ni behaaye.
44002003	Ngʼaŋo babona nʼebiitu ebyali ni bifaana oti hani ndimi jʼomuliro era nga jeyabulamo jiiha hu hiisi mulala hu bafugiirira Kurisito abo.
44002004	Nga bosibosi Omwoyo Omutukuvu abamaamira era nga batandiha ohuloma mu ndimi ejindi eji baali ni batamanyire, Omwoyo omwene nʼali njʼabalomya endimi ejo.
44002005	Ŋaahani mu biseera ebyo, ŋaaliŋo Abayudaaya abanadiini abaali ni baŋooye mu mawanga agenjabulo ni bali mu Yerusaalemu olwʼembaga eyo.
44002006	Abaatu abo ni baŋulira ohwoluuma hula ohwali hyʼohwa epunga enyene eyʼamaani nga baŋindigana bahumbaanira aŋali abafugiirira Kurisito. Ehyabahenaho ebyeŋungula nje hiisi mulala hu bo ohuŋulira abafugiirira ni baloma mu ndimi ejitali jaawe.
44002007	Ngʼaŋo bebuusa baati, “Abaatu bano bosibosi si Bagalilaaya abatamanyire ndimi jeefe?
44002008	Hiija hiitye ohuba ti baloma endimi jeefe?
44002009	Abaperusi, Abameedi nʼAbalaamu, nʼejabaŋwa mu Mesopotamya, Buyudaaya ni Kapadokiya; Pooto nʼAsiya,
44002010	Fulugiya nomu Pafiliya; Misiri nomu matwale ga Libbiya agali ohuupi nʼe Kireene nʼabandi ni bali bageni abahyaye ŋano ohuŋwa e Rooma,
44002011	nga pomuli Abayudaaya nʼabalugendwa abengira ediini yʼEhiyudaaya! Era nʼabandi abaŋwa hu hizinga hyʼe Kureete nʼAbaŋarabbu? Cooka hwesihwesi huli huŋulira ni baloma mu ndimi jeefe enyene hu byamaliholiho ebi Hatonda aholire!”
44002012	Hino hyabatangalasa era nga bebuusa abeene nʼabeene baati, “Hino hitegeesa hina?”
44002013	Aye abandi nga babajeeja hubajeeja ni babalanga bameesi abehapiiye omwenge!
44002014	Ngʼaŋo Peetero gemeerera ŋalala nʼabahwenda bahye ehumi namulala ngʼabaloma nʼadundireho ejanjaasi ati, “Bayudaaya bahyange ko ni nʼenywe mwesimwesi abamenya mu hibuga Yerusaalemu, mutegere ohutwi muŋulirise ehi ndoma.
44002015	Abaatu bano ko ni neese samwene sihuli bameesi ngʼolu abandi hunywe muŋeega olwohuba ko jiri esaawa edatu ejomu mugamba ate ngʼolu mumanyire sibaŋuuna humeera!
44002016	Ohutusaho hino hyoherehiise ebibono ebi Hatonda galomera mu naabbi Yoweeri ati,
44002017	“Mu ndaalo ejʼoluvanyuma, ndiŋeeresa Omwoyo wange hu baatu bosibosi aŋabula hubihisya. Olwʼehyo, abasaani benywe nʼabahaana benywe, baja hulomera abaatu ehibono hyange. Abaseere benywe balyolesewa, nʼabaatu abahulu mu gwanga ndibalootesa ebirooto.
44002018	Mu ndaalo ejo, ndiŋa abaŋeeresa bange abasinde nʼabahasi Omwoyo wange Omutukuvu nga balomera abaatu ehibono hyange.
44002019	Ndihola ŋa mugulu mu bbanga ebiitu ebiryeŋunjisa abaatu ko nʼebyamaliholiho ebiriraga obuŋangi bwange hu hyalo. Hu hyalo hulibaho ohujijuha hwʼamafugi mu baatu ko nʼomuliro nʼeriisi ebiitu ni biguhuuliha.
44002020	Eryuba ŋamugulu linahabeho enjirema, nʼomwesi gulicuuha gwafaana hyʼamafugi. Ebyo njʼebiribaŋo ngʼoludaalo oluhulu olu Musengwa alisaliraho emisango ko lwola.
44002021	Aye ni luliba ni luhiiri hwola, hiisi aliranga Musengwa nʼamusunga ohumunoŋola, ali munoŋola.”
44002022	Nga Peetero geyongera aloma ati, “Bayisirayiri bahyange, mwetege mbalomere. Muhimanyire bulaŋi muuti Yesu omusaale wʼomu hibuga hyʼe Nazaleesi ni gaali nʼahiiri mu hyalo muno Hatonda gamuŋa ohuhola ebyamaliholiho ebyʼamaani ohuhahasa ati njʼoyu gafuujaho amate ohuuja ohubanoŋola.
44002023	Wayire hyali hiityo, mwaleha baamuŋayo eyiri abaatu ababi abatamanyire Hatonda. Cooka mu tegeha yiye omwene, Hatonda gamanya ati hino hiribaŋo era gaaganya hyolerera nga mweŋimba nʼabaatu abo abatamanyire Hatonda bamwita ni bamuhomerera hu musalabba.
44002024	Aye Hatonda sigaganya amaani gʼohufa hu muboŋera e magombe era gamulamusa nindi gaaba mulamu.
44002025	Habaha Dawudi gamulomaho ati, “ ‘Hiisi obuhya mbona Hatonda Musengwa naali ni neese. Era olwohuba ali ni neese, sinja hweŋendeherera.
44002026	Cʼehigira ni kujumirya ewe Hatonda wange, nʼomwoyo gwange ni guli musangaafu
44002027	olwohuba ndi suubi ti, wayire ndifa olindamusa. Solireha mwoyo gwange ohusigala e magombe, era soliganya Omwabufu wuwo ohubolerayo.
44002028	Wundagire amagira agaapira mu bulamu. Onahanjijuse esangaalo olwohuba nja huberereranga ni neewe.’ ”
44002029	Nga Peetero geyongera aloma ati, “Aboluganda, mbalomera hino ni mbula ehinemoota. Sehulu yeefe habaha Dawudi era omwene huloma bibono ebyo gafa nʼamagombe gage galiŋo nʼohwosa olwa leero luno.
44002030	Dawudi gaali naabbi era gamanya ati Hatonda geeyama era gaalayira nʼohulayira ati mulala hu bejuhulu babe alisikira etebe eyʼobwahabaha buwe.
44002031	Era olwʼohumanya ebyali ni bija hubaŋo, galoma hu hulamuha hwa Kurisito oyu Hatonda gafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu ati Hatonda sigaali nʼaja humuleha ohusigala e magombe era omubiri gugwe sigwabola.
44002032	Hatonda galamusa Yesu era efe abaloobera babe hwamweboneraho nʼemoni era huli bajulizi bʼohulamuha huhwe ohwo.
44002033	Ni gatiina mwigulu Hatonda era Semwana gamuŋa eŋono gamuta hu tebe yʼobuŋugi ohuŋuga ni naye era gaamuŋa Omwoyo Omutukuvu oyu gamusuubisa era hwesi gatuyombolaho ehirabo hihye ehyo, mwesi mweboneraho era njʼehiri hutulomya ebi muŋulira.”
44002034	Dawudi niye sigatiina mwigulu aye aloma ati, “Hatonda Musengwa gaaloma Musengwa yange ati, ‘Yiihala ni wundireene hu lubega olwʼomuhono gwange omulungi
44002035	ohwola olu ndifuula abasigu babo ekokolo eyʼohutaho amagulu gago.’ ”
44002036	“Olwʼehyo abaatu bosibosi mu Yisirayiri bali nʼohumanya baati Yesu oyo oyu mwaŋayo bamuhomerera hu musalabba njʼoyu Hatonda gafuujaho amate gamufuula Musengwa era Kurisito Omunoŋosi wʼabaatu.”
44002037	Abaatu abo ni baŋulira ebibono ebyo nga bibasimita hu myoyo era nga babuusa Peetero nʼabahwenda bahye baati, “Aboluganda huhole hiina konyo Hatonda atusoniŋe?”
44002038	Nga Peetero abagobolamo ati, “Mwebbwage mucuuse emyoyo era hiisi mulala hu nywe abatiziwe mu siina lya Yesu Kurisito ko babasoniŋe ebibi byenywe. Era ni munahole ehyo, mwesi munasune ehirabo hyʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu,
44002039	olwohuba Hatonda gasuubisa ohuhibaŋa enywe nʼabaana benywe ko nʼabaatu bosibosi abalimufugiirira wayire nga bamuli ŋaleeŋi. Hatonda Musengwa aliŋa hiisi muutu oyu alanga gatiina eyi ali ehirabo hino ehyʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu.”
44002040	Nʼatambisa ebibono ebindi ebiŋeraho, Peetero geyongera ohubegalihira nʼohubalabula nʼaloma ati, “Musabe abanoŋole muŋone ehiguudyo ehinahoole hu baatu ababi abomu mulembe guno.”
44002041	Ngʼaŋo hu ludaalo olwo abaatu ngʼekumi edatu bafugiirira ebibono bibye era nga babatiziwa.
44002042	Ngʼaŋo abaatu abo abafugiirira Kurisito bosibosi begumya ohwega ebi abahwenda babasomesanga nʼohuhumbaananga ŋalala ngʼaboluganda ohusaba nʼohuliira ŋalala.
44002043	Abaatu bosibosi mu hibuga omwo nga beŋunja olwʼebyamaliholiho ebingi ebi bahwenda baholanga era nga bibaleetera ohuŋa Hatonda eŋono.
44002044	Abafugiirira abo bosibosi baali nʼobulala era begumya ohuhumbaananga ŋalala nʼohutambisanga hitabwe ebiitu ebi hiisi mulala galinga ni nabyo.
44002045	Abalinga nʼebiitu babitundanga bayeeda abahyawe abaali ni baŋuma hyʼohweŋambaho.
44002046	Habuhyabuhya begumyanga ohuhumbaanira hu Yekaalu ohujumirya Hatonda era hiisi mulala mu mago gage geŋulanga ebiryo nʼomwoyo mulala era gaabirya nʼabahye mu sangaalo.
44002047	Mu hiisi hiitu bajumiryanga Hatonda, nʼabaatu bosibosi mu Yerusaalemu baasiimanga esambo jaabwe. Era hiisi owahyanga Yesu Musengwa gongerangaho omuŋendo gwʼabaatu abanoŋohanga ohuŋwa mu bibi byawe.
44003001	Lulala Peetero ni Yowaane batiina hu Yekaalu egulo hu nyanga eyʼomwenda ohusaba.
44003002	Ŋaahani ŋaaliŋo omusinde owaŋwa mu hida hya nyina ni hyamufutafuta oyu hiisi ludaalo baŋiranga beehasa ŋa mulyango ogwingira mu lunya lwa Yekaalu ogu balanganga baati: “Omulyango Omuŋoono,” ohusungirisa ebbeesa hu baatu abengiranga.
44003003	Omusinde oyo ni gabona Peetero ni Yowaane ni babitaŋo ohwingira mu Yekaalu ngʼabasunga ebbeesa.
44003004	Nga Peetero ni Yowaane bamusimba emoni, nga Peetero ahena amuloma ati, “Tuhejeho.”
44003005	Ngʼola abahejaho nʼasuubira ati banamuŋeho ahaatu.
44003006	Aye Peetero ngʼamuloma ati, “Ese puma bbeesa ejʼohuhuŋa aye ehi ndi ni nahyo cʼehi kuŋa. Mu buŋangi obu Yesu Kurisito owʼe Nazaleesi gaapa yinyoha ogende.”
44003007	Ni galoma atyo ngʼamuŋamba hu muhono omulungi amwinyosa. Aŋo ni naaŋo ngʼamagulu gʼoyu hyali ni hifutafutire gahahadala.
44003008	Nga hino himuŋa amaani ahuhutuha gemeerera, atandiha ohugenda gengira ni nabo mu lunya lwa Yekaalu nʼagenda nʼohupuluha nʼapuluha era nʼajumirya Hatonda.
44003009	Abaatu bosibosi abaali mu lunya lwa Yekaalu ni bamubona nʼagenda era nʼajumirya Hatonda,
44003010	baahena bamufaania baati njʼomusinde ola oweehalanga ŋa mulyango ogwingira mu Yekaalu ogu balanga baati: Omulyango Omuŋoono nʼasungirisa nga beŋunja bugali weene ehyali ni himwolireho.
44003011	Omusinde ola owasungirisanga ni gaali nʼahyeboŋire hu Peetero ni Yowaane abaatu bosibosi abaali mu Yekaalu bamubona beŋunja bugali era nga badulumaho baja bahumbaanira aŋa baali mu lunya lwa Yekaalu mu hifo ehi balanga baati “Ehigangu hya Sulemaani.”
44003012	Peetero ni gabona atyo ngʼabaloma ati, “Bayisirayiri bahyange, ehyʼomusinde ono ohugenda hitabeŋunjisa ohwola aŋo era mwatulengerera olwaga aŋo oti hani buŋangi ŋalala nʼobugwalaafu bwefe mbebimuleeteeye ohutandiha ohugenda.
44003013	Hatonda wa Yibbulayimu ni Yisaka ni Yakobbo, abasehulu beefe, gasalaŋo ohugulumisa Yesu omuŋeeresa wuwe oyu enywe mwegaana mu moni ja Pilaato olu abatangirisi benywe bamwemeha mu moni jije ohumuŋosesya, wayire nga Pilaato niye gaali asalireŋo ohumulehula.
44003014	Enywe mwasalaŋo ohwegaana Yesu oyu Hatonda gangala era owaholanga ebiruŋamu nʼabula musango mwasunga balehule omutemu owaali ni geetire abaatu.
44003015	Oyo omwene bulamu era agira abaatu bosibosi baaba nʼobulamu obutaŋwaŋo njʼoyu mwaŋayo beeta aye Hatonda gamulamusa ohuŋwa mu bafu. Era efe huli bajulizi bʼohulamuha huhwe.
44003016	Yesu oyu hufugiirira ahahadahise omusinde ono oyu mubona era oyu mumanyire. Olwʼohwesiga obuŋangi bwa Yesu njʼehireeteeye omusinde ono ohuŋona era gaba muhwiye ngʼolu mwesimwesi mumubona.
44003017	“Ŋaahani balebe, ese manyire ti ebi enywe nʼabaŋugi benywe mwahola Yesu mwabihola lwʼobuŋaayi.
44003018	Ne omwo pomu Hatonda gabita ko goherese ebigasuubisa abaatu nʼabita mu banaabbi ni galoma ati ebyo mbebi balihola Kurisito oyu gafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu.
44003019	Olwʼehyo mwebbwage mugobole eyiri Hatonda abasoniŋe ebibi, era Musengwa agobose bunyaaha obulamu bwenywe.
44003020	Ni munahole ehyo Hatonda nindi anahabatumire Omunoŋosi ate nga si bundi wabula naali nje Yesu omwene oyo.
44003021	Cooka nga Yesu aja huhola nʼahiiri mwigulu ohwola olu Hatonda anahagobose bunyaaha ebiitu byosibyosi ebigawumba ngʼolu gahisuubisa ahale nʼabita mu banaabbi babe abagwalaafu abaaliŋo ahale.
44003022	Olwohuba Musa naabbi wa Hatonda galoma ati, ‘Musengwa Hatonda wenywe alibatumira naabbi ohuŋwa mu balebe benywe abeene ngʼolu gaatuma ese. Nʼalija mudembuhiranga byosibyosi ebi alibaloma.
44003023	Aye hiisi muutu atalihola ebi naabbi oyo aliroma aliba sahiiri muutu wa Hatonda era bamusihiirisanga ohuŋwa mu baatu ba Hatonda.’
44003024	“Era abanaabbi bosibosi ohuŋwera erala hu Samwiri baloma hu biriŋo endaalo jino ebiŋamba hu Yesu.
44003025	Enywe ni neefe ndiife aba Hatonda gasuubisa Omunoŋosi nʼabita mu banaabbi, era nʼendagaano eyi galagaana nʼabasehulu bʼefe, efe hwesi huyiganyulwamo. Galoma Sehulu yeefe Yibbulayimu ati, ‘Abaatu abamawanga gosigosi mu hyalo balisuna ekabi ni jiŋwa mu lusaaye lulwo.’
44003026	Olwʼehyo, Hatonda ni gatuma Yesu omuŋeeresa wuwe omuhoda hu hyalo, gehereeye hu mutuma eyi muli abaŋe ekabi mucuuhe muŋwe mu bibi byenywe mutagihe ohuhola ebimusangaasa.”
44004001	Peetero ni Yowaane ni baali ni bahiiroma eyiri ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu, ngʼabasengi nʼomuhulu wʼabasirikale abahuuma Yekaalu ŋalala nʼAbasadukaayo batiina eyi baali.
44004002	Abaatu abo baali nʼehiruŋi ehyʼamaani olwohuba mbo abahwenda abo ababiri baali basomesa abaatu baati Hatonda aliramusa abaatu ngʼolu Yesu galamuha.
44004003	Ngʼaŋo abaatu abo baŋamba abahwenda abo babadanya mu komera ohwola mu mugamba ko babaŋosesye olwohuba hyali hiseera hyʼegulo ni batafugiirira hubaŋohesya hu nyanga eyo.
44004004	Cooka bangi hu abo abaŋulira ebibono ebi Peetero galoma bafugiirira Kurisito era omuŋendo gwʼabafugiirira nga gweyongera ohwola abasinde ngʼekumi etaanu nʼotataayeho bahasi nʼabaana.
44004005	Ni bwahya, abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya nʼabaatu abahulu mu gwanga lyabwe ko nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi gʼAbayudaaya behumbaania ŋalala mu hibuga Yerusaalemu.
44004006	Mu bahumbaana mwalimo omuhulu wʼabasengi ba Hatonda oyu balanganga baati Anaasi ni Kayaafa owaali nʼamusikiiye, ni Yowaane nʼAlekizanda ko nʼabandi abomu lulyo lwʼomuhulu wʼabasengi.
44004007	Ni bahumbaana nga balagira abahuumi baleeta Peetero ni Yowaane babemeha mu moni jaawe batandiha ohubaŋosesya ni bababuusa baati, “Mutusa ŋeena obuŋangi obwʼohuhola ebi mwaholire?”
44004008	Ngʼaŋo Omwoyo Omutukuvu amaamira Peetero amuŋa obugumu abaloma ati, “Enywe abatangirisi beefe ko nʼabaatu abahulu mu gwanga lino mwetege mbalomere!
44004009	Hanye mutwemehire hweŋosyeho olwʼehikolwa ehiraŋi ehyʼohuŋonia omusinde oyo owaali omuleme nʼohubalomera ngeri hi eyi hwamuŋonisyemo,
44004010	ale enywe nʼabaatu ba Yisirayiri abandi mwesimwesi muhimanye muuti gaŋonire hu lwʼobuŋangi wa Yesu Kurisito owʼe Nazaleesi, oyu mwahomerera hu musalabba aye Hatonda gamulamusa. Yesu njʼagemire omusinde oyo gaba ti gemereeye ŋano mu moni jenywe nʼaŋonire.
44004011	Yesu njʼoyu ebyaŋandiihiwa biromaho biiti ‘Ebaale eri enywe abatongoli mutala, njʼeryafuuha eryʼomugaso mu gosigosi.’
44004012	Yesu nje yeŋene aŋanga ohutunoŋola. Ŋabula ngira yindi ŋano hu hyalo eyi omuutu aŋanga ohubitamo ohunoŋoha ohuŋwa mu bibi ohutusaho nʼabita mu ye.”
44004013	Abomu hahiiho ni babona obusira bwa Peetero ni Yowaane ate bahifaania baati baali baatu bahabuhyabuhya abaali ni batemangaho nʼomu somero nga beŋunja era nga bahena bahihahasa baati abasinde abo baali balobera ba Yesu.
44004014	Cooka olwohuba omusinde ola oyu baali ni baŋonisye gaali yeesi gemereeye mu moni jaawe ohuupi ni Peetero ni Yowaane, byabatangaliha bahaya ehyʼohuloma.
44004015	Olwʼehyo baalagira babatuse ebulafu basooke beteesemo.
44004016	Ni babatusa nga beteesamo ni bebuusa baati, “Huhole hutye abasinde bano? Abaatu bosibosi mu Yerusaalemu bahenire ohumanya ehyamaliholiho hino ehyʼamaani ehibaholire era sihuŋanga hugaana huuti sihyaliŋo!
44004017	Wayire hiri hiityo huli nʼohuhinga ehiitu ehyo ohweyongera ohugenda mu baatu. Olwʼehyo huteehwa ohulabula abasinde bano ni hubaloma huuti nindi ni hulibaŋulisaho ni basomesa omuutu yesiyesi hu biŋamba hu Yesu sibaliruŋona.”
44004018	Ni bagobosa Peetero ni Yowaane mu luhiiho, nga babahamiirisa nindi ohutagobolaho ohulomera wayire ohusomesa omuutu yesiyesi ebiŋamba hu Yesu.
44004019	Aye Peetero ni Yowaane nga babagobolamo baati, “Muŋeega muuti hiruuŋamu efe ohuholera hu byenywe ohuhira ohudembuhira Hatonda?
44004020	Efe sihuŋanga huŋoolera hu ebyo ebihwabona nʼemoni jeefe nʼebihweŋulirira nʼamatwi geefe.”
44004021	AbʼOluhiiho lwʼAbayudaaya Olubbala ni bahaya ehi baneŋambye ko bababonerese, nga babaloma ebibono ebibatiisatiisa nga babaleha batiina. Hino bahihola olwʼohutya abaatu abaali aŋo ni bajumirya Hatonda olwʼehyamaliholiho ehi baali ni beboneyeeho abeene nʼemoni jaawe.
44004022	Omusinde ola oyu baŋonia gaali abisya mu myaha amahumi ane ejʼobuhulu olwʼehyo hyali ŋalafu ti gaali saaŋanga huŋona ohutusaho Hatonda omwene nʼamuŋonisye.
44004023	Abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya ni bahena ohubalehula, Peetero ni Yowaane baŋamba engira baagama eyiri abahyawe babalomeraho byosibyosi ebi abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda nʼabaatu abahulu mu gwanga ebi babahamiirisa.
44004024	Abahyawe bosibosi ni baŋulira nga bagangamusa amajanjaasi basaba baati, “O Musengwa omwene buŋangi era omwene hutonda egulu nʼehyalo nʼenyanja ko ni hiisi hiitu ehirimo.
44004025	Omwoyo wuwo Omutukuvu galomera mu sehulu yeefe Dawudi omuŋeeresa wuwo ati, “ ‘Lwahiina Abatali Bayudaaya bahuluŋira ohwaga aŋo era abaatu abo abatahumanyire bagesyaho ohuhusalira oluhwe?
44004026	Abahabaha bomu hyalo bahwesoomera, nʼabaŋugi abandi mu hyalo bahumbaana ŋalala, ohusoosa Hatonda Musengwa ni nooyo oyu gafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu.’
44004027	“Musengwa, ebyo ebi waloma bituufu byene olwohuba habaha Herode ni Pootiyo Pilaato behobaana nʼabalugendwa ko nʼAbayisirayiri bahumbaanira ŋano mu Yerusaalemu ohusihiirisa Yesu Omuŋeeresa era Omwabufu wuwo oyu wajuhaho amafuta.
44004028	Ngʼaŋo boseresa ehyo ehi ewe omwene wendire era ngʼolu wategeha mu buŋangi buwo.
44004029	“Ale Hatonda Musengwa wamwene balengerere mu bibono byawe ebibatutiisatiisa ni nabyo aye efe abaŋeeresa babo otuŋe obusira obwʼohulomera abaatu ehibono hihyo nʼobugumu.
44004030	Era mu buŋangi buwo ganya ohole ebyamaliholiho era oŋonie abaatu babo mu siina lya Yesu Omwabufu era omuŋeeresa wuwo.”
44004031	Ni bagwisa esaala eyo, ngʼehifo omu baali ni bahumbaaniiye hyosihyosi hitengeta. Era nga bosibosi Omwoyo Omutukuvu abamaamira abaleetera ohuloma nʼobugumu ehibono hya Hatonda.
44004032	Abafugiirira Kurisito bosibosi baali nʼobulala era ni bahola hirala. Siŋaaliŋo wayire mulala mu bo owalomanga ati ebi gaali ni nabyo byali bibye yenyene wabula abaalinga nʼebiitu babiŋangayo babitambisa hitabwe nʼabahyawe abaali ni baŋuma.
44004033	Ngʼabahwenda ba Yesu abo ni beejuuye amaani ameene amangi batiina mu moni ni balomera abaatu ngʼolu Hatonda galamusa Yesu Musengwa. Era nga bosibosi ekabi ja Hatonda jibatangiriranga mu byosibyosi.
44004034	Siŋabangaŋo owahayanga ehiitu hyosihyosi mu bafugiirira Kurisito olwohuba mu bo omuutu owabanga nʼebisugu oba amanyumba gatundangaho ngʼebbeesa ejiŋooyemo
44004035	ajiŋirira abahwenda nga bagabaniamo baŋa hiisi muutu mubo owahali nʼaŋuma hyahweŋambaho.
44004036	Mu bahola ehyo po mwali omusinde oyu balanganga baati Yosefu aye abahwenda ni baamuguliha esiina erindi baati Bbalunaba (amahulu galyo ti: “Oyo agobosa mu bahye amaani.”) Omusinde oyo owaali owʼehiha hyʼAbaleevi nʼasaalibwa hu hizinga hyʼe Kipuro,
44004037	gatunda ehisugu hihye ngʼaŋirira abahwenda ebbeesa ejaŋwamo.
44005001	Ŋaahani mu bafugiirira mwalimo omusinde oyu balanganga baati Ananiya nʼomuhasi wuwe ni bamulanga baati Safira. Abaatu abo nga boosi batunda hu hisugu ehi baali ni nahyo.
44005002	Ni bahitunda nga bafugiirisania bamegaho ebbeesa ejindi bajesigahisa nga ko Ananiya aŋira ejasigalaho ajiŋa abahwenda nʼadulinga ati njʼeji batundamo.
44005003	Ni gaŋambya abahwenda ebbeesa eji gaŋira nga Peetero amubuusa ati, “Ananiya, lwahiina olehire Sitaani gaŋuga omwoyo gugwo ohutudulinga wadulingiramo nʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu? Oholire hina ehyo ohulehaho ebbeesa ejindi hujiwatunda mu hisugu?
44005004	Ni waali nʼohiiri huhitunda sihyali hihyo? Era ni wahena ohuhitunda ebbeesa ejaŋwamo sijaali mu buŋangi buwo ohujituma ehi wenda? Olwo ŋaahani lwahiina wasalireŋo mu mwoyo gugwo ohuhola ehiitu ehifaana hiityo? Ale himanye oti ndogesyaho hudulinga efe abaatu aye odulingire nje Hatonda omwene!”
44005005	Ananiya ni gaŋulira ebibono ebyo ngʼagwa ŋaasi atondoha. Abaaliŋo bosibosi beboneraho ni naabo aba baloohesaho ngʼolusisimo lubaŋamba.
44005006	Ngʼaŋo ŋabaaŋo abaseere abʼamaani abaaja badunda omulambo gugwe baguŋira bagusiiha.
44005007	Ni ŋahabitaŋo ahamanga oti hʼesaawa edatu omuhasi wʼAnaniya paŋa yeesi gengiriiye mu nyumba omu abahwenda baali cooka nʼatamanyire ebibaayeŋo.
44005008	Ni gengira nga Peetero amubusa ati, “Ndomereho. Jino njʼebbeesa josijosi ejimwatunda mu hisugu?” Nga Safira amugobolamo ati, “E-e. Njʼejo ejihwasunamo.”
44005009	Nga Peetero amubusa ati, “Lwahiina mufugiirisenie ni wamwo mugesyeho ohulebakania Omwoyo wa Hatonda Musengwa? Ale ni epindo eji oŋulira ejo jʼabasiihire wamwo! Mbabo baaja weesi banahuŋire baaja bahusiiha.”
44005010	Ŋaweene aŋo nga Safira agwa ŋaasi ohuupi ni Peetero atondoha. Abavubuka bala ni bengira bamwagaana nʼafuuye nga badunda omulambo gugwe baja bagusiiha mu lubafu lwa wamwe.
44005011	Olwʼehyo, ngʼolusisimo olwʼamaani luŋamba ehibbubbu hyosihyosi ehyʼabafugiirira Kurisito ko nʼabaatu abandi bosibosi abaŋulira ehiitu ehyo.
44005012	Ŋaahani abahwenda baali bahola ebyamaliholiho ebyene ebingi ebyeŋunjisa abaatu. Era nʼabafugiirira Kurisito bosibosi ni bahumbaaniranga mu lunya lwa Yekaalu mu hifo ehi balanganga baati, “Ehigangu hya Sulemaani.”
44005013	Wayire abaatu abandi abataali bahyawe mu hufugiirira babatangamo bugali eŋono, ŋaŋuma hu bo owesinga ohuhola ni nabo omuhumba ni geholesa ati yeesi mufugiirira wahyawe.
44005014	Cooka omuŋendo gwʼabafugiirira Musengwa ogwʼabasinde nʼabahasi gwatiina ni gweyongera hweyongera.
44005015	Olwʼebyamaliholiho ebi bahwenda baholanga, abaatu baŋiranga abalwaye baawe baabata hu tulo wʼengira jʼehibuga ehisisigo hya Peetero hyahaboolaho nʼabita baaŋona.
44005016	Era abaatu kwiro nʼekwiro besombanga ohuŋwa mu bibuga ebiririhene ehibuga Yerusaalemu ni baleeta abalwaye ko ni naabo ababangaho emisambwa eyiri abahwenda era bosibosi Hatonda nabaŋonia.
44005017	Ngʼaŋo omuhulu wʼabasengi nʼabaloobera babe abaali abomu hibbubbu hyʼAbasadukaayo bagongeera olwʼebiitu ebi abahwenda baholanga.
44005018	Ehyaŋwamo, baalagira abahuumi bomu Yekaalu baaŋamba abahwenda babadaanya mu komera omu baboŋeranga ababbwagi bʼamagambi.
44005019	Aye mu hiire ehyo nga Hatonda Musengwa atuma malayika wuwe aja gegulaŋo enjigi jʼekomera eryo abatusa ebulafu ahena abaloma ati,
44005020	“Mutiine mu Yekaalu mulomere abaatu mu wiijufu ebibono ebiŋamba hu bulamu obutaŋwaŋo.”
44005021	Ni wahya, ngʼabahweda baŋuuna mu mugamba batiina bengira mu Yekaalu batandiha ohusomesa abaatu. Baali bahiiri eyo nga jireeta omuhulu wʼabasengi nʼabahye. Ni boola nga balanga abʼOluhiiho lwʼAbayudaaya Olubbala nʼabaatu abahulu bosibosi mu gwanga lya Yisirayiri bahumbaane. Ni bahumbaana nga batumisa baleete abahwenda ohuŋwa mu komera.
44005022	Aye aba batuma ni boola mu komera sibagaanamo aba babatuma ohuleeta. Ngʼaŋo baagamayo babaloma baati,
44005023	“Hwageene ekomera ni liri ligale bulaŋi weene nʼabahuumi ni beemereeye hu mulyango ni bahumire. Aye ni hwiguuyeŋo hwengira mugati ndihwagaanamo muutu kadi mulala hu bamututumire.”
44005024	Omuhulu wʼabahuumi ba Yekaalu nʼabatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda ni baŋulira ebibono ebyo nga bibatangaliha bahena beŋunja ehyolire hu baboŋe.
44005025	Baali bahiiri aŋo nga ŋabaaŋo owaaja gabaloma ati, “Mbalomereho? Abasinde bala abamwaboŋire mu komera mbabala bali mu lunya lwa Yekaalu basomesa abaatu!”
44005026	Omuhulu wʼabahuumi ni gaŋulira ebibono ebyo ngʼatiina nʼabasirikale babe baje babaleete. Mu hubaleeta babaŋooyaŋooya hubaŋooyaŋooya ni batya baati ni banatambise ehifuba abaatu banabahubbe amabaale.
44005027	Ni baboosa nga babemeha mu moni jʼOluhiiho lwʼAbayudaaya Olubbala. Ngʼomuhulu wʼabasengi ababuusa ati,
44005028	“Sihwabaloma huuti mutagobolaho ohusomesa abaatu ebiŋamba hu Yesu? Nʼenywe mutiinire mu moni nʼohuhola ehi hwabagaana era ŋaahani muhwanisye Yerusaalemu yosiyosi nʼesomesa yenywe ni muli bahenerefu ohutuŋaha omusango ogwʼohumwita.”
44005029	Aye nga Peetero nʼabahwenda bahye bamugobolamo baati, “Huli nʼohugondera Hatonda ohuhira ohuŋulira ebi abaatu baloma!
44005030	Hatonda wa basehulu beefe galamusa Yesu oyu enywe mwahomerera hu musalabba.
44005031	Ni gahena, gamutwiha obuŋangi nʼamwihasa hu lubega lwʼomuhono gugwe omulungi hu tebe yʼobuŋugi era gamufuula omutangirisi era Omunoŋosi wʼabaatu. Hatonda gahola ehyo ni genda Abayisirayiri ohusuna engira eyʼohwebbwaga nʼohubasoniŋa ebibi.
44005032	Olwʼehyo efe huli nʼohulomera abaatu ebihumanyire huuti byamwolaho. Omwoyo Omutukuvu oyu Hatonda aŋa abo abamugondera yeesi alumiirisa abaatu ati ebiitu ebyo bituufu.”
44005033	Ni baŋulira ebibono ebyo ngʼehiruŋi ehyʼamaani hibaŋamba begomba nʼohuhenaŋo obulamu wʼabahwenda abo.
44005034	Aye ŋaaliŋo owahyawe mulala oyu balanganga baati Gamalyeri owʼabalabula. Gamalyeri gaali womu hibbubbu hyʼAbafalisaayo era nʼali musomesa wʼamagambi gʼAbayudaaya oyu baatu bosibosi baali ni baŋa eŋono. Mu huloma huhwe gemeerera gaasunga batuse abahwenda abo ebulafu ŋadidiri,
44005035	nga ko aloma abahye ati, “Bayisirayiri bahyange mwegenderese ehimuhola abaatu bano.
44005036	Olwohuba mu ndaalo ejibitireŋo ŋabaluhaŋo omusinde oyu balanganga baati Sewuda. Sewuda gepaaha ngʼolu gaali wa hifuba era ati aja hutangirira abaatu mu hujeemera Abarooma. Hino hyaleetera abaatu ebihumi bine ohumweŋimbaho. Aye olu bamwita abaali ni bamweŋimbireho nga basalaniha nga nʼebibye bihoma aŋo.
44005037	Oyo olu gaŋwaŋo mu biseera ebi abatangirisi bʼegwanga lino babaliramo abaatu nga nindi ŋabaluhaŋo omusinde ohuŋwa mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya oyu balanganga baati Yuda. Oyo yeesi ngʼasuna abamweŋimbaho aye yeesi ni bamwita abaali ni bamweŋimbireho nga basalaniha.
44005038	Kale aŋo paŋa nenda hubaŋeera amagesi mu songa yino. Muŋwe hu baatu bano. Mubalehule batiine olwohuba ebi bahola ni biba ni biri byʼabaatu buutu bija huhoma.
44005039	Aye ni biba ni biri bya Hatonda simuja huŋanga hu basimya. Era muŋanga ohweyagana ni muli husoosa nje Hatonda omwene!”
44005040	Ngʼaŋo ebibono bya Gamalyeri bicuusa epeega eyi baali ni nayo oludaayi baholera hu magesi aga gabaŋa. Nga balagira bengisa abahwenda babafaduulamo efaalu nga bahena nundi babahamiirisa ohutagobolaho husomesa abaatu ebiŋamba hu Yesu. Ni bahena nga babalehula.
44005041	Ngʼaŋo abahwenda baŋwa mu kooti eyo ni basaŋalya olwohuba bahifaania ngʼolu hyali hya mahulu mu moni ja Hatonda ohubagudya ni babahaabya ohuba abaloobera ba Yesu.
44005042	Hiisi owahyanga sibaleheranga hutiina mu lunya lwʼe Yekaalu era nʼohutiina nyumba hu nyumba ohulomera abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi baati Yesu nje Kurisito oyu Hatonda gafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu.
44006001	Mu ndaalo ejo abafugiirira Kurisito ni baali ni beyongeeye obungi balala hu bo abaali ni basimuha mu mawanga agaloma Oluyonaani nga bemulugunya hu bahyawe abaloma Olubbebbulaniya, olwohuba abanamwandu baawe sibaali ni babaŋanga ebiryo ebihena.
44006002	Ehyo ni hyaliŋo ngʼabahwenda ehumi nʼababiri balanga abafugiirira Kurisito bosibosi bahumbaana nga babaloma baati, “Sihiraŋi efe ohuleha ohusomesa ehibono hya Hatonda hugobole hu gwʼohugaba biryo.
44006003	Olwʼehyo balebe, mwetobolemo abasinde musanvu abamumanyire muuti Omwoyo Omutukuvu njʼabatambisa mu byosi, abali nʼamagesi era aba abaatu baŋa eŋono babe mbaba huŋambya omulimo ogwo,
44006004	efe huhenere amaani hu husaba nʼohusomesa ehibono hya Hatonda.”
44006005	Ehiteese hino nga hisangaasa abaatu bosibosi mu hibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira Kurisito. Era nga batobola Sitefaano omusinde owaali nʼohufugiirira ohwʼamaani era Omwoyo Omutukuvu nʼali njʼamutambisa mu byosi, ni Filipo ni Purokooro ni Nikanori ni Timooni ni Parumena ni Nikolaawo. Nikolaawo gaali musaale womu hibuga hyʼAtiyokiya era gaali gengiiye ediini lyʼEhiyudaaya ne ŋaahani nʼafuuhire muloobera wa Yesu.
44006006	Ni bahena ohubatobola nga babaleeta mu moni jʼabahwenda. Ngʼaŋo abahwenda babataho emihono hu mitwe basabira era nga baababula ohuhola omulimo ogu babatobolera.
44006007	Ngʼaŋo abafugiirira beyongera ohulomera abaatu ehibono hya Hatonda era nga hihwana hiisi ŋaatu era nʼomuŋendo gwʼabafugiirira nga gweyongera mu hibuga Yerusaalemu nʼabasengi mu diini yʼAbayudaaya abeene abangi boosi bafugiirira Kurisito.
44006008	Ŋaahani Hatonda ngʼaŋambira Sitefaano, mulala hu bala omusanvu aba bangala, ehisasabirisi. Era ngʼamutangiriranga mu huhola ebyamaliholiho ebyene ebingi ebyeŋunjisanga abaatu.
44006009	Hino hyamuŋweramo abaatu abandi ohugongeera era nga batandiha ohumuŋahania. Abaatu abo baali bomu humbaaniro eri balanganga baati eryʼAbaali Abeedu ni baŋwera mu bibuga ehyʼe Kireene nʼAlekizandiriya, nʼabandi ni baŋwera mu twale eryʼe Kilikiya ni eryʼAsiya.
44006010	Cooka baali sibamuŋanga olwʼamagesi aga gaali ni nago nʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu owaali nʼalomera mu Sitefaano.
44006011	Ehyaŋwamo nga basala oluhwe basendasenda abaatu balome ebyakalebule hu Sitefaano baati mbo bamuŋulira nʼafodogola Hatonda era nʼataala amagambi aga gaŋa Musa.
44006012	Mu ngeri eyo nga batabangula abaatu ŋalala nʼabaatu bahulu mu gwanga ko nʼabasomesa bʼamagambi aga Hatonda gaŋa Musa. Ngʼaŋo baaja bajasa Sitefaano bamuleeta mu Luhiiho lwʼAbayudaaya.
44006013	Ni bamuleeta nga bamwemeha ohuŋosya baleeta nʼabajulizi baloma ni bamubeŋera baati, “Omusinde ono habuhyabuhya aloma ebibono ebifodogola ehifo hino ehyabufu era nʼatala nʼamagambi aga Hatonda gaŋa Musa.
44006014	Era hwamuŋulira nʼaloma ati mbo Yesu owʼe Nazaleesi aja husihiirisa Yekaalu nʼehifo hino ahene acuuse nʼesambo eji Musa gatusomesa.”
44006015	Bosibosi abaali mu luhiiho olwo nga balengerera Sitefaano bamuhaŋaasa era nga bamubona nʼameregenya mu moni oti hani malayika.
44007001	Ngʼaŋo omuhulu wʼabasengi abuusa Sitefaano ati, “Ebiitu bino ebi bahulomaho bituufu?”
44007002	Nga Sitefaano agobolamo ati, “Aboluganda nʼabaatu abahulu mu gwanga mutege amatwi mbalomere! Hatonda mu eŋono lirye gabonehera sehulu yeefe Yibbulayimu ni gaali nʼahiiri mu hyalo hyʼe Mesopotamya ko ahene atiine amenye mu habuga hʼe Harani.
44007003	Ni gamubonehera gamuloma ati, ‘Ŋwa mu hyalo hino omu omenyire ŋalala nʼabolulyo lulwo otiine mu hyalo ehi nahahulage.’
44007004	“Olwʼehyo, nga Yibbulayimu aŋwa mu hyalo ehyo ehi balanganga baati hyʼAbakaludaaya ngʼatiina amenya e Harani. Semwana ni gafa, nga nindi Hatonda aloma Yibbulayimu gaaje asenge mu hyalo hino omu enywe ni neese humenyire.
44007005	Mu hiseera ehyo, Hatonda sigamuŋa muŋuluho wayire oguŋera ohugulu hulala aye gamusuubisa ati olusaaye lulwe ndʼolulirya ehyalo ehyo ate nga hu nyanga eyo Yibbulayimu gaali aŋuma mwana.
44007006	Hatonda galoma Yibbulayimu ati, ‘Olusaaye lulwo luliŋata mu hyalo ehitali hyalwo eyi lulihena emyaha ebihumi bine ni bahola owiidu era ni bababisya bubi.’
44007007	Aye keesi ndiboneresa abaatu abo abalibahosa owiidu era oluvanyuma olusaaye lulwo luliŋwayo banjumirihisya mu hifo hino nga Hatonda waawe.
44007008	Ngʼaŋo Hatonda ahola endagaano ni Yibbulayimu. Era ehyali ehyʼohunywania endagaano eyo haali habonero hahuhomola. Era Yibbulayimu ni gasaala Yisaka ngʼamuhomola ni ŋabitireŋo endaalo munaana. Yisaka ngʼasaala Yakobbo era yeesi ngʼamuhomola. Yakobbo oyo ngʼasaala abasehulu beefe ehumi nʼababiri era bosibosi babahomola.
44007009	“Abasehulu beefe abo nga baŋambira mulebe yabwe Yosefu egongi olwohuba saawe gamugoosanga. Hino hyabaleetera ohumutunda mu wiidu eyiri abaatu bʼe Misiri. Aye Hatonda gaaba ni Yosefu,
44007010	gamuhuuma mu bigosi byosibyosi ebyamwolangaho era gaamuŋa amagesi era gamuleetera ohuba muhoda mu moni ja Falaawo habaha wʼe Misiri. Nga Falaawo amufuula muŋugi mu Misiri era gaamuŋa nʼogwohulabirira ebiitu bibye.
44007011	Ngʼaŋo enjala yigwa mu hyalo hyʼe Misiri hyosihyosi nʼomu hyalo hyʼe Kanani abaatu baaŋata ni bahaya ehyʼohulya. Sehulu yeefe Yakobbo nʼabasaani boosi enjala yabaluma mu mago gaabwe ni baŋuma hyʼohulya.
44007012	Yakobbo ni gaŋulira ati mu hyalo hyʼe Misiri eriyo emere ngʼatumaayo abasaani abahulu baje basahe. Ni boola nga mulebe yabwe Yosefu abasahira emere aye sibamufaania.
44007013	Ni baagamayo omulundi ogwohubiri nga Yosefu ko gebuula eyiri abalebe babe era nga ni Falaawo yeesi ko amanya obusaale buwe.
44007014	Ebyo ni byaŋwa nga Yosefu atuma abalebe babe abo baleete saawe Yakobbo nʼabomu mago gage abaali ni basigaayeyo. Abaatu abo bosibosi ŋalala baali sanvu nʼabataanu.
44007015	Abasaani ni bamulomera Yakobbo nʼabomu mago gage batiina e Misiri era eyo abasehulu beefe abo peyi baafiira.
44007016	Aye amagumba gaawe nga bagaleeta bagasiiha e Sekemu mu hifo hyʼamasiihiro ehi Yibbulayimu gagula hu bejuhulu ba Hamori.
44007017	“Aye ehiseera ni hyola ehi Hatonda gasuubisa Yibbulayimu ati alibatusa eyi baŋatira, omuŋendo gwʼabasehulu beefe abo abaali mu Misiri gwali gweyongeeye bugali.
44007018	Mu hiseera ehyo, nga habaha owundi geehala hu tebe yʼobuŋugi mu Misiri. Habaha oyo gaali samanyire ebyali ni biŋamba hu Yosefu
44007019	era ngʼagudya abasehulu beefe abaali mu Misiri ehiseera ehyo gabasalira nʼolugesi olwʼohwita abaana babwe abeebo nabalagira babadanye.
44007020	Mu hiseera ehyene ehyo paŋa basaalira Musa. Musa gaali mwana aboneha obulaŋi era hyaleetera abasaaye babe ohumuhweha ohuhena emyesi edatu.
44007021	Ehiseera ni hyola ni bataŋanga hweyongera ohumuhweha, ngʼomwana oyo bamuŋira bamuta hwigenya lyʼolwabi eyi omuhaana wa Falaawo gamwageene ngʼamwangala amuŋira amuhusa hyʼomwana wuwe omwene.
44007022	Nga Musa geega era ngʼagunjuha mu magesi gosigosi nʼobusomi bwʼAbamisiri nga sigeŋeeha mu huloma nʼomu biitu ebi gaholanga.
44007023	“Musa ni gaŋesa emyaha amahumi ane ejʼobuhulu ngʼaŋwa mu lubiri atiina alambuula abalebe babe Abayisirayiri hu mirimo eji baali ni babatambisa.
44007024	Ni goola eyo gaabona Omumisiri nʼagudya mulala hu Bayisirayiri ngʼamubeera era nga geeta Omumisiri owaali nʼamugudya.
44007025	Mu huhola hino gaŋeega ati abalebe babe banafanie baati Hatonda gaali aja hubita mu niye ohubanunula cooka nibo sibahifania.
44007026	Oludaalo olwalondaho Musa gaageene Abayisirayiri babiri ni basoola ngʼagesyaho ohubagaya. Ngʼabaloma ati, ‘Lwahiina musoola ate muli balebe?’
44007027	“Aye ola owaali nʼanogia owahye ngʼasindiha era Musa ngʼahena amuloma ati, ‘Njʼani owahufuula omuŋugi era omulamuzi weefe?
44007028	Keesi wenda hunjita ngʼolu wetire Omumisiri olwejo?’
44007029	Musa ni gaŋulira ebibono ebyo nga olwʼohutya anyalagataŋo atiina amenya mu hyalo hyʼe Midiyaani ngʼomubuli ngʼasaalirayo abaana abasinde babiri.
44007030	“Lwali lulala, ni gaali ni gahahena mu hyalo hyʼe Midiyaani emyaha amahumi ane, nga malayika wa Hatonda amubonehera mu hifaananyi hyʼahadeŋo ahaali ni haaduha omuliro mu lulafu ohuupi nʼolusozi Sinaayi.
44007031	Musa ni gabona omuliro ogwali ni gwaduha aye nʼahadeŋo ni hataguhuliha nga geŋunja ngʼahanda gesenda getegerese. Ŋaweene aŋo paŋa gaŋulirira ejanjaasi lya Hatonda Musengwa nʼamuloma ati,
44007032	‘Ndiise Hatonda wa Yibbulayimu ni Yisaka ni Yakobbo.’ Musa ni gaŋulira ngʼateetema olwʼobuti nʼatenda nʼohuhejayo nindi.
44007033	“Ngʼaŋo Hatonda Musengwa amuloma ati, ‘Tusamo ebirayito bibyo olwohuba ehifo aŋa wemereeye, hyawufu.
44007034	Mbwene engeri eyi Abamisiri bali hugudyamo abaatu bange era puliiye ohubinda hwawe olwʼobulumi obu balimo. Olwʼehyo nijire ohubanunula mbatuse mu huŋata ohwo. Ale ŋaahani hola kutume waagameyo e Misiri.’
44007035	“Musa ono njʼoyu bala bageene ni baloma baati, ‘Njʼani owahufuula omuŋugi era omulamuzi weefe?’ Era Musa ono njʼoyu Hatonda gatuma nʼabita mu malayika owamubonehera mu hadeŋo ahaali ni haaduha omuliro, aje abe mutangirisi wabwe abanunule mu wiidu.
44007036	Era ngʼabatangirira ohubatusa mu hyalo hyʼe Misiri. Ngʼahola ebyamaliholiho mu moni jʼAbamisiri, hwigenya lyʼenyanja enando nʼomu lulafu ohuhena emyaha amahumi ane.
44007037	“Musa omwene oyo njʼowaloma Abayisirayiri ati, ‘Hatonda alibatumira naabbi ohuŋwa mu balebe benywe ngʼolu gaatuma ese eyi muli yeesi gabalomera ehibono hihye.’
44007038	Era omwene oyo njʼowaali omutangirisi wʼabasehulu beefe mu lulafu olu bahumbaana hu lusozi Sinaayi malayika ko ahene amuŋambye ebibono ebi galomera abasehulu beefe. Ebibono ebyo ebireeta obulamu mbebi hwesi gatuŋambya.
44007039	“Cooka abasehulu beefe abo bagaana ohumuŋulira era nga begomba bagameeyo e Misiri.
44007040	Ehyaŋooyemo nga baloma Alooni mulebewe baati, ‘Ewe tubbotere abahatonda abanatutangirire olwohuba sihumanyire ehiguuye hu Musa owatutusa mu hyalo hyʼe Misiri.’
44007041	Aŋo paŋa babbotera ehifaananyi hyʼenyana yʼeŋombe nga bahiŋongera era nga bemba ni bahijumirya mu hifo hya Hatonda ni beejaga olwʼehiitu ehi abeene bebbotera.
44007042	Hatonda yeesi abaŋwaho bahole ehi benda nga bajumiryanga ebyaduha ŋamugulu mu bbanga ohwoheresa ebibono ebi mulala hu banaabbi gaŋandiiha Hatonda nʼaloma ati, “ ‘Enywe Abayisirayiri, mu myaha amahumi ane eji mwali mu lulafu ebisolo ebi mwetanga ni muŋayo ngʼeŋongo mwapanga ndiise?
44007043	Mwagegeruhananga eweema yʼekuni eyi balanga baati Moleki, nʼehifaananyi hyʼemunyenye eyi balanga baati Refani ni biri mbebi mujumirya. Olwʼehyo ndibaŋayo eyiri abalugendwa babaŋira mu buŋaŋanguse engereha wa Bbabbulooni.’ ”
44007044	Nga Sitefaano atiina mu moni abaloma ati, “Abasehulu beefe ni baali mu lulafu baali nʼeweema ni hali habonero ahalaga haati Hatonda ali ni nabo. Eweema eyo bayibbota ni beema hu ngeri eyi Hatonda galoma Musa era eyi gaali naweene.
44007045	Oluvanyuma abasehulu beefe abomugigi ogundi aba Yoswa gatangirira nga baaja nʼeweema eyo mu hyalo muno omu huli omu Hatonda gabbinga amawanga agaalimo. Eweema eyo yaali mu hyalo muno ohwolerera erala mu biseera bya habaha Dawudi
44007046	owaali omuhoda mu moni ja Hatonda. Nga Dawudi asunga ehiyale Hatonda aganye amutongolere enyumba omu ye omwene ko nʼAbayisirayiri bosibosi bali nʼohumujumirihisyanga.
44007047	Aye Hatonda sigamufugiirira, ohutusaho omusaani wa Dawudi Sulemaani njʼowatongola Yekaalu eyo.”
44007048	“Aye Oyo Owaŋamugulu obugali, saamenya mu nyumba eji baatu batongola. Hiri ngʼolu mulala hu banaabbi gaŋandiiha ebi galoma ati,
44007049	“ ‘Egulu njʼetebe eyʼobuŋugi ohu nihala ehyalo pʼohu ta amagulu gange. Nyumba ya ngeri hi eyo eyi mulitongolera menyemo?
44007050	Ese samwene si ndiise owatonda ebiitu byosibyosi?’
44007051	“Baatu nywe muuli nʼemyoyo migumu hyʼabatamanyire Hatonda! Muli basiŋa abatenda huŋulira ebibono bibye! Muli hya basehulu benywe bala olwohuba mwesi hiisi obuhya muŋahania ebi Omwoyo Omutukuvu aloma!
44007052	Ŋaliŋo naabbi oyu basehulu benywe batahiyania? Obanga beeta ni nabo abalagula ohuuja hwʼOyo Omwabufu oyu enywe mwalyamo oluhwe bamwita!
44007053	Enywe abeene husuna amagambi aga Hatonda gaŋa abamalayika bagaŋambya abasehulu beefe, nindi ndinywe abagajeemera mwagabbwaga.”
44007054	Ni baŋulira ebibono bya Sitefaano ebyo ngʼobusungu bubaŋamba beninala oti bamulye bulye.
