44007055	Aye Omwoyo Omutukuvu gaali amaamiye Sitefaano nʼamuŋaaye obugumu era ni gaheja ŋamugulu mwigulu ngʼabona Hatonda mu eŋono lirye ni Yesu ni gemereeye mu hifo ehyʼeŋono hu lubega olwʼomuhono omulungi ogwa Hatonda.
44007056	Ngʼaloma abaali ni bamuŋosesya ati, “Bona! Egulu nderyo libwihuhire era mbona Omwana wʼOmuutu ni gemereeye mu hifo ehyʼeŋono hu lubega olwʼomuhono omulungi ogwa Hatonda!”
44007057	Abahahiiho ni baŋulira ebibono ebyo nga basemba amatwi nʼengalo jaawe ni bahubba nʼoluboyooboyo bataŋulira ebi gaali nʼaloma. Nga ko bosibosi bamuyabuluhiraho,
44007058	bamuŋalundula bamutusa ebulafu wʼehibuga batandiha ohumuhubba amabaale bamwite. Nga bala abeene humutaho obujulizi obwʼobudulingi befihulamo ebyambalo byawe ebyohu mugulu babiŋambya omuseere oyu balanga baati Sawulo abibaŋambire ko baŋange ohumuhubba bulaŋi amabaale.
44007059	Ni baali ni bahubba Sitefaano amabaale, ngʼasaba ati, “Yesu Musengwa kulomba onaaŋe obulamu bwange.”
44007060	Ngʼaŋo ahoma ekumbo aloma nʼejanjaasi eryʼamaani ati, “O Musengwa basoniŋe ehibi hino.” Ni gahena ohuloma ebibono ebyo ngʼafa.
44008001	Era Sawulo gaaliŋo gaawagira ehikolwa hyʼohwita Sitefaano. Hu ludaalo olwene olwo ohuhiyaania abafugiirira Kurisito ohwʼamaani hwatandiha mu Yerusaalemu. Ngʼabafugiirira abahira obungi mu hibuga ehyo nʼotuhiiseho abahwenda badulumaŋo basasanira mu bitundu byʼe Buyudaaya ni Samaliya.
44008002	Aye ngʼebaayo abasinde abanadiini abaja basiiha omulambo gwa Sitefaano era ohufa huhwe hwabaluma bugali.
44008003	Aye Sawulo niye gagesyaho ohusihiirisa ehibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira era gatiinanga nyumba hu nyumba nʼajasa abafugiirira abasinde nʼabahasi gabadyedyesa gabadaanya mu komera.
44008004	Ngʼaŋo abafugiirira bala abasasaana olwʼohubahiyaania batiina ni balomera abaatu ehibono hya Hatonda eyi hiisi mulala hu bo gajanga.
44008005	Mulala hu bo oyu balanganga baati Filipo ngʼaserengeta atiina mu hirala hu bibuga byomu twale lyʼe Samaliya alomera abaatu baayo ati Yesu njʼoyu Hatonda gafuujaho amate gaaje anoŋole abaatu.
44008006	Abaatu abeene abangi nga baŋulira ebi Filipo gabalomeranga era nga babona nʼebyamaliholiho ebi gaholanga. Ehyo nga hileetera bangi ohutaayo omwoyo hubi gabalomanga.
44008007	Ngʼemisambwa jiŋwanga hu baatu abeene abangi ni jaana hwana nʼejanjaasi eryʼamaani. Era bangi aba hyali ni hisanyalahiise ni bataŋanga nʼohwecuusa ko nʼabaleme nga baŋona.
44008008	Nga ŋabaaŋo esangaalo ebitirifu mu hibuga ehyo.
44008009	Ŋaahani ŋaaliŋo mu hibuga ehyo omusinde oyu balanganga baati Simooni owaali omuŋeŋa haŋunye era ni geŋunjisa abaatu bosibosi mu Samaliya. Era ni gepaaha ngʼolu ali wa hitalo.
44008010	Abaatu abeene abangi mu Samaliya ohuŋwa hu baŋaasi ohwolera erala hu begingihiriri baali bamufugiiriramo ni baloma mbo omuutu oyo gaali nje “Maani ga Hatonda ” era mbo njʼahihenaho.
44008011	Abaatu bomu hibuga ehyo bamufugiirirangamo olwohuba gabeŋunjisanga nʼebyobuŋeŋa buwe.
44008012	Aye ni baŋulira obuhwenda obwʼAmaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu Yesu Kurisito ko nʼobuŋugi bwa Hatonda obu Filipo gabalomera nga bafugiirira bababatiza, abasinde nʼabahasi.
44008013	Ni Simooni omwene yeesi ngʼafugiirira bamubatiza. Ni gabatizibwa ngʼalonderesanga Filipo hiisi eyi gajanga era geŋunjanga ebyamaliholiho ebyʼamaani ebi gabonanga Filipo nʼahola.
44008014	Abahwenda abaali e Yerusaalemu ni baŋulira baati abaatu bʼe Samaliya baali bafugiiriye ehibono hya Hatonda, nga baŋindihayo Peetero ni Yowaane.
44008015	Ni boola e Samaliya nga basabira abafugiirira Omwoyo Omutukuvu abeeheho,
44008016	olwohuba yaali eŋuma wayire mulala hu bafugiirira abo owaali nʼasunire Omwoyo Omutukuvu. Baali bababatihize hubababatiza mu siina lya Yesu Musengwa.
44008017	Ngʼaŋo Peetero ni Yowaane bata emihono hu hiisi mulala hu bafugiirira abo ngʼamaani gʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu gabamaamira.
44008018	Simooni ni gabona ati abahwenda abo ni bata emihono hu baatu amaani gʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu gabamaamira, gagesyaho ohuŋa abahwenda abo ebbeesa,
44008019	nʼabaloma ati, “Keesi mupeho amaani ago hiisi oyu natengaho emihono Omwoyo Omutukuvu amumaamirenga.”
44008020	Aye nga Peetero amuloma ati, “Hihuŋire era osihiirihire eyo nʼebbeesa jijo! Olwohuba oŋeega oti Omwoyo wa Hatonda bamugula bugule nʼebbeesa!
44008021	Oŋuma nʼomugabo gwosigwosi mu buŋeeresa buno olwohuba omwoyo gugwo si muluŋamu mu moni ja Hatonda.
44008022	Olwʼehyo webbwage weŋunderere Hatonda Musengwa ahusoniŋe olwʼohuŋeega otyo mu mwoyo gugwo;
44008023	olwohuba mbona nga wijuuye egongi era oguuye mwiroŋo eryʼehibi.”
44008024	Simooni ngʼaloma Peetero ni Yowaane ati, “Musabire Hatonda Musengwa ganjede ŋaŋume wayire hirala hu bibono ebyo ehi njolaho.”
44008025	Peetero ni Yowaane ni bahena ohulomera abaatu baayo ebiŋamba hu Yesu nʼohubabuulira ehibono hya Hatonda Musengwa, nga baagamayo e Yerusaalemu. Ni baali ni baagama batiinanga balomera abaatu abomu bitahere byʼe Samaliya Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu Yesu.
44008026	Ŋaahani lulala malayika wa Hatonda Musengwa galoma Filipo ati, “Serengeta oŋambe engira ebitira mu lulafu nʼeŋwa e Yerusaalemu nʼetiina mu hibuga hyʼe Gaaza.”
44008027	Ngʼaŋo Firipo genyoheramo atiina. Ni gaali nʼagenda nga gagaanana nʼomusinde Omwisopiya owaali mulala hu begingihiriri abaŋeeresanga Kandake, habaha omuhasi owaali nʼaŋuga ehyalo ehi balanga baati Esopiya. Omusinde oyo gaali mulaaŋe era nʼali njʼomuŋanika wa Kandake. Omusinde oyo gaali mu lugendo ni gaagamayo engo nʼaŋwa e Yerusaalemu eyi gaali nʼatiinire ohusaba.
44008028	Mu lugendo lulwe luno gaali gehaaye mu higaali hihye nʼasoma ehitabo hya naabbi Yisaaya.
44008029	Ngʼaŋo Omwoyo Omutukuvu aloma Filipo ati, “Tiina ogendere ŋaapi nʼehigaali ehyo.”
44008030	Nga Filipo asesera goola hu higaali hyʼomusinde ola. Ni gahyolaho ngʼamuŋulira nʼasoma ehitabo hya naabbi Yisaaya, nga ko amubuusa ati, “Ebi osoma obitegeera?”
44008031	Ngʼola amugobolamo ati, “Kadi! Sipanga hubitegeera ohutusaho ni ŋaliŋo obunyonyooye amahulu.” Ni gahena ohuloma atyo ngʼasunga Filipo aniine mu higaali hihye gehale ŋalala ni naye amunyonyole amahulu gabyo.
44008032	Omusinde oyo gaali asoma ehyaŋandiihiwa ehiroma hiiti, “Gaali hyʼetaama eyi baŋira ohusala; era hyʼenyana yʼetaama eyitabbaalaala ni bayisalaho amooya, yeesi sigasimula abo abamubonyabonya.
44008033	Abaatu bamujerega, era sibaganya abobuŋangi ohumulamula ni batehubbira. Eŋuma owanyonyola hu lulyo lulwe, olwohuba obulamu buwe bwali buŋooyeŋo.”
44008034	Omusinde ola ngʼabuusa Filipo ati, “Ndomereho. Naabbi oyo gaali aloma hu njʼani? Gaali geromaho omwene oba gaali aloma hu muutu wundi?”
44008035	Nga Filipo atagihira hu hyaŋandiihiwa ehyene ehyo amulomera Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu Yesu.
44008036	Baali bahitiina nga boola aŋali ehidiba hyʼamaaji. Ngʼomusinde oyo aloma Filipo ati, “Bona! Ehidiba hyʼamaaji kehino! Hola bumbatize.”
44008037	Ngʼaŋo Filipo amuloma ati, “Nʼoba nʼofugiirira nʼomwoyo mulala, oŋanga ohubatiziwa.” Ngʼomusinde ola amugobolamo ati, “Fugiirira ti Yesu Kurisito Mwana wa Hatonda.”
44008038	Ngʼaŋo omusinde oyo omwegingihiriri alagira bemeerese ehigaali. Nga Filipo nʼomusinde oyo beeha mu maaji, Filipo amubatiza.
44008039	Ni baŋwa mu maaji, ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo Omwoyo wa Musengwa atusaŋo Filipo mu moni jʼomusinde ola ndagobolayo humubona nindi. Cooka niye ngʼatiina mu moni nʼolugendo lulwe ni gejuuye esangaalo.
44008040	Aye Filipo niye gaja ohweyagaana Omwoyo nʼamuŋirire mu hibuga Azooto. Ni gaali eyo ngʼagenda ŋano ni naŋala nʼatiina nʼalomera abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi mu bibuga byosibyosi ohwola olu goola mu hibuga hyʼe Kayisaaliya.
44009001	Ŋaahani mu ndaalo enyene ejo Sawulo gaali aŋera huŋera ohwita abafugiirira Yesu Musengwa. Hino hyamuleetera ohutiina eyiri Omuhulu wʼabasengi,
44009002	gaamusunga amuŋe ebbaluŋa eyimwanjula mu mahumbaaniro gʼAbayudaaya agomu hibuga Damasiko aje abone hanye eriyo abasinde nʼabahasi, abagendera mu Ngira ya Musengwa, abaŋambe ahene abahoolomye abaŋire e Yerusaalemu babasalire omusango.
44009003	Sawulo nʼaba gaali ni nabo ni baali ni batiina ko ni banatere ohwola e Damasiko, ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo enjase eyʼamaani ohuŋwa mwigulu emuhubba yimweswanigirisa.
44009004	Ngʼagwa ŋaasi aŋulira ejanjaasi ni ŋaliŋo aloma ati, “Sawulo, Sawulo, lwahiina bukiyaania?”
44009005	Nga Sawulo abuusa ati, “Ndiiwe ani Musengwa?” Ngʼomuutu oyo owaloma agobolamo ati, “Ndiise Yesu oyu ohiyania.
44009006	Ale yinyoha otiine mu hibuga, eyo peyi banahahulomere ehyʼohuhola.”
44009007	Ngʼabasinde abaali ni Sawulo bibatangaliha ni baŋuma hyʼohuloma olwohuba baŋulira ejanjaasi aye ndibabona muutu yesiyesi.
44009008	Ngʼaŋo Sawulo genyoha aye ni galimbula geyageene nʼatabona era ngʼabahye bamuŋamba hu muhono bamugeesya bengira mu Damasiko.
44009009	Eyo gahenayo endaalo edatu nʼatabona era nʼatalya wayire ohunywa ehiitu hyosihyosi.
44009010	Ŋaahani mu hibuga hyʼe Damasiko yaaliŋo omuutu afugiirira Kurisito ni bamulanga baati Ananiya. Ananiya oyo mu hwolesewa gaŋulira Musengwa nʼamulanga ati, “Ananiya.” Nga niye agobolamo ati, “Ndiise ono Musengwa.”
44009011	Nga Yesu Musengwa amuloma ati, “Yinyoha otiine mu mago gʼomusinde oyu balanga baati Yuda. Amago ago gali hu luguudo olu balanga baati ‘Oluguudo oluluŋamu,’ era nʼonooleyo obuuse bahulage omusinde owʼe Taruso oyu balanga baati Sawulo olwohuba mu hiseera ehyene hino ali husaba.
44009012	Omusinde oyo aweene mu hwolesebwa omuutu oyu balanga baati Ananiya ni gengira mu nyumba omu ali nʼamwisaho emihono jije ohumusabira atandihe ohubona nindi.”
44009013	NgʼAnaniya aloma ati, “Musengwa, puliiye abaatu bangi ni baloma ebiitu ebyene ebingi hu musinde oyo nʼebigosi ebi gohiise hu baatu babo abagwalaafu abali mu Yerusaalemu.
44009014	Era ni ŋano gaajire nʼebbaluŋa ohuŋwa eyiri abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda ni bamufugiirira ohuuja ajase abahufugiirira bosibosi.”
44009015	Aye Musengwa ngʼamuloma ati, “Ewe tiina ohole ehi kuloma, olwohuba oyo njʼoyu tobooye ohuja ohulomera Abatali Bayudaaya nʼabahabaha baawe ko nʼabaatu ba Yisirayiri ebipambaho.
44009016	Era samwene nahamulage ngʼolu asaniiye ohubonaabona bugali hu lwange.”
44009017	Ngʼaŋo Ananiya atiina gengira mu nyumba ya Yuda. Ni gabona Sawulo ngʼamutaho emihono amuloma ati, “Omulebe Sawulo, Yesu Musengwa owahubonehera mu ngira ni wuuja ŋano gaatumire niije kuŋambeho otagiihe ohubona nindi era nʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu ohwiheeho ahumaamire.”
44009018	Ni gagwisa ebibono ebyo ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo hu moni ja Sawulo huŋwaho ebiitu ebyali oti hani magalagambwa gʼenyeeni era ngʼatandiha ohubona. Ngʼaŋo genyoha bamubatiza.
44009019	Era ni galyaho ebiryo, ngʼagobolamo amaani. Ngʼaŋo Sawulo ahena endaalo ndidiri naali nʼabafugiirira Kurisito mu Damasiko.
44009020	Era sigalwa nga gengiranga mu mahumbaaniro gʼAbayudaaya nʼalomera abaatu ati Yesu Mwana wa Hatonda.
44009021	Abaatu boosi abamuŋulira nga beŋunja ni baloma baati, “Ono sinje owahiyaanianga abafugiirira Kurisito mu Yerusaalemu? Era ehyo sinje ehyamuleetire ni ŋano ŋoosi abajase ahene abaŋire eyiri abatangirisi bʼabasengi ba Hatonda?”
44009022	Cooka Sawulo niye geyongera hweyongera amaani mu husomesa goola ohuŋoleeresa Abayudaaya abaali mu Damasiko nʼabahahasa ati Yesu Kurisito njʼoyu Hatonda gafuujaho amate anoŋole abaatu.
44009023	Ni ŋabitaŋo endaalo ejiŋera ngʼAbayudaaya bateesa bamwite,
44009024	aye Sawulo ngʼategeera oluhwe lwabwe. Nga bala beemanga ŋamulyango ogwingira mu hibuga omuusi nʼobwire ni betegeeresa hiisi abita olwʼohwenda bamuŋambe baje bamwite.
44009025	Aye Sawulo ni gaŋayiraho abafugiirira nga nibo bagera ehire ŋagati bamuta mu gunaaba bamwibaŋo bamubisya mu ŋundu eryali mu hiteepe ehyeswanigirisa ehibuga bamwiisa ebulafu geeyiba aŋwa mu Damasiko.
44009026	Sawulo ni goola e Yerusaalemu, ngʼagesyaho ohweŋimba hu bafugiirira Kurisito aye nibo ni bamutya olwohuba baali babuusabuusa hanye dala Sawulo gaali afugiiriiye Kurisito.
44009027	Aye ŋaaliŋo owahyawe oyu balanganga baati Bbalunaba oyo njʼowaŋira Sawulo ngʼamwanjula eyiri abahwenda. Era njʼowabalomera ngʼolu Musengwa gabonehera Sawulo era gaaloma ni naye olu gaali mu ngira nʼatiina e Damasiko. Era gabalomera ngʼolu Sawulo gaali nʼabuuliiye nʼobugumu hu biŋamba hu Yesu Musengwa mu Damasiko.
44009028	Hino hyabaleetera ohufugiirira Sawulo gaamenya ni nabo era getaaya nʼabafugiirira bahye mu Yerusaalemu nʼalomera abaatu nʼobugumu ebiŋamba hu Yesu Musengwa.
44009029	Ngʼalomanga nʼAbayudaaya abaloma Oluyonaani ebiŋamba hu Yesu era gaŋahananga ni nabo aye nibo ni baŋeeganga hu ngeri yʼohumwita.
44009030	Abafugiirira bahye ni bahitegeera nga bamutusaaŋo bamuŋira hu mwalo gwʼe Kayisaaliya gambuhe atiine e Taruso.
44009031	Ngʼaŋo abafugiirira Kurisito mu matwale gʼe Buyudaaya ni Galilaaya ko ni Samaliya baba nʼemirembe olwohuba mu hiseera ehyo ŋaali ŋabula abahiyaania. Ngʼomuŋendo gwʼabafugiirira gweyongera obungi era ngʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu abaleetera ohweyongera ohuba nʼamaani mu hufugiirira hwawe nʼohuta mu Hatonda Musengwa eŋono.
44009032	Ŋaahani Peetero gatiinanga ŋano ni naŋala mu matwale gʼeyo nʼahyalira abafugiirira Kurisito. Era lulala gatiina aje ahyalireho abaatu ba Hatonda abomu hitahere hyʼe Liida.
44009033	Eyo gagaanayo omusinde oyu balanga baati Ayineeya oyu hyali ni hisanyalahiise omubiri era nʼaŋotoheeye hu buliri ohuhena emyaha munaana.
44009034	Ngʼaŋo Peetero amuloma ati, “Ayineeya, Yesu Kurisito ahuŋonisye. Yinyoha ofumbeŋo obuliri buwo.” Ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo Ayineeya genyoha gemeerera.
44009035	Bangi hu baali ni bamenyire mu hitahere hyʼe Liida ni Saroni ni bamubona nʼaŋonire nga bafugiirira Yesu Musengwa.
44009036	Ŋaahani mu hibuga ehi balanganga baati Yoopa mwalimo omwegi wa Yesu oyu balanganga baati Tabbisa ate mu Luyonaani ni bamulanga baati Doloka. Amahulu gʼamasiina gano gombi gaali ti “enjobe.” Habuhyabuhya Tabbisa gaholanga ebiraŋi era nʼayeeda abagadi.
44009037	Mu hiseera ehyo ehi Peetero gabeereyemo e Liida, Tabbisa galwala ngʼafa. Ni bahena ohwoga omulambo gugwe nga baguta mu hisenge ehyaŋamugulu mu nyumba eya kalina.
44009038	Liida hyali hupi nʼe hibuga hyʼe Yoopa olwʼehyo abafugiirira bʼe Yoopa ni baŋulira baati Peetero gaali ahiiri mu Liida, nga bamutumira abasinde babiri. Ni boola nga bamuloma baati, “Huhwegalihiiye, yinyoheramo hutiine e Yoopa.”
44009039	Ngʼaŋo Peetero genyoheramo atiina ni nabo. Ni goola nga bamuŋira mu hisenge ehyaŋamugulu omu mulambo gwali. Abanamwandu bangi nga bemweswanigirisa ni balira era ni bamulaga nʼengoye eji Doloka gaali nʼatungiiye abaatu nʼahiri mulamu.
44009040	Ngʼaŋo Peetero abaloma bosibosi batule ebulafu nga ko ahubba amafuha asaba. Ni gahena ngʼacuuha aheja eyiri omulambo aloma ati, “Tabbisa, yinyoha.” Ngʼaŋo Tabbisa alimbula. Ni gabona Peetero nga genyoha gehala.
44009041	Nga Peetero amuŋamba hu muhono amwinyosa gemeerera ngʼahena alanga abanamwandu nʼabafugiirira abandi, ngʼamubaŋambya nʼali mulamu.
44009042	Ngʼefuma yehyo eŋulirihana mu Yoopa mwosimwosi era nga hireetera bangi hu baatu baayo ohufugiirira Yesu Musengwa.
44009043	Peetero ngʼahena ahamanga e Yoopa nʼamenyire ewa Simooni omubambi wʼebyanjo.
44010001	E Kayisaaliya yaaliyo omusinde oyu balanganga baati Koloneriyo. Koloneriyo gaali muhulu wʼehibbubbu hyʼamaŋe gʼAbarooma cikumi ehi balanganga baati, “Ehibbubbu hyʼabamaŋe Abayitale.”
44010002	Omusinde oyo nʼabomu mago gage bosibosi baali baŋa Hatonda eŋono era ye omwene nʼasabanga habuhyabuhya era nʼali wa hyere eyiri abagadi.
44010003	Lulala hu nyanga nga mwenda ejeegulo Koloneriyo gasuna ohwolesewa. Mu hwolesebwa ohwo gabona malayika wa Hatonda owatiina aŋa gaali gaamulanga ati, “Koloneriyo!”
44010004	Koloneriyo ngʼamuhaŋasa ni gejuuye obuti. Ngʼaŋo amuloma ati, “Musengwa, hiina?” Nga malayika amugobolamo ati, “Hatonda asiima ehyere ehi oli ni nahyo eyiri abagadi era aŋuliiye ohusaba huhwo.
44010005	Olwʼehyo hu nyanga enyene yino tuma abaatu batiine e Yoopa bahulangire omuutu oyu balanga baati Simooni Peetero.
44010006	Omuutu oyo ali ewa Simooni omubambi wʼebyanjo. Enyumba yiye yiri huupi nʼenyanja.”
44010007	Malayika owaloma ni naye ni gaagamayo eyi gaŋwera, nga Koloneriyo alanga babiri hu beedu babe, nʼomulala hu basirikale abamuhuumanga owaali yeesi nʼaŋa Hatonda eŋono.
44010008	Ni batiina eyi ali ngʼabaŋayira byosibyosi ebi malayika gamuloma nga ko ahena abatuma e Yoopa.
44010009	Ni wahya, esaawa jaali oti jija ohwola omukaaga ogwomu muusi abaatu bala aba Koloneriyo gatuma ni banatere ohwola e Yoopa. Hu nyanga enyene eyo, njʼeyi Peetero ganiiniraho ŋamugulu hu nyumba aje asabe.
44010010	Ni gaali eyo ngʼaŋulira enjala nʼemuluma era nga gegomba abeho nʼehi alya. Ni baali ni bahiitegeha ebiryo ngʼasuna ohwolesewa.
44010011	Mu hwolesebwa ohwo gabona egulu oti libwihuhire, era ni beesa hu hyalo ehiitu ehyali oti hani lusuuka olwene olubba ni baluŋambire hu esonda jaalwo ene.
44010012	Hu lusuuka ohwo hwaliho hiisi solo eyʼamagulu ane, ebyeŋalula ebya hiisi ngeri ko nʼenyuni eja hiisi hiha.
44010013	Gaali aheja aŋulira ejanjaasi ni ŋaliŋo aloma ati, “Peetero yinyoha wiite ohene olye.”
44010014	Ngʼaŋo Peetero amugobolamo ati, “Bbe, Musengwa sipanga, olwohuba kiiri hulyangaho ehiitu ehyʼembiho wayire ehitali higwalaafu.”
44010015	Nga nindi omwene janjaasi lira amuloma ati, “Ehiitu ehi Hatonda ahenire ohugwalaasa otahiranga oti sihigwalaafu.”
44010016	Peetero ngʼaŋulira ebibono ebyo ni babigobolamo emigigi edatu nga ko aŋo ni naaŋo ehiitu hira ehyali oti hani lusuuka bahyagamyayo mwigulu.
44010017	Peetero gaali ahyeŋunja era ni gebuusa amahulu gʼehi aweene ngʼabasinde bala aba Koloneriyo gatuma boosi boola hu nyumba ya Simooni bemeerera ŋa mulyango.
44010018	Ni bahubba koodi nga babuusa hanye aŋo paŋa omugeni oyu balanga baati Simooni Peetero gaali.
44010019	Peetero ni gaali nʼahiŋeega hu bi aweene, ngʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu amuloma ati, “Simooni, ŋaliŋo abasinde badatu abali huhwendula.
44010020	Olwʼehyo ninuha otiine eyi bali. Otegania hutiina ni nabo olwohuba Ndiise abatumire.”
44010021	Ngʼaŋo Peetero aninuha atiina eyiri abasinde abo abaloma ati, “Ndiise ono oyu mwendula. Songa hiina ebaleetire?”
44010022	Ngʼaŋo bamugobolamo baati, “Koloneriyo Omurooma era omuduumisi wʼehibbubbu hyʼabasirikale ecikumi njʼatutumire eyi oli. Omusinde oyo mugwalaafu era aŋa Hatonda eŋono nʼAbayudaaya bosibosi abamumanyire bamutamo eŋono. Malayika omugwalaafu gamuloma ahutumise otiine ewuwe obeho nʼebi omulomera.”
44010023	Ngʼaŋo Peetero abasangalira abengisa mu nyumba. Ni wahya, nga Peetero genyoha atiina ni nabo era balala hu bafugiirira bomu Yoopa nga bamuŋereheraho.
44010024	Oludaalo olwagobolaho ndolu boleeyeho e Kayisaaliya. Ni boola eyo bagaana Koloneriyo nʼabalindiriiye era nʼahumbanisye nʼabalebe babe ko nʼabemihago.
44010025	Peetero ko gaali gengira ati mu nju nga Koloneriyo gaaja amusangalira era ngʼahubba amafuha ohulaga eŋono eri gaali nʼamuŋa.
44010026	Aye nga Peetero amwinyosa aloma ati, “A-a! Yinyoha! Ese keesi ndi muutu buutu hyʼewe.”
44010027	Peetero gamulomanga ebibono ebyo eno gengira naba gaali ni nabo mu nju era nga gagaanamo ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ni bahumbeene.
44010028	Ngʼabaloma ati, “Muhimanyire bulaŋi muuti hyʼembiho Omuyudaaya ohuhyalira Atali Muyudaaya wayire ohuholagana ni naye. Aye Hatonda gandagire mu hwolesebwa ati sihiraŋi ohuloma omuutu yesiyesi ti si mugwalaafu era ti hyʼembiho ohuholagana ni naye.
44010029	Olwʼehyo ni wandangire, nijire ni mbula ehi nemota. Ale ŋaahani mundomere. Wandangiiye hiina?”
44010030	Ngʼaŋo Koloneriyo amugobolamo ati, “Endaalo edatu ejahabita olwa leero lwahune ohuŋwa olu naali mu nyumba yange hu nyanga mwenda hya jino, ni saba. Ni naali ni saba ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo mbona omuutu ni gambaaye engoye ejimeregenya ni ganjemereeye emutwe.
44010031	Ngʼomuutu oyo gandoma ati, ‘Hatonda asiima ehyere ehi oli ni nahyo eyiri abagadi era aŋuliiye ohusaba huhwo.
44010032	Olwʼehyo tumisa bahulangire omuutu oyu balanga baati Simooni Peetero ali e Yoopa. Omuutu oyo ali ewa Simooni omubambi wʼebyanjo amenyire ohuupi nʼenyanja.’
44010033	Kale keesi njʼohuhutumira abaatu bahulange, era oholire bulaŋi waaja. Hwesi ŋaahani huhumbeene ŋano mu moni ja Hatonda ohuŋulirisa byosibyosi ebi Musengwa ahulagiiye ohutulomera.”
44010034	Ngʼaŋo Peetero atandiha ohuloma ati, “Ŋaahani tegeeye ti Hatonda samomola mu baatu,
44010035	wabula ganirisa hiisi muutu amuŋa eŋono era ahola ebiruŋamu nʼatamubalira gwanga omu aŋwa.
44010036	Mumanyire ngʼolu Hatonda gatuŋa efe Abayisirayiri Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaleeta emiyaaya nʼabita mu Yesu Kurisito Musengwa wʼabaatu bosibosi.
44010037	Era mumanyire nʼebyaliŋo mu Buyudaaya, ebyatagihira mu twale lyʼe Galilaaya Yowaane nʼahenire ohubuulira ati abaatu bebbwage baleheŋo ebibi byawe babatiziwe;
44010038	ngʼolu Hatonda gaŋa Yesu Omunazaleesi Omwoyo Omutukuvu era nʼamaani agenjabulo. Yesu oyo gagendanga ŋosiŋosi, nʼahola ebiraŋi era nʼaŋonia bosibosi aba amaani ga Sitaani gaali ni gafutire, olwohuba Hatonda gaali ni naye.
44010039	“Efe abahwenda babe huhahasa ebyo byosi ebi gahola mu hyalo hyʼAbayudaaya nomu Yerusaalemu. Abaatu ababi bamuhomerera hu musalabba nga bamwita.
44010040	Aye ni ŋabitaŋo endaalo edatu Hatonda ngʼamulamusa era abaatu bamubona naali mulamu.
44010041	Abaatu bosibosi sibamubona ohutusaho efe aba Hatonda gaali nʼahenire ohutoboola ohuhola omulimo guno ogwʼohulomera abaatu ebimuŋambaho. Efe hwalya era hwanywa ni naye nʼahenire ohulamuha.
44010042	Gatulagira hulomere abaatu ngʼolu ali njʼoyo oyu Hatonda gaŋa obuŋangi obwʼohulamula abalamu nʼabafu.
44010043	Abanaabbi bosibosi baloma hu Yesu baati hiisi muutu amufugiirira balimusoniŋa ebibi bibye olwʼobuŋangi obuli mu siina lirye.”
44010044	Peetero gaali ahiiroma ngʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu geha hu baatu abo bosibosi abaali ni bamuŋulirisa nga batandiha ohuloma endimi eji baali ni batamanyire ni bajumirya Hatonda.
44010045	Abayudaaya abafugiirira Kurisito abaali ni baŋeereheeyeho Peetero ohuŋwa e Yoopa ni baweene Hatonda nʼaŋaaye Abatali Bayudaaya boosi ehirabo ehyʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu nga beŋunja.
44010046	Babaŋulira ni baloma mu ndimi ni bajumirya Hatonda. Peetero niye ngʼaloma ati,
44010047	“Abaatu bano ngʼolu bahenire ohusuna ehirabo hyʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu hyefe olu hwasuna ŋaliŋo aŋanga ohubagaana ohubabatiza nʼamaaji?”
44010048	Olwʼehyo ngʼalagira bababatiza mu siina lya Yesu Kurisito. Ni bahena ohubabatisa ngʼabaatu abo basunga Peetero ohuhola nʼabaho ni nabo ohuhena ahamanga.
44011001	Ngʼaŋo abahwenda abasigalaŋo ko nʼabafugiirira Kurisito abomu Buyudaaya yosiyosi baŋulira baati abaatu Abatali Bayudaaya boosi baali bafugiiriiye ehibono hya Hatonda.
44011002	Olwʼehyo Peetero ni gaŋwa e Kayisaaliya gagamayo e Yerusaalemu, Abayudaaya bahye abaali ni bawagira ehyʼAbatali Bayudaaya ohuhomola nga bamwoloobya baati,
44011003	“Otiina otye mu mago gʼAbatali Bayudaaya era walyamo nʼebiryo?”
44011004	Ngʼaŋo Peetero abaloohesa byosibyosi ngʼolu byali ati,
44011005	“Ni naali mu hibuga e Yoopa ni ndi husaba nasuna ohwolesewa. Mu hwolesebwa ohwo nabona ehiitu ehyali oti hani lusuuka olubba ni baluŋambire hu mbega jalwo ene ni balwisa aŋa naali ohuŋwa mwigulu.
44011006	Ni netegeeresa nga mbonaaho esolo ejʼamagulu ane eja hiisi hiha nʼebyeŋalula ko nʼenyuni.
44011007	Ngʼaŋo pulira ejanjaasi omuutu ni gandoma ati, ‘Peetero, yinyoha wiite, ohene olye.’
44011008	Ngʼese mugobolamo ti, ‘Bbe, Musengwa sipanga, olwohuba kiiri hulyangaho ehiitu ehyʼembiho wayire ehitali higwalaafu.’ ”
44011009	Nga nindi pulira ejanjaasi lira eri naŋulira ni liŋwa mwigulu omuutu oyo ni gandoma ati, “Ehiitu ehi Hatonda ahenire ohugwalaasa otahiranga oti sihigwalaafu.”
44011010	Ebibono ebyo babigobolamo emirundi edatu, ngʼaŋo bagobosayo olusuuka olwo mwigulu.
44011011	“Mu hiseera ehyene ehyo abasinde badatu aba baali ni batumire eyi ndi ohuŋwa e Kayisaaliya nga boola mu mago omu naali.
44011012	Era Omwoyo Omutukuvu nga gandoma tegania hutiina ni nabo eyiri owaali nʼabatumire. Abalebe bano omukaaga boosi batiina ni nange era hwesihwesi hwengira mu nyumba yomwene hunanga.
44011013	Ni hwali eyo nga Koluneriyo omwene hunanga atuloohesa ngʼolu malayika gamubonehera mu nyumba yiye era malayika oyo ngʼolu gamuloma ati, ‘Tumisa e Yoopa, bahulangire omuutu oyu balanga baati Simooni Peetero,
44011014	njʼanahulomere ebibono ebinahuleetere ewe omwene nʼabomu mago gago bosibosi ohunoŋoha.’
44011015	“Ni natandiha ohuloma, Omwoyo Omutukuvu ngʼabeehaho ngʼolu hwesi oludaayi gatwihaho hu ludaalo lwa Petekoote.
44011016	Ehyo ni hyaliŋo nga kebulira ehi Musengwa galoma ati, ‘Yowaane gabatiza nʼamaaji, aye enywe muja hubatiziwa mu Omwoyo Omutukuvu.’
44011017	Olwo ŋaahani Hatonda nʼaba nʼaŋaaye abaatu abo Abatali Bayudaaya ehirabo ehyene ehyo ehi gatuŋa efe ni hwafugiirira Musengwa Yesu Kurisito, naahali ndiise ani ohuŋahania Hatonda mu hi aholire?”
44011018	Ni baŋulira ebibono ebyo, baŋuma hindi hya huloma wabula bajumirya hujumirya Hatonda ni baloma baati, “E-e! Ŋaahani Hatonda aŋaaye nʼAbatali Bayudaaya ekabi eyʼohwebbwaga nʼohufugiirira Yesu basune obulamu obutaŋwaŋo!”
44011019	Ŋaahani balala hu bafugiirira Kurisito bala abasaasaana ohuŋwa mu Yerusaalemu olwʼohuhiyaania ohwaliŋo ni beetire Sitefaano, bagenda nga boola mu twale lyʼe Foyinikiya abandi hu hizinga Kipuro nʼabandi mu hibuga hyʼAtiyokiya. Hiisi eyi babitanga batiinanga ni balomera Bayudaaya boŋene Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu Yesu.
44011020	Aye abandi hu bafugiirira abo baali basinde abaali ni basimuha hu hizinga Kipuro nomu hibuga Kireene. Abo ni batiina mu Atiyokiya, nga batandiha ohulomera Abayonaani boosi Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu Yesu Musengwa.
44011021	Hatonda Musengwa ngʼabaŋambiraho era nga bangi hu bo bacuuha bafugiirira Yesu Musengwa.
44011022	Amaŋuliro ago ni gagwa mu matwi gabafugiirira Kurisito abaali mu Yerusaalemu nga batuma Bbalunaba mu Atiyokiya.
44011023	Bbalunaba ni goola gaabona ngʼolu Hatonda gaŋambira abaatu abo ehisasabirisi ngʼasangaala era ngʼabahubbirisa bosibosi ohusigala ni bali bahenerefu mu myoyo jaawe ohwesiga Yesu Musengwa.
44011024	Bbalunaba gaali musinde mulaŋi era Omwoyo Omutukuvu nʼali njʼamutangirira mu byosi ebi gaholanga era ni gesigira erala Hatonda. Abaatu bangi nga boola ohufugiirira Yesu Musengwa hulwa Bbalunaba.
44011025	Ŋaahani olwolire nga Bbalunaba atiina mu Taruso ohuheja Sawulo.
44011026	Ni gamubona ngʼatiina ni naye mu Atiyokiya aje amuyeedeho omulimo gwʼohusomesa abafugiirira Kurisito. Eyo nga bahenayo omwaha omuhwiye ni bali nʼehibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira ehyomu hibuga ehyo nga basomesa abaatu abeene abangi. Eyo mu Atiyokiya peyi basookera ohuguliha abafugiirira Kurisito esiina baati, “Abakurisitaayo.”
44011027	Mu hiseera ehyo ngʼebaayo abanaabbi abaŋwa e Yerusaalemu baserengeta batiina mu Atiyokiya.
44011028	Ni baali eyo, nga mulala hu bo oyu balanganga baati Agabbo gemeerera mu baatu ohubaaho nʼehi aloma. Ngʼaŋo Omwoyo Omutukuvu amulomeramo ngʼolu enjala eyʼamaani yaali nʼeja hugwa mu hyalo hyosihyosi ehi Abarooma baali ni baŋuga (Enjala eyo yagwaŋo mu mulembe gwa habaha wʼAbarooma oyu balanganga baati Kulawudiyo).
44011029	Ehyo ni hyaliŋo, ngʼabafugiirira bomu Atiyokiya basalaŋo ohwesondamo obuyeedi ni beema hu pamba ya hiisi mulala hu bo babuŋeerese abahyawe abaali mu twale lya Buyudaaya.
44011030	Ni bahena ohwesonda nga batuma Bbalunaba ni Sawulo baŋire obuyeedi obwo babuŋambye abatangirisi abʼehibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira Kurisito babuŋe abo abaali ni baŋuma hyahweŋambaho.
44012001	Ŋaahani mu hiseera ehyo habaha Herode gatandiha ohuhiyaania abafugiirira Kurisito era galagira bajase balala hu bo babadanye mu komera.
44012002	Habaha oyo ngʼalagira beeta nʼepiima omuhwenda oyu balanganga baati Yakobbo mulebe wa Yowaane omuhwenda.
44012003	Ni gabona ehi aholire ni hisangahise abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya ngʼalagira bajasa ni Peetero yeesi bamudanya mu komera. Ehyo gahihola mu hiseera hyʼEmbaga yʼAbayudaaya eyi baliiraho emigaati eji batataayemo ehisimbulusa.
44012004	Ni bahena ohuŋamba Peetero nga Herode alagira bamudanye mu komera era ngʼalagira bayungule ebibbubbu bine ebyʼabasirikale bane bane bamuhuume butiribiri ni batamuŋa simire. Herode gaali genda aŋosesye Peetero mu lwijuuye oludaalo lwʼEmbaga eyʼOhuhebuliraho Ohubihisya ni lubitire.
44012005	Ngʼaŋo bajasa Peetero bamuboŋa mu komera, aye abafugiirira bahye nga begumya ohumulombera Hatonda amuyeede.
44012006	Ko buhene buhye hu ludaalo olu Herode gaali nʼategehire ohulagira baleete Peetero bamuŋosesye mu lwijuuye lwʼabaatu, Peetero gaali aŋenyuhire ŋagati wʼabasirikale babiri, ni bamuhaadire nʼenjegere ebiri era nʼabasirikale abandi ni bahuumire hu lwigi lwʼekomera.
44012007	Ni gaali mwiro ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo malayika wa Musengwa gaaja ngʼehimyaso hihwana ehisenge hyosihyosi omu gaali. Nga Malayika oyo ahoonya Peetero mu mbafu amwinyosa mwiro ahena amuloma ati, “Yinyoha mangumangu!” Ngʼaŋo enjegere eji bali ni basidihire Peetero jiŋwa hu mihono jigwa ŋaasi.
44012008	Nga malayika oyo amuloma ati, “Yambala ebyambalo bibyo nʼebirayito bibyo.” Nga Peetero ahola ngʼolu bamuloma. Nga malayika amuloma ehindi ati, “Yeboŋe olugoye lulwo ohene wunonde.”
44012009	Nga Peetero atula mu komera alonda malayika cooka nʼatahahasa ati ebi malayika gaali nʼamuholera dala bituufu era byali biri hubaŋo. Niye gaali aŋeega ati aloota buloote.
44012010	Ngʼaŋo bagenda baabita hu hibbubbu ehidaayi ehyʼabasirikale abaali ni bahuuma ekomera. Nga babita nʼohu hyohubiri boola hu lwigi olwʼehyoma olwali hu mulyango ogwiguhira mu ngira eyija mu hibuga. Ni balwolaho nga lweyigula olwene batula boola mu luguudo. Ni bagenda ni baluŋama lulala hu nguudo baluheenaho ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo malayika amugotaho.
44012011	Nga mu hiseera ehyo Peetero ko afaania ati ebyali ni bibaayeŋo dala byali bituufu ngʼaloma ati, “Ŋaahani tegeeye ti Musengwa atumire malayika wuwe gaaje gaatuse mu meeno ga nasaŋa omu Herode abaaye ni gataaye ni nʼebyo byosibyosi ebi batangirisi bʼAbayudaaya babaaye ni baŋeega ohukola.”
44012012	Ni gahena ohuhifaania ngʼagenda atiina ewa Malyamu nyina wa Yowaane oyu balanganga erindi baati Mariko. Eyo abafugiirira baali bahumbaaniiyeyo ohumulombera Hatonda amuyeede.
44012013	Peetero ni goola gakookona hu lwigi ngʼomuhaana oyu balanganga baati Rooda owaali nʼatamba mu mago ago, atiina aje abone njʼani akookona.
44012014	Omuhaana ni gafaania ati ejanjaasi lyʼowaali nʼakookona lyali lya Peetero gaduluma nʼesangaalo ni lyenda hwita wiite nga gaagaamayo nʼatamwiguliiyeŋo. Ngʼalomera abaali mu nyumba ati, “Peetero njʼali ebulafu gemereeye hu mulyango!”
44012015	Nga bala bamubuusa baati, “Oguuye eralu?” Omuhaana ni gabahahasa ati hituufu, nga bahanda baloma baati, “Oyo anabe malayika wuwe amuhuuma.”
44012016	Aye Peetero niye gaali geyongera ohukookona. Ni beegulaŋo bamubona nga beŋunja.
44012017	Nga Peetero abaŋubira omuhono ohubaŋoleresa ngʼabalomera ngʼolu Musengwa gaali nʼamutuhiise mu komera. Era ngʼabaloma ati, “Bino mubilomereho Yakobbo nʼabalebe abandi.” Ngʼahena aŋwayo atiina aŋaatu aŋandi.
44012018	Ni wahya mu mugamba nga ŋabaaŋo ohutabuha ohwʼamaani mu basirikale abaali ni bahuuma Peetero ni bebuusa abeene nʼabeene ehyali ni himwolireho.
44012019	Ni byagwa habaha Herode mu hutwi ngʼalagira bamuŋenje aye ndibamubona. Ehyaŋwamo ngʼabuusa abasirikale abaali ni bamuhuuma ohubiroosa ngʼolu gabeyibaho ko agote. Ni byabahaya ngʼalagira babeete. Ebyo ni byaŋwa, nga habaha Herode aŋwa mu twale lyʼe Buyudaaya aserengeta atiina mu hibuga hyʼe Kayisaaliya abeho eyo ohuhena ahamanga.
44012020	Mu hiseera ehyo habaha Herode gaali asuuleene nʼabaatu bomu bibuga ehyʼe Tiiro ko ni Sidoni. Balala hu baatu bomu bibuga ebyo nga beŋimba batiina eyi ali baje bamubone basyane. Ni boola nga baŋooyaŋooya Bulasito omuŋeeresa wa habaha oyu gasiganga ohwesiga ni bamusunga abateereyo ahabega habaha Herode aganye ŋabeŋo ekolagana ŋagati waabwe nʼegwanga lirye olwohuba ndʼeryabaliisanga.
44012021	Hu ludaalo olu Herode gabalaga ati ndolu anababone, gambala ebyambalo bibye ebyʼobuŋugi nga geehala hu tebe yiye eyʼobuŋugi ngʼaloma eyiri abaatu bosibosi abaali ni bahumbeene.
44012022	Ngʼaŋo abaatu abo bamupaaha ni baloma baati, “Ono aloma eyi huli si muutu wabula hatonda!”
44012023	Olwohuba Herode sigaŋa Hatonda eŋono aye galeha abaatu bamupaaha ni bamulanga hatonda, ŋaweene aŋo malayika wa Hatonda Musengwa ngʼamudanyaho olumbe era nga enyende jimulya mulamu ahena afa. Era ŋabitaŋo ahamanga hatotono ngʼafa.
44012024	Aye ehibono hya Hatonda nihyo nga hyeyongera ohuhwana mu baatu era nʼomuŋendo gwʼabafugiirira nga gweyongera.
44012025	Bbalunaba ni Sawulo ni boosa obuyeedi obu bafugiirira bomu Atiyokiya babaŋa ohuŋirira abahyawe abomu Yerusaalemu, nga baagamayo mu Atiyokiya ni Yowaane oyu balanganga erindi baati Mariko.
44013001	Ŋaahani mu hibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira Kurisito mu Atiyokiya mwalimo abanaabbi ko nʼabasomesa abasomesanga ebiŋamba hu Hatonda. Abaatu abo baali nje Bbalunaba ni Simyoni oyu balanganga erindi baati Mumali ni Lukiyo owʼe Kireene ni Manayeeni owaali owʼomuboolo gwa habaha Herode ko ni Sawulo.
44013002	Lulala abaatu abo ni baali mu husaba nʼohusiiba, Omwoyo Omutukuvu ngʼabaloma ati, “Muutobolere Bbalunaba ni Sawulo baakolere omulimo ogu nabalangiiye.”
44013003	Ngʼaŋo bosibosi beyongera ohusiiba nʼohulombera Sawulo ni Bbalunaba. Ni bahena nga babataho emihono ohubaabula ohuholanga emirimo eji babalangira nga bahena babaseebula batiine bahole emirimo ejo.
44013004	Ngʼaŋo Omwoyo Omutukuvu atangirira Bbalunaba ni Sawulo nga batiina ŋano ni naŋala ni babuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi. Ni baŋwa mu Atiyokiya baserengeta nga batiina hu mwalo gwʼe Selewukiya eyi baŋwa nga basomoha batiina hu hizinga Kipuro.
44013005	Hu hizinga hino boolera hu mwalo gwʼe Salamisi. Ni baali eyo nga babuuliranga ehibono hya Hatonda mu mahumbaaniro gʼAbayudaaya. Yowaane oyu balanga baati Mariko gaali ni nabo era gabayeedanga mu mulimo guno.
44013006	Ngʼabaatu abo bondatu bagenda ohuŋwa eyi ehizinga ehyo hitandihira ohwola eyi hyagama mu hibuga ehi balanganga baati Paafo. Eyo bageeneyo omuŋeŋa Omuyudaaya era naabbi owʼobudulingi oyu baali ni balanga baati Bari Yesu.
44013007	Omuŋiŋa oyo gaali meeri yʼomuŋugi owʼehizinga ehyo oyu balanganga baati Serugiyo Pawulo. Serugiyo Pawulo gaali muŋugi owaali omulabuhi era gatumisa bamulangire Bbalunaba ni Sawulo ni genda yeesi bamulomere ehibono hya Hatonda.
44013008	Aye omuŋiŋa oyo oyu balanganga baati Eluma olwohuba cʼehi esiina lirye lira lyali ni niritegeesa, ngʼaŋahania ebya Bbalunaba ni Sawulo nʼatenda omuŋugi oyo afugiirire Kurisito.
44013009	Ngʼaŋo Sawulo oyu balanganga erindi baati Pawulo Omwoyo Omutukuvu amumaamira ngʼasimba Eluma emoni,
44013010	ahena amuloma ati, “Musinde ewe, oli muŋeeresa wa Sitaani. Oli wamahiribbania era owijuuye obudulingi. Oŋahania hiisi hiitu ehiraŋi mu moni ja Hatonda. Solirehera aŋo ohubbamya abaatu ohuŋwa hu bibono ebitufu ebiŋamba hu Musengwa?
44013011	Ale ni ŋaahani ŋano Hatonda Musengwa genda huhuboneresa, era genda huhwigala emoni ohene ahamanga nʼoli muŋofu nʼotabona njase yʼeryuba.” Ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo emoni jʼomusinde oyo omuŋiŋa jiijaho olubooha ngʼehyalo himaliŋa ndaŋanga hubona. Ngʼatandiha ohumamaata humamaata ni gendula omuutu owʼohumuŋamba hu muhono amutangirire.
44013012	Omuŋugi Serugiyo Pawulo ni gabona ebyolire hu muŋiŋa oyo nga geŋunja bugali esomesa eyiŋamba hu Yesu Musengwa era ngʼahena amufugiirira.
44013013	Ebyo ni byaŋwa nga Pawulo nʼabahye ababiri basomoha ohuŋwa e Paafo bambuha boola e Peruga mu twale lyʼe Pafiliya eyi Yowaane oyu balanganga erindi baati Mariko gabaleha geeyagamirayo e Yerusaalemu.
44013014	Nga Pawulo ni Bbalunaba nibo baŋwa e Peruga batiina mu hibuga Atiyokiya mu hitundu ehi balanga baati Pisidiya. Oludaalo olwa Sabbaato ni lwola nga batiina mu humbaaniro lyʼAbayudaaya beehala.
44013015	Nga ŋabaaŋo owʼasomera abaatu ebyaŋandiihiwa ohuŋwa mu bitabo byʼamagambi ebi Musa gaŋandiiha nomu bitabo byʼabanaabbi. Ni gahena ngʼabatangirisi bʼehumbaaniro eryo batuma omuutu alome Pawulo nʼowahye ati, “Aboluganda ni muba nʼehibono ehyʼohugumya abaatu, esaawa njʼeyino.”
44013016	Pawulo ni gabaloma atyo, nga genyoha aŋa ahabonero nʼahola omuhono beetege bamuŋulirise ngʼahena aloma ati, “Bayisirayiri bahyange ni nʼenywe Abatali Bayudaaya aye ni mujumirya Hatonda, mutege ohutwi mbalomere.
44013017	Hatonda oyu efe Abayisirayiri hujumirya gatobola abasehulu beefe ni baali babuli mu hyalo hyʼe Misiri babe baatu babe era ngʼabaasa basaalagana bafuuha egwanga eryʼabaatu oluhulende. Ehiseera hyola ngʼabatusa eyi baali ni baŋatiiye nʼatambisa obuŋangi buwe owʼamaani.
44013018	Gahena ngʼabalabirira mu lulafu ohuhena emyaha ngʼamahumi ane ni gehalirihire obuhahadafu bwabwe.
44013019	Ngʼabaŋambiraho asihiirisa amawanga omusanvu agaali ni gamenyire mu hyalo hyʼe Kanani. Ni gahena ohugasihiirisa ngʼabaŋa ehyalo ehyo ohuba obutaka waawe.
44013020	Ehyo hyaŋira emyaha ngʼebihumi bine nʼataanu. Ebyo ni byaŋwa nga Hatonda abateeraŋo abalamuzi ohubalamulanga era omugigi ogwo gwaliŋo ohwolera erala mu biseera bya naabbi Samwiri.
44013021	Ehiseera hyolire Samwiri nʼahiramula ngʼaŋo basunga babaŋe habaha abe njʼabaŋuga. Nga Hatonda abaŋa Sawulo omusaani wa Kiisi owʼehiha hya Bbenjamini owʼabaŋuga ohuhena emyaha amahumi ane.
44013022	Hatonda ni gatusa hu Sawulo obwahabaha ngʼataŋo Dawudi ohuba habaha waawe. Dawudi oyo Hatonda gamulomaho ati, ‘Dawudi omwana wa Yese njʼomusinde owoleene nʼebiŋeego byange era anaholenga byosibyosi ebinjolera hu mwoyo.’ ”
44013023	Hatonda gooheresa ehi gasuubisa abasehulu beefe nʼahibisya mu lulyo lwa Dawudi ni gaŋa Yisirayiri Yesu ohuba Omunoŋosi.
44013024	Yesu ni gaali nʼahiri hutagiiha omulimo gugwe, Yowaane omubatiza geheerera galoma abaatu bosibosi mu Yisirayiri bebbwage babatiziwe.
44013025	Era Yowaane ni gaali nʼaheneresa omulimo gugwe gabuusa abaatu ati, “Muŋeega muuti ndiise ani? Mutaŋeega muuti ndiise Omunoŋosi oyu babasuubisa. Niye anahanondeho egongo, ese ni poyeeŋo era oyo gaakira obuŋangi sipoomera wayire nʼohuboŋolola ekoba jʼengayito jije.”
44013026	Ale Aboluganda Abayisirayiri abomu lulyo lwa Yibbulayimu ko ni nenywe Abatali Bayudaaya aye ni mujumirya Hatonda mulehe mbalomere. Hatonda gaŋeeresa ebibono bino ebiŋamba hu Munoŋosi hu lwefe.
44013027	Abaatu bomu Yerusaalemu ko nʼabatangirisi baawe sibafaania baati Yesu njʼOmunoŋosi, cooka mu hutamufaania ohwo hyabaŋweramo ohumusalira omusango ogwʼohufa booheresa ebibono byʼabanaabbi ebi basomanga hiisi ludaalo lwa Sabbaato.
44013028	Wayire baŋuma songa etuufu eyitisa Yesu, basunga Pilaato alagire bamuhomerere hu musalabba.
44013029	Ni bahena ohwoheresa byosibyosi ebi ebyaŋandiihiwa bimulomaho, nga ŋabaaŋo abamutusa hu musalabba bamusiiha.
44013030	Aye Hatonda ngʼamulamusa.
44013031	Yesu ngʼahena hu hyalo endaalo enyene enyingi nʼatiina nʼabonehera abaloobera babe aba gaŋwa ni nabo e Galilaaya ohutiina e Yerusaalemu. Hatyane abaatu abo njʼabaŋa obujulizi obumuŋambaho.
44013032	“Ŋaahani Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi aga hubalomera gali gaati ehi Hatonda gasuubisa abasehulu bʼefe,
44013033	ahyoherehiise mu mulembe guno eyiri efe abaana baawe nʼalamusa Yesu. Ehyo era hyoheresa ehyaŋandiihiwa mu Zabbuli eyohubiri ehiroma hiiti, “ ‘Oli Mwana wange, olwa leero kusaaye.’
44013034	“Olwohuba Hatonda galamusa Yesu, era nga saligobolayo hufa nindi, cʼehigira aloma ati, ‘Ngʼolu nʼasuubisa Dawudi, mwesi aŋaŋuma hubuusabuusa ndibaŋa ekabi.’
44013035	Nʼomu Zabbuli eyindi Dawudi aloma ati, “ ‘Solireha Omwabufu wuwo hubolera e magombe.’
44013036	“Dawudi ni gahena ohuhola emirimo eji Hatonda gendire ahole, gafa era bamusiiha mu masihiro gʼabasehulu babe.
44013037	Aye Yesu oyo oyu Hatonda galamusa ohuŋwa e magombe sigabola.
44013038	“Olwʼehyo balebe, muhitegeere muuti Hatonda asoniŋa ebibi byenywe olwʼehyo ehi Yesu gahola sosi olwʼohuhuuma amagambi aga baŋa Musa. Hatonda aŋanga ohusoniŋa ebibi byenywe.
44013039	Hatonda asoniŋa ebibi bya hiisi muutu afugiirira Yesu, ehi amagambi ga Musa gataŋanga huhola.
44013040	Olwʼehyo mumanya ebi banaabbi baloma bitaboolaho. Olwohuba baloma baati,
44013041	“ ‘Ale enywe abatala ebindoma ohuhola, mutiine mu moni nʼohweŋunja muhene musihirire, olwohuba ŋaliŋo ehi ndi huhola mu mulembe gwenywe, cooka ehi mutaŋanga hufugiirira, wayire nʼolu ŋabaaŋo abanyonyola.’ ”
44013042	Pawulo ni gahena ohuloma ebibono ebyo, nʼehiseera ni hyola ehyʼohuŋwa mu humbaaniro, Pawulo ni Bbalunaba ni baali ni batiina ngʼabaatu babasunga baagameyo mu humbaaniro olwa Sabbaato olulondaho bongere ohubasomesa ebibono ebyo.
44013043	Abahulu bʼehumbaaniro ni baseebula abaali ni bahumbeene, abaatu abaŋeraho omwali Abayudaaya nʼAbatali Bayudaaya abaali ni bacuuhire ni bengira ediini lyʼEhiyudaaya, nga baŋerehera Pawulo ni Bbalunaba. Mu huŋaya ni nabo, Pawulo ni Bbalunaba babahubbirisa begumye ohufugiirira baati Hatonda abanoŋola lwa hisasabirisi hihye.
44013044	Hu lwa Sabbaato olwalonderaho, abaatu bomu hibuga ehyo baŋwerehereramo nʼebyana baje baŋulire ehibono hya Hatonda Musengwa.
44013045	Abatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya ni babona abaatu ni bali bangi baatyo, nga bagongeera era nga batandiha ohuloma lubona ni batala ebi Pawulo gaali nʼalomera abaatu.
44013046	Pawulo ni Bbalunaba ni babona baatyo nga babaloma ni baŋuma hutya baati, “Enywe Abayudaaya ninywe aba hubaaye nʼohweherera ohulomera ehibono hya Hatonda. Aye ngʼolu mugeene, nga mulaga mwabeene ngʼolu mutenda husuna bulamu obutaŋwaŋo ale leha hwesi hubalehe hutiine hulomere Abatali Bayudaaya,
44013047	olwohuba ehyo ni Musengwa omwene cʼehi gatulagira ohuhola ni galoma ati, ‘Kutayeŋo obe hyʼenjase eyiri Abatali Bayudaaya era oje olomere abaatu bosibosi mu hyalo ebiŋamba hu bunoŋosi.’ ”
44013048	Abatali Bayudaaya ni baŋulira ebibono ebyo, nga basangaala era nga baŋa ehibono hya Musengwa eŋono. Abo aba Hatonda gategehera ohusuna obulamu obutaŋwaŋo nga bafugiirira Kurisito.
44013049	Mu hiseera ehyo ehibono hya Musengwa nga higenda hihwana mu twale eryo lyosiryosi.
44013050	Cooka ngʼabatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya basendasenda abasinde abʼeŋono ko nʼabalala hu bahasi abaali ni bajumirya Hatonda ate ni bali begingihiriri mu hibuga ehyo batandiha ohuhiyaania Pawulo ni Bbalunaba era nga bahena bababbinga nomu twale lyawe.
44013051	Nga Pawulo ni Bbalunaba baŋahania ehi babahola ni bakukumulira abaatu abo efuuhe lyʼomu magulu gaawe. Ngʼaŋo baŋwa mu hibuga ehyo batiina mu hibuga ehi balanganga baati Yikoniyo.
44013052	Ne Omwoyo Omutukuvu nga geyongera ohumaamira abafugiirira mu Atiyokiya nʼabatangirira mu bibaholanga beeyongera ohusaŋalyanga olwʼobunoŋosi.
44014001	Pawulo ni Bbalunaba ni boola mu hibuga ehi balanganga baati Yikoniyo, nga batiina mu humbaaniro lyʼAbayudaaya ngʼolu esambo yaawe yaali. Ni batiina nga batandiha ohulomera abaatu ebiŋamba hu Yesu. Ohumanya nga baloma bulaŋi Abayudaaya nʼAbatali Bayudaaya abeene abangi nga bafugiirira Kurisito.
44014002	Aye nga ŋabaaŋo Abayudaaya abandi abagaana ohufugiirira ebya Pawulo ni Bbalunaba era nga batabula ebiŋeego byʼAbatali Bayudaaya ni babaloma baati baali babadulinga era nga hibaleetera ohucaawa abalebe abo.
44014003	Ngʼaŋo Pawulo ni Bbalunaba bahenayo ahamanga ahaŋeraho ni balomera abaatu nʼobugumu ebiŋamba hu Musengwa. Era Musengwa yeesi ngʼabaŋambirangaho bahola ebyamaliholiho ohuhahasa ebi basomesanga baati abaatu banoŋoha olwʼehisasabirisi hihye.
44014004	Ngʼeduuli lyʼAbaatu bomu hibuga ehyo begabulamo ebibbubbu bibiri olwʼobuhwenda obuŋamba hu Yesu. Hirala hu byo mwalimo abafugiirira ebi Bayudaaya baloma, ngʼabandi baba hu lubega olwafugiirira ebyʼabahwenda abo ababiri.
44014005	Ngʼaŋo abaali ni baŋahania ebyʼabahwenda ni mulimo Abatali Bayudaaya ko nʼAbayudaaya ŋalala nʼabatangirisi baawe beehoba ohulumba abahwenda abo babahubbe amabaale bafe.
44014006	Aye abahwenda nga bahitegeera baŋwa mu hibuga ehyo batiina mu bibuga Lisitura ni Derube mu hitundu hyʼe Likawooniya ko nʼomu bitahere ebyʼomulirano,
44014007	eyi batiina mu moni nʼomulimo gwʼohulomera abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu Yesu.
44014008	Ŋaahani mu hibuga Lisitura mwalimo omusinde omuteŋe owaŋwa mu hida hya nyina ni hyamutolyonga amagulu.
44014009	Lulala Pawulo ni gaali nʼabuulira, omusinde oyo omuteŋe yeesi gaali aŋo nʼaŋulirisa ebi gaali nʼaloma. Pawulo ni gasimba omusinde oyo emoni ngʼahifaania ati gaali nʼohufugiirira ati Yesu aŋanga ohumuŋonia.
44014010	Olwʼehyo Pawulo gamuloma ati, “Yinyoha weemerere.” Ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo omusinde oyo ahutuha gemeerera atandiha ohugenda.
44014011	Ngʼaŋo ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu ahyali aŋo hyabona ehyamaliholiho ehi Pawulo gahola baŋeega baati abahwenda abo ababiri mbʼabagasani aba bajumiryanga mu gwanga lyawe. Nga bayaalira ŋalala ni baloma nʼejanjaasi eryʼamaani mu Lulikoniyo baati, “Muuje mwebonere! Abahulu batuhyaliiye mu hifaananyi hyʼabaatu!”
44014012	Nga Bbalunaba bamulanga ohuba nje Zeewo, Pawulo niye bamulanga Erume olwohuba mbo njʼowali omuhwenda wa Zeewo namulomerera.
44014013	Ngʼaŋo omusengi wa Zeewo owaali nʼesabo ebulafu wʼehibuga, aleeta ebunwa jʼeŋombe ŋa mulyango gwʼehibuga ni bajambahiise amabombwe ni genda geŋimbe hu hiŋindi hyʼabaatu abaali aŋo baŋongere Pawulo ni Bbalunaba.
44014014	Aye abahwenda abo bombi, Bbalunaba ni Pawulo ni bahifania nga bahanula ebyambalo byawe ohulaga baati sibasangaafu olwʼehyo ehi baatu baali ni benda ohuhola. Era nga baja babehubbamo ni besasaagala ni baloma baati,
44014015	“Bahyefe hiina ehiboosa ohuhola ehyo? Efe hwesi huli baatu buutu hyenywe. Hujire ohubalomera Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi mulehe ohujumirya ebinambulamo mucuuhe mugobole eyiri Hatonda Omulamu owʼatonda egulu nʼehyalo nʼenyanja ni nebyo byosibyosi ebirimo.
44014016	“Ahalehale Hatonda galeha enywe abaatu Abatali Bayudaaya mwajumirya hiisi ehi emyoyo jenywe jabatumanga.
44014017	Cooka sigahaya hwebonesa eyi muli. Hino gahiholanga nʼabita mu biraŋi ebi gabaholeranga omuli ohubatonyehesa efula hu birime, nʼohwamya gabyamya mwasuna ebiryo ebiŋera emyoyo jenywe jejula esangaalo.”
44014018	Wayire baloma abaatu ebibono ebyo sihyali hyangu ohulobera abaatu ohubaŋongera.
44014019	Aye ebyo ni byaŋwa nga ŋabaaŋo Abayudaaya abaaŋwa mu bibuga Atiyokiya ni Yikoniyo batiina basendasenda abaatu baŋwa hu bi Pawulo gaali nʼababuuliiye. Ngʼabaatu bafugiirira ebyʼAbayudaaya bahubba Pawulo amabaale ohwola olu gagwa gaafaho olweso. Nga bala bamudyedyesa bamutusa ebulafu wʼehibuga bamuleha eyo ni baŋeega baati afuuye.
44014020	Aye abafugiirira Kurisito abaali mu hibuga ehyo nga batiina bemeerera ohumweswanigirisa. Ni gagobosa nga genyoha gaagamayo mu hibuga ni nabo. Ni wahya nga Pawulo ni Bbalunaba baŋamba engira batiina mu hibuga hyʼe Derube.
44014021	Ni boola e Derube, nga Pawulo ni Bbalunaba balomera abaatu bomu hibuga ehyo Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi era nga bangi hu bo bafugiirira Kurisito. Ebyo ni byaŋwa baŋamba olugendo nga baagamayo e Lisitura mbabo e Yikoniyo ohwola mu Atiyokiya mu twale lyʼe Pisidiya.
44014022	Hiisi eyi boolanga, batiinanga bagumya abafugiirira Kurisito ni babahubbirisa ohuba abamazima mu hufugiirira hwawe mu Hatonda. Hino bahihola ni babaloma baati, “Huli nʼohugumira ebigosi ebingi ebitwolaho Hatonda ko atwingise mu buŋugi buwe.”
44014023	Hiisi eyi Pawulo ni Bbalunaba baŋwanga, balehanga ni bangaaye abatangirisi abohutangirira ehibbubbu ehyo. Era ni bahenanga ohubangala nga bahumbaania abafugiirira babaaho nʼehiseera ni babasabira era ni basiiba nga ko bahena babaŋambya Musengwa oyu baali ni bafugiiriiye abahuume.
44014024	Pawulo ni Bbalunaba ni baŋwa mu hitundu hyʼe Pisidiya nga boola mu hyʼe Pafiliya.
44014025	Ni boola mu hitundu ehyo batiina mu hibuga ehi balanga baati Peruga nga balomera abaatu baamo ehibono hya Hatonda eyo peyi baŋwa nga batiina hu mwalo Ataliya.
44014026	Ni boola hu mwalo ogwo nga basomoha baagamayo mu Atiyokiya eyi bafugiirira bahyawe basaba abe ni nabo ni batandiha omulimo ogwʼohulomera abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi ogu ŋaahani baali ni babbubuuye.
44014027	Pawulo ni Bbalunaba ni boola nga bahumbaania abafugiirira Kurisito babanjulira byosibyosi ebi Hatonda gabatambisa era ngʼolu gaŋa Abatali Bayudaaya ehiyale boosi baafugiirira Kurisito.
44014028	Ngʼaŋo abahwenda abo bahena mu Atiyokiya ahamanga ni bali nʼabafugiirira bahyawe.
44015001	Ŋaahani ŋaaliŋo abasinde abaŋwa e Buyudaaya batiina mu Atiyokiya nga batandiha ohusomesa abafugiirira Kurisito baati, “Ohutusaho nga enywe Abatali Bayudaaya mwesi muhomooye ngʼolu amagambi ga Musa galagira, Hatonda saaja hubanoŋola.”
44015002	Hino hyaleetera Pawulo ni Bbalunaba ohuŋahana ni nabo ebyembaha ebyene hu songa yino nʼehyaŋwamo ngʼabafugiirira basalaŋo baati Pawulo ni Bbalunaba nʼabafugiirira abandi hu bo batiine e Yerusaalemu eyiri abahwenda nʼabatangirisi babafugiirira babebuuseho hu songa eyo.
44015003	Abafugiirira Kurisito ni babaseebula, ngʼabahwenda basimbuha batiina mu lugendo lwawe ni babitira mu twale eryʼe Foyinikiya ni eryʼe Samaliya. Hiisi eyi boolanga balomeranga abafugiirira baayo ngʼolu Abatali Bayudaaya boosi bafugiirira Hatonda. Amaŋuliro gano gaasangaasa bugali abafugiirira bahyawe abomu bifo ebyo.
44015004	Pawulo ni Bbalunaba ni boola e Yerusaalemu ngʼabafugiirira Kurisito, abahwenda nʼabatangirisi abahulu aba babafugiirira babasangaalira. Boosi nga babanjulira hiisi hiitu ehi Hatonda abatambihiise.
44015005	Aye abandi hu bafugiirira abaali abomu hibiina hyʼAbafalisaayo nga baloma baati, “Abatali Bayudaaya ni baba ni benda ohufuuha abafugiirira Kurisito, bali nʼohuhomola era bahole ebi magambi aga Hatonda gaŋa Musa galagira konyo.”
44015006	Ngʼaŋo abahwenda nʼabatangirisi babafugiirira abahulu bahumbaana ohuŋeega hu songa eyo.
44015007	Ahamanga ni haŋeraŋo bahubbagania ebiŋeego, Peetero genyoha ngʼaloma Oluhiiho ati, “Aboluganda, muhimanyire muuti ehiseera ehibitireho ŋanyuma aŋo Hatonda gatobooye ese samwene nje ndomere Abatali Bayudaaya Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi bahafugiirira.
44015008	Hatonda amanyire ebiri mu myoyo jʼabaatu gafugiirira abaatu abo era gahena gaabaŋa ehirabo hyʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu ngʼolu gatuŋa efe.
44015009	Sigataŋo njabulo ŋagati weefe ni nabo olwohuba gagwalaasa obulamu waawe olwʼohufugiirira Kurisito.
44015010	Olwo ni hiba hiityo, lwahiina hwahendire ohuhema Hatonda ni hutwiha abafugiirira Kurisito abo omugugu gwʼamagambi ogu efe abeene wayire abasehulu beefe bataŋanga hwetwiha?
44015011	Huhimanyire bulaŋi huuti efe hwesi Hatonda atunoŋola olwʼehisasabirisi hya Musengwa yeefe Yesu, ngʼolu Abatali Bayudaaya boosi abanoŋola.”
44015012	Ebibono ebyo nga biŋoleeresa abaali ni bahumbeene era nga baŋulirisa Pawulo ni Bbalunaba ni babaloohesa ebyeŋunjisa nʼebyamaliholiho ebi Hatonda gabatambisa ŋagati mu Abatali Bayudaaya.
44015013	Ni bahena ohuloosa ebyo nga Yakobbo owaali omutangirisi wʼabafugiirira mu Yerusaalemu aloma ati, “Aboluganda mutege ohutwi mbalomere.
44015014	Simooni Peetero atunyonyooye ngʼolu Hatonda omwene muhutandiiha galaga ati abalumirwa ni gaali nʼaba getoboleeye mu baatu abo Abatali Bayudaaya gabafuula abaatu babe.
44015015	Ehyo hiŋambagana bulaŋi nʼebi banaabbi baŋandiiha baati,
44015016	“ ‘Ebyo ni biŋooye ndigobola, nʼagobosa bunyaaha obuŋugi wa Dawudi. Ndibuhosiira, nabugobosaŋo ngʼolu bwali oludaayi.
44015017	Ehyo ndihihola abaatu boosi banyendule, Abatali Bayudaaya bosibosi aba nalanga ohuba abaatu bange, banyendule. Bino binahabeŋo olwohuba ese Hatonda Musengwa omwene hubiroma nahabyoherese.
44015018	Ebyo samwene nabimanyisa eyiri abaatu ohuŋwa ahale nahale.’ ”
44015019	Nga Yakobbo geyongera aloma ati, “Olwʼehyo, hu lwange ndoma ti hutahalubya bulamu wʼAbatali Bayudaaya hihande hibalobeerese ohucuuha ohugobola eyiri Hatonda.
44015020	Aye hubaŋandiihire ni hubaloma beŋalame ohulya ebiryo ebi baŋongire eyiri emisambwa, nʼobuhwedi nʼohulya enyama eyʼehyayo ehifuuye ni batahisalireho wayire ohulya amalasire.
44015021	Olwohuba ahamanga haŋerire abaatu abo ni baŋulira ebibono bya magambi ga Hatonda ebi Musa gaŋandiiha ni babisoma hiisi ludaalo lwa Sabbaato mu mahumbaaniro gomu bibuga byawe.”
44015022	Ngʼaŋo abahwenda nʼabatangirisi abahulu nʼehibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira Kurisito hyosihyosi behirisa ebya Yakobbo. Nga basalaŋo ohweyangalamo abasinde babiri babatume batiine ni Pawulo ni Bbalunaba mu Atiyokiya. Nga bangala Yuda oyu balanganga erindi baati Barusabba ko ni Silaasi. Abaatu bano bombi baali batangirisi babafugiirira bahyawe.
44015023	Nga babatuma nʼebbaluŋa eyaali ni yiroma yiiti, “Ndiife abalebe benywe abahwenda nʼabatangirisi abahulu aba bafugiirira. Huŋandiihira enywe abafugiirira Kurisito Abatali Bayudaaya abali mu hibuga Atiyokiya nomu bifo ebindi mu twale lyʼe Siriya ko nʼerye Kilikiya. Mutye eyo?
44015024	Hwaŋulira huuti ŋaliŋo abaatu abaŋwa eno beŋagula baaja eyo nga betambagania nʼebibono ebitabuyetabuuye ebiŋeego byenywe.
44015025	Olwʼehyo efe hwesihwesi eno husalireŋo ohwetobolamo abaatu hubatume eyi muli ŋalala nʼabameeri beefe abahoda Bbalunaba ni Pawulo,
44015026	abeŋayo baasinga obulamu bwawe ohuhola emirimo ja Yesu Kurisito Musengwa yeefe.
44015027	Olwʼehyo huli hutuma Yuda ni Silaasi ohubahahasa ni babalomera nʼomunwa ebi hubaŋandiihiiye mu bbaluŋa yino.
44015028	“Omwoyo Omutukuvu atutangiriye mu hiŋeego hino era husalireŋo ohutabatwiha mugugu gwʼamagambi gʼAbayudaaya ohutusaho ohubaloma muhole bino,
44015029	mweŋalame ohulya ebiryo ebi baŋongire eyiri emisambwa, nʼobuhwedi era nʼohulya enyama eyʼehyayo ehifuuye ni batahisalireho wayire ohulya amalasire. Singa simunaholenga biitu ebyo munabenga muholire bulaŋi. Mweraba.”
44015030	Ngʼaŋo babaseebula baŋire obuhwenda obwo eyiri abafugiirira mu Atiyokiya. Ni boola nga bahumbaania abafugiirira Kurisito bahena babaŋambya ebbaluŋa eyo.
44015031	Abafugiirira ni basoma ebbaluŋa eyo nga basangaala olwʼobuhwenda obwo obwabagobosamo amaani.
44015032	Nga Yuda ni Silaasi abaali nʼehirabo hyʼobunaabbi baloma ebibono bingi ebigobosamo amaani era ebyagumya abalebe abo.
44015033	Oluvanyuma lwʼohuhenayo ahamanga, abafugiirira bomu Atiyokiya babasaayaho nga babaseebula baagamayo e Yerusaleemu eyiri ababatuma.
44015034	Aye Silaasi niiye gasalaŋo ohusigalayo.
44015035	Aye Pawulo ni Bbalunaba nga basigala mu Atiyokiya ni basomesa abaatu ehibono hya Musengwa nʼabahyawe abandi.
44015036	Ni ŋabitaŋo ehiseera nga Pawulo aloma Bbalunaba ati, “Hutiine hulambuule abafugiirira Kurisito mu bibuga eyi hwabulira ehibono hya Musengwa hubone ngʼolu beemire mu hufugiirira Musengwa.”
44015037	Bbalunaba gaali genda batiine ni Yowaane oyu balanganga baati Mariko,
44015038	aye Pawulo ndahisiima nʼatahibonamo mahulu ohutiina ni Mariko olwohuba gabadulumaho ni bali mu twale lyʼe Pafiliya gabaleha ni baahihola obuŋeeresa.
44015039	Hino hyabaleetera obuyoga ŋagati waawe era boola nʼohwabuhana amabitire. Bbalunaba ngʼasalaaŋo atiine ni Mariko era nga basomoha batiina hu hizinga Kipuro.
44015040	Aye Pawulo gangala nje Silaasi abe njʼoyu atiina ni naye. Abafugiirira Kurisito ni babasaayaho ekabi ja Hatonda Musengwa nga batiina.
44015041	Nga Pawulo agendanga ni Silaasi betoloola mu Siriya nomu Kilikiya nʼagumya ebibbubbu byʼabafugiirira Kurisito.
44016001	Ngʼaŋo Pawulo ni Silaasi boola mu hibuga hyʼe Derube abonaho abafugiirira bayo ngʼahena atiina mu hibuga hyʼe Lisitura. Eyo yaaliyo omuloobera wa Yesu oyu balanganga baati Temuseewo. Nyina ya Temuseewo gaali muhaana Muyudaaya era nʼafugiirira Kurisito, aye semwana niiye gaali Muyonaani.
44016002	Abafugiirira Kurisito bosibosi mu Lisitura ni Yikoniyo balomanga biraŋi byerere hu Temuseewo.
44016003	Pawulo gendire ohutiina ni Temuseewo mu lugendo lulwe. Hino hyamuleetera ohumuhomola olwohuba Abayudaaya abaali mu hitundu ehyo bosibosi baali bamanyire ngʼolu semwana gaali Muyonaani.
44016004	Ngʼaŋo Temuseewo ni Pawulo ni Silaasi baagenda batiina hibuga hu hibuga ni balomera abafugiirira ebi bahwenda nʼabatangirisi abahulu mu Yerusaalemu basalaŋo abafugiirira Abatali Bayudaaya ohuŋamba.
44016005	Ebibbubbu byʼabafugiirira Kurisito nga biŋangala mu hufugiirira hwabyo era nga hiisi ludaalo omuŋendo gwʼabafugiirira gweyongerangaho.
44016006	Pawulo nʼabahye baali bendire ohutiina ohulomera abaatu bomu twale lyʼAsiya Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi aye Omwoyo Omutukuvu gabagaana. Ehyaŋwamo nga batiina ni betoloola mu twale lyʼe Fulugiya nʼe Galatiya ni balomera abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi.
44016007	Ni boola hu salosalo nʼetwale lya Misiya nga bagesyaho ohutiina mu twale lyʼe Bbisiniya, aye Omwoyo wa Yesu sigabaganya hutiina.
44016008	Olwʼehyo babita hubita e Misiya beehirira batiina hu mwalo gwʼe Turoowa eyi nabeŋimbiraho.
44016009	Ni boola eyo mu wiire oweene obwo nga Pawulo goolesewa abona omusinde owomu twale lyʼe Makedoniya ni gemeereye era namwegalihira ati, “Nja e Makedoniya otuyeede.”
44016010	Ni wahya Pawulo ko nʼahenire ohusuna ohwolesewa, ni gatuŋayira hwasalaŋo aŋo ni naaŋo hutegehe hutiine e Makedoniya, ni huli nʼobuhahafu huuti Hatonda gaali atulanga huje hulomere abaatu abʼe Makedoniya Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi.
44016011	Ngʼaŋo husomoha ohuŋwa e Turoowa hutiina hu hizinga ehi balanga Samoturakiya era peyi hwaŋenyuha. Ni wahya nga nindi husomoha hwola hu mwalo gwʼe Niyapooli.
44016012	Ni hwaŋwayo nga hutiina mu hibuga hyʼe Filipi. Ehibuga hino njʼehyali ehihulu mu twale lyʼAbarooma eryʼe Makedoniya. Eyo hwamenyayo endaalo ejiŋera.
44016013	Oludaalo lwa Sabbaato ni lwola hwatula ehibuga nga hutiina hu lwabi eyi hwasuubira huuti huŋanga ohwagaanayo ehifo ehiraŋi hyʼohulomberamo. Ni hwola eyo hwagaanayo abahasi abaali ni bahumbeene nga hwihala hutandiha ohubalomera ehibono hya Hatonda.
44016014	Mu bahasi abo abaali ni batutegeeye amatwi mwalimo oyu balanganga baati Lidiya. Lidiya gaali musubuzi wa ngoye ejʼerangi lya namasyoma nʼaŋwera mu hibuga Siyatira. Omuhasi oyo gaali Muyonaani aye ni gacuuha gengira ediini yʼAbayudaaya. Hatonda Musengwa ngʼagegula omwoyo gugwe afugiirira obuhwenda obu Pawulo gabuulira.
44016015	Niiye nʼabomu mago gage ni bahena ohubatiziwa, ngʼatusunga ohutiina ewuwe nʼaloma ati, “Ni muba ni mukahasa ohuba omuutu afugiirira Musengwa, muganye muuje mumenyeho ewange.” Nga huganya hutiina humenyaho ni naye.
44016016	Lulala ni hwali ni hutiina mu hifo ehi baatu beeyo bahumbaanirangamo ohusaba nga hwaganana nʼomuhaana owaali omwidu womulala hu baatu bohwo. Omuhaana oyo gaaliho omusambwa ogwamuleeteranga ohulagula ebyabanga ni bija hubaŋo. Musengwawe gamusunirangamo hibbala olwʼohulagula ohu galagulanga abaatu nʼabalomera ebinahabeŋo.
44016017	NgʼOmuhaana oyo alonderesa Pawulo ko ni neefe abaali ni naye nʼalomera ŋamugulu ati, “Abasinde bano baŋeeresa ba Hatonda owomwigulu ahira bosibosi obuŋangi. Bali hubalomera baati Hatonda oyo njʼanoŋola.”
44016018	Hino gahihola ohuhena endaalo ejiŋera. Ehyo hyaleetera Pawulo ehabyo ehyaŋwamo ngʼacuuha aheja eyiri omuhaana oyo ngʼaloma omusambwa ogwamuliho ati, “Kulagira mu siina lya Yesu Kurisito, muŋweho!” Ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo omusambwa gumuŋwaho.
44016019	Abeene muhaana oyo ni babona baati esuubi lyabwe eryʼohwingisa obuŋinda lihomire, nga baŋamba Pawulo ni Silaasi babadyedyesa babaŋira mu nabiŋwera mu moni jʼabobuŋangi.
44016020	Ni baboosa nga babemeha mu moni jʼabalamuzi babaŋaŋabira ni baloma baati, “Abaatu bano Bayudaaya ne basasamahise abaatu mu ehibuga muno
44016021	ni babaleegera esambo eji efe Abarooma hutaŋanga hufugiirira wayire ohugenderamo.”
44016022	Ngʼaŋo oguŋindi gwʼabaatu abaali aŋo gweŋimba hu bala abaali ni baŋaŋabira Pawulo ni Silaasi gubejulira. NgʼAbalamuzi balagira bambula Pawulo ni Silaasi babafaduula efaalu.
44016023	Ni bahena ohubafaduula nga babadanya mu komera bahena balagira omuhuumi wʼekomera ohubahuuma butiribiri.
44016024	Omuhuumi wʼekomera yeesi ni bamuŋa ehiragiro ehyo ngʼabata mu hisenge ehyomugati ngʼabasidiha amagulu nʼebijofu.
44016025	Mu wiire ŋagati Pawulo ni Silaasi ni baali ni basaba era ni bemba nʼenyembo ejʼohumujumirya, abasibe bahyawe baali baŋulirisa.
44016026	Ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo ŋabaaŋo ohuteetema hwʼehyalo ohwʼamaani ohwatengesya omusingi gwʼekomera. Ngʼejigi jʼekomera josijosi jiiguha nga nʼenjegere eji baali ni basidihiiye abasibe bosibosi jiboŋoloha.
44016027	Omuhuumi wʼekomera ni gasisimuha mwiro gaabona enjigi jʼekomera ni jiri njigule ngʼaŋeega ati abasibe beyibire. Ngʼasoŋolayo epiima yiye ni genda geeyite.
44016028	Aye Pawulo ngʼamuhayuhira ati, “Leha oteyita! Hwesihwesi hulimo!”
44016029	Ngʼaŋo omuhuumi wʼekomera atumisa baleete etaala. Ni bamuleetera etaala nga gengira mangu mu komera ahubba amafuha ohuupi ni Pawulo ni Silaasi nʼateetema huteetema olwʼobuti.
44016030	Ngʼaŋo atusa abasibe abo ebulafu ahena ababuusa ati, “Basengwa, kole hi ko nahanoŋoha?”
44016031	Ngʼaŋo bala bamuloma baati, “Fugiirira Yesu Musengwa oja hunoŋoha ewe omwene nʼabomu mago gago bosibosi.”
44016032	Ngʼaŋo Pawulo ni Silaasi balomera omuhuumi wʼekomera nʼabomu mago gage bosibosi ehibono hya Musengwa.
44016033	Owiire obwo ngʼomuhuumi wʼekomera aŋira Pawulo ni Silaasi aŋali amaaji abamitya amabbwa gʼebihubbe. Ni gahena ngʼaŋo ni naaŋo omuhuumi wʼekomera abatiziwa ko nʼabomu mago gage bosibosi.
44016034	Ni bahena ngʼomuhuumi wʼekomera aŋira Pawulo ni Silaasi ewuwe abaŋa ehigeni ni gejuuye esangaalo olwohuba niye omwene nʼabomu mago gage bosibosi baali bafugiiriiye Hatonda.
44016035	Owiire ni wahya ngʼabalamuzi batuma abasirikale eyiri omuhuumi wʼekomera bamulome baati, “Lehula abasinde abo.”
44016036	Ngʼaŋo omuhuumi wʼekomera aloma Pawulo ati, “Abalamuzi bandagiiye mbalehule, ewe ni Silaasi. Olwʼehyo mweyagamireyo engo era mwole bulaŋi.”
44016037	Aye nga Pawulo aloma aba balamuzi batuma ati, “Batuhubbire mu lwijuuye ni batehereeye hutuŋosesya ate nga ko huli Barooma. Ŋaahani olwo batulehula batye mu ngiso? Kadi! Hugeene. Muje mubalome abeene baaje batulehule.”
44016038	Nga bala batiina balomera abalamuzi ebi Pawulo gabaloma. Ni hyabagwa mu hutwi hiiti Pawulo ni Silaasi Barooma nga balebera ekoba.
44016039	Ngʼaŋo baja babebbwagira olwʼebi baali ni babaholire nga babaŋerehera babatusa ebulafu wʼekomera ni babegalihira batiine baŋwe mu hibuga ehyo.
44016040	Pawulo ni Silaasi ni baŋwa mu komera nga batiina ewa Lidiya. Ni boola nga babonana nʼabafugiirira nga babahubbirisa ohwegumya hu Yesu nga bahena basimbuha batiina.
44017001	Ngʼaŋo Pawulo ni Silaasi batiina babita mu hibuga ehyʼAfipooli nʼehya Apolooniya nga boola mu hibuga hyʼe Sesalonika. Eyo yaaliyo ehumbaaniro lyʼAbayudaaya.
44017002	Oludaalo lwa Sabbaato ni lwola, nga Pawulo atiina mu humbaaniro ngʼolu esambo yiye yaali era ngʼalondehania Sabbaato edatu nʼatiinanga mu humbaaniro nʼanyonyola abaatu abaalingamo Ebyaŋandiihiwa,
44017003	ohulaga ati Oyo oyu Hatonda gafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu gaali nʼohubonaabona, bamwite aye ahene alamuhe. Ngʼera abaloma ati, “Yesu ono oyu mbalomera njʼomwene oyo oyu Hatonda gafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu.”
44017004	Nga ŋabaŋo Abayudaaya abafugiirira Kurisito beeŋimba hu Pawulo ni Silaasi era nʼAbatali Bayudaaya abeene abangi abaali ni baŋa Hatonda eŋono ko nʼabahasi abegingihiriri abatali batono boosi bafugiirira Kurisito.
44017005	Aye balala hu batangirisi bʼAbayudaaya nga bagongeera olwʼabaatu bomu Sesalonika ohufugiirira ebi Pawulo gabasomesa. Ehyaŋwamo nga batiina mu nabiŋwera bahumbaania balala hu baatu ababi abaalimo ni berereesa nga baŋesa ogubbubbu gwʼabaatu batagiha ohwegugunga mu ehibuga. Nga balumba amago gʼomusinde oyu balanganga baati Yasoni ni baheja Pawulo ni Silaasi babaŋire mu bobuŋabangi babaŋohesye.
44017006	Ni batabagaanayo nga baŋamba Yasoni bamudyedyesa ko nʼabafugiirira abandi abaaliyo babaŋira eyiri abobuŋangi mu hibuga ehyo. Ni baboosa nga baloma abobuŋangi ni bahayuha baati, “Abasinde nago ababiri abatabuuyetabuuye abaatu mu hyalo hyosihyosi bajire ni naŋano mu hibuga hyefe.
44017007	Era omusinde ono Yasoni, njʼabahuumire mu mago gage. Abaatu bosibosi abomu hibbubbu hyawe bajeemera amagambi ga Kayisaali ni baloma mbo ŋaliŋo habaha owundi atali Kayisaali. Mbo bamulanga baati Yesu.”
44017008	Ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu abaaliŋo nʼabatangirisi bʼehibuga ni baŋulira ebibono ebyo nga batawuha.
44017009	Baali benda hu danya Yasoni nʼabafugiirira aba gaali ni nabo mu komera aye nga basasula endiŋi nga abatangirisi bʼehibuga babalehula.
44017010	Ni wiira ngʼabafugiirira baseebula Pawulo ni Silaasi batiine e Bberoya. Ni boola eyo ngʼolu esambo yabwe yaali, batiina mu humbaaniro lyʼAbayudaaya.
44017011	Abayudaaya abaali mu Bberoya nibo baali balaŋi ohuhira abʼe Sesalonika olwohuba baafugiirira ehibono hya Hatonda nʼomwoyo mulala era baatayo omwoyo hiisi ludaalo ohwendulirisa mu Byaŋandiihiwa ohubona hanye ebi Pawulo ni Silaasi baali ni babasomesa dala bituufu.
44017012	Ehyaŋwamo, Abayudaaya bangi nga bafugiirira Kurisito era balala hu bahasi abegingihiriri nʼabasinde abeene bangi Abatali Bayudaaya nga boosi bafugiirira.
44017013	Aye ni hyagwa Abayudaaya bomu Sesalonika mu hutwi ti Pawulo gaali abuulira ehibono hya Hatonda e Bberoya, nga yoosi batiinayo baja basasamasa abaatu baayo ni babaloma baati ebi Pawulo gaali nʼabasomesa byabudulingi.
44017014	Olwʼehyo, balala hu bafugiirira nga baŋamba Pawulo bamuŋereha hu mwalo aye Silaasi ni Temuseewo nibo nga basigala e Bberoya.
44017015	Abaŋerehera Pawulo ni bamwosa hu mwalo nga basomoha ni naye bamwosa mu hibuga Asene nga ko baagamayo. Ni baali ni baagama nga Pawulo abalagiirisa balome Silaasi ni Temuseewo batere bamulondeho.
44017016	Pawulo ni gaali mu Asene nʼahumiriye Silaasi ni Temuseewo ohutiina ohumweŋimbaho ngʼaŋulira ohulumwa mu mwoyo olwʼehibuga ohwijulamo ebirolero byʼemisambwa ebingi eji baatu bamwo bajumiryanga.
44017017	Hino hyamuleetera ohutiinanga habuhyabuhya mu humbaaniro nʼomu nabiŋwera mu hibuga ehyo ohulomera Abayudaaya nʼAbatali Bayudaaya abaali ni baŋa Hatonda omulamu eŋono, ebiŋamba hu Yesu.
44017018	Nga ŋabaŋo abasomesa aba balanganga baati Abeepikuro ko nʼAbasitoyiki abaŋahanianga ebya Pawulo. Nga mubaamo abaloma ni bamujerega baati, “Ko ono yeesi adafaaya hi?” Abandi nga baloma baati, “Hinaabe ti emisambwa emigeni njʼejimulomereraho.” Abaatu abo baloma batyo olwohuba Pawulo gaali abuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu Yesu ngʼolu gafa gaahena gaalamuha.
44017019	Ngʼaŋo bamuŋira mu hifo omu bahihiranga ehi balanganga baati Arewopagaawo. Ni boola nga bamuloma baati, “Ale ŋaahani tulomereho ebiŋamba hu buhwenda buno obunyaaha obu oli hulomeranga abaatu.
44017020	Ebi oloma binyaaha mu matwi geefe era hwenda humanye ehi bitegeesa.”
44017021	Ehyo bahiroma olwohuba abasaale bomu Asene ko nʼabaali ni bamenyire mu hibuga ehyo bosibosi, bahenanga ebiseera byawe ni baŋulirisa abalomeranga amaŋuliro amanyaaha.
44017022	Ngʼaŋo Pawulo gemeerera mu moni jʼoluhiiho lwʼArewopagaawo aloma ati, “Bataka bomu Asene, mbwene ngʼolu muli banadiini ehibitiriiye.
44017023	Hino kiroma olwohuba ni mbaaye ni genda mu hibuga hyenywe, hiisi aŋa kubbirenga emoni nga mbonaŋo ehirorero era kenire naabona nʼehindi ehi baŋandiihaho baati, ‘HINO HYA HATONDA ATATEGEREHEHA.’ Ŋaahani oyo oyu mujumirya ni mutamutegeera njʼoyu nenda hubalomera ebimufaho.
44017024	“Hatonda oyo njʼowatonda ehyalo ni nʼebyo byosibyosi ebirimo, era nje Musengwa aŋuga egulu nʼehyalo, era saamenya mu masabo aga abaatu batongola nʼengalo jaawe.
44017025	Hatonda oyo aŋuma ehi getaaga abaatu ohumuhirihitanira olwohuba niye njʼaŋa abaatu bosibosi omuuya ogwʼobulamu nʼebiitu byosibyosi ebi benda.
44017026	Mu hutandiha, Hatonda gabumba omuutu mulala era mu oyo nga muŋwamo amawanga gʼabaatu bosibosi abahwene mu hyalo hyosihyosi. Ni gahena ngʼateeraŋo hiisi baatu ehifo omu banamenyenga nʼebiseera ebi banahenenga,
44017027	Ehyo Hatonda gahihola olwʼohwenda abaatu bamwendule hamunga bahamubona wayire saali ŋaleŋi ni hiisi mulala hu fe.
44017028	Ngʼolu baloma, ‘Hatonda oyo njʼagema hwagenda era hwabaŋo balamu,’ era ngʼolu balala hu bahiri magesi benywe baloma baati, ‘Huli baana babe.’
44017029	Olwʼehyo, ngʼolu huli baana ba Hatonda, sihiba hiraŋi huŋeega huuti Hatonda ali mu hifaananyi hyʼehiitu ehi baatu bahola mu magesi gaawe ogʼobuutu buutu mu zaabbu oba mu feeza.
44017030	“Ahalehale Hatonda sigafangayo hu ebyo ebi baatu baholanga olwʼobuŋaayi ni batamumanyire. Aye ŋaahani alagira abaatu bosibosi hiisi eyi bali bebbwage bacuuse emyoyo,
44017031	olwohuba gataŋo oludaalo olu alisalira abaatu bosibosi omusango nʼatehubbira nʼatambisa omuutu oyo oyu omwene gahena ohweyangalira. Hino gahihahasa eyiri abaatu bosibosi ni galamusa omuutu oyo mu bafu.”
44017032	Ni baŋulira Pawulo nʼaloma hu hulamuha nga ŋabaaŋo abesiniola, aye abandi nga baloma baati, “Hunahende wongere ohutulomera hu songa eyo oludaalo olundi.”
44017033	Ngʼaŋo Pawulo aŋwa mu luhiiho atiina.
44017034	Nga ŋabaaŋo abaatu bageregere abehirisa ebi Pawulo galoma nga bafugiirira Yesu. Mu baatu abo mwalimo mulala hu bʼOluhiiho oyu balanganga baati Diyoniziyo, nʼomuhasi oyu balanganga baati Damari ko nʼabandi.
44018001	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, nga Pawulo aŋwa mu hibuga Asene atiina e Koriiso.
44018002	Eyo gageeneyo Omuyudaaya owaali omusaale womu twale lyʼe Pooto ni bamulanga baati Akwila ko nʼomuhasi wuwe Pulisikira. Abaatu abo baali bahasenguha ohuŋwa e Rooma mu Yitale ohuuja mu hibuga ehyo olwohuba Kulawudiyo owaali omuŋugi wʼobwahabaha wʼAbarooma mu hiseera ehyo gaali alagiiye Abayudaaya bosibosi bahiŋwemo. Nga Pawulo ajʼabahyalira.
44018003	Olwohuba Akwila ni Pulisikira baali babboti wa weema, Pawulo owaali yeesi nʼamanyire omulimo njʼomwene gasalaŋo ohumenya ni nabo batambire ŋalala.
44018004	Hiisi ludaalo lwa Sabbaato Pawulo gatiinanga mu humbaaniro lyʼAbayudaaya gagesyaho ohunyonyola Abayudaaya nʼAbatali Bayudaaya bafaanie baati Yesu njʼoyu Hatonda gafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu.
44018005	Silaasi ni Temuseewo ni baŋwa e Makedoniya bamweŋimbaho nga Pawulo ahenera amaani gosigosi hu hubuulira ehibono hya Hatonda nʼalomera Abayudaaya ati Yesu njʼoyu Hatonda gafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu.
44018006	Aye Abayudaaya abo ni batandiha ohumuŋahania nʼohumulomaho ebyakalebule ngʼabakukumulira efuuhe lyʼomu ngoye jije ngʼahena abaloma ati, “Ni musihiirihanga, musango gwenywe mwabene! Ese kenire ogwange era ohuŋwa ŋaahani nja hutiina hulomera Abatali Bayudaaya Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi.”
44018007	Ngʼaŋo Pawulo aŋwa mu humbaaniro eryo atiina mu mago agaali ni galireene ngʼaja abeeyo nʼabuulira. Amago ago gaali ga musinde Atali Muyudaaya aye owaali nʼaŋa Hatonda eŋono ni bamulanga baati Tito Yusito.
44018008	Oluvanyuma, Omuhulu wʼehumbaaniro lyʼAbayudaaya oyu balanganga baati Kurisipo nʼabomu mago gaage bosibosi nga bafugiirira Musengwa. Era abaatu bʼe Koriiso bangi abaŋulira ebibono ebi Pawulo gabuulira nga bafugiirira Kurisito bababatiza.
44018009	Lwali lulala mu wiire nga Musengwa aloma ni Pawulo mu holesebwa ati, “Otatya, wegumye ohulomera abaatu ehibono hyange otahihalaho,
44018010	olwohuba ese samwene ndi ŋalala ni neewe. Eŋuma muutu yesiyesi aja huhwosaho ehigosi. Yegumye olwohuba ndi nʼabaatu bangi mu hibuga hino abaja hufugiirira.”
44018011	Nga Pawulo ahenayo omwaha muhwiye nʼehimesu nʼasomesa abaatu baayo ehibono hya Hatonda.
44018012	Ŋaahani olwolire Galiyo ni gaali nʼaŋuga e twale eri balanganga baati Akaya, ngʼabatangirisi bʼAbayudaaya beehobana baŋamba Pawulo bamuhubba mu mbuga.
44018013	Nga bamuŋaŋabira ni baloma baati, “Omusinde ono ali husendasenda abaatu bajumirye Hatonda mu ngeri eyi bbwaga amagambi gʼEhiyudaaya.”
44018014	Pawulo gaali ko genda hweŋosyaho, nga Galiyo aloma Abayudaaya abo ati, “Omusinde ono abanga nʼaholire esobi oba nʼasaaye omusango ogwʼohubbwaga amagambi nahaguŋulirihise,
44018015	aye ngʼolu ebi mufa biŋamba hu bibono nʼamasiina ko nʼamagambi genywe agʼEhiyudaaya, mwabeene mubiholeho ese sinabyeyingisemo.”
44018016	Ni galoma ebyo ngʼahena ababbinga nomu kooti.
44018017	Nga ŋaweene aŋo bala baŋamba omuhulu wʼehumbaaniro lyʼAbayudaaya oyu baali ni balanga baati Sosinesi nga batandiha ohumuhubbira aŋo mu moni ja Galiyo. Cooka Galiyo niye sigabefiiraho.
44018018	Nga Pawulo amenya mu hibuga Koriiso ohuhena endaalo enyene enyingi. Oluvanyuma ngʼaseebula abafugiirira asomoha nʼAkwila ni Pulisikira omuhasi wuwe batiina e Siriya. Ne ni gaali nʼahiri husomoha, gatiina hu mwalo gwʼe Kekiriya nga bamubegeraho eyo efiiri olwʼohweyama ohu gaali ni geeyamire.
44018019	Ni boola mu hibuga Efeeso eyo peyi Pawulo galeha Akwila ni Pulisikira omuhasi wuwe. Aye nʼahiiriyo ye omwene gatiina mu humbaaniro lyʼAbayudaaya ngʼatandiha ohunyonyola Abayudaaya ebiŋamba hu Yesu.
44018020	Cooka ni bamusunga abongereyo ahamanga ahʼohuba ni nabo sigafugiirira,
44018021	aye ni gaali nabaseebula ngʼabaloma ati, “Ni huba njʼohusiima hwa Hatonda ndigobola.” Ngʼahena asomoha aŋwa mu Efeeso.
44018022	Emeeri ni yoola hu mwalo gwʼe Kayisaaliya ngʼaŋwamo atiina ohuhesaho abafugiirira Kurisito nga ko gehirira atiina mu Atiyokiya.
44018023	Oluvanyuma lwʼohubaho mu Atiyokiya ohuhena ahamanga, gaŋwayo ngʼagenda atiina ŋano ni ŋala mu twale lya Galatiya nʼerye Fulugiya nʼagumya abafugiirira bosibosi mu hufugiirira hwawe.
44018024	Mu hiseera ehyene ehyo ŋaaliŋo Omuyudaaya oyu balanganga baati Apolo owaali omusaale womu hibuga Alekizandiriya owaŋwa ewaawe ngʼatiina mu Efeeso. Apolo gaali mwegerese bulaŋi era nʼamanyire bulaŋi ebyaŋandiihiwa.
44018025	Gaali gegire bingi ebiŋamba hu ngeri eyi Musengwa genda abafugiirira bebisyemo, era nʼabuulira bulaŋi ehyo ehi gaali nʼamanyire hu Yesu wayire nga gaali ahoma hubi Yowaane omubatiza gasomesa abo aba gabatizanga.
44018026	Ngʼaŋo Apolo atandiha ohubuuliranga nʼobugumu mu humbaaniro lyʼAbayudaaya mu hibuga omwo. Akwila ni Pulisikira omuhasi wuwe ni baŋulira ebi gaali nʼasomesa nga bamwanirisa mu mago gaawe bamunyonyola ebiŋamba hu Ngira ya Hatonda.
44018027	Ehiseera ni hyola Apolo gasalaŋo ohutiina mu twale lyʼAkaya, Abafugiirira bamuwagira era nga baŋandiihira abafugiirira baayo bamusangaalire. Ni goolayo gayeeda bugali abaatu aba Hatonda gaali nʼaŋambiiye ehisasabirisi bafugiirira Yesu.
44018028	Era ŋagati mu baatu ngʼasimyanga Abayudaaya mu huŋahana ye nʼahahasa nʼebyaŋandiihiwa ati Yesu njʼoyu Hatonda gafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu.
44019001	Apolo ni gaali nʼahiiri e Koriiso, Pawulo gaŋwa mu matwale gʼe Fulugiya ni Galatiya eyi gaali ngʼaŋamba engira atiina mu Efeeso. Eyo gagaanayo abaatu abamulomera baati baali bafugiirira Kurisito.
44019002	Nga niye ababuusa ati, “Ni mwafugiirira mwasuna ehirabo hyʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu?” Nga nibo bamugobolamo baati, “Kadi! Nʼohuŋulira sihuŋulirangaho huuti ŋaliŋo Omwoyo Omutukuvu.”
44019003	Nga Pawulo ababuusa ehindi ati, “Olwo ŋaahani ohubatiziwa hwenywe hwali hwa ngeri hi?” Nga bamugobolamo baati, “Ohubatiziwa ohwa Yowaane.”
44019004	Nga Pawulo abaloma ati, “Ohubatiza ohwa Yowaane haali habonero ahalaga haati omuutu gebbwagire era gabalomanga bafugiirire owaali nʼaja huuja niye nʼaŋooyeŋo era oyo nje Yesu.”
44019005	Ni baŋulira ebibono ebyo, nga bababatiza mu siina lya Yesu Musengwa.
44019006	Pawulo ni gata hu hiisi mulala emihono, ngʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu abeehaho nga batandiha ohuloma endimi eji baali ni batamanyire era nga baloma ebibono ebi Omwoyo gabawiihulira.
44019007	Abaatu abo baali baŋera abasinde ngʼehumi nʼababiri.
44019008	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, Pawulo gahena emyesi edatu nʼatiinanga mu humbaaniro lyʼAbayudaaya mu hibuga ehyo nʼalomeranga abaatu nʼobugumu nʼabahahasa ati ebi gaali nʼabalomera hu ngeri eyi Hatonda genda aŋugemo obulamu wʼabaatu bituufu.
44019009	Aye balala hu Bayudaaya nga bagaana ohufugiirira Kurisito era nga baduuliranga mu lwijuuye abo abaali ni bagendera mu Ngira ya Musengwa. Ehyo nga hireetera Pawulo ohubaŋwamo, era ngʼaŋamba abafugiirira atiina ni nabo bahumbaaniranga mu somero lya Turaano hiisi ludaalo ni bahubbagania ebiŋeego hu biŋamba hu buŋugi bwa Hatonda.
44019010	Hino hyamuŋirira emyaha ebiri era ngʼAbayudaaya nʼAbatali Bayudaaya bosibosi abaali ni bamenyire mu Asiya baŋulira ehibono hya Musengwa.
44019011	Hatonda ngʼahola ebyamaliholiho bingi nʼabitira mu Pawulo.
44019012	Nʼebitambaala obutambaala ebi gesabuhisanga oluuya oba ebi gebooŋanga nʼahola emirimo jije ni babiŋiranga babita hu balwaye, obulwaye bwabwe waŋonanga. Nʼababangaho emisambwa ni jibaŋwaho.
44019013	Ŋaahani ŋaaliŋo Abayudaaya abagendanga ni babbinga emisambwa hu baatu. Ehiseera hyola nga bagesyangaho ohujibbinga ni bajiroma baati, “Kulagira mu siina lya Yesu Musengwa oyu Pawulo abuuliraho, ŋwa hu muutu ono.”
44019014	Abaholanga ehiitu ehyo baali basinde musanvu abaali abasaani bʼomutangirisi wʼabasengi bʼAbayudaaya oyu balanganga baati Sikeeva.
44019015	Aye lwali lulala nga ŋabaŋo omusambwa ogwabaloma guuti, “Yesu mumanyire ni Pawulo yeesi mumanyire, ne enywe ndinywe aba ani?”
44019016	Ngʼaŋo omusinde owaaliho omusambwa ogwo abatuumiraho bosibosi abahubbiraŋo nga ko ababbutujula hifaabi ohwola olu beŋunula baduluma majula nʼabahanuuyehanuyeho ebyambalo ni batonya amafugi.
44019017	Ehiitu ehyo ni hyagenda hyahwana mu Bayudaaya nʼAbatali Bayudaaya abamenyanga mu Efeeso, nga bosibosi obuti bubaŋamba era nga batagiha ohuŋa Yesu Musengwa eŋono eryʼamaani olwohuba bafaania baati ali nʼobuŋangi owʼamaani.
44019018	Era nga hireetera bangi hu bafugiirira ohubbutula ebibi byawe eyiri abahyawe mu lwijuuye.
44019019	Abaŋeŋa bangi nga bahumbaania emifumbo jʼebitabo ebi batambisanga ohuhola obuŋeŋa, babyohya mu lwijuuye abaatu bosibosi ni babona. Ebiitu ebyo ni babibalirira byali biŋwamo ebbeesa buheehere.
44019020	Bino byaleetera ehibono hya Musengwa ohusasaana mu baatu abeene abangi era hyahola nʼamaani mu bulamu bwʼabo abahiŋulira.
44019021	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, nga Pawulo asalaŋo ohutiina e Yerusaalemu nʼabita mu matwale eryʼe Makedoniya nʼerye Akaya ohulambuula abafugiirira Kurisito. Nʼaloma ati, “Ni ndihena ohwolayo, teehwa ohutiina nʼe Rooma yoosi.”
44019022	Nga geheerera atuma abaloobera babe Temuseewo nʼErasito e Makedoniya bamwehererengayo niye nʼahiiriho mu twale lyʼAsiya.
44019023	Huupi mu hiseera njʼehyene, ŋaaliŋo abaatu abaleeta endibo hu abo abaali ni bagendera mu Ngira ya Musengwa.
44019024	Ŋaahani ŋaaliŋo omusinde omubboti oyu balanganga baati Demetiriyo. Demetiriyo njʼowabboteranga abaatu mu byoma ebya feeza obufaanani bwomu birorero byʼomusambwa ogu balanganga baati Arutemi. Omulimo guno gwamwingihisanga ye omwene nʼababboti bahye ebbeesa ejitali tono.
44019025	Ngʼaŋo Demetiriyo ahumbaania ababboti bahye bosibosi abaloma ati, “Bahyange, muhimanyire bulaŋi weene ngʼolu husunira hibbala mu mulimo gwefe guno.
44019026	Cooka mubona era muŋulira ngʼolu omusinde ono oyu balanga Pawulo abbamiisye abaatu abeene abangi baaba ti sibahiigula biitu ebi hubbota, si mu Efeeso muno mwoŋene aye mu twale lyʼAsiya lyosiryosi, nʼaloma mbo bino ebi hubbota nʼengalo si bahatonda kadi nʼaŋatotono.
44019027	Ehigosi hino sihinahagame hu mulimo gwefe, ahatale hʼebiitu byefe ni haguuye hyonyene, aye nʼabaatu boosi banahalehere aŋo ohutiina mu ngolo yʼArutemi. Era banahagosye obubbala nʼeŋono ebi Arutemi oyu baatu bosibosi mu twale lyʼAsiya nomu hyalo hyosihyosi ohuŋirira aŋalala bajumirya.”
44019028	Abahye ni baŋulira ebibono ebyo ngʼetima libaŋamba batandiha ohuhayaana ni baloma baati, “Arutemi owʼAbefeeso njʼahihenaho!”
44019029	Siŋabita eteŋama ebbala ngʼehibuga hyosihyosi hihwana oluboyooboyo. Nga ŋaabaŋo abaatu abaŋamba Gaayo nʼArisitaluuko abʼe Makedoniya abagendanga ni Pawulo. Ngʼehiŋindi hyʼabaatu hyeyoola hitiina ni badyedyesa abasinde abo baja beejuha mu hifo ehi bagudulirangamo emigudulo.
44019030	Pawulo gaali gendire gebonese eyiri ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu abo, aye abafugiirira bamugaana.
44019031	Balala hu bʼobuŋangi mu hibuga ehyo abaali abameeri babe boosi bamutumira obuhwenda ni bamuloma atagesyaho hwemayo.
44019032	Abaatu abaali ni bahumbeene baali mu huhubba luboyoboyo ni ŋabula aŋulirisa ehyʼowahye, hiisi muutu nʼahayaana nʼaloma hihye. Era ŋaaliŋo bangi abaali ni batabona nʼehibaŋirireyo.
44019033	Nga ŋabaaŋo Abayudaaya abaŋamba owahyawe oyu balanganga baati Alekizanda nga bamusindigirisa bamuŋira mu moni abahihirire alome eyiri ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu. Nga ŋaweene aŋo Alekizanda aŋuubira ehiŋindi hyʼabaatu abo omuhono baŋoleere aŋoserehese Abayudaaya.
44019034	Aye bala ni bahifaania baati Muyudaaya nga bosibosi bayaalira ŋalala bahayaana ni baloma baati, “Arutemi owʼAbefeeso njʼahihenaho!” Hino bahihola ohuhena esaawa huupi ebiri kwiye.
44019035	Ehiseera ni hyola omuŋandiihi wʼabobuŋangi mu hibuga ehyo gaŋooleresa abaatu, ngʼabaloma ati, “Bahyange abehasi bomu Efeeso, njʼani ŋano atamanyire ati mu hibuga Efeeso pomuli esabo lyʼArutemi owʼeŋono, ŋalala nʼehifaananyi hihye ehyaŋwa mwigulu hyagwa hu hyalo?
44019036	Olwʼehyo, ngʼolu ŋaŋuma aŋanga huhiŋahania, muguuje mutanguŋirisa huhola hiitu hyosihyosi ehiŋanga ehuhenaŋo emirembe.
44019037	Abasinde bano aba muleetire ŋano ŋabula ehi banyagire ohuŋwa mu sabo lyʼArutemi wayire ohumufodogola.
44019038	Ale hanye Demetiriyo nʼababboti bahye bali nʼehi bemulugunya hu muutu yesiyesi, emiryango jʼekooti jʼabalamuzi miigule. Baŋire eyo esonga jaawe banajiŋulirise.
44019039	Ni ŋabaŋo esonga yosiyosi eyi mwemulugunya, mutiine mwemulugunyihise mu kooti.
