Batwejeeresa obusibe bwʼamagambi huŋange ohuŋeeresa Hatonda mu kola epyaha ni hubita mu Mwoyo Omutukuvu, ekola eyitali yira ekale eyʼohugenderanga mu magambi aga baŋandiiha.
45007007	Olwo ŋaahani hulome huuti amagambi mabi? Kadi naŋadiidiri! Olwohuba hu lwange aŋaŋuma magambi sinahamanyire ehibi njʼehiina. Niŋahatabaayeŋo egambi eriroma liiti, “Siwegombanga hiitu hyabeene.” Sinahamanyire ti ohwegomba ehyabeene hibi.
45007008	Aye ehibi hyatambisa ekabi ohuŋwa hu gambi eryene eryo, hyandeetera ohwegomba ohwa hiisi ngeri. Olwohuba aŋaŋuma magambi ehibi sihiba nʼobulomere.
45007009	Ni naali ni kiiri hufaania ehi amagambi galagira, naali ndibulaŋi. Aye ni nagategeera, ngʼehibi hyeta aŋalafu,
45007010	era nga ko faania ti egambi eryali eryʼohunjeeda sune obulamu, mu butuufu lyali lipira mu hufa.
45007011	Olwohuba ehibi ni hyasuna ekabi eyʼohundulinga ni hibita mu hiragiro, nga hindeteera ohufa.
45007012	Wayire hiri hiityo amagambi nigo mawufu era nʼebiragiro byosi byabufu, bituufu era biraŋi.
45007013	Ŋaahani hulome huuti amagambi malaŋi nindi njʼagapweramo ohufa? Kadi naŋadiidiri. Aye ehihulu hiri hiiti ehibi ko hibonehere erala hiiti hibi, hitambisa ehiraŋi ohupweramo ohufa.
45007014	Humanyire huuti amagambi gaŋwa ewa Hatonda, aye neyagaana ni kolire ebyʼomubiri era ndi mwidu wʼehibi.
45007015	Ehi kola sikitegeera olwohuba ehi nenda ohuhola si cʼehi kola aye neyagaana ni kolire ehi tenda kole.
45007016	Mu ngeri eyi kola ehitahendire kole, hindeetera ohufugiirira ti amagambi nigo malaŋi.
45007017	Aye puma ngeri yosiyosi olwohuba ehibi ehiri mu ese njʼehigira ni kola ehitahendire kole.
45007018	Manyire ti mu ese puma hiraŋi hyosihyosi, olwohuba ngʼomuutu wayire nenda ohuhola ehiraŋi, sipanga huhihola.
45007019	Olwohuba ehiraŋi ehi nenda ohuhola si cʼehi kola aye neyagaana ni kolire ehibi ehitahendire kole.
45007020	Ŋaahani nimba ni kola ehi tahendire kole, si ndiise aba nahiholire aye ehibi ehiri mu ese.
45007021	Olwʼehyo, neyagaana ehyo ni hiri njʼehindiho. Nimba ni nenda kole ehiraŋi neyagaana ehibi ni hiri njʼehyetaayeŋo.
45007022	Cooka mu mwoyo gwange sangaalira amagambi ga Hatonda.
45007023	Aye mu mubiri mbona egambi eryʼenjabulo ni litamba era ni liŋiriŋania egambi lya Hatonda mu biŋeego byange, hino hindeteera ohuhola ebyʼomubiri.
45007024	O, nga mbweneweene! Njʼani alinoŋola mu mubiri guno ogwijuuye ehibi era oguupira mu husihiiriha?
45007025	Neyaasa Hatonda olwohuba mu Yesu Kurisito Musengwa yeefe, punuha ohuŋwa mu higosi hino! Ŋaahani po ndi tyo. Mu mwoyo gwange nemanyire ti ndi nʼohuhola ehi gambi lya Hatonda liroma, aye omubiri gupalula gwapira ohuhola ebi ehiragiro hyʼohuhola ehibi hiroma.
45008001	Abaatu abo abali mu Yesu Kurisito baŋuma musango,
45008002	olwohuba mu Yesu Kurisito, Mwoyo gaapa edembe era ehibi nʼohufa si bihiŋuga bulamu wange.
45008003	Amagambi gaali sigaŋanga hutunoŋola olwʼohwegomba hwʼomubiri. Aye Hatonda gatuma Omwana wuwe naali nʼomubiri hyʼogwomuutu ko ahene aŋangule ehibi ehi magambi gaali ni gataŋanga huhola olwʼohwegomba hwʼomubiri.
45008004	Yesu Kurisito gahihola, ko efe aba ohwegomba hwʼomubiri hutatangirira aye Omwoyo Omutukuvu njʼatutangirira, hwahoheresa ebi magambi gatulagira.
45008005	Abo aba ohwegomba hwʼomubiri huŋuga, baŋemba hu hola ebyʼomubiri, aye abo aba Omwoyo Omutukuvu aŋuga, baŋemba hu hola ebi asiima.
45008006	Ohuŋemba ohuhola ebi mubiri gwegomba hihwosa hu hufa. Aye onahola ebi Omwoyo Omutukuvu asiima, oja husuna emiyaaya nʼobulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
45008007	Omuutu oyu hwegomba hwʼomubiri huŋuga aba mulabe eyiri Hatonda era saaŋanga hugondera magambi gage.
45008008	Abo aba ohwegomba hwʼomubiri huŋuga sibaŋanga husangaasa Hatonda.
45008009	Omwoyo wa Hatonda nʼaba nʼamenyire mu nywe, ŋaahani njʼobaŋuga sosi ohwegomba hwʼomubiri. Era oyo aŋuma Omwoyo wa Kurisito mu bulamu buwe, si wuwe.
45008010	Kurisito nʼaba nʼamenyire mu bulamu bwenywe, wayire emibiri jenywe jinahafe olwʼehibi, aye Omwoyo abaŋa obulamu olwohuba Hatonda ababala ohuba abagwalaafu.
45008011	Hanye Omwoyo wa Hatonda owalamusa Yesu Kurisito amenyire mu bulamu wenywe, mwesi alibalamusa.
45008012	Olwʼehyo ŋaahani balebe mu Kurisito, huli nʼebbanja. Aye ohwegomba hwʼomubiri sinjʼohutubanja ohuhola ebigwenda.
45008013	Ohululuhanira ohuhola ebi hwegomba hwʼomubiri gwenda hireeta ohufa. Aye Omwoyo anabaŋa amaani mwaŋangula ehibi, muba nʼobulamu obusangaasa Hatonda.
45008014	Olwohuba abo aba Mwoyo wa Hatonda aluŋamya, njʼabaana babe.
45008015	Omwoyo oyu Hatonda gabaŋa saabaleetera obuti aye gabafuula abaana babe, era huli nʼobugumu ohulanga Hatonda huuti “Bbaabba.”
45008016	Omwoyo wuwe omwene atuhahasa mu myoyo jʼefe ati huli baana ba Hatonda.
45008017	Ni huba ni huli baana babe, hulisuna ebyo ebi gasuubisa abaatu babe, era hulisunira ŋalala ni Kurisito ebi Hatonda gamutegehera. Ni hubonaabonera ŋalala ni Kurisito, balituŋeera ŋalala eŋono ni naye.
45008018	Mbona ngʼebiguudyo ebi hubitamo hatyane, sihuŋanga hubigeragerania nʼeŋono eri Hatonda alituŋa.
45008019	Ebitonde byosibyosi bihuumira era byesunga ohwola hu ludaalo olu Hatonda alihwehulayo abaana babe.
45008020	Ebitonde sibyeyendeeye ohutoheresa ehigendererwa hya Hatonda aye omwene njʼowasalaŋo bibe biityo.
45008021	Ebitonde ebyo bisuubira ohubinunula mu hufa olu Hatonda aliŋa abaana babe eŋono nʼedembe.
45008022	Humanyire huuti ebitonde byosibyosi ohwola hatyane bibinda nʼobulumi hyʼomuhasi alumwa ohusaala.
45008023	Si bitonde byoŋene, aye ni neefe abaasuna Omwoyo Omutukuvu ngʼehirabo ehi Hatonda atagihiraho ohutuŋa. Hwesi hubinda mu myoyo jeefe nʼobulumi. Hwesunga era huhuumiirira Hatonda ohutununula atuŋe emibiri ejitafa ohulaga ngʼolu huli baana babe.
45008024	Ngʼolu gatunoŋola, hwesunga era husuubira ohutununula. Aye ehi osuubira onaba nʼohibonaho, ohwo sihuba husuubira nʼaŋadiidiri. Njʼani asuubira ehyo ehyʼaba nʼaŋambire mu ngalo?
45008025	Aye ni husuubira ohusuna ehi hutabonaho, huhuumirira nʼohwehaliriha.
45008026	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, Omwoyo Omutukuvu atuyeeda mu budoto weefe obwʼohutamanya husaba bulaŋi. Aye Omwoyo omwene oyo atulombera nʼohubinda mu ngeri eyi otaŋanga huloma nʼebibono.
45008027	Hatonda oyo abona emyoyo jʼabaatu, amanyire Omwoyo ehyʼaba nʼatulombera efe abafugiirira.
45008028	Humanyire huuti mu hiisi hiitu ehitwolaho, Hatonda agira efe abamwenda hyatuŋweramo ehiraŋi ngʼolu husiima huhwe huli.
45008029	Ko Hatonda atonde ehyalo, gamanya abaatu babe era gabalanga gahena gatobola ni genda bafaane nʼOmusaani wuwe, ko Omusaani wuwe oyo ahene abe omudaayi mu balebe eduuli.
45008030	Abo aba Hatonda gatobola gahena gabalanga era gababala ohuba abagwalaafu ngʼabaŋa nʼedaala eryʼeŋono.
45008031	Ŋaahani ehyo hunahiromeho hi? Hatonda anaba hu lubega lwefe, njʼani aŋanga ohutuŋiriŋania gatuŋanga?
45008032	Hatonda owaŋayo Omusaani wuwe ohufa hu lwefe hwesihwesi, olwʼehisasabirisi hihye saalituŋa ebiitu byosibyosi ebihwenda?
45008033	Njʼani aliŋaŋabira aba Hatonda gatobola? Mbona ti Hatonda omwene oyo njʼobabala ohuba abagwalaafu.
45008034	Njʼani alibasalira omusango? Eŋuma wayire mulala. Olwohuba Yesu Kurisito owafuuye era galamuha gehaaye mu hifo ehyʼeŋono hu lubega lwʼomuhono omulungi ogwa Hatonda atuŋoherehesa.
45008035	Ŋaahani njʼani aŋanga ohutwabuhania ni Kurisito galeheraŋo ohutwenda? Huba nʼebigosi oba baatu hutuhiyaania, huŋuma hyahulya oba hugenda majula, baatu hu tutisatiisa oba hwenda hutwita?
45008036	Ngʼolu hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti; “Hiisi ludaalo batwehoyera ohutuhenaŋo hu lulwo. Batubisya hyʼetaama eyi baja husala.”
45008037	Aye mu ebyo byosibyosi, huli nʼobuŋangusi owʼamaani olwa Yesu Kurisito atwenda.
45008038	Kahahisa erala ti wayire ohufa oba huba mulamu, bamalayika oba emisambwa, ebiriŋo hatyane oba ebiribaŋo mu moni eyo, wayire amaani gʼemisambwa
45008039	agaholera ŋamugulu mu bbanga oba ŋaasi hu hyalo oba ehitonde hyosihyosi, sibiŋanga hututusaho hwenda ohu Hatonda atwenda mu Yesu Kurisito Musengwa yeefe.
45009001	Ndoma amazima mu Kurisito sindulinga, nʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu gakahasa mula mu mwoyo gwange ati ehi nja huloma hituufu.
45009002	Ndi nʼohunyolwa hungi hu mwoyo gwange olwʼAbayudaaya bahyange.
45009003	Era nahendire mbe ndiise ofuuha ehyʼembiho era omusuule eyiri Kurisito ni hiba ni hireetera abalebe bange abegwanga lyange abo ohunoŋoha.
45009004	Abalebe bange Abayisirayiri abo, mbaba Hatonda gaŋa ekabi ohuba abaana babe, mbaba gabonehera baabona eŋono lirye nʼemoni jaawe, mbaba gahola ni nabo endagaano. Mbaba gaŋambya amagambi gage gaahena gabalegera nʼengeri eyʼohumujumiryanga mu Yekaalu era mbaba gaŋa ebisuubise ebiŋamba hu bunoŋosi.
45009005	Nibo njʼabaŋwa mu lulyo lwʼabahale omu ebiha byʼabaatu bosibosi bisimuha. Ni Kurisito oyu basaaye hyʼomuutu osimuha mu lulyo lwawe ate nje Hatonda aŋuga byosibyosi oyu banajumiryenga emirembe nʼemirembe. Amiina.
45009006	Nʼaloma tyo sihitegeesa hiiti Hatonda sigooheresa ebi gabasuubisa olwohuba si hiisi abaŋwa mu lulyo lwa Yisirayiri bosibosi oti baatu ba Hatonda.
45009007	Wayire bamu lulyo lwa Yibbulayimu, sihitegeesa hiiti bosibosi bejuhulu babe, endiho. Aye hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti “Mu Yisaka njʼomwolisunira abejuhulu aba nahusuubisa.”
45009008	Mu ngeri eyindi, abaatu ba Hatonda sinjʼabaŋwa mu lulyo lwa Yibbulayimu hyoŋene aye abo abafugiirira ehisuubiso hihye ngʼolu Yibbulayimu gafugiirira ehi Hatonda gamusuubisa.
45009009	Malayika ni gaali nʼabalomera ehisuubiso galoma ati, “Mu hiseera ehiragaane aŋa nahagobolere omwaha oguuja, Saala anaahabe asundya omwana omuseere.”
45009010	Si cʼehyo hyoŋene, omuhasi wa Yisaka oyu balanganga baati Labbeeka gasaaye abaana.
45009011	Aye abaana abo ni baali ni bahiiri hubasaala, era ni bahiiri huhola ehiraŋi oba ehibi,
45009012	Hino hyali hiityo ko bahahase baati Hatonda atobola oyo oyu aba ni gendire nʼatemire hu ebyo ebi aba nʼaholire. Hatonda galoma Labbeeka ati, “Omuhulu aliba muŋeeresa wʼomuŋere.”
45009013	Hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Nenda Yakobbo aye nasuula Esawu.”
45009014	Ŋaahani olwo hulome huuti Hatonda gehubbira? Kadi naŋadiidiri.
45009015	Olwohuba Hatonda omwene galoma Musa ati, “Ese saasira oyo oyu mba ni nendire ohusaasira era naŋambira ehisasabirisi oyo oyu mba ni nendire ohuŋambira ehisasabirisi.”
45009016	Olwʼehyo, Hatonda saaŋambira muutu yesiyesi ehisasabirisi olwʼohwefaaho oba olwʼebikolwa ebi aba nʼaholire, aye omwene njʼosalaŋo owʼohuŋambira ehisasabirisi.
45009017	Ehyaŋandiihiwa hiroma Falaawo hiiti, “Nahuhusa nahuŋa obuhulu olwʼohwenda ohulaga amaani gange mu ewe era ngʼolu ndi nʼobuŋangi mu hyalo hyosihyosi.”
45009018	Olwʼehyo, Hatonda asaasira oyo oyu aba ni gendire ohusasira era ahahadasa omwoyo gwʼoyo oyu aba ni gendire ohuhahadasa.
45009019	Ŋaahani oŋangire ohuloma oti, “Obanga pohiri hiityo, lwahiina Hatonda atunenya? Njʼani aŋanga ohuŋahania ehi aba ni gendire ohuhola?”
45009020	Aye ewe omuutu obuutu, ndiiwe ani ohubuusa Hatonda hu kola yiye? Ehiwumbe obuwumbe hiŋanga hiitye ohubuusa owahibumba hiiti, “Lwahiina wamumba oti?”
45009021	Omuwumbi saaba nʼehiyale ehyʼohuwumba hyosihyosi ehi aba ni gendire mu hitole hyʼeroba lirye? Mwiroba nderyene saaŋanga husalaŋo gawumbamo ebyʼohutambisa ebitula aŋa naaŋa nʼebitula olubalira?
45009022	Ni Hatonda yeesi cʼehi ahola. Gendire ohulaga ehiruŋi ehibitiirifu nʼamaani gage eyiri abo aba gaali nʼaja ohusihiirisa aye gabehaliiriha.
45009023	Hino gahihola ni genda ohulaga eŋono lirye ebitiirifu eyiri abo aba galitegeehera ohuŋwa ahale nahale era abaŋambira ehisasabirisi.
45009024	Abaatu abo ko ndiife aba galanga, si mu Bayudaaya booŋene aye nʼAbatali Bayudaaya.
45009025	Ngʼolu Hatonda omwene aloma mu hitabo hya Kosiya ati, “Abatali baatu bange, ndi balanga baatu bange. Abaatu abaali abasuule, ndi balanga bahoda.
45009026	Mu hifo ehyene ehyo omu babalangira baati, ‘Simuli baatu bange’ njʼomu banahabalangirire baati, ‘Abaana ba Hatonda omulamu.’ ”
45009027	Ni Yisaaya galira Yisirayiri amangi ati, “Wayire Abayisirayiri bangi bali hyʼomujehe ogwʼohunyanja ogutabaliha, abanahanoŋohe banaahabe badiidiri beene.
45009028	Olwohuba Hatonda Musengwa aŋaŋuma hwemoota anahasalire abaatu omusango era abagudye aŋaŋuma hubagoboleramo.”
45009029	Era Yisaaya omwene oyo gaaloma ati, “Singa Musengwa Omuŋugi wʼebiitu byosi sigatuleherahuŋo abaatu abʼolulyo lwefe, hani hwasihiiriha hyʼabaatu abomu bibuga Gomora ni Sodoma.”
45009030	Ŋaahani hulome hiina? Hatonda gabala Abatali Bayudaaya abetefuuyeho ohwendula ohuba abagwalaafu olwʼohumufugiirira,
45009031	aye Abayisirayiri abagesyaho ohuba abagwalaafu olwʼohuhuuma amagambi, sibabusuna.
45009032	Ne lwahiina sibabusuna? Sibabusuna olwohuba sibabwendulira mu ngira eyʼohufugiirira wabula babita mu bikolwa byawe. Ehyo hyabaleetera ohwegumula hu oyo ali “hyʼebaale eri begumulaho.”
45009033	Ngʼolu hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti; “Bona taaye ebaale mu Sayuuni, ebaale egumu erireetera abaatu ohwegumula, olubanga oluja hubaleetera ohwehubbiraŋo omunyiha. Era hiisi amwesiga saanahaswale.”
45010001	Aboluganda, ehi mwoyo gwange guŋembaho bugali era ehi saba hiri hiiti Abayisirayiri banoŋohe.
45010002	Manyire ti bafubaho ohuŋa Hatonda eŋono aye simukola endaŋi.
45010003	Sibamanyire engeri eyʼohusanamo obugwalaafu ohuŋwa ewa Hatonda aye bagesyaho ohuseegaŋo engira yaawe hu waawe ohuba bagwalaafu.
45010004	Kurisito gooheresa ehigendererwa hyʼamagambi ko hiisi amufugiirira bamubale ohuba mugwalaafu.
45010005	Musa gaŋandiiha ati omuutu anegumyenga ohwoheresa amagambi nʼebiragiro anabengaŋo olwʼohubyoheresa.
45010006	Aye obugwalaafu obuuja olwʼohufugiirira, omuutu sigebuusa ati, “Njʼani anahatiine mwigulu atuseyo Kurisito amuleete hu hyalo atuyeede?”
45010007	Oba ohwebuusa ati, “Njʼani alitiina e magombe atuseyo Kurisito ohuŋwa mu bafu?”
45010008	Ŋaahani obuhwenda obuŋamba hu bugwalaafu obu muutu asuna olwʼohufugiirira buli buuti, “Ehibono hya Hatonda hiri huupi ni neewe. Hiri mu hanwa nʼomu mwoyo gugwo.” Ehyo njʼehibono ehi hubuulira abaatu.
45010009	Singa waatula nʼomunwa gugwo oti Yesu nje Musengwa nʼotayeho nʼohufugiirira mu mwoyo gugwo oti Hatonda gamulamusa mu bafu, onoŋoha.
45010010	Olwohuba omuutu afugiirira nʼomwoyo gugwe ko bamubala ohuba omugwalaafu era ohunoŋoha, geyatulira nʼomunwa gugwe omwene ati anoŋohire.
45010011	Ngʼolu ehyaŋandiihiwa hiroma hiiti “Hiisi amwesiga saanahaswale,”
45010012	Eŋuma njabulo ŋagati bwʼOmuyudaaya nʼAtali Muyudaaya. Hatonda nje Musengwa ya bosibosi era agaba ekabi abo bosibosi abamusaba.
45010013	Era hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti; “Hiisi aliranga Musengwa nʼamusunga ohumunoŋola, ali munoŋola.”
45010014	Aye basunga baatye oyo oyu bahiiri hufugiirira, ohubanoŋola? Era baŋanga baatye ohumufugiirira ni bahiiri huŋulirangaho ebi muŋambaho? Nindi baŋanga baatye ohuŋulira ebimuŋambaho ni ŋaŋuma muhwenda obalomeeye?
45010015	Era abahwenda batiina baatye ohubalomera ni ŋaŋuma obatumire? Hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Nga hiraŋi abaatu abatulomera Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi ohutuhyalira!”
45010016	Aye abaatu bosibosi sibafugiirira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi ago. Yisaaya aloma ati, “Musengwa, njʼani afugiirira obuhwenda weefe?”
45010017	Ohufugiirira huuja olwʼohuŋulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu Kurisito.
45010018	Aye hambuuseho, mu butuufu sibaŋuulira buhwenda obwo? Ehituufu hiiri hiiti baŋulira, ngʼolu ehyaŋandiihiwa hiroma hiiti; “Amajanjaasi gaawe gaŋulirihana mu hyalo hyosihyosi, era nʼebibono byawe hiisi muutu gabiŋulira.”
45010019	Nindi hambuuse, Abayisirayiri sibategeera? Bategeeye. Musa omwene galoma ati, “Hatonda anahabalehe baagongeera olwʼabaatu aba muŋeega muuti mbo baŋuma punga yiita hiswa, Hatonda anahabaleetere ohuluŋa olwʼAbatali Bayudaaya, abaŋubeebe.”
45010020	Era Yisaaya nʼobugumu gaaloma ati, “Abo abatanyendulangaho baahena bambona. Era nehwehulira abo abaali ni baatasungire.”
45010021	Aye ehiŋamba hu Yisirayiri aloma ati, “Nʼahena eteŋama eyʼamaani ni nangirisa abaatu abajeemu baaje eyi ndi aye bageene.”
45011001	Ŋaahani hambuuseho, kaho Hatonda gahubba Abayisirayiri omugongo? Kadi naŋadiidiri. Ese aloma ono, ndi Muyisirayiri omwijuhulu wa Yibbulayimu ohuŋwa mu hiha hya Bbenjamini.
45011002	Hatonda sigahubba abaatu babe abo omugongo, abagatobola ko ahene atonde ehyalo. Simumanyire ehyaŋandiihiwa ehiroma hu Eriya ngʼolu galoma hu Bayisirayiri ati,
45011003	“Musengwa, beetire abanaabbi babo era babbwagabbwaga ebituuti bibyo ohubaŋeera eŋongo. Ndiise osigaaye era keesi bali hupiima benda bakeneŋo.”
45011004	Aye Hatonda gamugobolamo atye? Gamuloma ati, “Ndiŋo nʼabaatu kasanvu abageene ohusenga Bbaali.”
45011005	Era pohiri nʼomu ndaalo jino. Ŋaliŋo badiidiri beene aba Hatonda gatobolamo olwʼehisasabirisi hihye.
45011006	Hatonda naaba ni gabatobola olwʼehisasabirisi hihye, ehyo hiba hitegeesa hiiti sigabatobola olwʼebikolwa byawe ebiraŋi. Hiba ni hyali hiityo, ehisasabirisi hihye hyahali sihyihiiri hisasabirisi.
45011007	Ŋaahani Abayisirayiri bendire Hatonda ohubabala ohuba abagwalaafu olwʼohuhuuma, amagambi aye sibahisuna ohutusaho abo abagatobola. Abandi baali nʼemyoyo emihahadafu.
45011008	Ngʼolu hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Hatonda gabalehera obuŋubeebe ohubaŋuga. Gabaŋa emoni aye sibabona, nʼamatwi aye sibaŋulira nʼohwola hatyane.”
45011009	Ni habaha Dawudi galoma ati, “Leha ebiiŋulo byawe bibafuuhire omutego, bibe ebaale eryʼohwegumulaho era ehyʼohwegalula.
45011010	Leha emoni jaawe jiijeho olubooha batabona nʼohubona, nʼemigongo jaawe jigodame emirembe nʼemirembe.”
45011011	Nindi hambuuseho, olwo Abayudaaya ni bageene ohufugiirira basihiirihira erala? Bbe, aye ohubbenga hwawe hyaleetera abʼAbatali Bayudaaya ohunoŋoha, ko hiŋweremo Abayudaaya abo ohugongeera.
45011012	Ohubbenga hwawe hwagira Abatali Bayudaaya basuna ekabi mbitiirifu. Aye hija huba hibitiirifu Abayudaaya ni balifugiirira Kurisito.
45011013	Ŋaahani handome ngʼolu ndi muhwenda wenywe, obuŋeeresa wange eyiri enywe Abatali Bayudaaya bunesiimisa,
45011014	hamunga hyahaleetera abandi hu balebe bange Abayisirayiri ohunoŋoha.
45011015	Obanga Hatonda ohuhubba Abayudaaya omugongo hyafaaŋania Abatali Bayudaaya ni naye, hinahabe hiitye olu Hatonda alibasangalira olu baligobola eyi ali? Hiriba oti hani hulamuha.
45011016	Onaŋonga ehitole hyʼetome lyʼengaano eyiri Hatonda, hitegeesa hiiti etome eryo lyosiryosi liba lyawufu olwohuba oliŋongireeyo. Era nʼehiholo hyʼomusaala onahiŋongayo, nʼamasaga goosi gatiiniraho.
45011017	Aye singa amasaga agʼomusaala omuzayiti bagatemaho, baahena bajomehaho olusaga lwʼomuzayiti ogwomwisugu, olusaga olwo luliisiwa nʼehiholo hira. Mu ngeri njʼenyene weesi Otali Muyudaaya ŋaahani osuna omuganyulo njʼomwene hyʼAbayudaaya.
45011018	Kale ewe oli hyʼolusaga olu bajomehaho obujomehe otatalanga hiholo olwohuba oli lusaga busaga.
45011019	Aye oŋanga ohuloma oti, “Amasaga ago bahena hugatemaho ko banjomehaho.”
45011020	Ehyo hituufu, aye bagatemaho olwʼohutafugiirira Hatonda. Enywe babajomehaho olwʼohumufugiirira. Kale mweŋomehe, mutepaahapaaha.
45011021	Olwohuba obanga Hatonda sigasaasira amasaga gala ameene hiholo enywe ababajomehaho bujomehe, muliŋonera ŋeena?
45011022	Olwʼehyo mwegenderese, wayire Hatonda ali nʼehisasabirisi, abamujeemera abahambuŋalira. Ali nʼehyere eyi muli singa mweyongera ohumwesiga. Aye ni munahamujeemere, mwesi anahabatemeho.
45011023	Era Abayudaaya abo ni banahaleheŋo obujeemu wabwe, Hatonda anahabagoboleremo gabajomeha hu hiholo nindi.
45011024	Enywe Abatali Bayudaaya muli hyʼolusaga lula olwʼomuzayiti ogwamera omwene bahena bagujomeha hu hiholo. Aye Abayudaaya nibo bali hyʼomusaala omuzayiti ogubahoma huhoma. Olwʼehyo hyangu Hatonda ohubagobosa hu hiholo ngʼolu baali oludaayi.
45011025	Aboluganda, nenda mutegeere ehyama ehiŋamba hu Yisirayiri ko mutaŋeega muuti mubahira. Abayisirayiri abandi basigaaye bahahadafu bʼemyoyo ohwola olu obungi wʼAbatali Bayudaaya buliŋwayo ni bafugiirira Hatonda. Obuhahadafu wʼemyoyo jaawe wahaseera buseera.
45011026	Ebyo ni biŋooye, Abayisirayiri bosibosi balinoŋoha, ngʼolu hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti; “Omunoŋosi aliŋwa mu Sayuuni, alitusa abejuhulu ba Yakobbo mu bibi byawe.
45011027	Era yino njʼenahabe endagaano yange ni nabo, olu ndibasoniŋa ebibi byawe.”
45011028	Abayisirayiri abo balabe ba Hatonda olwohuba sibafugiirira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi ko enywe muganyulwemo. Aye olwa basehulu baawe, bahoda eri Hatonda era gabatobola.
45011029	Hatonda sacuusa biŋeego bibye eyiri abo abatobola gahena gabaŋa ekabi.
45011030	Ngʼolu mwesi Abatali Bayudaaya ahale hale mwali bajeemu, ŋaahani Hatonda gabaŋambira ehisasabirisi olwʼobujeemu wʼAbayudaaya.
45011031	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, ngʼolu Hatonda gabaŋambira enywe ehisa, Abayudaaya boosi bajeemu ko Hatonda abaŋambire ehisa.
45011032	Olwʼehyo, Hatonda galeha abaatu bosibosi baaba mu bujeemu waawe hyʼabasibe ko abaŋambire bosibosi ehisa.
45011033	Nga Hatonda muŋinda! Eŋuma aŋanga ohutegeera amagesi nʼohumanya huhwe! Ebula otegeera ebi asalaŋo nʼengeri eyi aholamo ebibye!
45011034	Ehyaŋandiihiwa hiroma hiiti; “Njʼani amanyire ehi Musengwa aŋeega? Era njʼani aŋanga ohumuŋa amagesi?
45011035	Njʼani owaali nʼaŋolireho Hatonda ehiitu hyosihyosi ko abe nʼebbanja eryʼohusasula?”
45011036	Hatonda njʼowatonda ebiitu byosibyosi, njʼagira byabaŋo era birimuŋa eŋono. Abaatu bamuŋe eŋono emirembe nʼemirembe. Amiina.
45012001	Ŋaahani balebe bange mu Yesu, mbegalihira olwʼehisa hya Hatonda, mumuŋe obulamu wenywe bube eŋongo endamu eyi bamutoboleeye era emusangaasa. Eyo njʼengeri etuufu eyʼohumujumirya.
45012002	Mutebisyanga hyʼabaatu bʼehyalo hino, aye muganye Hatonda acuuse emyoyo nʼepeega yenywe ko mufaanie ebi genda ngʼolu biri ebiraŋi, ebisangaasa era ebyolereye.
45012003	Olwʼehirabo ehi Hatonda gaapa olwʼehisasabirisi hihye, ndoma ti hiisi muutu hu enywe ateebona ati njʼohihenaho ate nga ko paanaŋo. Aye geŋeegengaaho mu kola endaŋi era geheberenga ni geema hu hufugiirira ohu Hatonda gamuŋa.
45012004	Hiisi muutu ali nʼomubiri mulala era ni guli nʼebimesu bingi, aye ebimesu ebyo byosibyosi sibitamba mulimo njʼomwene.
45012005	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, wayire nga huli bangi aye huli mubiri mulala mu Kurisito era hiisi muutu hu efe getaaga owahye.
45012006	Huli nʼebirabo byenjabulo ngʼolu Hatonda gatuŋa olwʼehisasabirisi hihye. Singa omuutu aba nʼehirabo ehyʼobunaabbi, atiine mu moni nʼohulomera abaatu ehibono hya Hatonda nʼafugiirira ati ali huhulomeramo.
45012007	Ni huba huŋeeresa, afubenga ohuŋeeresa nʼomwoyo mulala, oba ohusomesa abaatu ba Hatonda, afubengaho ohubasomesa.
45012008	Oyo ali nʼehirabo ehyʼohugobosangamo abahye amaani, afubengaho ohuhihola. Ali nʼehyohugaba, agabenga nʼomwoyo mulala. Ali nʼehyobuŋugi, aŋugenga nahenereye. Ni nooyo ali nʼehyohulaga ehyere, aholenga atyo naali musangaafu.
45012009	Ohwendana hwenywe hubenga hwa amazima. Mweŋalenga ehibi era mwegumyenga ohuholera abaatu ebiraŋi.
45012010	Mwendanenga hyʼabalebe era hiisi muutu aŋenga owahye eŋono.
45012011	Mubenga baheneerefu era muŋeeresenga Musengwa nʼomwoyo mulala.
45012012	Esuubi eri muli ni nalyo libaleetere ohuba nʼesangaalo, mwehalirihenga mu mubigosi ebi mubitamo era mulombenga hiisi haseera.
45012013	Mubugulenga hu bimuli ni nabyo mwayeeda abafugiirira bahyenywe abaŋuma hyahweŋambaho era musangaalirenga abageni mu mago genywe.
45012014	Mutabaŋwaba abo ababahiyaania aye mubalomberenga ekabi.
45012015	Musaŋalihisyenga ŋalala ni naabo abasaŋalya era mulirisenga abo ababa ni bali hulira.
45012016	Hiisi muutu amenyenga mu bulala nʼabahye era mutehudumbasanga aye mube nʼomuhago nʼabaatu abʼedaala eryʼaŋaasi. Mutaŋeeganga muuti mbo ndinywe omuhihenaho.
45012017	Omuutu anahuhola ehibi, ewe otamwegalula. Muholenga ebi abaatu bosibosi basiima baati biraŋi.
45012018	Mufubenga ngʼolu hiŋangiha ohuhola ebiitu ebireeta ohumenya mu miyaaya nʼabaatu bosibosi.
45012019	Bahyange, mutegalulanga muutu yesiyesi abahola ehibi, aye muleherenga Hatonda omwene gaaba njʼobegalulira. Olwohuba Musengwa aloma mu hyaŋandiihiwa ati, “Ohwegalula hwange. Ndibesasula.”
45012020	Ngʼolu ehyaŋandiihiwa hiroma hiiti, “Enjala yinaba nʼeluma omulabe wuwo, omuŋanga ebiryo galya, era enduŋo yinaba nʼemuluma, omuŋa amaaji ganywa. Onahola otyo, esoni jirimuŋamba.”
45012021	Ehibi hitabaŋangulanga aye muhiŋangule ni muhola ebiraŋi.
45013001	Mudembuhirenga abo ababaŋuga olwohuba obuŋugi bwosibwosi buŋwa eyiri Hatonda. Era eŋuma muŋugi aŋuga, Hatonda nʼatamutaayeŋo.
45013002	Olwʼehyo, hiisi agaana ohudembuhira abaŋugi aba ajemeeye ehi Hatonda gataayeŋo era balimusalira omusango.
45013003	Abaatu abahola ebiraŋi sibatya batangirisi baawe aye abo abahola ebibi batya ohubebonesa. Wenda ohumenya mu miyaaya nʼabatangirisi babo? Ale hola ebiraŋi ebi baŋugi benda era baja huhuŋa eŋono.
45013004	Abaŋugi baŋeeresa ba Hatonda hu lwʼobulaŋi wenywe. Aye onaba nʼohola ebibi oli nʼohweŋenderera olwohuba abaŋugi baliŋo ohugudya abo abahola ebibi.
45013005	Olwʼehyo, mubadembuhirenga, silwʼohutya ohubagudya hyoŋene aye olwohuba muhimanyire mu myoyo jenywe muuti hiraŋi ohubadembuhira.
45013006	Era ehyo cʼehigira ni musasula omusolo olwohuba abaŋugi banahola emirimo ejibagwene ohuhola baba baŋeeresa Hatonda.
45013007	Musasulenga amabanja genywe, oba husasula omusolo oba epooza, ni hiba huŋa muutu eŋono muli muŋe.
45013008	Mutabanga nʼebbanja lya muutu yesiyesi ohutusaho ebbanja eryʼohwendananga, olwohuba onenda owahyo oba woherehiise ehi amagambi galagira.
45013009	Amagambi galagira gaati, “Sooholanga buhwedi, siwitanga muutu wahyo, siwibanga hiitu hyosihyosi, siwegombanga hiitu hyʼowahyo,” ko nʼamagambi agandi gosigosi bagaŋimba lyaba erala lyoŋene eriroma liiti, “Yendanga omuutu wahyo ngʼolu weyenda wamwene.”
45013010	Nʼoba ni wenda owahyo, sooŋanga hu muhola hibi. Olwʼehyo onenda owahyo oba woheerehise ehi amagambi galagira.
45013011	Hiino muhiholenga ni mumanyire muuti ehiseera hituŋoyeeho. Musisimuhe muŋwe mwiro esaawa yoolire, olwohuba ŋaahani ehiseera ehyʼohugobola hwa Musengwa yeefe higereeye ohuhiraho aŋa hwatagihira ohufugiirira.
45013012	Owiire bunatere ohwanuuha. Hulehe ohuhola ebikolwa ebyʼehiirema hwambale ebisoosa ebyʼobutangaafu.
45013013	Hwebisyenga bulaŋi hyʼabaatu abʼomumwi, sosi huŋwera mu binyumo nʼomu bumeesi nʼomu buhwedi nʼomu hwejabaata nʼomu huduhana duhana ko nʼegongi.
45013014	Aye mwambale Musengwa Yesu Kurisito aŋuge obulamu wenywe ko mutoheresanga hwegomba hwʼomubiri.
45014001	Musangaalirenga owahyenywe atali mudimamu mu hufugiirira era mutaŋahananga ni naye hu biitu ebiŋamba hu ngeri eyi omuutu oyo aŋeega hu hino ni nahira.
45014002	Abaatu abandi balya hiisi hiitu olwʼohufugiirira hwawe. Aye abandi abali nʼohufugiirira ohudiidiri balya eryani eryʼamagala lyoŋene.
45014003	Aye oyo alya hiisi hiitu atatalanga oyo otalya byosibyosi. Ni nooyo atalya ebiitu ebindi atasalira oyo alya hiisi hiitu omusango olwohuba Hatonda saamwesamba.
45014004	Ndiiwe ani owolobya omuŋeeresa wʼabeene? Musengwa waawe njʼasalaŋo hanye ehibaholire hiraŋi oba hibi. Era olwʼamaani ga Musengwa baja huŋangula.
45014005	Eriyo aŋeega ati oludaalo hirebe luhira oludaalo hirebe ohuba olwʼenjabulo, owundi ati endaalo josijosi jiŋeraŋerana. Ese ndoma ti hiisi muutu agumirenga hu hyʼaŋeega ati njʼehituufu.
45014006	Oyo ahusa oludaalo hirebe ohuhira olundi, ahihola olwʼohuŋa Musengwa eŋono. Ni nooyo alya enyama, alya lwa Musengwa olwohuba geyaasa Hatonda. Ni nooyo atalya ahihola lwa Musengwa olwohuba yeesi geyaasa Hatonda.
45014007	Eŋume muutu hu efe aliŋo ohwesangaasa omwene. Era ni huba ni hufuuye oba ni huhiiriŋo balamu, eŋuma eweŋuga omwene.
45014008	Ni huba balamu, hubaŋo lwa Musengwa. Era ni hufa, hufa hu lwa Musengwa. Olwʼehyo, mbo hufa mbo huba balamu, husigala ni huli baatu ba Musengwa.
45014009	Olwʼesonga enyene yino, Kurisito gafa gaahena galamuha ko abe Musengwa wʼabalamu nʼabafu.
45014010	Ŋaahani ewe otalya enyama, lwahiina osalira omulebe wuwo omusango? Ni neewe olya lwahiina otala mulebe wuwo otalya? Hwesihwesi hunahemeerere mu moni ja Hatonda ohutusalira omusango.
45014011	Hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti; “Musengwa aloma ati, ‘ngʼolu ndi Hatonda omwene bulamu, hiisi muutu alikubbira amafuha. Era hiisi muutu alinjumirya olwohuba ndiise Hatonda.’ ”
45014012	Olwʼehyo, hiisi muutu anaheŋosyeho mu moni ja Hatonda omwene.
45014013	Ŋaahani hulehere aŋo ohusalira abafugiirira bahyefe emisango aye huhole ebiitu ebigira sibesitaala hugwa mu hibi.
45014014	Ese manyire era kahasa ti mu moni ja Yesu Musengwa eŋuma hyahulya ehyʼembiho aye hiba hyʼembiho eyiri oyo aŋeega ati hyʼembiho.
45014015	Singa ehyʼolya higira mulebe wuwo gesitaala, aŋo oba soohola ehiraga hiiti omwenda. Otagira mulebe wuwo oyu Kurisito gafiiririra gaŋamba engira emuŋira mu husihiiriha olwʼehyo ehyʼolya.
45014016	Otaleha ehi omanyire oti hiraŋi ohufuuha ehiduho eyiri abaatu abandi.
45014017	Obuŋugi bwa Hatonda sihulya nʼohunywa aye huhola ebi Hatonda asiima, emiyaaya nʼesangaalo ebi Omwoyo Omutukuvu atuŋa.
45014018	Oyo aŋeeresa Kurisito mu ngeri eyo, asangaasa Hatonda era nʼabaatu bamusiima.
45014019	Olwʼehyo, hufubenga ohuhola ebireeta emiyaaya nʼebiyeeda hiisi muutu ohuŋangala mu hufugiirira huhwe.
45014020	Otonoona mulimo gwa Hatonda olwʼebiryo. Ebiryo byosibyosi biraŋi aye ehibi njʼohulya ehyo ehireetera omuutu owundi ohwesitaala mu hufugiirira huhwe.
45014021	Hiraŋi ohutalya nyama wayire ohunywa omwenge gwomu mizabbibbu oba ehiitu ehindi hyosihyosi ehireetera omulebe wuwo ohugwa mu hibi.
45014022	Leha ehi ofugiirira oti hiraŋi ehiŋamba hu biitu ebyo, hisigale hyama hihyo ni Hatonda. Ali bulaŋi oyo otesalira musango hu hyʼaŋeega ati hiraŋi.
45014023	Aye singa omuutu aba nʼohubuusabuusa, ehiitu ni himulumirisa ohutalya ehiitu aye gatiina mu moni gahirya, aba gesaliiye omusango olwohuba ehiitu hyosihyosi ehi ohola nʼoŋuma hufugiirira oti hiraŋi hiba hibi.
45015001	Efe abadimamu mu hufugiirira, huyeedenga abo abali nʼohufugiirira ohudiidiri sosi ohuholanga ebiitu ohwesangaasa efe abeene.
45015002	Hiisi muutu aholerenga abafugiirira bahye ebiitu ebi basangaasa era ebi baleetera ohuŋangala mu hufugiirira hwawe.
45015003	Ni Kurisito yeesi ebi gaholanga, sigaholanga ohwesangaasa omwene aye ngʼolu hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Ebi baatu baaloma ni bahuduha byagobooye hu ndiise.”
45015004	Byosibyosi ebiri mu byaŋandiihiwa ahale bitwegeresa hube nʼohwehaliriha nʼohugobolamo amaani mu huhuumirira ebi Hatonda gasuubisa.
45015005	Hatonda agira hwaba nʼohwehaliriha era gatugobosamo amaani, abaleetere ohuba nʼobulala mu myoyo jenywe ni mweyongera ohufugiirira Yesu Kurisito,
45015006	ko muyaalire ŋalala hyʼamage mu hujumiryanga Hatonda semwana ya Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito.
45015007	Hiisi muutu ganirisenga owahye ngʼolu Kurisito gabaanirisa, ehyo hireetere abaatu ohuŋa Hatonda eŋono.
45015008	Olwohuba Kurisito gaaja ohuŋeeresa Abayudaaya abahomole ohulaga ngʼolu Hatonda ali mwesigwa owoheresa ebi gasuubisa abasehulu baawe,
45015009	ko Abatali Bayudaaya bajumirye Hatonda olwʼehisa hihye. Ngʼolu hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Olwʼehyo nahahujumirye ni ndi ŋalala nʼAbatali Bayudaaya. Nahembe enyembo eji hujumirya.”
45015010	Era nindi ehyaŋandiihiwa hiroma hiiti, “Enywe Abatali Bayudaaya, musaŋalihisyenga ŋalala nʼabaatu babe abagatobola.”
45015011	Era nindi hiiti, “Mwesimwesi Abatali Bayudaaya, abaatu mwesimwesi mujumiryenga Musengwa.”
45015012	Era nindi naabbi Yisaaya aloma ati, “Mu lulyo lwa Yese, muliŋwamo anahaŋuge amawanga, esuubi lyʼAbatali Bayudaaya liriba mu nje niye.”
45015013	Hatonda ogira hwaba nʼesuubi abasagaaluse era abaŋe emiyaaya olwʼohumufugiirira ko mweyongerenga ohuba nʼesuubi olwʼamaani gʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu.
45015014	Aboluganda, ese samwene kahahisa erala ti enywe mulimo ebiraŋi nʼamagesi era mumanyire ehyʼohuhola, era ti hiisi muutu aŋanga ohusomesa owahye.
45015015	Aye hu biitu ebindi mbaŋandiihiye ni puma hubbimbirya ni mbahebulisa ehyʼohuhola. Hino ciholire olwʼehisasabirisi ehi Hatonda gapambira.
45015016	Gafuula ohuba omuŋeeresa wa Yesu Kurisito eyiri Abatali Bayudaaya. Era ngʼomusengi ndomere abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋwa ewa Hatonda. Ehyo ko hiretere Abatali Bayudaaya abafugiirira Kurisito ohuba hyʼeŋongo eyi Hatonda asiima, ngʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu njʼabagwalaahiise.
45015017	Olwʼehyo, hinesiimisa mu Yesu Kurisito olwʼomulimo ogukolera Hatonda.
45015018	Simpanga huloma hu hiitu ehindi ohutusaho ebyo ebi Kurisito gahola nʼabita mu ese ehireeteye Abatali Bayudaaya ohudembuhira Hatonda olwʼebyo ebinaloma nʼebinahola,
45015019	ebyamaliholiho ebinahola olwʼamaani gʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu. Hiisi ŋaatu aŋa tiinire, ohuŋwera erala e Yerusaalemu ohwola e Yiririko, mbuliiye abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi mu wiijufu agaŋamba hu Kurisito.
45015020	Ohwegomba hwange hubaaye hubuulira abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi mu bifo ebyo eyi bataŋulirangaho hu Kurisito, ko taba hyʼomuutu atongola hu musingi gwʼowundi.
45015021	Aye ngʼolu hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti; “Abo ababatalomerangaho ebimuŋambaho baja hufaania, ni naabo abataŋulirangaho ebimuŋambaho banahamutegeere.”
45015022	Yino njʼesonga eyibayenga ni yipambiriiye ohuuja eyo, mbaaye mbuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi mu matwale ago.
45015023	Aye ŋaahani ngʼolu kenire omulimo gwange mu matwale ago era ngʼolu kenire emyaha mingi ni negomba ohuuja ohubabonaho.
45015024	Nahabahyalireho ni tiina e Supeyini, mbeho ni nenywe era mupeho obuyeedi ko neyongereyo.
45015025	Aye ŋaahani ndi hutiina e Yerusaalemu ohuŋiriraho abaatu ba Hatonda obuyeedi.
45015026	Abafugiirira abʼe Makedoniya nʼabe Akaya nʼesangaalo basalaŋo ohuyeeda ebibbubbu byʼabafugiirira Kurisito abagadi abali e Yerusaalemu.
45015027	Ehyo bahiholiire ni bahyesimiiye abeene era bali nʼebbanja ohuyeeda abaatu ba Hatonda abagadi mu Yerusaalemu. Olwohuba Abatali Bayudaaya basuna ekabi ejʼomwoyo mu Maŋuliro Amalaŋi ohuŋwa hu Bayudaaya, mu ngeri njʼenyene basaniiye boosi ohuyeeda Abayudaaya nʼebiitu ebyahabuhyabuhya.
45015028	Ni nahabe ni kenire ohubaŋirira obuyeedi, nahabitireho eyo nabahyaliraho ko neyongereyo e Supeyini.
45015029	Manyire ti Kurisito anahatuŋe ekabi hwesihwesi ni nahaaje eyo.
45015030	Mbegalihiiye balebe bange mu Yesu, hu lwa Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito nʼolwohwenda ohu munyenda ohu Omwoyo Omutukuvu gabaŋa, huŋambire ŋalala mu husaba hu lwange nahaaja eyo.
45015031	Munombere muuti abo abatafugiirira Yesu Kurisito abali mu Buyudaaya batanjosaho hisago, era nʼabaatu ba Hatonda abali mu Yerusaalemu basiime obuŋeeresa wange.
45015032	Aŋo ni huliba husiima hwa Hatonda niije ni nejuuye esangaalo hugobosaniemo amaani.
45015033	Hatonda agaba emiyaaya abe ni nenywe mwesimwesi. Amiina.
45016001	Leha mbanjulire mboojo yeefe mu Kurisito oyu balanga baati Feyibbe, omuŋeeresa wʼehibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira Kurisito ehiri mu Kekiriya, ali huuja eyo.
45016002	Mbasunga mumusangaalire mu kola eŋeesa Musengwa eŋono. Era mumuŋe obuyeedi bwosibwosi obu aba ni genda, yeesi abaye ayeeda abaatu bangi nga keesi po mundi.
45016003	Keesaho Pulisikira nʼAkwila aba kola ni naabo mu huŋeeresa Yesu Kurisito.
45016004	Abo bombi basinga omubiri ohuŋonia obulamu wange. Si ndiise seŋene aye ebibbubbu byʼabafugiirira Kurisito Abatali Bayudaaya bosibosi babeyaasa bugali weene.
45016005	Mukeheeseho abafugiirira Kurisito abahumbaanira mu nyumba yabwe. Mukeheeseho owʼomuhago oyu balanga baati Payineeto owaali omudaayi ohufugiirira Kurisito mu twale lyʼAsiya.
45016006	Muheese ni Malyamu owʼabafululuhanira bugali.
45016007	Keesaho abalebe bange Anduroniiko ni Yuniyasi aba nʼahola ni nabo obusibe mu komera. Abalebe bange abo bali nʼobumanye eyiri abahwenda era nibo banjehereera ohufugiirira Kurisito.
45016008	Muheese nʼApuliyaato owʼomuhago mu Musengwa yeefe.
45016009	Mukeheese ni Wurubbanasi oyu huhola ni naye mu huŋeeresa Kurisito ko ni meeri yange Sitakiisi.
45016010	Muheeseho nʼApele ogumiiye ebigosi mu Kurisito. Era muheese nʼabomumago gʼArisitobbulosi.
45016011	Mukeheese ni mulebe yange Herodiyooni. Muheese abafugiirira Musengwa yeefe abomu nyumba ya Narusiiso.
45016012	Mukeheese Torofayina ni Torofisa, abahasi abahola bugali omulimo gwa Musengwa yeefe. Mukeheese ni Perusi owʼomuhago, omuhasi atambiiye Musengwa yeefe bugali.
45016013	Muheeseho ni Ruufusi oyu Musengwa gatobola. Muheese ni nyina ali oti hani nje maayi yange.
45016014	Muheese Asukuritasi ni Fulegooni ni Herume ni Paturobasi ni Heruma ko nʼaboluganda ababamenya ni nabo.
45016015	Muheese Filologosi ni Yuliya ni Nerewo ni mboojoye nʼOlipasi nʼabaatu ba Hatonda bosibosi ababamenya ni nabo.
45016016	Hiisi muutu aheese owahye mu keesa eyʼabaatu abagwalaafu. Ebibbubbu byʼabafugiirira Kurisito byosibyosi bibahehiise.
45016017	Aboluganda, mbegalihiiye mwegenderesenga abo abahola ebiitu ebireeta ohweyabujula, byagira abaatu baaŋaba baleha engira etuufu eyi babasomesa. Abaatu hyʼabo, mubeŋalamenga.
45016018	Abaatu abo si baŋeeresa ba Kurisito Musengwa yeefe, aye beyendulira hya hulya. Batambisa ebibono ebinyunyuula nʼebiwanawaana olwʼohwenda ohudulinga abaatu abaŋuma ehi bamanyire.
45016019	Hiisi muutu aŋulira ngʼolu mudembuhira Hatonda, cʼehigira ni ndi musangaafu olwenywe. Nenda mube bagesi mumanye ehiraŋi ehyʼohuhola aye mweŋalame ehibi.
45016020	Hatonda ogaba emiyaaya, ali huupi huteteenera Sitaani ŋaasi wʼamagulu genywe. Ehisasabirisi hya Musengwa yeefe Yesu hibenga ni nenywe.
45016021	Temuseewo omutambi wahyange abahehiiseho. Nʼabalebe bange Lukiyo ni Yasoni ko ni Sosipateeri bosibosi babaheehiiseho.
45016022	Era keesi Terutirasi omuŋandiihi wʼebbaluŋa yino, mbahehiiseho mu siina lya Musengwa yeefe.
45016023	Gaayo obukumiire era omwene mago omu bafugiirira Kurisito bahumbaanira, abahehiseeho. Erasito omuŋanika wʼehibuga Kwatasi babahehiise.
45016024	Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito abaŋambirenga ehisa mwesimwesi.
45016025	Hujumiryenga Hatonda olwohuba asobola ohubagumya mu hufugiirira hwenywe ngʼolu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi galoma. Amaŋuliro ago agaŋamba hu Yesu Kurisito njʼagandomera abaatu. Era galoma hu hyama ehi bahweha ohuŋwa ahale nahale.
45016026	Aye ŋaahani ngʼolu banaabbi baŋandiiha hu Kurisito, Hatonda oyo otafa galagira ehyama ehyo bahihwehule eyiri abaatu bosibosi bahamufugiirira era bamudembuhire.
45016027	Hatonda oyo ahihenaho era omwene magesi, abaatu bamuŋenga eŋono ohubita mu Yesu Kurisito emirembe nʼemirembe. Amiina.
46001001	Ndiise Pawulo oyu Hatonda galanga olwʼohusiima huhwe ohuba muhwenda wa Yesu Kurisito. Ndi nʼowoluganda Sosinesi.
46001002	Pandiihira enywe ehibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira Kurisito ehiri mu hibuga Koriiso, abaatu abagatobola nʼabitira mu Kurisito ohuba ababe, ŋalala ni naabo bosibosi abali hiisi ŋaatu abesiga Yesu Kurisito Musengwa, Musengwa yeefe hwesihwesi.
46001003	Hatonda Seefe ni Musengwa Yesu Kurisito, babaŋambire ehisasabirisi era babaŋe nʼemiyaaya.
46001004	Habuhyabuhya, neyaasa Hatonda olwenywe olwohuba gabajuhira ebirabo ebyʼOmwoyo bingi nʼabitira mu Yesu Kurisito.
46001005	Ohubita mu Yesu Kurisito, Hatonda gabaŋa ebiraŋi bingi, muloma ehibono hihye era muli nʼohutegeera.
46001006	Obuhwenda obuŋamba hu Kurisito buhomire emisi mu bulamu bwenywe.
46001007	Olwʼehyo, ni muhuumirira nʼesuubi, Yesu Kurisito Musengwa ohugobola, ŋaŋuma birabo byʼOmwoyo ebi muŋuma.
46001008	Era Hatonda alibahuuma mwasigala ni muli bagumu ohwola hu komerero, ko muŋume musango hu ludaalo olu Yesu Kurisito Musengwa yeefe aligobola.
46001009	Hatonda owabalanga ohuba bulala nʼOmwana wuwe Yesu Kurisito Musengwa yeefe, alibaŋa obugumu olwohuba mwesigwa.
46001010	Aboluganda, hu lwʼobuŋangi wa Yesu Kurisito Musengwa yeefe, mbasunga mube bulala mwesimwesi ko ŋaŋumengaŋo hweyabulayabula era mubeere erala bulala mu biŋeego nʼomutegeera yenywe.
46001011	Aboluganda, hino kiroma olwohuba balala hu bomu mago ga Kuloowe bandomera mbo musiiba muhuŋahana hu biŋamba hu batangirisi benywe.
46001012	Ehi ndoma cʼehino; abandi mu enywe mbo muloma muuti Pawulo njʼomutangirisi wenywe, abandi baati Apolo njʼomutangirisi wenywe, abandi baati Keefa njʼomutangirisi wenywe, ko nʼabandi baati Kurisito njʼomutangirisi wenywe.
46001013	Hambuseho, olwo Kurisito bamwabulamo? Bahomereraho Pawulo hu musalabba hu lwenywe? Oba bababatiza ni batambisa esiina lya Pawulo?
46001014	Ndi musangaafu olwohuba simbatizangaho wayire mulala hu nywe, ohutusaho Kurisipo ni Gaayo.
46001015	Olwʼehyo eŋuma asobola ohuloma ati bamubatiza mu siina lyange.
46001016	Era nabatiza nʼamago ga Sitefanaasi. Ohutusaho abo, sikebulira ti nabatizaho omuutu owundi yesiyesi.
46001017	Hino kiroma olwohuba Kurisito sigaatuma hubatiza aye hulomera abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi ni taholera hu magesi gʼomuutu olwohuba sinenda ohufa hwa Kurisito hu musalabba hube hwawereere.
46001018	Obuhwenda obuŋamba hu Yesu ohutufiirira hu musalabba buŋuma mahulu eyiri abo abagota olwohuba sibabutegeera, aye eyiri efe abali hunoŋoha, hiraga maani ga Hatonda.
46001019	Hino kiroma olwohuba hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti; “Ndisihiirisa amagesi gaabo abaŋeega baati bagesi, era tabuujule ohumanya hwʼabo abaŋeega baati bamanyire.”
46001020	Ni hiba ni hiri hiityo, omugesi ali ŋeena? Omusomesa wʼamagambi ga Hatonda ali ŋe? Oyo amanyire ohuŋahana owʼomulembe guno ali ŋeena? Ehituufu hiri hiiti, Hatonda alagire ati amagesi gʼabagesi mu hyalo hino, busirusiru bwereere.
46001021	Hino kiroma olwohuba Hatonda mu magesi gage gahihola ngʼolu hisoboha, abaatu ohutamutegeera ni batambisa amagesi gaawe. Aye gasalaŋo ohunoŋola abaatu abamufugiirira nʼabita mu busirusiru wʼohubuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi.
46001022	Abayudaaya benda baboneho ahabonero aheŋunjisa ohuhahasa ti hituufu. Aye Abatali Bayudaaya nibo benda ohuŋulira ebibono ebi baŋeega baati byʼamagesi.
46001023	Aye hubuulira Kurisito oyu bahomerera hu musalabba, ehiitu ehireetera Abayudaaya ohwegumula ne eyiri Abatali Bayudaaya, bya busirusiru.
46001024	Aye eyiri Abayudaaya nʼAbatali Bayudaaya aba Hatonda galanga ohuba abaatu babe, Kurisito alaga ati Hatonda ali nʼamaani era nʼamagesi.
46001025	Hino kiroma olwohuba obusirusiru bwa Hatonda buhira amagesi gʼabaatu era obunafu buwe buhira amaani gaawe.
46001026	Aboluganda, muhebulire obulamu obu mwalimo ko Hatonda abalange ohuba abaatu babe. Batono hu enywe mwali abo aba baali ni baŋira baati mwali bagesi, era batono hu enywe mwali baŋugi era batono mwali ni mwasaaliwa mu mago amahombe.
46001027	Aye Hatonda gatobola abaatu ababalanga ababuyabuya olwʼohwenda ohuswasa aberanga abagesi. Era gatobola abo ababalanga abanafu olwʼohwenda ohuswasa abaŋeega baati bʼamaani.
46001028	Hatonda gatobola abaatu ohuŋwa mu mago agatali mahombe era ababatala ni babalanga ebitagasa, ko asobole ohusihiirisa abo abaŋeega baati bamugaso,
46001029	ko ŋaŋume owehudumbasa mu moni jije.
46001030	Hatonda njʼogira ni muli bulala ni Yesu Kurisito, owafuuha amagesi ga Hatonda ohutunoŋola, gatufuula abagwalaafu, abatobole era abanunule babe.
46001031	Olwʼehyo, ngʼolu hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Oyo owepaaha, gepaahenga olwa Musengwa.”
46002001	Aboluganda, ni naaja ohubalomera obuhwenda obuŋamba hu Hatonda, sinaaja eyo ohulaga obusomi bwange era sinatambisa bibono ohweraga ngʼolu ndi mugesi.
46002002	Hino kiroma olwohuba ni naali ni nenywe nasalaŋo ohutaloma hu ehiitu ehindi hyosihyosi ohutusaho Yesu Kurisito oyu bahomerera hu musalabba.
46002003	Era ni naaja eyo, naaja mu bunafu nʼohutya ni teetema huteetema ni nenda tonoona mulimo ogwʼohubuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi.
46002004	Era mu somesa yange sinatambisanga magesi gʼabaatu buutu aye naajira mu maani gʼOmwoyo wa Hatonda.
46002005	Ehyo hyali hyahuleetera ohufugiirira hwenywe ohutaba hu musingi gwʼamagesi gʼabaatu buutu aye hu maani ga Hatonda.
46002006	Wayire ndomire tyo, aye hubuulira mu magesi agatali gʼabaatu buutu oba agʼabaŋugi bohu hyalo hino abaliŋo ahaseera buseera era ehyo huhihola ni huli nʼabaatu abaŋangafu mu hufugiirira Kurisito.
46002007	Aye hulomera abaatu ehyama ehi hwenyumikirisamo ehi Hatonda gaali nʼabahwehire ko atonde ehyalo.
46002008	Eŋuma muŋugi wayire mulala owamanya etegeha ya Hatonda, olwohuba babanga ni baali ni bamanyire singa sibahomerera Musengwa owʼeŋono eryagaŋo, hu musalabba.
46002009	Ngʼolu hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti; “Ŋaŋuma owaali nʼaweeneho, ŋaŋuma owaali nʼaŋuliyeho, era ŋaŋuma owaali nʼaŋeegireho hu ehi Hatonda gategehera abamwenda.”
46002010	Aye efe, Hatonda gatuhwehulira nʼabita mu Omwoyo wuwe Omutukuvu. Omwoyo amanyire hiisi hiitu nʼebiŋeego bya Hatonda.
46002011	Njʼani amanyire ehiri mu mwoyo gwʼomuutu ohutusaho omuutu oyo omwene? Mu ngeri njʼenyene eŋuma aŋanga ohumanya ebi Hatonda aŋeega ohutusaho Omwoyo wuwe.
46002012	Aye efe sihutegeera ngʼolu abaatu abandi bategeera olwohuba Hatonda gatuŋa Omwoyo wuwe ohutuyeeda ohutegeera ebyo ebi atuhwehulira.
46002013	Olwʼehyo ebi huloma si byʼabaatu buutu aye byʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu era hubinyonyola abaatu abali nʼOmwoyo.
46002014	Omuutu aŋuma Omwoyo wa Hatonda saafugiirira ebi Mwoyo aloma olwohuba byʼobusirusiru eyiri omuutu oyo, era saaŋanga hubitegeera.
46002015	Hiisi ali nʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu ategeera ebya Hatonda aye abo abaŋuma sibaŋanga humutegeera.
46002016	Hino kiroma olwohuba hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Njʼani amanyire ehi Musengwa aŋeega ko abenga ti amuŋa amagesi?” Aye efe abamufugiirira, huŋeega hya Kurisito.
46003001	Aboluganda, ni naali eyo sinaloma ni nenywe ngʼabaatu abaŋangafu mu hufugiirira Hatonda, aye ngʼabaatu abahyoheresa ebi mubiri gwenda, abahiiri abaŋere mu Kurisito.
46003002	Nabaŋa mabeere mu hifo hyʼebiryo, olwohuba mwali muhiiri baŋere mu hufugiirira hwenywe, era hituufu, muhiiri baŋere.
46003003	Muhyoseresa ebi mubiri gwenda. Munaba ni muhiiri nʼegongi era ni muhiduhanirisa, hiba hiraga hiiti muhiiri bamubiri.
46003004	Mulala analoma ati, “Omutangirisi wange, nje Pawulo,” owundi ati, “Ese owange njʼApolo,” ehyo sihiraga hiiti mwebisya hyʼabaatu abatamanyire Hatonda?
46003005	Apolo, njʼani? Era Pawulo yeesi, njʼani? Mbona ti hwesihwesi huli baŋeeresa buŋeeresa aba Hatonda gatambisa, hiisi mulala gaahola omulimo ngʼolu Musengwa gamutuma. Era ehyo hyabaleetera ohufugiirira Kurisito.
46003006	Ese nahoma owumo, ngʼApolo ajuhirira aye Hatonda njʼowagira bwamera.
46003007	Olwʼehyo, owahoma nʼowajuhirira si hibbala aye Hatonda owaleetera owumo ohumera.
46003008	Omuutu aŋanya nʼajuhirira, bombi bali nʼehigendererwa hirala. Era Hatonda aliŋa hiisi muutu omuhemba olwʼomulimo ogu gaahola.
46003009	Hino kiroma olwohuba ese nʼApolo huŋeeresa Hatonda. Enywe muli ndimiro era nyumba ya Hatonda.
46003010	Era ngʼomutongoli omuhugu, natambisa ehirabo ehi Hatonda gaapa ohutaŋo omusingi era abaatu abandi pohu bali hutongola. Aye hiisi muutu gegenderese engeri eyi atongolamo.
46003011	Ŋaŋuma asobola ohutongola hu musingi ogundi ohutusaho ogwo ogubayaba, omusingi ogwo nje Yesu Kurisito.
46003012	Singa omuutu atongola hu musingi ogwo, nʼatambisa ebiitu ebigumu hyʼezaabbu, efeeza, nʼamabaale agʼebbeeyi, oba nʼatambisa ebiitu ebinya omuliro hyʼembaawo nʼenyaasi nʼenganda,
46003013	omulimo gugwe baligubona hu ludaalo olwʼekomerero. Omuliro gulimanyisa hiisi mulimo gwʼomuutu, era guliba ŋalafu.
46003014	Singa ehi gatongola hiŋunuha ohunya omuliro, omutongoli aja husuna omuhemba.
46003015	Ne singa ebiitu ebi gatambisa ohuhola omulimo binya, saalisuna muhemba. Niye omwene alinoŋoha aye hyʼomuutu aŋoneeye hu haala.
46003016	Enywe simumanyire muuti ndinywe Yekaalu ya Hatonda, era Omwoyo wuwe amenya mu nywe?
46003017	Olwʼehyo singa omuutu yesiyesi gonoona Yekaalu ya Hatonda, Hatonda alimusihiirisa olwohuba Yekaalu ya Hatonda yiye yeŋene era ndinywe Yekaalu eyo.
46003018	Mutedulinganga. Era ŋaŋume aŋeega ati mugesi ni geema hu esambo jʼabaatu wʼomulembe guno, aŋeega atyo afuuhe musiru mu moni jʼabaatu ko abe mugesi mu moni ja Hatonda.
46003019	Ebi abaatu mu hyalo muno baŋira baati byʼamagesi, eyiri Hatonda bya busirusiru. Hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Hatonda aŋambihisya abaatu abaŋeega baati bagesi, mu budulingi bwawe.”
46003020	Era nindi hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Musengwa amanyire ati ebiŋeego byʼabaatu abaŋeega baati bagesi, biŋuma mahulu.”
46003021	Olwʼehyo mulehe ohwepaahapaaha muuti “omutangirisi ono ahira ola.” Bosibosi baliŋo hubayeeda.
46003022	Oba Pawulo oba Apolo oba Keefa, oba ehyalo hino oba bulamu oba hufa oba ebiitu ebiriŋo hatyane oba ebiribaŋo mu moni eyo byosibyosi bya hubayeeda.
46003023	Enywe muli baatu ba Kurisito era Kurisito yeesi wa Hatonda.
46004001	Olwʼehyo, hiraŋi abaatu ohutuŋira ngʼabaŋeeresa ba Kurisito era abagatamo obwesige ohulomera abaatu ebyama bya Hatonda.
46004002	Hisaana abaŋeeresa ohuba besigwa.
46004003	Ese sifayo, enywe oba abaatu abandi ohupima obuŋeeresa bwange ohuba obulaŋi oba bbe. Mu butuufu obwene, keesi sisobola hwepima.
46004004	Eŋuma ehibi ehinemanyireho mu buŋeeresa wange. Ne ehyo sihiraga hiiti ndi muluŋamu, Musengwa njʼomanyire.
46004005	Olwʼehyo simusaliranga muutu musango ehiseera ehituufu ni hihiiri hwola, muhuume ohwola olu Musengwa aligobola. Alihwehula ebyo ebi bahweha mu njirema era alita aŋalafu ebiri mu myoyo jʼabaatu. Mu hiseera ehyo Hatonda aja husiima hiisi muutu mu ngeri emuŋoomera.
46004006	Aboluganda, ebyo byosibyosi ebindomire hu Apolo ni neese byahuboneraho muŋange ohutegeera amahulu gʼendoma eriŋo yiiti, “Mutaholanga ebiitu ebitali mu byaŋandiihiwa.” Ehyo hiribayeeda ohutaba nʼabaatu abamwenda nʼabandi abamutala.
46004007	Ale njʼani owahufuula ohuba owenjabulo hu bahyo? Hina ehi oli ni nahyo ehi otasuna ohuŋwa eyiri Hatonda? Obanga hiisi ehi oli ni nahyo bahuŋa huhuŋa, lwahiina wepaaha?
46004008	Olwo mwasuna hiisi hiitu ehimwenda era muli baŋinda? Ŋaahani mwafuuha bahabaha abatetaaga efe ohubayeeda? Nahendire mufuuhe bahabaha ko hwesi hwahaŋugira ŋalala ni nenywe!
46004009	Peega ti Hatonda gaaŋa efe abahwenda ehifo ehya ŋaasi, huli hyʼabaatu ababasalira ogwʼohufa ohubetira mu lwijuuye. Huli ŋalafu hiisi muutu hu hyalo ohutwebonera, abamalayika nʼabaatu.
46004010	Abaatu batuŋira ti huli basiru olwʼohubuulira Kurisito, aye enywe mweranga bagesi olwʼofugiirira Kurisito. Efe batutala baati huli banafu ne enywe muli bʼamaani era mwepaaha muuti babaŋa eŋono ne efe bbe.
46004011	Nʼolwa leero luno enjala nʼenduŋo bituluma, huŋuma hyahwambala, abaatu batubisya bubi era huŋuma ŋa humenya.
46004012	Hufabiina bugali weene ko hwebesaŋo, era wayire abaatu batulomaho bubi, efe hubasabira ekabi. Era ni batuhiyaania hwehaliriha.
46004013	Ni batufodogola, efe hubagobolamo nʼobuwombeefu. Sibatubalamo magesi era batubisya hyʼehitagasa mu hyalo hino.
46004014	Sipandiiha hino ohubaŋambya esoni, aye mbalabula ngʼabaana bange abahoda.
46004015	Wayire muli nʼabasomesa aboola omutwalo, aye muŋuma basenywe bangi olwohuba nafuuha senywe mu Yesu Kurisito olwʼAmaŋuliro Amalaŋi aganabalomera.
46004016	Olwʼehyo mbasunga mwebisyenga hyange.
46004017	Era ehyo cʼehigira ni ndi hubatumira Temuseewo omwana wange omwesigwa mu Musengwa. Aja hubahebulisa engeri eyimenyamo olwʼohufugiirira Yesu Kurisito era eŋambagana nʼebisomesa hiisi ŋaatu mu bibbubbu byʼabafugiirira Kurisito.
46004018	Abandi mwepaahapaaha oti hani sindigobola.
46004019	Aye ni huli husiima hwa Musengwa, ndihugobola mangu, mbone ehigima abandi abo abepaahapaaha nʼehigima bepaahapaaha.
46004020	Hino kiroma olwohuba Obuŋugi bwa Hatonda hububonera mu bulamu wʼabaatu olwʼebiitu ebibahola sosi ebi baloma.
46004021	Kale mwahendire mbahole hiina ni nijire eyo? Mwenda niije nʼesimbo oba niije mbalage ohwenda nʼobubombeefu?
46005001	Hituufu abaatu batulomera baati eriyo omuutu mu nywe ahola obuhwedi ni muha semwana. Ate nga nʼabatafugiirira Hatonda, sibahola ehiitu hyʼehyo.
46005002	Ne ehinjeŋunjisa, njʼehiitu hyʼehyo ohutabaŋambya soni! Simwahanakuŋaye mwaloma omusinde ohola ehikolwa ehyo ohuleheraŋo ohuhola omuhumba ni nenywe?
46005003	Wayire sindi ni nenywe, ndi ŋalala ni nenywe mu biŋeego. Mu siina lya Yesu Musengwa, ahola ehikolwa ehyo ahola hibi. Musalira omusango ohumuhira.
46005004	Ni muhumbaana ŋalala ohusaba, keesi nja huba ni nenywe mu biŋeego hu lwʼobuŋangi bwa Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito.
46005005	Muŋeyo omusinde oyo eyiri Sitaani, omubiri gugwe gusihiirihe aye obulamu buwe bunoŋohe hu ludaalo olu Musengwa aligobola ohusala emisango.
46005006	Mulehere aŋo ohwepaahapaaha. Simumanyire muuti ahasimbulusa ahadiidiri haleetera etome lyʼengaano ekande ohusimbuluha?
46005007	Olwʼehyo, mweyambuleho ehibi ko mube abaatu ba Hatonda. Hu Mbaga eyʼOhubihisya, baŋonga Kurisito ali mu hifo hyʼEtaama Etusaŋo Ebibi byʼabaatu, gatufiirira husobole ohusuna obulamu obunyaaha.
46005008	Kale hulye Embaga eyʼOhubihisya ni huŋuma sambo embi nʼekirihindi, aye hweŋeereyo erala eyiri Hatonda era ni huli bʼamazima.
46005009	Nabaŋandiihira mu bbaluŋa yange ni mbaloma ohutaholanga muhumba nʼabaatu abahwedi.
46005010	Sitegeesa abaatu abatafugiirira Kurisito abali hu hyalo hino abahola obuhwedi oba abaluluhanira ebiitu, abeebi, abajumirya ebitali Hatonda, olwohuba simuŋanga huleheraŋo ohuba ni nabo ni muhiiri hu hyalo huno.
46005011	Aye mbaŋandiihira ti mutaholanga muhumba nʼabaatu abaloma baati mbo baluganda ne basigala ni bahola obuhwedi, baŋayirisa abahyawe, bajumirya ebitali Hatonda, abameesi, oba abeebi. Simulyanga nʼabaatu hyʼabo.
46005012	Hipambiraho ŋe ohusalaŋo hu biŋamba hu batafugiirira Kurisito ohuba ni bahola ebiraŋi oba bbe? Aye simusalaŋo hu biŋamba hu bo abafugiirira Kurisito?
46005013	Hatonda omwene alisalira abatamufugiirira, omusango. Hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Mubbinge omuutu ohola ehibi, mu enywe.”
46006001	Singa mulala hu enywe aba nʼesonga hu wahye, lwahiina ajiŋira mu kooti jʼabaatu abatafugiirira Kurisito, mu hifo hyʼohutiina eyiri abafugiirira Kurisito?
46006002	Simumanyire muuti abaatu ba Hatonda balisalira abaatu bʼehyalo hino omusango Yesu nʼagobooye? Obanga mulisalira ehyalo hino omusango, simusobola hulongoosa obusonga songa obwo bbe?
46006003	Simumanyire muuti hulisalira abamalayika omusango? Hanye hiri hiityo, simuŋanga husala emisango ejiŋamba hu biitu ebyahabuhyabuhya hyʼebyo?
46006004	Olwʼehyo, ni muba ni muli nʼesonga ejʼengeri eyo, lwahiina mujiŋirira abaatu aba abafugiirira Kurisito bataŋa eŋono?
46006005	Hino kiroma hubaŋambya esoni. Dala hituufu ŋaŋuma owoluganda yesiyesi mu enywe asobola ohulongoosa esonga ŋagati wenywe abafugiirira Kurisito?
46006006	Ehyo njʼehigira owoluganda gaŋaŋabira owahye eyiri abatafugiirira Kurisito?
46006007	Munaba ni muŋaŋabira abahyenywe mu kooti jʼabatafugiirira Kurisito balamule hiba hiraga hiiti simwebisya hyʼabafugiirira. Hyahali hiraŋi ohubahola ehibi era babalyaha ohuhira ohubaŋaŋabira.
46006008	Ate enywe mwesi mulyaha! Era hino muhihola hu bafugiirira Kurisito bahyenywe.
46006009	Simumanyire muuti abatafugiirira Kurisito babula mugabo mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda? Batabadulinganga. Wayire abʼemoni enyangu oba abajumirya ebitali Hatonda oba abahwedi oba abamalaaya oba abasinde abaŋenyuha nʼabasinde bahyawe,
46006010	oba abeebi oba abaluluhanira ebiitu oba abameesi oba abo abaŋayirisa abahyawe oba abakupanya, sibalisuna muhemba mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda.
46006011	Era abandi hu enywe mwali muutyo. Aye olwʼobuŋangi bwa Musengwa Yesu Kurisito nʼolwa Omwoyo wa Hatonda, baboogaho ebibi mwafuuha bagwalaafu, abaatu ba Hatonda era mwejeerera omusango.
46006012	Manyire ti abaatu baloma baati, “Husobola ohuhola hiisi hiitu ehi hwenda.” Ehyo hituufu aye ese ndoma ti hiisi hiitu sihyamugaso ohuhihola. Era baloma baati, “Sobola ohuhola hiisi hiitu ehinenda.” Aye ese sinja hufugiirira hufuuha mwidu wʼehiitu hyosihyosi.
46006013	Era baloma mbo, “Emere eriŋo ohwigusa ehida era ehida hiriŋo hulya ebiryo.” Baloma baatyo, ne Hatonda alibisihiirisa byombi. Sootambisanga omubiri ohuhola obuhwedi, aye gutambise ohuŋeeresanga Musengwa era njʼagulabirira.
46006014	Hatonda galamusa Musengwa Yesu Kurisito, era hwesi alitulamusa olwʼobuŋangi buwe.
46006015	Simumanyire muuti emibiri jenywe bitundu byʼomubiri gwa Kurisito? Olwo ŋaahani sobola tye ohuŋamba ebitundu byʼomubiri gwa Kurisito neŋimba nʼomuhwedi? Sisobola huhola ehiitu hyʼehyo kadi.
46006016	Simumanyire muuti omusinde oweŋimba nʼomuhasi omuhwedi, bombi bafuuha mubiri mulala? Hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Bombi bafuuha mubiri mulala.”
46006017	Aye oyo oweŋimba ni Musengwa, bombi baba bulala mu mwoyo.
46006018	Mweŋalamenga ohuhola obuhwedi. Ebibi ebindi ebi omuutu ahola, biba ebulafu wʼomubiri gugwe. Aye oyo ahola ehibi akosa bulamu buwe omwene.
46006019	Simumanyire muuti emibiri jenywe Yekaalu yʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu oyu Hatonda gabaŋa, ali mu enywe? Era simumanyire muuti simuliŋo hu lwenywe aye hulwa Hatonda,
46006020	era gabagula hu bbeeyi eyʼamaani. Olwʼehyo mutambisenga emibiri jenywe ohuŋa Hatonda eŋono.
46007001	Bino njʼebiŋamba hu songa eji mwapandiihira: Hiraŋi omuutu ohutaleeta muhasi.
46007002	Aye olwʼohweŋalama obuhwedi, hiraŋi hiisi muutu ohuleeta omuhasi era hiisi muhasi ohufumbirwa.
46007003	Omusinde omufumbo ali nʼohwoheresanga obuvunanyiziwa bubwe mu hisenge eyiri omuhasi wuwe era nʼomuhasi yeesi atyo.
46007004	Omubiri gwʼomuhasi sigugwe yeŋene, aye wamwe yeesi aguliho obuŋangi. Mu ngeri njʼenyene omubiri gwʼomusinde sigugwe yeŋene, aye omuhasi wuwe yeesi aguliho obuŋangi.
46007005	Abafumbo, mutagananga huŋa bahyenywe ebi basaanira ohutusaho ni mufugiirisenie muuti muhene ehiseera ehigere olwʼohwenda ohusaba. Aye ni muhenire, mugobolenga ŋalala ko Sitaani atabahema olwʼohutasobola hwehuuma hwenywe.
46007006	Ndoma hino ngʼafugiirira Kurisito, simbaŋa hiragiro.
46007007	Nahendire hiisi muutu ohuba hyange. Aye hiisi muutu ali nʼehirabo hihye ehyʼenjawulo ehi Hatonda gamuŋa, ono ali nʼehirabo hino owundi ali ni nehira.
46007008	Ŋaahani, abo abatali bafumbo nʼabanamwandu, ndoma ti hiraŋi ohusigala ni batali bafumbo ngʼolu ese ndi.
46007009	Aye ni baba ni bataŋanga hwehuuma, bafumbirwe olwohuba hiraŋi ohufumbirwa ohuhira ohufa nʼobulumi owohwenda ohwegaata.
46007010	Abafumbo mbaŋa ehiragiro ehitali hyange aye hiŋwa eyiri Musengwa; omuhasi saanobanga hu wamwe.
46007011	Ne singa anoba ateehwa ohusigala nʼaŋuma musinde, ne natasobola atabagananga ni wamwe. Era omusinde saabbinganga muhasi wuwe.
46007012	Hino ehi nja ohuloma, hiŋwa eyiri ndiise samwene sosi eyiri Musengwa. Eyiri abandi, singa ŋabaŋo owoluganda naali nʼomuhasi atafugiirira Kurisito, ne nʼahyenda ohumenya ni naye, owoluganda oyo saamubbinganga.
46007013	Era singa omuhasi afugiirira Kurisito aba nʼomusinde atafugiirira, ne omusinde oyo nʼahyenda ohumenya ni naye, saamunobangaho.
46007014	Hino kiroma olwohuba Hatonda aŋira omusinde atafugiirira Kurisito ohuba hyʼomuutu wuwe olwʼomuhasi afugiirira Kurisito era nʼomuhasi atafugiirira Kurisito, amuŋira ohuba hyʼomuutu wuwe olwa wamwe afugiirira Kurisito. Singa sihiri hiityo, abaana baawe bahabaaye hyʼababaatu abatajumirya Hatonda. Aye ngʼolu hiri hiityo Hatonda abaŋira hyʼabaatu babe.
46007015	Aye singa omulala hu bo atafugiirira Kurisito genda ohwawuhana nʼofugiirira, leha bawuhane. Mu mbeera hyʼeyo, omusinde oba omuhasi afugiirira Kurisito aba aŋuma ehimuboŋa olwohuba Hatonda gabatobola ohumenya mu miyaaya.
46007016	Muhasi ewe afugiirira Kurisito, omanyira hu hi oti olireetera wamwo ohunoŋoha? Oba ewe omusinde afugiirira Kurisito, omanyira hu hi oti olireetera omuhasi wuwo ohunoŋoha?
46007017	Aye hiisi muutu geyongere ohuba ngʼolu gaali nʼahiiri hufugiirira Musengwa era abe ehyo ehi Hatonda gamulanga ohuba. Hino njʼehiragiro ehiipa ebibbubbu byʼabafugiirira Kurisito ebiri hiisi ŋaatu.
46007018	Oyo owahomola ko afugiirire Kurisito, atetusaho ahabonero ahalaga haati muhomole. Ni nooyo owafugiirira Kurisito nʼahiiri huhomola, atahomola.
46007019	Ohuhomola nʼohutahomola sihyamugaso, aye ehihulu hugondera ebiragiro bya Hatonda.
46007020	Hiisi muutu asigale nʼali ngʼolu gaali nʼahiiri hufugiirira Kurisito.
46007021	Waali mwidu ko ofugiirire Kurisito? Ehyo hitahulumya mwoyo aye singa ŋabaŋo ekabi ohuŋwa mu wiidu, hiba hiraŋi.
46007022	Hino kiroma olwohuba omuutu oyu Musengwa gafuula owuwe nʼali mwidu, gamufuula wʼedembe ohuŋwa mu hibi. Ni nooyo otaali mwidu ko afugiirire Musengwa, ŋaahani mwidu wa Kurisito.
46007023	Hatonda gabagula era gasasula endiŋi nʼamafugi ga Kurisito, olwʼehyo simubanga beedu bʼomuutu owundi.
46007024	Aboluganda, musigale ni muli ngʼolu mwali ni muhiiri hufugiirira Hatonda.
46007025	Ebiŋamba hu bajoŋu, puma ehiragiro ohuŋwa eyiri Musengwa, aye mbaŋa epeega yange ngʼomuutu oyu Musengwa gaŋambira ehisa gaafuula omwesigwa.
46007026	Hino kiroma olwʼebigosi ebiriŋo hatyane, hiraŋi omuutu ohusigala ngʼolu ali.
46007027	Oli mufumbo? Otanoba oba otabbinga muhasi wuwo. Sooli mufumbo? Otaleeta muhasi.
46007028	Aye onafumbirwa, sooba nʼobbengire. Era omujoŋu anafumbirwa, aba saabbenga. Aye abo abafumbirwa bagaana ebigosi mu bufumbo. Cʼehigira nahendire mbaŋonie ebiitu hyʼebyo.
46007029	Aboluganda, tegeesa ti ebiseera ebyʼekomerero byolire. Era ohuŋwa ŋaahani, abo abali nʼabahasi babe hyʼabaŋuulu.
46007030	Abo abalira babe hyʼabatalira, ni naabo abasangaala babe hyʼabatali basangaafu. Era ni naabo abagula ebiitu, babe hyʼabaŋuma.
46007031	Era ni naabo abali nʼebiitu mu hyalo hino, bitabaŋuga olwohuba ehyalo hino nʼebiitu ebirimo biriŋwaŋo.
46007032	Nenda muteralihiriranga. Omusinde atali mufumbo afa hu mulimo gwa Musengwa olwohuba genda ohumusangaasa.
46007033	Aye omusinde omufumbo afa hu ebiitu ebyʼehyalo hino: hu ngeri eyʼohusangaasamo omuhasi wuwe,
46007034	era ebiŋeego bibye sibigumira hu hiitu hirala. Aye omuhasi owaaliho mufumbo oba ataŋenyuhangaho nʼomusinde, aba muheneerefu hu bya Musengwa. Ehigendererwa hihye huba hweŋerayo erala eyiri Musengwa mu mubiri nʼomu mwoyo gugwe. Aye omuhasi omufumbo, aba hu huŋeega hu byʼehyalo hino, nʼengeri eyʼohusangaasamo wamwe.
46007035	Hino kiroma hu lwʼobulaŋi bwenywe era simbatwiha mugugu aye mbalaga ehihirayo obulaŋi, ko musobole ohweŋeerayo erala eyiri Musengwa.
46007036	Aye singa omuutu aŋeega ati sigebisya bulaŋi eyiri omujoŋu oyu genda obufumbo, nataŋanga hwehuuma, atiine mu moni bafumbirigane olwohuba ehyo si hibi.
46007037	Aye singa omuutu asalaŋo mu mwoyo gugwe ohutaleeta omuhasi, ni ŋaŋuma humuŋalirisa ohuhihola, era nʼasobola ohwehuuma aba aholire hiraŋi.
46007038	Olwʼehyo oyo owereetera omuhasi aba aholire hiraŋi, aye asalireŋo ohutaleeta, njʼahira.
46007039	Omuhasi omufumbo aŋuma edembe ohufumbirwa omusinde owundi, wamwe nʼahiiri mulamu. Aye singa wamwe afa, aba wʼedembe ohufumbirwa omusinde owundi yesiyesi oyu aba ni gendire anaba nʼafugiirira Kurisito.
46007040	Aye mu hubona ohwange, singa asigala ngʼolu ali aba bulaŋi ohuhiraho olu afumbirwa. Era keesi ndi nʼOmwoyo wa Hatonda, ohuloma tyo.
46008001	Ebiŋamba hu mere eyi baŋongire eyiri ebitali Hatonda, ngʼolu mwabeene muloma muuti, “Hwesihwesi hutegeera ebiŋamba hu ebiitu ebyo.” Era ohumanya ohwo huleetera omuutu ohwehudumbasa, aye ohwenda abaatu njʼehiyeeda.
46008002	Omuutu yesiyesi aŋeega ati amanyire, aba ahiiri ohumanya ehi asaanira ohumanya.
46008003	Aye omuutu owenda Hatonda njʼoyu Hatonda amanyire.
46008004	Kale ohulya ebiryo ebi baŋongire eyiri ebitali Hatonda, humanyire huuti ebitali Hatonda biŋuma mahulu mu hyalo hino era ti ŋaliŋo Hatonda mulala yeŋene.
46008005	Wayire nga ŋaliŋo ebiitu eduuli mwigulu oba hu hyalo ebi balanga mbo hatonda nʼabasengwa,
46008006	aye ŋaliŋo Hatonda era Seefe mulala yeŋene owatonda hiisi hiitu era efe huliŋo hu lulwe. Era ŋaliŋo Musengwa Yesu Kurisito, omulala yeŋene owatonda hiisi hiitu era huliŋo hu lulwe.
46008007	Aye hiisi muutu samanyire ehi huli hulomaho. Engeri abaatu abandi baanala ohujumirya ebitali Hatonda, era hatyane ni balya ebiryo ebyo, mula babona baati baholire hibi. Ehyo hiriŋo olwʼepeega yaawe enafu era hibaleetera ohweyonoona.
46008008	Aye ebiryo sinje ebitufuula abalaŋi oba ababi mu moni ja Hatonda. Ohulya nʼohutalya, ŋaŋuma ehihufiirwa oba ehihitumeedaho.
46008009	Aye mwegenderesenga, edembe lyenywe litagira abo abanafu mu hufugiirira beesitaala.
46008010	Singa omuutu omunafu mu hufugiirira ahubona ewe oli nʼohutegeera ebiŋamba hu Yekaalu yʼebitali Hatonda, ni wetengehire hu mere mu ngolo, ehyo sihija humuleetera ohuŋeega ati hiraŋi yeesi ohulya ebiryo hyʼebyo?
46008011	Olwʼehyo, owoluganda oyo, omunafu mu hufugiirira, oyu Kurisito gafiiririye, alisihiiriha olwʼohumanya huhwo.
46008012	Onesitaaza aboluganda babo, olwʼohuhola ehi bamanyire baati hibi, oba oli hwonoona eyiri Kurisito omwene.
46008013	Olwʼehyo, hanye ohulya enyama hireetera muganda yange ohugwa mu hibi, sinja hugobolayo huyirya, tamuleetera hwonoona.
46009001	Mu butuufu obwene sinahali ni tamba ko nebesaaŋo ngʼolu abandi benda. Ŋaahani sindi wa dembe ohulya oba ohunywa ehinenda? Keesi ndi muhwenda wa Yesu Musengwa era enywe muli bibala byʼomulimo ogu gaapa ohuhola.
46009002	Wayire eyiri abandi sindi muhwenda aye eyiri enywe ndi muhwenda, olwohuba enywe muli habonero ahahahasa haati Musengwa gaatuma.
46009003	Enywe ndinywe obujulizi bwange eri abaatu abapahania baati sindi muhwenda.
46009004	Olwo ese sindi wa dembe ohulya nʼohunywa hu byenywe olwʼomulimo ogu mbaholamo?
46009005	Sihuli bʼedembe ohugendanga nʼabahasi bʼefe ngʼolu abahwenda abandi nʼabalebe ba Musengwa ko ni Keefa bahola?
46009006	Ese ni Bbalunaba, ndife hweŋene ohuli nʼohutamba ko hwalya?
46009007	Musirikale hi owesasula omuhemba? Njʼani ahoma emizabbibbu aye ndalyaho hu ebibala byagwo? Oba njʼani owemera aye ndi anywe hu mabeere?
46009008	Sindoma hu lwange ngʼomuutu obuutu olwohuba nʼegambi lyosi liroma cʼehyene.
46009009	Hyaŋandiihiwa mu magambi aga Hatonda gaŋa Musa hiiti, “Otasidihanga munwa gwʼesaame erima, wayiroberesa ohwaya.” Oŋeega oti Hatonda alumirwa esaame joŋene?
46009010	Ehyo gahiroma hutuyeeda ndiife abaatu era hyaŋandiihiwa hu lwefe, olwohuba alima, ni nooyo agesa basuubira ohulya amakungula.
46009011	Efe hubaliisa emere eyʼomwoyo, hiba hibi efe ohusuna obuyeedi ohuŋwa eyi muli?
46009012	Obanga abandi bʼedembe ohusuna obuyeedi ohuŋwa eyi muli, efe sihuli ni nalyo ohubahiraho? Aye efe sihwatambisa ekabi eyo. Ne hugumira hiisi mbeera olwʼohutenda huziyiza ohubuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu Kurisito.
46009013	Simumanyire muuti abo abaŋeeresa mu Yekaalu balya hu byomu Yekaalu, era ni naabo abaŋeeresa hu hituuti balya hu birabo ebi baŋonga hu hituuti?
46009014	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, Musengwa galagira ati abo ababuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi bali nʼohusuna obuyeedi olwʼobuŋeeresa bwawe.
46009015	Aye ese sitambisa edembe eryo era hino sindihuhiŋandiiha ni suubira obuyeedi ohuŋwa eyi muli. Nenyumirisa ti nababuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi ni ŋaŋuma ehimuupa. Era mala gafa ohuhira omuutu olu ahiitusaho.
46009016	Ate puma hyʼohwenyumirisa olwʼohubuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi olwohuba Hatonda gandagira ohubuulira. Era jinjageene singa simbuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi.
46009017	Mbanga ni mbuulira mu hweyendera hwange samwene, nahali suubira ohuupa omuhemba. Aye ese mbuulira olwohuba Hatonda gaapambya obuvunanyiziwa obwo.
46009018	Omuhemba gwange guliŋe? Omuhemba gwange njʼekabi eyʼohubuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi ni puma ehisuna olwʼohubuulira.
46009019	Wayire nga sindi mwidu wʼomuutu yesiyesi, nafuuha mwidu wa bosibosi, nahaleeta bangi eyiri Kurisito.
46009020	Naba nʼAbayudaaya nebisya ngʼOmuyudaaya, ko nahabaleetera ohufugiirira Kurisito. Ni ndi ni naabo abaŋamba amagambi gʼEhiyudaaya nebisya oti hani keesi ndi ŋaasi wʼamagambi ko nahabaleeta eyiri Kurisito.
46009021	Mu ngeri njʼenyene nʼeyiri Abatali Bayudaaya, nebisya hya nibo ko nahabaleeta eyiri Kurisito. Hino sihitegeesa hiiti sipamba magambi ga Hatonda, ese ndi ŋaasi wʼamagambi ga Kurisito.
46009022	Naba nʼabanafu mu hufugiirira keesi fuuha munafu, ko nahabaleeta eyiri Kurisito. Olwʼehyo fuuha byosibyosi eyiri abaatu bosibosi mu ngeri yosiyosi abandi bahanoŋoha.
46009023	Ebyo byosibyosi mbihola hu lwʼAmaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu Yesu ohubuulirwa ko nahasuna ebibala.
46009024	Mumanyire muuti mu husindana embiro, baba bangi abaduluma aye mulala oyu baŋa ehirabo. Olwʼehyo mudulumenga mu ngeri eyi muŋanga ohusuna ehirabo.
46009025	Hiisi osindana mu migudulo agesyaho ohwetegeha nʼamaani gahaŋangula. Ehyo bahihola ohusuna engule eya haseera buseera aye efe mu husindana hwʼefe huja husuna engule eyʼemirembe nʼemirembe.
46009026	Olwʼehyo, sinduluma hyʼomuutu aŋuma ehigendererwa era sisoola hyʼoyo ohubba ebbanga.
46009027	Nihahania ohwegomba hwʼomubiri gwange sobole ohwehuuma ko ni kenire ohulomera abandi Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi, tafiirwa ehirabo ehi Hatonda aja huŋa abaatu olwohuba abesigwa.
46010001	Aboluganda, nenda muhebulire muuti abasehulu beefe bosibosi ni baŋwa e Misiri bagenderanga ŋaasi wʼehireri ehyabaluŋamyanga, era bosibosi basomoha enyanja eyi balanga baati Enando.
46010002	Bosibosi ni baali ŋaasi wʼehireri ehyo era ni babita mu nyanja eyo baali babatiziwa ohufuuha abaloobera ba Musa.
46010003	Era bosibosi balya hu ebiryo ebyʼomwoyo ebi Hatonda gabaŋa,
46010004	banywa hu maaji agʼomwoyo ohuŋwa mu baale eryʼomwoyo eryabaŋereheranga era ebaale eryo nje Kurisito.
46010005	Aye ebikolwa byʼabahira obungi hu bo sibyasangaasa Hatonda. Ehyaŋwamo hubasihiirisa emirambo jaawe jandagalana mu lulafu.
46010006	Ebiitu ebyo byali byahuboneraho eyiri efe ohutulabula, hwesi hutaŋembanga hu huhola ebibi hya nibo.
46010007	Simujumiryanga ebitali Hatonda hya nibo ngʼolu hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Abaatu beehala balya era banywa ni baŋa ehibbote eŋono nga benyoha bahina mu kola eyʼobuhwedi.”
46010008	Hutaholanga buhwedi hya nibo, era ehyo hyaleetera abaatu emitwalo ebiri nʼekumi edatu ohufa hu ludaalo lulala.
46010009	Hutahemanga Musengwa, ngʼolu balala hu bo baahola hyagira etemu jabaluma.
46010010	Era hutemulugunyanga ngʼolu bandi hu bo beemulugunya hyagira malayika aleeta ohufa, ohubasihiirisa.
46010011	Ebiitu ebyo byosibyosi byaboolaho ohuba ehyʼohuboneraho eyiri efe era byaŋandiihiwa hutulabula olwohuba huli mu biseera ebyʼekomerero.
46010012	Olwʼehyo oyo aŋeega ati gemire bulaŋi mu hufugiirira, gegenderese atagwa mu hibi.
46010013	Ebihemo byosibyosi ebiboolireho, mbebiijira abaatu habuhyabuhya. Aye Hatonda mwesigwa era ahuuma ebisuubise bibye, saaja huleha muutu yesiyesi ohuhemewa mu ngeri eyi atasobole huhiŋangula. Era ni munahemebwenga, anabaŋenga amaani agʼohwehaliriha, nʼamagesi agʼohubiŋangula.
46010014	Olwʼehyo, bameeri bange abahoda, mweŋalamenga ohujumirya ebitali Hatonda.
46010015	Manyire ti ndoma nʼabaatu abategeera ehi ndoma, musaleŋo mwabeene oba ehi ndoma hituufu.
46010016	Hunanywa hu hihopo hirala ehyʼenvinyo ni huhenire ohweyaasa Hatonda sihuba ni huli hugabana hu mafugi ga Kurisito? Era ni hubbongola omugaati hwagulya, sihuba ni huli hugabana mubiri gwa Kurisito?
46010017	Omugaati guli mulala, efe abangi huli mubiri mulala olwohuba hugabana omugaati omulala ogwo.
46010018	Muhebulire muuti ŋaaliŋo Abayisirayiri abalyanga eŋongo eyi baŋongeranga hu hituuti, ngʼehyo hibaleetera ohuba bulala ni Hatonda. Mu ngeri njʼenyene ohulya ebi baŋongire eyiri ebitali Hatonda, hihuleetera ohuba bulala ninabyo.
46010019	Ni ndoma tyo, muŋeega muuti ebitali Hatonda oba ohulya ebi baŋonga, byamahulu?
46010020	Biŋuma mahulu bbe aye eŋongo eyi abatafugiirira Kurisito baŋonga, babiŋongera misambwa sosi Hatonda era sinenda mweŋimbe nʼemisambwa.
46010021	Simuŋanga hunywa hu hihopo hya Musengwa nohu hihopo hyʼemisambwa. Era simuŋanga huliira hu meeza ya Musengwa nohu yʼemisambwa.
46010022	Huŋanga ohuhola ehyo Musengwa ndaababubira, oba huŋeega huuti huli nʼamaani ohumuhiraho?
46010023	Nga Pawulo geyongera aloma ati, “Abaatu baloma baati mbo ‘Husobola ohuhola hiisi hiitu ehi hwenda.’ ” Aye ese ndoma ti hiisi hiitu sihyamugaso ohuhihola. Baloma mbo “Husobola ohuhola hiisi hiitu ehi hwenda.” Aye ese ndoma ti ebiitu byosibyosi sibyamugaso.
46010024	Ŋaŋumengaŋo hu enywe afa hu bibye byoŋene, aye afenga nohu byʼabahye.
46010025	Mulyenga enyama eyi batunda ni ŋaŋuma hwesalira musango mu myoyo jenywe,
46010026	olwohuba hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti “Ehyalo nʼebiitu byosibyosi ebihirimo bya Musengwa.”
46010027	Singa omuutu atafugiirira Kurisito ahulanga ewuwe ohulyaho, lya hiisi ehi aba nʼahwiŋuuye nʼoŋuma hwesalira omusango mu mwoyo gugwo.
46010028	Aye singa omuutu ahulomera ati, “Ehyo bahiŋongire eyiri ebitali Hatonda,” soohiryanga hu lwʼoyo aba nʼahulomeeye, ohuteŋulira musango mu mwoyo gugwe.
46010029	Ndoma hu lwʼobulaŋi bwʼomwoyo gugwe, sosi ogugwo. Omuutu aŋanga ohuloma ati, “Lwahiina edembe lyange ohuhola ehiitu liri nʼohutiinira hu ebiŋeego byʼabaatu?
46010030	Singa neyaasa Hatonda ko nalya, lwahiina omuutu obundi gaanenya?”
46010031	Olwʼehyo hiisi ehi muhola oba hulya oba hunywa, muholenga olwʼohuŋa Hatonda eŋono.
46010032	Simuleeteranga muutu yesiyesi ohubbenga wayire hu Bayudaaya oba hu Abatali Bayudaaya oba hu hibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira Kurisito.
46010033	Muholenga hyʼese ngʼolu ngesyaho ohusangaasa hiisi muutu mu hiisi ehi kola. Sikolatyo olwʼobulaŋi bwange aye hu lwʼobulaŋi bwa bangi bahanoŋoha.
46011001	Mubonere hu ese muhene muhole ebi kola ngʼolu keesi mbonera hu Kurisito.
46011002	Ndi musangaafu olwohuba muhebulira hiisi hiitu ehi nahola era mugumisye ebi nabasomesa.
46011003	Nenda mutegeere muuti Kurisito ali nʼobuŋangi hu hiisi musinde, omusinde ali nʼobuŋangi hu muhasi wuwe era Hatonda ali nʼobuŋangi hu Kurisito.
46011004	Omusinde yesiyesi anasaba oba analomera abaatu ehibono hya Hatonda, ni gewihiriiye omutwe aswasa Kurisito amuliho obuŋangi.
46011005	Nʼomuhasi yeesi anasaba oba analomera abaatu ehibono hya Hatonda nateboŋire hitambala hu mutwe, aswasa wamwe olwohuba omutwe gugwe guba oti hani bagubegireeho efiiri.
46011006	Ale hanye ŋaliŋo omuhasi atenda hweboŋaho ehitambaala hu mutwe, gebegeho efiiri. Aye hanye hyasoni ohwebegaho efiiri, geboŋengaho ehitambaala hu mutwe.
46011007	Sihiraŋi omusinde ohweboŋa ehitambaala hu mutwe olwohuba alaga ehifaananyi nʼeŋono lya Hatonda. Aye omuhasi ŋono lyʼomusinde.
46011008	Hiri hiityo olwohuba Hatonda sigawumba omusinde ohuŋwa mu muhasi, aye gawumba omuhasi ohuŋwa mu musinde.
46011009	Era omusinde sibamuwumba hu lwʼomuhasi aye omuhasi njʼoyu bawumba hu lwʼomusinde.
46011010	Olwʼesonga eyo nʼolwabamalayika, omuhasi nʼasaba ali nʼohweboŋa ehitambaala ohuba ahabonero ahalaga haati ali ŋaasi wʼomusinde.
46011011	Aye eyiri Musengwa, omuhasi saaliŋo hu lulwe yeŋene aye hu lwʼomusinde era nʼomusinde yeesi saaliŋo hu lulwe yeŋene aye hu lwʼomuhasi.
46011012	Hino kiroma olwohuba omuhasi gaŋwa mu musinde, nʼomusinde yeesi aŋwa mu muhasi. Aye byosibyosi biŋwa eyiri Hatonda.
46011013	Musaleŋo mwabeene hanye hiraŋi omuhasi ohusaba nʼateboŋire ehitambaala.
46011014	Sihiri ŋalafu ti hiswasa omusinde ohuba nʼefiiri ereeŋi?
46011015	Aye hiŋeesa omuhasi eŋono singa aba nʼefiiri ereeŋi olwohuba Hatonda galimuŋa ngʼehyambalo.
46011016	Ŋanabaŋo owenda ohuŋahana hu ebyo aŋahane, ne efe nʼebibbubbu byʼabafugiirira Kurisito huŋuma hindi.
46011017	Mu hino ehinja hulomaho, puma hubasiima olwohuba olu muhumbaana ŋalala, muhifo hyʼebiraŋi, ebibi njʼebi baŋwamo.
46011018	Ehisooka bandomera baati mbo ni muhumbaana ŋalala ngʼabafugiirira Kurisito, muba muhweyabulayabulamo era ehiseera ehindi noola nahiŋira ti hituufu.
46011019	Ŋaŋuma hubuusabuusa ohweyabulayabulamo huli nʼohubaŋo, ko basobole ohufaania mu enywe abali nʼohufugiirira ohutuufu.
46011020	Enywe ni muhumbaana ŋalala, simulya ehiŋulo hya Musengwa,
46011021	olwohuba ŋaŋuma ahuumaho owahye ko galya. Enjala eruma owundi aye owundi aba gegutire, era owundi aŋuma hyʼohunywa aye abandi ni basambira magulu.
46011022	Hambuuseho, muŋuma mago eyi muŋanga ohuliira nʼohunywera? Oba olwohuba mutala ehibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira Kurisito era mwenda muswase abaŋuma ebiryo? Olwo mwenda ndome hiina? Mbasiime olwʼehyo? Bbe, sipanga.
46011023	Hino kiroma olwohuba ebi Musengwa gaasomesa, keesi mbebi mbasomesa; mu hiire ehi baliiramo Yesu Musengwa oluhwe, gabugula omugaati,
46011024	geyaasa Hatonda, ni gahena ngʼagubbongolamo, ngʼabaŋa aloma ati, “Guno njʼomubiri gwange oguupayo hu lwenywe. Hino muhiholenga olwʼohukebulira.”
46011025	Mu ngeri njʼenyene ni baahena ohulya ehyʼegulo, nga Yesu aŋamba ehihopo hyʼenvinyo aloma ati, “Envinyo yino njʼamafugi gange aganooŋohe ohuba ahabonero ahahahasa endagaano epyaha eyi Hatonda aholire nʼabaatu. Muholenga hino hiisi olu munanywenga olwʼohukebulira.”
46011026	Hino kiroma olwohuba hiisi olu munalyenga hu mugaati guno era mwanywa hu hihopo hyʼenvinyo hino, hibenga hyahulomera abaatu ebiŋamba hu hufa hwa Musengwa, ohwola olu aligobola.
46011027	Olwʼehyo, hiisi alya omugaati oba anywa hu hihopo hyʼenvinyo ya Musengwa mu ngeri etamusangaasa, aba aholire ehibi eyiri omubiri nʼamafugi ga Musengwa.
46011028	Olwʼehyo hiraŋi omuutu asooke gehebere mu mwoyo gugwe, ko alye omugaati era anywe nohu hihopo hyʼenvinyo.
46011029	Hino kiroma olwohuba hiisi alya era ganywa nʼataŋa omubiri gwa Musengwa eŋono, aba gereetaho omusango.
46011030	Era ehyo cʼehigira bangi hu enywe muli banafu era mulwala era bangi bafuuye.
46011031	Singa husooka ohweheebera hwabeene ko hwalya era hwanywa, Hatonda saatusalira musango.
46011032	Aye Musengwa anatuŋamo endabusi, aŋo aba atuluŋamya ko batatusalira musango nʼabaatu abahosi bʼebibi hu ludaalo olwʼekomerero.
46011033	Olwʼehyo aboluganda ni muhumbaananga, muhuumenga abahyenywe ko mwalya.
46011034	Ni ŋabaŋo oyu enjala eruma, asookenga ohulya ewuwe ko hitabaŋweramo hubasalira omusango ni muhumbeene. Ebiŋamba hu bindi, nja hubalomera ni nijire eyo.
46012001	Aboluganda, sinenda mube mu hiirema hu biŋamba hu birabo byʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu.
46012002	Muhimanyire muuti ni mwali ni muhiiri humanya Hatonda, baali bababbaamisye ni mujumirya ebitali Hatonda, ebiitu ebiŋuma bulamu.
46012003	Olwʼehyo, mbalomera ti ŋaŋuma muutu yesiyesi ali nʼOmwoyo wa Hatonda aloma ehibi hu Yesu. Era ŋaŋuma abbutula ati, “Yesu nje Musengwa,” Omwoyo Omutukuvu natamuluŋamisye.
46012004	Ŋaliŋo ebirabo ebyenjabulo aye Omwoyo abigaba ali mulala.
46012005	Ŋaliŋo obuŋeeresa obwenjabulo aye Musengwa oyu huŋeeresa ali mulala.
46012006	Ŋaliŋo engeri nyingi ejʼohutambamo emirimo, aye Hatonda ali mulala atuŋa amaani ohuhola emirimo ejo.
46012007	Hatonda aŋa hiisi muutu Omwoyo Omutukuvu olwʼohwenda ohuyeeda abaatu bosibosi.
46012008	Omwoyo Omutukuvu aŋa omuutu amagesi agenjabulo, owundi gamuŋa ohumanya ohwenjabulo,
46012009	ngʼOmwoyo omwene oyo aŋa owundi ohufugiirira ohubitiirifu, era gaaŋa owundi ehirabo ehyʼohuŋonia abalwaye.
46012010	Omwoyo omwene oyo aŋa owundi amaani agʼohuholanga ebyamaliholiho, ngʼowundi amuŋa ehirabo ehyʼobunaabbi. Omwoyo Omutukuvu aŋa owundi ohwabula ebirabo ebyʼOmwoyo owa Hatonda ko ni nebyo ebiŋwa aŋaatu aŋandi, Omwoyo omwene oyo aŋa owundi ohuloma mu ndimi ejenjabulo, owundi gamuŋa ohutafuta endimi.
46012011	Omwoyo aŋa abaatu ebirabo ebyo byosibyosi ngʼolu omwene aba ni gendire.
46012012	Nga Pawulo geyongera aloma ati, “Kurisito ali hyʼomubiri,” wayire guli nʼebitundu bingi, aye gusigala ni guli mubiri mulala.
46012013	Era mu ngeri njʼenyene hwesihwesi Abayudaaya nʼAbatali Bayudaaya, abeedu nʼabatali beedu, hwabatiziwa mu Mwoyo mulala. Era Hatonda gatuŋa Omwoyo mulala, hwahena hwafuuha omubiri mulala.
46012014	Omubiri siguli nʼehitundu hirala hyoŋene, aye guli nʼebitundu bingi.
46012015	Singa ohugulu huloma huuti, “Olwohuba sindi muhono, sindi ehitundu hyʼomubiri,” ehyo sihigima hwalehera aŋo ohuba hirala hu bitundu hyʼomubiri.
46012016	Era singa ohutwi huloma huuti, “Olwohuba sindi emoni, sindi hitundu hyʼomubiri,” ehyo sihigima hwaleheraŋo ohuba hirala hu bitundu byʼomubiri.
46012017	Singa omubiri gwosigwosi gwali emoni, hani omuutu aŋulira atye? Era singa omubiri gwosigwosi gwali hutwi, hani omuutu atambisa hi ohuŋunyira?
46012018	Mu butuufu, Hatonda gata mu mubiri ebitundu ebyenjabulo, ngʼolu omwene gendire bibe.
46012019	Singa ebitundu byosibyosi byali hitundu hirala, olwo omubiri gwahabaaye guutye?
46012020	Ebitundu biri bingi, aye omubiri guli mulala.
46012021	Emoni siyiŋanga huloma muhono yiiti, “Sikwenda, olwohuba wupumira mugaso.” Era omutwe siguŋanga huloma hugulu ti, “Sikwenda, olwohuba wupumira mugaso.”
46012022	Mu butuufu, ebitundu ebyʼomubiri ebinafu, mbebihira ohuba ebyʼomugaso.
46012023	Era ebitundu ebyʼomubiri ebinafu obugali mbebi baatu bahira ohuŋa eŋono eryʼamaani era babirabirira bulaŋi abaatu ohutabibona olwohuba biŋambya esoni.
46012024	Ebitundu eyʼohu mibiri jeefe ebiboneherera sibyetagisa hubirabirira bugali, aye Hatonda gabiŋimbya ŋalala byosibyosi era ebyo ebi baali ni bataŋa eŋono gahena gabifuula ebyʼeŋono eryʼamaani.
46012025	Ehyo gahihola, ko ŋatabaŋo hweyabulayabulamo mu mubiri, era hiisi hitundu hyʼomubiri hirumirwenga ehyahye.
46012026	Ŋanabaŋo ehitundu hyʼomubiri ehiŋulira obulumi, hiisi hitundu ehiri hu mubiri hiŋulira obulumi. Ehindi banahiŋa eŋono, hiisi hitundu ehiri hu mubiri hisaŋalihisyenga ŋalala nʼehyahye.
46012027	Olwʼehyo, muli mubiri gwa Kurisito, era hiisi mulala hu enywe hitundu hyʼomubiri gugwe.
46012028	Era mu bafugiirira Kurisito, Hatonda gataŋo: abadaayi, abahwenda, abohubiri abanaabbi, obohudatu abasomesa abʼehibono hihye, abahola ebyamaliholiho, abali nʼehirabo ehyʼohuŋonia abalwaye, abo abayeeda abaatu abali mu bigosi, abatangirisi, ko ni naabo abaloma endimi ejenjabulo.
46012029	Hiisi muŋeeresa si muhwenda. Bosibosi si banaabbi. Bosibosi si basomesa. Bosibosi sibahola ebyamaliholiho.
