46012030	Bosibosi sibali nʼehirabo ehyʼohuŋonia abalwaye. Bosibosi sibaloma mu endimi. Era bosibosi sibatafuta endimi.
46012031	Aye muŋembenga bugali hu birabo ebihira obuhulu. Era nja hubalaga engeri ehira ohuba endaŋi.
46013001	Wayire ndoma mu endimi ejʼabaatu nʼeja bamalayika, aye ni puma hwenda, mba hyʼehivuga ehiŋwamo ejanjaasi eritategereheha.
46013002	Wayire mba nʼehirabo ehyʼobunaabbi era nʼohumanya namanya ebyama byosibyosi, era wayire mba nʼamagesi nʼohufugiirira ohugengula esozi, aye nga puma hwenda, mba puma mugaso.
46013003	Wayire paayo ebyange byosibyosi ohuyeeda abagadi, era nʼohweŋaayo Neŋayo ohunjohya omuliro, aye ni puma hwenda, ehyo hiba sihingasa.
46013004	Ohwenda hugumikiriza era huli nʼehisa. Ohwenda huŋuma esaalwa, sihwepaahapaaha, sihwehudumbasa,
46013005	huŋuma ehabyo, sihweyendesa ebiraŋi, huŋuma busungu owamangu mangu, era sihweŋambirira hibi.
46013006	Ohwenda sihusangaalira ebikolwa ebibi, aye husangaalira ebiitu ebituufu.
46013007	Ohwenda hwehaliriha, hugumira ebigosi byosibyosi, sihuleheraŋo hufugiirira ti Hatonda asobola byosibyosi, mu biitu byosibyosi ohwenda huba nʼohusuubira nʼohugumikiriza.
46013008	Ohwenda nihwo sihuhoma. Aye obunabbi bulyola ehiseera bwahoma. Nʼehirabo ehyʼohuloma mu ndimi hija huŋwaŋo, nʼohumanya hwosi huhome aŋo.
46013009	Hino kiroma olwohuba humanyireho bidiidiri era nʼobunaabbi obuhuŋa sihubuhenayo.
46013010	Aye ni hulisuna ebyene nʼebyene, ebindi ebyo birihoma aŋo.
46013011	Ni naali ni kiiri muŋere, nʼalomanga hyʼomuŋere, naŋeeganga hyʼomuŋere era ni mbona ebiitu hyʼomuŋere. Aye ni nahula, nga ebyʼobuŋere mbita ŋala.
46013012	Hatyane hubona biroliroli. Aye ni hulitiina mwigulu, hulibona hiisi hiitu moni hu moni. Sitegeera hiisi hiitu mu wiijufu, aye hu olwo ndimanyira erala byosibyosi bulaŋi, ngʼolu Hatonda gamanyire mu wiijufu.
46013013	Ebiitu biri bidatu ebija husigalaŋo emirembe nʼemirembe; ohufugiirira, nʼohusuubira, nʼohwenda. Aye ohwenda njʼohuhira byosibyosi.
46014001	Olwʼehyo, muhenerenge amaani genywe gosigosi hu hwenda era muŋembenga hu ebirabo ebyʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu, ohuhirira erala ehirabo ehyʼobunaabbi.
46014002	Hino kiroma olwohuba omuutu aloma mu ndimi saaloma nʼabaatu, aye ni Hatonda era ŋaŋuma ategeera ebi aba nʼaloma olwohuba Omwoyo aba njʼomulomya.
46014003	Aye oyo aŋa obunaabbi, agumya, gahubbirisa era gagobosa mu baatu amaani.
46014004	Oyo aloma mu ndimi, omwene gegobosamo amaani. Aye aŋa obunaabbi, agobosa mu abafugiirira Kurisito, amaani.
46014005	Nahendire mwesimwesi mulome mu ndimi. Aye ohuhirira erala, nahendire mwesimwesi muŋe ebyʼobunaabbi olwohuba oyo alomera abaatu obuhwenda bwa Hatonda, ahiraho oyo aloma mu ndimi, ohutusaho nga ŋaliŋo atafuta ohuyeeeda abafugiirira Kurisito ohutegeera ehi aloma.
46014006	Aboluganda, singa niija eyi muli naloma mu ndimi, hiba hyʼomugaso hi? Ohutusaho nga mbalomera ehi Hatonda aba ni gakwehuliiye, oba ohumanya ohwenjabulo oba naaŋa obunaabbi oba nʼabasomesa?
46014007	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, nʼebiitu hyʼomulere oba enanga, singa omuutu saabihubba mu ngeri etegereheha, aŋuliirisa saaŋanga humanya ehi aba ni gemba.
46014008	Era singa bafuuŋa egwala ni balanga abaatu batiine mu lutalo ne ejanjaasi ni litategereheha, njʼani aŋanga ohwetegeha ohuja mu lutalo olwo?
46014009	Mu ngeri njʼenyene ohutusaho ngʼolomire mu lulimi olutegereheha, eŋuma aŋanga ohutegeera ebi oba nʼoloma. Onahola otyo, oba hyʼofuuŋire omuuya mu hisero.
46014010	Wayire hituufu ti ŋaliŋo endimi nyingi hu hyalo huno, ne ŋaŋuma lulimi oluŋuma mahulu.
46014011	Nimba ni tategeera lulimi olu muutu aba naali huloma, hiisi muutu aba mugwira eyiri owahye.
46014012	Kale mwesi, ngʼolu mwegomba ohusuna ebirabo byʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu, mufeeyo bugali ohubona muuti musuna ebirabo ebyemeeresaŋo abafugiirira Kurisito.
46014013	Olwʼehyo, omuutu aloma mu ndimi, asabe amuŋe nʼehirabo ehyʼohujitafutanga.
46014014	Hino kiroma olwohuba nimba ni saba mu ndimi, omwoyo gwange guba guli hu saba, aye ese samwene sitegeera ehi mba ni ndi hu saba.
46014015	Olwo ŋaahani kole hiina? Nja husaba nʼomwoyo gwange, ne nja husaba nʼohutegeera hwosi. Nja hwemba nʼomwoyo gwange, ne nja hwemba nʼohutegeera.
46014016	Singa oba oli hweyaasa Hatonda mu ndimi, oyo atategeera ehi oba nʼoloma aŋanga ohugobolamo ati, “Amiina” nʼoheneresa ohusaba?
46014017	Wayire oŋanga ohuba ti weyaahise Hatonda bulaŋi bwene, aye oyo atamanyire lulimi olwo, saaganyulwamo.
46014018	Neyaasa Hatonda olwohuba ndoma mu ndimi ohubahira mwesimwesi.
46014019	Aye hiraŋi mu luhumbaano lwʼabafugiirira Kurisito, ndome ebibono bitaanu mu lulimi olu baatu bategeera ohuhira olu ndoma ebibono omutwalo mu lulimi olu batategeera.
46014020	Aboluganda, mutaŋeeganga hyʼabaana abaŋere. Aye mu bikolwa ebibi, mube hyʼabaana abaŋere, ne muŋangale mu biŋeego.
46014021	Mu hyaŋandiihiwa, Hatonda Musengwa aloma ati, “Nditambisa abaatu abaloma endimi eji batamanyire, ohulabula abaatu bange, aye sibaliŋulira.”
46014022	Olwʼehyo, ohuloma mu ndimi sihabonero eyiri abafugiirira Kurisito ahohubasalira omusango, aye habonero eyiri abatafugiirira Kurisito. Obunaabbi habonero ohuŋwa eyiri Hatonda ohulaga abafugiirira Kurisito ati ali ŋalala ni nabo.
46014023	Singa abafugiirira Kurisito muhumbaana, hiisi muutu gatandiha huloma mu ndimi, ngʼabatategeera ehi muloma oba abatafugiirira Kurisito baaja mu luhumbaana olwo, sibaja huloma baati muli balalu?
46014024	Aye singa atafugiirira Kurisito oba atategeera ehi muba ni muli huloma gaaja ngʼagagaana mwesimwesi ni muli huŋa obunaabbi, ehyo hija humulumirisa ebibi bibye, gesalire omusango omwene,
46014025	Hatonda aja huta ebyama bibye aŋalafu. Olwʼehyo, aja huhubba amafuha ajumirye Hatonda nʼaloma ati, “Hituufu, Hatonda ali ni nenywe.”
46014026	Aboluganda, hulome hi? Ni muhumbaananga ŋalala ohujumirya Hatonda, owʼolwembo, ali nʼehyohusomesa abahye, ali nʼobuhwenda obu Hatonda amuŋaaye aleete, ali nʼehirabo ehyʼohuloma mu ndimi nʼowundi ali nʼehirabo ehyʼohutafuta, atafute. Ebyo byosibyosi mubiholenga olwʼohwemeresaŋo abafugiirira Kurisito.
46014027	Ŋanabaŋo abaloma mu ndimi, babe babiri oba badatu, ne ni baloma mu lubu era ŋabeŋo atafuta.
46014028	Ne ni muhumbeene, ŋanaŋumaŋo atafuta, aloma mu ndimi, aŋoleere huŋoleera ohutusaho alomenga ni Hatonda.
46014029	Abanaabbi babiri oba badatu baŋe obunaabbi bwawe, ne abasigaaye babe nga bawehenenya.
46014030	Aye singa mulala hu behaaye asuna obuhwenda ohuŋwa eyiri Hatonda, oyo abaaye nʼaloma, aŋolerenga ola yeesi galoma.
46014031	Mwesimwesi musobola ohuloma mu lubu, ohusomesa nʼohugobosa mu hiisi muutu amaani.
46014032	Abo abasuna ehirabo ehyʼobunaabbi, beŋugenga mu ndoma yaawe,
46014033	olwohuba Hatonda siwahifagaato aye aleeta emiyaaya. Ngʼolu hiri mu bibbubbu byʼabafugiirira Kurisito
46014034	abahasi baŋoleerenga huŋoleera ni muhumbeene. Sibabafugiirira huloma, aye baŋoleranga huŋolera ngʼolu magambi gʼEhiyudaaya gabaloma.
46014035	Ni ŋabaŋo ehi benda ohumanya, babuusenga abawamwawe ni bali engo, olwohuba hya soni omuhasi ohuloma mu luhumbaano lwʼabafugiirira Kurisito.
46014036	Obuhwenda obuŋamba hu Hatonda, siwatandiihira ewenywe, era si ndinywe mweŋene omwabusuna.
46014037	Ni ŋabaŋo omuutu aŋeega ati naabbi oba ati ali nʼehirabo hyʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu, ategeere ati ebi mbaŋandiihira, biragiro bya Musengwa.
46014038	Singa saafayo ohubiŋira ngʼebihulu, yeesi sibalimufaho.
46014039	Olwʼehyo, aboluganda mwegombenga bugali ohuŋa obunaabbi, aye mutagananga huloma mu ndimi.
46014040	Aye hiisi hiitu muhiholenga mu kola endaŋi era enduŋamu.
46015001	Aboluganda, mbahebulisa hu biŋamba hu Maŋuliro Amalaŋi aga nabalomera mwafugiirira era njʼomusingi gwenywe.
46015002	Amaŋuliro ago gabanoŋola singa mweyongera ohugafugiirira. Hanye si cʼehyo, mwafugiirira wereere.
46015003	Ehihulu hiri ti obuhwenda obwomugaso obu nasuna mbobu keesi nabalomera ti: Kurisito gaafa olwʼebibi byefe ngʼolu byaŋandiihiwa biroma.
46015004	Era ti bamusiiha, bamulamusa hu ludaalo olwohudatu ngʼolu byaŋandiihiwa.
46015005	Ni bamulamusa, gabonehera Peetero ngʼoluvanyuma abonehera abahwenda ehumi nʼababiri bosibosi.
46015006	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, gabonehera abaloobera babe abatuuma mu ebihumi bitaanu, bosibosi ni bali ŋalala. Abahira obungi hu bo bahiiri balamu, wayire nga abandi baŋooye ohufa.
46015007	Ngʼaŋo abonehera Yakobbo, oluvanyuma ngʼabonehera abahwenda bosibosi.
46015008	Ni gahena ohubonehera abo bosibosi, keesi gambonehera, wayire nga ndi hyʼomwana oyu basaala ehiseera ni hihiiri ohwola.
46015009	Ndiise asembayo ohuba owʼomugaso mu bahwenda era sipoomera nʼohunanga omuhwenda, olwohuba nahiyaanianga abafugiirira Kurisito.
46015010	Aye ndi ehi ndi olwʼehisasabirisi hya Hatonda era ehisasabirisi ehi gapambira sihyali hyawereere. Nafululuhana bugali ohuhiraho abahwenda abandi bosibosi, aye nga si ndiise owahola ebyo, ne nje Hatonda owaapa amaani olwʼehisasabirisi hihye.
46015011	Oba ndiise oba abahwenda abandi babuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi, ago njʼaga hwesihwesi hubuulira era njʼagamufugiirira.
46015012	Aye hanye hubuulira huuti Hatonda galamusa Kurisito, lwahiina abandi hu enywe muloma muuti ŋaŋumaŋo hulamuha?
46015013	Ni ŋaba ni ŋaŋumaŋo hulamuha, hitegeesa hiiti ni Kurisito yeesi sibamulamusa.
46015014	Ni baba ni batalamusa Kurisito, ohubuulira hwʼefe era nʼohufugiirira hwenywe, huŋuma mahulu.
46015015	Era hiba hitegeesa hiiti huloma bya budulingi hu Hatonda, olwohuba hwabuulira huuti Hatonda galamusa Kurisito oyu atalamusa, hinaba ni hiri hituufu ti eŋuma hulamuha.
46015016	Era hanye eŋuma hulamuha, ehyo hitegeesa hiiti ni Kurisito sibamulamusa.
46015017	Ni baba ni batalamusa Kurisito, ohufugiirira hwenywe huba huŋuma mahulu era muhiiri mu bibi byenywe.
46015018	Ni naabo abaafa ni bafugiirira Kurisito ngʼOmunoŋosi waawe, bali mu husihiiriha.
46015019	Ni huba ni husuubira Kurisito ohutunoŋola mu bulamu obwohu hyalo huno bwoŋene, husaasirwa ohuhiraho abaatu bosibosi olwohuba ehyo hiba hitegeesa hiiti huli huhena biseera byefe.
46015020	Aye ehituufu hiri ti baalamusa Kurisito, ehihahasa hiiti ni naabo abaafa, balibalamusa.
46015021	Ngʼolu ohufa hwaja olwʼehibi ehi muutu gaahola, mu ngeri njʼenyene abaatu balamuha olwʼehi omuutu gaahola.
46015022	Ngʼolu ohufa hwaja olwʼehibi hyʼAdamu, mu ngeri njʼenyene bosibosi baliramuha olwa Kurisito.
46015023	Aye abafu baja hulamuha mu biseera byawe. Hatonda gasooka hulamusa Kurisito, oluvanyuma lwʼohuuja huhwe, abamufugiirira bosibosi baliramuha.
46015024	Kurisito nʼahenire ohusihiirisa abanamaani bosibosi, aliŋambya Hatonda obuŋugi nga ko ekomerero yʼehyalo yoola.
46015025	Kurisito ali nʼohuŋuga ohwola olu aliŋangula abalabe babe bosibosi.
46015026	Ohufa njʼomulabe oyu alisembyayo ohusihiirisa.
46015027	Hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Gamuŋa obuŋangi ohuŋuga hiisi hiitu.” Aye ni hiroma hu biitu byosibyosi, sihiŋiriramo ni Hatonda, owaŋa Kurisito obuŋangi hu biitu byosibyosi.
46015028	Nʼalihena ohuta ebiitu byosibyosi ŋaasi wʼobuŋangi bwa Kurisito, olwo Kurisito Omwana omwene yeesi alyeta ŋaasi wʼobuŋangi bwa Hatonda owʼamuŋa ohuŋuga byosi. Hatonda ko aŋugire erala ebiitu byosibyosi.
46015029	Ŋaahani ni ŋaba ni ŋaŋuma hulamuha, abaatu abababatiza hu lwʼabafu basuubira hwoheresa hi? Era ni ŋaba ni ŋaŋuma hulamuha, lwahiina babatiza abaatu abalamu hu lwʼabafu?
46015030	Era lwahiina efe hweta mu bigosi hiisi hiseera?
46015031	Aboluganda, ese nolehera ohufa hiisi ludaalo, ohwenyumiirisa ohu ndi ni nahwo olwenywe mu Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito hundeetera ohuloma hino.
46015032	Ohuŋiriŋana ohunaŋiriŋana nʼabaatu abali oti esolo mu Efeeso, hwamahulu hi? Ni ŋaba ni ŋaŋuma hulamuha, ngʼolu endoma yiri, “Leha hulye era hunywe, olwohuba hwefiira ehiseera hyosihyosi.”
46015033	Simwihirisanga hubabbaamya, olwohuba emihago emibi jonoona esambo endaŋi.
46015034	Mwegoboleho, mulehere aŋo ohwonoona, olwohuba abandi hu enywe simumanyire Hatonda era hino kiroma hubaŋambya soni.
46015035	Nga Pawulo geyongera aloma ati, “Aye omuutu aŋanga ohubuusa ati, ‘Abafu balamuha baatye?’ Era ati, ‘Baliba nʼomubiri gwa ngeri hi?’ ”
46015036	Musiru ewe! Ahamo sihaŋanga huhula ohutusaho nga hacuuhire haba oti hafu.
46015037	Era mu eroŋo soodanyamo ehimera ehyahula ahale ohutusaho ahamo, haŋangire ohuba hʼengaano oba ehiitu ehindi.
46015038	Aye Hatonda aŋa ahamo aho ekula yaho ngʼolu aba nʼasiimire, era hiisi hiha hyʼahamo ahiŋa ekula yahyo.
46015039	Ekula yʼebiitu byosibyosi siyifaanana. Abaatu bali nʼomubiri ogwenjabulo hu gwʼebisolo, enyuni jʼaba nʼogwajo era nʼenyeeni joosi jiri nʼogwajo.
46015040	Ŋaliŋo emibiri ejomwigulu, nʼemibiri ejʼohu hyalo huno. Aye obuŋoono bwʼemibiri ejomwigulu bwabuhana hu buŋoono bwʼemibiri jʼohu hyalo.
46015041	Eryuba liri nʼobuŋoono bwalyo, obuŋoono bwʼomwesi bwosi wenjabulo hu wʼemunyeenye. Era nʼomu munyeenye ejo mulimo enjabulo.
46015042	Era pohiri hiityo nʼohulamuha hwʼabafu. Omubiri bagusiiha ni guli gwahubola, aye bagulamusa ni gutali gwahubola.
46015043	Bagusiiha ni guŋuma eŋono aye bagulamusa ni guli nʼeŋono, bagusiiha ni guli munafu, aye bagulamusa ni guli gwʼamaani.
46015044	Bagusiiha ni guli mubiri bubiri aye bagulamusa ni guli gʼOmwoyo. Ni ŋaba ni ŋaliŋo omubiri bubiri, ŋaba ŋaliŋo nʼomubiri ogwʼomwoyo.
46015045	Olwʼehyo hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Adamu omudaayi gafuuha mulamu.” Aye Adamu owʼoluvanyuma Mwoyo omulamu.
46015046	Omubiri ogwabulijo gweherera ohuuja nga ko Omwoyo aleeta obulamu, gaaja.
46015047	Omuutu owasooka gaŋwa mu eroba, aye owohubiri gaŋwa mwigulu.
46015048	Ngʼolu omuutu oyu bawumba mu eroba gaali, baatyo pobali nʼabaatu abohu hyalo. Era ngʼolu muutu owaŋwa mwigulu ali, ni nabo abomu mwigulu pobali.
46015049	Ngʼolu hufaanana omuutu ola oyu babwumba mwiroba, pʼolu hulifaana ni nooyo owaŋwa mwigulu.
46015050	Aboluganda, mbalomera ti omubiri nʼamafugi sibiŋanga hwingira mu Buŋugi bwa Hatonda, nʼomubiri ogufa siguŋanga huba ogutafa.
46015051	Mbalomera ehyama; sihulifa hwesihwesi hwaŋwaŋo aye hwesihwesi hulicuusiwa
46015052	mu dakiika ndala hyʼohumoga hwʼemoni olu balifuuŋa egwala olusembayo, baliramusa abafu era balyambala omubiri ogutalifa aye efe ohuliba ni huhiiriŋo balamu, hulicuusiwa.
46015053	Omubiri guno ogufa guli nʼohufuuha ogutalibola.
46015054	Omubiri guno ogufa ni gulifuuha ogutalibola, ngʼaŋo ebyaŋandiihiwa byolerera ebiroma biiti; “Obuŋangusi bwa Hatonda bumirire ohufa.”
46015055	“Hufa ewe, obuŋangusi buwo buliŋe? “Hufa ewe, amaani gago agagima abaatu balumwa, galiŋe?”
46015056	Ehibi njʼehigima ohufa ni huleetera abaatu obusiba era nʼamaani gʼehibi gaŋwa mu magambi aga baŋa Musa.
46015057	Aye hweyaasa Hatonda olwohuba agima hwaŋangula ehibi hulwa Yesu Kurisito Musengwa yeefe.
46015058	Olwʼehyo, aboluganda abahoda mube bagumu era ŋaŋume ehibaŋigula. Mweŋereyo erala ohuŋeeresa Musengwa, olwohuba mumanyire muuti ohuhalabana hwenywe sihwawereere.
46016001	Ŋaahani ebiŋamba hu husoloosa obuyeedi ohuŋirira abaatu ba Hatonda abali e Yerusaalemu, muhole ngʼolu naloma ebibbubbu byʼabafugiirira Kurisito ebyʼe Galatiya.
46016002	Hu ludaalo oludaayi mu wiiki, hiisi muutu hu enywe abeho nʼehyatanga hutulo ni geema hu suna yiye, ko ŋaŋume husoloosa ebbeesa ni niijire.
46016003	Ni nahaaje, njahuŋa abaatu abamunahangale ebbaluŋa ni mbanjulayo baŋirire abafugiirira Kurisito mu Yerusaalemu obuyeedi obwo.
46016004	Ni hinahabe ni hinetaagisa ohutiiniraho, hulitiina.
46016005	Oluvanyuma lwʼohubitira mu twale lyʼe Makedoniya, nja huuja mbaboneho. Hino kiroma olwohuba njahubitira e Makedoniya.
46016006	Soomanya panga ohubaho ni nenywe ohwola olu biseera byʼobuŋololohi obubitiirifu biriŋwaho mwahapaho obuyeedi ko neyongerayo nʼolugendo lwange.
46016007	Sinenda huuja eyo ohubabonaho ŋadiidiri ehiseera ehyo ni mbita hubita. Suubira ohuhena ni nenywe ahamanga ahaŋeraho, Musengwa nʼaliba ni gendire.
46016008	Aye njahuba mu Efeeso ohwola hu ludaalo lwa Petekoote,
46016009	olwohuba Hatonda ganjiguliraŋo olwigi mu Efeeso ohubuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi wayire nga bangi bapahania.
46016010	Temuseewo nʼaliija, mufubeho ohubona muuti siŋabaŋo hiitu hyosihyosi ehimuleetera ohutya nʼali ni nenywe olwohuba yeesi aŋeeresa Musengwa, hyʼese.
46016011	Olwʼehyo ŋatabaŋo muutu yesiyesi amutalirisa aye mumuyeede mu lugendo lulwe ohugobola eno era musuubira ohugobola nʼaboluganda abandi.
46016012	Ebiŋamba hu muganda yeefe Apolo, namuhubbirisa bugali ohuuja eyo nʼaboluganda. Gaali sigenda, ne anahaaje nafunire ehiseera.
46016013	Mwegenderesenga era mwegumye ohwema nʼamagulu abiri mu hufugiirira hwenywe, mube basira era abʼamaani.
46016014	Hiisi hiitu muhiholenga muhwendana.
46016015	Aboluganda, muhimanyire muuti abaatu bomu mago ga Sitefanaasi njʼabeheerera ohufugiirira Kurisito mu twale lyʼAkaya, era beeŋayo ohuŋeeresanga abagwalaafu ba Hatonda. Kale mbahubbirisa
46016016	mugonderenga abaatu hyʼabo era ni naabo abaholera ŋalala ni nabo.
46016017	Naali musangaafu olwʼohuuja hwa Sitefanaasi ni Forutunaato nʼAkayiko. Hino kiroma olwohuba babaaye baapa obuyeedi obu enywe mwahapaaye ni muliŋo.
46016018	Era bangobohisemo amaani ngʼolu babagobosamo mwesi ni babalomera ebifa eno. Muŋenga abaatu hyʼabo eŋono.
46016019	Ebibbubbu byʼabafugiirira Kurisito ebyomu twale lyʼAsiya, bibahehiise. Akwila nʼomuhasi wuwe Pulisikira, ŋalala nʼabafugiirira Kurisito abahumbaanira mu mago gaawe, babahehiise bugali mu siina lya Musengwa.
46016020	Aboluganda bosibosi eno, babahehiiseho. Hiisi muutu aheese owahye mu keesa eyʼabaatu abagwalaafu.
46016021	Ese Pawulo samwene mbaŋandiihire obuheese buno nʼomuhono gwange.
46016022	Ni ŋaba ni ŋaliŋo omuutu yesiyesi atenda Musengwa, oyo muŋwabe. Musengwa, hola ogobole.
46016023	Ehisasabirisi hya Yesu Kurisito Musengwa yeefe, hibe ni nenywe.
46016024	Hulwa Yesu Kurisito, mbenda mwesimwesi. Amiina.
47001001	Ndiise Pawulo, owafuuha omuhwenda wa Yesu Kurisito, olwʼohusiima hwa Hatonda ni ndi nʼomulebe Temuseewo, hubaŋandiihira enywe ehibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira Kurisito mu hibuga Koriiso, ni naabo bosibosi abali hiisi ŋaatu mu twale lyʼAkaya.
47001002	Hatonda seefe ni Musengwa Yesu Kurisito, babaŋambire ehisasabirisi era babaŋe emiyaaya.
47001003	Hujumirye Hatonda era Semwana ya Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito, Seefe oyo owʼehisa era Hatonda agumya abaatu.
47001004	Oyo njʼatugumya ni huli mu bigosi ebya hiisi ngeri, hwesi ko hwasobola ohugumya abo ababa ni bali mu bigosi.
47001005	Hino kiroma olwohuba eyi huhomya ohubonaabona ngʼolu Kurisito gabonaabona, peyi Hatonda ahomya ohutugumya nʼabita mu Kurisito.
47001006	Ohubonaabona hwʼefe hwahubaleetera ndinywe ohuba bagumu mu hufugiiirira era ehyo hibaŋweramo ohunoŋoha. Hatonda nʼatugumya, mwesi hibaŋa obugumu mwaŋanga ohugumira ebigosi ngʼolu efe hubigumira.
47001007	Olwʼehyo, hubalimo esuubi eryʼamaani era humanyire huuti muja hugumira ebigosi hyefe, olwohuba mwesi Hatonda aja hubagumya ngʼolu atugumya efe.
47001008	Aboluganda, hwahendire mumanye ohubonaabona ohuhwabitamo ni huli mu twale lyʼAsiya. Batugudya ehibitiriiye era hwaŋwamo nʼesuubi eryʼohuba abalamu.
47001009	Mu butuufu hyali oti hani batusaliiye ogwʼohufa. Era ehyo hyatusomesa ohutesiga amaani geefe, aye ohwesiga Hatonda yeŋene alamusa abafu.
47001010	Hatonda owatuŋonia ehigosi hyʼehyo, husuubira huuti aja hweyongera ohutuŋonianga ebindi. Era esuubi lyʼefe liri mu mwene oyo.
47001011	Olwʼehyo, hubasunga mutusabire era olwʼesaala jʼabaatu abangi Hatonda alituŋa ekabi hyahena hyaleetera abaatu bangi ohumweyaasa hu lwefe.
47001012	Aboluganda, ehituleetera ohwepaaha hiri ti mu myoyo jeefe huŋulira huuti enebisya yeefe mu baatu nʼohuhirira erala mu kolagana yeefe ni nenywe, hubaaye bʼamazima eyi muli olwʼamaani ga Hatonda.
47001013	Era sihuŋanga hubaŋandiihira ehiitu ehimutaŋanga ohusoma mwategeera. Era suubira ti
47001014	wayire simututegeera bulaŋi, ehiseera hiryola mwatutegeerera erala bulaŋi, ehyo hibaleetere ohutwenyumirisamo ngʼolu hwesi hulibenyumirihisamo hu ludaalo olu Yesu Musengwa aligobola ohusala emisango.
47001015	Era olwohuba nahitegeera, nategeha ohusookera eyo ko mwahaganyulwamo habiri.
47001016	Nategeha ohubahyalira ni tiina e Makedoniya, era mu hugobola nindi mbaboneho mupeho obuyeedi ni tiina e Buyudaaya.
47001017	Olwo, olwʼohusalamo olugendo olwo, ŋaahani muŋeega muuti sinoheresa ehi mba ni ndomire? Era muŋeega muuti ekola yange yitiinira hu yʼabaatu abatafugiirira Kurisito abaloma baati, “Naahole,” aye ŋabitaŋo ahaseera hatotono nga baloma baati, “Sinaahole?”
47001018	Aye ngʼolu Hatonda ali wʼamazima, obuhwenda weefe eyi muli bubulamo hwefudula.
47001019	Hino kiroma olwohuba Yesu Kurisito, Omwana wa Hatonda oyu ese ni Silaasi ni Temuseewo hwabalomera ebimuŋambaho, sigefudula. Aye niye hiisi ehi aloma, ahiroma nʼomwoyo mulala.
47001020	Hiisi ehi Hatonda gasuubisa, Kurisito gahyoheresa. Era hwesi mu huŋa Hatonda eŋono nga hutaaho enjihiso huuti, “Amiina,” ni hubita mu Kurisito omwene oyo.
47001021	Hatonda njʼagima efe ni nenywe hwemerera nʼamagulu abiri mu hufugiirira Kurisito. Era Hatonda gatujuhaho amafuta,
47001022	gatutaaho ahabonero ohulaga ati huli babe era gatuŋa Omwoyo wuwe ngʼomusingo ohulaga ati alituŋa ehi gasuubisa.
47001023	Mu moni ja Hatonda ehi mbaloma njʼamazima ti ehyagima ndiniija eyo e Koriiso, hyali hyahubasaasira mutalumwa myoyo ni mbanenya.
47001024	Sinenda efe hube ndiife ohubalomera engeri eyi muli nʼohufugiiriramo Kurisito aye huholera ŋalala ni nenywe ko mube basangaafu era muŋangale mu hufugiirira hwenywe.
47002001	Kale nasalaŋo ohutagobola eyo, olwohuba ohuuja hwange hwahabaŋwereyemo ohubanakuŋasa nindi.
47002002	Hino kiroma olwohuba singa mba ndiise abanakuŋasa, njʼani aja husangaasa ohutusaho enywe aba mba ni nakuŋahiise?
47002003	Ehyo cʼehyagima nabaŋandiihira, ni tenda niije eyo mbanakuŋase ate nga muli nʼohusangaasa. Nehahasa ti ehisangaasa, hibasangaasa ni nenywe mwesi.
47002004	Ni nabaŋandiihira ebbaluŋa eyo naali nʼenaku hu mwoyo era nʼamasiga ni ganjituluha. Ehigendererwa hyʼohubaŋandiihira sihyali hubanakuŋasa, aye nendire hubalaga ngʼolu mbenda bugali.
47002005	Hanye ŋaliŋo owasobya hu wahye gabaleetera ohunakuŋala, sigasinga hunakuŋasa ndiise, aye gasinga hunakuŋasa ninywe mwesimwesi.
47002006	Ehibonereso ehi bangi hu enywe mwamuŋa, himuhena.
47002007	Ŋaahani mumusoniŋe era mumugumye, ko enaku etamuŋamba gahanda gaŋwamo amaani mu hufugiirira.
47002008	Mbasunga mumulage muuti muhimwenda.
47002009	Era ehigendererwa hyʼohubaŋandiihira, nendire hubona oba mugondera hiisi ehi mbaloma.
47002010	Munasoniŋa omuutu yesiyesi, keesi musoniŋa. Ni ŋaba ni ŋaliŋo ehyʼohumusoniŋa, hu lwenywe nahena ohumusoniŋa era mu hino Kurisito njʼomujulizi wange. Ŋanabaŋo oyu mba ni soniŋire, mba musoniŋire.
47002011	Ehyo kihola olwʼohutenda Sitaani hutuhema olwohuba humanyire ebigendererwa bibye.
47002012	Ni natiina e Turoowa ohulomera abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu Kurisito, Musengwa gaali ganjiguliyeeŋo engira ohubuulirayo.
47002013	Aye mu mwoyo gwange sihyambisya bulaŋi ohutagaanayo owʼoluganda Tito. Era ehyo hyagima nabaseebula nʼatiina e Makedoniya.
47002014	Cooka hweyaasa Hatonda atuleetera ohuŋangula habuhyabuhya hulwa Kurisito era atutambisa ohusasaania Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu Kurisito agali hyʼamafuta agʼahaloosa hwagoosa hu hiisi muutu.
47002015	Hino kiroma olwohuba huli hyʼolusyololo oluŋunya obulaŋi ohuŋwa mu ŋongo eyi Kurisito aŋonga eyiri Hatonda ni ŋunyira abo abanoŋoha ko ni naabo abali hutiina mu husihiiriha.
47002016	Eyiri abo abatiina mu husihiiriha, huŋunya hyʼolumbe, aye eyiri abo abanoŋoha huli hyʼahasyololo ahalaŋi ahaleeta obulamu. Olwo ŋaahani njʼani amwegerageraniaho ohuhola omulimo hyʼogwo?
47002017	Efe sihuli hyʼabaatu abandi abatambisa ehibono hya Hatonda mu ngeri ecaamu olwʼohwenda ohusuna obuŋinda. Aye efe mu Kurisito huloma amazima olwohuba Hatonda njʼowatutuma.
47003001	Olwo hunaloma huutyo, huba huli hwepaaha? Oba hwesi hwenda ebbaluŋa ejitulomaho ebiraŋi eyi muli oba ohuŋwa eyi muli hyʼabaatu abandi?
47003002	Hino kiroma olwohuba enywe mwabeene muli hyʼebbaluŋa etusemba eyi baŋandiiha hu myoyo jeefe eyi hiisi muutu amanyire era eyi aŋanga ohusoma.
47003003	Hiisi muutu abona engeri eyi mufugiiriramo Kurisito, ahahasa ati muli Bbaluŋa. Ebbaluŋa eyibataŋandiiha ni wiino aye nʼOmwoyo wa Hatonda Omulamu. Etaŋandiihiwa hu bipande byʼamabaale aye hu myoyo jʼabaatu.
47003004	Ehyo kiroma olwʼobwesige obuhuli ni nabwo mu Hatonda ni hubita mu Kurisito.
47003005	Sihuloma huuti ndiife abamanyi aye obumanyi bwefe buŋwa yiri Hatonda.
47003006	Era njʼowatufuula abaŋeeresa abʼendagaano yiye epyaha abatali ŋaasi wʼamagambi aga baŋa Musa aye abʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu. Hino kiroma olwohuba amagambi galeetera abaatu ohubasalira ogwʼohufa, aye Omwoyo wa Hatonda agima baaba nʼobulamu.
47003007	Obanga amagambi agaleetera abaatu ohubasalira ogwʼohufu gaaja nʼeŋono eryʼamaani era hyaleetera Abayisirayiri ohutasobola huheja Musa mu moni ate nga eŋono eryo lyali lyahaseera buseera,
47003008	olwo obuŋeeresa bwʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu sibuhiraho aŋo eŋono?
47003009	Obanga amagambi agaleetera abaatu ohubasalira ogwʼohufa gaaja nʼeŋono, olwo obuŋeeresa obuleetera abaatu ohuba bagwalaafu sibulihiraho aŋo eŋono?
47003010	Olwʼehyo ehyo ehi baatu baŋanga eŋono eryo eryʼamaani sihihiri nʼeŋono olwohuba hira hiri nʼeŋono ohuhihira.
47003011	Ŋaahani obanga ehyo ehyʼehiseera buseera hyaja nʼeŋono, olwo hira ehyʼoluberera sihirihiraho aŋo eŋono?
47003012	Olwʼehyo, ngʼolu huli nʼesuubi eryo, husigala ni huli bagumu.
47003013	Sihuli hya Musa owewihiriranga olugoye Abayisirayiri batabona humeregenya hwomu moni wuwe ni humuŋwaho.
47003014	Cooka nʼohwola olwa leero luno nibo bahisiriŋaliiye ohwo olwohuba ni basoma amagambi aga baŋa Musa, basigala ni batafaania olwohuba Kurisito njʼeyeŋene awihula abaatu emoni ko bafaania.
47003015	Nʼohwola olwa leero luno ni basoma amagambi aga baŋa Musa, sibagategeera olwohuba ehyabawiiha emyoyo jaawe hihiiri hubawijuhaho.
47003016	Aye hiisi ocuuha gafugiirira Musengwa, amuwihula emoni ko gafaania ehituufu.
47003017	Musengwa Mwoyo era Omwoyo wa Musengwa aŋa aba, aleeta edembe.
47003018	Ŋaahani balabe, efe hwesihwesi aba Musengwa gawihula emoni hwafaania, huli nʼohulaga eŋono lirye era habuhyabuhya hucuusiwenga ohumufaanana olwʼeŋono eryo eriija eyi huli mu maani gʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu.
47004001	Hatonda njʼowatulanga olwʼehisa hihye gaatuŋa obuŋeeresa buno. Olwʼehyo, sihuŋanga huŋwamo maani ohuhola omulimo guno.
47004002	Hwasalaŋo ohutahola ebiitu ebyʼesoni ebi baatu bahola mu ngiso, era sihutambisa bubi ehibono hya Hatonda olwʼohweyendulira ebyefe. Wabula hulomera abaatu amazima mu moni ja Hatonda era hiisi muutu amanyire hiina ehi huli.
47004003	Ne ni hiba ti Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi aga hubuulira sigategereheha, sigategereheha eyiri mbabo abatiina mu husihiiriha.
47004004	Sigategereheha eyi bali olwohuba Sitaani gabasiriŋasa, gabawiha emoni ohutabona enjase eyʼAmaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu eŋono lya Kurisito owoleha ehi Hatonda ali.
47004005	Hino kiroma olwohuba sihubuulira ebituŋambaho aye hubuulira ebiŋamba hu nje Yesu Kurisito nga Musengwa nʼohweromaho huuti huli baŋeeresa benywe hu lulwe.
47004006	Hino huhihola olwohuba Hatonda owaloma ati, “Leha ŋabeŋo enjase yaaduhe mu hiirema,” galagira enjase ohwaduha mu myoyo jeefe husobole ohutegeera huuti eŋono lirye libonehera mu Kurisito.
47004007	Aye ehyʼobuŋinda ehyo hiri mu ndiife ohuli hyʼembya ejʼeroba. Ehyo hiri hiityo olwʼohwenda ohulaga ti Hatonda njʼomwene buŋangi sosi efe.
47004008	Hwosa ehiseera ebigosi byatunyigirisa eyi ni neyi, aye sibituhenamo maani. Era wayire ebiitu bituhehera, sihuŋwamo suubi.
47004009	Batuhiyaania aye Hatonda satulehurira, batunyigirisa aye sibatusihiirisa.
47004010	Hiisi aŋa huja, hugenda olumbe olweta Yesu ni lutulengereeye, obulamu buwe bubonehere mu mibiri jeefe.
47004011	Hino kiroma olwohuba wayire huli balamu hiisi ludaalo hubita mu meeno ga nasaŋa hulwa Yesu obulamu buwe bubonehere mu mibiri jeefe ejifa.
47004012	Olwʼehyo, efe ohufa hutulengereeye, ko enywe musobole ohusuna obulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
47004013	Baloma mu Byaŋandiihiwa baati, “Nafugiirira, cʼehigima naloma.” Hwesi mu engeri njʼenyene ohufugiirira hwʼefe njʼohugima hwaloma,
47004014	olwohuba humanyire huuti Hatonda owalamusa Yesu Musengwa, hwesi aja hutulamusa ngʼolu gamulamusa era alitwanjulayo efe ni nenywe mu moni ja Hatonda.
47004015	Ale ni muhimanye muuti ndinywe omugima ni hubonaabona, ko ehisa hya Hatonda hyeyongere ohusasaana mu baatu, boosi beyongere ohumwebasa nʼohumuŋa eŋono.
47004016	Olwʼehyo, wayire emibiri jeefe jitiina ni jiseseŋa, sihuŋwamo maani, olwohuba habuhyabuhya obulamu bwefe obwʼomwoyo Hatonda abugobosa bunyaaha.
47004017	Sihuŋwamo maani olwohuba ebiguudyo ebi huli hubitamo bididiri era bya hiseera buseera, sibyolana nʼeŋono eritaŋwaŋo erihulisuna olwʼohubigumira.
47004018	Olwʼehyo ebiŋeego byefe hubitenga hu biitu ebitaboneha sosi ebiboneha. Hino kiroma olwohuba ebiitu ebi hubona nʼemoni jeefe bya hiseera buseera, aye ebyo ebitaboneha byahubaŋo emirembe nʼemirembe.
47005001	Humanyire huuti emibiri jeefe ejʼohuhyalo jiri hyʼeweema eyi bataŋo bahena batusaŋo. Era ni hulifa, Hatonda alituŋa emibiri ejindi mwigulu ejo ni jiri hyʼenyumba eyʼoluberera etaŋwaŋo, eyi Hatonda omwene alitongola sosi abaatu.
47005002	Ne ni huhiiri mu mubiri guno hwesunga era huŋemba ohwambala emibiri ejomwigulu,
47005003	olwohuba singa Hatonda atwambasa emibiri ejo sibaja hutwagaana ni huli wereere.
47005004	Hino kiroma olwohuba ni huhiiri mu mubiri guno, hubinda olwʼobulumi olwohuba sihwenda batwambule aye batwambase ehyambalo ehyo ehyomwigulu; omubiri ogwo ogutafa gumire guno ogufa.
47005005	Ehyo Hatonda omwene gahena ohuhitegeha era gatuŋa Omwoyo Omutukuvu ohuba ahabonero eyi huli ohuhahasa ati ehyo hiribaŋo.
47005006	Olwʼehyo, ehituŋa obugumu habuhyabuhya hiiri ti humanyire huuti ni huhiiri mu mubiri guno sihuŋanga huba yingo eyiri Musengwa.
47005007	Era hu hyalo huno hubaaho ni hwesiga Hatonda olwʼebiitu ebi gatusuubisa, wayire sihubibona nʼemoni.
47005008	Olwʼehyo huli bagumu ne ehihwahasingire ohwenda njʼohuŋwa mu mubiri guno hutiine hube ni Musengwa.
47005009	Kale hwefaaho ohusangaasa Musengwa hahibe ti huhiiri mu mubiri guno oba hutiinire eyo eyi husuubira ohutiina.
47005010	Hino kiroma olwohuba hwesihwesi hwenda sihwenda hulyemeerera mu moni ja Kurisito ohutusalira omusango ko hiisi muutu asune ehimusaanira olwʼebiitu ebiraŋi oba ebibi ebi ahola nahiiri mu mubiri guno.
47005011	Olwʼehyo, ngʼolu humanyire huuti hyetagisa ohuŋa Musengwa eŋono, huhubbirisa abaatu bebbwage. Hatonda atumanyire bulaŋi era suubira ti mwesi mu myoyo jenywe mumanyire ehi huli.
47005012	Ne sihuli hugesyaho hweromaho nindi eyi muli aye hwenda mube nehimwemaho ko mwepaahe hu lwefe, era mube nʼehyohulomera abo abepaaha olwʼebiitu ebyʼohumugulu mu hifo hyʼebyo ebyomu mwoyo.
47005013	Ni huba ni huli balalu ngʼolu baloma, huli balalu olwa Hatonda. Ne ni huba ni hutali balalu, ehyo hiyeeda ndinywe.
47005014	Hino kiroma olwohuba ohwenda ohu Kurisito atwendamo njʼohutuŋuga, era hwehahasa huuti ye omulala hu bubwe gafa hu lwʼabaatu bosibosi, era olwʼehyo bosibosi nga baba oti abafuuye.
47005015	Era olwʼohufa huhwe hulwa abaatu bosibosi abo abalamu bali nʼohumanya baati sibalamu hu lwawe aye hu lwʼoyo owabafiiririra gahena galamuha.
47005016	Olwʼehyo, sihuhitambisa magesi agʼobuutu ohutegeera ebifa hu muutu, wayire nga hwatambisanga amagesi gʼobuutu ohumanya ehi Kurisito ali. Ŋaahani humutegeera mu engeri eyindi.
47005017	Olwʼehyo, singa omuutu yesiyesi aba mu Kurisito aba afuuhire hitonde hinyaaha, ebihale biba biŋooyeŋo nʼafuhiire muutu munyaha.
47005018	Ebyo byosibyosi Hatonda owafaaŋana ni neefe nʼabita mu Kurisito njʼabihola. Era gahena gatuŋa obuŋeeresa obwʼohuhubbirisa abaatu abandi boosi bafaaŋane ni naye.
47005019	Ehiri ti Hatonda afaaŋana nʼabaatu bosibosi nʼabita mu Kurisito, aŋaŋuma hubabalira ebibi byawe. Era gaatuŋa obuŋeeresa obwʼohulomera abaatu obuhwenda obuŋamba hu hufaaŋana ohwo.
47005020	Olwʼehyo huli bahwenda ba Kurisito, era Hatonda abahubbira omulanga nʼabita mu hubuulira hwʼefe. Hubegalihira mu esiina lya Kurisito mufaaŋane ni Hatonda.
47005021	Hatonda gaŋayo Kurisito ate nga sigaholaho hibi hyosihyosi ohuba eŋongo olwʼebibi byefe. Era olwʼehyo hunaba bulala ni naye Hatonda atubala ohuba bagwalaafu.
47006001	Ŋaahani ngʼolu Hatonda gatuŋa ohuba abatambi ni naye, hubegalihira ohutatambisa bubi ehisasabirisi ehi gabaŋa.
47006002	Hatonda aloma ati, “Mu hiseera hyange ehituufu nabagobolamo, era hu ludaalo olwʼohunoŋoha nabayeeda.” Era mbalomera ti hino njʼehiseera hya Hatonda, era olwa leero njʼoludaalo olwʼohunoŋoha.
47006003	Sihwahendire hwesitaaza muutu yesiyesi mu bihuhola ko bataŋaha obuŋeeresa bwefe esiro.
47006004	Aye mu hiisi hiitu hulaga huuti huli baŋeeresa ba Hatonda. Olwʼehyo hwehaliiriha bugali ebigosi omuli embeera embi,
47006005	ebihubbe, ohutuboŋa mu komera, abaatu ohutuyabuluhiraho, ohutamba emirimo ejʼamaani, ohutalimba hwiro nʼohuhaya ehyʼohulya.
47006006	Era hulagire huuti huli baŋeeresa ba Hatonda mu nebisya yeefe, mu hulaga huuti hutegeera Hatonda, mu hugumikiriza nʼohuba abʼehyere, nʼomuhuboneha ti amaani gʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu gaholera mu fe era ti ohwenda hwʼefe hubulamo hwehubbira.
47006007	Ni hwongera hu ebyo, hulomera abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi mu maani ga Hatonda. Era hutambisa obugwalaafu ngʼehisoosa mu muhono gwefe omulungi nʼomugooda.
47006008	Ŋaliŋo abatuŋa eŋono abandi batujerega, abatulomaho ebiraŋi abandi ebibi, abatulanga baati huli baŋeeresa abatuufu abandi baati huli badulingi.
47006009	Batuŋira hyʼabaatu aba batamanyire ate nga batumanyire. Batubalira mu bafu aye huli balamu, era batugudya baatwite aye sihufa.
47006010	Wayire batunakuŋasa, husigala ni huli basangaafu. Wayire huboneha hyʼabagadi, huleetera bangi ohuba baŋinda. Wayire huboneha oti huŋuma hiitu hyosihyosi, huli ni hiisi hiitu.
47006011	Enywe abaatu bʼe Koriiso, efe hiisi hiitu huhiromire mu lwatu eyi muli ni ŋaŋuma ehihubagisa.
47006012	Efe hubalagire huuti mutuli hu mwoyo aye enywe mutulagire muuti hubali ŋaleeŋi mu biŋeego byenywe.
47006013	Mbasunga ngʼolu nahasungire abaana bange, mwesi mutulage muuti hubali hu myoyo jenywe.
47006014	Mutaholanga muhumba nʼabatafugiirira Kurisito. Hino kiroma olwohuba ŋaŋuma ehiŋanga ohuŋimba abaatu abahola ebiruŋamu nʼabahosi bʼebibi. Oba kolagana hi eŋanga ohubaŋo ŋagati wʼenjase nʼehiirema?
47006015	Kolagana hi eriŋo ŋagati wa Kurisito ni Sitaani? Hiina ehiŋimba omuutu afugiirira Kurisito nʼatamufugiirira?
47006016	Era kolagana hiina eriŋo ŋagati wa Yekaalu ya Hatonda nʼeyebitali Hatonda? Huli Yekaalu ya Hatonda omulamu. Era Hatonda galoma ati, “Naabenga mu bo era nagendenga ni nabo. Nja huba Hatonda waawe, boosi banaabenga baatu bange.”
47006017	Era Musengwa aloma ati, “Olwʼehyo, mubaŋwemo, mubeyabuleho. Mutaŋambanga hu hiitu ehitali hitukuvu, keesi nja hubasangaalira.”
47006018	“Nja huba Senywe, mwesi muja huba baana bange. Ese Musengwa Omwene Buŋangi, ndiise aloma.”
47007001	Bameeri bange abahoda, ngʼolu batusuubisa ebyo byosibyosi, hulongoose obulamu bwefe hulehe ohuhola ebiitu ebyonoona emibiri nʼemyoyo jeefe, ko husobole ohubeera erala abagwalaafu olwʼohutya Hatonda.
47007002	Bahyange mubeho nʼaŋamututa mu myoyo jenywe. Eŋuma muutu oyu huholangaho ehibi oba oyu hulyakulangaho oba oyu hwebaho.
47007003	Si ndoma hino hubasalira musango. Nahiromaho hale ti mutuli hu myoyo era huli ŋalala mu bulamu nomu hufa.
47007004	Mbesiga bugali era mbenyumirihisamo. Olwʼehyo wayire mbaaye nʼebigosi bingi aye sigaaye ni ndi musangaafu bugali.
47007005	Era ni hwola e Makedoniya, sihwasunaho buŋeerero olwohuba batugudya mu hiisi ngeri era ehiseera cʼehyene ni huŋiriŋana nʼabaatu ko nʼobuti obwali mu myoyo jeefe.
47007006	Aye Hatonda agumya abo abaŋoyemo amaani gatugumya nʼabitira mu huuja hwa Tito nʼaŋwa eyo.
47007007	Ohuuja huhwe sinje ohwatugumya hwoŋene, aye hwasuna obugumu ni gatulomera ngʼolu mwamusangaasa bugali. Tito gatulomera ngʼolu muŋemba ohumbonaho, ngʼolu mwehubba mu hifuba olwʼebyo ebyaliŋo, era ngʼolu mundumirwa bugali. Ebyo byosibyosi byeyongera ohusangaasa.
47007008	Wayire ebbaluŋa eyi nabaŋandiihira yabaleetera ohunakuŋala, sinehebulisa lwahiina nayiŋandiiha. Ne wayire noola ehiseera nehebulisa olwohuba yabanakuŋasa, ehyo hyali hya ahaseera buseera.
47007009	Cooka ŋaahani ndimusangaafu silwohuba ti nabanakuŋasa, olwohuba ohunakuŋala hwenywe hwabaleetera ohwehubba mu hifuba mwenenya. Hwali husiima hwa Hatonda enywe ohunakuŋala, olwʼehyo ŋaŋuma hibi ehi hwabahola.
47007010	Ohwehubba mu hifuba ohu Hatonda asiima hugima omuutu genenya hyamuŋweramo ohunoŋoha era omuutu oyo sigehebulisa. Aye ohwehubba mu hifuba ohwa hamooyo mooyo, huŋwamo ohusihiiriha.
47007011	Ale mubone ohwehubba mu hifuba ohusangaasa Hatonda ngʼolu hwaleetera hiisi mulala hu enywe ohweŋosyaho, obusungu ohubaŋamba olwa oyo owaŋwaho endibo nʼohutandiha ohuutya, ohuŋemba ohumbonaho. Era hyabaleetera ohwenda bamubonerese omuhosi wʼebibi. Mu ebyo byosibyosi mwalaga muuti ŋaŋuma ehyʼohuboloobya.
47007012	Olwʼehyo sinaŋandiiha hu lwʼomuutu owahola ehibi, oba olwa oyo oyu basobyaho, aye nabaŋandiihira lwʼohwenda huhahasa mu moni ja Hatonda ti mutwenda.
47007013	Ebyo byosibyosi bitugobosamo amaani. Era ohumeeda hu ehyo hwali basangaafu bugali olwohuba mwesimwesi mwaleetera Tito ohuba musangaafu.
47007014	Naali nenyumirihise eyiri Tito ngʼolu muli balaŋi, hiraŋi ti simwaswasa. Aye ngʼolu byosibyosi ebi hwabalomera byali bituufu, nʼohwenyumirisa hwʼefe eyiri Tito sihwali hwabudulingi.
47007015	Era Tito abenda bugali mwesimwesi ohuhirira erala nahebuulira engeri eyi mwamusangaaliramo, ngʼolu mwamugondera ko nʼeŋono eri mwamuŋa.
47007016	Ndi musangaafu olwohuba mu biitu byosibyosi panga ohubesiga.
47008001	Aboluganda, ŋaahani hwenda mumanye hu biŋamba hu hyere ehi Hatonda gaaŋa ebibbubbu byʼabafugiirira ebyomu twale lyʼe Makedoniya.
47008002	Wayire baali nʼebigosi ebyʼamaani era ni bali bagadi bugali, basigala ni bali basangaafu, era ehyo hyabaleetera ohugaba nʼomwoyo mulala.
47008003	Mbalomera ehituufu ti bagaba nʼohusingisaho ngʼolu baali ni basobola. Era ehyo bahihola hulwa ohwenda hwawe abeene.
47008004	Batwegayirira bugali hubafugiirire ohusoloohesa abaatu ba Hatonda abali mu Yerusaalemu obuyeedi.
47008005	Baahola ehi hwali ni hutabasuubiriramo! Beheerera hweŋayo eyiri Musengwa, ngʼoluvanyuma batweŋa hwesi olwʼohusiima hwa Hatonda.
47008006	Olwʼehyo hwahubbirisa Tito ohutiina mu moni nʼomulimo ogwʼohubasoloosamo obuyeedi, mu ngeri eyi gaali nʼagutagihireho.
47008007	Aye ngʼolu muli ndinywe abasinga abahyenywe mu hiisi hiitu; mu hufugiirira, mu hubuulira, mu humanya ebiŋamba hu Hatonda, mu huba abaheneerefu era nomu hutwenda, hwenda mube cʼehyene nomu hugaba.
47008008	Sindi hubalagira aye nenda hubona obuheneerefu bwʼohwenda hwenywe ni ngeragerania nʼohweŋaayo hwʼabaatu abandi.
47008009	Mumanyire ehyere ehi Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito ali ni nahyo. Wayire gaali muŋinda ne gafuuha mugadi hu lwʼohwenda mufuuhe baŋinda hu lwʼobugadi buwe.
47008010	Ese, hino njʼehiŋeego hyange hu biŋamba hu husoloosa obuyeedi. Omwaha ogubitire ndinywe omweheerera si mu husoloosa hyoŋene aye nomuhuba baheneerefu ohuhihola.
47008011	Olwʼehyo muheneerese omulimo ogu mwatagiha era obuheneerefu obu mwali ni nabwo butiinire ŋalala nʼohuhita mu kola ni mwema hu pamba yenywe.
47008012	Hino kiroma olwohuba omuutu anagaba nʼobuheneerefu, era gaŋaayo ni geema hu ebi ali ni nabyo Hatonda amusiima era samubalira hugaba ebi aŋuma.
47008013	Sinenda hubahalubya, abandi ni beyagala aye nenda ŋabeŋo ohuŋeraŋerana.
47008014	Mu hiseera hino muli nʼebingi, olwʼehyo hiraŋi muyeede abo abaŋuma. Era mwesi ni munahabe ni muŋuma nibo ni bali ni nabyo, banahabayeede. Mu ngeri eyo ŋanahabe ŋaliŋo ohuŋeraŋerana.
47008015	Ngʼolu hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Oyo owahumbaania ebingi, sigaali nʼebingi era ni nooyo owahumbaania ebitotono, sigaali nʼebitotono.”
47008016	Neyaasa Hatonda owaŋa Tito omwoyo ogubalumirwa hyʼese.
47008017	Sigahoma hu hufugiirira ehi hwamuloma ohuhola hyoŋene, aye yeesi omwene gaali muheneerefu ohuuja eyi muli abayeede.
47008018	Era huli humutuma nʼomulebe oyu ebibbubbu byʼabafugiirira Kurisito ebyʼeno byosibyosi biŋa eŋono olwʼohulomera abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi.
47008019	Era nʼehindi, ebibbubbu byʼabafugiirira Kurisito byamwangala atuŋerehere ni huŋira obuyeedi, olwʼobuŋeeresa buno obu huhola ohuŋa Hatonda eŋono nʼohulaga ngʼolu huli baheneerefu ohuyeeda.
47008020	Hwenda hwegenderese ŋatabaŋo hwemulugunya hu engeri eyi husoloosamo nʼeyi hugabamo obuyeedi obubitiirifu hyʼobwo.
47008021	Ehigendererwa hyefe huhola ebiruŋamu, si mu moni ja Hatonda yeŋene, aye nomu moni jʼabaatu boosi.
47008022	Olwʼehyo huli hubaŋindihira omulebe owundi ŋalala ni nabo. Mirundi mingi, huweene omulebe oyo nʼalaga ati munyikifu mu hwenda ohuyeeda abahye. Era ŋaahani geyongeeye ohunyikira olwohuba abalimo esuubi ebbala eryʼohugaba ni muteemota.
47008023	Tito niye mumumanyire muuti mutambi wahyange oyu kola ni naye olwʼohubagasa. Abalebe aba ali ni nabo, bahwenda ohuŋwa mu bibbubbu byʼabafugiirira Kurisito ebyʼeno, abaŋeesa Kurisito eŋono.
47008024	Olwʼehyo mulage abasaaja abo obuhahafu bwʼohwenda hwenywe ko ebibbubbu byʼabafugiirira Kurisito byosibyosi bihahase era bimanye biiti ebi hubenyumirihisamo bituufu.
47009001	Sihinjetagisa hubaŋandiihira hu biŋamba hu buyeedi obwohuŋirira abafugiirira Kurisito abali mu Yerusaalemu.
47009002	Hino kiroma olwohuba manyire ti muli baheneerefu ohuyeeda, era mbayenga mbapaaha eyiri abaatu bʼe Makedoniya ti ohuŋwa omwaha ogwo, abalebe abomu twale lyʼAkaya baheneerefu ohusoloosa obuyeedi. Era obuheneerefu bwenywe buleeteeye bangi ehinyeegenyege boosi ohwenda ohuŋayo obuyeedi.
47009003	Aye ndihuŋindiha abalebe abo ko ohupaaha ohunabapaaha hu hutaba hwawereere, aye mube betegefu ngʼolu naloma ti muli betegefu.
47009004	Hino kiroma olwohuba singa niija nʼabalala hu baatu bʼe Makedoniya, hwagaana ni mutetegehire, ehyo hija hutuleetera si efe fenyene aye ni ninywe mwesi ohuswala olwohuba naali kenire ohubapaaha.
47009005	Olwʼehyo mbona ti hiraŋi ohubasindihira abalebe beheerere ohubahyalira, babayeede ohuheneresa etegeha eyʼohusoloosa obuyeedi obu mwasuubisa. Ehyo ko hirage hiiti mwaŋayo muhweyendera, aŋaŋuma hubaŋalirisa.
47009006	Muhebulire muuti oyo amwa aŋatono, aligesa bitotono era ni nooyo amwa aŋabbala, aligesa bingi.
47009007	Olwʼehyo hiisi muutu agabenga ngʼolu aba nʼasalireŋo mu mwoyo gugwe, sosi muhweŋagia oba olwʼohumuŋagia. Hino kiroma olwohuba Hatonda genda omuutu agaba nʼesangaalo.
47009008	Era Hatonda aŋanga ohubaŋa nʼebisingaho ebi mwetaaga, ko musobole hiisi hiseera ohuba nʼebibahena era musobole ohutambisa ebisigalaho ohuyeeda abali muwetaavu.
47009009	Era Ebyaŋandiihiwa biroma biiti; “Gagabira abagadi nʼehyere, era balihebulira ehyere hihye emirembe nʼemirembe.”
47009010	Era Hatonda aŋa omulimi owumo obwʼohumwa nʼemere eyʼohulya, aja hwasa owumo wenywe mwaheyongera ohuyeeda abo abaŋuma.
47009011	Hatonda aja hweyongera ohwasa hiisi ehi muli ni nahyo ko musobole ohuŋa obuyeedi abaŋuma era obuyeedi obwo ni bubita mu efe ohwola eyiri abo abawetaga ko abaatu abo beyaasenga Hatonda olwʼebyo ebi muholire.
47009012	Ehyo kiroma olwohuba obuyeedi bwenywe sibuhoma hu huleetera abaatu ba Hatonda ohusuna ebibaŋuma hyoŋene, aye higima baatu beyaasa Hatonda bugali.
47009013	Ni balibona ehyere hyenywe eyi bali ko nʼeyiri abaatu abandi, baja hujumirya Hatonda olwohuba muliba mulagire ngʼolu mugondera ebiragiro bibye era ti mubutuufu obwene mwafugiirira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi aga Kurisito.
47009014	Era muja huba bahoda eyi bali era babasabirenga ekabi ohuŋwa eyiri Hatonda olwʼehyere ehyʼamaani ehi gabaŋa.
47009015	Era hweyaasa Hatonda olwʼehirabo hihye ehyo ehyeŋunjisa.
47010001	Ese Pawulo oyu abandi munywe baloma baati mbo ndi muti era baati mbo nimba ni nenywe tya ohubahayula aye aŋa mubula nga ko nehambuŋasa mu bbaluŋa hambalombe ni mbegalihira olwʼehisa nʼohweŋomeha hwa Kurisito.
47010002	Mbasunga mutandeetera huba nʼehabyo ni niijire eyo, olwohuba eriyo eyo abaloma baati huli baatu buutu hya nibo era hwesi hwebisya ngʼolu baatu abandi mu hyalo hino bebisya. Olwʼehyo suubira ohuba nʼobusambuha eyi bali.
47010003	Hino kiroma olwohuba, wayire hwesi huli baatu buutu ngʼolu baloma, efe sihusoola mu ngeri eyi baatu buutu basoolamo.
47010004	Ebisoosa ebyefe sibya mu hyalo hino aye biŋwa eyiri Hatonda era biri nʼamaani ohusihiirisa amaani gʼomusigu.
47010005	Husimya ebibono byosibyosi ebireetera abaatu ohutamanya Hatonda. Era hucuusa epeega yaawe baba ti bagondera Kurisito.
47010006	Ni munahafuuhire erala abagondi eyiri Kurisito, huja hugudya hiisi muutu omujeemu.
47010007	Mulengerere esonga era mufaanie ehituufu. Oyo oweŋeegaho ati nje yeŋene aŋeeresa Kurisito, ali nʼohuhimanya ati hwesi huli baŋeeresa ba Kurisito abatuufu.
47010008	Wayire nepaaha olwʼobuŋangi Musengwa obu gaatuŋa, ehyo sihipambya soni olwohuba Kurisito gaabutuŋa ko husobole ohubagumya mu hufugiirira sosi ohubahenamo amaani.
47010009	Sinahendire huboneha oti mbatihirisa nʼebi pandiiha mu bbaluŋa jange.
47010010	Hino kiroma olwohuba abaatu abandi baloma mbo, “Ebbaluŋa ja Pawulo kambwe era jʼamaani, aye omwene munafu nʼali ni neefe era ebi aloma adafaaya hu dafaaya.”
47010011	Aye abaloma baatyo, bali nʼohumanya baati ebi huloma mu bbaluŋa jeefe, mbebi hulihola ni hujire eyo.
47010012	Efe sihweta hu daala erala oba ohwegeragerania hu abo abeginiha. Abeene beeteraŋo esambo eji baŋeega baati tuufu era bajifuula ehipimo ehyʼohwegerageranihisyaho abeene hu beene. Ehyo hiraga busiru.
47010013	Ne efe sihuja hwepaaha ohuhiraho ngʼolu hisaana, ohutusaho huja hwepaaha hu biŋamba hu mulimo ogu Hatonda gatuŋambya, era mwesi omulimo ogwo gubahooheramo.
47010014	Hwahali hutuumire salo ohwepaaha hu lwenywe hubanga ni mutali balala hu abo aba Hatonda gatuŋambya ohulomera Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu Kurisito.
47010015	Ate era sihwepaaha hulwa ebi bandi bahola ebulafu wʼesalo jʼomulimo ogu Hatonda gatuŋambya. Husuubira huuti muja huŋangala mu hufugiirira hwenywe era nʼomulimo gwefe mu enywe gweyongere ohugalama.
47010016	Ehyo hyahatuleetera ohubuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi mu bitundu ebindi olwohuba efe sihwepaaha olwʼomulimo ogu bandi baahola.
47010017	Aye hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Oyo owepaaha, gepaahenga olwa Musengwa.”
47010018	Hino kiroma olwohuba omuutu oweginiha, sinje oyu Musengwa asiima aye asiima njʼoyo oyu omwene aginiha.
47011001	Nahabasungire mwehaliriheho obusirusiru bwange. Era peega ti muli huhihola.
47011002	Mbabubira era ebuba eri ndi ni nalyo liŋwa yiri Hatonda, olwohuba nabahobya nabaleeta eyiri Kurisito mube babe yeŋene, mbaŋeyo eyi ali ni muli bagwalaafu hyʼomuhaana ataŋenyuhangaho nʼomusinde.
47011003	Aye ndimo ohutya ti ngʼolu etemu yadulinga Kaawa, mwesi muŋangire ohubbaama mwaŋwa hu mazima ga Kurisito.
47011004	Hino kiroma olwohuba muli bangu bʼohufugiirira omuutu singa gaaja gabuulira ebiŋamba hu Yesu owundi, otali oyo oyu hwabuulira oba mwafugiirira omwoyo owundi atali oyo oyu mwasuna oba mwafugiirira Amaŋuliro agandi agatali ago aga hwabalomera.
47011005	Aye sipeega ti abo abeeranga abahwenda abahihenaho bali nʼehibaakira.
47011006	Pangire ohuba ni taali mulomilomi mulaŋi, ne abo sibaakira humanya amazima era mu hiisi ngeri ehyo hwahibahahasa bulaŋi.
47011007	Ni nababuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi ohuŋwa eyiri Hatonda sinabasasulisa. Olwo ko muŋeega muuti obuhwenda obu nabalomera bwali buŋumamo samuuna? Oba nahola hibi ohweyisa ohwola aŋo?
47011008	Ni naali eyo ni mbaholamo omulimo, nali hyʼonyaga ebibbubbu byʼabafugiirira Kurisito ebindi, olwohuba mbebi nʼasunangamo obuyeedi mu hifo hyʼohubusuna mu enywe.
47011009	Era ni naali eyo, ni ŋabangaŋo ehi nenda, ŋaŋumanga wayire mulala hu enywe oyu nasitoŋereranga olwohuba abalebe abʼe Makedoniya bandeeteranga obuyeedi. Nehuumanga ohutaba nʼengeri yosiyosi eyʼohusitoŋolera muutu yesiyesi era nja hweyongera ohutabasitoŋerera.
47011010	Mu hino ŋaŋuma muutu yesiyesi mu twale lyʼAkaya aja hundobera ohwepaaha olwohuba ŋaŋuma ehi ndi cuusamo ohufugiirira obuyeedi ohuŋwa eyi muli. Era ehindoma njʼamazima mu siina lya Kurisito ali mu bulamu bwange.
47011011	Mutaŋeega muuti hino kiroma olwohuba simbenda. Mu butuufu ni Hatonda yeesi amanyire ati mbenda.
47011012	Wabula nja hutiina mu moni nʼohutanaaŋa obuyeedi bwenywe olwʼohwenda ohusimya abo aberanga abahwenda bataba nʼehi bemaho ohwepaaha nʼohutwegerageraniaho.
47011013	Abaatu abo abeeranga abahwenda bakuyakuyi, era mu bukuyakuyi bwawe beranga ohuba bahwenda ba Kurisito.
47011014	Era ehyo sihyeŋunjisa, olwohuba ni Sitaani yeesi gefuula ohuba malayika owʼenjase.
47011015	Mu ngeri njʼenyene sihyeŋunjisa abaŋeeresa babe ohwefuula ohuba abaŋeeresa abahola ebiruŋamu. Ne hu komerero baja husuna ehibonereso ehisaana ebikolwa byawe.
47011016	Ngʼolu kenire ohuhiroma nindi hambagoboleremo: Mutaŋeega muuti ndi musiru. Aye ni muba ni muŋeega muutyo, kale mupire hyʼomusiru keesi nepaaheho.
47011017	Ohwepaaha hwange huno, sihuŋwa yiwa Musengwa, aye kihola ngʼomusiru.
47011018	Ngʼolu bangi bepaaha olwʼebibaholire, keesi hanepaaheho.
47011019	Olwohuba muli bagesi ehihena njʼehigima ni mwehaliriha ebibono byʼabasiru abo?
47011020	Dala ndimufayo omuutu ohubafuula abeedu babe oba ohubanyaga, oba ohubacuuhisa ŋano ni naŋala, oba ohubeeba lubona?
47011021	Kale handome ti swaye olwohuba sihwaŋanga hubahola hyʼabo. Aye ŋanabaŋo owepaaha mu hiitu hyosihyosi, keesi nja hwepaaha era hino kiroma hyʼomusiru.
47011022	Abepaaha abo sibaloma mbo Bebbulaniya? Keesi ndi Mwebbulaniya. Baloma baati mbo Bayisirayiri? Keesi ndi Muyisirayiri. Baloma baati mbo bejuhulu ba Yibbulayimu? Keesi ndi mwijuhulu wa Yibbulayimu.
47011023	Kaho baloma baati mbo baŋeeresa ba Kurisito? Oba ndi huloma hyʼomulalu. Ese kolire emirimo ohubahira. Basidihire mu mukomera emirundi mingi ohubahira. Emirundi mingi batiinire ni bakubba bugali ohubahira era punyire hu hufa emirundi mingi.
47011024	Emirundi etaanu, Abayudaaya bakubba esimbo amahumi adatu namwenda.
47011025	Emirundi edatu ni batambisa oluga, lulala baakubba amabaale era emirundi edatu eryato omu naali ni gendera lyabwagiha nahena omuusi nʼowiire mu nyanja ŋaagati.
47011026	Mu ngendo jange enyingi eji ngendire, ponire enjabi ohundya, abeebi, ebigosi ebi Bayudaaya bahyange ko nʼAbatali Abayudaaya banjohiseho. Ponire ebigosi mu bibuga nomu byalo, mu nyanja ko nʼabaatu aberanga mbo balebe mu Kurisito.
47011027	Fululuhene ni fabina bugali ni kola omuusi nʼowiire ohweyemeresaŋo era ebiseera bingi ni talimba hwiro. Enjala nʼenduŋo birumire hu ese emirundi mingi. Embeŋo efuuŋire hu ese ni puma hyahwedanya hu magumba.
47011028	Ebyo nʼobitaaye hu tulo, hiisi ludaalo pulira ni nyigirisibwa nʼomugugu ogwʼohulabirira ebibbubbu byʼabafugiirira Kurisito byosibyosi.
47011029	Njʼani aŋwamo amaani, ndi ndumwa? Njʼani ahemebwa gaagwa mu hibi, nasihinduma?
47011030	Nimba wa hwepaaha, nja hwepaaha olwʼebyo ebiraga obunafu bwange.
47011031	Hatonda era Semwana wa Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito, oyu baatu bali nʼohuŋa eŋono emirembe nʼemirembe, amanyire ati sindulinga.
47011032	Ni naali mu hibuga Damasiko, gavana oyu habaha Areete gataŋo, galagira abasirikale babe ohuhuuma ehibuga ehyo butiribiri bapambe,
47011033	aye abahyange nga baata mu gunaaba nga banjihisa mu dinisa eryali mu hiteepe ehyali ni hyeswanigirisa ehibuga, nga punuha.
47012001	Ŋaahani ha nindi nepaahe wayire nga ŋaŋuma ehi higasa. Leha mbalomere ebiŋamba hu hwolesebwa nʼohu biitu ebi Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito gaakwehulira.
47012002	Emyaha ehumi neene ejibitireŋo, Hatonda gaaŋira mulala hu abafugiirira Kurisito, mwigulu eryohudatu. Era omuutu oyo mumanyire ne simanyire oba hyaliŋo nʼahiiri mulamu oba hwali hwolesebwa, aye Hatonda omwene amanyire.
47012003	Ese manyire ti omuutu oyo oba gaali ahiiri mulamu oba bbe, ehyo Hatonda omwene njʼamanyire,
47012004	ese ehi manyire hiri ti bamuŋira mu hifo ehyʼohwesiima. Ni goola eyo, gaŋulira ebibono ebi muutu atasobola hunyonyola era aŋuma lukusa ohubiroosa.
47012005	Kale nja hwepaaha olwʼebyola hu muutu oyo aye sinja hwepaaha olwʼebyo ebipambaho ohutusaho obunafu bwange.
47012006	Ate nindi wayire saalaŋo ohwepaaha, sihiba ni hiraga hiiti ndi musiru olwohuba gahali mazima. Aye sinabijemo olwohuba sinenda muutu yesiyesi ohumbona mu hifaananyi ehindi ohuhiraho ehyʼebyo ebi kola oba ebindoma.
47012007	Aye Hatonda olwʼohwenda tehudumbasa olwʼebiitu ebyeŋunjisa ebinabona, gaasyoha oluŋwa mu mubiri lungudye. Oluŋwa olwo, njʼomuhwenda wa Sitaani.
47012008	Era efunda edatu negalihira Musengwa yeefe gaponie obulumi obwo.
47012009	Aye gangobolamo ati, “Ehisasabirisi hyange hihuhena, olwohuba amaani gange gabonehera mu bunafu.” Olwʼehyo nja ohwepaaha olwʼobunafu bwange ko obuŋangi bwa Kurisito bubonehere mu ese.
47012010	Ehyo cʼehigima hulwa Kurisito naaba musangaafu olwʼobunafu bwange, nʼolu abaatu banduha, nʼolu mba mu bigosi, nʼolu bakiyaania, nʼolu mbonaabona olwohuba nimba munafu aŋo ko mba ndi wʼamaani.
47012011	Fuuhire hyʼomusirusiru, aye ndinywe omundeteeye ohwebisya tyo. Mwahali musiima olwohuba abahwenda aberanga abʼamaani abo sibaakira wayire nga puma aŋa ndi.
47012012	Ni naali eyo, mu hugumikiriza ohwʼamaani nahola obubenero obweŋunjisa ko nʼebyamaliholiho ohubalaga ti ndi muhwenda omutuufu.
47012013	Ebibbubbu byʼabafugiirira Kurisito ebindi bibahira mu ngeri hi? Ohutusaho ti nibo nabasunganga obuyeedi aye enywe bbe. Musoniŋe olwʼohubaleha ebulafu mwihyo.
47012014	Ŋaahani netegehire ohubahyalira omulundi ogwohudatu, cooka era sinja hubasitoŋerera. Hino kiroma olwohuba simbendaho byenywe, aye nenda myoyo jenywe. Muhimanyire bulaŋi muuti muli baana bange. Ne abaana sinje ababiihiraho abasaaye baawe aye abasaaye njʼabalabirira abaana baawe.
47012015	Nja huba musangaafu ohuŋaayo ebyange byosibyosi era keesi neŋeereyo erala hu lwenywe. Wayire nga mbenda bugali enywe munyenda hamooyomooyo.
47012016	Muhimanyire muuti sinabasitoŋerera, aye abandi hu enywe baŋeega baati mbo ndi mukuyakuyi era nabadulinganga.
47012017	Ne ehyo nahiholanga mu ngeri hi? Mu abo aba nabatumiranga, mulimo oyu natambisa ohubalyakula?
47012018	Nasunga Tito ohuuja eyi muli era gaaja nʼomulebe owundi. Ŋaliŋo ehi Tito gabalyakula? Episa yange nʼeyiye sinjʼenyene era sihuli nʼehigendererwa hirala?
47012019	Oba muŋeega muuti huli hweŋoomya hweŋoomya mu moni jenywe? Efe, mu moni ja Hatonda huloma ngʼolu Kurisito genda hulome era hiisi ehi huhola huhihola olwʼohubayeeda.
47012020	Tya ohuuja eyo mbagaane ni mutali ngʼolu nenda mube era mwesi mumbone ni tali mu hifaananyi ehi musuubiriramo. Tya ohuuja mbagaanemo obuyoga, egongi, obusungu, ohwesalasalamo obubbubbu, owiimi, ohuŋahana esiro, ohugeyana, ohwehudumbasa nʼohwetabujula.
47012021	Era tya ti ni nahaaje, esoni jiripamba mu moni ja Hatonda wange, ehyo hindetere ohulira amangi olwʼabangi hu enywe ŋanyuma aŋo abaahola ebibi ndibebbwaga ebibi ebi bahola, omuli ohwejabaata, obuhwedi, nʼohuba nʼemoni enyangu.
47013001	Guno guja huba mulundi gwa hudatu ohuuja eyo ohubahyalira. Ehyaŋandiihiwa hiroma hiiti “Hiisi songa bayihahasenga ni ŋaliŋo obujulizi owʼabaatu babiri oba badatu.”
47013002	Ni nabahyalira efunda eyohubiri nalabula abo abaahola ebibi ko ni naabo bosibosi abali hubbenga. Era wayire sindi ni nenywe, ngobolamo ohubalabula ti ni nahaaje, ŋaŋuma muutu abbenga oyu ndisasira.
47013003	Ehyo kiroma olwohuba mwenda ahabonero ahahahasa haati Kurisito aloma nʼabita mu ese. Muhimanye muuti Kurisito simunafu aye ali nʼamaani agʼohubahangafula.
47013004	Wayire sigalaga ati wʼamaani ni baali ni bamuhomerera hu musalabba, aye olwʼamaani ga Hatonda ŋaahani mulamu. Hwesi mu ye Hatonda atuŋa amaani ohubaholamo omulimu gugwe wayire abandi baloma mbo huli banafu mu malomere.
47013005	Hiisi muutu gehebere omwene abone hanye ahiiri mu hufugiirira. Simumanyire muuti Yesu Kurisito ali mu enywe? Ohutusaho nga mwenda hwendulinga!
47013006	Suubira ti muja huhifaania muuti efe ngʼabahwenda abatuufu aba Kurisito, sibituhayanga.
47013007	Husaba Hatonda abayeede muleheŋo ohuhola ebibi, silwa hwenda huboneha oti hwabaholamo omulimo omulaŋi, aye enywe muhole ebiraŋi, ngʼolu hiboneha oti efe hwalemererwa.
47013008	Hino kiroma olwohuba sihuŋanga huhola ehiitu ehihingirira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi, ohutusaho ohubona huuti hugasoolerera.
47013009	Husangaala ni batubona baati huli banafu aye enywe ni muli bagumu mu hufugiirira. Olwʼehyo hubasabira mube badimamu.
47013010	Hino njʼehigima ni mba ni tali ni nenywe mbaŋandiihira ni mbaloma ebiitu bino, ko hibe ti ni nijire eyo taba wʼehabyo ni tambisa obuŋangi obu Musengwa gaapa ohubayeeda, sosi hubasihiirisa.
47013011	Aboluganda, ni keneresa mweraba. Mufube ohuba badimamu mu hufugiirira, mute omwoyo hu bimbalomire, muholenga hirala, mumenye mu miyaaya nʼabahyenywe era Hatonda atulaga ohwenda era atuŋa emiyaaya, anabenga ni nenywe.
47013012	Hiisi muutu aheese owahye mu keesa eyʼabaatu abagwalaafu.
47013013	Abafugiirira Kurisito abeeno bosibosi babahehiise.
47013014	Ehisa hya Musengwa Yesu Kurisito nʼohwenda hwa Hatonda, nʼobulala wʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu, bibenga ni nenywe mwesimwesi.
48001001	Ndiise Pawulo omuhwenda wa Kurisito abaŋandiihira enywe abafugiirira Kurisito abali mu twale lyʼe Galatiya. Ese Pawulo si ndi muhwenda olwohuba ti abaatu batobola oba omuutu obuutu ohuutuma. Aye ndi muhwenda olwohuba Yesu Kurisito ni Hatonda Seefe, owamulamusa njʼabanyangala era baatuma.
48001002	Ese ko nʼabalebe bosibosi mu Kurisito abali ŋano hubahehiiseho enywe ebibbubbu byʼabafugiirira Kurisito mu Galatiya,
48001003	Hatonda Seefe ni Musengwa Yesu Kurisito babaŋambire ehisasabirisi era babaŋe emiyaaya.
48001004	Yesu Kurisito oyo olwʼohugera hwa Hatonda era Seefe, geŋayo bamwita hu lwʼebibi byefe atunoŋole mu mulembe guno omubi.
48001005	Ale abaatu baŋenga Hatonda oyo eŋono emirembe nʼemirembe, Amiina.
48001006	Bahyange, hikenire efiiri hu mutwe ohuba ti musenguhire ohuŋwa hu Hatonda owabalanga mufuuhe baana babe olwʼehisasabirisi hya Kurisito oyu mwahafugiiriranga, mangu mangu mwabbaamira hu somesa eyindi eyi babadulinga baati mbo yoosi maŋuliro malaŋi,
48001007	ate nga ko panaŋo. Ehihulu hiri hiiti ŋaliŋo abaatu abali hubaŋwitania olwʼohwenda ohuhoohera ebyawe mu Maŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu Yesu Kurisito.
48001008	Aye ŋanabaŋo omuutu agesyaho ohubabuulira obuhwenda obundi obutali obwo obu hwabaleetera oludaayi, omuutu oyo nʼolwaba mulala hu fe abahwenda oba malayika ohuŋwa mwigulu, Hatonda amusyenanga!
48001009	Ngʼolu hwahena ohubalomera, nindi kigobolamo ti; hanye ŋaliŋo omuutu ali hugesyaho ohubabuulira obuhwenda obundi obwenjabulo hu bula obu mwafugiirira, Hatonda amusyenanga!
48001010	Bino simbiroma olwʼohwenda ohweŋomya eyiri abaatu wabula olwʼohwenda Hatonda asiime ebi kola. Olwohuba singa kola ogwʼohweŋomya eyiri abaatu, aŋo mba sipanga huba muŋeeresa wa Kurisito owolereeye.
48001011	Aboluganda, nenda mumanye hino ti Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi aga ndomera abaatu sigahuseega buseege.
48001012	Sinagasuna huŋwa hu muutu yesiyesi oba ti omuutu njʼowasomesa, ohutusaho Yesu Kurisito omwene njʼowagambwihulira.
48001013	Manyire ti mwaŋulira ebiŋamba hu bulamu wange ni naali ni kiiri mu diini lyʼEhiyudaaya, era ngʼolu nahiyaanianga ehibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira Kurisito aba Hatonda gaali nʼahenire ohutongosa, era ngʼolu nagesyaho ohubisihiirisa.
48001014	Ebiŋamba hu bumanyi obwʼediini lyʼEhiyudaaya naali netemaho mutwe era ni ŋaŋuma wa muwoolo gwange owaali ni gapunyamo era ni nenda abaatu bosibosi baŋambe obulombolombo bwʼabasehulu beefe.
48001015	Cooka Hatonda mu hisasabirisi hihye owanjabula ni kiiri nʼomu hida hya maama, olwʼohusiima huhwe gananga tambe omulimo gugwe,
48001016	era gaamanyisa ebiŋamba hu Yesu Omwana wuwe olwʼohwenda mbiromere Abatali Bayudaaya. Hino natandiha ohuhihola aŋabula hwendula bumanyi eyiri omuutu yesiyesi.
48001017	Sinatiina wayire nomu hibuga Yerusaalemu eyiri abaneherera ohuba abahwenda mbebuuseho aye nenyoheramo natiina mu twale lyʼe Buŋarabbu eyi naŋwa oluvanyuma nga tiina mu hibuga Damasiko.
48001018	Ni ŋabitaŋo emyaha edatu, nga ko tiina e Yerusaalemu ohumanyana ni Peetero aye yeesi nahena ni naye endaalo ehumi nʼetaanu jooŋene.
48001019	Ni naali eyo ŋabula muhwenda owundi oyu nabonanaho ni naye ohutusaho Yakobbo mulebe ya Yesu Musengwa.
48001020	Mu mazima ameene aga Hatonda ebindoma bino sibyabudulingi.
48001021	Ni naŋwa e Yerusaalemu natiina mu matwale gʼe Siriya nʼe Kilikiya.
48001022	Mu hiseera ehyo abaatu abahira obungi mu bibbubbu byʼabafugiirira Kurisito abomu twale lya Buyudaaya baali bahiiri huumanya.
48001023	Baali baŋulira huŋulira efuma yʼebipambaho ebi baatu babalomeranga baati, “Omusinde ola owatuhiyaanianga leero yeesi abuulira abaatu bafugiirire ebyo ebi gaŋahanianga nʼatenda abaatu babifugiirire.”
48001024	Era nga bajumirya Hatonda olwʼebyali ni binjolireho.
48002001	Oluvanyuma ni ŋabitaŋo emyaha ehumi nʼene, nindi naagamayo e Yerusaalemu. Hu mugigi guno natiina nʼowahyange Bbalunaba, ko ni Tito yeesi.
48002002	Hu luno natiinayo olwohuba Hatonda omwene gambwihulira ati tiineyo era ni noola neheerera hwegeyamo nʼabatangirisi babafugiirira nabanyonyola obuhwenda obu ndomera Abatali Bayudaaya. Ehyo nʼahihola olwʼohweŋendeherera ti hamunga omulimo ogu naali ni kola baŋanga ohugugaana ni baloma baati mbo ebisomesa sibituufu.
48002003	Wayire njʼeyaali ekola yabwe, hu mulundi ogwo abatangirisi sibaŋalirisa hya huhomola Tito wayire nga gaali Muyonaani olwohuba bafugiirira baati yeesi gafugiirira Yesu,
48002004	ate nga ko ŋaaliŋo abaatu abandi abaali ni bahyendire. Abaatu abo baali batwepaatihiremo ni beranga bahyefe cooka nga ehi baliho hya hutulega hya mu hanwa nʼohwenda ohutwemera mu dembe eri Yesu Kurisito gaatuŋa batwagamyeyo mu bwidu bwʼobulombolombo wʼEhiyudaaya.
48002005	Ne efe hwahatala ndihubadembuhiraho kadi naŋadiidiri olwʼohwenda enywe muganyulwe mu hituufu ehi Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi galoma.
48002006	Abo aba nibo balanga baati njʼabahihenaho, ate nga hu lwange ehyo sihihulu olwohuba Hatonda abona ebyʼomugati njʼatusinga ohumanya, baŋuma ehi bameedaho hu buhwenda obu ndomera abaatu.
48002007	Ohutusaho ti bahifaania baati Hatonda gaali gapambisye omulimo ogwʼohulomera Abatali Bayudaaya Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi, ngʼolu gaŋambya Peetero ogwʼohulomera Abayudaaya.
48002008	Olwohuba Hatonda owaali nʼatambisa Peetero ohuhola omulimo gwʼobuhwenda eyiri Abayudaaya abahomole, keesi njʼowaali ni gatambisa mu mulimo ogwʼohuba omuhwenda wuwe eyiri Abatali Bayudaaya.
48002009	Era ehyo hyaleetera Yakobbo ni Peetero ni Yowaane aba bamanyire baati njʼesiiro jʼabafugiirira ohufaania baati hwesi olwʼehisasabirisi hya Hatonda hwali humuŋeeresa njʼehyene era baahena baŋamba ese ni Bbalunaba mu ngalo ohulaga obulala. Bahena bafugiirisania baati efe hutiine mu moni nʼohulomera Abatali Bayudaaya Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi nibo bagalomere Abayudaaya abahomole.
48002010	Ohutusaho ti batusunga ohutebirira hudulumiriranga abafugiirira abomu Yerusaalemu abaali abagadi. Ne ehyo keesi naali muheneerefu ohuhihola.
48002011	Ebyo ni byaŋwa, ni naali mu hibuga Atiyokiya, ŋaaliŋo olu Peetero gaajayo namuhayula mu lwijuuye olwʼehigodami ehi gaahola.
48002012	Ŋaahani ŋaaliŋo abaatu abaaŋwa eyiri Yakobbo mu Yerusaalemu batiina mu Atiyokiya. Ne ni baali ni bahiiri huuja, Peetero galyanga ŋalala nʼAbatali Bayudaaya. Aye abaatu abo ni boola, nga Peetero gefudula mu ndya olwʼohutya ehi abaatu abo abaali ni bawagira ehyʼohuhomola Abatali Bayudaaya banamulomeho olwʼohulya ŋalala nʼabatali bahomole.
48002013	Abayudaaya abandi boosi nga bamweŋimbaho era ohwefudula hwabwe hwaŋalula ni Bbalunaba yeesi gabbaama.
48002014	Ni nabona ehibaholire ni hitali ŋalala nʼehituufu ehi Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi galoma, nga kayula Peetero mu moni jaawe ni muloma ti, “Obanga ewe Omuyudaaya, sohironderesa magambi nʼobulombolombo wʼEhiyudaaya aye webisya hyʼAtali Muyudaaya, lwahiina oŋalirisa Abatali Bayudaaya ohuba ti babironderesa?”
48002015	Ohutafaana nʼaba balanga “Abatali Bayudaaya ababbengi” era abatoheresa magambi aga Hatonda gaŋambya Musa, efe hwasaaliwa ngʼAbayudaaya era hwahulira mu magambi ago.
48002016	Cooka ŋaahani huhimanyire huuti omuutu saaba mugwalaafu olwʼohwesiga ohwoheresa amagambi wabula olwʼohufugiirira Yesu Kurisito. Olwʼehyo hwesi Abayudaaya nʼAbatali Bayudaaya obwesige hwabuta mu Yesu Kurisito ko batubale bagwalaafu olwʼohumufugiirira, sosi lwʼohwoheresa amagambi aga Hatonda gaŋambya Musa. Olwohuba ŋaŋuma muutu kadi mulala aŋanga ohufuuha omugwalaafu ni geesiga ohwoheresa amagambi ago.
48002017	“Abaatu batulanga baati huli babbengi” olwohuba hwata obwesige weefe mu Kurisito hwalehaŋo obuteekateeka wʼEhiyudaaya. Ehyo hiraga hiiti Kurisito awagira muutu huhola ebibi? Kadi naŋadiidiri!
48002018	Ehihulu hiri hiiti singa naagamayo nafugiirira ti Hatonda abala omuutu ohuba omugwalaafu hu lwʼohwoheresa ebi magambi galoma mba neragire ngʼolu ndi mubbengi aŋooye emirimo.
48002019	Ni nebona ndi hyʼomufu oyu magambi gataŋanga hubaho buŋangi cooka ni ndi mulamu hulwa Hatonda omwene. Ese bakomerera ni Kurisito.
48002020	Cooka ese samwene sindiise aŋuga obulamu bwange ngʼolu hyabanga ahale. Ŋaahani Kurisito njʼabuŋuga era hiisi ehi kola, kihola ni nesiga Omwana wa Hatonda owanyenda geeŋayo ohufa abe ŋongo ohununula obulamu bwange.
48002021	Ni ndoma ehyo mba singaana hyere hya Hatonda eyi ndi. Aye ehi ndoma hiri ti singa Hatonda abala abaatu ohuba abagwalaafu hulwohwoheresa ebi magambi aga gaŋambya Musa galagira, ohufa hwa Kurisito huba huŋuma mahulu.
48003001	Enywe abafugiirira Kurisito abali mu twale lyʼe Galatiya lwahiina mwebisya hya baŋubeebe? Njʼani owabaloga ohuba baŋubeebe? Hiina ehi tabalomera hu biŋamba hu bi Yesu Kurisito gabaholera ni bamuhomerera hu musalabba?
48003002	Olwʼehyo ndi nahirala ehi nenda ohwega ohuŋwa eyi muli. Kaho Hatonda gabaŋa Omwoyo Omutukuvu olwʼohwoheresa magambi aga gaŋa Musa oba lwʼohufugiirira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu Yesu?
48003003	Hiina ehibaleetera ohuba hyabaŋubeebe ohwola aŋo? Olwo ŋaahani muŋeega muuti bikolwa byenywe njʼebiŋanga ohubayeeda ohuŋangala mu hufugiirira hwenywe? Mwoyo wa Hatonda njʼowabatangiriranga mu hutandiha aye ŋaahani muli hu byenywe.
48003004	Nga mwabonaabona bugali ni mwafugiirira Kurisito! Olwo ohubonaabona ohwo mwenda hubafe busa?
48003005	Hatonda ni gabaŋa Omwoyo wuwe gahena gaahola ebyamaliholiho, gahihola lwahuba mwali mwoheresa ebi magambi galoma ohuhola oba lwohuba mwafugiirira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi aga mwaŋulira?
48003006	Ale ŋaahani hahubonere hu Yibbulayimu. Hatonda gamubala ohuba mugwalaafu olwʼohufugiirira ebi gamuloma.
48003007	Muli nʼohuhimanya muuti abo abafugiirira ebya Hatonda booŋene mbaba babala ohuba abomu lulyo lwa Yibbulayimu.
48003008	Nʼehindi Hatonda omwene gahimanya ati Abatali Bayudaaya ni balimufugiirra alibabala ohuba abagwalaafu. Ehyo njʼehyagira gaaloma Yibbulayimu ati, “Amawanga gosigosi galisuna ekabi hu lwewe.”
48003009	Olwʼehisuubiso ehyo, Hatonda aŋa abaatu bosibosi ekabi, abafugiirira hya Yibbulayimu.
48003010	Abaatu bosibosi abesiga ohugendera mu magambi aga baŋambya Musa ko basune obuhoda eyiri Hatonda, bahiiri ŋaasi wʼehiruŋi hihye olwohuba hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti oyo ateegumya huhola hiisi hiitu ehi magambi galagira; Hatonda alimusyena.
48003011	Mu butuufu ŋaŋuma oyu Hatonda aŋanga ohubala ohuba omugwalaafu olwʼohwoheresa amagambi olwohuba sihiŋangiha hugoheeresa gosigosi. Hino cʼehigira hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Oyo ahola ebiruŋamu alibaŋo mulamu olwʼohufugiirira huhwe.”
48003012	Ohwoheresa amagambi ŋaŋuma aŋa hwediirira hu hwesiga Hatonda olwohuba hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Anegumyenga ohwoheresa amagambi nʼebiragiro anabengaŋo olwʼohubyoheresa.”
48003013	Aye ŋaahani Kurisito ni geeŋayo bamuhomerera hu musalabba hu lwefe, gatujoŋooyeho ehijoogi hyʼamagambi ye gahyefiiha. Hino kihahasa olwohuba hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Ehijogi hya Hatonda hiri hu oyo oyu beeta ni bamubambire hu musaala.”
48003014	Kurisito gatununula mu ehijoogi hyʼohutoheeresa ebi magambi galagira, Abatali Bayudaaya boosi baŋange ohusuna ekabi eji Hatonda gaŋa Yibbulayimu. Era gendire ati olwʼohufugiirira Yesu Kurisito hwesihwesi aŋabula hubihisya husune ehisuubiso hyʼOmwoyo wuwe oyu gatusuubisa.
48003015	Ale ŋaahani boluganda, hambaŋe ehyʼohuboneraho ohuŋwa mu kolagana yeefe abaatu hu hyalo hino. Singa ŋabaŋo abaatu ababa ni baholire endagaano era baayita mu buŋandiihe, ŋabula muutu bundi aŋanga ohuyicuusa. Ehi ndi hulomaho hyosi hiityo pohiri.
48003016	Ehisuubiso hya Hatonda hyali eyiri Yibbulayimu nʼolusaaye lulwe. Sigaloma hu “saaye jije” ko ohuloma nʼahooheramo abaatu eduuli, aye gamuloma ati, “nʼolusaaye lulwo.” Galoma hu muutu mulala era omuutu oyo nʼali nje Kurisito.
48003017	Ehi ndi hugesyaho ohuloma hiri hiiti, amagambi aga Hatonda gaŋa Abayisirayiri ni ŋabitireŋo emyaha ebihumi bine nʼadatu oluvanyuma lwʼohuhola endagaano ni Yibbulayimu, sigabbwagaŋo ndagaano yiye ni Yibbulayimu.
48003018	Singa hiba hiiti Hatonda atuŋa ehi gatusuubisa lwʼohwoheresa magambi, ehyo hiba hiraga hiiti sahituŋa olwohuba gahitusuubisa. Cooka Hatonda niye olwʼehisasabirisi hihye gaŋa Yibbulayimu ehyo ehi gamusuubisa era ni neefe huutyo po atuŋa.
48003019	Ne ni hiba hiityo, hiina ehyene ehyagira Hatonda gataŋo amagambi? Gagataŋo gayeede ohulaga obubbengi wʼabaatu era gaali nʼohutamba ohwola hu huuja hwʼoyo oyu hisuubise hiromaho. Hatonda gaŋambya Musa amagambi nʼabita mu malayika ahole nga wakwenda wuwe agoose eyiri abaatu.
48003020	Wakwenda abaaŋo olwʼohuŋimba enjuyi eji hiŋambaho. Aye Hatonda gaali yeŋene nʼahola ehisuubiso.
48003021	Olwo ŋaahani hulome huuti amagambi aga Hatonda gaŋa Musa gabbwagaŋo ehisuubiso hihye? Kadi naŋadiidiri! Olwohuba hiba ni hiri hiityo hani omuutu asuna obulamu obutaŋwaŋo olwʼohwoheresa amagambi era hani omuutu alongoosa ekolagana yiye ni Hatonda olwʼohwoheresa amagambi ago.
48003022	Aye Ebyaŋandiihiwa nibyo biroma biiti amaani gʼehibi gatuhaada hwesihwesi era hwaba hyʼabasibe abaŋuma bwecuuhise. Ehyo hiri hiityo hiŋeese abafugiirira Yesu Kurisito ehi Hatonda gasuubisa ohuŋa abaatu olwʼohufugiirira.
48003023	Ehiseera hyʼabaatu ohufugiirira Yesu ni hyali ni hihiiri hwola, amagambi ga Musa ago gaali gatuhaadire ni gatuhadaahise hyʼabasibe mu komera. Ehyo hiretere abaatu ohusuna esuubi eryʼohuba nʼedembe ohuŋwa mu busibe obwo olwʼohufugiirira Yesu.
48003024	Ehiri ti Hatonda gataŋo amagambi gabe hya nyapala ohutulabirira ohwola hu huuja hwa Kurisito ko Hatonda atubale ohuba abagwalaafu olwʼohumufugiirira.
48003025	Ŋaahani Kurisito nʼahenire ohuuja, amagambi sigahiiri nyapala weefe ohutucuunganga.
48003026	Olwʼohufugiirira Yesu Kurisito, mwesimwesi aŋaŋuma hubihisya mwafuuha baana ba Hatonda,
48003027	olwohuba enywe mwesimwesi abahena ohubatiziwa ohulaga muuti mwengira mu muhumba ni Kurisito ebikolwa byenywe bifaana hyʼebya Kurisito.
48003028	Eyiri Hatonda, siŋahiiriŋo njabulo ŋagati wʼOmuyudaaya nʼAtali Muyudaaya, omwidu nʼatali mwidu, omuhasi nʼomusinde. Mwesimwesi muli cʼehyene olwʼekolagana eriŋo ŋagati wa hiisi mulala hu nywe ni Yesu Kurisito.
48003029	Olwohuba muli ba Yesu Kurisito, mwesi bababala ohuba lusaaye lwa Yibbulayimu era mulisuna omugabo hu hirabo ehi Hatonda gamusuubisa.
48004001	Mu ngeri eyindi, ehi ndoma huŋanga ohuhigeragerania hu mwana omuseere mu mago ga semwana. Omwana oyo anaba nʼahiiri muŋere, saabaho njabulo nʼomuŋeeresa womu mago ago olwohuba wayire aba njʼomwene biitu ebiri ŋango aŋo mu hiseera ehyo sabyehenerera.
48004002	Omwana oyo bamutaho omuutu ohumubbiita, era gamuhuumira ebiitu ohwola ehiseera ehi semwana galaga ohubimuŋambya hyola.
48004003	Mu ngeri njʼenyene hwesi ni hwali ni huhiiri hufugiirira Kurisito, hwali hyʼomwana oyo era ni huli hyʼabeedu ni hundembuhira emisambwa nʼobulombolombo obwomu hyalo hino ngʼolu omwidu agondera musengwawe.
48004004	Aye ehiseera ehiragaane ni hyola, Hatonda gatuma Yesu Omwana wuwe mu hyalo nga yeesi omuhasi amusaala era nga yeesi aba nʼohwoheresa amagambi ga Musa.
48004005	Ebyo byaliŋo olwʼohutununula eyiri obuŋugi bwʼamagambi hwesihwesi hwahasuna omugabo gwefe ogutusaanira ngʼabaana ba Hatonda.
48004006	Olwohuba hwesihwesi huli baana ba Hatonda, gatuma Omwoyo Omutukuvu ohuŋwa eri Yesu Omwana wuwe gaaje amenye mu myoyo jeefe. Omwoyo oyo njʼatuŋa obugumu obwʼohwehahasa huuti huli baana ba Hatonda era hwamulanga “Bbaabba.”
48004007	Olwʼehyo muhimanye muuti simuhiiri beedu aye ŋaahani hiisi mulala hunywe mwana wa Hatonda. Era olwohuba mwana mu nyumba yiye, Hatonda gabaŋaaye obusika bwʼebi gasuubisa.
48004008	Halehale ni mwali ni muhiiri huba nʼekolagana ni Hatonda, ebinambulamo ebitali Hatonda njʼebyabaŋuganga ni bibahosa hiisi hiitu hyʼomwidu oyu musengwa wuwe ahosa hiisi ehi aba ni gendire.
48004009	Ngʼolu ŋaahani mumanyire Hatonda era ehihiraho ehyo yeesi abamanyire ati muli babe, hiina ehyene ehigira ni muŋemba ohwagama eyi mwaŋwa mugendere mu buteekateeka nʼobulombolombo bwʼehyalo ebi mwaŋunuha? Ehi muloma mwenda mwagameyo mu busibe bwabyo?
48004010	Mbo mwesi mutagihire ohulonderesa obulombolombo obutali bwenywe obuŋamba hu ndaalo ekulu, emyesi, ebiro ŋalala nʼemyaha ejenjabulo olwʼohwendula obuhoda eyiri Hatonda!
48004011	Ndi mweŋendeherefu olwʼebiitu ebi muhola! Olwo obuŋeeresa bwange eyi muli ko bwenda hufa busa?
48004012	Olwʼehyo, boluganda mbegayirira mwefihule ebiitu ebyo mube hyange ngʼolu nabyefihula nafaana hyenywe olu mwali oludaayi. Mubaaye mutebisyangaho bubi eyi ndi aye ŋaahani mwenda hwonoona oluŋayo.
48004013	Muhimanyire bulaŋi muuti nʼali niijire ewenywe lwʼobulwaye nga ko mbalomera Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi aga Yesu.
48004014	Wayire nʼali mulwaye, simwambisayamo moni aye mwasangaalira mu ngeri eyi mwahasangaaliiyemo Malayika wa Hatonda, aŋandi oti hani nʼali ndiise Yesu Kurisito omwene!
48004015	Esangaalo eryo lyosiryosi eri mwasangaalira lyaja ŋeena? Mu hiseera ehyo ŋaŋuma ehi mwali ni mutaŋanga hukolera nʼolu nahabalomire ohwomolamo emoni jenywe mujiipe!
48004016	Olwo ŋaahani ko fuuhire musigu eyi muli olwʼohubahayula ni mbalomera ehituufu olwʼohugota ohu muli hugota?
48004017	Abo aberanga ti babalumirwa ehi baliho hya hubabbaamya muŋambe obulombolombo bwawe. Ehigendererwa hyawe sihiraŋi olwohuba ehi baliho hyahwenda hutwabuhania, efe ni nenywe abatafugiirira byawe ko bahene babegoboseho.
48004018	Hiraŋi ohulaga muuti muwagira ebi mbegirisa. Aye ehyo si muli nʼohuhihola lwʼohwehenaho ni niijire eyi muli.
48004019	Baana bange! Ohufaana hyʼomuhasi alumwa ebise ni genda husaala keesi pulira obulumi nʼohweŋendeherera hu lwenywe ohwola olu Kurisito anahengire era gaamenya mu bulamu bwenywe.
48004020	Hiba ni hiŋangiha nahaajire eyo naaba ni nenywe hu nyanga enyene yino nacuusaho nʼamalomere olwohuba ebi muhola olwʼohutaba ŋalala ni nenywe, bikenire bugali efiiri hu mutwe.
48004021	Ale ni mundomereho, enywe omwenda ohugendera ŋaasi wʼamagambi ga Musa, hanye mumanyire ehi Musa gaŋandiiha mu magambi ago?
48004022	Baŋandiiha mu magambi ago baati Yibbulayimu gaali nʼabasaani babiri. Mulala hu bo gaali musaani wʼAgali omuhasi owaali omwidu nʼowundi, gaali musaani wa Saala omuhasi omweneŋo.
48004023	Ohusaaliwa hwʼabasaani ba Yibbulayimu abo hwosi hwalimo enjabulo. Omusaani oyu gasaala nʼomuhasi omwidu gamusaaye mu ngeri eya bulijo aye ohusaaliwa hwʼomusaani owʼomuhasi omweneŋo, hwali hwʼehyamaliholiho oluvanyuma lwa Hatonda ohuŋa semwana ehisuubiso hyʼohumusaala.
48004024	Ebiitu ebyo hubiŋira ohuba mu hifaananyi hyʼolugero olwohuba abahasi bano bombi bali mu hifaananyi hyʼendagaano ebiri eji Hatonda gaahola. Ndala hu ndagaano ejo gayiholera hu lusozi Sinaayi era yaalimo ohugondera amagambi aga gaŋa Musa. Eyo njʼeya Agali owaali omwidu nʼabaana babe aba asaala.
48004025	Agali ali hyʼolusozi Sinaayi mu hyalo hyʼe Buŋarabbu era Agali ali mu hifaananyi hyʼehibuga Yerusaalemu mu mbeera eyi hirimo hatyane olwohuba abali mu hibuga ehyo nʼabahiihalamo bali mu wiidu.
48004026	Aye ŋaliŋo ehibuga Yerusaalemu ehinyaaha ehiri mwigulu era abo abalihiihalamo bali mu dembe era sibali ŋaasi wʼobuŋugi bwʼamagambi. Efe abasuubira ohuba mu hibuga ehyo huhiŋirira mu hifaananyi hya nyineefe olwohuba huli baana ba Hatonda abʼedembe.
48004027	Ebyaŋandiihiwa biroma biiti, “Saŋalya ewe omuhasi omugumba, atasaala; otaŋoleera huŋoleera aye lereesula ehigalagala ewe atabonangaho bise byʼohusaala olwohuba omuhasi nabunobe anahooŋe oluhulende abaana ababe baahira abanawende obungi.”
48004028	Ŋaahani boluganda muhimanye muuti muli baana ba Hatonda olwʼohufugiirira ebi gasuubisa era muli hya Yisaka omusaani wa Yibbulayimu oyu gasaala olwʼohufugiirira ehisuubiso hya Hatonda.
48004029	Era ohufaana ngʼolu omusaani wa Yibbulayimu oyu gasaala nʼomuhasi omwidu gahiyaania owahye owasaaliwa olwʼamaani gʼOmwoyo, hwesi huutyo pohuli. Abo abaŋeega baati huli nʼohugendera ŋaasi wʼamagambi ga Musa batuhiiyaania olwʼohufugiirira Kurisito.
48004030	Aye huhebulire ebi ebyaŋandiihiwa biroma hu songa yino. Biroma biiti, “Bbinga omuhasi oyo omwidu era atiine nʼomwana wuwe olwohuba omwana oyo abula mugabo mu byʼobusika bwa semwana ohutusaho omwana wʼomuhasi omweneŋo.”
48004031	Olwʼehyo balebe bange, efe abamufugiirira sihuli bomu lusaaye lwʼomuhasi omwidu abali ŋaasi wʼamagambi aye huli bomu lusaaye lwʼomuhasi omweneŋo.
48005001	Yesu gatuboŋolola mu busibe wʼamagambi ga Musa gaatuŋa edembe. Olwʼehyo mube badimamu ŋatabaŋo nindi abaatu ababahalubirisa ni babafiiha ehijoogi hyʼobuteekateeka nʼobulombolombo waawe.
48005002	Ale mwetege bulaŋi mbalomere! Ese Pawulo mbalomeraho ti hiisi olu munaganye babahomola mbo mwendula obuhoda eyiri Hatonda, ohufa hwa Kurisito hunaabe huhiibula mahulu kadi eyi muli.
48005003	Nindi hakigobolemo! Ndoma ti hiisi muutu anafugiirira bamuhomola omwene anaabe geboŋire mu mamiro omugoye ogwʼohuhola byosibyosi ebi amagambi gamulagira.
48005004	Era enywe abali hugesyaho ohwenda Hatonda ababale ohuba abagwalaafu ni mubita mu magambi, mwahena ohweyabula hu Kurisito era mwabeene mulehire engira ya Hatonda eyʼohusoniŋa olwʼehisasabirisi hihye.
48005005	Ne efe abataaye obwesige mu hisasabirisi hya Hatonda, Omwoyo Omutukuvu atuhahasa ati Hatonda aja hutubala ohuba abagwalaafu olwʼohufugiirira Kurisito.
48005006	Hino hiri hiityo olwohuba Hatonda saafayo oba omuutu muhomole oba simuhomole. Ehihulu ehi genda njʼomuutu ohwesiga Yesu Kurisito era ni genda nʼabahye.
48005007	Mwali mugenda bulaŋi ngʼabafugiirira ne ŋaahani hiina ehyaboolireho ko muŋwe hu hufugiirira obuhwenda obutuufu obuŋamba hu Kurisito?
48005008	Ohuhongeresa ohu babahongeresa sihuŋwa yiri Hatonda omwene hubangala ohuba abamufugiirira.
48005009	Muhebulire muuti ngʼolu hasimbukulusa ahadiidiri haleetera etome lyʼengaano efute ohusimbuluha ohuhira olu lyaga, ehibono bubono ehyʼesomesa ecaamu hyosi hiŋanga ohubbaamya abaatu oluhulende.
48005010	Ne ese mbalimo owesige mu Yesu Musengwa ti simunahabbaame mwaŋwa hu hi ndi hubaloma. Oyo abatabulatabula aja husuna omuhemba, haabe ani oba ani.
48005011	Aboluganda, ni ŋera mbanga ni ndoma abaatu ti bali nʼohuhomola ngʼolu abandi basidihaho, hani Abayudaaya abahiwagira bakiyaania? Mbanga ni mbalomera cʼehyo mu hifo hyʼohubalomera ti ohufa hwa Yesu hu musalabba njʼohunoŋola abaatu, hani sibakiyaania.
48005012	Hiba ni hiŋangiha abo ababahongeresa ohuhomola bahehereeye abeene begiduuliraho erala obusinde waawe!
48005013	Ne enywe balebe bange Hatonda gabatobooye mube mu bulamu obwʼedembe ni ŋaŋuma buteekateeka oba obulombolombo obubafuga. Simutambisanga dembe lyenywe ohwetolyonga mu byʼobusiru wabula hiisi muutu nʼaŋa owahye obuyeedi olwʼohumwenda.
48005014	Hino muhihole olwohuba amagambi gosigosi mu buupi gaŋwamo egambi erala eriroma liiti, “Yendanga muliranwawo ngʼolu weyenda ewe wamwene.”
48005015	Aye singa mubeererera ni muŋiriŋana mwaba hyʼagabwa agalumanira egumba, ni mutegenderesa mwabeene mwesihiirisa.
48005016	Olwʼehyo mbahubbirisa muganye Omwoyo Omutukuvu abe njʼabatangirira mu bi muhola ko mweŋalame ohwoheresa ebi mibiri jenywe jegomba.
48005017	Hino muli nʼohuhihola olwohuba ohwegomba hwenywe ohwʼomubiri huŋalula omugoye nʼOmwoyo hiisi hirala hubyo ni hyenda muhole ebi hibalagira. Ohuŋalula hwʼomugoye ohwo sihubaganya muhole ehi mwahendire ohuhola.
48005018	Aye singa Omwoyo aba njʼabatangiirira muba simuhiiri ŋaasi bwʼamagambi ga Musa.
48005019	Ebikolwa ebiŋwa mu hwegomba hwʼomubiri biri ŋalafu era hiisi muutu abimanyire. Birala hu byo mbebino; obuhwedi, ohwejabaata, ohuba owʼemoni enyangu;
48005020	ohusenga emisambwa nʼohuhola ebyʼobuŋeŋa, obucaayi, ohweduhaniaduhania, ekenyera, etima, ohweŋeegaho, ohweyabujula, ohwesalasalamo obubbubbu,
48005021	egongi, obumeesi, ohutaŋwa mu binyumo ko nʼebindi ebiri hyʼebyo. Nindi mbalabula ngʼolu nabalabula oludaayi ti abahola ebyo babula mugabo mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda.
48005022	Ebikolwa ebyʼomuutu oyu Omwoyo wa Hatonda atangirira nibyo byanjabulo era mbebino; ohwenda abahyo, esangaalo, ohwenda emiyaaya, obugumikiriza, ehyere, obuutu bulamu, obwesigwa,
