48005023	ohuŋamba ebiitu pola nʼohwegenderesa. Nʼohola ebyo, siŋabaŋo gambi eri obbwaga.
48005024	Abo abali mu Yesu Kurisito bahomerera ohwegomba hwʼomubiri ohu baali ni nahwo oludaayi.
48005025	Hanye dala Omwoyo wa Hatonda gatuŋa obulamu obunyaaha, huganye huhole ebi genda huhole.
48005026	Hutaba mu hwepaahapaaha ni huluŋia abahyefe era ni hubaleeteranga ohugongeera.
48006001	Aboluganda, singa ŋabaŋo owahyenywe agwa mu hibi, enywe abadimamu mu hufugiirira mumuŋambenga pola mwamuyeeda ohuŋwa mu hibi ehyo. Cooka oyo aba nʼamuyeeda gegenderesenga yeesi atagwa mu hibi.
48006002	Singa ŋabaŋo owahyenywe ali mu bigosi, mumuŋambirengaho gabihenaŋo. Ni munaholenga muutyo munaabenga mwoherehiise egambi eri Kurisito gaatuŋa.
48006003	Muhimanye muuti singa omuutu geŋeegaho ngʼolu ali wahitalo ate nga ko panaŋo aba gedulinga omwene.
48006004	Ehihiraho obulaŋi muutu hwehebera ebikolwa bibye omwene gebuuse hanye biraŋi. Nʼahena ehyo, nga ko gesiima hu lwʼebiraŋi ebi aba nʼahola, cooka nʼatahihola olwʼohweŋeraŋerania hu bahye.
48006005	Muhebulire muuti hiisi muutu ali nʼohwetwiha obuvunanyiziwa bubwe.
48006006	Musaanira ohuŋangaho ababegirisa ehibono hya Hatonda, omugabo ogusaanira hu biitu byenywe ebi muli ni nabyo.
48006007	Omuutu atabahooŋanga hubabbaamya. Muhebulire muuti sihuŋanga hwebbalakania hu Hatonda olwohuba ngʼolu muutu ageesa ehyo ehyene nʼehyene ehi aba ni gamwa, ni Hatonda atyo po ahola. Asasula omuutu ni geema hu ehyo ehi aba nʼaholire.
48006008	Olwʼehyo Hatonda aligudya hiisi muutu olwʼehibi ehi omubiri gugwe gumutuma ohuhola era gasasula oyo ahola ehi Omwoyo Omutukuvu amulagira ohuhola, nʼehirabo hyʼobulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
48006009	Ale ni hutademba huholanga biraŋi olwohuba ehiseera ehiragaane ni hiryola, Hatonda alituŋamo omuhemba.
48006010	Ngʼolu huhiiri nʼekabi eyo hwegumye ohuholera abaatu bosibosi ebiraŋi ko weyite abafugiirira bahyefe.
48006011	Ale ni mwetege bulaŋi mufaanie bino olwohuba samwene ndi hubiŋandiiha nʼomuhono gwange omwene mu ganyikuta agabbala.
48006012	Abo abenda ohweragalaga ebinambulamo bali hugesyaho ohubaŋagia muhomole. Ehyo bahihola olwʼohwenda batabahiyaania olwohuba sibenda hulomera abaatu baati Hatonda asoniŋa ebibi olwʼohufugiirira baati Yesu Kurisito gaabafiirira hu musalabba.
48006013	Mbaloma bino olwohuba Abayudaaya abo ababomeeyeho nʼesomesa yaawe ti muhomole, boosi siboheresa ebi magambi ga Musa galagira ohutusaho benda muhomole basune ehi banepaahe olwʼohuhomola hwenywe.
48006014	Ne ese simbona ehi nepaahisa ohutusaho nepaaha olwa Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito owaafiirira hu musalabba. Ehi gaakolera hu musalabba, hindeteera ohutaŋemba hu bi baatu abandi mu hyalo basangalira era boosi ehyo hibaleetera ohutambalamo magesi.
48006015	Ohwepaaha hwange huli mu hufa hwa Kurisito hu musalabba olwohuba Hatonda saafayo oba omuutu muhomole oba simuhomole. Ye ehi abala hu muutu hya huba mu bulamu obunyaaha olwʼohufugiirira Kurisito.
48006016	Sunga Hatonda aŋambire hiisi muutu anagendere mu bindomire ehisasabirisi era amuŋe emiyaaya. Ko weyite Yisirayiri, abaatu ba Hatonda abali mu hifaananyi hya Yisirayiri.
48006017	Ehisembayo, nenda ohwema olwa leero abaatu abo baasoniŋe, ŋatabaŋo nindi owundambya mu songa jino olwohuba emamba eji ndi ni najo olwohuba muhwenda wa Yesu nibo bajiŋuma.
48006018	Boluganda, Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito abaŋambire ehisasabirisi. Amiina.
49001001	Ndiise Pawulo omuhwenda wa Yesu Kurisito olwʼohusiima hwa Hatonda. Pandiihira enywe abagwalaafu, abesiga Yesu Kurisito abali mu hibuga Efeeso.
49001002	Hatonda Seefe ni Musengwa Yesu Kurisito babaŋambire ehisasabirisi era babaŋe emiyaaya.
49001003	Hujumirya Hatonda Semwana ya Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito owabitira mu Kurisito ohutuŋa hiisi kabi ejomwigulu.
49001004	Hatonda nʼahiiri hutonda ehyalo gaatutobola, nʼabita mu Kurisito, hube bagwalaafu ni huŋumaho hamogo mu moni jije. Olwʼohutwenda,
49001005	gasalaŋo ohuŋwa ahale nahale ohutufuula baana babe nʼabita mu Yesu Kurisito olwʼohusiima huhwe,
49001006	cʼehigira huli nʼohumujumirya olwʼehisasabirisi hihye ehi gatuŋa nʼabita mu Mwana wuwe oyo omuhoda.
49001007	Kurisito ni gafa, amafugi gage gatununula ngʼatusoniŋa ebibi. Ehisasabirisi hya Hatonda
49001008	ehi gatuyomboolera hyatuŋa amagesi ohufaania etegeha yiye.
49001009	Era gatuhwehulira ehyama ehi gaali nʼategehire ohwoheresa nʼabita mu Kurisito.
49001010	Etegeha yiye yiri yiiti ehiseera ni hyolire, aleete ŋalala ebiitu byosibyosi ebiri mwigulu nʼohu hyalo, ŋaasi wʼobuŋugi wa Kurisito.
49001011	Olwa Kurisito, Hatonda gatutobola gaahena gatwabula ohuba abaatu babe ngʼolu genda era ahola byosibyosi ni geema hu tegeha yiye yira eya halehale,
49001012	ko efe Abayudaaya abehereeye ohuba nʼesuubi mu Kurisito, humujumirye era humuŋe eŋono.
49001013	Era enywe Abatali Bayudaaya mwesi Hatonda gabafuula abaatu babe ni mwaŋulira amazima, njʼAmaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu hunoŋoha. Ni muhenire ohufugiirira Kurisito, gaabaŋa Omwoyo Omutukuvu oyu gabasuubisa ohuŋwa ahale nahale ohulaga ati muli babe.
49001014	Omwoyo oyo njʼahabonero ahahahasa haati Hatonda alituŋa ebi gasuubisa abaatu babe era ti aja hutununula, leha humujumirye olwʼeŋono lirye.
49001015	Olwʼehyo, ohuŋwa olu nʼaŋulira ti mufugiirira Yesu Musengwa era mwenda abagwaalafu bosibosi,
49001016	sindeherangaho ohweyaasa Hatonda hu lwenywe mu husaba hwange.
49001017	Mbasabira ti Hatonda wa Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito era Seefe oweŋono, abaŋe Omwoyo Omutukuvu ko mwahaba nʼamagesi mumutegeere bulaŋi.
49001018	Era saba ti emoni jenywe ejomu hida jirimbuhe mufaanie ebiitu ebyʼamaani ebi Hatonda gabalangira era mulindirire ni ŋaŋuma hubuusabuusa ebi gasuubisa abaatu babe.
49001019	Saba ti mutegere amaani gage amabitiirifu ohuhira gosigosi era agatuyeeda efe abafugiirira.
49001020	Amaani ameene ago, njʼagalamusa Kurisito ngʼahena gehala mu hifo ehyʼeŋono hu lubega lwʼomuhono omulungi ogwa Hatonda mwigulu.
49001021	Kurisito oyo ali ŋamugulu wʼobuŋangi nʼabaŋugi era aŋuga abanamaani nʼabahombe bosibosi, siŋahani hyoŋene aye emirembe nʼemirembe.
49001022	Hatonda gaata ebiitu byosibyosi ŋaasi wʼobuŋangi wa Kurisito era ngʼamufuula Musengwa era aŋuga hiisi hiitu olwʼabo abamufugiirira.
49001023	Abafugiirira abo, njʼomubiri gwa Kurisito era njʼaleetera hiisi hiitu ohuba nʼobulamu.
49002001	Ni mwali ni muhiiri hufugiirira Yesu, mwali bafu mu mwoyo olwʼebibi byenywe.
49002002	Mwalondereranga esambo embi ejʼehyalo hino, ni mudembuhira Sitaani, omwoyo oguŋuga ŋa mugulu mu bbanga. Hatyane, omwoyo jana ogwo njʼoguŋuga abo abajeemera Hatonda.
49002003	Ohwegomba ohwʼomubiri nʼepeega yeefe embi ni bituŋuga ngʼolu byali ni biŋuga abaatu abandi. Era olwʼebibi ebyo, hwesihwesi Hatonda gaali atuliho ehiruŋi.
49002004	Aye Hatonda olwʼohutwenda obugali nʼolwehisa hihye ehibitiirifu,
49002005	gatulamuhisa ŋalala ni Kurisito ohuŋwa mu bujeemu omu hwali ni hufiiriye, gatunoŋola olwʼehisasabirisi hihye.
49002006	Hatonda gatulamuhisa ŋalala ni Yesu Kurisito era ngʼatwihasa ni naye mwigulu olwohuba huli hirala ni naye.
49002007	Gaahola ehyo ohulaga abomu mirembe ejiribaŋo obulaŋi nʼehisasabirisi hihye ehibitiirifu ehi gatuŋambira mu Yesu Kurisito.
49002008	Mwanoŋoha olwʼehisasabirisi hihye olu mwamufugiirira, olwohuba ohunoŋoha si maani genywe aye hirabo hya Hatonda.
49002009	Hatonda sigabanoŋola olwʼebikolwa byenywe ebiraŋi olwʼehyo ŋaŋume owepaahapaaha.
49002010	Hatonda gatutonda nʼabita mu Yesu Kurisito ohuholanga ebiraŋi ebi gatutegehera.
49002011	Olwʼehyo, enywe Abatali Bayudaaya era “abatali bahomole” ngʼolu Abayudaaya babalanga olwohuba mbo nibo bahomole, (ohuhomola ohu baatu bahomola nʼengalo) muhebulire ehi mwali mu biseera ebyahale.
49002012	Mwali muŋuma Kurisito era simwali baatu ba Hatonda, ni batababalira hu gwanga eryʼAbayisirayiri, abaatu ba Hatonda era ni muŋuma mugabo mu ndagaano ejirimo ebi Hatonda gasuubisa. Mwali muŋuma suubi lyosiryosi era ni muŋuma Hatonda omwene buŋangi.
49002013	Aye ŋaahani ohubita mu hufa hwa Yesu Kurisito, enywe abaali ni mwedanyiriiye aŋaleeŋi, Hatonda gabeegeresa huupi olwʼamafugi ga Kurisito.
49002014	Kurisito galeeta emiyaaya, gaagira Abayudaaya nʼAbatali Bayudaaya hwaba muutu mulala, gatusaŋo obulabe owaali hyʼehiteepe ni butwabuujula.
49002015	Olu gafa hu musalabba, gadibya ebiragiro nʼamagambi gʼEhiyudaaya ko afaaŋanie Abayudaaya nʼAbatali Bayudaaya ohuba egwanga erala era enyaaha mu moni ja Hatonda, mu kola eyo galeetaŋo emiyaaya.
49002016	Ohufa huhwe hu musalabba hwatufaaŋania ni Hatonda hwatusaŋo obulabe ŋagati wʼAbayudaaya nʼAbatali Bayudaaya, hwesihwesi hwagobola ŋalala.
49002017	Kurisito gaaja gabalomera enywe Abatali Bayudaaya abaali aŋaleeŋi ni Hatonda nʼAbayudaaya abaali ohuupi ni naye, Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi.
49002018	Ŋaahani hwesihwesi hubita mu Kurisito oyo ko hwola eyiri Hatonda Seefe olwʼamaani gʼOmwoyo wuwe.
49002019	Olwʼehyo, enywe Abatali Bayudaaya simuhiiri balugendwa aye muli bʼehiha hirala nʼabaatu ba Hatonda era abomu nyumba yiye.
49002020	Enywe muli nyumba eyi baatongola hu musingi gwʼesomesa yʼabahwenda nʼabanaabbi, Yesu Kurisito omwene nʼali njʼebaale eryomu sonda era eryʼomugaso.
49002021	Kurisito njʼaŋambiriiye enyumba eyo yosiyosi era njʼagira yagalama yaba Yekaalu enjabufu eya Musengwa.
49002022	Mu Kurisito, enywe mwesi Abatali Bayudaaya, babatongolera ŋalala ni neefe Abayudaaya ohuba enyumba omu Mwoyo wa Hatonda amenya.
49003001	Ale ese Pawulo oyu baaboŋa hu lwenywe Abatali Bayudaaya olwohuba pereesa Yesu Kurisito.
49003002	Mbalomera ti ngʼolu mwaŋulira, Hatonda gaapambira ehisasabirisi gaapa omulimo ogwʼohulomera Abatali Bayudaaya Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi.
49003003	Ko huloma gakwehulira ehyama hihye ngʼolu pandiihire mu buupi.
49003004	Mu husoma ebbaluŋa yino, muja hufaania ngʼolu Kurisito njʼehyama ehyo.
49003005	Hatonda sigahwehulira abomu mirembe ejʼahale ehyama ehyo, ngʼolu hiri ŋaahani nʼabita mu Omwoyo Omutukuvu eyiri abahwenda nʼabanaabbi babe abagaabula ohumuŋeeresa.
49003006	Ehyama hiri hiiti, Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi gagira Abatali Bayudaaya basuna omugabo ŋalala nʼAbayudaaya hu hisuubiszo hya Hatonda ohubanoŋola. Era bosibosi mubiri mulala ohubita mu Yesu Kurisito.
49003007	Olwʼehisasabirisi hya Hatonda, gaapa ekabi ohuba omuŋeeresa ohulomera abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi gano olwʼamaani gage.
49003008	Wayire ndiise owʼedaala erya ŋaasi mu abaatu ba Hatonda bosibosi, aye gaapa ekabi ohulomera Abatali Bayudaaya Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu buŋinda obubitiirifu obuli mu Kurisito.
49003009	Era Hatonda oyo owatonda hiisi hiitu, gaatuma ohulomera abaatu bosibosi ebiŋamba hu hyama ehyo ehi gaali nʼahwehire ohuŋwa ahale nahale.
49003010	Ehigendererwa hihye hiri hiiti ŋaahani nʼabita mu abafugiirira Kurisito, balomere emisambwa nʼabanamaani abali mu bbanga ebiŋamba hu magesi gage amangi agataŋwayo.
49003011	Ohunoŋola abaatu, njʼeyaali etegeha ya Hatonda ko atonde ehyalo era gayoheresa nʼabita mu Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito.
49003012	Ŋaahani ni hubita mu Kurisito oyo olwʼohumufugiirira, hwigerera eyiri Hatonda nʼobugumu.
49003013	Olwʼehyo, mbegalihira mutaŋwamo maani olwʼohungudya ohubangudya hu lwenywe, olwohuba hyasuno eyi muli.
49003014	Cʼehigira kubbira Hatonda seefe amafuha ni mbasabira,
49003015	Hatonda oyo njʼowatonda ebiitu byosibyosi mwigulu nʼohu hyalo.
49003016	Saba ti Hatonda owʼeŋono eryʼamaani, abaŋe amaani gage nʼabita mu Mwoyo wuwe.
49003017	Era saba ti mufaanie ngʼolu Hatonda abenda bugali weene era Kurisito amenye mu mwoyo jenywe olwʼohumufugiirira ko musigale ni muli bagumu,
49003018	ko enywe ŋalala nʼabagwalaafu abandi bosibosi, muŋange ohufaania ohwenda hwa Kurisito ngʼolu huli hwʼamaani.
49003019	Era mumanye ohwenda hwa Kurisito ohwo eyiri abaatu, ohwenda ohu omuutu ataŋanga hufaania mu magesi gage agʼobuutu ko mube nʼobulamu obu Hatonda genda.
49003020	Ŋaahani Hatonda oyo ali nʼobuŋangi ohuhola nʼohuhiraho ebi humusunga nʼebi huŋeega, olwʼamaani gage agaholera mu efe.
49003021	Abamufugiirira baŋenga Hatonda eŋono ohubita mu Yesu Kurisito emirembe nʼemirembe. Amiina.
49004001	Ngʼomuutu oyu baaboŋa olwʼohuŋeeresa Musengwa, mbegalihira mube nʼesambo ejoolana nʼobulamu obu Hatonda gaabalanga ohuba ni nabwo.
49004002	Mube abaatu abatetulirisa, mweŋomehe era hiisi muutu gehalirihenga owahye olwʼohwendana.
49004003	Mufubengaho ohweyongera ohuloma hirala, Omwoyo wa Hatonda nʼali njʼabayeeda ohumenya ŋalala mu miyaaya.
49004004	Huli mubiri mulala, nʼOmwoyo wa Hatonda mulala ngʼolu hihusuubira ohusuna, hiri hirala.
49004005	Ŋaliŋo Musengwa mulala nʼobuhwenda bulala obu hufugiirira ko nʼohubatiziwa hulala ngʼahabonero ahalaga haati huli hirala ni Kurisito,
49004006	Hatonda, Semwana wʼabaatu bosibosi mulala aŋuga ebiitu byosibyosi, aholera era amenya mu hiisi muutu wuwe amufugiirira.
49004007	Kurisito gaŋa hiisi muutu ehirabo ehyʼenjabulo ngʼolu omwene asiima.
49004008	Cʼehigira ehyaŋandiihiwa hiroma hiiti, “Gaŋangula abasigu era ni gatiina mu hifo ehya ŋamugulu obugali gaaŋa abaatu ebirabo.”
49004009	Hitegeesa hi ohuloma oti gatiina mu hifo ehya ŋamugulu obugali? Hitegeesa hiiti geheerera ohwiha ŋaasi hu hyalo.
49004010	Oyo oweeha, njʼomwene oyo owatiina mwigulu ŋa mugulu obugali ohuhiraho ebireri ko amaamire hiisi hiitu.
49004011	Era njʼomwene oyo owaŋa abaatu ebirabo. Abandi gaabaŋa ohuba abahwenda babe, abandi ohuba abanaabbi, abandi ohuba abalomera abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi, abandi ohuba abaayi ko nʼohusomesa abaatu ba Hatonda.
49004012	Ehyo Kurisito gahihola ni genda batendehe abaatu babe mu mulimo gwʼohumuŋeeresa ko omubiri gugwe guhule,
49004013	ohwola hwesi hwesi olu huliba hyʼomuutu mulala mu hwesiga nʼohumanya Omwana wa Hatonda, huŋangale mu byʼomwoyo hube hya niye.
49004014	Aŋo sihunaahabe hyʼabaana abaŋere abacuuhacuusa aŋa naaŋa olwʼesomesa eyʼobudulingi era egodamya abaatu.
49004015	Aye hube bʼamazima era hwendane ko huhule mu hiisi ngeri hya Kurisito omutwe gwefe abamufugiirira.
49004016	Kurisito oyo aleetera omubiri gwosigwosi ohweŋimba ŋalala, hiisi muutu nʼahola omulimo gugwe ko omubiri gwosigwosi gwahula olwʼohwendana.
49004017	Mutege ohutwi mbalomere hino olwʼobuŋangi wa Musengwa, era leha mbaŋe hu magesi ti mulehere aŋo ohwebisya hyʼabaatu abali nʼepeega embi abatafugiirira Hatonda.
49004018	Obulamu bwawe wijuuye ehiirema era baŋuma mugabo ogwʼobulamu obutaŋwaŋo olwʼobuŋaayi nʼobuhahanyafu wʼemyoyo jaawe.
49004019	Baŋuma nʼesoni era baŋwera mu huhola ebyʼobuŋemu. Bali nʼomulungo ohuhola ebibi ebya hiisi ngeri aŋaŋuma hwemoota.
49004020	Aye enywe sibabasomesa baatyo hu Kurisito.
49004021	Mu butuufu, mwaŋulira obuhwenda owʼamazima obuŋamba hu Yesu.
49004022	Ngʼolu babasomesa, mwefiihule obulamu obuhale owijuuye ohwegomba ohwʼobudulingi obu mwalimo ni muhiiri hufugiirira Yesu.
49004023	Mwambale obulamu obunyaaha ohuŋwa ewa Hatonda, mufuuhe banyaaha nʼomu biŋeego byenywe,
49004024	era mube baatu abanyaaha aba gatonda mu hifaananyi hihye ohubeera erala abagwalaafu era abamusangaasa.
49004025	Olwʼehyo, mulehe obudulingi, hiisi muutu alomenga amazima olwohuba huli mubiri mulala.
49004026	Ŋanabaŋo ehi baluŋia, mwehuumenga ohutabaleetera huhola hibi. Mutagwisanga eryuba ni muhiiruŋire,
49004027	era mutaŋanga Sitaani ebbanga ohubahema ohuhola ehibi.
49004028	Omwibi alehere aŋo ohwiba aye abeho nʼehyahola aŋange ohuyeedaho abo abagadi.
49004029	Mweŋalame endoma embi aye ebibono byenywe bibe ebiyeeda abo ababiŋulira.
49004030	Era muteŋunamisanga Omwoyo wa Hatonda olwohuba njʼahabonero ahalaga haati balibanunula hu ludaalo olwʼekomerero.
49004031	Mweŋalenga ohuba abaatu abehabyo nʼoluswa. Mutaŋayirisanga oba ohuŋalatana nʼomuutu yesiyesi.
49004032	Aye hiisi muutu alumirwenga era asoniŋenga owahye ngʼolu Hatonda gabasoniŋa nʼabita mu Kurisito.
49005001	Ŋaahani ngʼolu muli abaana ba Hatonda abahoda, leha abe ehyʼohuboneraho mu bulamu wenywe,
49005002	era mwendanenga ngʼolu Kurisito gatwenda geeŋayo gaafa hu lwefe ohuba eŋongo erisangaasa Hatonda.
49005003	Mutaholanga obuhwedi oba omuutu yesiyesi ohuba nʼemoni enyangu oba ayayaanira ebibi byʼehyalo hino. Ebiitu hyʼebyo, sihiraŋi ohuba mu abaatu ba Hatonda.
49005004	Mutalomanga ebyʼobuŋemu wayire ohumooca ohwehisirusiru aye mweyaasenga hweyaasa Hatonda.
49005005	Hino muhimanyire erala muuti ŋaŋuma muhwedi wayire oyo ahola ebyʼobuŋemu oba ebyʼobudakaani oba aŋemberesa hu ebibi byʼehyalo hino, ko njʼohujumirya ebitali Hatonda, alisuna omugabo mu buŋugi bwa Hatonda ni Kurisito.
49005006	Omuutu yesiyesi saabadulinganga ati Hatonda afugiirira ebiitu hyʼebyo, olwohuba aligudya abajeemu, nʼehiruŋi.
49005007	Olwʼehyo, mutaholanga muhumba nʼabaatu hyʼabo.
49005008	Ni muhiiri hufugiirira Kurisito, mwagenderanga mu hiirema aye ŋaahani ngʼolu muli nʼomuhumba ni Musengwa, mugenderenga mu njase olwohuba muli baatu bʼenjase.
49005009	Ehyo kiroma olwohuba enjase njʼegira omuutu gaahola ebiraŋi, ebiruŋamu era ebyʼamazima.
49005010	Era mugesyengaho ohuhola ebisangaasa Musengwa.
49005011	Mutaholanga ebiitu ebyʼehiirema olwohuba biŋuma ehi biyeeda aye mubyanihenga hubyaniha.
49005012	Hiŋambya nʼesoni ohuloma hu ebyo ebi bajeemu bahola mu ngiso.
49005013	Aye enjase enahubba mu hiirema, ebiitu byosibyosi ebyomu hiirema biboneherera,
49005014	olwohuba enjase njʼegira hiisi hiitu hyaboneha. Cʼehigira baloma baati, “Sisimuha ewe oli hyʼofuluuta, era ewe oli hyʼomufu lamuha oŋwe mu bafu, era onahola otyo, Kurisito aja hu huhwaduhisa enjase.”
49005015	Mwegenderesenga, mutebisyanga hyabaŋubeebe aye hyʼabali nʼamagesi.
49005016	Mutambisenga hiisi kabi eyi muba ni nayo bulaŋi ohuhola ebiraŋi olwohuba omulembe guno mubi.
49005017	Olwʼehyo, mutaba hyʼabatategeera aye mufaanie ehi Musengwa genda.
49005018	Era mutameeranga olwohuba ehyo hija hu bonoona aye mulehe Omwoyo Omutukuvu abamaamirenga.
49005019	Nʼomwoyo mulala, mwemberenga Musengwa e Zabbuli nʼenyembo ejʼohumujumirya, nʼeji Mwoyo abaŋa ohuseega.
49005020	Era habuhyabuhya mweyaasenga Hatonda Seefe olwʼebiitu byosibyosi, ebi Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito gaatuholera.
49005021	Hiisi muutu aŋulirenga owahye olwʼohuŋa Kurisito eŋono.
49005022	Abahasi, muŋulirenga abawamwenywe ngʼolu muŋulira Musengwa,
49005023	olwohuba omusinde njʼomutwe gwʼomuhasi wuwe ngʼolu Kurisito ali njʼomutwe gwʼabamufugiirira, omwene nʼali njʼOmunoŋosi waawe.
49005024	Ngʼolu abafugiirira bagondera Kurisito, nʼabahasi boosi baŋulirenga abawamwawe mu hiisi hiitu.
49005025	Abasinde, mwendenga abahasi benywe ngʼolu Kurisito gendire abamufugiirira era geeŋayo gafa hu lwawe,
49005026	gabagwalaasa nʼabooga nʼamaaji, njʼehibono hihye,
49005027	ko abamufugiirira abo, babe bagwalaafu eyi ali ni baŋumaho hamogo wayire mbalo oba efunyi.
49005028	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, nʼabasinde mwesi mwendenga abahasi benywe ngʼolu mweyenda mwabeene. Owenda omuhasi wuwe aba geyenda.
49005029	Ŋaŋuma kadi mulala owerya olubeŋe aye geeriisa era geerabirira ngʼolu Kurisito alabirira abamufugiirira,
49005030	olwohuba huli mubiri gugwe.
49005031	Hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Olwʼehyo, omusinde analehenga semwana ni nyina, geŋimba nʼomuhasi wuwe nga bombi bafuuha mubiri mulala.”
49005032	Hino hyama hihulu era hiraga ngʼolu Kurisito nʼabamufugiirira bali omuutu mulala.
49005033	Ale, hiisi musinde gendenga omuhasi wuwe ngʼolu geyenda omwene era nʼomuhasi yeesi aŋenga wamwe eŋono.
49006001	Abaana, mudembuhirenga abasaaye benywe hulwa Musengwa, olwohuba ehyo hiraŋi.
49006002	“Ŋanga lataawo ni maawo, eŋono,” lino njʼegambi edaayi eriri nʼehisuubiso ehiroma hiiti,
49006003	“Ko ebiitu bihutiinire bulaŋi era owangaale hu hyalo.”
49006004	Abasaaye mutanyigisanga baana benywe aye mubasomesenga ebi Musengwa genda.
49006005	Abeedu, mudembuhirenga abasengwa benywe era mubaŋenga eŋono nʼomwoyo mulala ngʼolu mwahadembuhiye Kurisito.
49006006	Ehyo mutahiholanga olwohuba babataayeho emoni aye muhiholenga ni muhenereeye ngʼabeedu ba Kurisito olwohuba ehyo njʼehi Hatonda abendaho.
49006007	Muŋeeresenga abasengwa benywe nʼomwoyo omulala hyʼabaŋeeresa Musengwa omwene sosi abaatu,
49006008	olwohuba muhimanyire muuti Musengwa aja huŋa hiisi muutu omuhemba, haabe mwidu oba bbe, ni geema hu hiisi hiraŋi ehi ahola.
49006009	Ni nenywe abali nʼabeedu, mubabisyenga bulaŋi ni ŋaŋuma hubahayula hiisi aŋa naaŋa. Muhebulire muuti Musengwa yenywe mwesimwesi ali mwigulu era ŋaŋuma oyu aboola.
49006010	Ehisembayo, mube badimamu hu lwʼamaani ga Musengwa.
49006011	Mwambale ebisoosa byosibyosi ebi Hatonda abaŋa ko muŋange ohuŋiriŋania ekwe ja Sitaani.
49006012	Sihuŋiriŋana nʼabaatu bahyefe abali nʼomubiri nʼamafugi aye nʼabaŋugi, nʼabanamaani, nʼamaani gʼehiirema agali mu hyalo muno ko nʼobuŋugi bwʼemisambwa eji ŋugira mu bbanga.
49006013	Olwʼehyo, mwambale ebisoosa bya Hatonda ko muŋange ohuŋiriŋania ekwe ja Sitaani nʼabawagaaye.
49006014	Ŋaahani mwemeerere ni mwesidihire amazima mu hihunya ngʼolu muutu geeboŋa omusipi, nʼebikolwa ebiraŋi bibe hyʼehyohwambala ehi musirikale gambala mu hifuba ohwehuumisa mu lutalo.
49006015	Mwambale engayito ohulaga ohwetegeha ohulomera abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi engeri eyi baŋanga ohusunamo emiyaaya ja Hatonda.
49006016	Ohumeeda hu ebyo byosibyosi, mube nʼohufugiirira hyʼengabo ko muŋange ohwehuuma obusaale wa Sitaani obuli hyʼomuliro owalasa.
49006017	Mwambale obunoŋosi hyʼekofiira eyi omusirikale gambala era muŋambe ehibono hya Hatonda ehi Omwoyo abaŋa hibe hyʼepiima ohusoosa omusigu.
49006018	Mu lutalo luno, Omwoyo abatangirirenga mu husaba ohwa buli hiha habuhyabuhya. Era mube butebute, mutaleheranga husabira abaatu ba Hatonda bosibosi.
49006019	Keesi musabirenga, Hatonda gaape ehyʼohuloma era ndomere abaatu nʼobugumu, ehyama ehiri mu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi.
49006020	Ndi mu komera olwʼohulomera abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi. Musabireho mbe nʼobugumu mbuulire ngʼolu hyahali.
49006021	Mulebe yeefe omuhoda oyu balanga baati Tukikasi era omuŋeeresa omwesigwa owa Musengwa, aja hu balomera hiisi ebiifaho nʼebi kola.
49006022	Cʼehigira ndihumutuma eyo olwʼesonga enyene eyo ko mumanye ngʼolu huli era abagobosemo nʼamaani.
49006023	Hatonda seefe ni Musengwa Yesu Kurisito, babaŋe emiyaaya nʼohwenda era babayeede ohuba nʼohufugiirira.
49006024	Hatonda abaŋambire ehisasabirisi, enywe mwesimwesi abenda Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito nʼomwoyo mulala.
50001001	Ndiise Pawulo ni Temuseewo abaŋeeresa ba Yesu Kurisito, mbaŋandiihira enywe abagwalaafu ŋalala nʼabalabirizi ko nʼabadiikoni abamenya mu hibuga hyʼe Filipi.
50001002	Hatonda Seefe ni Musengwa Yesu Kurisito babaŋambire ehisasabirisi era babaŋe nʼemiyaaya.
50001003	Neyaasa Hatonda wange hiisi olu mbaŋeegaho,
50001004	mu husaba hwange hwosihwosi ni mbasabira, saba nʼesangaalo,
50001005	olwohuba ohuŋwa olu mwafugiirira Kurisito ohwola hatyane, mwaneŋimbaho mu mulimo gwʼohubuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi.
50001006	Kahasa ti Hatonda owatandiha omulimo omulaŋi mu nywe, aja hweyongera ohuguhola ohwola olu Yesu Kurisito aligobola.
50001007	Mbaŋeegaho hiisi hiseera olwohuba mundi hu mwoyo era nʼomukomera muno munjeedire ohubuulira nʼohunyonyola abaatu ngʼolu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi gali gʼamazima. Olwʼehisasabirisi hya Hatonda ehi gatuŋambira, huli huholera ŋalala ohubuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi.
50001008	Mazima Hatonda amanyire ati mbenda mwesimwesi nʼohwenda ohuŋwa eyiri Yesu Kurisito.
50001009	Era mbasabira ti Hatonda abaŋangase mu hwendana ni mwijuuye amagesi nʼohutegeera,
50001010	ko musobole ohwabulaŋo ehiraŋi nʼehibi ohwola hu ludaalo olu Kurisito aligobola, abagaane ni muli bagwalaafu era abaŋumaho mbalo.
50001011	Muholenga ebikolwa ebiraŋi olwʼamaani aga Yesu Kurisito abaŋa. Era abaatu ni balibona ebikolwa byenywe ebiraŋi baja huŋa Hatonda eŋono.
50001012	Aboluganda, nenda mumanye muuti ebigosi ebinjolireho, bireteeye Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi ohweyongera ohusasaana.
50001013	Era ehyo hiŋwereyemo abasirikale bangi mu lubiri lwa habaha ko nʼabaatu abandi ohutegeera baati ndi mukomera olwohuba muloobera wa Kurisito.
50001014	Era olwohuba mukomera, Musengwa aŋaaye abalebe bangi obugumu ohubuulira Ehibono hya Hatonda ni babula hutya hwosihwosi.
50001015	Hituufu ti abandi babuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu Kurisito olwʼesaalwa nʼohusindania abahyawe aye abandi babuulira mu mwoyo omulaŋi.
50001016	Abo ababuulira mu mwoyo omulaŋi, bahihola olwohuba banyenda era bamanyire baati Hatonda gaataŋo ohubuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi.
50001017	Aye abo babuulira olwʼekirihindi nʼohusindana olwʼohwenda baati neyongere ohusuna ebigosi mu komera muno.
50001018	Aye ohubuulira ni basindana sinje hibbala. Sifayo oba omuutu abuulira lwʼehigendererwa ehibi oba ehiraŋi, ehihulu wiira babuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu Kurisito. Era olwʼehyo nja hweyongera ohusangaala,
50001019	manyire ti olwʼohusaba hwenywe, ebyo ebinjolireho biripweramo ohundehula olwʼamaani gʼOmwoyo wa Yesu Kurisito.
50001020	Suubira era manyire ti esoni si jija hupamba, ehyo hija huŋeesa Kurisito eŋono olwʼebiitu ebi kola nʼebi ndoma, mu ngeri eyi nebisyamo oba engeri eyi nahafemo.
50001021	Olwohuba mu bulamu wange nenda mbeŋo ni sangaasa Kurisito era ni fa hinahambeere hiraŋi ohuhira ohuba hu hyalo hino.
50001022	Ohusigala ni kiiri mulamu, hyosi hiraŋi ohweyongera ohuŋeeresa Kurisito aye simanyire hyahuhola, oba hweyongera ni kiiriŋo mulamu oba ohwefiira.
50001023	Ndi ŋagati aŋo, negomba ohuŋwa hu hyalo huno tiine nebeere ni Kurisito, olwohuba ehyo hisingira ohuba ehiraŋi.
50001024	Aye hu lwenywe, hya mugaso ohusigala ni kiiri mulamu.
50001025	Ehyo kiriho obuhahafu ti nja hweyongera ni kiiriŋo mulamu ohuyeeda ohunywania ohufugiirira hwenywe mwesimwesi, mwahasuna esangaalo.
50001026	Ni balindehula ndigobola eyo era mulisaŋalya olwa Yesu Kurisito hu lwange.
50001027	Mu hiisi mbeera, mwebisye ngʼolu hisaanira abaatu abafugiirira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi aga Yesu Kurisito. Oba ndigobola ohubabonaho oba pumayo ne ni pulira huŋulira ebibaŋambaho, nenda pulire ti muhiiri bagumu era muhola hirala mu huŋiriŋania abo abaŋiriŋania Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi.
50001028	Mutatya abo ababahiyaania ko habe habonero ahalaga haati Hatonda aja hubasihiirisa aye abaŋe enywe obulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
50001029	Hatonda genda mubonaabone hulwa Kurisito, sosi humufugiirira bufugiirire hyoŋene.
50001030	Mwesi muli mu lutalo njʼolwene hyʼolu nali ni nalwo ni ndi eyo era olu muŋulira muuti kiŋiriŋana mu komera muno.
50002001	Ohuba bulala ni Kurisito hibaŋa amaani? Olwohuba abenda sihibasangaasa? Muli bulala nʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu? Muŋambanira ehisasabirisi era hiisi muutu asaasira owahye?
50002002	Olwʼehyo, mbahubbirisa ohusangaasa ni muŋeega hirala, ni mwendana era ni muli nʼomwoyo mulala.
50002003	Muteyendesanga ebiraŋi mweŋene oba olwʼohwepaahapaaha aye mu hweŋomeha muŋirenga abaatu abandi ohuba nʼeŋono ohubahiraho.
50002004	Simufanga hu byenywe byoŋene aye mufenga nʼohu byʼabandi boosi.
50002005	Mubenga nʼepeega hyʼeyi Yesu Kurisito gaali ni nayo,
50002006	Wayire Kurisito gaali Hatonda, sigasigala mu hifo ehyo.
50002007	Aye getusaho eŋono lirye, gafugiirira ohufuuha omuŋeeresa gasaaliwa ngʼomuutu.
50002008	Era mu huba omuutu, gaali mugondi nʼohwola erala olu gafa hu musalabba.
50002009	Olwʼehyo Hatonda gaamuŋa obubbala, nʼobuŋangi nʼesiina erihira amasiina gosigosi obuŋangi,
50002010	ebitonde byosibyosi ebiri mwigulu nohu hyalo, era ni nʼebyo ebiri ŋaasi wehyalo bihubbirenga Yesu oyo amafuha,
50002011	era abaatu bosibosi baŋe Hatonda Bbaabba eŋono ni babbutula baati Yesu Kurisito nje Musengwa.
50002012	Olwʼehyo, balebe bange abahoda, ngʼolu mubaayenga ni mugondera Hatonda sosi ni ndi eyo ni nenywe hyoŋene aye hu nyanga yino ni mbulayo, mweyongere ohuhola ebiitu ebisaanira abaatu aba Hatonda ganoŋola. Muhole hino nʼohuteetema olwʼohumuŋa eŋono
50002013	olwohuba Hatonda njʼabayeeda ohwenda ohuhola ebigenda muhole era gaabaŋa nʼamaani ohubihola.
50002014	Ebiitu byosibyosi ebi muhola, mubiholenga ni muteŋuluŋunya oba ni mutaŋahana nʼabahyenywe.
50002015	Ni muhola muutyo, eriŋuma muutu yesiyesi aliboloobya era mumenye mu bulamu obulaŋi ngʼabaana ba Hatonda mu hyalo hino ehijuuye abaatu abahola ebibi. Mu hyalo hino, mube hyʼemunyeenye ejihosya egulu.
50002016	Mwegumye ohulomera abaatu ehibono hya Hatonda, ehibaleetera ohusuna obulamu obutaŋwaŋo. Singa muhola muutyo, muja hundeetera ohuba nʼohwenyumiirisa hu ludaalo olwʼekomerero olu Kurisito aligoboleraho, ohufabiina hwange eyo sihwali hufuuŋa muuya mu hisero.
50002017	Singa banjita, amafugi gange galiba hyʼehyohunywa ehibalitufuula ohwongera hu ŋongo nʼobuŋeeresa wenywe olwʼohufugiirira Kurisito era ehyo hindeetera ohusangaalira ŋalala ni nenywe mwesimwesi.
50002018	Era mwesi musangaalire ŋalala ni nange.
50002019	Musengwa Yesu Kurisito nʼalisiima, suubira ohubatumira Temuseewo mangu, ahene agobole gandomere ebibafaho nahagobolamo amaani.
50002020	Puma wundi yesiyesi abalumirwa bugali hya niye.
50002021	Olwohuba abahira obungi beyendulira byawe, sibafayo hu ebi Yesu Kurisito genda.
50002022	Aye mumanyire muuti Temuseewo abaaye mwesigwa olwohuba ngʼomwana ni semwana, huholeeye ŋalala omulimo ogwʼohubuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi.
50002023	Suubira ohumuŋindiha eyo oluvanyuma lwʼohumanya ebiitu ngʼolu bitiina eno.
50002024	Era kahasa ti Musengwa anahaganye bandehula, nga niija eyo mu hiseera ehitali hyaŋale.
50002025	Aye ni kiiri huuja eyo, mbwene ti hiraŋi ohubaŋindihira omuŋeeresa wahyange era owoluganda Epafuladito oyu mwatumira ohunjeedanga.
50002026	Olwohuba genda bugali mumuhubbeho emoni ko weyite olwʼohunyolwa ohu ali ni nahwo olwʼohumanya ati mwaŋulira ngʼolu galwala.
50002027	Hituufu galwala era ŋatono afe aye Hatonda gamuŋambira ehisa, sigasaasira niye yeŋene aye ni nange keesi, gaaponia obutahi.
50002028	Cʼehigira nenda bugali ohumutuma eyo, ko mwahasangaala ni mumuweneho era keesi ndeheraŋo ohweŋendeherera.
50002029	Mumusangaalire mu kola eyʼabaatu ba Musengwa. Era muŋenga abaatu hyʼabo eŋono,
50002030	olwohuba gaŋonera hu haala ohufa ni ganjeeda mu mulimo gwa Kurisito hu lwenywe.
50003001	Aboluganda, musangaalenga olwa Musengwa yeefe. Era ŋaŋuma bubi ohubaŋandiihira hu biitu njʼebyene olwohuba hija hubayeeda ohwehuuma abasomesa abʼobudulingi.
50003002	Mwehuumenga abaatu abo abali nʼesambo embi, Abayudaaya abasomesa mbo Hatonda genda muhomole omubiri obubiri.
50003003	Ndiife ohwasuna ohuhomola ohutuufu, olwohuba hujumirya Hatonda ngʼolu Omwoyo wuwe atuluŋamya era hwenyumirihisa olwa Yesu Kurisito, sihwesiga bulombolombo wʼabaatu ohutunoŋola.
50003004	Ni ŋaba ni ŋaliŋo omuutu owenyumirisa mu bikolwa ohunoŋola omuutu, ese ndi nʼebingi ebyʼohwenyumihirisamo.
50003005	Olwohuba ni baasaala, nahena endaalo munaana nga baakomola. Nasaaliwa Muyisirayiri, ohuŋwa mu hiha hya Bbenjamini, ndi Mubbebbulaniya endiho, mu huŋamba amagambi gʼEhiyudaaya, naali Mufalisaayo.
50003006	Naali nʼehinani mu huhiyaania abafugiirira Kurisito, ni netemaho mutwe mu huhuuma amagambi era ni neranga mugwalaafu.
50003007	Aye ebyo byosibyosi ebi naali ni peega ti byamugaso, ŋaahani mbibona nga sibyamugaso olwa Kurisito.
50003008	Ehituufu ehyene, ebiitu byosibyosi mbibona nga biŋuma mugaso olwohuba ohufugiirira Yesu Kurisito Musengwa hiitu hyamagoba amabitiirifu ohuhira byosibyosi.
50003009	Era sifululuhana huba mugwalaafu hu lwange olwʼohuhuuma amagambi gʼEhiyudaaya. Aye obugwalaafu obuŋwa eyiri Hatonda, hubusuna olwʼohufugiirira Kurisito.
50003010	Nenda ohutegeera Kurisito nʼamaani agamulamusa. Nenda mbite mu hubonaabona hyʼolu niye gabonaabona, faane hyaniye mu hufa huhwe.
50003011	Era keesi ni suubira ti ndiramuha.
50003012	Ese sindoma ti ehyo kenire ohuhisuna, ohutusaho ndi nʼohutiina mu moni, ohusuna ehyo ehi Yesu Kurisito gagenderera mu hufuula ohuba owuwe.
50003013	Aboluganda, manyire ti kiiri husuna ehifaabinira aye ehi kola njʼohwibirira ebyʼegongo nʼatiina mu moni.
50003014	Ehi kola njʼohwenda ohwola hu mugoye, ohusuna omuhemba ogu Hatonda gaategehera mwigulu olwʼohwenda ohufuula faane ni Yesu Kurisito.
50003015	Ŋaahani efe abaŋangafu mu hufugiirira, huli nʼohuba nʼepeega njʼenyene. Aye oba mu ngeri eyindi muŋeega lundi, Hatonda abayeede mutegeere.
50003016	Aye hugumire hu ehyo ehi hwasuna.
50003017	Aboluganda, mwesimwesi muŋire obulamu wange ko nʼowabandi abali nʼesambo endaŋi ngʼehyohuboneraho ngʼolu hwabasomesa.
50003018	Ngʼolu mbalomeeye emirundi nyingi era nindi ngobolamo ni ndira nʼamasiga, ti ŋaliŋo bangi abacaawa obuhwenda obuŋamba hu hufa hwa Yesu Kurisito hu musalabba.
50003019	Ekomerero yaawe huliba husihiiriha, ehida hyafuuha hatonda waawe nindi ebyahabaŋambisye esoni njʼebibenyumirihisamo, nʼebiŋeego byawe babiheneeye hu byʼehyalo.
50003020	Aye efe obutaka weefe buli mwigulu, era huhuumirira Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito Omunoŋosi, ohugobola.
50003021	Alifuula emibiri jeefe eminafu era ejifa ohuba hyʼogugwe ogutalifa olwʼamaani nʼobuŋangi wuwe.
50004001	Aboluganda abahoda era abapembaho mu mwoyo gwange, musangaasa era nenyumiirisa hu lwenywe, mube bagumu mu hufugiirira Musengwa.
50004002	Negalihira Ewudiya ni Sutuke baganye babe hirala olwa Musengwa.
50004003	Kusunga muŋeeresa wahyange omwesigwa, oyeede abahasi abo bahole hirala. Olwohuba, ŋalala ni Kelemeeti ko nʼabaŋeeresa abandi aba masiina gaawe gali mu hitabo ehyʼobulamu, baahola ni nange omulimo ogwʼohubuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi.
50004004	Hiisi hiseera musangaalenga olwohuba muli bulala ni Musengwa. Nindi ngobolamo ti musangaalenga.
50004005	Muŋambenga abaatu bosibosi nʼohwegenderesa olwohuba Musengwa ali huupi hugobola.
50004006	Muteŋendehereranga olwʼehiitu hyosihyosi aye ebyetago byenywe byosibyosi mubiŋambyenga Hatonda ni musaba nʼohwegalihira era nʼohweyaasa.
50004007	Era emiyaaya ja Hatonda ejihutaŋanga hutegeerera erala, jihuumenga emyoyo nʼebiŋeego byenywe mu Yesu Kurisito.
50004008	Aboluganda, ebiŋeego byenywe bibenga hu biitu ebiraŋi, ebyʼamazima, ebireetera abaatu ohubaŋa eŋono, ebiruŋamu era ebisaana.
50004009	Hiisi ebi mwega oba ebi mwasuna ohuŋwa eyi ndi oba ebi mwabona mu ese oba mwaŋulira ni ndoma, ebyo njʼebi muba ni muta mu kola. Era Hatonda atuŋa emiyaaya aja huba ni nenywe.
50004010	Ndimusangaafu bugali olwa Musengwa olwohuba wayire mubaaye muhenire ebbanga ni ŋuma buyeedi obu muupa, mutandihire ohufaaho. Hituufu mubaaye mufaayo aye ni muŋuma ngeri eyʼohulaga.
50004011	Si ndoma hino olwohuba ndibubi. Nahena ohwiga ohubaŋo mu mbeera yosiyosi.
50004012	Mbitire mu mbeera eyʼohuŋuma haatu hosihosi, nindi nʼembeera eyʼohuba ni nabyo mu bungi. Ngumira embeera yosiyosi oba huba ni nabyo oba hulumwa enjala, ohuba nʼebingi oba ohubuliriraho erala haatu hosihosi.
50004013	Sobola ohubaŋo mu hiisi mbeera olwʼamaani ga Kurisito.
50004014	Aye mwahola bulaŋi ohunjeeda mu bigosi byange.
50004015	Bahyange Abafilipi, mumanyire muuti ni naŋwa e Makedoniya, mwali mwahafugiirira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi era eŋuma hibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira Kurisito abaneŋimbaho mu songa yʼohugaba nʼohusuna, ohutusaho enywe mweŋene.
50004016	Era ngʼolu naali e Sesalonika, mwapeeresa obuyeedi emirundi ejiŋera.
50004017	Sindoma hino olwohuba nenda muupe obuyeedi aye nenda mwahasuna omuhemba olwʼehyere hyenywe.
50004018	Obuyeedi obu mwaŋa Epafuladito ohuleeta, buukena. Buli hyʼahasyololo ahaŋunya obulaŋi ahaŋwa mu hyayo ehibaŋongire eri Hatonda gasangaala.
50004019	Era Hatonda wange alibaŋa hiisi ehimwenda, nʼatusa hu buŋinda buwe obubitiirifu obuli mu Yesu Kurisito.
50004020	Abaatu baŋenga Hatonda weefe era Seefe eŋono emirembe nʼemirembe. Amiina.
50004021	Muheese abagwalaafu bosibosi. Abʼeno babahehiseeho.
50004022	Abagwalaafu bosibosi ohuhirira erala abali mu lubiri lwa Kayisaali babahehiseeho.
50004023	Ehisasabirisi hya Musengwa Yesu Kurisito hibe ni nenywe. Amiina.
51001001	Ndiise Pawulo omuhwenda wa Yesu Kurisito olwʼohusiima hwa Hatonda. Ndi nʼomulebe yeefe Temuseewo,
51001002	mbaŋandiihira enywe abaatu ba Hatonda abesigwa era abafugiirira Kurisito abali mu hibuga ehyʼe Kolosaayi. Hatonda Seefe abaŋambire ehisasabirisi era abaŋe nʼemiyaaya.
51001003	Habuhyabuhya ni hubasabira, hweyaasa Hatonda Semwana ya Yesu Kurisito Musengwa yeefe,
51001004	olwohuba hwaŋulira ngʼolu mufugiirira Yesu Kurisito era ngʼolu mwenda abagwaalafu bosibosi.
51001005	Ohufugiirira Yesu Kurisito nʼohwenda abaatu ba Hatonda ohumuli ni nahwo, bisimuha mu esuubi eri muli ni nalyo eryʼohusuna ebiraŋi ebi gabategehera mwigulu. Esuubi eryo, mwalisuna olu mwaŋulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agʼamazima.
51001006	Amaŋuliro ago gatiina ni gahwana ehyalo hyosihyosi ni galeetera abaatu ekabi ngʼolu gaholire mu enywe, ohuŋwera erala hu ludaalo olu mweheerera ohuŋulira amazima agaŋamba hu hisasabirisi hya Hatonda mwahifaania.
51001007	Epafuraasi omutambi wahyefe, omuhoda, omwesigwa era omuŋeeresa wa Kurisito njʼowabasomesa Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi ago hu lwefe.
51001008	Era gatuŋayira nʼohu ngeri eyi mwendamo abaatu ba Hatonda ngʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu njʼabatangirira.
51001009	Olwʼehyo, ohuŋwa olu hwaŋulira huuti mufugiirira Yesu, habuhyabuhya sihuleherangaho hubasabira, Hatonda abaŋe ohumanya ohuŋwa ewʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu, mufaanie ebi genda.
51001010	Husaba huutyo muŋange ohwebisya mu sambo esaana era esangaasa Musengwa mu hiisi ngeri ni muhola ebiraŋi era mweyongere ohumanya Hatonda,
51001011	abaŋe amaani ko muŋange ohwehaliiriha hiisi higosi ni muli basangaafu,
51001012	ni mweyaasa Hatonda Seefe agira ni muli bagwalaafu, abali mu njase yiye era mulisuna ekabi jije josijosi.
51001013	Olwohuba gaatutusa mu wahabaha wa Sitaani owʼehiirema gatuŋira mu buŋugi bwʼOmwana wuwe omuhoda,
51001014	era ohubita mu Mwana oyo, Hatonda gatununula ngʼatusoniŋa ebibi.
51001015	Kurisito oyo pomu Hatonda ataboneha abonehera, njʼOmwana wuwe ahiira obuŋangi era aŋuga hiisi hiitu.
51001016	Hatonda gaabita mu Kurisito oyo ohutonda ebiitu byosibyosi mwigulu nohu hyalo, ebyo ebiboneha nʼebitaboneha, abahabaha nʼabanamaani nʼobuŋangi bwosibwosi. Ebiitu byosibyosi bibye era njʼagira byabaŋo.
51001017	Kurisito gaaliŋo ni ŋahiiri hubaŋo ehiitu hyosihyosi era njʼaŋambirira byosibyosi.
51001018	Kurisito njʼomutwe gwʼomubiri gugwe, ko mbʼabamufugiirira era njʼesimuho yʼobulamu wabwe. Njʼomudaayi ohuŋwa mu bafu ko aŋuge hiisi hiitu.
51001019	Hatonda gasalaŋo ati ehyo ehi ali mu wiijufu hibe mu Kurisito,
51001020	era nʼabita mu Mwana wuwe oyo, galeetaŋo omuhago ŋagati wuwe nʼebiitu byosibyosi ebiri mwigulu nohu hyalo. Mu ngeri eyo, Kurisito gataŋo emiyaaya olwʼamafugi gage olu gafa hu musalabba.
51001021	Ni mwali ni mu hiiri hufugiirira Kurisito, mwali basigu mu ebiŋeego nʼebikolwa byenywe, ebibi era ni muŋuma ekolagana endaŋi ni Hatonda.
51001022	Aye ŋaahani Hatonda gafaaŋana ni nenywe nʼabita mu mubiri gwa Kurisito olu gaafa hu musalabba ko mube bagwalaafu ni baŋumaho hamogo wayire omusango gwosigwosi mu moni jije.
51001023	Mutiine mu moni ni muli bagumu mu hufugiirira Kurisito era mutadanya esuubi eri mwasuna olu mwaŋulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi. Amaŋuliro ago, njʼagababuulira hiisi muutu hu hyalo era keesi Pawulo nafuuha mulala hu bagabuulira.
51001024	Sifayo wayire ndi hugada kasita ohugada huno ohu ngada, ngada hu lwenywe ni nongerera hu ohwo ohu Yesu gagada hu lwʼabo abamufugiirira.
51001025	Hatonda gaafuula omuŋeeresa wʼabafugiirira Kurisito era gaapa omulimo ogwʼohubalomera ehibono hihye mu wiijufu.
51001026	Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi ago, njʼehyama ehi gaali nʼagihise abaatu aye ŋaahani ahihwehuliiye ababe.
51001027	Hatonda gabahwehulira ehyama ehyo olwohuba gendiire enywe Abatali Bayudaaya mwesi muhitegeere ngʼolu hiri ehyʼomugaso bugali weene era ehyʼeŋono. Ehyama ehyo cʼehino ti Kurisito ali mu enywe, njʼesuubi lyenywe eryʼohusuna eŋono lya Hatonda.
51001028	Olwʼehyo, hulomera hiisi muutu ebiŋamba hu Kurisito oyo ni hubatebusa era ni hubasomesa nʼamagesi aga Hatonda atuŋa, ko hiretere hiisi muutu ohuŋuma ehyaŋumiraho mu hufugiirira Kurisito.
51001029	Ehyo cʼehigira ni fululuhana bugali weene olwʼamaani ga Kurisito amabitirifu agabonehera mu ese ni kola emirimo jije.
51002001	Nenda mumanye ngʼolu kalabana bugali weene hu lwenywe nʼabafugiirira Kurisito abali mu hibuga hyʼe Lawodiikiya era ni naabo bosibosi abahiiri huumanya.
51002002	Ehigendererwa hyange, nenda hu bagobosamo amaani era mube mu bulala mu hwendana ko mufaanihisye erala mu wiijufu ngʼolu Kurisito njʼehyama hya Hatonda.
51002003	Kurisito oyo, nje yeŋene agira mwamanya obuŋinda wʼamagesi nʼohumanya hwosihwosi ohuŋwa ewa Hatonda.
51002004	Mbalomera hino ko ŋatabaŋo omuutu kadi mulala agira mwaŋaba ohuŋwa hu mazima nʼabadulingadulinga nʼebibono, habibe binoli biitye.
51002005	Wayire nga sindi ni nenywe mu mubiri, ndi ŋalala ni nenywe mu mwoyo era sangaala bugali ohuŋulira ti muli mu bulala, era bagumu mu hufugiirira Kurisito.
51002006	Ŋaahani ngʼolu mwafugiirira Yesu Kurisito nga Musengwa yenywe, mweyongere ohuba nʼobulamu obumusangaasa.
51002007	Mwegumye ohumufugiirira ko muŋangale mu hufugiirira ohwo ni mwema hu ebyo ebi babasomesa era mutadembanga humweyaasa.
51002008	Mwehuumenga ŋatabaŋo muutu kadi mulala agira mwaŋaba nʼatambisa obulombolombo wʼabaatu obuŋumamo mahulu aye obudulingi obwerere. Esomesa hyʼeyo siyiŋwa yiri Kurisito aye yiŋwa eyiri emisambwa ejinyopire ehyalo hino.
51002009	Kurisito nje Hatonda mu mubiri gwʼobuutu,
51002010	era mwesi olwohuba hirala ni Kurisito, eŋuma ehindi ehimwenda ohubanoŋola. Kurisito oyo nje Musengwa era aŋuga abanamaani nʼabobuŋangi bosibosi.
51002011	Kurisito gabahomola mu bulamu wenywe obwʼomwoyo, ngʼabambulaho ohwegomba hwʼomubiri olu bamuhomerera hu musalabba.
51002012	Era ni bababatiza, hyali oti hani mwesi babasiiha ni Kurisito era nga mulamuhira ŋalala ni naye olwʼohufugiirira Hatonda owamulamusa.
51002013	Ni mwali ni muhiiri hufugiirira Kurisito, mwali bafu mu mwoyo olwʼebibi byenywe era ohwegomba hwʼomubiri ni hubaŋuga aye Hatonda gabaŋa obulamu obunyaaha nʼabita mu Kurisito era gatusoniŋa ebibi byefe byosibyosi.
51002014	Hatonda gatutusaho ebbanja eryʼehibi gaahena galisalamo olu bahomerera Yesu hu musalabba.
51002015	Era hu musalabba ohwo, njʼohu gaŋangulira abanamaani nʼabobuŋangi, gabatusaho ebisoosa ngʼabaswasa mu lwijuuye.
51002016	Olwʼehyo, mutaganyanga omuutu yesiyesi ohubasalira omusango hu biŋamba hu byʼohulya oba ebyʼohunywa oba hu ndaalo ekulu oba hu byʼembaga eja hiisi mwaha oba hu byʼohubaluha hwʼomwesi wayire ebiŋamba hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato.
51002017	Ebiitu hyʼebyo, bisisigo busisigo aye Kurisito njʼamazima, oyu byali ni biraga biiti gaali aja huuja.
51002018	Mutaganya abaatu abo, abeefuula ohuba nʼohwolesewa ohwenjabulo bagira mwajumirya abamalayika, mwaba nʼohweŋomeha ni mwegudya, mwafiirwa obunoŋosi. Abaatu hyʼabo baali nʼohumanya hwʼabaatu buutu era nʼohwepaahapaaha hwawe, panaŋo.
51002019	Abaatu abo, beyabula hu Kurisito omutwe gwʼabafugiirira era aliisa omubiri gwosigwosi, gaguŋimba ŋalala hyʼolu owongero nʼemisiŋa bihola, nga ko guhula ngʼolu Hatonda genda.
51002020	Kurisito ni gafa, mwesi muli oti hani mwafiira ŋalala ni naye nga muŋangula emisambwa ejinyopire ehyalo hino. Ŋaahani lwahiina muŋamba obulombolombo wʼabo ababaloma baati mbo,
51002021	“Otaŋamba hu hirebe oba otalya hino oba otaholanga oti?”
51002022	Bahyange, obulombolombo hyʼobwo buŋamba hu ebyʼohunywa nʼebyohulya ebiŋwaŋo, ebyo byʼabaatu buutu era ŋaŋuma ehi bigasa.
51002023	Wayire obulombolombo obwo, buboneha hyʼehiitu ehyʼamahulu mu kola eyʼohujumirya nʼohweŋomeha ohwʼobudulingi ko nʼekola eyʼohwegudya eyi abaatu abeene baseegaŋo ohusangaasa Hatonda, biŋuma aŋa biyeedera omuutu ohuŋangula ohwegomba hwʼomubiri.
51003001	Ale ngʼolu mwalamuhira ŋalala ni Kurisito mu byʼomwoyo era mwasuna obulamu obunyaaha, muŋembenga hu biri mwigulu eyi Kurisito geehaaye mu hifo ehyʼeŋono hu lubega lwʼomuhono omulungi ogwa Hatonda.
51003002	Muŋembenga hu biitu ebyomwigulu sosi ebibi ebyohu hyalo huno,
51003003	olwohuba muli oti hani mwafa era obulamu bwenywe babuhweha mu Kurisito ewa Hatonda.
51003004	Kurisito esimuho yʼobulamu wenywe obunyaaha olu aligobola, mwesi balibahwehulira ŋalala ni naye mu eŋono lirye.
51003005	Ŋaahani mweyambule ohwegomba ohwʼomubiri hyʼobuhwedi, ohuba nʼemoni enyangu, ohwejabaata ko nʼohuyayaanira ebiitu ebibi ebyʼehyalo hino. Olwohuba ehyo hiri hyʼohujumirya ebiitu ebitali Hatonda.
51003006	Hatonda aja hugudya abaatu abahola ebiitu hyʼebyo, nʼehiruŋi.
51003007	Era mwesi ebyo njʼebimwaholanga ni mwali ni muhiiri hufugiirira Yesu.
51003008	Aye ŋaahani mweyambule ebiitu hyʼetima, ohuŋalaatana, ohuloma ebyakalebule nʼohuŋemula era bitatulanga nomu hanwa henywe.
51003009	Mutaduliŋananga olwohuba mweyambula obulamu obuhale nʼebikolwa ebibi ebi mwaholanga ni mu hiiri hufugiirira Yesu,
51003010	nga muhena mwambala obulamu obunyaaha ohuŋwa ewa Hatonda era obu ali hugobosa bunyaaha ko mwahamutegeera bulaŋi.
51003011	Olwʼehyo, sihyamahulu ohuba Omuyudaaya oba Atali Muyudaaya, omuhomole oba atali muhomole, omulugendwa, atali mugunjuhi, omwidu oba atali mwidu aye Kurisito njʼehihulu era ali mu bosibosi, abamufugiirira.
51003012	Olwʼehyo, ngʼolu Hatonda gabatobola ohuba abaatu babe abahoda gaahena gabagwalaasa, mubenga nʼomwoyo ogusaasira, nʼehyere nʼohweŋomeha nʼohweyisa ŋaasi ko nʼohwehaliriha.
51003013	Hiisi muutu gehalirihenga era asoniŋenga owahye hiisi olu ŋanabengaŋo ohweŋuluŋunya. Musoniŋanenga hyʼolu Musengwa gabasoniŋa.
51003014	Era hu ebyo byosibyosi, mumeedeho nʼohwendana olwohuba njʼohubanywanywasa mwesimwesi mu bulala.
51003015	Emiyaaya eji Kurisito atuŋa jibaŋe ohuba abateehi mu myoyo jenywe. Olwohuba hyʼomubiri omulala, Hatonda gabalanga ohumenya mu miyaaya hiisi muutu nʼowahye. Era mumweyaasenga humweyaasa.
51003016	Obuhwenda obuŋamba hu Kurisito bubenga mu bulamu wenywe mu wiijufu, ni musomesania era hiisi muutu nʼalabbira owahye nʼamagesi gosigosi. Era mwemberenga Hatonda e Zabbuli nʼenyembo ejʼohumujumirya nʼeji Mwoyo abaŋa ohuyiiya, nʼohweyaasa mu myoyo jenywe.
51003017	Hiisi hiitu ehi muloma oba ehi muhola, muhiholenga ngʼabahihirira Yesu Musengwa yeefe ni mweyaasa Hatonda Seefe ohubita mu Yesu oyo.
51003018	Abahasi, muŋulirenga abawamwenywe ngʼolu Musengwa genda.
51003019	Abasinde, mwendenga abahasi benywe era mutabahambuŋaliranga.
51003020	Abaana, muŋulirenga abasaaye benywe mu hiisi hiitu olwohuba ehyo hisangaasa Musengwa.
51003021	Abasaaye mutanyigirisanga baana benywe, bahanda baŋwamo amaani.
51003022	Abeedu, muŋulirenga abasengwa benywe mu hiisi hiitu, ehyo mutahiholanga ni babataayeho emoni ohusuna obuhoda aye muhiholenga ni muhenereeye olwʼohuŋa Musengwa eŋono.
51003023	Hiisi ehi muhola, muhiholenga nʼomwoyo mulala hyʼabaholera Musengwa sosi abaatu.
51003024	Muhebulire muuti Musengwa aja hubaŋa omuhemba ngʼolu gasuubisa, olwohuba buhomya weene Kurisito njʼoyu muŋeeresa.
51003025	Oyo ahola ebibi, aja husuna omuhemba ogwolana nʼebibi bibye olwohuba Hatonda aŋuma muutu yesiyesi oyu aboola.
51004001	Abasengwa bʼabeedu, mubabisyenga bulaŋi ni mumanyire muuti mwesi muli ni Musengwa mwigulu abaliho obuŋangi.
51004002	Mwegumyenga ohusaba era mutengeyo omwoyo hu ebi musaba ni mutayeeho nʼohumweyaasa.
51004003	Era hwesi mutusabirenga, Hatonda atwigulireŋo engira hulomere abaatu obuhwenda obuŋamba hu Kurisito. Era olwʼohulomera Abatali Bayudaaya ehyama ehyo, cʼehigira nindi mu komera.
51004004	Muusabire, ndomere abaatu obuhwenda obwo ngʼolu hiseene ko bahabutegeera bulaŋi.
51004005	Mwebisyenga mu kola eyʼamagesi eyiri abo abahiiri hufugiirira Kurisito era mutambisenga hiisi kabi eyi muba ni nayo bulaŋi.
51004006	Emboosi yenywe nʼabatafugiirira Yesu yibenga ndaŋi era eyisangaasa ko muŋange ohumanya engeri eyʼohwanuhulamo omuutu nʼaba nʼehyabuusa.
51004007	Oboluganda Tukikasi, omuhoda era omuŋeeresa wahyefe omwesigwa oyu hutamba ni naye omulimo gwa Musengwa aja hubalomera byosibyosi ebiifaho.
51004008	Cʼehigira ndihumutuma eyo mwahamanya ngʼolu huli eno era ehindi abagobosemo nʼamaani mu hufugiirira hwenywe.
51004009	Tukikasi ali huuja eyo nʼOnesimo mulebe yeefe omuhoda era omwesigwa. Onesimo oyo mulala hunywe eyo era baja hubalomera byosibyosi ebitufaho.
51004010	Arisitaluuko omusibe wahyange ni Mariko omwiŋwa wa Bbalunaba, babahehiise. Mwasuna obuhwenda muuti Mariko ali hutegeha ohuuja eyo, kale nʼanahaaje mumusangaaliranga.
51004011	Ni Yesu oyu balanga erindi baati Yusito, abahehiseeho. Abo njʼAbayudaaya boŋene abaakola ni nabo omulimo gwa Hatonda era bamugaso bugali eyi ndi.
51004012	Epafuraasi omuŋeeresa wa Yesu Kurisito era omulala hu enywe, abahehiise. Habuhyabuhya abasabira bugali weene ati mwahaŋangala mu hufugiirira hwenywe ko muŋange ohumanya ebi Hatonda genda ni mutemoota.
51004013	Ese ndi nʼobuhahafu ti Epafuraasi ahalabana bugali weene hu lwenywe ko nohu lwʼabo abomu Lawodiikiya nʼabomu Yerapoolisi.
51004014	Omusaŋu era omuhoda weefe oyu balanga baati Luka ko ni Demasi, babahehiise.
51004015	Muheese abalebe abomu Lawodiikiya ni Nuufa mboojo yeefe ko nʼabafugiirira Kurisito abahumbaanira mu nyumba ewuwe.
51004016	Oluvanyuma lwʼohusoma ebbaluŋa yino, muyiŋeerese ehibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira Kurisito abʼe Lawodiikiya. Era mwesi musome ebbaluŋa eyiŋwa ewaawe.
51004017	Era mulome Arikipo muuti, “Fubaho ohuheneresa obuŋeeresa obu Musengwa gahuŋambya.”
51004018	Ese Pawulo, ndiise aŋandiihire obuheese buno nʼomuhono gwange. Muhebulire muuti ndi mu komera. Hatonda abaŋambire ehisasabirisi.
52001001	Ese Pawulo nʼabahyange Siluvaano ni Temuseewo, hubaŋandiihira enywe abaatu ba Hatonda Seefe ni Yesu Kurisito Musengwa, ehibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira Kurisito mu hibuga hyʼe Sesalonika. Hubendesa ekabi nʼemiyaaya.
52001002	Hweyaasa Hatonda habuhyabuhya olwenywe mwesimwesi, era hiisi olu husaba, sihuhaya hubaŋayo eyiri Hatonda mu saala jeefe.
52001003	Habuhyabuhya hiisi olu hweŋomeha mu moni ja Seefe era Hatonda weefe ohusaba, huhebulira ebi muhola ohulaga ohufugiirira hwenywe nʼohwenda ohu muli ni nahwo ohweraga mu ngeri eyi muhatabaanamo olwa abahyenywe. Era huhebulira nʼohugumikiriza ohu muli ni nahwo olwʼesuubi eri muli ni nalyo mu hugobola hwa Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito.
52001004	Aboluganda, humanyire huuti muli bahoda eyiri Hatonda, era ngʼolu gabatobola mube baatu babe.
52001005	Hino huhihahasa olwohuba mwesi hwababuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi, agataali mu bibono bubono aye ni galiho nʼohuhola hwʼamaani gʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu, ohuhahasa ti ebi hwali ni huloma, bituufu. Era ngʼolu mumanyire, ni hwali eyo ni nenywe, mwabona engeri eyi hwebisyangamo olwʼohwenda ohubayeeda mutwegereho.
52001006	Mwalonderera esambo jeefe nʼeja Musengwa yeefe Yesu, olwohuba wayire nga baatu babagudya olwʼobuhwenda obu hwabaleetera, cooka mwabufugiirira nʼesangaalo eryʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu.
52001007	Mu ngeri eyo mwafuuha hyahuboneraho eyiri abafugiirira bosibosi abomu twale lya Makedoniya nʼerya Akaya.
52001008	Olwʼehyo, ŋaahani obuhwenda bwa Yesu Musengwa busaseene, simu Makedoniya nʼAkaya mwoŋene, aye efuma yʼohufugiirira hwenywe, yoolire hiisi ŋaatu. Efe nindi hino ŋabula ehi hitwetagisa ohuhiromaho,
52001009	olwohuba abaatu abeene baloosa engeri eyi mwatuhuumamo ni hwaja ewenywe. Era baloosa ngʼolu mwafuluha mwaleha emigaami mwagobola eyiri Hatonda Omulamu era omutuufu, mumuŋeerese
52001010	era ngʼolu mulindirira Omwana wuwe Yesu ohugobola ohuŋwa mwigulu, oyu galamusa era ngʼomwene oyo njʼatuŋonia ehiruŋi hya Hatonda.
52002001	Aboluganda, enywe mwabeene mwesi mumanyire muuti ohuuja hwʼefe eyi muli, sihwafa busa.
52002002	Ngʼolu mumanyire, ni hwali ni huhiiri huuja ewenywe, e Sesalonika, hwabonaabona era batubisya bubi mu hibuga hyʼe Filipi. Cooka Hatonda weefe gatugumya, hwasobola ohubabuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋwa eyi ali, wayire nga bangi bagesyaho ohutuhayisa.
52002003	Bino ebi hubahubbirisa ohufugiirira sibyabudulingi ate sihweyendulira byefe oba ti huli hwenda hubahema hubabbaamye.
52002004	Cooka ngʼolu Hatonda gatwesigire gatuŋambya omulimo gwʼohulomera abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi, hwesi huutyo pohuguhola. Ni hutagenderera husangaasa abaatu ni huloma ebiŋomera amatwi gaawe, aye ni hwenda husangaasa Hatonda amanyire ebitufaho nʼohwolera erala mugati wʼemyoyo jeefe.
52002005	Mumanyire bulaŋi muuti ni hwaja ewenywe, sihwatambisa bibono ebi bapaahapaaha ebinambulamo oba ebibayeyeresa hyʼabaatu abʼomulyerye olu bahola olwʼohwenda ohuwiiha omulyerye gwawe. Hatonda omwene njʼomujulizi weefe mu hino.
52002006	Era sihwaholanga biitu olwʼohwenda batupaahe.
52002007	Ngʼabahwenda ba Kurisito hyali hyola ohubasitoŋerera mu ngeri eyʼohweyemeeresaŋo. Cooka hwegenderesanga eyi muli hyʼomuhasi omusaaye olu gegenderesa eyiri abaana babe.
52002008	Olwʼohubooya nʼohubenda obugali hwegomba hubooseho Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋwa eyiri Hatonda. Si cʼehyo hyoŋene, aye nʼohuŋayo huŋeyo obulamu weefe obwene hu lwenywe.
52002009	Mu butuufu balebe muhebulira bulaŋi muuti ni hwali eyo ni hubabuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi aga Hatonda, hwafabiinanga ni huhola omuusi nʼowiire husobole ohweyemeresaŋo fabeene, habe hasinge hutasitoŋerera kadi mulala hu nywe.
52002010	Enywe mwabeene muli bajulizi beefe, ni Hatonda omwene yeesi humwijulira era amanyire ati ni hwali eyo esambo jeefe jaali ngwalaafu, ejolana era ni jibulaho hya hweŋambya.
52002011	Muhimanyire muuti hiisi mulala hu nywe hwamuŋiranga mu ngeri eyi omusaaye owʼehisinde aŋiramo abaana babe.
52002012	Hwababuliriranga, hwabagumya, era hwabahubbirisa mugendere mu bulamu obusangaasa Hatonda, omwene hubalanga mube mu Buŋugi buwe nʼomu ŋono lirye.
52002013	Ebyo nʼobitaaye hutulo, hweyaasa Hatonda habuhyabuhya nʼolwohuba ti ni hwaboosaho ehibono hihye, mwahitegera ohutwi era mwahifugiirira. Simwahiŋira ngʼehiŋwa eyiri abaatu aye ngʼehibono hya Hatonda ehyene nʼehyene era nga njʼehiri huhola omulimo mu bulamu wenywe abafugiirira.
52002014	Abalebe, ohufaanana nʼebibbubbu byʼabafugiirira Yesu Kurisito ebyomu twale lyʼe Buyudaaya, mu ngeri njʼenyene mwesi Abayudaaya bahyenywe abeene, babagudya.
52002015	Abayudaaya abahola ebiri hyʼebyo njʼabeeta Musengwa yeefe Yesu nʼabanaabbi, era hwesi njʼabatugudya. Abaatu abo sibasangaasa Hatonda, era ogwawe gwahunyiza hiisi muutu.
52002016	Obona baagesyaho nʼohutuhingirira hutalomera Abatali Bayudaaya ehibono hya Hatonda bahanoŋoha! Ehyo hyameeda humeeda hu bibi byawe ebi batiinire ni bahola ohuŋwa enyuma. Aye ŋaahani jibageene, ehiruŋi hya Hatonda hibageene.
52002017	Aboluganda, ni hwaseebulana ni nenywe, wayire hyali hyahamanga hatono, ehiyungo hyatuŋamba hwaŋulira ni hwegomba bugali ohubabonaho,
52002018	era nga huŋemba nindi hugobole eyi muli. Ese semwene Pawulo aloma ni nenywe, nagesyaho omulundi omudaayi nʼogwohubiri, cooka Sitaani gahingirira.
52002019	Hunalome hi hwaleha hi? Yesu Musengwa yeefe nʼaligobola, sindinywe omuliba esuubi lyʼefe era omuligema hwaba nʼesangaalo mu moni jije? Sindinywe omuligema hwepaaha ngʼolu hwaŋangula?
52002020	Enywe ndinywe omuŋwaho ohwepaaha hwʼefe, nʼesangaalo eri huli nalyo.
52003001	Olwʼehyo, ohugumikirisa ehibubalo ni hwatuhaya, nga husalaŋo husigale hweŋene mu hibuga hyʼAsene,
52003002	aye hwabatumira Temuseewo mulebe yeefe era omutambi wahyefe mu mulimo gwa Hatonda ogwʼohubuulira abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu Kurisito. Hwamutuma gaaje abagumye, era abanywanie mu hufugiirira hwenywe,
52003003	ŋatabaŋo kadi mulala hu nywe aŋwamo amaani olwʼohuhiyaania ohu babahiyaania. Muhimanye bulaŋi muuti ebyo bitwolaho olwʼohugera hwa Hatonda.
52003004	Ni hwali ni huhiiri eyo ni nenywe hwabalomereeyeŋo huuti efe abafugiirira baja hutuhiyaania olwʼohufugiirira hwʼefe era mumanye muuti ehyo ŋaahani hyolereeye.
52003005	Olwʼehyo, ni nabona ti sipanga hweyongera hugumikiriza ohuba mu njirema ni tamanyire ebibafaho, nabatumira Temuseewo. Namutuma sobole ohumanya ngʼolu mwemereeye mu hufugiirira hwenywe ni neŋenderehire ti hamunga naŋwangayo omuhemi gabahema mwaŋwa hu hufugiirira Kurisito, ohufaabiina ohu hwafaabiina hwatufa busa.
52003006	Ŋaahani Temuseewo njʼono ko gahagobolanga nʼaŋwa eyo. Atuleeteeye amaŋuliro agagobosamo amaani ni gahya hu hufugiirira hwenywe era nʼohwenda ohu hiisi muutu ali ni nahwo eyiri owahye nʼabaatu boosi ohuŋirira ŋalala. Era atulomeeye ati habuhyabuhya mutuŋeegaho bugali, era ati mwoya ohutubonaho hyefe hwesi ngʼolu hwoya ohubabonaho.
52003007	Olwʼehyo balebe beefe, wayire nga huli mu bigosi nʼohugada ohwʼamaani, ohufugiirira hwenywe hutugobosiseemo amaani.
52003008	Hitugobosamo amaani munaba banywani mu hufugiirira era ni muli bulala ni Musengwa yeefe.
52003009	Mu butuufu oweene, hiina ehi huŋanga ohuŋa Hatonda ohumulaga ohumusiima hwʼefe nʼesangaalo eri huli ni nalyo mu moni jije hu lwenywe?
52003010	Omuusi nʼowiire hubeererera ni hwegalihira Hatonda nindi atuŋe ekabi hubonaneho ni nenywe emoni hu moni, hwoherese ebihibuliraho hu hufugiirira hwenywe.
52003011	Ale, Seefe era Hatonda weefe, omwene ni Musengwa yeefe Yesu, baganye batuseŋo ebirobera husobole ohuuja.
52003012	Musengwa abameedemo omwoyo gwʼohwendana era nʼohwenda abaatu bosibosi, ngʼolu efe hubenda enywe,
52003013	Musengwa yeefe Yesu nʼaligobola ŋalala nʼabagwalaafu babe, abaagaane ni mubulaho ehi muutu asobola ohweŋambya, ni muli bagwalaafu mu moni ja Seefe era Hatonda weefe.
52004001	Ehisembayo aboluganda, hwabahubbirisa ohwebisyanga mu ngeri esangaasa Hatonda, ehiitu himuli hugesyaho ohuhola. Era mu siina lya Musengwa, hubasunga mweyongerenga ohuhola cʼehyene.
52004002	Hino huhiroma olwohuba mumanyire ebi hwabalabbira olwʼobuŋangi obu Yesu Musengwa gaatuŋa.
52004003	Hatonda abendesa ohuba bagwalaafu, nʼohweŋalamira erala obuhwedi.
52004004	Hiisi mulala hu nywe ateehwa ohumanya ohufuganga omubiri gugwe mu ngeri engwalaafu era eŋeesa eŋono.
52004005	Ohwegomba hwʼomubiri hutabafuganga ngʼolu hufuga abaatu abatamanyire Hatonda.
52004006	Kale, mu songa yino ŋatabaŋo muutu mu nywe ahola ebirumya owahye, wayire owiibira epiki ni muha owahye, olwohuba ngʼolu hwabalomera era hwabalabula Musengwa aliboneresa abaatu abahola ebiitu hyʼebyo byosibyosi.
52004007	Hatonda sigatulanga huhene husigale ni hugendera mu buhwedi, wabula gatulanga hube bagwalaafu.
52004008	Olwʼehyo hiisi anyooma hino ehi hubalabbira, aba saanyooma muutu aye aba anyooma Hatonda, abaŋa Omwoyo wuwe Omutukuvu.
52004009	Ebiŋamba hu hwendana, sihinetagisa hulanduluhana ni mbalaabbira, olwohuba Hatonda gaahena ohubasomesa.
52004010	Era mu butuufu, ehyo njʼehi mulihuhola. Mwenda aboluganda bosibosi abali mu twale lyʼe Makedoniya lyosiryosi. Ni nʼaŋo baganda beefe, hubegalihira muholenga muutyo nʼohusingaho aŋo.
52004011	Mwegumye mu sambo yʼohutaba bahifaabi nʼohuteyingisa mu bitabaŋambaho, hiisi muutu ni geholera emirimo jije nʼemihono jije ngʼolu hwabaloma.
52004012	Ni munaholenga muutyo, abatafugiirira Kurisito banabaŋenga eŋono era simunasitoŋererenga muutu yesiyesi.
52004013	Aboluganda, sihwenda mube mu hiirema hu biŋamba hu abafa, obutahi ohubaŋamba ngʼolu buŋamba abaatu abandi abaŋuma suubi.
52004014	Efe hufugiirira huuti Yesu gafa era galamuha, ni naabo abafa oluvanyuma lwʼohumufugiirira, Hatonda alibalamusa bagobolera ŋalala ni Yesu.
52004015	Hubalomera hino ni hwema hubi Musengwa yeefe omwene gaaloma ati nʼaliba nagobola, efe abaliba ni huhiiri balamu mu hiseera ehyo sihulitangirira mwabo abaafa, ohumusisikana.
52004016	Hino kiroma olwohuba Musengwa omwene oliŋwa mwigulu nʼejanjaasi eririhabuha, nʼomuhulu wa malayika alifuuŋa egwala nʼaŋa ehiragiro ehya Hatonda. Abo abaafa ni bahenire ohufugiirira Kurisito, njabalyeherera ohulamuha.
52004017	Ngʼaŋo hwesi abaliba ni huhiiri balamu, ko hulondaho huŋiriwa ŋalala ni nabo mu bireri ohuja ohusisikana Musengwa mu bbanga. Era ni naye emirembe nʼemirembe.
52004018	Olwʼehyo, hiisi muutu agumyenga owahye nʼebibono ebyo.
52005001	Aboluganda, sinenda hulanduluhana mu hubalomera hu biŋamba hu biro nʼebiseera ebyo aŋa biryolera,
52005002	olwohuba mwabeene mwesi muhimanyire bulaŋi muuti oludaalo lwʼohugobola hwa Musengwa luliba hyʼomwibi olu gaaja owiire nʼatalagire.
52005003	Olu abaatu baliba ni baloma baati, “Ha-a! Huli bulaŋi, ŋaŋuma hituluma.” Hu olwo ndolu ohusihiiriha hulibagwaho bugwe ni batetegehire ngʼolu ebise biija hu muhasi nʼalumwa ohusaala, era ŋalibula buŋonere.
52005004	Aye enywe, aboluganda, simuli mu hiirema oludaalo olwo ko lubagweho bugwe hyʼomwibi olu gaaja ohwiba.
52005005	Mwesimwesi muli baatu ba mumwi, era muli hyʼeswa esiisi ejija omuusi etangalwe, muli bamu muusi. Olwohuba efe abafugiirira sihuli bamugenda wiire, wayire abaholera mu hiirema.
52005006	Olwʼehyo hutaŋenyuha hyʼabandi olu bali huŋenyuha aye hubeŋo moni, era ni muli balangaasa.
52005007	Abaŋenyuha, baŋenyuha wiire; nʼabameera bameera wiire.
52005008	Aye efe ngʼolu huli bamumwi, hutameera aye husigale ni huli balangaasa. Husaanira hwehinge ohuhola ebibi, ohufugiirira nʼohwendana ni biri njʼengabo yeefe, nʼesuubi lyʼobunoŋosi obuŋwa eyiri Yesu libe eyi huli hyʼekofiira eyʼehyoma eyiri omusirikale.
52005009	Olwohuba Hatonda sigatutegehera hutugudya mu hiruŋi hihye, ohutusaho ohutunoŋola nʼabita mu Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito,
52005010	owatufiririra ko husobole ohuba balamu ŋalala ni naye, sisonga oba hufuuye oba huli balamu.
52005011	Kale hiisi mulala hu nywe agumyenga owahye, era ni muyeedana ngʼolu muhola hatyane.
52005012	Aboluganda, hubegalihira mumanye era muŋe eŋono abaatu ababaholamo omulimo, aba Hatonda gatobola ohubatangirira nʼohubegirisa ebi musaanira ohuhola.
52005013	Mubatengamo eŋono bugali, era mubendenga olwʼomulimo ogu babaholamo. Mwihale bulaŋi ni mweŋalama nionionio ŋagati wenywe.
52005014	Aboluganda, hubegalihira mulabulenga abahyenywe abaŋuuna ohulera engalo, mugumyenga abatali bagumu, muyeedenga abanafu, mugumiikirizenga bosibosi.
52005015	Mubone muuti mu nywe simubangamo omuutu owʼoluboole. Ohutusaho habuhyabuhya mwegumyenga hiisi muutu ohuholera owahye ebiraŋi, ŋalala nʼabaatu bosibosi ohuŋirira ŋalala.
52005016	Mubenga basangaafu habuhyabuhya.
52005017	Mujumiryenga Hatonda hiisi hiseera.
52005018	Mu byosibyosi, mweyaasenga olwohuba enywe ngʼabaatu ba Yesu Kurisito, ehyo Hatonda cʼehi genda muhole.
52005019	Mumanya mutahayisanga Omwoyo Omutukuvu.
52005020	Mutatalanga bibono bya banaabbi.
52005021	Mwetegeresenga byosibyosi era mugumirenga hu hiraŋi,
52005022	ni mwebaayanga hiisi hibi.
52005023	Hatonda yeŋene atuŋa emiyaaya, abafuule abagwalaafu. Era muhuume emyoyo jenywe, obulamu wenywe nʼemibiri jenywe ni biri bulaŋi, Musengwa yeefe Yesu nʼaliija mube ni mubulaho hyʼohubanenya.
52005024	Owabalanga mwesigwa, era ehi gasuubisa alihyoheresa.
52005025	Aboluganda, muteebirira hutusabirangaho.
52005026	Muheese aboluganda bosibosi mu keesa eyʼabaatu abagwalaafu.
52005027	Mbalagira, mu siina lya Musengwa yeefe, ebbaluŋa yino muyisomere aboluganda bosibosi.
52005028	Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito abaŋambire ehisasabirisi.
53001001	Ese Pawulo nʼabahyange aba Siluvaano ni Temuseewo, hubaŋandiihira enywe ehibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira Kurisito mu hibuga hyʼe Sesalonika. Muli baatu ba Hatonda Seefe ko ni Musengwa Yesu Kurisito.
53001002	Hatonda era Seefe ko ni Musengwa Yesu Kurisito babaŋambire ehisasabirisi era babaŋe emiyaaya.
53001003	Aboluganda, efe huli nʼohweyaasa Hatonda habuhyabuhya olwenywe. Ehyo husaniiye ohuhihola olwohuba ohufugiirira hwenywe huli hweyongera hweyongera ohuŋangala, era ohwenda ohu hiisi mulala hu nywe gendamo owahye, hweyongera.
53001004	Ehyo hwesi hituŋa obugumu ni huba nʼebibbubbu ebindi ebyʼabafugiirira Kurisito, ohwenyumiirisa olwenywe. Hwenyumiirisa olwenywe olwohuba mugumiikiriza ohuhiyaania ohu babahiyaania era mugumira ohugada olwʼohufugiirira Kurisito.
53001005	Ebyo byosibyosi bujulizi obulaga ngʼolu Hatonda atehubbira mu hulamula huhwe, era hu komerero ngʼolu mulisaanira ohwingira obuŋugi bwa Hatonda obugira ni mugada.
53001006	Hatonda saalyaha, aliboneresa ababahiyaania,
53001007	ate enywe aba bahiyaania ŋalala ni neefe gaatuŋa obuŋeerero. Ebyo biribaaŋo Musengwa yeefe Yesu nʼalyeyeyula nʼaŋwa mwigulu ohugobola hu hyalo, abamalayika babe abʼamaani ni bamuŋerehera.
53001008	Yesu aliijira mu himyaso hyʼomuliro abonerese abatamanyire Hatonda, ni nʼabo abagaana ohufugiirira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi aga Musengwa.
53001009	Abaatu abo begula mubiri. Balisasula olwʼebibi ebibahola. Hatonda alibaŋa ehiguudyo ehyʼohubabbinga ohuŋwa mu moni ja Musengwa yeefe nʼomu ŋono lirye eryʼamaani, era baliba mu hugada emirembe nʼemirembe.
53001010	Ebyo biriboolaho hu ludaalo olu Yesu Musengwa aligoboleraho, abafugiirira bosibosi bamuŋe eŋono olwʼebyo ebi aliba nʼaholeeye abaatu babe. Era mwesi muliba balala hu baatu abo olwohuba mwafugiirira obuhwenda obu hwabaleetera.
53001011	Olwohuba muja huŋeesa Musengwa eŋono, habuhyabuhya hubasabira, Hatonda weefe ababone ngʼabasaanira ehyo ehi gabalangira, era mu buŋangi buwe goheerese emirimo emiraŋi josijosi eji muhola nʼeji muluubirira ohuhola olwʼohufugiirira hwenywe.
53001012	Husaba ehyo hyolerere ko abaatu baŋe Musengwa yeefe Yesu eŋono olwʼohubanoŋola era mwesi hu lulwe babaŋe eŋono olwʼehisasabirisi hya Hatonda weefe, ni Musengwa Yesu Kurisito.
53002001	Ŋaahani aboluganda, hu biŋamba hu hugobola hwa Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito, era ngʼolu efe abafugiirira hulihumbaanira aŋa ali,
53002002	hubegalihira mutaŋalagana hubugabugana mu biŋeego byenywe, wayire ohweralihirira ni babalomera baati oludaalo lwʼohugobola hwa Musengwa yeefe lwabita hale. Ehyo wayire muhiŋulira huŋwa hu banaabbi oba mu lugambo obugambo oba mu bbaluŋa eyi pulira ti mbo yaaja eyo ni huli ndiife abayiŋandiiha, simuhifugiiriranga.
53002003	Simufugiiriranga muutu yesiyesi ohubadulinga, olwohuba oludaalo lwʼohugobola hwa Musengwa yeefe ni luliba ni luhiiri hwola, ŋalyeherera hubaŋo ehiseera ehi baatu balijeemera Hatonda. Ehiseera ehyo ni hiryola omuutu oyo oyu balisihiirisa, omutangirisi wʼabajeemu alyeta aŋalafu.
53002004	Omuutu oyo aliŋahania Hatonda ko ni hiisi hiitu ehi baatu bajumirya mu siina lya Hatonda. Alyeginiha gahena geetabata nʼobuŋangi owʼohumujumirya. Omuutu oyo alyolera erala nʼohwihala mu Yekaalu ya Hatonda ni geeranga Hatonda era galagira abaatu bamujumirye.
53002005	Peega ti muhiihebulira muuti ni nʼali ni kiiri eyo ni nenywe nabalabula ti ebiitu ebyo biribaaŋo.
53002006	Muhimanye muuti ehyemerehiise omuutu oyo ohweta aŋalafu huba ti ehiseera hihye ehirage hihiiri hwola.
53002007	Obujeemu buno obuliŋo obu mubona buhiiholera mu hyama era buja hutiina ni weyongera ohwola olu ehihingiriiye omujeemu oyo, hirimulehula geete aŋalafu.
53002008	Hu olwo omujeemu oyo ndolu alyeta aŋalafu, nga Yesu Musengwa amuhubba ehimyaso hyʼeŋono lirye eri aligoboleramo nga wangewe omujeemu oyo agamuginihanga gamuŋwa. Nga Yesu ahena amutusaŋo nʼamufuuŋa hu mufuuŋa hyʼahanyaasi amuholoŋa mu husihiiriha.
53002009	Omujeemu oyo aliija nʼamaani ga Sitaani ameene amangi gaahola ebyamaliholiho ŋalala nʼebyeŋunjisa ebya hiisi ngeri aye ni biri byabudulingi.
53002010	Alitambisa hiisi hibi ehisobola ohubbaamya abaatu abali mu ngira yʼohusihiiriha olwʼohugaana ohufugiirira obuhwenda wa Yesu obutuufu era obunoŋola.
53002011	Olwʼehyo, abaatu abo Hatonda alibaŋwaho, baagota ni bafugiirira obudulingi wʼomuutu oyo owʼehibi.
53002012	Ehyo ni hiŋooye, omusango gulihira bosibosi abatafugiirira hituufu olwohuba basangaalira ehibi.
53002013	Ne efe huli nʼohweyaasa Hatonda habuhyabuhya olwenywe abalebe beefe era abahoda eyiri Musengwa yeefe, olwohuba Hatonda gabatobola, ohuba balala hu badaayi ohunoŋolewa hu lwʼamaani gʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu abafuula abaatu ba Hatonda abagwalaafu nʼolwa ohufugiirira ehituufu.
53002014	Hino Hatonda gahibalangira nʼabita mu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi aga hwabalomera, konyo musune omugabo gwenywe ogwʼeŋono eri Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito gasuna.
53002015	Olwʼehyo, balebe mube bagumu mu hufugiirira hwenywe. Mugumire hu bituufu ebiŋamba hu Kurisito ebi hwabegirisa mu bibono ebi hwaloma ni nenywe oba mu bbaluŋa eyi hwabaŋandiihira.
53002016	Hubasungira Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito omwene, ni Hatonda Seefe, owatwendire era mu hisasabirisi hihye, gatuŋa esangaalo eritaliŋwaŋo nʼesuubi eryʼebiraŋi ebi gatusuubisa,
53002017	agumye emyoyo jenywe era abaŋe amaani mu hiisi hiraŋi ehi muhola nʼebibono ebi muloma.
53003001	Aboluganda, ni keneeresa mbasunga mutusabirengaho, ehibono hya Yesu Musengwa hyeyongere ohusasaana amangu, nʼabahiŋulira bahifugiirire hyenywe.
53003002	Era mutusabire, abaatu abahosi bʼebibi era ababi batatwosaho higosi, olwohuba abaatu bosibosi abaŋulira obuhwenda sibabufugiirira.
53003003	Aye Musengwa omwesigwa era owoheresa hiisi ehi aloma, anabaŋenga obugumu era anabagayengaho oluŋetehe lwʼomusigu abahiyaania.
53003004	Huli bagumu eyi muli olwʼowesige obu huli ni nabwo mu Musengwa, era huhahasa huuti muhola era munaholenga ebyo ebi hwabalagira.
53003005	Hubasabira, Musengwa aluŋamye emyoyo jenywe muhufaania ohwenda ohu Hatonda abenda era mube nʼohugumikiriza ohuŋwa eyiri Kurisito.
53003006	Aboluganda, hubalagira mu siina lya Musengwa Yesu Kurisito ohutahola muhumba nʼabaatu abaŋuuna ohulera engalo, era abatalonderera ebi hwabegirisa.
53003007	Enywe mwesi mwabeene muhimanyire bulaŋi muuti ni hwali eyo ni nenywe hwabalaga ehyʼohuboneraho ni hutaŋuuna hulera ngalo. Olwʼehyo mwesi ni mubonera hu efe muli nʼohutamba ngʼolu efe hwatambanga.
53003008	Efe sihwalyanga biryo ebi hutaholereeye aye hwatambanga nʼamaani, ni hwehalubya omuusi nʼowiire, hutahalubirira kadi mulala hu nywe.
53003009	Sihuloma huuti hyali sihyola enywe ohutuholaho, aye hwendire hubaŋa ehyʼohuboneraho, mwesi musobole ohuholanga hyefe.
53003010	Era ni hwali ni huhiiri ŋalala ni nenywe, hwabaŋa ehiragiro huuti, “Atenda hutamba, nʼohulya atalyanga.”
53003011	Ne huŋulira mbo abandi mu nywe baŋuuna hulera ngalo, sibatamba wabula baba hu gwa hweyingisa mu bitabaŋambaho.
53003012	Abʼengeri abo, hubalabula era hubalagira mu siina lya Musengwa Yesu Kurisito, begoboleho baŋwe hu byʼohulera engalo batambenga, besunire abeene ehi banaalye.
53003013	Aye enywe balebe, mwegumye mutademba huhola biraŋi.
53003014	Ni ŋabangaŋo agaana ohuŋulira ebi hubaloma mu bbaluŋa yino, mumwegenderesanga era simuholagananga ni naye, ehyo himuhubbe esoni.
53003015	Cooka simumubisyanga hyʼomusigu, aye mumulabulanga nga mulebe yenywe.
53003016	Ehisembayo, hulomba Yesu Musengwa yeefe omwene hugaba miyaaya, abenga ni nenywe mwesimwesi era habuhyabuhya abaŋenga emiyaaya hiisi aŋa munaabenga.
53003017	Ndiise Pawulo, abaŋandiihiiye era abaŋeerehiise obuheese buno era yino njʼepandiiha yange. Tayeeho nʼomuhono gwange nga njʼahabonero ahalaga hiisi bbaluŋa eyi mba ni pandiihire.
53003018	Ehisasabirisi hya Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito, hibe hu nywe mwesimwesi.
54001001	Ndiise Pawulo owafuuha omuhwenda wa Yesu Kurisito olwʼobuŋangi wa Hatonda era Omunoŋosi weefe ŋalala ni Yesu Kurisito oyu hulimo owesige.
54001002	Kuŋandiihira ewe Temuseewo, oyu pira ngʼomwana wange omwene nʼomwene olwʼohufugiirira ohu ese ni neewe huli ni nahwo mu Kurisito. Hatonda Seefe ni Yesu Kurisito Musengwa yeefe bahuŋambire ehisasabirisi era bahuŋe emiyaaya.
54001003	Ngʼolu nahuloma ni nʼali ni tiina e Makedoniya, nenda osigale mu Efeeso, olagire abaatu abali husomesa ebibono ebyʼobudulingi ebyabuhana nʼohufugiirira hwʼefe, bahyagamye.
54001004	Balagire balehere aŋo ohuheneranga ebiseera mu husomesa abaatu ni batambisa engano ejitali tuufu ejiŋamba hu byafaayo byʼobusaale nʼohulanduluhana nʼolutungo lwʼamasiina gʼabaahale olutahoma. Ebyo byongesa huhubba mbaha nʼohuŋahana mu baatu, mu hifo hyʼohubasomesa ebya Hatonda. Ebya Hatonda hubyoheresa ni hubita mu humufugiirira.
54001005	Ehingendererwa mu huhuŋa ehiragiro hino, hya hwenda huhubbirisa abafugiirira bendane nʼohwenda ohuŋwa mugati wʼomwoyo ogubulamo kirihindi era oguŋanga ohwabula ehiraŋi nʼehibi. Singa bendana mu sambo eyo, hiija hulaga ngʼolu bagumisye esomesa etuufu.
54001006	Balala hu baatu abo abasomesa ebitali bituufu, ebyo babiŋwaho, baagobola hu binambulamo.
54001007	Abaatu abo benda basomese abaatu amagambi ga Hatonda aga abeene batategeera wayire beeŋira baati bagafaania.
54001008	Hwesihwesi humanyire huuti ebi magambi ga Hatonda galoma biraŋi ate bisaana, omuutu anagatambisa mu ngeri etuufu.
54001009	Ne husaana hutegeere huuti amagambi sibagataŋo hu lwʼabalaŋi, aye hu lwʼabaatu abajeemu abahola ebibi, abaganiiye mu hubbenga ni batatya Hatonda, abaali nʼomwoyo omubi era abatala Hatonda. Abeeti, abeeta abasaawe oba abanyinaawe ko nʼabaatu abandi.
54001010	Abahwedi, abasinde abaŋenyuha nʼabasinde bahyawe, abatunda mu bahyawe. Abadulingi nʼabalayira ebitali bituufu, nʼebindi byosibyosi ebitolana nʼesomesa etuufu
54001011	eŋambagana nʼAmaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu Hatonda oyu huŋa eŋono, aga bapambya ohulomera abaatu.
54001012	Neyaasa Yesu Kurisito Musengwa yeefe, owambona ni ndi mwesigwa ohuhola omulimo gugwe ko gagupambya gaahena gaapa nʼamaani agohumuŋeeresa.
54001013	Wayire oludaayi namulomangaho ebibi, ni ngudya abamufugiirira, era ni ndi muutu wʼembaha, gaasaasira olwohuba ebyo byosibyosi nabiholanga mu buŋaayi, nʼolwohuba ti naali kiiri humufugiirira.
54001014	Aye Musengwa yeefe gapambira ehisasabirisi ehyene ehingi, era gaapa nʼomwoyo ogwʼohufugiirira ŋalala nʼohwenda ebi husuna ohuŋwa eyiri Kurisito.
54001015	Ngʼolu omanyire, efe abafugiirira huloma hituufu huuti, “Yesu Kurisito gaaja hu hyalo ohunoŋola abali nʼebibi.” Ehibono hino hituufu hyene ehi hiisi muutu asaniiye ohufugiirira, era nga mu baatu abo ababi ndiise owaali ni kira ohuba omubi.
54001016	Aye wayire naali mubi ohwola aŋo, Hatonda gaapambira ese owaali ni singira erala ohuba omubi, ehisasabirisi. Gaasoniŋa olwʼohwenda ohulaga abaatu ngʼolu Yesu Kurisito asobola ohugumikiriza abo abaŋanga ohumufugiirira, basobole ohusuna obulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
54001017	Ale ŋaahani, hiisi muutu aŋe Hatonda eŋono olwohuba nje Habaha aŋuga emirembe nʼemirembe, atalifa, oyu muutu atasobola hubona nʼemoni era nga nje Hatonda omulala yeŋene emirembe nʼemirembe. Amiina.
54001018	Temuseewo mwana wase, kuhubbirisa ohuhola ebyo ebyolana nʼebibono ebyʼobunaabbi ebi bahulomaho baati olihola, konyo osobole ohugumikiriza ohuhola omulimo gwa Hatonda nʼohusoola olutalo nʼobusira.
54001019	Yegumye ohufugiirira era nʼohola ehi omanyire ti njʼehituufu. Abandi hino bahiŋwaho hale, hyabaleetera ohugwa.
54001020	Mu abo pʼomuli Himenaayo nʼAlekizanda aba nalyoŋera Sitaani abatambise hiisi ehi anende baheega ohutafodogolanga Hatonda.
54002001	Ohusookera erala, olwʼebyo ebi kenire ohuhuloma, kuhubbirisa ewe ko nʼabafugiirira bosibosi ohusabirangaho abaatu abandi hiisi olu munahumbaanenga ohujumirya Hatonda. Mubasabire, Hatonda asobole ohubayeeda benenye, banoŋohe. Era ni muba ni musaba, mweyaasenga Hatonda hulwa ebi aholire.
54002002	Musabirenga habaha, nʼabaŋugi abandi abasigaayeyo ko huŋange ohuba obulaŋi, ni huli nʼedembe eryʼohujumirya Hatonda nʼohuhola omulimo gugwe ni ŋabula atuhubba hu muhono.
54002003	Hino hiraŋi era hisangaasa Hatonda Omunoŋosi weefe,
54002004	owenda abaatu bosibosi banoŋohe, era basobole ohufaania amazima.
54002005	Hino kiroma olwohuba Hatonda ali mulala, era nafaaŋania abaatu ni Hatonda, ali mulala. Omuutu oyo nje Yesu Kurisito,
54002006	oweeŋayo abe endiŋi yʼabaatu bosibosi. Buno njʼobuhwenda obu Hatonda gatuŋambya era nga hino njʼehiseera ehituufu ehyʼohubulomera abaatu.
54002007	Era ehyo njʼehyagira Hatonda gaatuma ohuba omuhwenda nje nangirire era somese Abatali Bayudaaya obuhwenda buwe obutuufu buno. Ehi ndoma njʼamazima, sindulinga.
54002008	Olwʼehyo, hiisi olu munahumbaanenga ohusaba, nenda abasinde ni banagololenga emihono jaawe, baholenga baatyo ni babula tima oba egongi hu muutu.
54002009	Era nenda abahasi bambalenga mu ngeri etaŋemula era ebyambalo byawe bibawiihenga bulaŋi ni bitaleetera abasinde ohubegomba. Bataholanga majolobera mu fiiri jaawe wayire ohwambala embira nʼemihobyo ebyʼomuŋendo, wayire ebyambalo ebyʼebbeeyi ehibitiriiye.
54002010	Cooka ebiseera byawe nʼebbeesa babihenerenga hu huhola ebiitu ebiyeeda abaatu olwohuba ehyo cʼehi Hatonda genda abahasi ohuhola, ko weeyite abo abaloma baati bamufugiirira.
54002011	Mu hiseera hyʼohusomesa ebyaŋandiihiwa, omuhasi gegenga maŋoleeye, ni geŋomehire.
54002012	Sifugiirira muhasi husomesa oba ohuba nʼobuŋangi hu musinde, aye asaana huŋoleera huŋoleera.
54002013	Hino kiroma olwohuba ti Adamu njʼoyu basooka ohubumba, nga ko baloosaho Kaawa.
54002014	Nʼehindi, Adamu sinje oyu Sitaani gadulinga, aye omuhasi njʼoyu badulinga, gagwa mu hibi. Olwʼehyo abahasi bali nʼohweŋomeha.
54002015	Aye Hatonda alinoŋola abahasi singa banegumyenga ohumwenda nʼohumugondera, ohwesiganga Kurisito, ohwoheresanga obuvunanyiziwa waawe ngʼabasaaye, ko nʼohwebisya mu ngeri esaanira.
54003001	Ngʼolu omanyire, efe abafugiirira Yesu huloma hituufu huuti, “Omuutu yeesi owenda omulimo gwʼobulabirizi wʼabaatu abafugiirira Yesu aba gegombire ohuhola omulimo omulaŋi.”
54003002	Olwʼehyo, Omulabirizi, aseene ohuba omuutu owʼesambo endaŋi ejibulaho ehi omuutu geŋambya. Ali nʼohuba omusinde owʼomuhasi mulala, afuga owongo, omwegenderesa, oyu baatu baŋa eŋono, asangaalira abageni, amanyire ohusomesa,
54003003	atali mumeesi, atali muhambwe aye nʼaŋamba ebiitu pola, ataduhanaduhana, era aŋuma mulungo gwʼebbeesa.
54003004	Ali nʼohuba muutu aŋuga bulaŋi amago gage, nʼabaana babe ni bamuŋulira era ni bali bʼesambo ndaŋi.
54003005	Kale omuutu ataŋanga huŋuga mago gage ameene dala, aba aŋanga atye ohulabirira ehibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira Kurisito?
54003006	Nehindi, sihiraŋi Omulabirizi gaaba omuutu owahafugiiriranga Kurisito, olwohuba omuutu hyʼoyo ahanda geehudumbasa, ehyo hyamuleetera ohumusalira omusango, ngʼolu basalira Sitaani.
54003007	Asaana ohuba omuutu oyu abaatu abatafugiirira Kurisito bosibosi baŋa eŋono. Olwohuba aŋabula ehyo, baaja humulomaho ebibi ataŋanga hulomeranga abaatu ehibono hya Hatonda bamuŋulira, ate hino njʼehi Sitaani genda.
54003008	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, Abadiikoni boosi basaana ohuba abaatu aba baŋa eŋono, abaloma amazima, abatehapira mwenge, era abaŋuma mulungo gwʼebbeesa.
54003009	Bateehwa ohufugiirira obuhwenda obuŋamba hu Kurisito. Hino bali nʼohuhihola nʼobulamu bwawe bwosibwosi.
54003010	Era ni bahiiri hubangala ohubaŋa obuŋeeresa buno, beheererenga babahebera babona hanye baŋanga ohuhola bulaŋi obuŋeeresa buno ni ŋaŋuma hya hubeŋambya.
54003011	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, abahasi baawe boosi baatyo, bateehwa ohuba abahasi aba baatu baŋa eŋono, abataŋaayirisa aye abegenderesa mu hiisi ehi bahola era abesigwa mu hiisi hiitu.
54003012	Mu bufumbo, Omudiikoni ali nʼohuba omusinde wʼomuhasi mulala, era nʼaŋanga ohuŋuga obulaŋi abaana babe, nʼamago gage,
54003013	olwohuba abaatu abaŋeeresa obulaŋi ngʼabadiikoni, mbaba abaatu baŋa eŋono era nʼabeene boosi baba nʼobugumu owʼohulomera abaatu ebihya hu hufugiirira Yesu Kurisito.
54003014	Wayire nga suubira ohuuja mangu eyi oli, kuŋandiihira bino olwʼesonga ti,
54003015	singa ŋabaŋo ehindwihiise ohuuja, obeeŋo nʼomanyire ebyʼohusomesa abaatu bamanye ngʼolu Hatonda genda abaatu baholagane hyʼabaana abomu nyumba endala, era nga bo njʼabaatu ba Hatonda Omulamu era esiiro eyi ohufugiirira obuhwenda wa Kurisito obulaŋi era obutuufu, bwediiye.
54003016	Aŋaŋuma hubuusabuusa, Hatonda gaatuwihulira ehyama ehiri mu hufugiirira Kurisito ehiroma hiiti: “Hatonda geebonesa eyi huli ni gambaaye omubiri hyʼomuutu, Omwoyo wa Hatonda ngʼahahasa ebigaholanga. Abamalayika baamubona, Hatonda ngʼamuŋira mwigulu mu ŋono eryʼamaani. Abafugiirira nga balomera abamawanga ebimuŋambaho, Ngʼabaatu bamufugiirira.”
54004001	Omwoyo Omutukuvu atulomera buhomya ati mu ndaalo ejʼoluvanyuma ŋalibaaŋo abaliŋwa hu hufugiirira Hatonda, babbaamira hu baatu abasomesa ebitali bituufu ebiŋwa eyiri Sitaani nʼemyoyo ejibbaamya.
54004002	Abasomesa abo balyeranga ohuba ti basomesa bituufu ate nga budulingi bwerere. Baliba egubbe, abamalimbe nataŋulira, ni batafaayo oba ebi basomesa bituufu oba byabudulingi.
54004003	Baligaana abaatu ohuhwa nʼohufumbirwa, era ŋaliŋo nʼebiryo ebi baligaana abaatu ohulya ni babiranga bya musizo ate nga hiisi hiitu Hatonda gahitereeyeŋo abafugiirira era abafaania amazima bahitambise ni bamweyaasa olwʼohuhibaŋa.
54004004	Olwʼehyo, hiisi hiitu ehi Hatonda gatonda hiraŋi, era ŋaŋuma hisira, kasita omuutu geyaasa Hatonda ko gahitambisa,
54004005	olwohuba ebiitu byosibyosi bifuuha biraŋi olwʼehibono hya Hatonda nʼolwohubisabira.
54004006	Nʼonalomerenga aboluganda ebibono bino ebi kuloma, onaabenga muŋeeresa omulaŋi owa Yesu Kurisito, era Hatonda aja huhuŋangasa mu hufugiirira nʼomu buŋeeresa nʼabita mu bibono ebituufu ebiwafugiirira.
54004007	Weŋale emboosi ejehiŋere ejibula mahulu ate ejitaŋooma nʼohuŋaya. Aye wenaseho esambo eyʼohuhola ebi Hatonda genda.
54004008	Hola hino olwohuba ngʼolu olulomo luli, “Hiraŋi omuutu ohunasa omubiri gugwe ohutamba nʼamaani olwohuba hino himuyeeda naali mu bulamu wʼohu hyalo huno. Cooka ehisinga obulaŋi hwenasaho ohuhola ebi Hatonda genda olwohuba hino himuyeeda nʼahiiri mu bulamu wʼomu hyalo hino ko nʼobulamu obu husuubira ni huŋooye mu hyalo hino.”
54004009	Ehibono ehyo hituufu olwohuba esuubi lyʼefe, abafugiirira liri mu Hatonda era hiisi muutu gaahali ahifugiirira aŋabula hwemoota.
