54004010	Hino njʼehigira ni hufaabiina ohubona ti huhola ebi genda, olwohuba Ye Mulamu era njʼOmunoŋosi wʼabaatu bosibosi, ko weeyite abafugiirira Kurisito.
54004011	Ebikuloma bino, bisomesenga abaatu era balagire ohubyoheresanga.
54004012	Otaganya baatu huhubisyamo emoni olwohuba ti mbo ohiiri muŋere. Ngʼolu hiri ti omuŋere ahubba eŋoma omuhulu gaahina, weesi fuuha ehyʼohuboneraho eyiri abafugiirira mu malomere, mu sambo eyi webisyamo, mu hwenda ohu wendamo hiisi muutu, mu hufugiirira huhwo nomu bugwalaafu.
54004013	Yeegumye ohusomeranga abaatu ebyaŋandiihiwa, nʼohubabuulira nʼohubasomesa ebya Hatonda, ohwola olu ndiija.
54004014	Otagayalira hutambisanga ehirabo ehi Hatonda gahuŋa olu abatangirisi babafugiirira Kurisito bahufuujaho amate bahwabula baahena bahusabira olu bahutaho engalo.
54004015	Omanya otademba huhola ebi kuloma bino, era bitengeho omwoyo, abaatu bosibosi babone ngʼolu weegumisye ohugendera mu magira ga Hatonda.
54004016	Bona ti weegumya ohugonderanga Hatonda mu hiisi hiitu nʼohusomesanga ebimuŋambaho ebituufu, olwohuba nʼonaholenga otyo, Hatonda alihunoŋola ewe ko nʼabahutegera ohutwi nʼosomesa.
54005001	Omusinde ahuhiraho emyaha otamuhayulanga, aye muŋooyingenga nʼomulabula ngʼolu wahaholire lataawo. Abavubuka abʼoluse lulwo baŋirenga hyʼabalebe babo,
54005002	abahasi bahulu nʼobaŋira ohuba hyʼabamaawo, ate abahasi abahiiri abaŋere nʼobaŋira hyʼababoojo babo aba otaŋanga husobya ni nabo.
54005003	Ŋanga abanamwandu abaŋuma abaŋambire hu muhono, obuyeedi.
54005004	Aye namwandu anaba nʼabaana oba abejuhulu, abo babenga njʼabamulabirira olwohuba obuvunanyiziwa obu hiisi afugiiririra Kurisito ali nʼohwega ohwoheresanga, njʼohumanya ohulabirira abomu mago gaawe, nʼasasula abasaaye babe ebi bamuholera, olwohuba ehyo hisangaasa Hatonda.
54005005	Namwandu oyu muteehwa ohuyeeda njʼoyo abuliriraho muutu yeesi amuyeeda, oyu suubi lirye liri yiri Hatonda yeŋene era asiiba omuusi nʼowiire ni geŋunderera Hatonda amuyeede.
54005006	Aye namwandu aba mu hwetolyonga nʼohwesangaasa omwene ndamanya Hatonda, wayire ngʼaba ahiiri mulamu mu bulamu obwʼomwoyo aba hyʼomufu.
54005007	Leegera era olagire abaatu baholenga baatyo ŋatabaŋo kadi mulala abaho ehyʼohumunenya.
54005008	Singa ŋabaaŋo atafaayo huyeeda abalebe babe, ko weyite abomu mago gage abeene, aba gegeene ohufugiirira, era aba mubi ohuhiraho nʼatafugiirira Hatonda.
54005009	Namwandu ahiiri huŋesa emyaha nkaaga, otamuŋandiihanga hu lukalala lwʼabanamwandu abohuŋa obuyeedi. Omuutu oyu onaŋandiihenga nga namwandu ali nʼohuba ni gaali mwesigwa eyiri wamwe,
54005010	era oyu baatu bamanyire baati muutu mulaŋi, owahusa abaana babe bulaŋi, owasangaaliranga abageni mu mago gage, owalihitanga abaatu ba Hatonda ni goola nʼohubooga amagulu, owayeedanga abaalinga mu bigosi, era oweŋangayo ohuholera abaatu ebiraŋi ebya buli ngeri.
54005011	Aye abanamwandu abahisaaba ni gateremuha otabaŋadiihanga hu lukalala lwʼabanamwandu, olwohuba ehyʼohubeeramo aŋo ni babula musinde ni hiribahayisa, balibbwaga endagaano eyʼohweŋayo eyiri Kurisito, baaja bafumbirwa.
54005012	Ehyo hiribasalira omusango ogwʼohutagumya ehi basuubisa ohuhola oludaayi.
54005013	Nʼehindi, abanamwandu hyʼabo batera ohulera engalo nʼohuhena ebiseera byabwe ni balerenga mu bidaala byʼabaatu. Si cʼehyo hyonyene, aye bali ni kalebule era beeyingisa mu bitabaŋambaho, ni berebula nʼebibatasana huloma.
54005014	Ehyo njʼehigira nahendire abanamwandu abahisaaba ni gateremuha bafumbirwenga, basaale abaana, era balabirire amago gaabwe, bataŋa Sitaani ngira eyʼohutulomesaho ebibi.
54005015	Abanamwandu abandi bahena hale ohugota, balonda Sitaani.
54005016	Aye singa ŋanabengaŋo omuhasi afugiirira Kurisito nʼali nʼabanamwandu mu lulyo lulwe, abalabirirenga hiteeyuseho obusito hu hibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira Kurisito, ko hisobole ohulabiriranga abanamwandu abaŋumaho ababayeeda.
54005017	Abatangirisi abatangirira obulaŋi ehibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira, mubaŋenga eŋono nʼebibemeeresaŋo mu buŋeeresa, ko weeyite abo ababuulira nʼabasomesa abaatu ehibono hya Hatonda,
54005018	olwohuba ebyaŋandiihiwa biroma biiti, “Otasidihanga munwa gwʼesaame ni yirima, wayiroberesa ohwaya.” Era bimeedaho biiti, “Omutambi asaanira epeera yiye.”
54005019	Otanguŋirisanga hwihirisa ebi baba ni basidiha hu mutangirisi yesiyesi, ohutusaho nʼaliho abamulumiirisa babiri oba badatu.
54005020	Aye abaŋeeresa ababbenga, bahayulirenga mu lwijuuye, abandi ko batye.
54005021	Mu ga Hatonda Seefe ni Yesu Kurisito ko nʼabamalayika babe abatubona ebi huhola, kulagira ohuholanga ebi kulabbiiye aŋaŋuma hwehubbira, wayire ohusalirisa.
54005022	Otanguŋirisanga hwisa hu baatu emihono jijo ohubaabula ohuba abatangirisi bʼehibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira Kurisito, olwohuba ehyo hihanda hyahwingisa mu bibi bya baatu abandi. Yehuume osigale nʼoli mugwalaafu.
54005023	Aye ehyo hitahuleetera hunywanga amaaji gooŋene. Nywangaho nʼotwenge tutotono tuhuyeede mu bulumi wʼomu hida hihyo nʼohulwalalwala huhwo.
54005024	Ebibi byʼabaatu abandi biba byaŋalafu era mbebibasingisa omusango, aye ebyʼabandi biba mu ngiso era biboneha luvanyuma.
54005025	Mu ngeri njʼenyene ebikolwa ebiraŋi biboneherera. Nʼebibi byosi biityo pobiri. Olwʼehyo otanguŋirisanga hwabula abaatu.
54006001	Abafugiirira Kurisito bosibosi aba bataayeho ehijoogi hyʼobwidu baŋenga abasengwa baawe eŋono eryʼamaani olwohuba hino hiija huŋeesa Hatonda eŋono nʼohufugiirira hwʼefe batahufodogola.
54006002	Ate abeedu abali nʼabasengwa baawe abafugiirira Kurisito, bataŋeeganga baati olwohuba abasengwa baawe balebe baawe mu hufugiirira, baŋanga ohubabisyamo emoni. Aye babaŋeeresenga bulaŋi nʼohuhiraho, olwohuba abaganyulwamo, bafugiirira bahyawe era abahoda eyi bali. Ebibono bino ebi kuloma, bisomesenga abafugiirira Kurisito era bahubbirise babiholenga.
54006003	Omuutu yesiyesi asomesa ebibono ebindi ebitaŋambagana nʼebibono ebituufu ebiroma hu Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito nʼesomesa yiye, ebiŋanga ohuyeeda omuutu geebisya mu ngeri esangaasa Hatonda,
54006004	aba geebona era ni geranga omumanyi cooka nga mu butuufu saategeera ebi asomesa. Omuutu oyo anyumirwa bugali ohuŋahana hu biŋamba hu mahulu gʼebyaŋandiihibwa era aba hyʼomugwa eralu. Hino himusaalira omwoyo ogwʼekirihindi, ekayu, ohuŋaha abahye esiro, nʼohuŋeega ati bamulimirira.
54006005	Hino himuŋweramo ohubererera nʼaŋiriŋana nʼabahye abamufaanana, boosi abaŋooye hu mazima, abaŋeega baati ohuhola ebya Hatonda, ngira eyoosa omuutu hu busuni.
54006006	Aye mu hwesiga Hatonda nʼohutaŋuuduha ehi osunire, pomuli amagoba agasinga.
54006007	Olwohuba ŋaŋuma ehi hwajire ni nahyo mu hyalo, era ŋaŋuma ehi hulitiina ni nahyo ni huhiŋwamo.
54006008	Hutabanga nʼomwoyo ogwʼomuhopo. Ni hunabenga nʼebiryo ebituhena nʼebyambalo ebi hwetaaga, ebyo bituhenenga.
54006009	Aye hyangu abaatu abayayaanira ebyʼobuŋinda ohuhemewa, baagwa mu lutuula lwa Sitaani batandiha ohuhola ebitoola ebiiniha abaatu mu hugota nʼohusihiiriha,
54006010	Olwohuba omulungo gwʼebbeesa njʼesimuho yʼebibi ebya hiisi ngeri. Olwʼomulungo ogwo, abaatu abandi bagotire baaŋwa mu hufugiirira, nga bereetaho obulumi obwene obungi mu myoyo jaawe.
54006011	Aye ewe omuutu wa Hatonda, yeŋalenga ebyo byosibyosi. Genderanga mu bugwalaafu nʼohola ebi Hatonda genda, nʼomwesiga, ni wenda abaatu bosibosi, nʼogumira ebigosi, era nʼoŋamba ebiitu pola.
54006012	Ohufaanana hyʼomusooli mu lutalo, weesi ŋiriŋananga ni Sitaani nʼobuhenereri ni wesigire Hatonda ko osobole ohusuna obulamu obutaŋwaŋo obu gahulangira hu ludaalo olu wabbutuliiyeho lubona ohufugiirira huhwo mu moni jʼabangi.
54006013	Hatonda aŋa hiisi hiitu obulamu ni Yesu Kurisito owalomera erala amazima mu moni ja Pootiyo Pilaato, nga njʼabajulizi beefe hwembi, kulagira
54006014	oholenga hiisi ehi Hatonda genda ohole, ohwolera erala olu Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito aligobola.
54006015	Hatonda oyu hujumirya ate nga nje yeŋene aŋuga mu mazima, Habaha wʼabahabaha era Musengwa yʼabasengwa bosibosi, omwene njʼaligobosa Kurisito hu hyalo mu hiseera hihye ehiragaane.
54006016	Hatonda yeŋene ali nʼobuŋangi era atafa, owihala mu njase eyʼamaani eyiitamo emoni, oyu ŋabula owaali nʼamuweeneho era nga ŋaŋuma aŋanga ohumubona, omwene oyo abe njʼaŋuga era hiisi muutu amuŋe eŋono emirembe nʼemirembe. Amiina.
54006017	Labula abaŋinda abali eyo balehere aŋo ohweŋeegaho wayire ohwesiga obuŋinda ate nga sibubererera. Beesigenga nje Hatonda atuŋa byosibyosi ebitugasa.
54006018	Balome baholenga ebiraŋi, babe baŋinda bʼebiraŋi ebi baholera abahyawe, era babe bahyere ate abagabi.
54006019	Ni banaholenga baatyo baja huba hyʼabebiihira obuŋinda mwigulu, era banaabenga bebbotera omusingi omugumu ohu balyema basuna obulamu obutaliŋwaŋo.
54006020	Temuseewo, huuma bulaŋi obuŋeeresa obu bahuŋambya. Oteyingisanga mu huhubba embaha mu byʼobusirusiru ebitaŋeesa Hatonda eŋono ebi baatu abandi beedulinga baati mbo njʼamagesi.
54006021	Abaatu abandi bagotire baaŋwa hu hufugiirira baŋamba esomesa eyo ebbaamya. Ale mwesimwesi, Hatonda abaŋe ekabi.
55001001	Ndiise Pawulo, owafuuha omuhwenda wa Yesu Kurisito, olwʼohusiima hwa Hatonda sobole ohulomeranga abaatu ebiŋamba hu bulamu obutaŋwaŋo obu gatusuubisa nʼabita mu Yesu Kurisito.
55001002	Kuŋandiihira ewe Temuseewo omwana wange omuhoda. Hatonda Seefe ni Yesu Kurisito Musengwa yeefe bahuŋambire ehisasabirisi era bahuŋe nʼemiyaaya.
55001003	Habuhyabuhya, neyaasa Hatonda oyu peeresa hyʼolu abasehulu bange bamuŋeeresanga, ni puma hibi ehi kweha mu mwoyo gwange. Hiisi olu mba ni saba omuusi nʼowiire, sikaya huhonya hu siina liryo ni mweyaasa olwʼewe.
55001004	Nahebulira amasiga aga walira hulwo, pemba ohuhubona ehyo hyahaapa esangaalo.
55001005	Kewulira nʼohufugiirira ohwʼamazima ohu oli ni nahwo mu Kurisito. Ohufugiirira ohwo ohwatandiihira hu nguhwawo Loyisi ni maawo Ewunike, kahasa ti kohuli mu ewe weesi.
55001006	Olwʼehyo kuhebulisa otebiriranga hutambisa nʼamaani ehirabo ehi Hatonda gahuŋa olu nahufuujaho amate nahwabula ohuhola emirimo jije.
55001007	Olwohuba Hatonda sigatuŋa mwoyo ogwʼobuti, aye omwoyo ogwʼohumuŋeeresanga nʼobugumu, ni hwenda abahyefe era nʼohwehuumanga ohutahola ebitoola.
55001008	Olwʼehyo otatyanga ohulomera abaatu ebi omanyire hu Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito wayire esoni ohuhuŋamba hulwa ese oyu baaboŋa hu lulwe. Aye weesi ohufaanana ni neese, gumira ohubonaabona olwʼAmaŋuliro Amalaŋi, amaani ga Hatonda
55001009	owatunoŋola gaatufuula ababe, ni gali njʼagahuyeeda. Sigatunoŋola hu lwʼebiraŋi ebi hwaholanga aye gahihola ni geema hu tegeha yiye omwene eyi gaali ni nayo ohwema oludaayi nʼolwa ehisasabirisi hihye. Olwohuba ohuŋwa ahale nahale Hatonda gategeha ohutusaasira nʼabita mu Yesu Kurisito.
55001010	Aye ŋaahani Hatonda ataaye aŋalafu ehisasabirisi ehyo ehi gatutegehera hwahibonera mu Munoŋosi weefe Yesu Kurisito owaŋangula ohufa era nʼabita mu Maŋuliro Amalaŋi gaatuŋa esuubi lyʼobulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
55001011	Olwa hino, Hatonda ganyangala ohuba omusomesa era omuhwenda wuwe, gaatuma ohulomeranga abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi.
55001012	Hino njʼehigira ni bamboŋa mu komera. Ne ehyo sihipambya soni, olwohuba Yesu oyu nafugiirira mwehahasa, era kahasa ti aja huhuuma obulamu wange obu namuŋambya ohwola hu ludaalo olwʼekomerero.
55001013	Somesanga ebibono ebituufu ebiŋamba hu hufugiirira hwʼefe ngʼolu nabihuŋambya. Hola hino ni wegumisye hu hufugiirira Yesu nʼohwenda abahyo olwohuba muli muutu mulala mu Yesu Kurisito.
55001014	Huumanga bulaŋi obuhwenda obutuufu obu Hatonda gahuŋambya ohulomera abaatu, era Omwoyo Omutukuvu aba mu fe abafugiirira Hatonda, anahuyeedenga ohuhola ehyo.
55001015	Ngʼolu omanyire, abaatu abahira obungi mu twale lyʼAsiya baapwaho. Mu abo pomuli Fugero ni Heromogeene.
55001016	Aye Musengwa aŋambire Onesifooro nʼabomu mago gage, ehisasabirisi olwohuba emirundi mingi gaanambuulanga mu komera ni gangumya era esoni ni jitamuŋamba ohuuja ohumbona olwʼobusibe obu ndimo.
55001017	Era olu goola mu hibuga hyʼe Rooma ati bbepa, gafuba bugali ngʼolu asobola, ganyendula ohwola olu ganjolaho.
55001018	Ni neewe weesi omanyire bulaŋi ebi gaakolera ni naali mu hibuga Efeeso. O! Hatonda Musengwa amuŋambire ehisasabirisi hu ludaalo olu alisaliraho emisango!
55002001	Ne ewe Temuseewo mwana wase, Yesu Kurisito ahuŋambireho wegumye ohuba mugumu mu maani aga atuŋa.
55002002	Obuhwenda obuŋamba hu Kurisito obu waŋulira ni somesa mu lwijuuye, weesi busomesenga abaatu aba wesiga, abaŋanga boosi ohubusomesa abandi.
55002003	Ngʼolu omusirikale wamaŋe agumira ebigosi mu lutalo, weesi ngʼomusirikale omulaŋi owa Yesu Kurisito, gumira ohubonaabona.
55002004	Ŋaŋuma muutu owʼamaŋe aba ni genda ohusangaasa musengwawe, gahena nindi geyingisa mu mirimo ejitali jʼamaŋe.
55002005	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, omuutu yesiyesi owingira mu mbaha jʼohusindana mu mugudulo gwosigwosi, anasindana nʼatalonderera magambi agaŋuga omugudulo ogwo, nʼolu ahira sibamuŋa hirabo.
55002006	Nʼehindi, omulimi owafaabiina njʼasaana ohweheerera ohulya hu biŋooye mu ndimiro yiye.
55002007	Ale ŋeega hubi ndi huloma bino, olwohuba Musengwa saanahaye huhuyeeda ohubitegeera byosibyosi.
55002008	Habuhyabuhya bangaŋo nʼohimanyire oti Yesu Kurisito owalamuha, wamu lulyo lwa Dawudi. Gano njʼAmaŋuliro Amalaŋi aga ndomera abaatu,
55002009	era njʼagagira ni mbonaabona mu komera omu bamboŋa hyʼomubbwagi wʼamagambi. Aye baboŋa ndiise sosi ehibono hya Hatonda.
55002010	Olwʼehyo ngumiiye ebiguudyo byosibyosi olwʼabaatu bosibosi aba Hatonda gatobola ohuba ababe boosi bafugiirire Yesu Kurisito abanoŋole era abaŋe nʼeŋono eryʼemirembe nʼemirembe.
55002011	Ebibono bino ebiromwa biiti; Hunafugiirira Kurisito owafa olwʼebibi byefe, gatutusamo omwoyo ogwʼohuhola ebibi, mu ngeri njʼenyene huliba balamu ŋalala ni naye.
55002012	Ni hunagumirenga ebigosi hu lulwe, alitufuula baŋugi hwaŋuga ni naye. Aye hunegaana huuti sihuli baloobera babe, era yeesi alitwegaana.
55002013	Cooka nʼolu hudanya owesige, niye asigala nʼali mwesigwa, olwohuba saaŋanga hwegaana ehi ali. Ebibono bino bituufu byene era hiisi muutu asaniiye ohubifugiirira.
55002014	Hebulisanga abafugiirira Kurisito, ebibono bino ebindoma. Hatonda atubona oluuyi lulala nʼali njʼomujulizi abona nʼobaloma. Balabule beŋalamenga ohuŋahana ebinambulamo hu bibono ebi baatu bagwa ni nabyo, olwohuba ŋabula ehi biyeeda ababiŋuliirisa.
55002015	Fubanga ohuhola ebi Hatonda asiima, nʼoli mutambi owehahasa mubi ohola, era nʼosomesa mu buluŋamu ehibono hya Hatonda ehituufu.
55002016	Yebaayenga emboosi eyʼobusirusiru etaŋeesa Hatonda eŋono, era eŋumamo jamu, olwohuba abeyingisa mu bifaana hyʼebyo bibongera bwongere ohutala Hatonda.
55002017	Ebibono ebi begirisa abaatu biri hyʼehirwaye ehyʼehimaama ehyewiihirisa hu mugulu ne mugati ni hifuhula. Mu baatu abo pʼomuli Himenaayo ni Filetuusi,
55002018	ababbeeme baaŋwa hu mazima. Abaatu abo baloma mbo ohulamuha ohwa bosibosi hwahena hale ohubita era ŋaliŋo aba babbaamisye ohuŋwa hu somesa ya Kurisito etuufu.
55002019	Aye wayire bahola ebyo, abaatu ba Hatonda nibo bali hyʼomusingi omugumu ogutatenga, era Hatonda gabataho eraama eyʼebibono ebiroma biiti, “Hatonda Musengwa amanyire ababe.” Era nʼehindi ti, “Hiisi owetoloma esiina lya Musengwa, ali nʼohuŋwa mu bibi.”
55002020	Ebiitu ebiba mu nyumba yʼomuhombe sibiba bya zaabbu nʼefeeza byoŋene, aye mubaamo nʼebi babaaja ohuŋwa mu mbaawo, era nʼebi babumba mwiroba. Ebiitu ebyʼomuŋendo mu nyumba omwo, babitambisa emirimo emitongole aye ebitali byamuŋendo nibyo babitambisa aŋa ni naŋa.
55002021	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, omuutu yesiyesi oweŋala ohuhola ebibi ebindomireho geeŋoomya mu moni ja Hatonda, aba hyʼehirala hu biitu ebyʼomuŋendo mu nyumba yʼomuhombe. Yeesi anaabenga wʼenjabulo, omuŋoono era owʼomugaso eyiri Musengwawe olwohuba hiisi hiseera abaaŋo ni getegehire ohuhola omulimo omutongole era ogwʼeŋono ogu amutuma.
55002022	Olwʼehyo yebaayenga ohuhola ebibi ebi bavubuka abandi aboluse lulwo bahola, nʼohola ebiruŋamu ebi Hatonda genda. Ba mwesigwa era yendanga abaatu bosibosi, ni wihaaye ni nabo mu dembe. Ewe omwene nʼabafugiirira Musengwa nʼomwoyo mulala, muli nʼohuŋira ebindoma bino ngʼehihulu.
55002023	Oteŋimbanga hu bahubba embaha hu biitu ebyʼehisiru ate ebiŋumamo mahulu, olwohuba ngʼolu omanyire ehyo hiŋwamo ohuduhana.
55002024	Omuŋeeresa wa Hatonda saaŋomera huduhana, ohutusaho ali nʼohuba wʼehisa eyiri hiisi muutu, nʼasomesa bulaŋi ehibono hya Hatonda, era ni gehaliiriha abamuŋahania.
55002025	Abo abaŋahania ebi asomesa, abalaga engira enuŋamu nabanyonyola pola nʼabula kayu, esuubi nʼalitaaye mu Hatonda ohubayeeda bafaanie amazima, bebbwage
55002026	basobole ohuŋwa mu lutuula lwa Sitaani olu abawoŋeeyemo ko nʼahena nʼabatuma ohuhola hiisi ehi genda.
55003001	Baaŋo nʼomanyire oti mu ndaalo ekeneeresi Kurisito ko ahene agobole, ŋalibaaŋo ebiseera ebigosi.
55003002	Hino kiroma olwohuba abaatu balyemanya boŋene, ni bali nʼomulungo gwʼebbeesa, abepaaha, ebʼehyeŋulisi, abaduha abahyawe, abataŋulira basaaye baawe, abatasiima, abatala ebya Hatonda,
55003003	abatenda bahyawe, abatasoniŋa, abaŋaayira abahyawe, abatebalirira mu bibahola, abakambwe, abaŋoomerwa ebibi,
55003004	abeekwe, abenda ebiitu ebyamangu, abeebona, abasangalira ebinyumyo ohuhira Hatonda.
55003005	Hu mugulu balyeraganga abaatu abaŋa Hatonda eŋono, cooka mugati mula ni batafugiirira maani ga Hatonda hubacuusa.
55003006	Sooholanga muhumba nʼabaatu hyʼabo, olwohuba balala hu bo bengiririra ebidaala byʼabaatu ni basomesa ebyʼobudulingi, nga bafuga owongo wʼabahasi abaŋuma epunga eyiita ehiswa, aba ehibi nʼohwegomba ohubi ohwa buli ngeri hwahenamo amagesi.
55003007	Abahasi hyʼabo, hiisi obuhya baba hugwa hwega hiisi somesa epyaha eyibaluhaŋo aye sibaŋanga kadi nʼaŋatotono ohufaania nʼohwabulaŋo obuhwenda wa Hatonda obutuufu.
55003008	Ngʼolu Yanesi ni Yamburesi baŋahania Musa, nʼabasinde abo abasomesa ebyʼobudulingi boosi pobali, baŋahania amazima. Abaatu abo beŋwitania, era baŋuma hufugiirira hutuufu.
55003009	Aye baŋuma eyi baja, olwohuba ngʼolu obudulingi wa Yanesi ni Yamburesi weeta aŋalafu, boosi obudulingi waawe buuja hweta aŋalafu abaatu bosibosi babufaanie.
55003010	Ne ewe omanyire byosibyosi ebi tiinire ni somesa, omanyire esambo jange, omanyire hiina ehi fululuhanira, omanyire ohufugiirira ohu ndi ni nahwo mu Kurisito, omanyire engeri eyi nendamo abaatu, omanyire nʼobugumiikiriza hwange,
55003011	omanyire ohugudya ohu bangudisye nʼohubonaabona ohu mbitiremo. Omanyire ebigosi ebyanjolireho mu bibuga ehyʼAtiyokiya, ehya Yikoniyo nʼehya Lisitura. Mu butuufu bangudya bugali! Aye Musengwa gambisya mu byosibyosi.
55003012	Cooka ehihulu hiri hiiti, hiisi muutu owenda ohugendera mu bulamu owʼohuŋa Hatonda eŋono nʼafugiirira Yesu Kurisito, balimuhiyaania,
55003013	ate ehiseera njʼehyene abaatu ababi, nʼabadulingi balyeyongera ohuba ababi, ni badulinga abaatu ni bababbaamya, ate nindi boosi ni babadulinga.
55003014	Ne ewe olwohuba omanyire ate wesiga abahusomesa, gumya ebyo ebi bahusomesa ebi wahena nʼohwehahasa ti bituufu.
55003015	Nʼehindi, ohimanyire ti ohuŋwa mu buŋere bubwo, otinire ni weega Ebyaŋandiihiwa ebyabufu ebiŋanga ohuhuŋa amagesi, wanoŋoha olwʼohufugiirira Yesu Kurisito.
55003016	Hatonda njʼomwene Byaŋandiihiwa era njʼowabita hu myoyo jʼabo ababiŋandiiha husobole ohubyeyedesenga mu husomesa, ohunenya, ohugolola, nʼohutendeha abaatu ko baholenga ebituufu.
55003017	Era gabituŋa bisobole ohuleetera hiisi muutu aŋeeresa Hatonda, ohuba owolereeye era asobola ohuhola hiisi mulimo omulaŋi.
55004001	Kuhamirisa mu moni ja Hatonda ni Yesu Kurisito aligobola hu hyalo ohuŋuga nga Habaha, nʼohusalira abaliba abalamu nʼabaliba ni bafuuye omusango,
55004002	ohwegumya mu hiseera ehiraŋi nʼehitali hiraŋi ohulomeranga abaatu ehibono hya Hatonda nʼohuhisomesa. Lomeranga abaatu esobi eyi baba ni baholire aŋabula hubbimbirya era nʼobahayula olwʼebibi ebi baba ni baholire. Ehiseera njʼehyene, somesanga nʼoli nʼobugumiikiriza eyiri aba osomesa nʼobahubbirisa ohuŋamba nʼohugendera mubi obasomesa.
55004003	Olwohuba ehiseera hinahoole, abaatu behumbanihisyaho abasomesa abanahabasomese ebicaamu ebyolana nʼohwegomba hwawe, ebi matwi gaawe ganaahabe ni gaŋemba ohuŋulira mu hifo hyʼohufaayo ohuŋulira ebituufu.
55004004	Balireha ohuŋuliirisa ebituufu ebi baliba ni babasomesa, beehaada hu huŋulira engano obugano.
55004005	Aye ewe, ehyo sihihuhenangamo maani. Gumiranga ohubonaabona era holanga omulimo ogwʼohulomera abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi ni woheeresa omulimo ogwʼobuŋeeresa ogu baahuŋa.
55004006	Ne ese pambire olugendo ndi huupi hubalehaŋo. Ehiseera hya Hatonda ohupira pwe hu hyalo hinaatere ohwola.
55004007	Sooye bulaŋi olutalo olwʼohufugiirira Yesu Kurisito, mbubuuye omulimo ogu Kurisito gaapa era ngumisye ohufugiirira hwange.
55004008	Ehi sigahiise hya husuna hirabo hyʼobulamu obutaŋwaŋo obu Yesu Musengwa, asala emisango nʼatehubbira, aliipa hu ludaalo olwʼekomerero. Ehirabo ehyo saalihiŋa ndiise seŋene, aye alihiŋa ni naabo bosibosi, abaŋemba ohugobola huhwe.
55004009	Fuba wuuje amangu eyi ndi
55004010	olwohuba Demasi olwʼohwenda ebiitu ebyʼehyalo hino, gandehaŋo gatiina mu hibuga hyʼe Sesalonika. Kuresike niye namutuma mu twale lyʼe Galatiya, ate Tito oyo yeesi namutuma mu twale lyʼe Dalumatiiya.
55004011	Luka yenyene njʼali ni neese. Olwʼehyo nʼoba ni wuuja, yendula Mariko wuuje ni naye ganjeede omulimo gwʼohulomera abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi.
55004012	Tukikasi niye ndi humutuma mu hibuga Efeeso.
55004013	Nʼonaahabe ni wuuja, wundeteranga ekooti yange eyi naaleha ewa Karipo mu hibuga hyʼe Turoowa. Wundeteranga nʼomufumbo gwʼebiŋadiiho byange, ko weeyite ogwomu byanjo.
55004014	Cooka omusinde omubboti oyu balanga baati Alekizanda gaakola bubi bugali. Aye Musengwa alimusasula.
55004015	Ale weesi mwehuume, olwohuba gaŋahania bugali ebibono byefe.
55004016	Olu nemeerera omulundi omudaayi ohweŋosyaho mu moni jʼomulamuzi, abaatu bosibosi baapwaho ŋaaŋuma kadi mulala owaaja ohuposerehesaho. Aye Hatonda atabafuunana, olwʼehyo.
55004017	Wayire baahola baatyo, Yesu Musengwa niye gaali ni neese era gaapa amaani nasobola ohulomera abaatu bʼamawanga agandi abeene abangi, ehibono hya Hatonda era gaatasa mu meeno gʼepologoma.
55004018	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, Musengwa anaponienga mu hiisi higosi, era alinjosa bulaŋi mu buŋugi buwe mwigulu. Olwʼehyo, Musengwa oyo abaatu bamuŋenga eŋono emirembe nʼemirembe. Amiina.
55004019	Keeheseho Pulisikira nʼAkwila, nʼabomu mago gʼOnesifooro.
55004020	Erasito gasigala mu hibuga hyʼe Koriiso, ate Turofimo niye namuleha hu mwalo gwʼe Mileto nʼali mulwaye.
55004021	Fuba bugali wuuje ehiseera ehigosi ehyʼembeŋo enyingi ni hihiiri hwola. Yubbulo ni Puude ni Liino ni Kulawudiyo ko nʼaboluganda bosibosi, bahuheehiiseho.
55004022	Musengwa abe ni neewe, era abaŋambire mwesimwesi ehisasabirisi.
56001001	Ndiise Pawulo omuŋeeresa wa Hatonda era omuhwenda wa Yesu Kurisito oyu Hatonda gangala gaatuma ohunywania mu baatu babe abatobole ohufugiirira hwawe mu Yesu Kurisito, nʼohutegeera esomesa etuufu eyiŋamba hu Kurisito, ebiyeeda omuutu ko gagendera mu bulamu obusangaasa Hatonda.
56001002	Ohufugiirira ohwo nʼohutegeera esomesa etuufu kohu esuubi lyʼefe eryʼohusuna obulamu obutaŋwaŋo, obu Hatonda atadulinga gatusuubisa ohuŋwa ahale nahale, lyediiye.
56001003	Ehiseera hihye ehiragaane ni hyola, gata aŋalafu ehibono hihye ehyo mu buhwenda obu gapambya, ndomere abaatu. Keesi tyo po kola ngʼolu Hatonda Omunoŋosi weefe gandagira.
56001004	Kuŋandiihira ewe Tito oyu pira ngʼomwana wange omwene nʼomwene, mu hufugiirira hwʼefe mu Kurisito atuŋimba, ese ni neewe. Hatonda Seefe ni Yesu Kurisito Omunoŋosi weefe bahuŋambire ehisasabirisi era bahuŋe nʼemiyaaya.
56001005	Nahuleha hu hizinga hyʼe Kureete oheneerese ogwʼohutereesa ebyali ni bihiŋumiraho, nʼohutaŋo abatangirisi bʼabafugiirira Kurisito mu hiisi hibuga, ngʼolu nahuloma.
56001006	Omuutu oyu otaŋo ohuba omutangirisi wʼabafugiirira Kurisito, ateehwa ohuba nʼaŋumaho ehi bamweŋambya, nʼali musinde owʼomuhasi mulala era nʼateebira piki nʼabahasi abandi. Abaana babe batehwa ohuba abafugiirira Kurisito, era ni batali aba abaatu babala ohuba abʼehifaabi oba abajeemu.
56001007	Olwohuba omutangirisi oyo muŋeeresa wa Hatonda, era ateehwa ohuba nʼaŋumaho ehi baatu bamweŋambya. Ali nʼohuba omuutu aŋeeha amagesi, afuga omutwe, atali mumeesi, atali wʼehifaabi, era atahabira ebi atatuyaaniriiye.
56001008	Aye ateehwa ohuba omuutu asangaalira ohuhyasa abageni, era nʼanyumirwa ohuholera abaatu ebiraŋi, omwegenderesa, atehubbira, agendera mu bulamu obugwalaafu, era owʼesambo endaŋi.
56001009	Ateehwa ohuba omuutu atacuuhacuuha aye owemeereeye nʼamagulu gombi mu hibono ehituufu ehiŋamba hu Yesu Kurisito, ngʼolu bahimusomesiise. Hino hiija humuleetera ohusobola ohuyeeda abaatu abandi ohuŋamba esomesa eŋamba hu Kurisito etuufu, nʼohubalaga obugodami bwʼabo abayiŋahania.
56001010	Hino kiroma olwohuba ŋaliŋo eyo abaatu bangi abajeemera abatangirisi, ko weyite abʼehibbubbu hyʼabaloma baati abaatu bosibosi bateehwa ohuŋamba egambi lyʼAbayudaaya eryʼohuhomola. Abaatu abo beerombola ebinambulamo ni benda badulinge abahyawe.
56001011	Olwʼehyo simya esomesa yaawe olwohuba bali hutiina ni babbaamya abaatu, hidaala hu hidaala ni basomesa ebibono ebi batasaaniiye husomesa ni hireetera abaatu ohuŋwa hu hufugiirira Kurisito ni bafugiirira ebi basomesa, ngʼehibaliho hyʼohubasuniramo.
56001012	Ebindoma bino, ni mulala hu baatu baawe omwene, oyu abeene baloma mbo gaali naabbi galoma ati: “Abaatu bʼe Kureete baberereeye badulingi; bali hyʼebinyaŋa, banyumirwa hufenja aye sibenda hutamba!”
56001013	Ebi gabalomaho ebyo bituufu byene. Olwʼehyo, hayulanga abafugiirira Kurisito bataŋamba sambo eyo embi, ko babe nʼohufugiirira ohutuufu.
56001014	Batatanga mwoyo hu ngano jʼEhiyudaaya, oba hubi baatu abagaana ohufugiirira esomesa etuufu eyiŋamba hu Kurisito babalagira ohuhola.
56001015	Eyiri abaatu abagwalaafu mu moni ja Hatonda, ŋabula hisira. Aye eyiri ababbeeme era abatafugiirira Kurisito, siŋabaŋo higwalaafu, olwohuba ebiŋeego byawe byahena ohubbaama sibahisobola hwabula hiraŋi nʼehibi.
56001016	Abaatu abo baloma mbo bamanyire Hatonda, cooka ebi bahola biraga humutala. Baŋwamo hale, sibahigondera Hatonda era ŋabula nʼehiraŋi ehi baŋanga ohuhola.
56002001	Aye ewe somesanga ebibono ebituufu ebiŋamba hu Kurisito.
56002002	Hubbirisanga abaatu abahale mu myaha beŋomehenga, babe abaatu aba batamo eŋono, abahola ebijamo, abemeereye nʼamagulu gombi mu hufugiirira hwawe, abenda abahyawe, era abagumiikiriza.
56002003	Abahasi bahulu boosi bahubbirisenga otyo, babenga nʼesambo ejisaanira abaatu ba Hatonda, ni bataŋayirisa bahyawe, era ni batali bameesi. Bateehwa ohusomesanga ebiraŋi,
56002004	ko bagunjule abahasi abaŋere ohwendanga abawamwawe nʼabaana baawe,
56002005	ohutaba bʼemoni nyangu, ohuholanga emirimo mu mago gaawe, nʼohuba abʼehisa era abaŋulira abawamwawe, abaatu ko batafodogolanga hibono hya Hatonda hu lwawe.
56002006	Hubbirisa abavubuka babenga abegenderesa,
56002007	ewe omwene nʼoli hyʼohuboneraho ehiraŋi eyi bali mu byosibyosi ebi ohola, nʼoli muluŋamu era owʼamazima mu husomesa huhwo.
56002008	Lomanga mazima, ŋabulenga ehi muutu geŋambya mubi oloma, abahuŋahania baswale, olwʼohuhaya ehibi ehi banatuŋahe.
56002009	Hubbirisanga abeedu babenga bagondi eyiri abasengwa baawe, batabagalujusanianga era babasangaasenga mu byosibyosi,
56002010	era ni batabeebaho biitu byabwe. Aye babenga besigwa era abamazima mu byosibyosi, abaatu ko basiime era begombe esomesa ya Hatonda Omunoŋosi weefe.
56002011	Somesanga abafugiirira Kurisito ebibono ebindomire ebyo olwohuba Hatonda ataaye aŋalafu ehisasabirisi hihye nʼataŋo engira eyʼohunoŋoha mu moni jʼabaatu bosibosi.
56002012	Ehisasabirisi hya Hatonda ehyo hituyeeda ohwega ohweŋala ohuhola ebitamusangaasa nʼohuleha ohwegomba ebyʼehyalo. Aye hwaba abaatu abegenderesa mubi huhola, abaluŋamu, era abata eŋono mu Hatonda ni huhiiri mu bulamu buno.
56002013	Era huhole huutyo ni hulindirira oludaalo olwʼekabi olu husuubira, oludaalo olu Hatonda weefe owʼeŋono era Omunoŋosi weefe Yesu Kurisito aligoboleraho hu hyalo.
56002014	Yesu Kurisito geeŋayo bamuhomerera hu musalabba hu lwefe, konyo atununule mu bibi byefe byosibyosi, atufuule abaatu babe abagwalaafu, abeegumya ohuhola ebiraŋi.
56002015	Ebyo ebi kulomire banga mbebi olomera abaatu nʼobuulira, era nʼogolola nʼobuŋangi bwosibwosi abaatu babo aba otangirira, aŋa baba ni babbenga. Otaganyanga hubaŋo muutu yesiyesi ahubisyamo emoni.
56003001	Hebulisanga abafugiirira Kurisito abali eyo baŋenga abobuŋangi mu gavumeeti eŋono ni bagonderenga amagambi gaawe era ni betegehire ohuholanga hiisi hiitu ehiraŋi.
56003002	Bamanya, bataŋahanga muutu yesiyesi esiro, aye babe baahisa era abeŋomeha ni baŋa abaatu bosibosi eŋono.
56003003	Bahebulise ebyo olwohuba efe hwesi ahale ni hwali ni huhiiri hufugiirira Kurisito, hwali basirusiru era abajeemu. Hwali hugotire, era omwoyo ogwʼoguhopo nʼohwegomba ohubi ko nʼamasangaalo aga hiisi ngeri ni biri njʼebituŋuga. Hwali bagutima era ebʼemyoyo ejʼekirihindi, ni huli higosi eri abaatu bahyefe era ni hutendana.
56003004	Cooka ehisasabirisi hya Hatonda Omunoŋosi weefe, nʼohwenda huhwe, ohu gendamo abaatu ni byatubonehera,
56003005	nga Hatonda atunoŋola, silwa biraŋi ebi hwali ni huhola, aye lwʼohusasira huhwe. Gatunoŋola nʼatwogaho obubi weefe, hwasaaliwa omulundi ogwohubiri, nga hufuuha banyaaha olwʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu,
56003006	oyu gaatuŋa nʼatebalilira nʼabita mu Yesu Kurisito Omunoŋosi weefe.
56003007	Ehyo gahihola husobole ohwolana olwʼehyere ohufuuha abaana babe, era husune obulamu obutaŋwaŋo, obu husuubira.
56003008	Ebindoma bino, bituufu era nenda obihahasenga abafugiirira Hatonda, ko basobole ohwegenderesanga mu huhola ebiraŋi. Ebindoma bino bihulu era byamugaso eyiri hiisi muutu.
56003009	Cooka ewe yeeŋalenga abaatu abahubba embaha ejʼehisirusiru ejiŋamba hu tungo jʼamasiina gaba halehale, era abaŋahana hu biŋamba hu magambi aga Hatonda gaŋambya Musa olwohuba biŋuma mahulu era ŋabula ehi bigasa.
56003010	Omuutu yesiyesi aleetera abaatu bomu hibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira Kurisito ohwabuhanamo mulabulenga habiri, oluvanyuma anagaana ohuŋulira ebi omuloma, nga mumufujulula,
56003011	olwohuba ehyo hiba hiraga bulage ti omuutu oyo gahena ohugodama, mubbengi aŋooye emirimo, era ebibi bibye byahena hale ohumusingisa omusango.
56003012	Ndi hutumanga eyo Aritema oba Tukikasi. Mulala hu bo ni goolanga, ofubanga ngʼolu osobola ohuuja hwaganane mu hibuga hyʼe Nikopooli embeera yʼobwire nʼehiiri hwononoha, engenda yibe ngosi, olwohuba eyo peyi kenereeye ohuba mu biseera ebyʼembeŋo enyingi.
56003013	Fuba ngʼolu osobola otegehere Zeena omunamateeka nʼowahye Apolo batiine mu lugendo lwawe, era bona oti baba ni hiisi hiitu ehi beetaaga.
56003014	Era hubbirisa abaatu beefe beege ohuholanga emirimo emiraŋi ejiŋwamo ebiŋanga ohuyeeda abahyawe abali obubi, mu hifo hyʼohuba aŋo ni babula ehi bagasa.
56003015	Abafugiirira bosibosi abali eno ni neese, bahuheehiise. Weesi tuheheseeho abahyefe abali eyo aba hugabana ni nabo ohufugiirira. Mwesimwesi, Hatonda abaŋambire ehisasabirisi.
57001001	Ese Pawulo, omusibe hu lwʼohuŋeeresa Yesu Kurisito, ni Temuseewo mulebe yeefe, kuŋandiihira ewe Filimooni meeri yeefe omuhoda era omutambi wahyefe,
57001002	ni mboojo yeefe Afiya, nʼowahyefe Arikipo yeesi oweeŋayo ohuhola omulimo gwa Yesu hyefe, ko nʼabafugiirira Kurisito bosibosi abahumbaanira mu mago ewuwo.
57001003	Hatonda Seefe ni Musengwa Yesu Kurisito babaŋambire ehisasabirisi era babaŋe emiyaaya.
57001004	Habuhyabuhya ni saba sikaya huhonya hu siina liryo ni neyaasa Hatonda olwʼewe,
57001005	olwohuba binjolera ngʼolu ofugiirira Yesu Musengwa era nʼengeri eyi wendamo abagwalaafu bosibosi.
57001006	Saba ti omuhumba ogu oli ni nagwo nʼabafugiirira bahyo gwemeede ohuŋangala ni gwema hu hufaania huhwo ebiraŋi ebi Hatonda atuŋa, era hino hyolerere olwʼohuŋeesa Kurisito eŋono.
57001007	Owoluganda, engeri eyi wendamo abaatu yiipa esangaalo eryene eryʼamaani era yingobosamo amaani; olwohuba ebi ohola bigobohiisemo abagwalaafu amaani.
57001008	Olwʼehyo, wayire ngʼomuhwenda wa Kurisito nahali kulagira bulagire ohuhola ehi nenda,
57001009	ne olwʼohwenda ohu kwenda hipalirisa ese Pawulo omusinde omuŋangafu era oyu baboŋa mu komera hu lwʼohuŋeeresa Yesu Kurisito, ohuhusunga busunge ngʼowahyo bukolere ehisaaniye mu songa eyi nja hulomaho.
57001010	Kusunga busunge osoniŋe omwana wange Onesimo oyu nasaala mu hufugiirira Yesu ni ndi mu komera.
57001011	Ŋanyumaho aŋo Onesimo gaali aŋuma mugaso eyi oli aye ŋaahani afuuhire wamugaso eyi huli hwembi.
57001012	Wayire muhoda bugali eyi ndi salireeŋo ohumuhuŋeeresa agobole eyi oli.
57001013	Nahendire bugali ohumwesigahisa asobole ohupeeresa mu hifo hihyo nindi ŋano mu komera omu bamboŋa olwʼohulomera abaatu Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi,
57001014	aye sinenda kihole ni tehereeye huhusunga olwohuba nenda hyosihyosi ehi onasaleŋo hibe ni hiŋooye hu hwenda huhwo sosi olwʼohuhuŋalirisa.
57001015	Hamunga yaali tegeha ya Hatonda, Onesimo ohuhweyibaho, ko hibe ti gahagobola eyi oli asigale nʼali wuwo,
57001016	cooka nʼatali mwidu hyonyene aye nʼafuhiire muutu wundi eyi oli. Mu mubiri nʼahiri mwidu wuwo aye nʼali woluganda olwa Yesu Musengwa era omuhoda ehihena eyi oli, nʼohuhiraho ngʼolu ali muhoda eyi ndi.
57001017	Ale hanye mu butuufu bundiho, era wupeegaho ngʼowahyo mu buŋeeresa, ganya osangaalire Onesimo ngʼolu wahasangaaliiye ese.
57001018	Hanye ŋaliŋo esobi eyi gahuhola oba ŋaliŋo ehi omubanja, ese ndiise anahaliŋe.
57001019	Ese Pawulo aloma ni neewe era ahuŋandiihiiye nʼomuhono gwange omwene, neŋaayeyo ohuliŋa. Aye weesi otebirira oti oli ehi oli olwohuba ndiise owahulomera Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi.
57001020	Olwʼehyo owoluganda, ganya ohole ehi kusunga ohukolera, omwoyo gwange gwihe.
57001021	Kuŋandiihira bino ni kulimo esuubi era ni nehahasa ti soonahaye hukolera nʼebihiraho ebi kusunga.
57001022	Ehindi, tegeherenga aŋa ohuŋenyuha, olwohuba suubira ti olwʼesaala jenywe banahamboŋolole mu busibe obu ndimo hatyane, naajaho eyo.
57001023	Epafuraasi omusibe wahyange yeesi oyu bahaabya ohufugiirira Yesu Kurisito, ahuhehiise.
57001024	Abaŋeeresa bahyefe: Mariko, Arisitaluuko, Demasi ni Luka boosi bahuheehiise.
57001025	Ehisasabirisi hya Musengwa Yesu Kurisito hibe ni nenywe mwesimwesi.
58001001	Halehale Hatonda galomanga nʼabasehulu beefe emirundi mingi nʼomu ngeri nyingi nʼabita mu banaabbi.
58001002	Aye mu ndaalo jino ejʼoluvanyuma, Hatonda aloma ni neefe nʼabita mu Mwana wuwe oyu gataŋo ohuba omusika wa hiisi hiitu era omwene oyo njʼoyu gabitamo ohutonda ehyalo.
58001003	Mwana wuwe oyo, njʼomu eŋono nʼehifaananyi hya Hatonda bibonehera era niye njʼaŋengerera ehyalo hyosihyosi nʼatambisa amaani gehibono hihye. Ni gahena ohuhola ehyo ehi Hatonda gemaho ohusoniŋa abaatu ebibi, gatiina geehala mwigulu hu lubega lwʼomuhono omulungi ogwa Hatonda omwene buŋangi.
58001004	Hatonda gaŋa Omwana wuwe eŋono erihira erya bamalayika ko nʼesiina erihira agaawe.
58001005	Ale njʼani hu bamalayika oyu Hatonda gaaloma ati, “Oli Mwana wange, olwa leero kusaaye?” Oba ati, “Nja huba Semwana, yeesi aja huba Mwana wange?”
58001006	Era Hatonda ni gaali nʼanatere ohutuma Omwana wuwe omudaayi hu hyalo, gaaloma ati, “Abamalayika ba Hatonda bosibosi bamujumiryenga.”
58001007	Eyiri abamalayika, Ebyaŋandiihiwa biroma biiti, “Hatonda afuula abamalayika ohuba hyʼembeŋo, nʼabaŋeeresa babe ohuba hyʼenimi jʼomuliro.”
58001008	Aye hu Mwana wuwe biroma biiti, “O Hatonda, oja huŋuga emirembe nʼemirembe. Era oja huŋuga nʼotehubbira,
58001009	Wenda abo abahola ebyolereeye, era ocaawa abaatu ohuhola ebibi. Olwʼehyo, Hatonda wuwo ahutobooye mu bahyo era gaahuta mu hifo ehyʼeŋono, ehiitu ehija huhuŋweramo esangaalo ohuhiraho abahyo.”
58001010	Era aloma ati, “Ewe Musengwa, mu hutagiha watonda ehyalo, era nʼegulu ndiiwe owalihola.
58001011	Egulu nʼehyalo biriŋwaŋo, aye ewe obeererera. Byosibyosi birihayiriŋa hyʼolugoye,
58001012	Olibifumbaaho hyʼolugoye, era biricucuha hyʼehyambalo. Aye ewe osigala cʼehyene, era obaŋo emirembe nʼemirembe.”
58001013	Njʼani hu bamalayika oyu Hatonda gaaloma ati, “Yiihala hu lubega olwʼomuhono gwange omulungi, ohwola olu ndifuula abasigu babo ekookolo eyʼohutaho amagulu gago?”
58001014	Abamalayika bosibosi si njʼemyoyo ejiŋeeresa Hatonda, era eji atuma ohuyeeda abo abalinoŋola?
58002001	Huli nʼohugumira erala hu hituufu ehi hwaŋulira, ko hutaŋaba huhiŋwaho.
58002002	Ohulaga ti amagambi ga Hatonda aga bamalayika balomera abaatu gaali matuufu, hiisi atagagonderanga, Hatonda gamuboneresanga.
58002003	Olwo ŋaahani efe huliŋona huutye singa hutala obunoŋosi obuhulu obwaga aŋo? Musengwa omwene njʼoweherera ohuŋa obuhwenda obuŋamba hu ngeri eyi baatu banoŋohamo era abo ababuŋulira batuhahasa ngʼolu buli butuufu.
58002004	Ni Hatonda omwene gahahasa ati obuhwenda obwo butuufu ni gaahola ebyʼeŋunyisa nʼebyamaliholiho era nʼagaba nʼebirabo byʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu ngʼolu omwene genda.
58002005	Abamalayika si mbaba Hatonda gaaŋa obuŋangi ohuŋuga ehyalo ehinyaaha, ehiriija ehihulomaho.
58002006	Aye ŋaliŋo mu Byaŋandiihiwa aŋa bihahahisa erala biiti, “Hatonda, abaatu mbaba ani ewe ohubaŋeegaho, era lwahiina abalumirwa?
58002007	Wahola omuutu ŋabuliraho ŋadiidiri ohuba hyʼabamalayika. Era wamwambasa engule eyʼeŋono,
58002008	era ngʼomuŋa nʼobuŋangi ohuŋuga hiisi hiitu.” Hatonda ni gata ebiitu byosibyosi ŋaasi bwʼobuŋangi bwʼomuutu, ŋaŋuma hiitu kadi hirala ehi atamuŋa huŋuga. Aye ŋaahani huhiiri hubona byosibyosi nʼabiŋuga.
58002009	Aye hubona Yesu oyu beesa ŋaasi gaŋumiraho ŋadiidiri ohuba hyʼabamalayika ŋaahani ni bamuŋaye engule eyʼeŋono olwʼohubonaabona ohugabonaabona. Era olwʼehisasabirisi hya Hatonda gaafiiririra abaatu bosibosi.
58002010	Hatonda owatonda ebiitu byosibyosi era agira byabaŋo, gasiima ohunoŋola abaana babe bangi gaabambasa eŋono. Olwʼehyo, gabona ati Yesu njʼosaniira ohuba omutangirisi owolereeye nʼabita mu humugudya ko abanoŋole.
58002011	Yesu ko ni naabo aba agwalaasa, bali ni saawe mulala. Cʼehigira esoni ni jitamuŋamba ohubalanga ati balebe babe.
58002012	Yesu aloma Hatonda ati, “Nahamanyise abalebe bange obuhulu bwʼesiina liryo, nahembe ni kujumirya mu humbaaniro.”
58002013	Era nindi aloma ati, “Nja hwesiganga Hatonda.” Era geyongera ohuloma ati, “Ndi ŋano nʼabaatu aba Hatonda gaapa.”
58002014	Olwohuba abaatu bali nʼomubiri nʼamafugi, cʼehyagira Yesu gafuuha hya nibo ko aŋange ohufa asihiirise Sitaani owaali nʼobuŋangi hu hufa,
58002015	ko abo abaali hyʼabasibe mu bulamu waawe ni batya ohufa, abaŋe edembe.
58002016	Mu butuufu obwene, Yesu sigaaja huyeeda abamalayika aye gaaja huyeeda bejuhulu ba Yibbulayimu.
58002017	Cʼehyagira gafaana hya balebe babe mu hiisi ngeri, ko aŋeerese Hatonda ngʼOmuhulu wʼabasengi ali nʼehisa era omwesigwa, ko aleetere Hatonda ohusoniŋa abaatu ebibi.
58002018	Era ŋaahani aŋanga ohuyeeda abo abahemewa, olwohuba yeesi bamuhema era gabonaabona.
58003001	Ale baluganda, enywe aba Hatonda galanga musune omugabo gwʼobulamu obwomwigulu, muŋeegenga hu Yesu Omuhwenda era Omuhulu wʼabasengi ba Hatonda oyu hufugiirira.
58003002	Niye gaali mwesigwa eyiri Hatonda owamutobola ohuhola omulimo gugwe, ngʼolu Musa gaali mwesigwa mu nyumba ya Hatonda.
58003003	Cooka ngʼolu omutongoli aba nʼeŋono erihira enyumba eyi atongola, ni Yesu asaniira ohuba nʼeŋono erihira erya Musa.
58003004	Hino kiroma olwohuba hiisi nyumba ebaaho owayitongola aye owatongola hiisi hiitu nje Hatonda.
58003005	Musa gaali muŋeeresa mwesigwa mu nyumba ya Hatonda era gaaloma hu biitu ebi Yesu gaali nʼaja hulomaho mu biseera ebyomu moni.
58003006	Aye Kurisito ngʼomwana, mwesigwa mu nyumba ya Hatonda. Ndiife enyumba ya Hatonda singa husigala ni huli bagumu era ni huli nʼesuubi eryo eri hwebonehesyamo.
58003007	Ngʼolu Omwoyo Omutukuvu aloma ati, “Olwa leero ni munaŋulire ejanjaasi lirye,
58003008	mutahahanyasa myoyo jenywe, hyʼabasehulu benywe olu bajeema hu ludaalo olu bahemeraho Hatonda mu lulafu,
58003009	eyo eyi basehulu benywe baakema, era ohuhena emyaha amahumi ane baabona ebinabahola.
58003010	Cʼehyagira naluŋira abaatu abo, era nʼaloma ti, ‘Habuhyabuhya emyoyo jaawe jiŋaba, era sibaŋamba magambi gange.’
58003011	Ni naluŋa nalayira ti, ‘Sibalyola mu hifo omu naali nʼohubaŋeramo ehiŋuumulo.’ ”
58003012	Olwʼehyo, aboluganda, mweŋomehe ŋatabaŋo kadi mulala hu enywe aba nʼomwoyo oguŋemba ohuhola ebibi era ogutafugiirira, gaaŋwa hu Hatonda omulamu.
58003013	Aye hiisi muutu agumyenga owahye hiisi ludaalo, ni huhiiri mu “Olwa leero” ko ŋatabaŋo wayire mulala hu enywe oyu hibi hidulinga gahahanyasa omwoyo gugwe.
58003014	Hino kiroma olwohuba hwafuuha abaloma ehirala mu Kurisito kasita hugumihisya erala obwesigwa bwefe obu hwatandiha ni nabwo ohwola olu huliŋwa hu hyalo huno.
58003015	Ebyaŋandiihiwa biroma biiti, Olwa leero ni munaŋulire ejanjaasi lirye, mutahahanyasa myoyo jenywe, hyʼabasehulu benywe olu bajeema.
58003016	Mbaba ani abaŋulira ejanjaasi lya Hatonda bamujeemera? Mbabo bosibosi aba Musa gaatusa e Misiri.
58003017	Era mbaba ani aba Hatonda galuŋira ohuhena emyaha amahumi ane? Mbabo abonoona, baafa era emirambo jaawe jasigala mu lulafu.
58003018	Era mbaba ani aba Hatonda galayirira ati sibalingira mu hiŋuumulo hihye? Mbabo abamujeemera.
58003019	Olwʼehyo, hubona ti sibengira mu hiŋuumulo hihye olwʼohutafugiirira hwawe.
58004001	Ŋaahani, ngʼolu Hatonda gatusuubisa ohutuŋa ehiŋuumulo hihye, ŋatabaŋo wayire mulala hu enywe oyu hihaya ohuhisuna.
58004002	Hino kiroma olwohuba hwesi hya nibo, baatulomera Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agaŋamba hu hwingira mu hiŋuumulo ehyo. Aye nibo ebi baŋulira sibyabayeeda olwohuba sibabifugiirira.
58004003	Ŋaahani efe abagafugiirira, ndiife abengira mu hiŋuumulo ehyo olwohuba eyiri abo abatafugiirira Hatonda galoma ati, “Ni naluŋa nalayira ti, ‘Sibalyola mu hifo omu naali nʼohubaŋeramo ehiŋuumulo.’ ” Hino gahiroma wayire nga ebi gategeha ohuhola ohuŋwa hu hutonda hwʼehyalo byali biŋooyeyo.
58004004	Ebyaŋandiihiwa biroma hu biŋamba hu ludaalo olwomusanvu biiti, “Hatonda gaŋuumula hu ludaalo olwomusanvu nʼahenire emirimo jije josijosi.”
58004005	Era nindi galoma ati, “Sindibaŋa hiŋuumulo kadi nʼaŋadidiri.”
58004006	Eriyo abaatu abanahengire ehiŋuumulo ehyo wayire nga abeeheerera ohuŋulira amaŋuliro amalaŋi sibahingira olwʼobujeemu waawe.
58004007	Olwʼehyo, Hatonda nindi gaataŋo oludaalo olundi galulanga ati, “Olwa leero.” Oluvanyuma lwʼehiseera ehiŋeraho, galulomaho nʼabita mu Dawudi ati, “Olwa leero ni munaŋulire ejanjaasi lirye, mutahahanyasa myoyo jenywe.”
58004008	Yoswa abanga ni gaboosa mu hiŋuumulo ehyo, ebyo ni biŋooye nindi Hatonda sigahalomire hu ludaalo olundi olwʼehiŋuumulo.
58004009	Olwʼehyo, abaatu ba Hatonda bahiiriyo nʼehiŋuumulo ehindi ngʼolu Hatonda gaŋuumula hu oludaalo olwomusanvu,
58004010	olwohuba hiisi muutu owingira mu hiŋuumulo ehyo, aŋuumula ngʼolu Hatonda gaŋuumula nʼahenire ohutonda ehyalo.
58004011	Olwʼehyo, hufubengaho ohwingira mu hiŋuumulo ehyo, ŋatabaŋo oyu hyihaya ngʼolu hyahaya Abayisirayiri olwʼobujeemu bwawe.
58004012	Hiisi ehi Hatonda aloma hireeta obulamu era hiri nʼamaani nʼowoogi obuhira epiima eriho obwogi hu mbega jombi, hingirira erala mugati hyolera erala nʼohwabula obulamu nʼomwoyo, emisiŋa nʼomusohono era hita ŋalafu ebiŋeego nʼohugobangobana hwʼefe.
58004013	Eŋuma hitonde wayire hirala ehiŋanga ohwehweha hu Hatonda. Ebiitu byosibyosi byeyanjaaye eyiri Oyo oyu hulyemeerera mu moni jije ohweŋosyaho.
58004014	Olwʼehyo, ngʼolu huli nʼOmuhulu wʼAbasengi nga nje Yesu Omwana wa Hatonda owatiina mwigulu, hwegumye hu hufugiirira hwʼefe.
58004015	Omuhulu wʼabasengi oyo, ategeera obunafu bwefe olwohuba Sitaani gamuhema mu hiisi ngeri hyefe olu atuhema aye sigabbenga.
58004016	Ŋaahani hwigerere nʼobugumu eyiri Hatonda hu tebe yiye olwohuba ali nʼehisa, aja hutuŋambira ehisasabirisi era atuyeede hiisi olu huba ni hwenda obuyeedi.
58005001	Hiisi muhulu wʼabasengi ba Hatonda bamutobola ohuŋwa mu baatu ohubahihirira ewa Hatonda nʼaŋayo ebirabo nʼeŋongo olwʼebibi byawe.
58005002	Hino kiroma olwohuba omwene yeesi ali nʼobunafu, era aŋamba pola abo abahola ebicaamu ni batamanyire ŋalala ni naabo abaŋaba.
58005003	Ehyo cʼehigira nʼaŋayo eŋongo hu lwʼebibi bibye ko nʼolwa ebibi byʼabaatu.
58005004	Ŋaŋuma aŋanga ahwepaatihaho eŋono eryʼohuba muhulu wʼabasengi ohutusaho Hatonda omwene nʼamulangire ngʼolu galanga Alooni.
58005005	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, Kurisito yeesi sigepaatihaho ŋono eryo wabula Hatonda omwene njʼowamuloma ati, “Oli Mwana wange, olwa leero kusaaye.”
58005006	Aŋaatu aŋandi mu Byaŋandiihiwa Hatonda aloma ati, “Oli musengi emirembe nʼemirembe, hyʼolu Melukezedeki gaali.”
58005007	Yesu ni gaali nʼahiiri hu hyalo huno, gegayiriranga era gasaba nʼejanjaasi eryʼamaani nʼamasiga nʼaliririra Hatonda owaali nʼobuŋangi ohumunoŋola eri ohufa era yeesi gamuŋulira olwohuba Yesu gamuŋanga eŋono bugali.
58005008	Wayire Yesu gaali Mwana wa Hatonda, ohugudya ohubamugudya hwamwigirisa ohuba mugondi.
58005009	Era ni gahena ohubita mu hubonaabona, gafuuha munoŋosi owʼemirembe nʼemirembe eyiri abo bosibosi abamugondera,
58005010	ni Hatonda gaamufuula muhulu wʼabasengi hya Melukezedeki.
58005011	Huli nʼebingi ebyʼohuloma hu hya Yesu ohuba hya Melukezedeki aye higosi ohubanyonyola olwohuba mulwaŋo ohutegeera.
58005012	Mu butuufu obwene hani hatyane muli basomesa aye muhyenda omuutu owohubasomesa ebi batagihiraho ohwega hu Hatonda. Era muli hyʼabaana abaŋere abasaanira mabeere sosi mere ekahadafu.
58005013	Hiisi muutu ahyenda ohutambisa amabeere goŋene aba ahiiri mwana muŋere ataŋanga hwabula ehiraŋi nʼehibi.
58005014	Aye emere ekahadafu yʼabaatu abaŋangaaye mu byʼomwoyo, abamanyire ohwabula ehiraŋi nʼehibi.
58006001	Olwʼehyo, huŋwe hu huhenera ebiseera mu hwega ebibatandihiraho mu somesa lyʼabafugiirira Kurisito olwohuba hwahena hale ohubaŋa omusingi ogwo era sihyetagisa hugobojolamo ebi hwahena ohubasomesa. Mumanyire muuti sihiŋangiha hunoŋoha olwʼebikolwa byefe era mumanyire ngʼolu hiri hihulu ohufugiirira Hatonda.
58006002	Hwabegirisa hale ebiŋamba hu hubatiziwa, nʼohuta hu baatu emihono nʼohu hulamuha ko nʼengeri eyi Hatonda alisaliramo abaatu emisango. Olwʼehyo, muŋwe hu ebyo hutiine hu bibaleetera ohuŋangala mu byʼomwoyo.
58006003	Ni huba husiima hwa Hatonda, ehyo njʼehi hwenda muhole.
58006004	Hino kiroma olwohuba abaatu abaahena ohusuna enjase bafugiirira era bategeera ehirabo ehyomwigulu, baasuna nʼomugabo gwʼehirabo hyʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu,
58006005	baalega nʼohu bunoli bwʼehibono hya Hatonda nʼengeri eyi aja huŋugamo nʼobuŋangi,
58006006	abaatu abo banagwa baŋwa mu hufugiirira, sihyangu ohugobolaŋo olwohuba mu bikolwa byawe baba oti abali huhomerera Yesu hu musalabba omulundi ogwohubiri.
58006007	Hiisi olu fula yigwa, eroba linywa amaaji lyahusa ebiryo ebi mulimi genda olwohuba Hatonda aliŋa ekabi.
58006008	Aye eroba erihusa maŋwa nʼebinyaasi, liba liŋuma mugaso era liba lyolire ohusuna ehiŋwabo nʼebinyaasi ebyo ohu byohya omuliro.
58006009	Aye balebe beefe abahoda, wayire huloma huutyo enywe sihubebusabuusamo. Humanyire huuti muli mu ngira eyiriboosa hu hunoŋoha,
58006010	Hino kiroma olwohuba Hatonda sigehubbira era saalibirira mulimo ogu mwahola nʼohwenda ohu mwamulaga ni muyeeda abaatu babe era ehi muhihola nʼolwa leero luno.
58006011	Era hwenda hiisi mulala hu enywe ohulaganga obuheneerefu obwʼohwendana ohwo ohwola olu mulisuna ehi musuubira.
58006012	Sihwenda muŋuunenga hulera ngalo aye mulonderere ehyʼohuboneraho ehyʼabo abaali nʼohufugiirira era nʼohwehaliriha ko baasuna ebi Hatonda gabasuubisa.
58006013	Hatonda ni gasuubisa Yibbulayimu, gerayirira omwene olwohuba ŋaali ŋaŋuma amuhiraho oyu gaali nʼohulayirira.
58006014	Gaaloma ati, “Mazima nahahuŋe ekabi nʼolwebe lwʼabejuhulu.”
58006015	Yibbulayimu gahuumirira nʼohwehaliriha era ngʼasuna ehi Hatonda gamusuubisa.
58006016	Abaatu balayira ni batambisa esiina lyʼoyo abahiraho era ehirayiro njʼobuhahafu obuhenaŋo embaha.
58006017	Hatonda galayira olwʼohwenda ohuhahahisa erala ati abo abagasuubisa balisuna ebi gabasuubisa.
58006018	Hatonda gatuŋa ehisuubiso nʼehirayiro. Ebiitu ebyo byombi sibicuuhacuha olwohuba Hatonda saadulinga. Olwʼehyo efe ohwadulumira eyi ali, hitugobosamo amaani bugali ohugumira hu suubi lyʼefe eryo.
58006019	Hu suubi eryo, pohu obulamu weefe wediiye era hitugobosamo amaani. Era esuubi eryo lingirira erala mu hifo ehyabufu ehiri egongo wʼolutimbe lwʼomu Yekaalu mwigulu,
58006020	omu Yesu gengira hu lwefe gahena ŋaahani gafuuha muhulu wʼabasengi emirembe nʼemirembe hya Melukezedeki.
58007001	Melukezedeki gaali habaha wʼehibuga ehi balanga baati Saalemu era nʼali musengi wa Hatonda Oyo Owaŋamugulu Obugali. Yibbulayimu ni gaali nʼaŋwa mu lutalo olu gaŋangula abahabaha gagaanana ni Melukezedeki, gamusabira ekabi,
58007002	nga Yibbulayimu aŋa Melukezedeki hirala ehyʼehumi ehyʼebiitu byosibyosi ebi gaali nʼanyagire. Esiina Melukezedeki litegeesa, “Habaha ahola ebiruŋamu.” Ate “Habaha owʼe Saalemu” hitegeesa hiiti “Habaha aleeta emiyaaya.”
58007003	Ŋabula amanyire hu byʼohusaaliwa oba ebyʼohufa hwa Melukezedeki. Ŋaŋuma amanyire semwana wayire nyina oba abasehulu babe. Melukezedeki ali hyʼOmwana wa Hatonda era asigala musengi emirembe nʼemirembe.
58007004	Ale oweene ngʼolu Melukezedeki gaali muhulu! Ni sehulu yeefe Yibbulayimu gamuŋa ehirala ehyʼehumi hu ebyo ebi ganyaga mu lutalo!
58007005	Amagambi galagira bejuhulu ba Leevi abafuuha abasengi ohusoloosa mu balebe baawe Abayisirayiri hirala hyʼehumi wayire nga abalebe baawe abo bejuhulu ba Yibbulayimu.
58007006	Melukezedeki sigaali wamuhida hya Leevi aye Yibbulayimu gamuŋa hirala ehyʼehumi. Melukezedeki gahena gaaŋa Yibbulayimu, omuutu oyu Hatonda gaali nʼaŋaaye ebisuubise, ekabi.
58007007	Ŋaŋuma hubuusabuusa ti omuutu ahiraho owahye edaala njʼamuŋa ekabi.
58007008	Ni huloma hu basengi abomu lulyo lwa Leevi, abaatu obuutu abafa njʼabasoloosanga hirala ehyʼehumi. Aye Ebyaŋandiihiwa biroma biiti Melukezedeki abasinga olwohuba niye mulamu.
58007009	Oŋanga ohuloma oti Leevi yeesi nʼabasengi abʼomululyo lulwe, abasoloosa ehirala ehyʼehumi, boosi baahiŋa Melukezedeki ni babita mu Yibbulayimu.
58007010	Hino kiroma olwohuba Leevi ni gaali nʼahiiri mu tumbu ja Yibbulayimu, gaaŋa Melukezedeki hirala ehyʼehumi.
58007011	Abayisirayiri basuna amagambi ni gediiye hu buŋeeresa wʼAbaleevi. Omulimo gwʼabasengi abomu lulyo lwa Leevi guba ni gwali muluŋamu, hani sihyali ni hyetagisa omusengi owundi ohuuja nʼali hya Melukezedeki, nʼataŋwa mu hida hya Alooni.
58007012	Obuŋeeresa wʼabasengi bunacuuha, nʼamagambi goosi gacuuha.
58007013	Musengwa yeefe oyu balomaho ebyo, wamu hiha hindi ehitali hyahuŋwamo musengi wayire mulala ohuŋeeresa hu hituuti.
58007014	Huhimanyire huuti Musengwa yeefe gaŋwa mu hiha hya Yuda ehi Musa atalomaho ati hiriŋwamo abasengi.
58007015	Aye hitegereheha hiiti ŋaahani ŋaliŋo ecuuhacuuha, ŋaliŋo omusengi owundi ali hya Melukezedeki,
58007016	ataafuuha Musengi wa Hatonda olwohuba gaali wamu hiha ehiŋwamo abasengi aye hu lwʼobuŋangi bwʼobulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
58007017	Hino kiroma olwohuba Ebyaŋandiihiwa biroma biiti, “Oli musengi emirembe nʼemirembe, hya Melukezedeki.”
58007018	Ehiragiro ehidaayi ehiŋamba hu basengi, bahidibya olwohuba hyali hinafu era ni hitagasa,
58007019	olwohuba amagambi manafu era sigagasa. Aye ŋaahani huli nʼesuubi erihiraho obulaŋi erituleetera ohwigerera ohuupi ni Hatonda.
58007020	Hatonda galayira ati Yesu aja huba musengi emirembe nʼemirembe. Abandi bala bafuuha basengi nʼatalayiiye.
58007021	Aye Yesu gafuuha musengi olu Hatonda galoma ati, “Musengwa alayiiye era saalyehebulisa: ‘Oja huba musengi emirembe nʼemirembe.’ ”
58007022	Olwʼehirayiro ehyo, Yesu gafuuha musingo gwʼendagaano ehira obulaŋi era njʼagira yoolerera.
58007023	Abasengi mu ndagaano endaayi baali bangi olwohuba bafanga.
58007024	Aye olwohuba Yesu saafa, obuŋeeresa buwe ngʼomusengi bwa mirembe nʼemirembe.
58007025	Olwʼehyo, Yesu aŋangira erala ohunoŋola abo abaaja eyiri Hatonda ni babita mu ye olwohuba aliŋo ohubaŋoherehesa emirembe nʼemirembe.
58007026	Omuhulu wʼabasengi ba Hatonda oyo njʼowolana nʼobwetavu bwefe olwohuba mwabufu, abula hyahumweŋambya, mwabufu hu fe ababbengi era Hatonda gamuhusa gaaba ŋamugulu wʼegulu.
58007027	Yesu saali hyʼabahulu bʼabasengi abandi. Sihimwetagisa huŋaayo eŋongo hiisi ludaalo olwʼebibi bibye ko nʼebyabandi. Niye geeŋayo ngʼeŋongo olwʼebibi byʼabaatu omulundi mulala gaahena, olu bamuhomerera hu musalabba.
58007028	Mu magambi ga Musa, batobolanga abaatu buutu abaali nʼobunafu ohuba abahulu bʼabasengi. Aye mu hirayiro ehyalondera amagambi ago, Hatonda gatobola Mwana wuwe ohuba omusengi owolereeye emirembe nʼemirembe.
58008001	Ehihulu ehi huli hulomaho cʼehino ti, huli nʼOmuhulu wʼabasengi ba Hatonda era gehaaye mwigulu hu lubega lwʼomuhono omulungi ogwa Hatonda Omwene Buŋangi.
58008002	Omuhulu wʼabasengi oyo aŋeeresa mu Hifo Ehihirira erala Owabufu mu weema eyi Hatonda Musengwa omwene gabbota, sosi abaatu.
58008003	Hatonda gataŋo hiisi muhulu wʼabasengi ohuŋangayo ebirabo nʼeŋongo. Olwʼehyo, ni Yesu yeesi gaali nʼohuba nʼehi aŋayo.
58008004	Abanga nʼahiiri hu hyalo, sigahali musengi wa Hatonda kadi nʼaŋadiidiri olwohuba eriyo abasengi abaŋayo ebirabo ngʼolu magambi galagira.
58008005	Ebi abasengi abo bahola bifaana bufaane hyʼebyo ebiri mwigulu. Era Musa ni gaali nʼaja hubbota eweema, Hatonda gamulagira ati, “Hola byosibyosi nʼolonderera endagiriro eyi wasuna ni waali hu lusozi Sayuuni.”
58008006	Aye obuŋeeresa wa Yesu buhira owʼabasengi abadaayi ngʼolu endagaano epyaha eyi gahola nʼafaaŋania abaatu ni Hatonda yihira endaayi olwohuba yediiye hu bisuubiso ebisinga obulaŋi.
58008007	Endagaano endaayi yibanga ni yaali nʼeŋuma ehiŋumiraho, Hatonda sigahaholire eyohubiri.
58008008	Aye Hatonda Musengwa galoma ni goloobya abaatu babe ati, Hatonda Musengwa aloma ati: Ehiseera hinahoole, nʼahola endagaano epyaha nʼabaatu ba Yisirayiri, ko nʼabaatu abomu hiha hya Yuda.
58008009	Siyiriba hyʼendagaano eyi nʼahola nʼabasehulu baawe, olu nabaŋamba hu muhono nʼabatusa e Misiri. Aye olwohuba sibagumya ndagaano eyo, keesi nalehayo ohubaŋulirisa.
58008010	Yino njʼendagaano eyi ndihola nʼAbayisirayiri mu ehiseera ehiija. Ndiŋandiiha amagambi gange hu myoyo jaawe. Banahanjumirye nga Hatonda waawe, era boosi baliba baatu bange.
58008011	Ŋaliŋuma alisomesa omulebe wuwe oba muliranwawe, namuloma ati, “Osaana ohumanya Musengwa.” Olwohuba ohuŋwera erala hu baŋere ohwola hu bahulu, bosibosi balimanya nga Musengwa yaawe.
58008012	Olwohuba ndisoniŋa ebibi byawe era sindibihebulira kadi naŋadiidiri.
58008013	Hatonda nʼaloma hu ndagaano epyaha, endaayi aba ayidibisye. Era ehiitu banahidibya hiba hiŋuma mugaso.
58009001	Endagaano endaayi yaali eroma hu weema eyʼohu hyalo huno nʼamagambi agabalondereranga mu bajumirya Hatonda.
58009002	Eweema eyo yalimo ehifo ehidaayi ni bahiranga baati, “Ehifo Ehyabufu” era mwalimo ehisindi ohubatanga etaala, emeeza ko nʼemigaati ejibaŋongire eyiri Hatonda.
58009003	Ehifo ehyohubiri egongo wʼolutimbe, baali bahiranga baati, “Ehifo Ehihira Owabufu.”
58009004	Omwo mwalimo ehituuti ehya zaabbu ohubadunyihisanga obubbaani, nʼesanduuku eyʼendagaano ni bayiŋahaho ezaabbu embega josijosi. Mu sanduuku eyo, mwalimo esimbo yʼAlooni eyaloha, ebipande byʼamabaale ohubaŋandiiha amagambi ehumi ko nʼolubya olwʼezaabbu omwali emigaati ejibalanga baati emaanu.
58009005	Hu mugulu wʼesanduuku eyo hwaliho ebifaananyi byʼebiwumbe ebi balanga baati Abakerubbi abʼeŋono. Ebiwumbe ebyo byaliho amabaŋa aga byali ni bitigaliiye ni nago etebe ya Hatonda owʼehisasabirisi. Aye ebyo byosibyosi sihuŋanga hubiroosa hatyane hwabihenayo.
58009006	Hiisi hiitu ni bahena ohuhyanjiha baatyo, ngʼabasengi bengiranga aŋa ninaaŋa mu hisenge ehidaayi ohuhola emirimo jaawe.
58009007	Aye omuhulu wʼabasengi yeŋene njʼowengiranga mu Hifo Ehihira Owabufu, ate lulala lwoŋene mu mwaha. Hiisi olu gengiranga, gabanga nʼohuŋira amafugi ohuŋwa mu hyayo ehi baŋongire agaŋeyo hu lulwe nohu olwʼebibi byʼabaatu ebi baholanga ni batamanyire.
58009008	Mu byosibyosi, Omwoyo Omutukuvu gaali alaga ati engira eyitiina mu Hifo Ehihira Owabufu baali bahiiri huyihwehula olwohuba eweema endaayi yaali ehiiriŋo.
58009009	Ehyo hiraga hiiti ebirabo nʼeŋongo ebibaŋayo sibiŋanga hugwalaasa bulamu wʼabo ababiŋayo.
58009010	Ebyo byahomanga hu mugulu ebiŋamba hu byʼohulya nʼebyohunywa ko nʼobulombolombo owʼohwegwalaasa, era byali nʼohutamba ohwola hu hiseera ehyʼohugobosa ebiitu obunyaaha.
58009011	Aye Kurisito ni gaaja ngʼomuhulu wʼabasengi, era agima ebiitu ebiraŋi hatyane ni biriŋo, gatiina mu hifo ehihirira erala obulaŋi mwigulu ehi baatu batatongola era ehitali hya hu hyalo huno.
58009012	Yesu ni gengira mu Hifo Ehihira Owabufu sigengirayo nʼamafugi gʼembusi oba agʼeŋombe ohugaŋayo ngʼeŋongo aye omulundi mulala gaahena era gaaŋayo mafugi gage omwene gatununula emirembe nʼemirembe.
58009013	Mu magambi aga baŋa Musa, abaatu abaaholanga ebibi, baŋambanga amafugi gʼembusi nʼagebunwa yʼeŋombe bagatabula nʼegohe lyʼesodi eyi boohyanga yaguhuuliha, nga babaŋanyaho. Ehyo hyabagwalaasanga hu mugulu hwoŋene.
58009014	Aye mu ndagaano epyaha, amafugi ga Kurisito gagwalaasa emyoyo jeefe ehihena ohuŋwa mu bikolwa ebitwosa hu hufa ko huŋange ohuŋeeresa Hatonda omulamu mu kola eyolereeye. Ale ŋahani amafugi ga Kurisito abulaho ebibi mu moni ja Hatonda sigalihola bugali ohwoga emyoyo jʼefe ko huŋange ohuŋeeresa Hatonda Omwene Bulamu?
58009015	Olwʼehyo, mu ndagaano epyaha, Kurisito njʼafaaŋania abaatu ni Hatonda ko abo aba galanga baŋange ohusuna ekabi ejigasuubisa. Ehyo hibaaŋo olwohuba gafa ganunula abaatu mu bibi ebi baahola ni bahiiri ŋaasi wʼendagaano endaayi.
58009016	Ŋaahani ngʼehyʼohuboneraho, ehiraamo hiba nʼamahulu owʼahihola nʼahenire ohufa.
58009017	Owahihola anaba nʼahiiri mulamu sihitamba aye ahena hufa ko hyatamba.
58009018	Nʼendagaano endaayi siyatambanga ni ŋaŋuma mafugi gʼehyayo ehi baŋongire.
58009019	Musa ni gahena ohusomera abaatu amagambi gosigosi, gaŋamba amafugi gʼeŋombe ebunwa nʼembusi eperepere ŋalala nʼamaaji nʼamooya gʼetaama enando nʼahasaala ahabalanga baati, “Hayisopu,” abitabula aŋwanyusa hu mufumbo gwʼehitabo hyʼamagambi nʼohu baatu bosibosi,
58009020	ngʼahena aloma ati, “Gano njʼamafugi aganywania endagaano eyi Hatonda abalagiiye ohwoheresa.”
58009021	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, Musa gaŋwanyusa amafugi hu weema nʼohu biitu byosibyosi ebi batambisanga mu hujumirya Hatonda.
58009022	Mu butuufu, amagambi galagira huupi hiisi hiitu bahigwalaase nʼamafugi era aŋaŋuma amafugi, siŋaba husoniŋa bibi.
58009023	Ebiitu ebyo ebifaana hyʼebyomwigulu bali nʼohubigwalaasa nʼeŋongo. Aye ebyomwigulu nibyo byetaaga eŋongo eyihira obulaŋi.
58009024	Aye Kurisito sigengira mu Hifo Ehihira Owabufu ehi baatu bahola ehifaana bufaane hyʼehyene nʼehyene aye gatiina mwigulu mu moni ja Hatonda eyi ali hatyane hu lwefe.
58009025	Sigagobojolanamo hwingira mwigulu ohweŋayo ngʼolu omuhulu wʼabasengi gengiranga mu Hifo Ehihira Owabufu hiisi mwaha ohuŋaayo amafugi agatali gage.
58009026	Hiba ni hyali hiityo, hani Kurisito gabonaabona efunda nʼefunda ohuŋwera erala hu hutonda hwʼehyalo. Aye gabonaabona omulundi mulala gaahena, mu emirembe jino ejisembayo ko atuhiseŋo erala ehibi olwʼohweŋayo omwene ngʼeŋongo.
58009027	Ngʼolu hiisi muutu ali nʼohufa omulundi omulala oluvanyuma bamusalire omusango,
58009028	mu ngeri njʼenyene ni Kurisito yeesi geeŋayo omulundi mulala olwʼebibi byʼabaatu oluhulende. Era aligobola omulundi ogwohubiri, sihugobolamo hwetwiha ehibi aye ohunoŋola abo abamuhuumiriye.
58010001	Amagambi aga Hatonda gaŋa Musa nigo hisisigo busisigo ehyʼebiraŋi ebiija aye sinje byene nʼebyene. Eŋongo eji bagobojolamo ohuŋa hiisi mwaha jiŋanga ohugwalaahisa erala omuutu ajiŋayo? Bbe.
58010002	Eŋongo ejo jibanga ni jaali ni jiŋanga ohufuula abaatu ohuba abagwalaafu, hani balehera aŋo ohujiŋayo. Hani abo abaŋonga bahababalire bagwalaafu omulundi mulala baahena era bahali sibahiiri nʼehibi.
58010003	Aye eŋongo ejo hiisi mwaha jihola gwa hubahebulisa jiiti bahiiri nʼebibi.
58010004	Hino kiroma olwohuba amafugi gʼebunwa yʼeŋombe ko nʼagembusi sigaŋanga hutusaŋo ebibi.
58010005	Olwʼehyo, Kurisito ni gaaja mu hyalo gaaloma Hatonda ati, “Siwendire birabo nʼeŋongo, aye omubiri ogu wapaaye.
58010006	Ebyayo ebi boohya ni biri bihwiye, ninebyo ebi baŋayo olwʼebibi, siwabisiima.
58010007	Cʼehyagira nʼaloma ti, ‘O Hatonda, nijire ohuhola ebi osiima, ngʼolu bapandiihaho mu Byaŋandiihiwa.’ ”
58010008	Ehidaayi galoma ati, “Siwendire birabo nʼeŋongo ko nʼebyayo ebi boohya olwʼebibi.” Hino gahiroma wayire ngʼamagambi gaali galagira ohuŋangayo eŋongo.
58010009	Nga nindi aloma ati, “Nijire ohuhola ebi osiima.” Olwʼehyo atusaaŋo ekola endaayi eyʼohuŋonga ko agumye eyohubiri eyʼohugwalaasa abaatu nʼamafugi gage omwene.
58010010	Era batubala ohuba bagwalaafu olwohuba Yesu Kurisito olu geeŋayo ngʼendiŋi omulundi mulala gaahena, gaahola ehi Hatonda asiima.
58010011	Mu ndagaano endaayi, abasengi baŋangayo eŋongo hiisi ludaalo aye sijatusangaŋo bibi byawe.
58010012	Aye Kurisito ni geeŋayo omulundi mulala ngʼendiŋi olwʼebibi byʼabaatu, gahena geehala hu lubega olwʼomuhono omulungi ogwa Hatonda.
58010013	Ŋaahani ahumiriiye ohwola olu Hatonda alifuula abalabe babe ekookolo ohu ata amagulu gage.
58010014	Olwʼohweŋayo omwene ngʼendiŋi omulundi mulala, galeetera abaatu ohubabala ohuba abagwalaafu emirembe nʼemirembe.
58010015	Era Omwoyo Omutukuvu atuhahasa ati ehyo hituufu. Geheerera galoma ati,
58010016	“Hatonda Musengwa aloma ati, ‘Yino njʼendagaano eyi ndihola ni nabo, mu ndaalo ejʼoluvanyuma. Ndiŋandiiha amagambi gange hu myoyo jaawe.’ ”
58010017	Ngʼameedaho ati, “Sindihebulira ebibi nʼobujeemu waawe.”
58010018	Ŋaahani, naaba nʼasoniŋire abaatu ebibi byawe, hiba hiŋuma mahulu ohweyongera ohuŋayo eŋongo.
58010019	Olwʼehyo aboluganda, huŋanga ohwingira mu Hifo Ehihira Owabufu mwigulu ni huŋuma hutya olwʼamafugi ga Yesu.
58010020	Gatwiguliraŋo engira epyaha eyija ewa Hatonda era eyireeta obulamu nʼabita mu lutimbe, ko njʼomubiri gugwe, olu gaafa.
58010021	Era ngʼolu huli nʼOmuhulu wʼAbasengi aŋuga enyumba ya Hatonda,
58010022	ale hutiine eyiri Hatonda ni hufugiirira nʼomwoyo mulala olwohuba gagwalaasa emyoyo nʼemibiri jeefe najoogaho nʼamaaji amagwalaafu.
58010023	Ale mugende hugumye esuubi eri huli ni nalyo, hutalidaanya olwohuba Hatonda omwene husuubisa, mwesigwa.
58010024	Huŋengayo omwoyo hiisi muutu ohuhubbirisanga owahye, ohuhola ebiraŋi nʼohwendana.
58010025	Hutegania huhumbaananga ŋalala ngʼolu abandi bahola. Aye hiisi muutu agobose mu wahye amaani ohuhirira erala ngʼolu ohugobola hwa Musengwa hunaatere ohwola.
58010026	Eŋumayo eŋongo eyindi oyʼohutusaŋo ebibi byefe, hunabbenga mu hugenderera ni huhenire ohutegeera amazima agaŋamba hu Yesu.
58010027	Wabula ehiba ni hisigaaye huhuumirira Hatonda ohutusalira omusango nʼohutudanya mu muliro oguja ohwohya abalabe babe.
58010028	Omuutu owajeemeranga amagambi ga Musa, bamwitanga nʼeŋuma husaasira kasita ŋabangaŋo abajulizi babiri oba badatu ohumulumiirisa.
58010029	Olwo ŋaahani omuutu abisya emoni mu hufa hwʼOmwana wa Hatonda owatugwalaasa nʼamafugi gage, oba gaajerega Omwoyo amuŋambira ehisasabirisi saalisuna hibonerezo ehisingayo obuhambwe?
58010030	Humanyire oyo owaloma ati, “Ohwegalula hwange. Ndibasasula.” Era ati, “Musengwa alisalira abaatu babe omusango.”
58010031	Nga hiŋambya olusisimo ohugwa mu ngalo ya Hatonda Omulamu!
58010032	Muhebulire ebiseera ebyahale ebi mwasuniramo enjase ya Maŋuliro Amalaŋi aga Yesu, ngʼolu mwehaliiriha ohubonaabona ohwʼamaani olwʼohumufugiirira.
58010033	Emirundi ejindi babaduhanga era babahiyaania mu lubona era mwali nʼohulumirwa abo abaali mu hubonaabona hyenywe.
58010034	Mwalumirwa abasibe era mwehaliiriha nʼesangaalo olu abatafugiirira Kurisito babanyagaho ebyenywe, olwohuba mwali mumanyire muuti muli nʼebihira obulaŋi ebyʼemirembe nʼemirembe.
58010035	Olwʼehyo, mutaŋwamo maani olwohuba muja husuna omuhemba mubbala.
58010036	Muteehwa ohwehaliriha muhole ebi Hatonda genda ko musune ebi gasuubisa.
58010037	Esigaaye ahateŋama hadiidiri heene, “Oyo owuuja, gaaje era saanahalwe.
58010038	Aye oyo ahola ebiruŋamu alibaŋo mulamu olwʼohufugiirira huhwe. Era singa gaagama egongo, sindimusaasira.”
58010039	Efe si huli mu abo abagama egongo ohusihiiriha aye huli mu abo abafugiirira banoŋoha.
58011001	Ohufugiirira njʼohuba nʼobuhahafu huuti ebi Hatonda gasuubira hulibisuna era njʼohutabuusabuusa mubi hutabonaho.
58011002	Hino njʼehyaŋwaho Hatonda ohusiima abaatu abaahale.
58011003	Olwohuba nʼohufugiirira, humanyire huuti Hatonda gatonda ehyalo nʼatambisa amaani agʼehibono hihye. Era huuti ebiitu ebi hubonaho byaŋwa mu ebyo ebitaboneha.
58011004	Olwohuba Abbiri gaali nʼohufugiirira, gaŋayo eŋongo eyi Hatonda gasiima ohuhira eya Kayini. Era Hatonda ni gasiima eŋongo ya Abbiri hyahahasa ngʼolu Abbiri gaali mugwalaafu. Era wayire gaafa, olwʼohufugiirira huhwe ehigahola hyʼeromaho ehyene.
58011005	Olwohuba Enoka gaali nʼohufugiirira, Hatonda gamuŋira mwigulu nʼali mulamu era eŋuma owagobolayo ohumuhubbaho emoni. Aye ni baali ni bahiiri hu muŋira, hyahahasiwa hiiti gasangaasanga Hatonda.
58011006	Omuutu aŋuma hufugiirira, saaŋanga husangaasa Hatonda, olwohuba hiisi atiina eyi ali, ateehwa ohuba nʼafugiirira ati Hatonda aliŋo era ti aŋa abamwendula nʼobuhenerefu omuhemba.
58011007	Olwohuba Nuwa gaali nʼohufugiirira, Hatonda ni gamulabula hu byali ni bija hubaŋo aye ebi gaali nʼatabona geehirisa ebi Hatonda gamuloma ngʼabbota eryato. Ehyo hyaŋonia amago gage ohusiihiriha olwʼamataba. Mu ngeri eyo, Nuwa gaalaga abatafugiirira, ati Hatonda aja hubasalira omusango. Olwʼohufugiirira huhwe, Hatonda gamubala ohuba omugwalaafu.
58011008	Olwohuba Yibbulayimu gaali nʼohufugiirira, Hatonda ni gamuloma ati aŋwe mu hyalo hyʼewaawe atiine mu hyalo ehi gaali nʼaja humuŋa ohuba obusika buwe, Yibbulayimu gaganya gaŋamba engira gatiina wayire sigaali nʼamanyire nʼeyi gaali nʼaja.
58011009	Olwʼohufugiirira ebya Hatonda, Yibbulayimu gaali hyʼomulugendwa mu hyalo ehi bamusuubisa gaamenyanga mu weema. Yisaka ko ni Yakobbo boosi baamenyanga mu weema era boosi Hatonda gabasuubisa ehiitu cʼehyene.
58011010	Yibbulayimu gaahola ehyo olwohuba gaali ahumiriiye ohuba mu hibuga ehyʼemirembe nʼemirembe ehi Hatonda omwene gaatongola.
58011011	Olwohuba Yibbulayimu gaali nʼohufugiirira, gafuuha musaaye wayire nga gali asahuluŋire, ni Saala omuhasi wuwe nʼali mugumba. Yibbulayimu gafugiirira ati Hatonda owamusuubisa mwesigwa.
58011012	Olwʼehyo, wayire Yibbulayimu gaali asahuluŋire natasobola husaala, gasaala era gaŋwamo olwebe lwʼabejuhulu abaali abangi hyʼemunyeenye hwigulu, nʼomujehe hwigenya lyʼenyanja.
58011013	Abaatu abo bosibosi bafa ni bahifugiirira baati baja husuna ebi Hatonda gasuubisa. Sibabisuna aye babirengera bulengere babisangaalira ni bamanyire baati bageni bugeni mu hyalo muno.
58011014	Abo abamanyire baati bageni mu hyalo muno, basiiba bendula obwihasi mu gwanga eryawe eryene nʼeryene.
58011015	Era baba ni baali ni baŋemba ehyalo ehi baŋwamo, hani bagamayo.
58011016	Aye baŋemba humenya mu hifo ehihira obulaŋi. Cʼehyagira sihiŋambya Hatonda esoni ohuba Hatonda waawe olwohuba gabategehera ehibuga bamenyemo.
58011017	Olwohuba Yibbulayimu gaali nʼohufugiirira, Hatonda ni gamuhema gaganya ohuŋayo Yisaka omusaani omulala wogobbo abe ŋongo ate nga njʼoyu Hatonda gaali namusuubihise
58011018	ati, “Mu Yisaka pomuliŋwa abejuhulu aba nahusuubisa.”
58011019	Yibbulayimu gaali ahimanyire bulaŋi ati Hatonda aŋanga ohulamusa abafu era ehiromerere Hatonda gamugobohesa Yisaka nʼali hyʼalamuhire.
58011020	Olwohuba Yisaka gaali nʼohufugiirira, gasabira Yakobbo nʼEsawu ohusuna ekabi mu bulamu bwawe owomu moni.
58011021	Olwa Yakobbo ohuba nʼohufugiirira, mu busahulu buwe nʼali huupi hufa gasabira abejuhulu, abasaani ba Yosefu ekabi. Gediira hu simbo yiye gajumirya Hatonda.
58011022	Olwohuba Yosefu gaali nʼohufugiirira, ni gaali nʼahiiri hufa gaaloma hu huŋwa hwʼAbayisirayiri e Misiri era gaabaŋa nʼehiragiro ohugega amagumba gage batiine ni nago e Kanaani.
58011023	Olwohuba abasaaye ba Musa baali nʼohufugiirira, ni bahena ohumusaala bamuhweha ohuhena emyesi edatu ni batatya hiragiro hya habaha olwohuba bamubona baati gaali mwana mulaŋi.
58011024	Olwohuba Musa gaali nʼohufugiirira, ni gahula gagaana abaatu ohumulanga baati musaani wʼomuhaana wa Falaawo.
58011025	Gaasalaŋo ohubonaabonera ŋalala nʼabaatu ba Hatonda ohuhira ohuba mu sangaalo eryʼohwejalabya mu ngeri eyʼehibi ohwahaseera buseera.
58011026	Musa gabona ati ohumuduha hulwa Kurisito, hyali hihirira ŋale obuŋinda wʼe Misiri olwohuba gamanya omuhemba ogu gaali nʼaja husuna.
58011027	Olwohuba Musa gaali nʼohufugiirira, gaaŋwa e Misiri nʼaŋuma hutya ehi habaha anamuhole, ebiŋeego nʼabitaaye hu Hatonda oyu hutabona nʼemoni.
58011028	Olwohuba Musa gaali nʼohufugiirira, gataŋo embaga eyi balanga baati Ohubihisya gaaswanyusa amafugi hu miryango jʼAbayisirayiri, ko malayika owahola ogwʼohwita ateeta baana abaseere abadaayi abʼAbayisirayiri.
58011029	Olwohuba Abayisirayiri baali nʼohufugiirira, bambuha Enyanja Enando oti hani babita hu woomu. Aye Abamisiri ni bahigesyaho ohwambuha, enyanja yabalya.
58011030	Olwohuba Abayisirayiri baali nʼohufugiirira, ehiteepe ehyali ni hyeswanigirisa ehibuga Yeriko hyagwa Abayisirayiri ni bagenda bahyetoloola hiisi ludaalo ohuhena endaalo musanvu.
58011031	Olwohuba malaaya oyu balanganga baati Rahabbu gaali nʼohufugiirira, gasangaalira Abayisirayiri abaheeti, gaŋona ohusihiirihira ŋalala nʼabajeemu.
58011032	Meedeho hi nindi hwebyo? Mbula hiseera hyʼohuloma hu Gidyoni nʼohu Bbaraki ni Samusooni nʼohu Yefusa nʼohu habaha Dawudi ni Samwiri ko nʼabanaabbi.
58011033	Olwʼohufugiirira hwawe, abaatu abo baŋangula amawanga, baaŋuga ni batehubbira era basuna ebi Hatonda gabasuubisa. Abandi babadanya mu pungulu jʼepologoma aye sijabalya.
58011034	Era nʼomuliro ogwʼamaani sigwabohya, baaŋona ohubeeta nʼepiima. Wayire baali banafu, bafuuha bʼamaani era abasira mu lutalo, babbinga amaŋe ga mawanga agandi.
58011035	Abahasi basuna abaatu baawe abaali ni bafuuye, baalamuha. Abanamaani baagudya abaatu abandi mbo bahaŋwa hu Hatonda ko babalehule aye baagaana ni babona baati wakiri ohufa hihira ohuba omulamu. Olwohuba baali nʼesuubi eryʼohulamuha basune obulamu obuhiraho obwo obulaŋi.
58011036	Abandi babadulira, babahubba embooko nʼabandi babagudya era babawoŋa mu komera.
58011037	Babahubba amabaale, babasalamo ŋabiri nʼomusumeeno, abandi babeeta nʼepiima. Abandi baali bagadi ni babula ehi beŋambaho era bambalanga byanjo byʼetaama nʼebyembusi, babagudya era bababisya bubi,
58011038	ni beŋogoma mu lulafu nomu sozi nomu pungulu nomu maloŋo. Baali sibasaanira huba mu hyalo hino.
58011039	Hatonda gasiima abaatu abo bosibosi olwʼohufugiirira hwawe. Cooka sibaasuna ebi Hatonda gasuubisa,
58011040	olwohuba gatutegehera efe ni nabo ehiitu ehihira obulaŋi huhisune ni huli ŋalala ni nabo.
58012001	Olwʼehyo, ngʼolu huli nʼabaatu bangi abagenderanga mu hufugiirira Hatonda abatwetolooye ohutwebonera, hweyambule hiisi hiitu ehitusitoŋerera ohuhirira erala ehibi ehitweboŋaho era hudulume nʼohwehaliriha mu mbiro jino.
58012002	Emoni hujite hu Yesu yeŋene olwohuba oyo njʼomwene hutonda ohufugiirira hwʼefe era omwene oyo njʼali nʼengohoba yaahwo. Yesu niye gehaliiriha ohumuŋemula nʼohumugudya hu musalabba olwʼesuubi eri gaali ni nalyo ti alisuna esangaalo nʼabitire mu hufa olwohunoŋola abaatu. Ŋaahani gehaaye mu hifo ehyʼeŋono hu lubega lwʼomuhono omulungi ogwa Hatonda.
58012003	Olwʼehyo, muŋeegenga hu njʼoyo oyu babbengi bagudya ohwaga aŋo ko mutademba era mutaŋwamo maani mu hwesiga Hatonda.
58012004	Mu husoola hwenywe nʼehibi, muhiiri hwola hu hujuha amafugi.
58012005	Mwibiriiye ebibono ebigobosamo amaani ebi Hatonda gabaloma enywe abaana babe? Gaaloma ati, “Mwana wase, hiŋire ngʼehihulu Hatonda Musengwa anahuŋamo endabusi, era otaŋwangamo maani nʼahunenya,
58012006	olwohuba oyo oyu Musengwa genda, amuŋamo endabusi, era alabula hiisi oyu amanyire ngʼomwana wuwe.”
58012007	Mwehalirihenga, Hatonda anabaŋamo endabusi, olwohuba muli baana babe. Ŋaahani mwana hi oyu semwana atalomaho?
58012008	Aye singa Hatonda sabaŋamo ndabusi ngʼolu ahola abaatu babe, muba mufuhire baana abatali bahu lunya.
58012009	Hwesihwesi hwali nʼabaseefe abatuŋangamo endabusi era hwabaŋanga eŋono. Olwʼehyo, huli nʼohugondera bugali weene Seefe oyo owomwigulu ko hube balamu.
58012010	Abaseefe abo batuŋanga endabusi mu haseera hatotono ngʼolu abeene babonanga. Aye Hatonda nʼahihola hitugasa ndiife ko hwahamufaanana.
58012011	Eŋuma ndabusi eyireeta esangaalo mu hamanga ahoyisuniramo ohutusaho ohuhuleetera obusiba. Aye oluvanyuma yireetera abo abayiregireho emiyaaya nʼobulamu obulaŋi.
58012012	Olwʼehyo, mutefeebya ni muleha emihono nʼamagulu ohudotoŋala aye mwefuuŋemo omuuya.
58012013	Mweyongere ohugendanga buluŋamu mu hufugiirira hyahayeeda abandi ohugobolamo amaani.
58012014	Mufubenga ohumenya mu miyaaya nʼabahyenywe era mu bulamu obugwalaafu. Olwohuba aŋaŋuma bugwalaafu, ŋaŋuma alibona Musengwa.
58012015	Mwehuumenga ohutaŋwa mu hisasabirisi hya Hatonda. Era ŋaŋumeŋo kadi mulala hu enywe aba hyʼobutwa galeetera bangi ohufa.
58012016	Mwehuume ŋatabaŋo kadi mulala ahola obuhwedi oba aluluhanira ebyʼehyalo hyʼEsawu owaali omwana omudaayi aye gatunda obusika buwe olwʼehyohulya ehya haseera obuseera.
58012017	Mumanyire muuti ebyo ni biŋooye, gendiire ohusuna ekabi ejʼobusika aye sibajimuŋa olwohuba gaaŋuma ngeri eyʼohucuusa ehi gaali nʼaholire wayire gahyendire nga nʼamasiga po hu ataaye.
58012018	Mu huuja eyiri Hatonda, ndiimuuja hu Lusosi Sinaayi olu muutu aŋanga ohuŋambaho era olwaduha omuliro. Era ndiimuuja yiri hiirema ni hibuyaga,
58012019	nʼohufuga hwʼegwala nʼejanjaasi eryaleetera abaliŋulira ohwegalihira bateyongera huliŋulira. Ebyo byali hu Bayisirayiri,
58012020	olwohuba sibagumira hiragiro ehi Hatonda gabaŋa ati, “Muhubbe omuutu oba esolo yosiyosi eyiija hu lusozi amabaale!”
58012021	Ebyali hu lusozi byali bitiisa, ni Musa goola nʼohuloma ati, “Ndi huteetema huteetema olwʼohutya!”
58012022	Aye enywe muujire hu lusozi Sayuuni, era mu hibuga Yerusaalemu ehyomwigulu, ehibuga hya Hatonda Omulamu, eyi oluhulende lwʼabamalayika bahumbaanira.
58012023	Muujire mu luhumbaano lwʼehibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira Kurisito Omwana omudaayi owa Hatonda era baŋandiiha amasiina genywe mwigulu. Muujire yiri Hatonda aja hulamula abaatu bosibosi era mutiina nʼeyiri emyoyo jʼabaatu abagagwalaasa.
58012024	Muujire yiri Yesu afaaŋania Hatonda nʼabaatu mu ndagaano epyaha era muujire ohubaŋanyaho amafugi agaloma hu husoniŋa, agatali hyʼamafugi gʼAbbiri agasunga ohwegalula.
58012025	Ale ni mwehuume, mutagaana huŋulirisa ebi Hatonda aloma. Olwohuba obanga Abayisirayiri sibaŋunuha Hatonda ohubagudya ni bageene ohuŋulira Musa owaali omuhwenda owohu hyalo, efe huliŋonera ŋeena singa hugaana ohuŋulira oyo alomera mwigulu?
58012026	Hu lula ejanjaasi lya Hatonda hu lusozi Sinaayi lyateetemya ehyalo, ne ŋaahani asuubisa ati, “Sinja hugobolamo huteetemya ehyalo hyoŋene aye nʼegulu.”
58012027	Ohuloma ati, “Sinja hugobolamo,” ehyo hitegeesa hiiti ebitonde ebiteetema anahabituseŋo ko ebi tateetema bisigaleŋo.
58012028	Olwʼehyo, ngʼolu huli husuna obwahabaha obutaŋwaŋo, humweyaasenga era humujumiryenga ni humuŋa nʼeŋono nʼohumutya,
58012029	olwohuba “Hatonda omuliro ogwohya gwaguhuulisa!”
58013001	Mweyongere ohwendana mu Yesu, hyʼabokire hu ebeere erala.
58013002	Musangaalirenga abageni olwohuba musambo eyo eriyo abaatu abasangalira abamalayika ni batamanyire.
58013003	Muhebulirenga ohuyeeda abali mu komera ni muli oti hani mwesi muli basibe hya nibo era muyeedenga abo ababagudya oti hani ndinywe abali mu mbeera eyo.
58013004	Hiisi muutu aŋenga obufumbo eŋono era abasinde nʼabahasi baawe babenga besigwa hiisi muutu eri owahye olwohuba Hatonda aja husalira abahwedi nʼabemoni enyangu, omusango.
58013005	Mutabanga nʼoguhopo gwʼebbeesa era ebi muli ni nabyo bibahenenga olwohuba Hatonda galoma ati, “Sindihuleha era sindihwesamba.”
58013006	Cʼehigira ni huloma ni huŋuma hwemoota huuti, “Musengwa njʼowunjeeda, sinatyenga. Omuutu obuutu aŋanga hukola hi?”
58013007	Muhebulirenga abatangirisi benywe ababasomesa ehibono hya Hatonda. Muhebulire ebi babitamo mu hufugiirira hwawe, babenga ehyʼohuboneraho eyi muli.
58013008	Hino kiroma olwohuba Yesu Kurisito, aba njʼehyene, olwejo nʼolwa leero nʼejo obunahahye, emirembe nʼemirembe.
58013009	Mutaŋabiranga hu somesa eyiŋumamo mahulu. Hiraŋi ehisasabirisi hya Hatonda hyaba njʼehigumya emyoyo jeefe sosi obulombolombo obuŋamba hu byʼohulya ebibula mahulu eri abo ababirya.
58013010	Efe huli nʼehituuti ohu abo abaŋeeresa mu kola ekayire eyʼEhiyudaaya batasaana huliiraho.
58013011	Omuhulu wʼabasengi ba Hatonda gengiranga mu Ehifo Ehihira Owabufu nʼamafugi gʼehyayo ehi baŋangayo ngʼeŋongo olwʼebibi byʼabaatu aye enyama yʼehyayo ehyo nga bayohyera ebulafu wʼehigo omu baatu bamenyanga.
58013012	Yesu yeesi cʼehyagira gafiira ebulafu wʼehibuga Yerusaalemu ko agwalaase abaatu olwʼamafugi gage.
58013013	Olwʼehyo, hutiine eyi ali ebulafu wʼehigo huswalire ŋalala ni naye.
58013014	Hino kiroma olwohuba ehibuga hyefe sihya hu hyalo huno aye husuubira ehibuga ehyene nʼehye ehiriija, omu hulimenya emirembe nʼemirembe.
58013015	Olwʼehyo hweŋengayo ngʼeŋongo ni hujumirya Hatonda hiisi hiseera ni hubita mu Yesu, era habuhyabuhya hwatulenga esiina lirye nʼeminwa jeefe.
58013016	Mutebiriranga ohuhola ebiraŋi ni muyeeda abahyenywe mu bigosi. Eyo njʼeŋongo eyisangaasa Hatonda.
58013017	Muŋulirenga abatangirisi benywe mu byʼomwoyo, olwohuba njʼababalabirira era Hatonda alibabuusa banyonyole engeri eyi boherehiisemo obuvunanyiziwa obwo. Munabagondera, bahola omulimo gwawe nʼesangaalo ko emirimo jaawe nasijibabera mugugu olwohuba ehyo enywe sihibagasa.
58013018	Mutusabirengaho olwohuba hwehahasa huuti huli nʼomwoyo omulaŋi era ogwegomba ohuhola ebiraŋi hiisi hiseera.
58013019	Mbasunga nʼomwoyo omulala, musabire bahamboŋolola mu hiseera ehitali hya ŋale, niije.
58013020	Hatonda aleeta emiyaaya era owalamusa Musengwa yeefe Yesu Omwayi Omuhulu owʼetaama era owanywanywasa endagaano eyʼemirembe nʼemirembe olwʼamafugi gage,
58013021	abaŋe hiisi hiitu ehiraŋi ko musobole ohuhola ebi genda ni mubita mu Yesu Kurisito oyu baatu bali nʼohuŋa eŋono emirembe nʼemirembe. Amiina.
58013022	Aboluganda, muŋulirise ebi mbalomera olwohuba ebbaluŋa yino eyi mbaŋandiihiye ni mbagobosamo amaani nyiipi.
58013023	Nenda mumanye muuti mulebe yeefe Temuseewo bamulehula ohuŋwa mu komera. Era singa gaaja, mangu nahaaje ni naye eyo ohubahyalira.
58013024	Muheese abatangirisi benywe bosibosi ko nʼabaatu ba Hatonda bosibosi. Abomu Yitale babahehiise.
58013025	Hatonda abaŋambire ehisasabirisi mwesimwesi.
59001001	Kojeeyo, aboluganda. Ndiise Yakobbo omuŋeeresa wa Hatonda era owa Musengwa Yesu Kurisito. Mbaŋandiira enywe abaatu abasimuha mu biha ehumi nabibiri ebyʼabaatu ba Hatonda abasalanihira mu hyalo hyosihyosi, bafuuha babuli ŋano ni ŋala.
59001002	Aboluganda, hiisi olu ebiŋeeriŋeri nʼohuhemewa ohwa hiisi ngeri binabagwirenga, muhibalenga ngʼehiitu ehireeta amasaŋalyo,
59001003	ni mumanyire muuti ohuhemewa hyʼohwo hubatengesya ne hwabongera obugumu.
59001004	Era mweyongere ohuba abagumu ohwolera erala olu mulifuuha abaatu abolereeye abaŋuma ehiŋanga ohubahubbiraŋo.
59001005	Hanye ŋaliŋo mu nywe aŋuma amagesi nʼohutegeera engeri eyʼohuba omugumu mu hufugiirira, alombe Hatonda agabira abaatu bosibosi nʼatabalilira amuŋe amagesi ago.
59001006	Aye nʼaba nʼamusunga, alombe nʼaŋumamo ehi gemoota mu mwoyo gugwe. Olwohuba omuutu abaamo ahʼohwemoota, aba hyʼehiyungi hu maaji ehi embeŋo ehubba yaaŋira eno nineera. Yeesi awaakawaaka mu mwoyo gugwe ndagumira hu hiitu hirala.
59001007	Omuutu hyʼoyo ataŋeeganga ati aŋanga ohusuna ehi asungire ohuŋwa eyiri Musengwa,
59001008	olwohuba omuutu owʼemyoyo ebiri, saagumira hu hiitu hirala.
59001009	Afugiirira Kurisito oyu bahye babisyamo emoni olwohuba mugadi, gesiimenga mu mwoyo olwʼehyo. Olwohuba wayire abahye bamutala, aye ali nʼeŋono mu moni ja Hatonda era anahamudunde gamuta aŋalaŋi.
59001010	Olwo nʼomuŋinda yeesi geesiime olwohuba ti niye Hatonda alimwisa edaala? Omuŋinda niye ali hyʼehimuli ehiŋotoha hyakukumuha esaawa yosiyosi.
59001011	Olwohuba eryuba ni liŋanga obubalire bwohya ehirime, ehimuli ehibaho nga hiŋotoha higwa nʼobuŋoono waahyo nga bugota. Mu ngeri njʼenyene abaŋinda boosi baatyo pobatiina. Ohufa huboolaho ni batahyetegeheeye, ni befumbire hu gwʼohwendula buŋinda owohu hyalo huno.
59001012	Omuutu agumiikiriza ohwola olu alibita mu huhemewa gesiimire, olwohuba nʼalihena ohugumikiriza, alisuna ehirabo ehyʼobulamu obutaŋwaŋo, obu Hatonda gasuubisa abamwenda.
