59001013	Omuutu nʼagwiranga ebiŋeeriŋeri, atalomanga ati Hatonda njʼamuŋindihiiye ebiŋeeriŋeri olwʼohwenda ohumuhema. Olwohuba Hatonda saaŋanga huhema omuutu yesiyesi era ŋabula aŋanga ohumudulinga oba gamuhema gaahola ehibi.
59001014	Ohutusaho ti hiisi muutu hu buwe amanyire nʼohwegomba huhwe omwene mbebimusindigirisa gaahola ebitoola.
59001015	Amayiru nʼohwegomba ebi muutu aba ni nabyo bitiina ni bisaala ni byala nga biŋwamo ehibi era ehibi ehyo ni hiŋangala, nga himuleetera ohufa.
59001016	Olwʼehyo balebe bange abahoda, batabadulinganga.
59001017	Hiisi hirabo ehiraŋi, era ehibulaho mbalo, hiŋwa mwigulu. Hiiha ni hiŋwa ewa Hatonda omwene hutonda ebi hubona ni byaduhira mwigulu, oyo atacuuhacuuha hyʼehisisigo.
59001018	Omwene gasalaŋo hu lulwe, atusaale mu bulamu obunyaaha nʼabita mu buhwenda obwʼehibono hihye ehituufu, ko hibe ti huŋira ehifo ehidaayi mu bitonde bibye.
59001019	Olwʼehyo balebe bange abahoda, hiisi muutu abenga mwangu ohuŋulira, aye atabugutananga huloma, era atanguŋirisanga husunguŋala.
59001020	Olwohuba omuutu anaba nʼasunguŋaaye, saaŋanga huhola ebi Hatonda genda.
59001021	Olwʼehyo, muleheŋo esambo josijosi ejʼohwehenamo, nʼomwoyo ogwʼegomba ohuhola ebibi ogubitiriiye mu baatu hatyane. Muganye mufugiirire ehibono hya Hatonda ehi baababuulira olwohuba hiri nʼamaani agʼohunoŋola obulamu wenywe.
59001022	Ehibono ehyo mutahomanga hu huhiŋuliirisa buŋuliirise mwagama aŋo olwohuba aŋo muba mwedulinga wedulinge. Aye muholenga ebi hibono hibaloma ohuhola.
59001023	Olwohuba omuutu anahoma hu huŋulira buŋulire, aba ali hyʼomuutu agebona mu ndabirwamu.
59001024	Omuutu oyo aheja mu ndabirwamu gebona olu afaana aye aŋo ni naŋo nʼaŋwaŋo nga gebirira ngʼolu afaana.
59001025	Aye omuutu owetegeeresa amagambi ga Hatonda agatufuula ohuba abʼedembe, ndaahoma hu huŋulira buŋulire gebirira ebi aŋuliiye, aye gegumya ohuhola ebi gamuloma, Hatonda anamuŋenga ekabi mubi ahola.
59001026	Hiisi muutu oweranga ohuba omunadiini, cooka nʼataŋanga huŋuga lulimi lulwe, oyo aba gedulinga hwedulinga, obunadiini buwe buba ŋabula ehi bumugasa.
59001027	Obunadiini obutuufu era obuŋumaho hamogo mu moni ja Hatonda Seefe, njʼohuba nʼomwoyo ogwʼohubbiita abafuubbi nʼohuyeeda abanamwandu mu bugadi bwawe, nʼohwehumanga ndigeyonoona nʼebibi ebi abaatu abandi bahola.
59002001	Aboluganda, enywe ngʼabafugiirira oweŋono Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito, mutabanga nʼoluboole.
59002002	Niipa ngʼehyohuboneraho, singa mubaaye mu luhumbaano lwenywe ŋaabaŋo omuutu owuuja gengira aŋa muhumbaniiye ni gambaaye engoye ejʼebbeeyi, nʼepeta eya zaabbu, nga nʼomugadi awambaaye atyo atyo yeesi gaaja gengira,
59002003	munasangaalira owambaaye engoye ejʼebbeeyi mwamuŋa aŋa ohwihala aŋalaŋi, mwamuloma muuti, “Muhulu, ewe yihala ŋano.” Aye mwaloma omugadi muuti, “Ewe hola ni wemereraho aŋo,” oba muuti, “Yiihala ŋaasi aŋo.”
59002004	Munahola muutyo muba simuleetire oluboole ŋagati wenywe era ni muloma muuti abaatu abandi bamugaso ohuhiraho abahyawe?
59002005	Aboluganda ale ni mwetege mbalomere. Abaatu aba mutala olwohuba bagadi, Hatonda niye mbabagatobola ohuba baŋinda mu humufugiirira era gaabaŋa omugabo mu wahabaha buwe ogu gasuubisa abamwenda.
59002006	Aye enywe abanyooma abagadi, leha nindi mbabuuse. Abaŋinda sinje ababayikiriza hu byenywe? Abeene abo sinje abaŋuuna ohubadyedyesa ni babahubba mu mbuga?
59002007	Era abeene abo sinje abaduula oyo oyu mwafugiirira nga Musengwa yenywe olu mwafugiirira?
59002008	Ale hanye mwoheresa egambi eri Kurisito gaatuŋa ngʼolu liroma mu byaŋandiihiwa eri galoma ati, “Yendanga omuutu wahyo ngʼolu weyenda wamwene,” muba muhola bulaŋi.
59002009	Aye munaba baluboole, muba muhola hibi, era muba mufuuhire babbwagi bʼamagambi era ni guhenire ohubahira.
59002010	Olwohuba hiisi muutu aŋamba amagambi gosigosi cooka goola aŋaatu gabbwagaho erala, aba nʼomusango oguŋeraŋerana nʼogwa ohubbwaga amagambi gosigosi.
59002011	Hino kiroma olwohuba owaloma ati, “Sooholanga buhwedi,” omwene oyo njʼowahena gaaloma ati, “Siwitanga muutu wahyo.” Kale oŋangire ohuba ti soohola buhwedi aye wiita abaatu bahyo, aŋo oba oli mubbwagi wʼamagambi.
59002012	Olwʼehyo mulomenga era muholenga ebi muhola ni mumanyire muuti Hatonda alibasalira omusango ni geema hu magambi gage agatufuula abʼedembe.
59002013	Olwohuba hiisi muutu abula husaasira eri owahye ni Hatonda yeesi alimusalira omusango nʼabula husaasira, aye aliba nʼohusaasira eyiri oyo asaasira abahye.
59002014	Aboluganda, singa omuutu aloma ati afugiirira Kurisito, aye nʼatahola bikolwa ebiraga ohufugiirira huhwe, ehyo hiri nʼehi hiŋanga ohumuyeeda? Dala ohufugiirira hyʼohwo huŋanga ohumunoŋola?
59002015	Ha hulome singa ŋabaŋo oboluganda omusinde oba omuhasi aŋuma ehi gedanya hu mubiri nʼehi anabisye enamunwa,
59002016	mulala hu nywe gamuloma ati, “Owoluganda, tiina werabirire; onahasune ehyʼohulya nʼehyohuwiiha amagumba” cooka ndabaho nʼehi amuŋaaye, ehyo hiba nʼehi hiyeeda omuutu oyo ali obubi?
59002017	Kale nʼohufugiirira hwosi huutyo. Singa huba hwoŋene ni huŋumaho bikolwa ebihuŋereheraho, huba hubula mahulu.
59002018	Aye hamunga ola aŋanga ohuloma ati, “Ewe yebeere aŋo nʼohufugiirira huhwo, ese naabe nʼebikolwa.” Ese keesi ndoma ti ale ndage omuutu aŋanga ohufugiirira Kurisito aye nʼaŋuma bikolwa.
59002019	Hituufu hyene ti ofugiirira oti Hatonda ali mulala. Ehyo hiraŋi. Aye hebulira oti nʼemisambwa joosi jiityo pojifugiirira era ehyo hijireetera ohukaakana olwʼobuuti.
59002020	Musirusiru ewe, wahendire kuŋe ehiraga ti ohufugiirira ohuhayaga ohuŋumaho bikolwa ebiraga, huŋuma mahulu?
59002021	Hiina ehi Hatonda gemaho ko asiime sehulu yeefe Yibbulayimu? Sigeema hu hikolwa hihye ehyʼohuŋwa hu mwana wuwe Yisaka abe eŋongo eri Hatonda?
59002022	Oweene otye? Ohufugiirira huhwe nʼebikolwa bibye byatiinira ŋalala, era ebikolwa bibye njʼebyejulirisa ohufugiirira huhwe.
59002023	Ngʼehyaŋandiihiwa hyolerera ehiroma hiiti, “Hatonda gabala Yibbulayimu ohuba mugwalaafu olwʼohufugiirira ebi gamuloma era olwʼohufugiirira huhwe, gafuuha meeriiwe.”
59002024	Peega ti muweene muuti ebikolwa ebi muutu ahola njʼebimuleetera ohumubala ohuba omugwalaafu sosi hufugiirira hyoŋene.
59002025	Mu ngeri njʼenyene pohyali ni Rahabbu omuhasi owaali omuhwedi. Hatonda gamubala ohuba omugwalaafu olwʼehikolwa hihye ehyʼohusangaalira nʼohuhweha mu nyumba yiye abaatu abaali ni batiinire ohuheetera Abayisirayiri. Abaatu bano gahena gabayeeda ohweyiba nʼohuduluma ni babitira mu ngira eyindi.
59002026	Mu butuufu ngʼolu muhimanyire muuti omubiri gunaŋumamo mwoyo guba mufu, nʼohufugiirira hwosi huutyo. Ni hutabaho ebikolwa, huba hufu.
59003001	Aboluganda, mutagesyaho mwesimwesi ohufuuha abasomesa bʼehibono hya Hatonda, olwohuba ngʼolu mumanyire, efe abasomesa abahyefe, Hatonda nʼaliba nʼatulamula, saalituleheramo kadi nʼaŋatotono.
59003002	Abaatu hwesihwesi aŋabula hwabulira, hubbenga mu hino oba hira. Cooka ŋanabaŋo omuutu atabbenga mu malomere, oyo aba aŋangaaye mu hufugiirira huhwe, era nʼaŋanga ohufuga omubiri gugwe gwosigwosi.
59003003	Singa omuutu abaaye gendire esolo eyi balanga baati embalaasi emugondere nʼecuuhira hiisi eyi aba ni gendire, ayita ehyoma mu munwa ohumuyeeda ohuhola ehyo.
59003004	Leha nindi huŋeege hu meeri ngʼehyohuboneraho ehindi. Wayire emeeri guutu gubbala era embeŋo eyʼamaani njʼeŋanga ohugugeesya, omuutu ayigimba atambisa ahaatu hatotono heene enyuma waayo ohuyicuusa ohutiina hiisi eyi aba ni genda yitiine.
59003005	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, nʼolulimi lwʼomuutu lwosi luutyo. Wayire olulimi hamesu hadyagala hu mubiri gwʼomuutu, omuutu alutambisa ohwepaaha mu biitu ebyene ebingi. Ŋeega hu deŋo hasiigu eryahula lyasidiha ngʼolu ahaliro ahatotono haliŋambya lyanya lyaguhuliha.
59003006	Kale nʼolulimi lwosi luli hyʼomuliro. Lwijuuye obubi obwehyalo hyosihyosi era njʼehimesu obumesu ehyʼomubiri gwʼomuutu, aye lusaala ehibi ehimaamira obulamu bwʼomuutu bwosibwosi. Ebibono ebi lulimi luloma bisaala obuyoga mu baatu obuli hyʼomuliro ogwehereba ni gutasima ogusihiirisa hiisi hiitu aŋa gubita.
59003007	Olwohuba ohwemera erala hu hutonda hwʼehyalo, omuutu ali nʼobuŋangi ohuŋuga ebiha byosibyosi ebyʼesolo nʼenyuni, nʼebyeŋalula, nʼebiramu ebyomu maaji.
59003008	Aye ŋaŋuma muutu hu buwe aŋanga ohuŋuga olulimi. Olulimi njʼehiitu ehigosi, ehitafugiha ehiŋanga ohuleeta amafa mu abaatu hyʼobusagwa bwʼetemu.
59003009	Olulimi olwene olu muutu atambisa ohujumirya Musengwa era Seefe, nindi olwene olwo njʼolu atambisa mu huŋwaba abaatu aba Hatonda gabumba mu hifaananyi hihye.
59003010	Mu munwa njʼomwene, pomuŋwa ebibono ebijumirya nʼebiŋwaba. Aboluganda, ehyo sihisaana huba hiityo.
59003011	Esulo yʼamaaji endala sesobola huŋwamo amaaji amalaŋi nʼamaaji agalimo ehiŋomeresi ehya cumbi.
59003012	Aboluganda, dala omusaala omutiini guŋanga ohwamaho ebibala ebyʼomusaala omuzayiti, oba omuzabbibbu gwamaho ebibala ebyʼomusaala omutiini? Mu ngeri njʼenyene, esulo ereeta amaaji agʼehiŋomeresi hya cumbi seeŋanga huŋwamo maaji agabulamo hiŋomeresi ehyo.
59003013	Ŋaliŋo mu nywe omuutu ali nʼamagesi agʼohwabula ehiraŋi nʼehibi? Omuutu oyo alage amagesi ago mu sambo endaŋi eyi gebisyamo, nomu bikolwa ebi ahola mu hweŋomeha ohuŋwa mu magesi ago, aga ali ni nago.
59003014	Aye munaba nʼemyoyo ejʼekirihindi nʼohutenda yabahyenywe ohusaala esodi, mutepaaha muuti muli bagesi olwohuba munahihola, muba mwedulinga.
59003015	Amagesi agʼengeri eyo sigaŋwa yiri Hatonda, wabula gaba gʼabaatu abaŋeega hu byʼehyalo. Omwoyo wa Hatonda sinje agaba amagesi hyʼago wabula gaŋwa yiri Sitaani.
59003016	Olwohuba hiisi aŋaba omwoyo ogwʼekirihindi nʼohutenda yawahyo husaala esodi, ŋabaŋo nionionio nʼebibi ebya hiisi ngeri.
59003017	Aye abaatu ababa nʼamagesi agaŋwa eyiri Hatonda, ehidaayi nadaayi baba nʼemyoyo migwalaafu. Ehindi baba baatu abenda emiyaaya ohubaŋo, abehaliiriha era abali nʼohwenda eri abahyawe. Olwʼohwenda ohu baba ni nahwo eri abahyawe, babaholera ebyʼehisa ni batehubbira era ni bali bʼamazima mu bibahola.
59003018	Bahola ehyo olwohuba baholerera emiyaaya jibeŋo era nʼebibono ebi balomera abaatu biŋwamo ebikolwa ebi Hatonda genda.
59004001	Hiina ehireeta obuyoga nʼohuŋiriŋana ŋagati wenywe? Ehyo sihiŋwa hu mwoyo ogwʼomuhopo ogu muli ni nagwo?
59004002	Mululuhanira bugali ebiitu ebi muŋuma aye ndimubyolaho. Ehiŋwamo nga mwita abahyenywe. Oguhopo gubaŋira nʼohubi mutaŋanga husuna, ehiŋwamo buyoga nʼohuŋiriŋana. Era simusuna ebi mwenda olwohuba simusaba Hatonda hubibaŋa.
59004003	Ate nʼolu musaba Hatonda abaŋe ehimwenda, saahibaŋa olwohuba musaba ni mugenderera hweruuha ni mubihenera mu hwesangaasa mwabeene.
59004004	Enywe abali hyʼabafumbo abahwedi, simumanyire muuti onahola omuhago nʼehyalo obawesaalira bulabe eyiri Hatonda? Hiisi muutu asalaŋo ohuhola omuhumba nʼehyalo, afuuha mulabe wa Hatonda.
59004005	Oba muŋeega muuti ehyaŋandiihiwa ehiroma hiiti, “Hatonda abubira Omwoyo oyu gatuŋa ohuba mu bulamu weefe” hibula mahulu?
59004006	Aye Hatonda geyongera hutuŋambira hisasabirisi. Njʼehigira ehyaŋandiihiwa ehindi ni hiroma hiiti, “Hatonda sigenda abehudumbasa, aye aŋambira abo abeŋomeha ehisasabirisi.”
59004007	Olwʼehyo mweŋeeyo eyiri Hatonda. Muŋiriŋanienga Sitaani, yeesi gaaja hubatya abadulumenga.
59004008	Mute obwesige mu Hatonda, yeesi aja hubeeŋa abenga ni nenywe. Mulongoose obulamu bwenywe, enywe abali nʼebibi, enywe abali nʼekubbiro nʼengaluliro.
59004009	Muwomboŋale, muhubbe enduulu, mulire nʼamasiga. Mugawiiheho, enjeho jenywe jifuuhe amaliro, nʼesangaalo lyenywe lifuuhe mombo olwʼebibi ebyo ebi muhola.
59004010	Mweŋomehenga mu moni ja Musengwa, era Ye omwene aja hubadunda abate aŋalaŋi.
59004011	Aboluganda, mutageyananga. Hiisi muutu ageya owahye nʼaloma ati ehi ahola hibi, aba atala amagambi ga Hatonda nʼaloma ati mabi. Onatala amagambi ga Hatonda waloma oti mabi oba sooŋanga huhola ebi galagira wabula oba wepaatiihaho ogwʼobulamuzi.
59004012	Omwene hutaŋo magambi era nga njʼomusali wʼemisango ali mulala, nje Hatonda. Oyo njʼaŋanga ohunoŋola era njʼaŋanga nʼohusihiirisa. Ne ewe weranga ndiiwe ani ko osalire owahyo omusango?
59004013	Ale ŋaahani ni mwetege mbalomere enywe abebuuja muuti, “Olwa leero oba olwʼejo hunahatiine mu hibuga hirebe, huheneyo omwaha mulala ni huhola ebyʼamatano husune amagoba.”
59004014	E! Enywe omutamanyire ngʼolu bunahahye olwʼejo muŋanga ohuloma muutyo? Mumanyire ehi obulamu wenywe buli? Simumanyire muuti enywe muli hyʼehisuusu ehibaho ahamanga hatotono nga hiŋwaŋo?
59004015	Mwahali muloma muuti, “Musengwa nʼanahaganye wahya buhaana, hunahahole hino oba hira.”
59004016	Aye ŋaahani mundoma hyʼeyenywe eyo muba mwepaaha, ni muhiŋira muuti ebiitu biri mu buŋangi wenywe. Ohwepaaha hwosihwosi ohwengeri hyʼeyo huba hubi.
59004017	Olwʼehyo, hiisi muutu amanyire ehiraŋi ehi gahali nʼahola aye ndaahihole, aba aholire hibi.
59005001	Ale ŋaahani abaŋinda ni betege, mbalomere. Bahole batagihireŋo ohubbologa ni berira olwʼehiseera ehigosi ehinahabooleho.
59005002	Obuŋinda bwawe obu babungire bubabulira mahulu, buli hyʼehiitu ehibolire ehiŋunya ehibulu. Ebyambalo byawe ebyʼebbeeyi biri hyʼebi hayenje mulusi aliiye.
59005003	Hu ludaalo olu Hatonda anahasalireho omusango, ebyʼobuŋinda ebyo binahabule mahulu hyʼehyoma ehitalagire ngʼolu hitaba nʼomugaso eri omweneehyo. Ebyʼobuŋinda ebyo ebi behuhuta ni nabyo mbebinahabe obujulizi obulaga ngʼolu baluluhanira obuŋinda era ngʼolu bali bagumu era abatenda huyeeda abahyawe abali mu bugadi. Bahumbanisye era behuhuta nʼebyobuŋinda, ne bamanye baati ekomerero yʼehyalo yiri huupi hwola babasalire omusango.
59005004	Ale nindi ni betege mbalomere! Abatambi abahola mu ndimiro jaawe beririgana olwʼohubakupanya omuhemba gwawe era ohweririgana hwabwe hwolire mu matwi ga Hatonda Musengwa Omwene buŋangi.
59005005	Banyooye obulamu wʼehyalo, era besangaasa ngʼolu babona baati pohyola ohuba. Basangahiise emyoyo jaawe aye bebiriiye baati Hatonda anaatere ohusihiirisa abahosi bʼebibi.
59005006	Baleeteeye abaatu ababulaho musango ohubasalira omusango ohubahira era babetisa obwerere obwene olwohuba sibaŋanga hwesoolaho.
59005007	Ne enywe aboluganda, mube bagumikiriza ohwola olu Musengwa anahagobole ohuŋwa mwigulu. Mubonere hu mulimi ngʼolu ahuumiirira ohwola olu fula endaayi ko nʼerondaho yigwa eroba lyamesa, lyahusa era lyamya ebirime ebi aba nʼahomire mu ndimiro yiye.
59005008	Mwesi muutyo mube bagumikiriza era abagumu, olwohuba Musengwa ali huupi hugobola.
59005009	Aboluganda, muteŋuluŋunyanga hu bahyenywe, olwohuba banahabasalire omusango ohubahira. Ale mubone Yesu omusali wʼemisango omuhulu anaatere ohwola.
59005010	Aboluganda, mubonere hu banaabbi abalomanga mu siina lya Musengwa, ababonaabona aye bagumikiriza.
59005011	Ngʼolu mumanyire, beesimire abo abagumikiriza ohwola hu komerero yʼobulamu bwawe. Mwaŋulira ebyafuuye hu Yobbu omuhalehale ngʼolu gagumikiriza, era mumanyire ehi Musengwa gamuholera oluvanyuma. Mu butuufu Musengwa ali nʼehisasabirisi.
59005012	Aye balebe bange, ehihulu mu byosi, mutamalanga galayira muuti “Mu mazima aga Hatonda ali mwigulu,” oba ehyalo oba mu siina lyʼehiitu hyosihyosi aye mulomenga amazima. Ni mulomanga muuti, “Pohiri,” dala hibenga ni hiri cʼehyo era ehi munagaanenga muuti “Bbe” hyosi hibenga nga cʼehyo. Aŋabula ehyo banahabasalire omusango ohubahira.
59005013	Hanye ŋaliŋo mu nywe ali nʼebigosi, asunge Hatonda amuyeede. Hanye ŋaliŋo asangaaye, gembe enyembo nʼamujumirya.
59005014	Hanye ŋaliŋo omulwaye mu nywe, alange abatangirisi bʼehibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira Kurisito, bamusabire bamuŋahe nʼamafuta, mu siina lya Musengwa.
59005015	Ohusaba ohu bamulombera nʼohufugiirira, hugema Musengwa gesuusa omulwaye oyo; era nʼaba nʼali nʼebibi ebi gaahola, Hatonda abimusoniŋa.
59005016	Olwʼehyo, hiisi muutu abbutulirenga owahye ebibi bibye era hiisi muutu asabirenga owahye ko muŋone mube nʼobulamu. Singa omuutu omuluŋamu asaba, esaala yiye yiba nʼamaani agaleetera ebiitu ebi asungire ohubaŋo.
59005017	Ale mubonere hu naabbi Eriya owaali omuutu hyefe. Ni gasaba nʼomwoyo mulala, efula siyatonya ohuhena emyaha edatu nʼemyesi mukaaga.
59005018	Nindi ni gasaba efula yigwe, Hatonda gatonyesa efula ngʼeroba limesa ebyʼohulya.
59005019	Aboluganda, singa mulala hu nywe aŋaba, gaŋwa hu ngira ya Hatonda etuufu, ne ŋabaŋo mulala hunywe amugobosa,
59005020	muhimanye muuti omuutu yesiyesi aba nʼayeedire omuhosi wʼebibi oyo, ohuŋwa mu hubbenga huhwe, aba aŋonisye omwoyo gwʼomuutu oyo ohufa era aleetera Hatonda ohusoniŋa ebibi ehipyeda ebi omuutu oyo aba ni gahola.
60001001	Ese Peetero omuhwenda wa Yesu Kurisito mbaŋandiihira enywe abaatu ba Hatonda, aba gatobola, abalugendwa mu hyalo hino era abasasaana mu byalo byʼe Pooto, e Galatiya, e Kapadokiya, Asiya nʼe Bbisiniya.
60001002	Ohuŋwa ahale nʼahale Hatonda Seefe mu humanya huhwe gabatobola ohuba babe, nʼabita mu Mwoyo Omutukuvu olu mwagondera Yesu Kurisito gabagwalaasa olwʼamafugi gage. Hatonda geyongere ohubaŋa ehisasabirisi nʼemiyaaya.
60001003	Abaatu beyaase Hatonda era Semwana ya Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito. Olwʼehyere hihye ehingi, gaatunoŋola nʼabita mu hulamuha hwa Yesu Kurisito. Hino hituleetera ohusuubira obulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
60001004	Era mulisuna omugabo ogwo ogutacuuhacuuha era ogutaŋwaŋo emirembe nʼemirembe ogu Hatonda gaababihira mwigulu.
60001005	Olwʼohufugiirira hwenywe, Hatonda abahuuma nʼobuŋangi wuwe ohwola olu alinunula ebiitu byosibyosi hu ludaalo olwʼekomerero.
60001006	Olwʼehyo musaŋalyenga bugali weene wayire muli hugada olwʼebigosi ebingi ebi muli ni nabyo ebyʼehiseera obuseera.
60001007	Ebigosi ebyo biboolaho ohulaga ti ohufugiirira hwenywe hwʼamazima. Ngʼolu basanuusa ezaabbu olwʼohwenda ohutusamo obucaafu, mwesi ohufugiirira hwenywe ohuhiraho ezaabbu omuŋendo huli nʼohugezesewa ko huŋangale. Ebyo ni biŋooye ko musune eŋono era babapaahe hu ludaalo olwʼekomerero olu Yesu aligoboleraho.
60001008	Wayire simumubonangaho, mumwenda era wayire simumubonaho esaawa yino muli nʼesangaalo bitiriifu bugali eritalomeha olwohuba mumufugiirira.
60001009	Ehyo hibaleetera ohunoŋoha era njʼehigendererwa hyʼohufugiirira hwenywe.
60001010	Abanaabbi babalomera ebiŋamba hu hisasabirisi hya Hatonda ehi gaali nʼaja hubaŋambira ohubanoŋola era bendulirisa bugali nʼobwegenderesa.
60001011	Ni bagesyaho ohutegeera embeera nʼebiseera ebi Omwoyo wa Kurisito gaali nʼabalengesa olu galoma hu hubonaabona hwa Kurisito nʼeŋono eribalimuŋa.
60001012	Hatonda galeetera abanaabbi abo ohutegeera baati ebi baali ni balomaho sibyali ni bija hubaŋo mu mulembe gwawe aye mu gwenywe. Ŋaahani abo abababuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi, babuulira mu maani gʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu. Nʼabamalayika boosi begomba ohumanya ebiŋamba hu bunoŋosi buno.
60001013	Olwʼehyo mwetegehe, mumanye ehiraŋi ehyʼohuhola era muŋuge emitwe jenywe, nʼesuubi lyenywe lyosiryosi libe hu hisasabirisi ehi Yesu Kurisito alibaŋambira nʼagobooye.
60001014	Ngʼabaana abagondi, mutagenderanga mu hwegomba ohubi ohu mwalinga ni nahwo ni muhiiri humanya hituufu.
60001015	Aye ngʼolu Hatonda owʼabalanga aŋuma hibi, mwesi mubenga bagwalaafu mu hiisi hiitu ehi muhola.
60001016	Olwohuba hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Mube bagwalaafu ngʼolu ese ndi mwabufu.”
60001017	Ngʼolu muli ni Hatonda oyu mulanga muuti Bbaabba, oyo asalira hiisi muutu omusango nʼatehubbira, ŋaahani mumenye hu hyalo huno hyʼabalugendwa ni mumutya era ni mumanyire muuti sinje wenywe.
60001018	Olwohuba mumanyire bulaŋi weene muuti endiŋi eyi basasula siyabiitu ebiŋwaŋo hyʼefeeza oba ezaabbu aye gabanunula mu bulombolombo wabasehulu benywe.
60001019	Gabanunula olwʼamafugi ga Kurisito ali mu hifo hyʼetaama eyibulaho mbalo oba buleme bwosibwosi. Era amafugi ago gabbeeyi.
60001020	Hatonda ko atonde ehyalo gaatobola Kurisito ohuba eŋongo hu lwenywe aye ohumuhwehula hibaayeŋo mu ndaalo jino ejʼekomerero.
60001021	Ohubita mu Kurisito, mwafugiirira Hatonda owamulamusa ngʼahena amuŋa obubbala era ohufugiirira nʼesuubi lyenywe biri mu Hatonda oyo.
60001022	Ngʼolu mwaŋulira ehibono hya Hatonda ehyʼamazima mwagonda mwafugiirira, Hatonda gabagwalaasa era mwasuna ohwenda ohwʼamazima. Olwʼehyo mwendanenga nʼomwoyo mulala.
60001023	Olwohuba ni mwanoŋoha mwafuuha baana ba Hatonda atafa era mwasuna obulamu obutaŋwaŋo ohubita mu hibono hihye.
60001024	Hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Abaatu bali hyʼenyaasi, era nʼobuŋoono bwawe buli hyʼehimuli ehiŋotoha ehiseera buseera. Enyaasi liŋotoha, era nʼehimuli hyosi hiŋotoha nga higwa ŋaasi.
60001025	Aye ehibono hya Musengwa hiribaŋo emirembe nʼemirembe.” Era ehyo njʼehibono ehi bababuulira mwafugiirira.
60002001	Olwʼehyo mwefihuleho ebibi byosibyosi, ohuhotogerera abaatu, obudulingi, obunafuusi, ekirihindi nʼohuloma ebibi hu bahyenywe.
60002002	Ngʼolu baana abaŋere benda amabeere amatomwa ko bahule bulaŋi, mwesi muŋembenga hu hibono hya Hatonda mwahaŋangala mu bunoŋosi bwenywe.
60002003	Hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Mwalega hu Musengwa yeefe era mumanyire ngʼolu ali mulaŋi.”
60002004	Mutiine eyiri Yesu Musengwa, ebaale eryʼebbeeyi eri baatu baagaana baati siryamugaso aye Hatonda galitobola lyaba lyʼebbeeyi eyi ali.
60002005	Mwesi muli mabaale agʼebbeeyi aga Hatonda ali hutambisa ohutongola enyumba yiye. Mwesi muli basengi ba Hatonda abamuŋa eŋongo eyi musangaasa ohubita mu Yesu Kurisito.
60002006	Hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Bona taaye ebaale mu Sayuuni, erinatobola era eryʼebbeeyi, era hiisi amwesiga saanahaswale.”
60002007	Ebaale lino lyamugaso bugali eyiri enywe abamufugiirira aye eyiri abo abatafugiirira, “ebaale eri abatongoli batala baati siraŋi, njʼeryafuuha eryʼomugaso mu gosigosi.”
60002008	Era nindi hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti, “Lino njʼebaale egumu erireetera abaatu ohwegumula, ebaale ehosa eribaleetera ohwetega baagwa.” Begumula olwohuba sibafugiirira ehibono, nga Hatonda ehigategeha hyolerera.
60002009	Aye enywe babatobola, muli basengi ba Hatonda, egwanga eri gaabula, abaatu babe, abagatobola ohulomera abaatu obuhwenda bwʼoyo owabalanga ohuŋwa mu hiirema ohwingira mu njase yiye eyʼamaani.
60002010	Simwali baatu ba Hatonda aye ŋaahani muli baatu babe era egongo eyo mwali muŋuma hisa hihye aye ŋaahani mwahisuna.
60002011	Bameeri bange, ngʼolu mumanyire muuti muli balugendwa era abawuli mu hyalo muno, mbasunga mweŋalame ohuhola ebikolwa ebyʼomubiri ebibaŋiriŋania.
60002012	Esambo jenywe jibenga ndaŋi ŋagati mu batafugiirira Hatonda abamumenyiremo. Wayire banababeŋerenga, ne ni banabonenga ebikolwa byenywe ebiraŋi, baja huŋa Hatonda eŋono hu ludaalo olwʼekomerero.
60002013	Ngʼolu muli baloobera ba Yesu Musengwa, mugonderenga abaŋugi benywe: muŋulirenga habaha wenywe,
60002014	oba abaŋugi abandi abagataŋo ohugudya abo abahola ebibi era nʼohusiima abo abahola ebiraŋi.
60002015	Hatonda genda ebikolwa byenywe ebiraŋi bisimye ebibono byʼabaŋubeebe abo ababaŋaha esiro.
60002016	Wayire muli badembe aye muli beedu ba Hatonda era simutambisanga dembe lyenywe ohuhola ebibi.
60002017	Muŋenga hiisi muutu eŋono, mwendanenga hyʼabalebe, mutyenga Hatonda era muŋenga habaha eŋono.
60002018	Abeedu, muŋulirenga abasengwa benywe, si abo abababisya obulaŋi boŋene aye ni naabo abababisya obubi.
60002019	Hino kiroma olwohuba Hatonda alibaŋa ekabi olwʼohwehaliriha ebiguudyo ebi baatu babahola aŋaŋuma songa.
60002020	Omuutu asunamo hi singa bamuhubba olwʼebibi ebi ahola? Aye singa bamugudya olwʼebiraŋi ebi ahola, ehyo hisangaasa Hatonda.
60002021	Hatonda gabalanga ohuhola ebiraŋi wayire hibaŋwereyemo ohugada. Ni Kurisito yeesi gagada hu lwenywe. Muholenga ebi gaholanga olwohuba Ye njʼehyohuboneraho hyenywe.
60002022	Eŋuma hibi ehi Kurisito gaahola wayire ohuloma ehyʼobundulingi.
60002023	Era ni bamufodogola, niye sigabagobolamo era ni bamugudya sigesasusa muutu yesiyesi aye niye obulamu buwe gabuŋambya Hatonda asala emisango nʼatehubbira.
60002024	Kurisito omwene geetwiha ebibi byefe gabiŋira hu musalabba, ko hube hyʼabaatu abafuuye eyiri ehibi aye abagwalaafu mu moni jije. Ebihubbe ebi bamwosaho mbebibaŋonia.
60002025	Mwali muŋabire hyʼetaama aye babagobosa eyiri Omwayi era Omuhuumi wʼobulamu wenywe.
60003001	Abahasi muŋulirenga abawamwenywe, ko abandi hu bo abatafugiirira Hatonda basobole ohufugiirira olwʼesambo jenywe.
60003002	Hino hinahabeŋo olwʼohubona eŋono eri mubaŋa nʼesambo jenywe endaŋi.
60003003	Era obuŋoono bwenywe butabanga bwa hu mugulu, hyʼemisono jefiiri oba ohwambala emihomyo ejʼezaabbu oba engoye ejʼebbeeyi.
60003004	Aye bubenga wamugati mula nʼemyoyo emibombeefu era abaatu abatanyiganyiga, ehyo njʼehihira obulaŋi mu moni ja Hatonda.
60003005	Era nʼabahasi abahale abaali abagwalaafu po beebisyanga baatyo ni bagondera abawamwawe.
60003006	Saala muha Yibbulayimu owaali mulala hu bahasi abo gebisyanga atyo, nʼagonderanga wamwe era nʼamulanga musengwawe. Munahola ebiraŋi hya niye era ni muŋuma hutya, muba bahaana babe.
60003007	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, abasinde mufaanie muuti abahasi benywe bibya binafu ohubahiraho. Mubaŋenga eŋono ni mumayire muuti boosi balisuna ehirabo ehyʼobulamu obutaŋwaŋo olwʼehisa hya Hatonda. Munaholanga muutyo, olwo siŋanabengaŋo ehitigatigania ohusaba hwenywe.
60003008	Ehisembayo, mwisenga hirala, mwendanenga hyʼabalebe era hiisi muutu aŋambirenga owahye ehisa, ni geŋomehire.
60003009	Omuutu nahuholanga ehibi, omanya otegalulanga olwʼehibi ehi ahuholire aye omusabirenga ekabi olwohuba ehyo njʼehi Hatonda abendaho ko mwahasuna ekabi.
60003010	Hyaŋandiihiwa hiiti; “Owenda ohuba nʼobulamu obulaŋi nʼohuwangaala, ali nʼohuhuuma olulimi lulwe ohutalimirira bahye nʼohuloma ebyʼobudulingi.
60003011	Era alehere aŋo ohuhola ebibi ahole ebiraŋi, abe omuutu aleeta emiyaaya era geyongere mu jo.
60003012	Olwohuba Musengwa afaayo hu abo abahola ebiruŋamu, era aŋulira ohusaba hwawe. Aye sigenda abo abahola ebibi.”
60003013	Njʼani oyo aja hubalomaho olwʼohufuba ohuhola ebiraŋi? Ŋaŋuma.
60003014	Aye wayire babagudya, muli nʼekabi olwohuba muhola ebiraŋi. Olwʼehyo simutyanga ebi batya era muteŋendehereranga.
60003015	Aye Kurisito aŋire ehifo ehidaayi mu bulamu wenywe nga Musengwa. Mubenga butebute hiisi hiseera ohugobolamo omuutu yesiyesi ababuusa ebiŋamba hu ehyo ehi musuubira ohusuna. Aye hino muhihole nʼohwenenekeresa nʼohubaŋa eŋono
60003016	ni ŋuma hibi ehi muhweha mu myoyo jenywe ko abo ababaŋaha esiro baswaale ni babona esambo jenywe endaŋi ngʼabaloobera ba Kurisito.
60003017	Hiraŋi ohugada olwʼohuhola ebiraŋi ni huba husiima hwa Hatonda, ohuhira olwʼohuhola ebibi.
60003018	Hino kiroma olwohuba Kurisito ataholangaho hibi hyosihyosi, era omwabufu gaafiiririra abatali bagwalaafu omulundi mulala gwoŋene, ohubaleeta eyiri Hatonda. Baamwita aye Hatonda gamulamusa hu lwʼamaani gʼOmwoyo wuwe.
60003019	Yesu Kurisito gatiina e magombe mu komera gabuulira,
60003020	abo abagaana ohudembuhira Hatonda olu gabehaliiriha Nuwa nʼabaaja eryato. Abaatu munaana boŋeene njʼabaŋona amataba.
60003021	Era amataba ago gaaliŋo ngʼahabonero ahʼohubatiziwa ohubanoŋola mwesi sosi hubogaho obudida hu mibiri jenywe aye ehisuubizo ehyʼohuba nʼobulamu obulaŋi mu moni ja Hatonda. Ohubatiziwa ohwo huhola olwʼohulamuha hwa Yesu Kurisito.
60003022	Yesu gatiina mwigulu era gehaaye hu lubega lwʼomuhono omulungi ogwa Hatonda era aŋuga abamalayika nʼebiitu byosibyosi.
60004001	Ngʼolu Kurisito gabonaabona hu musalabba, mwesi mube nʼepeega eyi gaali ni nayo eyʼohucaawa ehibi olwohuba singa omuutu yesiyesi bamugudya olwa Yesu, aba saahyenda huhola ebibi.
60004002	Olwʼehyo mutabanga mu hwegomba hwʼomubiri aye muhole ebi Hatonda genda.
60004003	Nga mwahena ebiseera ebyene ebingi ni muhola ebiitu ebi baatu abatamanyire Hatonda bahola! Mu bibi ebyo pomuli obuhwedi, obumeesi, ebinyumyo nʼohusenga emisambwa. Mwesi ebyo mbebi mubaayemo ebbanga eryo lyosiryosi.
60004004	Era ŋaahani abatatya Hatonda, hibeeŋunjisa ni babona ni mutahola ebibi ebi bahola, era cʼehigira babalomaho ebibi.
60004005	Aye baliŋosya mu moni jʼoyo owetegehire ohusalira abalamu nʼabafu emisango.
60004006	Era njʼehigira ni baalomera ni abo abaafa Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi bafugiirire wayire abaatu baŋangire ohuba ni baabasalira omusango ni baali ni bahiiri hu hyalo huno aye ŋaahani basobola ohumenya ni Hatonda.
60004007	Bahyange, ekomerero yiri huupi hwola, olwʼehyo mube butebute era abegenderesa ko muŋange ohusaba ngʼolu hisaana.
60004008	Aye ehihulu mu byosibyosi, mwendanenga nʼomwoyo mulala olwohuba ohwenda huja hubaleetera ohusoniŋanga abaatu ebibi ebi babahola.
60004009	Era musangaalirenga abafugiirira bahyenywe mu mago genywe ni muŋuma hweŋuluŋunya.
60004010	Hiisi muutu atambisenga ehirabo ehi ali ni nahyo ohuyeeda abandi mu hufugiirira hwawe era mube besigwa mu hutambisa ebirabo bya Hatonda mu ngeri yosiyosi.
60004011	Oyo ali nʼehirabo ehyʼohubuulira, alomere abaatu ehibono hya Hatonda nʼamaani gosigosi. Ni nooyo ali nʼehirabo ehyʼohuyeeda, ayeedenga olwʼamaani ga Hatonda, ko abaatu baŋe Hatonda oyo ali nʼamaani nʼobuŋangi eŋono ohubita mu Yesu Kurisito emirembe nʼemirembe. Amiina.
60004012	Bahyange abahoda, hitabeŋunjisa oti hani hinyaaha eyi muli ohubita mu hubonaabona ohubitiirifu.
60004013	Aye musaŋalyenga olwohuba mugada hya Kurisito olu bamugudya ko mwesi muŋange ohusangaala ehibitiriiye olu alihwehula eŋono lirye.
60004014	Muli nʼekabi banabahola ebisirisinye olwohuba baloobera ba Kurisito, ehyo hiraga hiiti Omwoyo owʼamaani owa Hatonda ali ŋalala ni nenywe.
60004015	Era hanye hubonaabona, mutabonaabonanga olwohuba abatemu oba abeebi oba olwʼehibi hyosihyosi oba abeyingisa mu songa ejitabaŋambaho.
60004016	Hitabaŋambyanga soni ohubonaabona olwohuba mufugiirira Kurisito aye mujumiryenga hujumirya Hatonda.
60004017	Njʼehiseera ohusalira abaatu emisango ni batandiihira mu nyumba ya Hatonda, ne banatandihira hu fe, hinahabe hiitye eyiri abo abatafugiirira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi aga Hatonda?
60004018	Era, “Obanga higosi omugwalaafu ohuŋunuha, ne baliba batye abo abatatya Hatonda nʼabahola ebibi?”
60004019	Olwʼehyo abo ababonaabona hu lwʼohugera hwa Hatonda waawe omwesigwa, baali nʼohweŋerayo erala ohumwesiga era beegumye ohuhola ebiraŋi.
60005001	Eyiri abatangirisi babafugiirira Yesu, ese ngʼomutangirisi wahyenywe, oneboneyeho Kurisito nʼemoni jange nʼabonaabona era ngʼomulala hu balisuna omugabo mu buŋugi buwe hu ludaalo olwʼekomerero,
60005002	mbahubbirisa mube baayi abalabirira bulaŋi abaatu aba Hatonda gabaŋambya. Hino mutahiholanga olwohuba muli nʼohuhihola aye mube baheneerefu mu buŋeeresa wenywe ngʼolu Hatonda genda mube, ni mutaluluhanira bbeesa aye ni mwenda ohuŋeeresa.
60005003	Ni mutali mugugu eyiri abaatu ba Hatonda aye ni muli hyʼohuboneraho mu sambo jenywe eyi bali.
60005004	Omwayi Omuhulu nʼaligobola, musune engule eyʼeŋono eyʼemirembe nʼemirembe.
60005005	Enywe abavubuka, mu ngeri njʼenyene muŋulirenga ababahiraho obuhulu. Mwesimwesi mweŋomehenga eyiri abahyenywe, olwohuba “Hatonda sigenda abehudumbasa, aye aŋambira abo abeŋomeha ehisasabirisi.”
60005006	Olwʼehyo, mweŋomehenga mu moni ja Hatonda ali nʼobuŋangi, aja hubadunda abate aŋalaŋi ehiseera ni hyolire.
60005007	Muŋambyenga Hatonda ebigosi byenywe byosibyosi, olwohuba afaayo.
60005008	Mubenga butebute olwohuba Sitaani, omusigu wenywe aŋiirita hyʼempologoma etiina ŋano ni naŋala ni yendula ehyʼohulya.
60005009	Mumuŋiriŋanienga ni mwemereeye mu hufugiirira nʼamagulu gombi, olwohuba muhimanyire muuti nʼabalebe benywe mu Kurisito abali mu byalo ebindi boosi babita mu hubonaabona.
60005010	Hatonda mu hisa hihye gabalanga ohusuna hu ŋono lirye eryʼemirembe nʼemirembe ni mubita mu Yesu Kurisito. Oluvanyuma lwʼohugada ahaseera, Yesu aja hubagobosa bunyaaha ahene abaŋe amaani era abagumye mu hufugiirira hwenywe ni mubula husagasagana.
60005011	Hatonda oyo aŋuge emirembe nʼemirembe. Amiina.
60005012	Mbaŋandiihiiye ebbaluŋa yino enyipinyipi ni neyeedesa Siluvaano mulebe yange omwesigwa. Pandiihire ohubagobosamo amaani ti mu hubonaabona Hatonda abaŋeramo ekabi, olwʼehyo mutaŋwamo maani.
60005013	Abafugiirira bahyenywe abʼeno e Bbabbulooni, aba Hatonda gatobola hyenywe, ni Mariko musaani yange, babaheehiise.
60005014	Muheesanie mu keesa eyʼabaatu abagwalaafu eraga ohwendana. Emiyaaya jibe ni nenywe mwesimwesi abafugiirira Kurisito.
61001001	Simooni Peetero omuŋeeresa era omuhwenda wa Yesu Kurisito mbaŋandiihira enywe abaasuna ohufugiirira ohwʼomuŋendo hyefe olwʼobulaŋi wa Hatonda era Omunoŋosi weefe Yesu Kurisito.
61001002	Ehisasabirisi nʼemiyaaya byeyongere ohuba ni nenywe olwʼohumanya Hatonda ni Yesu Musengwa yeefe.
61001003	Hatonda ni gatulanga, mu buŋangi bubwe gaatuŋa byosibyosi ebi huli nʼohuba ni nabyo ko husobole ohumusangaasa nʼohugabana hu ŋono nʼowabufu bubwe olwʼohumumanya.
61001004	Gaatuŋa ebisuubise bibye ebyʼamaani era ebyʼomuŋendo. Ebisuubise ebyo njʼebituleetera ohuba nʼobulamu hyʼobuwe ni hutahola ebi batafugiirira bahola olwʼohwegomba hwʼemibiri jaawe.
61001005	Olwʼehyo, mugesyengaho bugali hu hufugiirira hwenywe ohumeedaho ebikolwa ebiraŋi, hu bikolwa ebiraŋi ebyo mumeedeho ohumanya ebi genda.
61001006	Hu humanya ebi Hatonda genda, mumeedeho nʼohuŋuga emitwe jenywe, hu ehyo mumeedeho ohwehaliriha, hu hwehaliriha, mumeedeho ohusangaasa Hatonda.
61001007	Hu husangaasa Hatonda, mumeedeho ohwenda abalebe, hu hwenda abalebe, mumeedeho ohwenda abaatu bosibosi.
61001008	Singa obulamu wenywe weyongereranga nʼamaani ohuba butyo, ohumanya ohuhumanyire Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito huja hubabera hwamugaso.
61001009	Aye omuutu yesiyesi aŋuma ebiitu ebyo mu bulamu buwe, saabona ŋaleeŋi, ali hyʼomuŋofu aŋooye emirimo era gebirira ati Hatonda gamwogaho ebibi bibye.
61001010	Olwʼehyo aboluganda, mufubenga bugali ohulaga muuti Hatonda gabatobola, gahena gabalanga ohuba baatu babe. Singa muhola muutyo, simuja huleheraŋo ohumufugiirira.
61001011	Era baja hubasangalira bugali weene mu buŋugi wa Musengwa Yesu Kurisito Omunoŋosi weefe owʼemirembe nʼemirembe.
61001012	Nja hubahebulisanga ebiitu ebyo habuhyabuhya wayire nga mubimanyire era mumanyiye erala amazima agaŋamba hu Yesu.
61001013	Peega ti hiraŋi ni kiiri hu hyalo huno ohweyongera ohubahebulisanga ebiitu ebyo,
61001014	olwohuba manyire ti natere ohuŋwa mu hyalo hino, Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito ganjibiraho ehyama ehyo.
61001015	Cʼehigira nja hugesyaho ohubahebulisa ebiitu ebyo ko mutebirira ni ndiba tiinire.
61001016	Ebi hwabalomera hu buŋangi nʼohugobola hwa Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito, sibyali byamujengejo aye hwabalomera ebyeŋunjisa ebi hwabonaho nʼemoni jeefe.
61001017	Hwaliŋo Hatonda seefe olu gamutwiha eŋono era galoma nʼejanjaasi eryʼamaani ati, “Ono njʼOmwana wange omuhoda oyu nenda era owunesiimisa.”
61001018	Ni hwali hu lusozi olwawufu ni naye, efe hwabeene hwaŋulira ejanjaasi eryo nʼamatwi geefe, Hatonda nʼaloma ebibono ebyo.
61001019	Ehyo hituŋa obuhahafu bwʼebibono byʼabanaabbi, era mwesi hibahola bulaŋi ohubitaho omwoyo. Ebibono ebyo biri hyʼenjase mu hiirema era bija husigala ni bibaŋa enjase mu myoyo jenywe ohwola olu bulihya Yesu ali hyʼemunyeenye suulwe aligobola.
61001020	Muli nʼohumanya muuti ebibono byʼabanaabbi, sibyali byawe hu bwawe,
61001021	olwohuba eŋuma buhwenda obu naabbi galomera abaatu ni biri bibono bibye omwene. Aye Omwoyo Omutukuvu njʼowabaluŋamyanga ohuloma obuhwenda owaŋwanga eyiri Hatonda.
61002001	Ngʼolu hyali ahale hale ni ŋaliŋo abanaabbi abʼobudulingi, ŋanahabeŋo abasomesa abaligunjaŋo era babanyerehesa esomesa yaawe eyʼobudulingi. Era esomesa yaawe eriba yegaana Musengwa owabanunula mu bibi byawe, ehiitu ehiribaŋweramo ohubasihiirihisaŋo.
61002002	Abaatu bangi balironderera esambo jaawe embi, era baleetera abandi ohufodogola amazima.
61002003	Olwʼohululuhanira ebbeesa, abasomesa abo abʼobudulingi banahaseege era babalomera ebibono ebyʼobudulingi, mubaŋe ebbeesa. Aye Hatonda gahena hale ohubasalira omusango era saaja hubasaasira.
61002004	Obanga Hatonda sigasaasira bamalayika abamujeemera aye gabadanya eyo mu komera mu hiirema ohwola olu banahabasalire emisango, ne abo?
61002005	Hatonda era sigasaasira abaatu abaahale abaholanga ebibi aye gabasihiirisa nʼamataba ohutusaho Nuwa owabuuliranga ebibono ebiruŋamu ko nʼabaatu musanvu abomu mago gage.
61002006	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, Hatonda gasalira abaatu abaali mu bibuga Sodoma ni Gomora omusango, gahena gabasihiirisa nʼomuliro era gabafuula hyahuboneraho ngʼolu alihola abo abatamutya.
61002007	Mu bo gaŋoniaho njʼe Luuti owaali nʼahola ebiruŋamu era nʼadembire esambo embi ejʼabaatu aba gaali nʼamenyire ni nabo.
61002008	Luuti niye gaali ahola ebiruŋamu mu moni ja Hatonda era hiisi ludaalo omwoyo ni gumuluma olwʼebibi ebi baatu baholanga era nʼebibalomanga.
61002009	Olwʼehyo Hatonda Musengwa amanyire ngʼolu aŋonia ababe ebigosi era gagumikiriza abahola ebibi ohwola hu ludaalo olwʼohusaliraho omusango.
61002010	Hatonda anahagudye abahola ebibi ohuhirira erala abo abahola ebyʼobuŋemu ngʼolu benda olwohuba bamutala. Abasomesa abo abʼobudulingi eŋuma oyu batya. Bafodogola ebiwumbe ebiramu ebiri mwigulu.
61002011	Ate nga abamalayika bali nʼamaani nʼobuŋangi ohuhiraho ebiwumbe ebyo ebyabufu, sijibifodogola wayire ohubiloopa mu moni ja Hatonda Musengwa.
61002012	Aye abasomesa abo bafodogola era bali hyʼesolo ejiŋuma hutegeera ejihola ngʼolu jiba ni jibona mu haseera aho. Era jiriŋo huŋa baatu nyama. Olwohuba bali hyʼesolo, baloma ebi batafaania nʼohufaania.
61002013	Abasomesa abo abʼobudulingi, sibamanyire baati hadubi hedaala haja hahye. Hatonda yeesi anahabegalule olwʼebibi byawe. Omulimo gwabasomesa abo abʼobudulingi gwahulya biitu, simu wiire mwoŋene aye nomu muusi mwosi. Sihibaholaho ohuhola ebiitu hyʼebyo nʼolu baba ni bali hu biŋulo ni nenywe. Esambo jabasomesa abo, jigima abaatu babaŋaha esiro era jabaŋambya esoni.
61002014	Abaatu abo sibaŋeega hu hiitu ehindi wabula huhola obuhwedi era sibademba huhola ebibi. Badulinga abo abemereeye nʼohugulu hulala mu hufugiirira. Bali nʼomulungo ogwʼamaani era basiraana.
61002015	Baaŋwa hu ngira etuufu, baŋamba obulamu hyʼowa naabbi Bbalamu omusaani wa Bbewori, owahola ebibi olwʼohwenda ohusuna ebbeesa mu ngeri embi.
61002016	Olwʼehyo Hatonda galeetera nasugirya ohumwoloobya olwʼebibi bibye. Wayire nasugirya siyiroma, ni yaali ni mugegire nʼatiina ewa habaha yatandiha ohuloma oti hani muutu ni yimugaana ebi gaali nʼahola.
61002017	Abasomesa abo abʼobudulingi, baŋuma mugaso hyʼesobere ejiŋumamo maaji era bali hyʼebireri ebi punga ehubba yaŋira eyo. Olwʼehyo Hatonda gaabategehera ehifo omuli ehiirema ehigunyiiye hiiti ngu!
61002018	Wayire ebibaloma biboneha oti byamahulu aye byahweragalaga hweragalaga era paanaŋo. Basomesa baati abaatu badembe ohuhola obuhwedi, era batambisa esomesa hyʼeyo ohuhongeresa abo abahiiri abanafu mu hufugiirira Yesu ohweyongera ohuhola ebibi.
61002019	Basomesa abaatu mbo banafugiirira esomesa yaawe, baaja husuna edembe. Aye abasomesa abeene abo, bali nʼesambo ejibulamo era abeene beedu bʼebyo ebibahola olwohuba omuutu aba mwidu wʼehiitu ehiba ni himuŋuga.
61002020	Abasomesa abo baali banoŋohire ohuŋwa mu hibi olwʼohufugiirira Musengwa era Omunoŋosi weefe Yesu Kurisito. Aye bagamayo mu biitu ebi baali ni baŋonire, esambo jaawe ŋaahani mbi ohuhiraho ngʼolu jaali.
61002021	Hyahali hiraŋi singa sibafugiirira Yesu ohusinga ohumanya engira etuufu nga ko baleeha ohugendera mu biragiro bibye ebyabufu ebi gabaŋa.
61002022	Ehyo ehi bahola sihiri yi bulafu wʼengero ejibagera baati, “Embwa egaluhira ebirusi byayo.” Era baati, “Embiiji eyi boogire, nindi yagamayo yegalangasa mu madosi.”
61003001	Aboluganda abahoda, yino bbaluŋa yange eyohubiri ohubaŋandiihira. Mu bbaluŋa jombi ngehisyeho ohubahebulisa amazima aga babasomesa ko muŋange ohuba nʼengeri endaŋi eyi mubiŋegaho.
61003002	Nenda muhebulire ebi banaabbi abagwalaafu baaloma ko nʼebiragiro bya Musengwa era Omunoŋosi weefe gaabaŋa nʼabita mu bahwenda aba gatuma eyi muli.
61003003	Mu byosibyosi, muli nʼohumanya muuti mu ndaalo ejʼekomerero, ŋalibaaŋo abaatu abendula ebyawe hu waawe abalibabisyamo emoni olwʼohufugiirira amazima.
61003004	Baliroma baati, “Gasuubisa ati aligobola, aye lwahiina saagobola? Ohuŋwa mu mirembe jʼabalata beefe eŋuma ehicuuhangaho, byosibyosi bihiiri ngʼolu byali Hatonda nʼatonda ehyalo!”
61003005	Aye abo ababatala beŋwitania hu biitu ebi bamanyire baati hale hale Hatonda galagira hulagira ngʼegulu nʼehyalo bibaŋo. Era galagira amaaji gaŋwamo ehyalo hino era amaaji ago gasigala ni gahyeswanigirihiise.
61003006	Amaaji ameene ago gabanda hiisi ŋaatu nga gasihiirisa ehyalo.
61003007	Mu ngeri enyene eyi Hatonda gatondamo egulu nʼehyalo, njʼeyi aja hubisihiirisamo nʼomuliro hu ludaalo olu alisalira abo abatamutya, omusango.
61003008	Aye bameeri simwibiriranga muuti eyiri Musengwa, oludaalo lulala luli hyʼemyaha lukumi era emyaha lukumi jiri hyʼoludaalo lulala. Byosibyosi byagagana mu moni jije.
61003009	Abandi baŋeega baati mbo Yesu Musengwa aluyeeŋo ohugobola ngʼolu gasuubisa. Aye abagumikiriza olwohuba sigenda muutu yesiyesi asihiirihe aye hiisi muutu gebbwage aleheraŋo ohuhola ebibi.
61003010	Cooka oludaalo olwʼohugobola hwa Musengwa, eŋuma alumanyire era aliija hyʼomwibi. Hu ludaalo olwo ŋalibaŋo ohuwatuha ohwʼamaani era omuliro gulyohya era gwasanuusa ebiitu ebiri mu bbanga. Ehyalo nʼebiitu ebirimo byosibyosi birisihiiriha.
61003011	Obanga ebiitu ebyo byosibyosi bija husihiiriha, obulamu wenywe buseene huba wa ngeri hi? Mwegenderese engeri eyi mugendamo. Obulamu bwenywe buseene ohuba bugwalaafu era obuŋeesa Hatonda eŋono.
61003012	Mwebisyenga muutyo ni muhuumirira ohugobola huhwe ngʼolu gasuubisa. Muholenga muutyo gahagobola mangu, hu ludaalo olwo olu muliro gulyohya gwaguhulisa ebiitu ebiri mu bbanga.
61003013	Aye huhuumiriiye egulu nʼehyalo ebinyaaha ngʼolu Hatonda gasuubisa era ehyo ni hihenire ohubaŋo, abaatu abalibamo balihola biruŋamu byereere.
61003014	Olwʼehyo, bahyange abahoda ngʼolu muhuumiiriye ebyo ohubaŋo, mwefeho Musengwa abagaane ni muŋumaho mbalo oba ebala lyosiryosi mu bulamu wenywe era ni muli bulala ni naye.
61003015	Mufanie muuti Musengwa aluuye ohugobola olwohuba genda abaatu bebbwage batasihiiriha. Ebiitu bino mbebi mulebe yeefe omuhoda oyu balanga baati Pawulo, yeesi gabaŋandiihira nʼatambisa amagesi aga Hatonda gaamuŋa.
61003016	Mu bigaŋandiiha mulimo ebiitu ebindi ebigosi ohutegeera, ebi abaŋubeebe banyonyola mu ngeri yaawe, nga beeleetera abeene ohusihiirisa.
61003017	Olwʼehyo bahyange abahoda, ngʼolu mumanyire ebiitu ebyo, mwehuume abaatu abo abatangondera Hatonda batababbaamya nʼobudulingi bwabwe.
61003018	Aye mweyongere ohusangaasa Musengwa era Omunoŋosi weefe Yesu Kurisito gaheyongera ohubaŋambira ehisasabirisi. Era mweyongere ohuba nʼehinani ehyʼohwenda ohumumanya ohuhiraho aŋo. Abaatu baŋe Yesu Musengwa eŋono emirembe nʼemirembe. Amiina.
62001001	Hubaŋandiihira ebifa hu Hibono aleeta obulamu obutaŋwaŋo era owaaliŋo ko batonde ehyalo. Hibono oyo, efe hwaŋulira ebibono ebi galoma, hwamubona era hwamwetegeeresa hwahena hwamuŋambaho nʼengalo jeefe. Ehyo cʼehigira hubuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi agamuŋambaho.
62001002	Hatonda gahwehula Hibono aleeta obulamu obutaŋwaŋo, hwamubonaho era huli bajulizi. Hubalomera hu biŋamba hu bulamu obutaŋwaŋo, obu muutu oyo owaŋwa eyiri Semwana gatwehwehulira.
62001003	Hubalomera hu oyo oyu hweboneraho nʼemoni jeefe era oyu hwaŋulira nʼatulabbira omwene, ko mwesi musobole ohutweŋimbaho mu huba bulala ni Hatonda Seefe ko nʼOmwana wuwe, Yesu Kurisito.
62001004	Hubaŋandiihira ebiitu bino mwaheega ko hwesihwesi hube basangaafu bugali weene.
62001005	Buno njʼobuhwenda obuhwaŋulira ohuŋwa eyiri Yesu Kurisito era hubalomera huuti; Hatonda ali hyʼenjase emulihira abaatu era mu ye mu ŋuma hiirema hyosihyosi.
62001006	Singa huloma huuti huli bulala ni Hatonda aye ni hugendera mu hiirema, aŋo huba hudulinga era huba sihugendera mu mazima.
62001007	Aye singa hugendera mu njase ngʼolu niye ali hyʼenjase, ehyo hituleetera ohuba bulala nʼabahyefe era amafugi ga Yesu Omwana wuwe gatwogaaho ebibi byefe byosibyosi.
62001008	Singa huloma huuti huŋuma hibi, huba hwedulinga hwabeene era huba huŋuma mazima.
62001009	Aye hunafugiirira huuti huli nʼehibi, Hatonda asala emisango nʼatehubbira era omwesigwa, aja hutusoniŋa ahene atugwalaase.
62001010	Singa huloma huuti sihuholangaho hibi hyosihyosi, humufuula ohuba mudulingi era ehibono hihye hiba sihiŋuga bulamu weefe.
62002001	Baana bange abahoda, mbaŋandiihira hino ko mutabbenganga. Aye singa omuutu yesiyesi abbenga, huli nʼatuŋoserehesa eyiri Seefe, oyo nje Yesu Kurisito Omwabufu wuwe.
62002002	Yesu Kurisito njʼatusaŋo ebibi byefe, saatusaŋo byʼefe byoŋene aye nʼebyabaatu bosibosi hu hyalo.
62002003	Hunagondera ebiragiro bya Hatonda, hiba hiraga hiiti humumanyire.
62002004	Omuutu aloma ati amanyire Hatonda aye ndahole ngʼolu biragiro bibye biroma, oyo aba mudulingi era nʼaŋumamo mazima.
62002005	Aye omuutu yesiyesi agondera ehibono hya Hatonda, aba alaga ati amwenda nʼomwoyo mulala. Era ehyo njʼehihutegeereraho huuti huli mu Hatonda.
62002006	Hiisi aloma ati ali bulala ni Hatonda, ali nʼohuba nʼesambo hyʼeja Kurisito.
62002007	Bameeri bange abahoda, simbaŋandiihira hiragiro hinyaaha aye ehyene ehyo ehi baabalomera ohuŋwera erala mu hutandiha. Era ehiragiro ehyo njʼobuhwenda obu mwaŋulira.
62002008	Aye mbaŋandiihira ehiragiro ehinyaaha era amazima gahyo gabonehera mu Kurisito ko nʼobulamu bwenywe olwohuba ebikolwa ebyʼehiirema birihuŋwaŋo era enjase yimuliha mu bulamu bwenywe olwʼohwendana.
62002009	Omuutu yesiyesi aloma ati agendera mu njase aye nʼacaawa mulebewe aba ahiri mu hiirema.
62002010	Hiisi owenda mulebewe aba agendera mu njase era ŋaba ŋabula ehimuleetera ohubbenga.
62002011	Aye hiisi acaawa mulebewe aba ahiiri mu hiirema era aba saamanyire eyi aba naali hutiina olwohuba hyamwigala emoni.
62002012	Mbaŋandiihira enywe abaana bange abahoda, olwohuba hu lwa Yesu Kurisito, Hatonda gasoniŋa ebibi byenywe.
62002013	Mbaŋandiihira enywe babbaabba, olwohuba mumanyire oyo owaaliŋo ohuŋwera erala mu hutandiha hwʼehyalo. Era pandiihira enywe abavubuka olwohuba mwaŋangula Sitaani. Pandiihira enywe abaana abaŋere olwohuba mumanyire Hatonda Seefe.
62002014	Pandiihira enywe abaŋangafu mu hufugiirira, olwohuba mumanyire owaaliŋo ohuŋwera erala hu hutandiha hwʼehyalo. Era pandiihira enywe abavubuka, olwohuba muli banywani mu hufugiirira hwenywe era ehibono hya Hatonda hiri mu bulamu bwenywe, era mwaŋangula Sitaani.
62002015	Olwʼehyo mbaloma ti simuŋembanga huhola ebibi nʼebiitu byʼehyalo hino ebitali biraŋi. Singa omuutu yesiyesi aŋembanga hu huhola ebibi, aba sigenda Hatonda.
62002016	Olwohuba ebiitu byʼehyalo hino omuli ohululuhanira ebiitu nʼohuba nʼemoni enyangu nʼohwehudumbasa, sibiŋwa yiwa Hatonda Seefe. Ebyo byosibyosi byʼehyalo hino.
62002017	Ehyalo hino nʼebikolwa ebibi biriŋwaŋo aye ahola Hatonda ebi genda, alibaaŋo emirembe nʼemirembe.
62002018	Baana bange abahoda, bino njʼebiseera ebyʼekomerero. Era ngʼolu mwaŋulira muuti aŋahania Kurisito ali huupi huuja, nʼesaawa yino abaŋahania Kurisito baliŋo bangi. Ehyo njʼehi hutegeereraho huuti huli mu ndaalo ejʼekomerero.
62002019	Abaatu abo abaŋahania Kurisito, batuŋwamo olwohuba sibaali bahyefe. Singa baali bafugiirira bahyefe hani sibatuŋwamo. Aye ohutiina hwawe hwalagira erala huuti ŋabula wayire mulala hu bo owaali owahyefe.
62002020	Aye mwesimwesi mwasuna Omwoyo Omutukuvu ohuŋwa eyiri Kurisito era mumanyire amazima.
62002021	Simbaŋandiihira olwohuba ti simumanyire mazima; mugamanyire era ebula budulingi obuŋwa mu mazima.
62002022	Njʼani omudulingi? Njʼoyo aloma ati Yesu sinje Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu. Omuutu aloma atyo aba mulabe wa Kurisito era aba amuŋahania ohuba Mwana wa Hatonda.
62002023	Ŋaŋuma owegaana Omwana wa Hatonda gaaba bulala ni Hatonda Seefe era hiisi afugiirira Omwana aba afugiirira ni Hatonda Seefe.
62002024	Olwʼehyo musigale ni mufugiirira ebi babasomesa hu Kurisito mu hutandiha. Munahola muutyo, muja husigala ni muli bulala ni Hatonda Seefe nʼOmwana wuwe.
62002025	Era Yesu Kurisito gaatusuubisa obulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
62002026	Mbaŋandiihira bino byosibyosi olwohuba eriyo abo abenda ohubabbaamya.
62002027	Aye enywe, Kurisito gabaŋa Omwoyo wuwe era simwetaga muutu obundi yesiyesi ohubasomesa. Omwoyo Omutukuvu oyo abasomesa hu hiisi hiitu era ngʼolu ali wʼamazima, mu niye mubula budulingi era mweyongere ni muli mu Kurisito oyo. Olwʼehyo musigale ni muhifugiirira Kurisito ngʼolu Omwoyo wuwe abasomesa.
62002028	Ale ŋaahani, baana bange abahoda, mweyongere ohuba bulala ni Kurisito, ko mube bagumu era esoni jitabaŋamba nʼagobooye.
62002029	Ni muba ni muhimanyire muuti Kurisito mwabufu, ale muhimanye muuti hiisi ahola ebiruŋamu mu moni ja Hatonda aba mwana wuwe.
62003001	Ale mubone ngʼolu hiri hibono hya maani ohuba ti Hatonda Seefe gatuŋwereheseyeho ohwenda huhwe hwosihwosi, gaatufuula baana babe. Mu butuufu ehyo njʼehi huli! Hino kiroma olwohuba abaatu sibamutegeera, era hwesi njʼehigima ni batatutegeera.
62003002	Bameeri bange abahoda, ŋaahani huli baana ba Hatonda wayire hatyane ahiiri hutuhwehulira hiina ehi huliba. Aye humanyire huuti Kurisito nʼaligobola, huliba hya niye olwohuba huliba humubona moni hu moni.
62003003	Era hiisi muutu asuubira ehyo, ali nʼohwegwalaasa abe mwabufu ngʼolu Kurisito ali.
62003004	Hiisi ahola ehibi aba abbwagire amagambi ga Hatonda era mu butuufu obwene, ehibi njʼohujeema wabbwaga amagambi.
62003005	Aye enywe muhimanyire muuti Kurisito gaaja ohututusaho ebibi era eŋuma hibi ehi gaahola.
62003006	Olwʼehyo omuutu yesiyesi anaba bulala ni Kurisito sigeyongera huhola ebibi. Era oyo atiina mu moni nʼahola ebibi aba saabonangaho hu Kurisito oba saamanyire ati Mwana wa Hatonda.
62003007	Baana bange abahoda, omuutu yesiyesi saababbaamyanga ohuŋwa hu mazima. Olwohuba oyo ahola ebiruŋamu aba muluŋamu ngʼolu Kurisito ali muluŋamu.
62003008	Era oyo ahola ebibi, aba wa Sitaani olwohuba ohuŋwera erala mu hutandiha Sitaani mubbengi. Cʼehifa Omwana wa Hatonda gaaja ohusihiirisa ebikolwa bibye.
62003009	Eŋuma muutu yesiyesi owafuuha omwana wa Hatonda oweyongera ohuhola ebibi olwohuba embeera ya Hatonda yiba yiri mu bulamu buwe.
62003010	Hino njʼehihumanyiraho abaana ba Hatonda nʼaba Sitaani, hiisi muutu atahola ebiruŋamu oba atenda mulebewe, oyo saaba mwana wa Hatonda.
62003011	Obuhwenda obu mwaŋulira ohuŋwa mu hutandiha buli buuti; hwendanenga.
62003012	Mutaba hya Kayini owaleha Sitaani gaŋuga obulamu buwe, ngʼamuleetera ohwita Abbiri mulebewe. Ehyo gahihola olwohuba ebikolwa bibye byali bibi aye ebya mulebewe ni biri biruŋamu.
62003013	Aboluganda, hitabeŋunjisanga singa abaatu babacaawa.
62003014	Ni huba ni hwenda abahyefe, ehyo hituleetera ohumanya huuti hwaŋwa mu hufa hwasuna obulamu obutaŋwaŋo. Omuutu yesiyesi atenda wahye aba ahiiri mu hufa.
62003015	Hiisi acaawa mulebewe aba mwiiti. Era muhimanyire muuti eŋuma mwiiti yesiyesi ali nʼobulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
62003016	Ahabonero ahatulaga haati Yesu Kurisito atwenda, geŋayo gaatufiirira. Era hwesi hweŋengayo ohwenda abahyefe nʼomwoyo mulala.
62003017	Singa ŋabaaŋo omulebe omuŋinda aye nga saafayo hu oyo aŋuma haatu hosihosi aha geŋambaho, asobola atye ohwebuuja ati mbo genda Hatonda?
62003018	Baana bange abahoda, hutendananga mu bibono bubono byoŋene, aye mu bikolwa nʼomu mazima.
62003019	Humanyira hu cʼehyo huuti huli baana ba Hatonda era hituleetera emiyaaya ni huba mu moni jije ni husaba.
62003020	Hino kiroma olwohuba mula hunaŋulira ni ŋaliŋo ehitulumiirisa mu myoyo jeefe, humanya huuti Hatonda ahira byosibyosi obubbala era amanyire ebiri mu myoyo jeefe.
62003021	Bameeri bange abahoda, emyoyo jeefe jinaba ni jitatulumirisa, huba bagumu mu moni ja Hatonda.
62003022	Aja hutuŋa hiisi ehi husaba olwohuba huŋamba ebiragiro bibye era huhola ebimusangaasa.
62003023	Ehiragiro ehi Hatonda gaatuŋa cʼehino; ohufugiirira Yesu Kurisito Omwana wuwe nʼohwendananga ngʼolu gaatulagira.
62003024	Abo abaŋamba ebiragiro bya Hatonda baba bulala ni naye. Era Omwoyo wuwe oyu gatuŋa ohumenya mu myoyo jeefe atuleetera ohumanya huuti amenya mu bulamu bwefe.
62004001	Bameeri bange abahoda, simufugiiriranga hiisi somesa eyiba ni yibaluhireŋo, aye mugesyengaho ohumanya oba yiŋwa yiwa Hatonda oba bbe, olwohuba ŋaliŋo abanaabbi bangi abʼobudulingi abahwene ehyalo hyosihyosi.
62004002	Engeri eyʼohumanya hanye omuutu ali nʼOmwoyo wa Hatonda nje yino; anafugiirira ati Yesu Kurisito gasaaliwa hyʼomuutu, oyo Omwoyo wa Hatonda aba njʼamuluŋamya ohuloma atyo.
62004003	Aye hiisi aloma ati Yesu Kurisito gaŋuma mubiri hyʼogwomuutu, oyo Omwoyo wa Hatonda sinje aba nʼamulomya atyo. Era omwoyo oguŋahania Kurisito ogu mwaŋulira muuti guja hubaluuhaŋo era ŋaahani guliŋo mu hyalo muno.
62004004	Aye baana bange abahoda, muli baatu ba Hatonda era mwaŋangula abasomesa abo abʼobudulingi, olwohuba Hatonda ali mu nywe ahira oyo ali mu hyalo amaani.
62004005	Abasomesa abo sibamanyire Hatonda era ebi baloma bya hu hyalo huno cʼehigima abaatu babaŋulirisa.
62004006	Aye efe huli baatu ba Hatonda era oyo amumanyire atuŋulirisa. Abo abatamwenda, sibatuŋulirisa. Hu ehyo njʼehihutegeereraho Omwoyo owʼamazima nʼomwoyo gwa Sitaani ogwʼobudulingi.
62004007	Bameeri bange abahoda, hwendanenga, olwohuba ohwendana huŋwa eri Hatonda, era hiisi muutu hu nywe owenda owahye aba mwana wa Hatonda era aba amumanyire.
62004008	Oyo atenda bahye aba saamanyire Hatonda, olwohuba hiisi ehi Hatonda ahola, ahihola olwohuba genda abaatu.
62004009	Hatonda galaga ati atwenda olu gatuma Omwana wuwe omulala wogobbo hu hyalo, ko hwahasuna obulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
62004010	Ohwo njʼohwenda. Sihiri ti efe ndiife ohwasooka ohwenda Hatonda aye niye gatwenda, gatuŋa Omwana wuwe ohuba eŋongo olwʼebibi byʼefe.
62004011	Bameeri bange abahoda, ngʼolu Hatonda gatwenda ohwaga aŋo, hwesi hwendanenga.
62004012	Ŋabula owaali nʼaweene hu Hatonda aye ni huba ni hwendana, Hatonda aba ali mu efe era ohwendana ohwo huba huli huhulira erala mu efe.
62004013	Humanyire huuti huli bulala ni Hatonda era yeesi ali bulala ni neefe, olwohuba gatuŋa Omwoyo wuwe.
62004014	Era efe ehi hwabona cʼehi hulomera abandi huuti Hatonda seefe gatuŋa Omwana wuwe ohuba Omunoŋosi wʼabaatu bosibosi.
62004015	Hiisi afugiirira ati Yesu Mwana wa Hatonda, aba bulala ni Hatonda era Hatonda yeesi aba bulala ni naye.
62004016	Humanyire ngʼolu Hatonda atwendamo era humwesiga olwʼohutwenda. Hiisi ehi Hatonda ahola, ahihola olwohuba genda abaatu, era owenda abahye aba bulala ni Hatonda, ni Hatonda yeesi aba bulala ni naye.
62004017	Mu ngeri eyo, ohwendana hwʼefe huli huhulira erala, era ehyo hija hutuŋa obugumu hu ludaalo olu Hatonda alisaliraho omusango olwohuba hwebisya hya Yesu mu hyalo muno.
62004018	Omuutu amanyire ati Hatonda amwenda saaba nʼehi atya olwohuba ohutya nʼohwenda sibiŋambagana, era omuutu oyo sigeralihirira ati baja humuboneresa. Singa geralihirira hiba hiraga hiiti ahiiri hweyiniha mu hwenda hwa Hatonda, olwohuba ohwenda hutusaŋo ohutya.
62004019	Hwenda abahyefe olwohuba Hatonda njʼowasooka ohutwenda.
62004020	Singa omuutu aloma ati genda Hatonda aye nʼatenda mulebewe, omuutu oyo aba mudulingi, olwohuba oyo aba nʼatenda owahye oyu abonaho aŋanga atye ohwenda Hatonda oyu atabonangaho?
62004021	Yesu gatuŋa ehiragiro ati hiisi owenda Hatonda, ali nʼohwenda omuutu wahye.
62005001	Hiisi afugiirira ati Yesu nje Kurisito oyu bafuujaho amate ohunoŋola abaatu, oyo aba mwana wa Hatonda. Hiisi owenda omusaaye aba genda nʼomwana wuwe yeesi.
62005002	Olwʼehyo hunenda Hatonda era hwaŋamba ebiragiro bibye, ehyo hiba hiraga hiiti hwenda abaana babe bosibosi.
62005003	Ohwenda Hatonda hitegeesa ohuŋamba ebiragiro bibye era ebiragiro bibye byangu,
62005004	olwohuba hiisi afuuha mwana wa Hatonda, aŋangula ebibi byʼehyalo hino. Huŋangula ebibi hu lwʼohumufugiirira.
62005005	Njʼani aŋangula ebibi byʼehyalo hino? Njʼoyo afugiirira ati Yesu Mwana wa Hatonda.
62005006	Yesu Kurisito gaaja mu hyalo muno gabatizibwa mu maaji era gaafa olwʼebibi byefe. Sigaaja gabatizibwa hyoŋene aye gahena gaatufiirira. Era Omwoyo Omutukuvu mujulizi wʼebiitu ebyo olwohuba njʼotuhwehulira amazima agaŋamba hu Hatonda.
62005007	Ebiitu biri bidatu ebiŋayo obujulizi,
62005008	Omwoyo Omutukuvu, ohubatiziwa mu maaji era nʼamafugi gage agajijuha olu gaafa hu musalabba. Era ebidatu ebyo bihahasa ehiitu hirala biiti Yesu Mwana wa Hatonda.
62005009	Ngʼolu hufugiirira ebi baatu baloma, ale hufugiirire ebi Hatonda aloma hu Mwana wuwe Yesu Kurisito.
62005010	Hiisi afugiirira Omwana wa Hatonda, amanyire ati ebiitu ebyo bituufu. Era abo abatafugiirira ebyo ebiŋamba hu Mwana wuwe, bafuula Hatonda ohuba mudulingi, olwohuba sibafugiirira ebi aloma hu Mwana wuwe oyo.
62005011	Hatonda aloma ati gaatuŋa obulamu obutaŋwaŋo era hubusuna ohubita mu Mwana wuwe oyo.
62005012	Hiisi muutu afugiirira Omwana wa Hatonda ali nʼobulamu obutaŋwaŋo, aye oyo atamufugiirira abuŋuma.
62005013	Pandiihira enywe abafugiirira muuti Yesu Mwana wa Hatonda mwahamanya muuti muli nʼobulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
62005014	Huli nʼobugumu hunatiina mu moni ja Hatonda olwohuba atuŋa hiisi ehi humusunga, kasita hinaba mu husiima huhwe.
62005015	Era hunaba ni humanyire huuti aŋulira ohusaba hwʼefe, aŋo hwehahasa huuti aja hutuŋa ebyo ebi huba ni humusungire.
62005016	Nʼobonanga owahyo nʼahola ehibi ehitamuleetera hufa, omulomberanga Hatonda amuŋe obulamu obutaŋwaŋo. Hino hiŋamba hu abo abahola ehibi ehitaleeta hufa. Ŋaliŋo ehibi ehireeta ohufa. Sindoma hulomberanga ehiitu hyʼehyo.
62005017	Hiisi hikolwa ehibi, hibi aye ŋaliŋo ehibi ehitaŋweramo muutu hufa.
62005018	Humanyire huuti hiisi owafuuha omwana wa Hatonda sigeyongera ohuhola ehibi olwohuba Yesu Omwana wa Hatonda amuhuuma, Sitaani atamwosaho habi.
62005019	Humanyire huuti huli baana ba Hatonda wayire ehyalo hyosihyosi hiri ŋaasi wʼobuŋugi wa Sitaani.
62005020	Humanyire huuti Omwana wa Hatonda gaaja mu hyalo muno era gaatuleetera ohumanya Hatonda owʼamazima. Era huli bulala ni Hatonda oyo owʼamazima olwa Yesu Kurisito Omwana wuwe. Era Hatonda oyo owʼamazima, njʼagaba obulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
62005021	Olwʼehyo baana bange abahoda, mweŋalamenga ohujumirya ebitali Hatonda.
63001001	Ese omutangirisi, pandiihira ewe omuhasi oyu Hatonda gatobola ko nʼabaana babo aba nenda obugali. Si ndiise seŋene abenda aye ni naabo abamanyire amazima boosi babenda,
63001002	olwohuba amazima aga hwafugiirira sihuja hulehera aŋo ohugafugiirira emirembe nʼemirembe.
63001003	Hatonda Seefe ni Yesu Kurisito Omwana wuwe batuŋambire ehisasabirisi era batuŋenga emiyaaya mu mazima ne mu hwendana.
63001004	Hyasangaasa ni naŋulira ti balala hu baana babo bafugiirira amazima, ngʼolu Hatonda Bbaabba gaatulagira.
63001005	Olwʼehyo, ewe omuhasi omuhoda, sikuŋandiihira hiragiro hinyaaha aye ehyo ehi batuŋa hale nʼatulagira hwendanenga.
63001006	Ohwendana hitegeesa ohugondera amagambi ga Hatonda. Ngʼolu mwaŋulira ehiragiro ehyo ohuŋwera olu mwafugiirira Yesu, ehiragiro hihye hiiri ti mwendanenga.
63001007	Hino kiroma olwohuba abasomesa abʼobudulingi bahwene ehyalo hyosihyosi. Basomesa baati Yesu Kurisito sigafuuha muutu era sigasaaliwa. Omuutu asomesa atyo, aba adulinga era aba mulabe wa Kurisito.
63001008	Olwʼehyo, mwehuume ko mutafiirwa ehi mwafululuhanira ni muŋeeresa Hatonda, aye musune omugabo mu wiijufu ogu gabasuubisa.
63001009	Hiisi muutu alehaŋo ohufugiirira ebiŋamba hu Kurisito ngʼolu bamusomesa, oyo saaba nʼahiri bulala ni Hatonda.
63001010	Omuutu yesiyesi asomesa ebyʼobudulingi, simumusangaliranga nʼomu mago genywe.
63001011	Oyo amusangalira aba ali bulala ni naye mu bikolwa bibye ebibi.
63001012	Ndi nʼebingi ebyʼohuhuŋandiihira aye olwohuba suubira ohuuja eyo kuboneho era huŋaye hwahasangaalira ŋalala.
63001013	Abaana ba mugandaawo aba Hatonda gaatobola, boosi bahuhehiseeho.
64001001	Ese omutangirisi, kuŋandihira ewe Gaayo oyu nenda nʼomwoyo gwange gwosigwosi.
64001002	Meeri yange, kulombera ekabi ebiitu bihutiinire bulaŋi era weyongere ohuba bulala ni Hatonda mu bulamu bubwo.
64001003	Nasangaala bugali abalebe mu Yesu ni baaja batuŋayira ngʼolu ohigumiiye hu mazima agaŋamba hu Yesu.
64001004	Eŋuma ehisangaasa hyʼohuŋulira ti abaana bange bahigendera mu mazima.
64001005	Wahyange, oholire bingi nʼoyeeda aboluganda wayire abandi baba bageni nʼotabamanyire. Ebikolwa bibyo biraga biiti oli mwesigwa.
64001006	Abalebe aba waŋa obuyeedi baatuŋayira engeri eyi wendamo abafugiirira Kurisito bahyo. Era neyongera ohuhusunga ti weyongere ohuyeeda abaatu hyʼabo ohweyongera mu lugendo lwawe.
64001007	Abalebe abo bagenda ni baŋeeresa Yesu Kurisito era sibasuna buyeedi ohuŋwa mu batafugiirira Kurisito.
64001008	Olwʼehyo hiraŋi ohuhuuma abaatu hyʼabo mu mago geefe olwohuba huba hutambira ŋalala ni nabo mu hubuulira Amaŋuliro Amalaŋi.
64001009	Naŋandiihira ehibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira Kurisito hu hiitu cʼehyene aye Diyotireefe olwʼohwenda ohuba omutangirisi waawe sigaŋulirisa byange.
64001010	Era atiinire nʼatulomaho bubi. Olwʼehyo, keesi ni nahaaje eyo nahalome mu lwijuuye hu ebi ahola. Saahoma hu hyʼohutuŋaha esiro hyoŋene cooka era sigenda nʼohusangaalira abageni ababahyalira. Nindi abo ababasangaalira ahena gababbinga baŋwe mu hibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira.
64001011	Wahyange omuhoda, otebisyanga hya niye aye weyongere ohuhola ebiraŋi. Oyo ahola ebiraŋi, ebikolwa bibye biraga biiti mwana wa Hatonda. Aye ahola ebibi, ebikolwa bibye biraga biiti saamanyire Hatonda.
64001012	Abaatu bosibosi baloma biraŋi byereere hu Demetiriyo era ebi baloma byʼamazima olwohuba ebyene byeraga. Hwesi humulomaho biraŋi, era ngʼolu omanyire efe ebi huloma biba byʼamazima.
64001013	Ndi nʼebingi ebyʼohuhuŋandiihira aye ebbaluŋa siyihena.
64001014	Suubira ohuuja eyo mangu kuboneho, huŋaye moni hu moni.
64001015	Hatonda ahuŋe emiyaaya. Abameeri babo bahuheehiise. Keheeseho hiisi mulala hu bameeri beefe.
65001001	Ndiise Yuda omuŋeeresa wa Yesu Kurisito era mulebe ya Yakobbo. Pandiihira enywe abahoda ba Hatonda Seefe era aba galanga era aba ahuuma olwʼohufugiirira Yesu Kurisito.
65001002	Ehisasabirisi nʼemiyaaya nʼohwenda ohuŋwa eyiri Hatonda, byeyongere ohuba ni nenywe.
65001003	Abaatu ba Hatonda abahoda, wayire naali nendire ohubaŋandiihira hu hunoŋoha ohu hwasuna, mula pulira ti hiraŋi mbaŋandiihire ni mbagobosamo amaani mweyongere ohuŋiriŋania esomesa eyʼobudulingi olwʼohufugiirira ohu Hatonda gaŋambya abaatu babe omulundi mulala gwoŋene nga biŋwa.
65001004	Hino kiroma olwohuba eriyo abaatu abatatya Hatonda abaamomoka babengiramo mu hyama nʼesomesa ebbaamya. Abaatu abo basomesa baati mbo ehisasabirisi hya Hatonda hibaŋa ehiyale ohweholera obuhwedi era sibafugiirira baati Yesu Kurisito nje Musengwa era aŋuga. Ebyaŋandiihiwa bibalomaho biiti abo baahena hale ohubasalira omusango.
65001005	Wayire ebiitu bino mubimanyire, nenda ohubahebulisa ti Musengwa gatusa Abayisirayiri e Misiri ne oluvanyuma gasihiirisa abo abatafugiirira bibye.
65001006	Nʼabamalayika abajeema, Hatonda gabadanya mu komera eyo mu hiirema ni babasidihire nʼenjegere eyi bali ohwola hu ludaalo olwʼekomerero olu alisaliraho omusango.
65001007	Mu ngeri njʼenyene, abaatu bʼe Sodoma nʼe Gomora ko nʼebibuga ebindi ebyʼohumulirano, baahola obuhwedi owa hiisi ngeri. Hatonda gabasihiirisa era ehyo hiriŋo ngʼehyohuboneraho ti abo abajeemu balibadanya mu muliro eyi baligada emirembe nʼemirembe.
65001008	Abaatu abo abatatya Hatonda, mu ngeri njʼenyene eyo boosi bahola obuhwedi olwohuba mbo baasuna ohwolesewa Hatonda gaabafugiirira ohuhola ebiitu hyʼebyo. Abaatu abo bajeemera Hatonda era baloma ebibono ebibi hu bitonde ebyomwigulu.
65001009	Cooka ni Mikayiri omuhulu wʼabamalayika ni gaali nʼahaabira ni Sitaani omulambo gwa Musa, malayika oyo sigamusalira musango aye gamuloma ti, “Hatonda ahugudye!”
65001010	Aye abaatu abo, bafodogola ebyo ebi batamanyire era bali hyʼesolo ejiŋuma hutegeera. Bahola ebiitu ebi baleetera ohusihiiriha olwohuba hiisi ehi epeega yaawe yibaloma ohuhola njʼehi bahola.
65001011	Jibageene, olwohuba baŋambire esambo ja Kayini oweeta Abbiri mulebewe. Baluluhanira ebbeesa hya Bbalamu era hya Koola owasihiriha olwʼobujeemu bubwe, mu ngeri njʼenyene boosi balibasihiirisa.
65001012	Abaatu abo bali hyʼehiitu ehyʼembiho hu hiiŋulo hyenywe ehyʼohuhebuliriraho Yesu Musengwa, baŋuma hweŋomeha mu bulamu bwabwe. Era baŋuma nʼesoni, bali hyʼabaayi abafa hu bida byabwe mu hifo hyʼebisolo ebibaaya. Bali hyʼebireri ebidumbadumbana aye sibitonyesa fula. Bali hyʼemisaala ejitaama bibala mu biseera byajo era jooma ohuŋwera erala ŋaasi hu biholo.
65001013	Abaatu abo bali hyʼebimoto byʼamaaji hu nyanja era hyʼamaaji amadumbuuhi nʼesambo jaawe jiŋambya esoni. Bali hyʼemunyeenye eji otaŋanga hwesiga ohuhulagirira eyi oja. Baja hubaŋindiha mu hiirema babe eyo emirembe nʼemirembe.
65001014	Enoka owaaliŋo mu mulembe ogwomusanvu ohuŋwa hwʼAdamu, galoma hu baatu abo ati, “Musengwa aliija nʼabamalayika babe eduuli,
65001015	ohusalira abaatu bosibosi abatatya Hatonda omusango olwʼebibi ebi bahola mu ngeri eyʼohutatya Hatonda nʼolwebibono byosibyosi ebi bamulomaho.”
65001016	Abaatu abo, basiiba bemulugunya era ni bendula ebibi hu baatu. Beŋira baati mbo njʼabahihenaho era bahiina abaatu abandi olwʼohwenda ohubasunaho ehi baba ni benda.
65001017	Aye balebe bange abahoda, muhebulire ebi bahwenda ba Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito baaloma.
65001018	Babalomera baati, “Mu ndaalo ejʼekomerero, ŋalibaaŋo abaatu abalibanyooma era abaligondera ohwegomba hwawe ohubi ohwʼomubiri.”
65001019	Era abaatu abo, njʼabali huleetanga ohwesalamo mu nywe olwʼohwegomba hwabwe ohubi era baŋuma Omwoyo Omutukuvu mu bulamu bwawe.
65001020	Aye enywe balebe bange abahoda, mweyongere ohuhula mu hufugiirira hwenywe era mulombenga Hatonda mu maani gʼOmwoyo Omutukuvu.
65001021	Mugumire hu hugendera mu hwenda hwa Hatonda ni mulindirira Musengwa yeefe Yesu Kurisito ohubaŋa obulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
65001022	Muŋambirenga ehisa abafugiirira Yesu ababa ni bali nʼohubuusabuusa mu bulamu bwawe.
65001023	Abandi mubaŋalulenga ohuŋwa mu muliro; nʼabandi mubaŋambirenga ehisa era ehyo muhiholenga nʼohwegenderesa cooka mucaawenga esambo jaawe embi.
65001024	Ale ŋahani muŋenga eŋono Hatonda weefe oyo asobola ohubahuuma ndimugwa era gabengisa mu ŋono lirye ni muŋumaho mbalo era ni muli nʼesangaalo.
65001025	Era abaatu ni babita mu Yesu Kurisito Musengwa yeefe baŋenga Hatonda era Omunoŋosi weefe eŋono olwohuba njʼomulala yenjene. Ye njʼomwene buŋangi, njʼaŋuga, njʼowaaliŋo ohuŋwa ahale nahale, aliŋo hatyane era njʼaja hubaŋo emirembe nʼemirembe. Amiina.
66001001	Hino njʼEhitabo hyʼebibono ebi Yesu Kurisito gahwehulira Yowaane. Hatonda gaŋa Yesu ebibono bino biŋange ohwola eri abaatu babe bamanye ebyali ni bija hubaŋo mu hiseera ehitali hya ŋale era Yesu gaatuma malayika eri Yowaane omuŋeeresa wuwe abimulomere.
66001002	Yowaane yeesi abiroosa byosibyosi ngʼolu gabibona era aŋandiiha obuhwenda buno obuŋwa eri Hatonda nʼebiitu byosibyosi ebi Yesu Kurisito gaamuhwehulira.
66001003	Gesiimire oyo anasomerenga abaatu ebibono bino ebyʼobunaabbi era besiimire abanabiŋulirenga baahena baabiŋamba mu mwoyo! Hino kiroma olwohuba ehiseera hyʼohwolerera hwabyo hinatere ohwola.
66001004	Ndiise Yowaane abaŋadiihira enywe abomu bibbubbu omusanvu ebyʼabafugiirira Kurisito ebiri mu twale lyʼAsiya. Hatonda owaaliŋo ohuŋwa ahale nahale, aliŋo hatyane era aja hubaŋo emirembe nʼemirembe, nʼali ŋalala nʼemyoyo omusanvu ejiri mu moni wʼetebe yiye eyʼobuŋugi,
66001005	ko ni Yesu Kurisito nasoswe mu hulamuha ohwa bosibosi, aloma ebituufu hu Hatonda era nga njʼomuŋugi ali nʼobuŋangi hu baatu bosibosi mu hyalo, babaŋambire ehisasabirisi era babaŋe emiyaaya. Eŋono nʼobuŋangi bibe eri Yesu Kurisito oyo atwenda obugali era agatufiiririiye gatunoŋola mu bibi byefe,
66001006	gaahena gatufuula abaatu babe era abaŋeeresa ba Semwana era Hatonda weefe, emirembe nʼemirembe. Amiina.
66001007	Ale ni mwetege! Kurisito oyu mbalomera ali mu ngira gaajira hu bireri. Abaatu bosibosi ni mulimo ni naabo abamufumita banahamubone. Era abaatu bangi mu hyalo banahalire amasiga olwʼobuti. Mu butuufu aŋabula hubadulinga pohinahabe hiityo. Amiina.
66001008	Hatonda Musengwa aloma ati, “Ndiise Alufa nʼOmega, Omwene buŋangi, owaaliŋo ohuŋwa ahale nahale era aliŋo hatyane era aja hubaŋo emirembe nʼemirembe.”
66001009	Ese Yowaane mulebe yenywe era owahyenywe mu hubonaabona nʼohugumira oluŋetehe olu banamaani batutaayeho olwʼohufugiirira Yesu, nʼali hu hizinga ehi balanga baati Patimo, eyi bandanya olwʼohulomera abaatu ehibono hya Hatonda ko nʼebiitu byosibyosi ebi Yesu Kurisito gakwehuliiye.
66001010	Lulala ni nʼali eyo, hu ludaalo lwa Musengwa, Omwoyo wa Hatonda ni gamaamiiye, naŋulira ejanjaasi lyʼomuutu nʼalomera egongo wange, nʼejanjaasi eribbuhulya hyʼegwala.
66001011	Omwene janjaasi eryo nʼaloma ati, “Ŋandiiha mu hitabo ebi obona ohene obiŋeerese ebibbubbu omusanvu ebyʼabafugiirira, ehyʼEfeeso, ehyʼe Simiruna, ehyʼe Perugaamo, ehyʼe Siyatira, ehyʼe Sarudi, ehyʼe Filadelufiya, nʼehye Lawodiikiya.”
66001012	Ngʼaŋo cuuha mbone owaali nʼaloma ni nange. Ni nacuuha, nga mbona ebihondo byʼetaala musanvu ebi babbota mu zaabbu.
66001013	Era nga mbona nʼomuutu owaali nʼafaana hyʼOmwana wʼOmuutu. Omuutu oyo gaali gambaaye ehyambalo ehyolera erala ŋaasi hu magulu gage, era ni gewoŋire omusibiro ogufaana hyʼe zaabbu mu hifuba, nʼebihondo byʼetaala omusanvu ni bimweswanigirihiise.
66001014	Omuutu oyo gaali nʼefiiri eryene ehosa ni lipepya hupepya hyʼamabaale gʼefula, nʼemoni jije ni jaaduha hyʼenjase yʼomuliro.
66001015	Amagulu gage gaali gamesya hyʼehyoma ehi omubboti ali hwohya mu muliro nʼejanjaasi lirye ni lifuga hyʼomwoluumo gwʼamaaji agʼomubando.
66001016	Mu muhono gugwe omulungi gaali aŋambire emunyeenye musanvu era mu munwa gugwe ni musobekereeyemo epiima eriho obwogi hu mbega jombi. Mu moni gaali gaduha hwaduha hyʼenjase yʼeryuba mu tungulwe.
66001017	Ni namubona nga ngwa mu moni jije, pola hyʼomufu. Ngʼaŋo niye gapambaho nʼomuhono gugwe omulungi gandoma ati, “Otatya, ndiise Mudaayi era Nakoma.
66001018	Ndiise omwene bulamu. Naali fuuye, aye bona ŋaahani ndi mulamu emirembe nʼemirembe! Era ndiise ali nʼobuŋangi obutusa omufu e magombe gaaba mulamu.
66001019	“Ale ŋaahani ŋandiiha ebi oweene, ebiriŋo hatyane nʼebiija ohubaŋo oluvanyuma.
66001020	Amahulu gʼemunyeenye omusanvu eji oweene mu muhono gwange omulungi ko nʼebihondo byʼetaala omusanvu ebi babbota mu zaabbu nga gano: Emunyeenye omusanvu njʼabatangirisi bʼebibbubbu omusanvu ebyʼabafugiirira, nʼebihondo ebyʼetaala omusanvu, njʼebibbubbu omusanvu ebyʼabafugiirira.”
66002001	Ngʼaŋo nindi gandoma ati, “Ŋandiihira omutangirisi owʼehibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira ehiri mu hibuga Efeeso nʼobaloma oti, ‘Bino njʼebibono byʼoyo aŋambire emunyeenye omusanvu mu muhono gugwe omulungi, era agendera ŋagati wʼebihondo byʼetaala omusanvu ebi babbota mu zaabbu (ko njʼabatangirisi baabyo omusanvu nʼebibbubbu omusanvu ebyʼabaatu abamufugiirira).
66002002	Manyire ebikolwa byenywe nʼohuhalabana ohu muhalabana ohubona muuti musigala ni mwemereeye ngʼabaloobera bange, nʼohwehaliriha hwenywe mu huhiyaania ohu babahiyaania olwohuba mufugiirira ebi ndoma. Manyire ngʼolu mutaŋanga hugumikiriza abo abahola ebibi era ngʼolu mwapima aberanga ohuba abahwenda bange mwabafaania ni bali badulingi.
66002003	Mugwiriiye ebigosi bingi olwohuba balobera bange aye ehyo ndihibahenamo maani cooka mwehaliiriha ohubonaabona ohu abanamaani baboohiseho.’
66002004	“Aye wayire hiri hiityo, omulaŋi saahaya mbalo. Mboloobya olwohuba mwalehaŋo ohwenda ohu mwali ni nahwo oludaayi ni mwahafuuha abaloobera bange.
66002005	Ale ni hiisi muutu ahebulire ohwenda ohu gaali ni nahwo gebbwage acuusemo ahole ebikolwa ebiraŋi ebigaholanga mu hutagiha. Aye ni mutebbwage mwacuuha, nja huuja eyi muli mbabonerese ni tusaŋo ehihondo hyʼetaala yenywe mu hifo hyayo.
66002006	Cooka musangaahise mu hino. Mwesi mucaawa hyʼese ebikolwa byʼabaloobera ba Nikolayiti.
66002007	“Ale ni ali nʼohutwi, getege aŋulire ehi Omwoyo wa Hatonda alomera ebibbubbu byʼabafugiirira. Omuutu aŋangula amaani gʼebibi, ndimuŋa obuŋangi ohulya hu biriiwa byʼomusaala oguleeta obulamu, oguli ewa Hatonda mu hifo ehyʼohwesiima.”
66002008	Ngʼaŋo nindi gandoma ati, “Ŋandiihira omutangirisi owʼehibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira ehiri mu hibuga hyʼe Simiruna oti, ‘Bino njʼebibono byʼoyo Omudaayi era Nakoma, oyu baali ni beetire aye galamuha.
66002009	Manyire ebiguudyo ebi boolaho, nʼobugadi obu mulimo cooka mu bulamu bwʼohufugiirira muli baŋinda. Manyire ngʼolu aberanga abaatu ba Hatonda olwohuba mbo Bayudaaya ate nga mu butuufu hibbubbu hyʼabaŋeeresa Sitaani, babaŋaha ehibi.
66002010	Muhimanye muuti abaatu ba Sitaani abo banahadaanye abandi hu nywe mu komyo olwʼohwenda ohubaleba era banahabahiyaanie ohuhena ehimanga higeregere. Bino nʼolu binahabooleho, simuŋwangamo maani olwʼebiguudyo ebi banahabagudye. Mumanya mutadaanya bwesige obu mwataayemo nʼolu hiba ni hiboosa hu hubeeta. Olwohuba ni mulihena ohugumya obwesige muutyo ese ndibaŋa ehirabo ehyʼobulamu obutaŋwaŋo.’
66002011	“Ale ni ali nʼohutwi, getege aŋulire ehi Omwoyo wa Hatonda alomera ebibbubbu byʼabafugiirira. Omuutu aŋangula amaani gʼebibi, ohufa ohwohubiri sihulimwolaho kadi nʼaŋadidiri.”
66002012	Ngʼaŋo nindi gandoma ati, “Ŋandiihira omutangirisi wʼehibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira ehiri mu hibuga hyʼe Perugaamo nʼobaloma oti, ‘Bino njʼebibono byʼoyo ali nʼepiima eriho obwogi hu mbega jombi.
66002013	Manyire ngʼolu muli mu higosi ehyʼohumenya mu hifo omuli obuŋugi wa Sitaani aye wayire hiri hiityo mugumire mwasigala ni muli baloobera bange. Nʼomu biseera byʼAtipa omuloobera wange owalomeranga abaatu ebipambaho nʼobugumu oyu banamaani betiiye mu hibuga hyenywe omu Sitaani asisimbaaye, mwaguma nandi muneegaana.’
66002014	“Aye wayire hiri hiityo, ŋaliŋo bididiri ebi mboloobya. Muli nʼabaatu mu nywe abafugiirira esomesa ya Bbalamu, owʼabbaamya Bbalaki nʼamulagira atege Abayisirayiri, boonoone mu moni ja Hatonda ni balya ebi baŋongeeye emisambwa, era bahole nʼobuhwedi.
66002015	Mu ngeri njʼenyene muli nʼabaatu mu nywe abafugiirira esomesa yʼaba Nikolayiti eroma yiiti abaloobera ba Kurisito boosi bebisye ngʼolu Bbalamu omulagusi gabbaamya Bbalaki habaha wa Mowabbu atege Abayisirayiri.
66002016	Ale ni mwebbwage mucuuse emyoyo! Aye ni mutahihole, nahaaje eyo mu hiseera ehitali hyaŋale soose aba hiŋambaho nʼepiima eriho obwogi hu mbega jombi eyiri mu munwa gwange.
66002017	“Ale ni ali nʼohutwi, getege aŋulire ehi Omwoyo wa Hatonda alomera ebibbubbu byʼabafugiirira. Oyo aŋangula amaani ga Sitaani ndimuliisa hu maanu eyibahweha. Era ndimuŋa ebaale ehosa eri baŋandiihaho esiina enyaaha, eri ŋabula kadi mulala alimanyire ohutusaho omweneryo.”
66002018	Ngʼaŋo nindi gandoma ati, “Ŋandiihira omutangirisi wʼehibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira ehiri mu hibuga hyʼe Siyatira nʼobaloma oti, ‘Bino njʼebibono byʼOmwana wa Hatonda ali nʼemoni ejaduha hyʼenjase yʼomuliro nʼamagulu agamesya hyʼehyoma ehi omubboti ataaye mu muliro.
66002019	Manyire ebikolwa byenywe. Manyire ngʼolu mwendana era ngʼolu mwegumisye ohufugiirira. Manyire nʼengeri eyi hiisi muutu ayeedamo owahye aba ni getaaga obuyeedi nʼohwehaliriha ohu muli ni nahwo mu bigosi ebi mwagaana era nga ebi muhola hatyane bingi ohuhiraho ebimwaholanga ni mwahafugiirira.’
66002020	“Aye wayire hiri hiityo, mboloobya olwa hino. Mulehire Yezebbeeri omuhasi oweranga naabbi, gaabbamya abaŋeeresa bange nʼabegirisa obuhwedi nʼohulya ebi baŋongeeye emisambwa.
66002021	Omuhasi oyo mbaye muleheeyemo ni muŋaaye ehimanga gebbwage, aye ehyo sahyenda.
66002022	Olwʼehyo nahamuteho endwaye eyi nahamute hu buliri gaaba ohwo nʼalooŋa. Ni nʼabo abahwedesania ni naye, ni batebbwage bacuuha baleha ebi bahola ni naye, boosi nahabateeho ehidambyo ehyʼamaani.
66002023	Era nahasihiirise abaloobera bʼomuhasi oyo bosibosi, ko ebibbubbu byʼabafugiirira byosibyosi bitegeere biiti ese ndiise afaania ebiŋeego nʼemyoyo jʼabaatu. Kena era nasasula hiisi muutu ehimusaaniiye, ni neema hu bikolwa bibye.
66002024	Ne ŋaahani enywe abasigaayeŋo mu Siyatira, enywe omutafugiirira somesa yʼomuhasi oyo era abateeta hu ebyo ebi abandi balanga ebyama bya Sitaani ebyʼomugati, sinja hubatwiiha busito obundi.
66002025	Ohutusaho mbahubbirisa mugumye ohufugiirira ohu muli ni nahwo ohwola olu ndigobola hu hyalo.
66002026	Hiisi muutu aŋangula amaani gʼehibi, gahola ebi ndagira ohwola hu komerero, ndimuŋa obuŋangi ohuŋuga amawanga.
66002027	“Ngʼolu Bbaabba gaapa obuŋangi ohuŋuga, ni nooyo aŋangula keesi ndimuŋa esimbo yʼowaami eyʼehyoma, era aliyitambisa ohubulungula abamuŋahania ngʼolu omuutu abulungula etamu.
66002028	“Era aliba nʼeŋono hyʼerya suulwe.
66002029	Ale ali nʼohutwi, getege aŋulire ehi Omwoyo wa Hatonda alomera ebibbubbu byʼabafugiirira.”
66003001	Ngʼaŋo nindi gandoma ati ŋandiihira omutangirisi wʼehibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira ehiri mu hibuga hyʼe Sarudi oti, “Bino njʼebibono byʼoyo ali nʼemyoyo omusanvu ejiŋeeresa Hatonda era aŋambire emunyeenye omusanvu mu ngalo yiye. Manyire ebibi ebi muhola. Mweranga ohuba balamu aye mu bulamu obwʼomwoyo mwafa hale.”
66003002	Mu bikolwa byenywe simbonamo ehisangaasa Hatonda. Olwʼehyo muŋwe mwiro eri mulimo! Musisimuhe mugobose bunyaaha ebihiiriho ebiramu mu hufugiirira hwenywe byosi ni bihiiri hufiira erala.
66003003	Ale ni muhebulire ebipambaho ebi mwaŋulira ngʼolu babibasomesa mwebbwage mucuuse omwoyo era muhole ebikolwa ebyolana. Aye ni mutaaŋwe mwiro, nahaaje hyʼomwibi ni talagire era simulimanya nʼehiseera ehi ndijiramo ohubaboneresa.
66003004	Aye wayire hiri hiityo, mu nywe abafugiirira mu Sarudi, mulimo abaatu badidiri abahiiri hweyonoona, abahiigendera mu bulamu obusangaasa Hatonda. Abaatu abo baligenda ni neese ni bambaaye ebyambalo ebihosa, olwohuba bibasaanira.
66003005	Hiisi muutu aŋangula amaani gʼebibi, yeesi balimwambasa ebyambalo ebihosa, era sindisangula siina lirye mu hitabo ehyʼobulamu. Era ndirangirira mu moni ja Bbaabba nʼabamalayika babe ti abaatu abo bange.
66003006	Ale ni ali nʼohutwi, getege aŋulire ehi Omwoyo wa Hatonda alomera ebibbubbu byʼabafugiirira.
66003007	Ngʼaŋo nindi gandoma ati ŋandiihira omutangirisi wʼehibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira ehiri mu hibuga Filadelufiya oti, “Bino mbʼebibono byʼoyo Omwabufu era aloma ebituufu, ali nʼehisumuluzo ohulaga ngʼolu ali nʼobuŋangi. Naŋamba ehisumuluzo ehyo gegulaŋo omulyango ŋabula aŋanga ohugwigala, era anegalaŋo ŋabula aŋanga ohwigulaŋo.
66003008	Manyire ebikolwa byenywe era manyire ngʼolu bababisyamo emoni olwohuba mbo mubula punga eyiita ehiswa. Cooka ehyo sihibahenamo maani aye mugumisye ehibono hyange ndimunegaana. Ale ni mubone! Ese kenire ohubeguliraŋo omulyango era ŋabula aŋanga ohugwigala.
66003009	Abo abababisyamo emoni olwohuba beranga baati mbo Bayudaaya ate nga hibbubbu hyʼabaŋeeresa Sitaani, nahabaleete mu moni jenywe babahubbira amafuha ko bafaanie baati mbenda.”
66003010	Ohuŋwa ngʼolu mweŋaayeyo mwahola ngʼolu nabalaabbira, mwehaliiriha ebigosi byʼohubahiyaania, keesi nahababayule ohuhemewa ohu nahalehe Sitaani goosa hu baatu bomu hyalo abagaana ohufugiirira ndibiboolaho.
66003011	Ndi hugobola hu hyalo ohulamula nʼohutongosa obuŋugi bwange mu hiseera ehitali hyaŋale. Olwʼehyo mbahubbirisa mugumye ohufugiirira ohu muli ni nahwo ohwola olu nahagobole, ŋahaye hubaŋo muutu yesiyesi abanyagulaho ehirabo ehyʼobulamu obutaŋwaŋo.
66003012	Hiisi muutu aŋangula amaani gʼehibi, ndimufuula ohuba hisindi mu Yekaalu ya Hatonda wange, era saaliŋwamo kadi nʼaŋatotono. Ndihena namuŋandiihaho amasiina amanyaaha agaloma gaati muutu wange era muutu wa Hatonda wange, omwihasi owʼemirembe nʼemirembe owomu hibuga Yerusaalemu ehinyaaha ehinaheehe hu hyalo ni hiŋwa mwigulu ewa Hatonda.
66003013	Ale ni ali nʼohutwi, getege aŋulire ehi Omwoyo wa Hatonda alomera ebibbubbu byʼabafugiirira.
66003014	Ngʼaŋo nindi gandoma ati ŋandiihira omutangirisi wʼehibbubbu hyʼabafugiirira ehiri mu hibuga hyʼe Lawodiikiya oti, “Bino njʼebibono byʼoyo oyu balanga baati Amiina, aloma ebituufu hu Hatonda era esimuho yʼebiitu byosibyosi ebi Hatonda gabumba.
66003015	Manyire ebikolwa byenywe. Ohufugiirira hwenywe hwahamwoyomwoyo. Muli hyʼamaaji agʼehinya pola agatagwisa nduŋo, olwohuba sigahutula ate simaŋolu. Kale mwandibaaye hirala hu bibiri!”
66003016	Ale ngʼolu mufugiirira bya hamwoyomwoyo, nahabahaase ngʼolu omuutu ahaasa amaaji agatagwisa nduŋo.
66003017	Mwepaaha muuti mbo muli nʼobuŋinda obubahena era ŋabula hindi ehi mwetaaga. Cooka ehihulu simumanyire muuti muli balimbiriri abali mu naku eyʼahasolo ahohye hyʼomugadi oweyagira olujo abula nʼehya awiiha amagumba.
66003018	Olwʼehyo muganye mbaŋe hu magesi. Muuje eyi ndi mwegulire ebyʼobuŋinda ebyʼamahulu ko muŋange ohuba baŋinda mu moni ja Hatonda. Muuje mbaguse nʼebyambalo ebihosa, mwambale muŋone esoni ejʼohugenda amajula, ko nʼobulesi owʼohuta hu moni jenywe jirimbule mutagihe ohufaania ebya Hatonda.
66003019	Simbaduha aye mbalegera. Ese aba nenda mbahayula nahena nabaŋamo nʼendabusi. Aŋo paŋa ndomera ti mwebbwage nʼohufugiirira hwenywe muhwongeremo amaani.
66003020	Ale mwetege mbalomere! Pano kookona hu lwigi. Omuutu yesiyesi anaaŋulire ejanjaasi lyange ganjiguliraŋo nengire nahena nalyaho mu wuwe.
